<item><p>182a.1</p><section></section><text>la'o/ /sti'i'o/ /am shas la yang na'o/ /i na'i yaNa'o/ /ma brtsegs pa las atsa gcig yin pa las i'i'o/ /mi zad gang dbyed pa can nye ba'i cho ga las su d+hI min pa'i u'i 'ang su pa la'o/ /baR+ShA tr-in bu nar ka ra las</text></item>

<item><p>182a.3</p><section></section><text>uta las so/ /rita dang ba ma dag la 'di dbyi ba yang na'o/ /krinya las ya la yang na'o/ /a ta gyi uta kun 'gro ba la'o/ /asti dang sh+nam dag gi'o/ /sh+mA dang gnyis dag gi Ata'o/ /d+hi min I 'dir i[: ]da ri drA'i Ita'o/ /b+hI'i yang na'o/ /hAka</text></item>

<item><p>182a.5</p><section></section><text>thal la iT la'o/ /tri pha la b+ha dza trapa kyi'o/ /ra d+ha'i 'tshe ba la'o/ /dzA b+h+ra mu[: ]tra sa[: ]phaN rA dza b+hA dza b+hA sha b+hA sha s+ya mu swa na sogs la e'o/ /da b+ha shra tha gra tha rnams kyi'o/ /ma tsi patsi man rnams kyi ming la'o/ /na sha'i ad la'o/ /ba da sha sab dang po</text></item>
<item><p>182a.6</p><section></section><text>yon tan can rnams kyi ma yin no/ /arba Na'i tra sA ba la na nya las so/ /ma g+hon yang na'o/ /b+ha'i 'o/ /bA da'i patA'o/ /ba sU'i ba byaM'o/ /bA ha'i u tha'o/ /yu ban ma g+ha ban/ shwan rnams de phan la ma yin no/ /ata las an gyi dbyi'o/ /</text></item>
<item><p>182a.7</p><section></section><text>aN la Sha snga ma'i 'o/ /han d+hi ta rA dzan rnams kyi'o/ /bi shI dag la yang na'o/ /brtsegs pa las pa ma las ma yin no/ /any+tsa'i'o/ /uta las I'o/ /ata las A pa min pa las so/ /Da ti la biM sha ti'i ti li'o/ /de phan la min no/ /ka lA</text></item>
<item><p>182b.1</p><section></section><text>bya sogs so/ /shwan las a ba ya ba dang saM ko tsa dag las so/ /a sha man las rnam 'gyur la'o/ /tsarman las mdzod la'o/ /mi ring ba las cig car dang sha shwad las mi zad pa'i 'o/ /a ha na'i kha la'o/ /sar+b+ba dang grangs med pa phyogs gcig min pa</text></item>
<item><p>182b.2</p><section></section><text>las tatsa la'o/ /grangs las kun sdud pa la'o/ /aka las so/ /in+ta ka'i ta la sogs pa'i ta ma la'o/ /ka la sogs pa'i mang por ro/ /u'i yon tan las swa yaM b+hU ma yin pa las so/ /D+ha la a kaDa yang na'o/ /i a'i 'o/ /di la 'ang ngo / /mat+t+ya'i</text></item>
<item><p>182b.3</p><section></section><text>ya'i'o/ /ha la las de phan gyi'o/ /sUR+Ya la a gas+t+ya dag gi cha la 'ang ngo / /ti Sh+yaH pu Sh+ya dag gi rgyu skar la aN la'o/ /Ata min pa la bu rgyud la'o/ /tswi kya dag la'o/ /bilpa kI ya sogs rnams kyi I yi'o/ /iSh+Tha I ma A yas rnams la Ti las so/ /</text></item>
<item><p>182b.4</p><section></section><text>s+thu la dU ra[: ]yu baH k+Shi pra k+Shu dra rnams kyi yata la sogs pa sta y+ton yang ngo / /ba hu las i'i ste b+hU yang b+ha hu las so/ /iSh+Tha la yika yang ngo / /dz+ya las I ya'i A'o/ /gri ya s+thi ra[: ]s+thi ra[: ]s+phir[: ]u ru gu ru[: ]ba hu la[: ]tri pra[: ]dIr+g+ha hra swa[: ]br-id+d+ha br-in+dAr ka</text></item>
<item><p>182b.5</p><section></section><text>rnams ni[: ]pra[: ]snra[: ]s+pha[: ]pa ra[: ]ga ra[: ]baM ha[: ]tra ba[: ]drA g+ha[: ]tras baR+Sha[: ]brin+da rnams so/ /pr-i thu/ mr-i thu[: ]kr-i shab+h+ri sha di D+ha[: ]pa ri br-i D+ha rnams kyi r-ita kyi ra'o/ /pra sha sa'i shra dang I yas kyi iSh+Tha'o/ /br-id+d+ha'i dz+ya 'ang ngo / /bA D+ha[: ]an+ti ka dag gi sgrub pa la</text></item>
<item><p>182b.6</p><section></section><text>ngo 'o/ /yu ba alpa ga gi kan yang na'o/ /atsa gcig pa las ma yin no/ /a ka la rA dza n+ya ma nu Sh+ya yu ba na rnams kyi'o/ /At+man dang a d+h+wa na dag gi khala'o/ /dngos po dang las min pa dag gi an gyi ya la'o/ /aN la'o/ /karman[: ]gyi ngang</text></item>
<item><p>182b.7</p><section></section><text>tshul ma yin pa la'o/ /ma las wa rman gyi bu rgyud la'o/ /hi ta nA man gyi yang na'o/ /brah+man gyi rigs la'o/ /uk+Shan gyi'o/ /gA thI bi da thi ka shi ga Ni pa Ni rnams kyi brtsegs pa las in gyi tshogs pa ma yin pa la'o/ /a ba t+ya ma yin pa la'ang ngo / /</text></item>
<item><p>183a.1</p><section></section><text>dA N+Ti nA ya na[: ]hA sti nA ya na/ bA si nA ya ni/ jai h+mA shi ne ya/ b+h+rau Na ta t+ya d+yai ba t+ya[: ]sA ra ba[: ]ai k+ShA ka /hi ra Na ya a tharba ni rnams so/ /zhes pa sA d+hu kIr+t+ti'i 'jam dpal gyi sgra brda sprod pa las skabs bdun pa'i rkang</text></item>
<item><p>183a.2</p><section></section><text>pa gsum pa rdzogs so// //phyed du 'gro ba la bal dang po'i ita'o/ /sw-i ShUng u dati las yang na'o/ /ra d+ha na sha[: ]tr-i pa dr-i pa dru hi mu ha Sh+Nu[: ]Sh+Ni hi rnams kyi 'ang ngo / /niSh+kuSha las so/ /niSh+ThA 'i rtag tu'o/ /pa sak+Shu d+hi dag gik+t+wA las</text></item>
<item><p>183a.3</p><section></section><text>kyang ngo / /any+tsi las mchod pa'o/ /mi brtan pa la u b+ha las so/ /pU kli sha las yang na'o/ /u dita las so/ /dzr-I[: ]pra sh+tsa dag las so/ /i Shu[: ]sa ha[: ]lu b+ha[: ]ru[: ]Sha ri Sha las ta dang po'i 'o/ /san las i ba mtha' dang / r-i d+ha[:]</text></item>
<item><p>183a.4</p><section></section><text>b+has+dza[: ]dan b+hu[: ]shri[: ]s+r+wi[: ]pra Ur+Na[: ]b+ha[: ]ra[: ]dz+nya pi sa ni ta ni pa ti da ri drA rnams la'o/ /sri pra ta las so/ /lid si tsa dag la At+ma ma ne'i tshig la'o/ /r-ita las kyang brtsegs pa dang po las so/ /ring po las ling a tang si tsa las so/ /liT</text></item>
<item><p>183a.5</p><section></section><text>las ma yin no/ /gra ha las so/ /kri ta[: ]tsi ra ta[: ]nr-i ta[: ]tr-id ts+tsh+r-id rnams las sitsa min pa'i sa dang po las so/ /ga mi las rtag tu a tad la'o/ /br-ita rnams las tad An la'o/ /klib las tAs kyi 'ang ngo / /snu las ma yin no/ /kraM las</text></item>
<item><p>183a.6</p><section></section><text>so/ /tang gi yul las kr-ita kyi byed pa po la'o/ /ba sha la'o/ /gra ha sogs min pa las ti'o/ /atsa gcig pa las shrI shwi DI[: ]shIng[: ]Uta[: ]pu Nu[: ]k+Shu[: ]snu[: ]ru bik+Shu las so/ /shak+no ti las so/ /pa tsi[: ]ba tsi[: ]si tsi ri tsi gi tsi mu tsi rnams</text></item>
<item><p>183a.7</p><section></section><text>las so/ /brats+tsha las so/ /b+ha dzi b+hu dzi b+hany+dzi ya dzi[: ]yu dzi[: ]rany+dzi[: ]ni dzi b-i dz-i san+dzi[: ]sri dzi[: ]ru dzi swan+dzI t+ya dzi mas+dzi bras+dzi rnams las so/ /a di ha di[: ]sa da skan+daH sha di[: ]tu di[: ]ts+tshi di[: ]k+Shu di[: ]nu di bi[: ]di ba di[: ]bin khi di[: ]bi d+ya sA di rnams</text></item>
<item><p>183b.1</p><section></section><text>las so/ /bya d+hi[: ]yu d+hi[: ]rA d+hi[: ]kru d+hi[: ]ru d+hi[: ]sA b+hi[: ]shu d+hi[: ]si d+hi[: ]bu[: ]d+h+ya[: ]k+Shu d+hi[: ]ban+d+hi rnams las so/ /ta bi[: ]ti pi[: ]li pi[: ]lu bi[: ]sha pi[: ]ba pi[: ]sri pi[: ]sa pi[: ]k+Shi pi a bits+tshu pi rnams so/ /a b+hi[: ]ra b+hi[: ]la b+hi rnams las</text></item>
<item><p>183b.2</p><section></section><text>so/ /ya mi[: ]ra mi[: ]na mi[: ]ga mi[: ]rnams las so/ /di shi[: ]dr-i shi[: ]ri shi[: ]li shi[: ]bi shi[: ]ru shi[: ]mr-i shi[: ]spr-i shi[: ]kru shi[: ]daM shi rnams las so/ /dwi Shi[: ]kr-i Shi[: ]bi Shi[: ]bi Shi[: ]puSh+ya[: ]du Shi[: ]twib Shi tu Shi shi Sha[: ]sh+la Sh+ya[: ]shu Sh+ye[:]</text></item>

<item><p>187a.1</p><section></section><text>kyi yon tan no/ /lug la yang na'o/ /dzas la'ang ngo / /ngita la nA TA la min no/ /sa khi la sa ma yin no/ /bsdu ba la yang na'o/ /pa ti las so/ /pud med la TA nA min pa las so/ /A Nu d+yA'o/ /A pa</text></item>

<item><p>187a.5</p><section></section><text>kata min pa kun 'gro la ring po'o/ /yang na tswi la'o/ /rAng r-ita las so/ /sha yako[: ]yA su Ta la ring 'o/ /arti dang brtsegs pa dang po dag gi yon tan no/ /yang na la'o/ /'tshe ba la han gyi g+h+ni'o/ /g+h+rA d+h+ma dag gi mI'o/ /tswal a 'a'o/ /</text></item>
<item><p>187a.6</p><section></section><text>kya tsa la'o/ /bkres pa la a sha na'i ma yin no/ /d+ha na'i sred pa la'o/ /u da ka'i mu da no'o/ /pr-i Sha a shwa dag gi 'khrig pa la suka'o/ /zas la a suka kyang ngo / /ta la kita la d+ya ta s+ya ti mA s+thA rnams ita'o/ /shA ts+tshA dag gi yang na'o/ /da</text></item>
<item><p>187a.7</p><section></section><text>d+hA ti'i hi'o/ /hAka gi twA la'o/ /d+hi dang dA ngag gi ngata'o/ /nyer bsgyur gyi atsa las ta'o/ /apa kyi b+ha la ta'o/ /sa'i sa la phyed 'gro la'o/ /tAs asti dag gi ra la 'ang dbyi'o/ /ata la ha'o/ /kyang la yang na'o/ /o dzas ap+sa</text></item>
<item><p>187b.1</p><section></section><text>ras dag gi'o/ /ya i yig dag la dI d+hI be bI dag gi'o/ /mi[: ]mIH mI d+hi[: ]ra b+ha[: ]la b+ha[: ]sha ka[: ]pa ta[: ]pa da rnams kyi atsa san gyi sa la isa'o/ /rA d+ha'i 'tshe ba la'o/ /dz+nyA pi Apa dag gi Ita'o/ /dan+d+ha'i ITa'ang ngo / /r-i</text></item>
<item><p>187b.2</p><section></section><text>d+ha'i i ra'o/ /las med pa las mu tsi'i ota yang na'o/ /'dir gnyis la dang po'i dbyi'o/ /hal dang po min pa'i'o/ /kha ya la khar gyi'o/ /pha tsha Tha tha rnams kyi tsa ya'o/ /dz+ha Sha'i dza sha'o/ /ku ha dag gi tsu'o/ /kung gi yang la ma yin no/ /</text></item>
<item><p>187b.3</p><section></section><text>r-i'i a ta'o/ /thung ngu'o/ /liTaH kita la iNa'i ring po'o/ /dang po'i a ta h+yi'o/ /de las hal gcig ma yin pa'i nu Ta'o/ /ash+no ti'i'o/ /b+hU'i ata'o/ /bi Sha pi dza ni dza rnams kyi sh+Nu la yon tan no/ /arti pr-I[: ]b+h+r-iM[: ]mA[: ]hAng</text></item>
<item><p>187b.4</p><section></section><text>rnams kyi ita'o/ /san la ata kyi'o/ /pu[: ]yan[: ]dza[: ]a pha rol la u'i'o/ /pu[: ]du[: ]sru shru[: ]r+Yu p+lu rnams kyi Ni la yang na'o/ /yang na la yon tan no/ /kita min pa las ring po'o/ /pany+tsu[: ]sri su[: ]d+h+wan+su[: ]b+h+ran+su[: ]ka Sha pa</text></item>
<item><p>187b.5</p><section></section><text>ta[: ]pa ra[: ]skin+di rnams kyi nI k+Sha'o/ /nyam las ata las muka ste mtha' bzhin no/ /dza pa[: ]dza b+ha[: ]da ha[: ]da sha[: ]b+hany+dza[: ]sha sha rnams kyi 'ang ngo / /tsa ra pha la dag ga'o/ /ta la'ang rang bzhin gyi uta'o/ /r-i ldan pa'i rIka'o/ /</text></item>
<item><p>187b.6</p><section></section><text>'jig pa la rug rika dag kyang ngo / /aka ma phyis pa yang ba li Ni la tsang la san bzhin no/ /yang pa'i rang bzhin po'o/ /smraM[: ]dr-I[: ]s+t+r-I[: ]pra[: ]tha[: ]mra[: ]da[: ]twa[: ]ra[: ]sba sha rnams kyi ata'o/ /beSh+Ti tseSh+Ti dag gi yang na'o/ /ga Na'i</text></item>
<item><p>187b.7</p><section></section><text>ita'o/ /zhes pa sA d+hu kIr+t+ti'i 'jam dpal gyi sgra brda sprod pa las skabs brgyad pa'i rkang pa gnyis pa rdzogs so// //khyab 'dod dang yang yang dag la gnyis so/ /spangs pa'i tshig la pa ri'i yang na'o/ /a d+ha saH a d+hiH u pa ri</text></item>
<item><p>188a.1</p><section></section><text>las nye ba la'o/ /yang dag par 'dod pa dag la kun tu bos nas brjod pa'i tshig dang po'i 'o/ /e ka'i supa 'jig go/ /kun tu gnod pa la skyes pa bzhin 'ang ngo / /rnam pa la yon tan brjod pa'i'o/ /pri ya su</text></item>
<item><p>188a.2</p><section></section><text>kha dag gi dka' ba min pa la yang na'o/ /a n+yo[: ]ne[: ]pa ra spa ra ita reta ra rnams phan tshun byed pa la'o/ /su pa las pha rol skyes pa min pa la A ma yang na'o/ /u ta ra u ta ma dag yang dag par dri ba dang dngos po la'o/ /kun tu 'phrul pa la</text></item>
<item><p>188a.3</p><section></section><text>ji srid rtogs par ro/ /rang ji lta ba la ya thA ya thaMA+o/ /dwaM dwaM gsang ba dang / lugs dang / nyams pa dang / steng dang mchod sbyin snod sbyor ba rnams la'o/ /shin tu nges par lhan cig spyod pa nyid kyis 'jig rten na grags pa dag la'o/ /</text></item>

<item><p>188b.6</p><section></section><text>du gu dag gi U 'ang ngo / /si las zin pa la las byed pa po la'o/ /k+Shi'i k+ShI yang ngo / /dngos po dang khros tshig dang 'o brgyal ba rnams la yang na'o/ /sh+yA[: ]de ba any+tsa las reg pa cho lo 'byung khungs rnams min pa la'o/ /ni rbI ti las rlung</text></item>

<item><p>189a.3</p><section></section><text>dri la yang na'o/ /mang po'i tshig la eta I'o/ /Ti las tshig p+lu ta'o/ /ring du bde la la'o/ /mtha' ma yin pa'ang he hai'o/ /lci ba'i rim pas raM ta ma yin pa'i yang na'o/ /bud med dang dmangs rigs ma yin pa'i bkur tshig la'o/ /</text></item>
<item><p>189a.4</p><section></section><text>lan la ha'i'o/ /so sor thos pa dang nye bar bsten pa dag la'o/ /spyo ba la gnyis brjod pa rnam grangs kyis so/ /sngon ma can nye bar 'dod pa dag go/ /rnam par dpyod pa la'o/ /aM ga ldan pa ting kun tu 'dod pa la'o/ /bsngags pa la'o/ /</text></item>

<item><p>189a.7</p><section></section><text>kyi kh+YA la am la'o/ /pra shAn ma yin pa'i na'i tsha ba la'o/ /nr-In gyi pa la ra yang na'o/ /'dir sngon ma'i rjes su sna ldan no/ /rjes su nga ro 'ang ngo / /sa mrAT min pa la hal la ma'i'o/ /dz+hal la mtha' ma yin pa'i na'i'o/ /ha la mon ya pa</text></item>

<item><p>190a.1</p><section></section><text>kyi'o/ /stu[: ]swany+dza[: ]si ba la sogs pa rnams kyi aT bar na yod pa la yang na'o/ /sa sogs las[: ]As ba las so/ /s+thA sogs gnyis brjod par de'i yang ngo / /bi las skan+ti las naSh+thI min pa la yang na'o/ /</text></item>

<item><p>190a.4</p><section></section><text>ya atsa la'o/ /su[: ]bir[: ]nir[: ]dur rnams las samaH sUti[: ]su pa rnams kyi'o/ /nir[: ]na dI dag lasaH su dang bde ba[: ]la'o/ /pra tiSh+tshA taM[: ]srad bu'o/ /praSh+Tha[: ]sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /bi las s+t+rI'i ming la'o/ /ga bi</text></item>

<item><p>190a.6</p><section></section><text>s+thi'i'o/ /ku min pa las eta ming la'o/ /skar ma las ita las yang na'o/ /thung ngu las su pa kyi ta la'o/ /niSha kyi ta pa la lan gcig pa'o/ /su ShA ma sogs rnams so/ /tshig gi dang po dang mtha' dag la ma yin no/ /</text></item>
<item><p>190a.7</p><section></section><text>sAta kyi'o/ /si tsa'i yang la'o/ /ni pra ti las sta ba d+ha'i'o/ /so D+ha'i'o/ /stan b+hu si bu[: ]sa ha rnams kyi nyer bsgyur las tsad la'o/ /sunya'i s+ya san dag la'o/ /sa di[: ]swany+dza dag gi liT las rang bzhin las so/ /sI lung</text></item>
<item><p>190b.1</p><section></section><text>dag las kyang d+ta'i D+ha'o/ /in las yang na'o/ /tshig gcig la ra Sha dag las na'i Na'o/ /tshig snga ma las ming la'o/ /grA ma a gra las nI'i kwipa las so/ /pu ra gA mi shra kA /si d+h+ra kA /sA ri kA/ a gre/ /ko Ta ra las</text></item>
<item><p>190b.2</p><section></section><text>ba na'i 'o/ /pri nar[: ]an+tar[: ]sha ra[: ]ik+Shu[: ]p+lak+Sha[: ]a mra[: ]kAR+Sh+ya[: ]pI yuk+ShA/ ba di ra las so/ /a ri kA sogs min pa las sman gyi shing atsa gnyis gsum pa las yang na'o/ /tri tse tu ra dag las hA ya na'i na tshod</text></item>
<item><p>190b.3</p><section></section><text>la'o/ /bA ha na'i phyi rol las so/ /pA na'i yul la'o/ /dngos po dang byed pa dag la yang na'o/ /gi ri na dI sogs rnams kyi'o/ /bsdu ba he tu an+ta'i yub sogs min pa'i 'o/ /ku ldan pa a tsa gcig pa tshig phyi ma la'o/ /nyer</text></item>
<item><p>190b.4</p><section></section><text>bsgyur dang an+tar las dur min pa las Na nye bar bstan pa'i 'o/ /he nu[: ]mIn[: ]A ni las so/ /ga da na da[: ]pa ta[: ]pa da ba pa ba ha ha na na[: ]di ta[: ]sha ma tsi[: ]d+hi mA[: ]bA[: ]yA[: ]drA[: ]p+sA ti[: ]s+ya ti rnams la ni las so/ /nye</text></item>
<item><p>190b.5</p><section></section><text>bar bstan pa la dang po ka kha dang mthar kha med pa la yang na'o/ /a na'i mtha' la yang ngo / /nik+Sha[: ]niM sa[: ]nin+da rnams kyi'o/ /han gyi'o/ /an+ti las so/ /Sha las tshig la'o/ /Sha ka'i na shi'o tsu Tu tu la shar dang / Ang min</text></item>
<item><p>190b.6</p><section></section><text>pa'i tshig bar chod pa la'o/ /ha na gyi g+ha yis so/ /k+Sha b+h+Na sogs rnams la'o/ /sa'i sh+tsuSh+nu dag sha Sha dag go/ /tu'i tsu Tu dag go/ /tshig mtha'i Tu las ming dang na ba ti na ga riH rnams min pa'i min no/ /tu'i Sha la'o/ /sha</text></item>
<item><p>190b.7</p><section></section><text>las so/ /yar gyi nyam la nyam yang na'o/ /a tsa las ra ha la gnyis so/ /a tsa las pa la'o/ /yaN las ma yi'i ste/ ta tas ta'i 'ang ngo / /shar las kha ya'i 'o/ /khros tshig la bu tra'i A dI na pu tra sogs las ma yin no/ /</text></item>
<item><p>191a.1</p><section></section><text>ra las atsa la shar gyi'o/ /ring po las so/ /khar la dz+ha gyi tsar ro/ /mtha' la yang na'o/ /a Na gyi mtshams sbyor la rjes su sna ldan no/ /ya pa le 'dra yig rjes su nga ro'o/ /sde pa rnams la'o/ /tshig mtha'</text></item>
<item><p>191a.2</p><section></section><text>min pa'i 'o/ /tu'i la la'o/ /uta las s+thA stam b+ha dag gi ta'o/ /skan+da nad la'o/ /hal las dz+nyar la dz+har rnams kyi 'dra yig la dbyi ba yang na'o/ /dz+ha ya las ha'i snga ma 'dra yig go/ /am la sha'i tsha'o/ /shar la ci ya'i gnyis</text></item>
<item><p>191a.3</p><section></section><text>pa'o/ /rnam par ma chad pa brjod pa ldan pa'o/ /zhes pa sA d+hu kIr+t+ti'i 'jam dpal gyi sgra brda sprod pa las skabs brgyad pa rdzogs so// //sgra yi lo ma'i rgya mtsho'i 'gram du gnas pa'i ljon shing kun tu bskrun pa 'di/ /bstan bcos</text></item>
<item><p>191a.4</p><section></section><text>bdag nyid dpag med rigs pa'i rin chen tshogs kyis rtsa ba brtan par bcings/ /sngon chad 'khrul par byas shing rmongs par phal cher bgrod dkar gyur la rkang brten te/ /rtogs pa don gnyer 'jig rten deng nas grib bsil 'di la ngal bso bsten par</text></item>
<item><p>191a.5</p><section></section><text>gyis/ /gzhung ni brgya phrag bdun rnams kyi/ /yi ge mdzes par bkod pa nyid/ /'dir ni 'don pa bzang ba yis/ /nyon mongs cha yang yang ma yin/ /dpal ldan 'jam dpal dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mkhas pa chen po/ /slob</text></item>
<item><p>191a.6</p><section></section><text>dpon dge slong legs par grags pa'i zhal snga nas bkod pa 'jam dpal gyi brda sprod pa'i mdo yongs su rdzogs so// //'di ni rgyal dbang sprul pa'i sku/ /spyan snga thams cad mkhyen pa yi/ /bka' dang dge slong lo tsA ba/ /dpal ldan</text></item>
<item><p>191a.7</p><section></section><text>grags pas bskul ba bzhin/ /lo tsA'i ming 'dzin zhwa lu ba/ /dge slong d+harma pA la yis/ /'di yi 'grel dang tsan+d+ra yi/ /gzhung la gtugs nas legs par bsgyur/ /nongs pa mchis gang mkhas pa yi/ /tshogs kyis bzod cing bcos par gsol// //</text></item>
<item><p>191b.1</p><section></section><text>@/ /sman dpyad gces pa grub pa zhes bya ba le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa bzhugs// //@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sid+d+ha sa ra/ bod skad du/ sman dpyad gces pa grub pa zhes bya ba/ bam po dang po'o/ /sman dpyad kyi gzhung 'di la le'u bsdus pa sum cu rtsa gcig yod</text></item>
<item><p>191b.2</p><section></section><text>de/ rgyud kyi le'u dang / sman gyi sde tshan gi le'u dang / zas kyi le'u dang / 'chi ltas kyi le'u dang / rims kyi le'u dang / 'khru ba'i le'u dang / khrag lud pa'i le'u dang / gcong chen po'i le'u dang / skran gyi le'u dang / dmu rdzings kyi le'u dang / gcin snyi'i le'u dang /</text></item>
<item><p>191b.3</p><section></section><text>mdze nad kyi le'u dang / gzhang 'brum dang / mtshan par rdol ba'i le'u dang / skya rbab kyi le'u dang / skyigs bu dang / dbugs mi bde ba'i le'u dang / lud pa'i le'u dang / skyug pa dang / skems pa'i le'u dang / gcin sri ba'i le'u dang / rtug skam gyi le'u dang / smyo byed</text></item>
<item><p>191b.4</p><section></section><text>dang / brjed byed kyi le'u dang / rlung nad kyi le'u dang / chang nad kyi le'u dang / me dbal gyi le'u dang / skrangs pa'i le'u dang / rma gso ba'i le'u dang / mig sman gyi rgyud kyi le'u dang / dug gso ba'i rgyud kyi le'u dang / sman bcud kyi len dang / ro tsa'i rgyud kyi le'u dang / byis</text></item>
<item><p>191b.5</p><section></section><text>pa'i rgyud kyi le'u dang / las rnam lnga'i le'u dang / cho ga'i le'u rnams so/ /bgrod par dka' bas bsrungs pa'i bus/ /kun phan kun mkhyen phyag btsal te/ /yang dag phan pa gces grub 'di/ /nyi mas bsrungs pas bshad par bya/ /blo chung ngu gang dag</text></item>
<item><p>191b.6</p><section></section><text>tshe'i rig byed kyi rgya mtsho brgal bar mi nus pa de dag gis khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ rgyud kyi gzhung 'grol bar 'di byas so/ /tshe 'dzin pa'i rig byed 'di ni/ /tshangs pas mtho ris su bshad do/ /rim gyis yul ka shi'i rgyal po'i mi rnams la bshad do/ /de la</text></item>
<item><p>191b.7</p><section></section><text>rgyud kyi le'u bshad par bya ste/ 'di'i yan lag ni mig sman dang / lus gso ba dang / gdon bsal ba dang / mtshon zug rngu dbyung ba dang / dug las bsrung ba dang / tshe bsrung ba dang / byis pa bsrung ba dang / khu chu 'phel bar bya'o/ /'byung ba chen po'i yon tan gyi rang bzhin</text></item>
<item><p>192a.1</p><section></section><text>can gyi mi ni nad kyi gzhi yin te/ de yang lus kyi nad dang / sems kyi nad dang / glo bur gyi nad dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i nad rnams yin par 'dod do/ /de la lus kyi nad ni rims dang / mdze la sogs pa'o/ /sems kyi nad ni khro ba la sogs</text></item>
<item><p>192a.2</p><section></section><text>pa'o/ /glo bur gyi nad ni gnod pa las byung ba'i nad do/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i nad ni bkres pa dang / skom pa dang rga ba la sogs pa'o/ /dus ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa ste mig 'dzums pa'i yud tsam la sogs pa'i mtshan ma can no/ /de'i rgyun gyi</text></item>
<item><p>192a.3</p><section></section><text>rnam par dbye ba ni/ dus tshigs rnam drug tu bshad de/ de la dbyar zla tha chungs dang / ston zla ra ba gnyis ni dbyar gyi dus so/ /ston zla 'bring po dang / ston zla tha chungs gnyis ni ston gyi dus so/ /dgun zla ra ba dang / dgun zla 'bring po gnyis ni dgun gyi dus so/ /dgun zla</text></item>
<item><p>192a.4</p><section></section><text>tha chungs dang / dpyid zla ra ba gnyis ni dgun smad kyi dus so/ /dpyid zla 'bring po dang / dpyid zla tha chungs gnyis ni dpyid kyi dus so/ /dbyar zla ra ba dang / dbyar zla 'bring po gnyis ni sos ka'i dus so/ /nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro ba dang / lho phyogs su 'gro zhing lam</text></item>

<item><p>192a.6</p><section></section><text>nad kyi grangs dang / dus kyi grangs rim bzhin du so sor sbyar ro/ /rlung nad ni phyi 'bred kyi dus dang / kha zas zhu ba'i mjug tu ldang ngo / mkhris pa'i nad ni nyi ma'i gung dang / nam phyed dang / kha zas 'ju ba'i tshe ldang ngo / /bad kan ni zas zos ma thag</text></item>
<item><p>192a.7</p><section></section><text>dang / /srod dang / snga dro ldang ngo / /de bzhin du gnyis kyi cha 'dus pa dang / gsum gyi cha 'dus pa'i bye brag gis nad gzhi 'khrug pa sbyar bar bya'o/ /nad gzhi dang / lus zungs dang / dri ma'i gnas kyi lus ni lus zhes bya ste/ de dag cha mnyam na ni nad</text></item>
<item><p>192b.1</p><section></section><text>med do/ /shas che chung du gyur na ni nad du 'gyur ro/ /de la nad gzhi ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan rnams so/ /lus zungs ni bdun te/ dwangs ma dang / khrag dang / sha dang / tshil dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / khu chu rnams so/ /dri ma ni phyi sa dang / gcin dang / rngul</text></item>
<item><p>192b.2</p><section></section><text>la sogs pa'o/ /rlung ni grang ba dang / yang ba dang / cha phra ba dang / mkhrang pa dang / rtsub pa dang / mi brtan pa dang / stobs che ba dang / dbugs rgyu bar byed pa dang / ngag 'byung bar byed pa dang / legs par 'jog pa dang / bskyod pa dang / dri ma 'byin pa rnams kyi bye brag</text></item>

<item><p>192b.6</p><section></section><text>tu bza' bar bya'o/ /de ltar ma byas na nad du 'gyur ro/ /tsha ba dang / kha ba dang / bska ba rnams kyis ni rlung 'khrug par 'gyur ro/ /tsha ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tshwa rnams kyis ni mkhris pa 'khrug par 'gyur ro/ /mngar ba dang /</text></item>
<item><p>192b.7</p><section></section><text>skyur ba dang / lan tshwa rnams kyis ni bad kan 'khrug par 'gyur ro/ /nad gzhi de dag zhi bar bya ba'i phyir de dag las ldog ste/ zos na nad yod pa rnams ni sos par 'gyur ro/ /nad med pa rnams la ni bde ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /ro mngar ba ni mig la</text></item>
<item><p>193a.1</p><section></section><text>phan te lus zungs 'phel bar byed do/ /skyur ba ni phyi sa bshang ba 'khru bar byed/ snying la phan pa dang / zas 'ju ba dang / chos par byed cing drod skyed par byed do/ /lan tshwa ni 'khru ba dang / tshos par byed pa dang / 'ju ba dang / sha slo bar</text></item>

<item><p>193a.4</p><section></section><text>no/ /de la nus pa ni ro zhu bar ma gyur pa'i bar ma la byas te/ rdzas la gnas shing brten la/ grang ba dang tsha ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /yang na rdzas kyi mthu nyid la yang bya'o/ /ro rnams ni zhu ba'i 'og tu mngar ba dang tsha ba rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te/ de gnyis kyi nang na snga</text></item>

<item><p>193b.1</p><section></section><text>rang bzhin dang / sman dang / lus dang / snying stobs dang / nyams stobs dang / nad dang 'di rnams mthong nas gdod bya'o/ /de la yul ni chu mang ba/ nags ri can ni gsher ba'i phyogs zhes bya ste/ bad kan dang rlung gi nad bskyed do/ /skams ni chu nyung zhing</text></item>

<item><p>193b.3</p><section></section><text>dang/ kha zas kyi 'tsho ba nas/ lo bcu drug ga bar du ni byis pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas lo bdun cu'i bar du ni bar ma zhes bya'o/ /de phan chad ni rgan po zhes bya'o/ /des rim pa bzhin du bad kan dang / mkhris pa dang / rlung shas che bar 'gyur te grangs bzhin</text></item>
<item><p>193b.4</p><section></section><text>du so sor sbyar ro/ /byis pa dang rgan po la ni thal sman tsha ba dang / me btsa' dang / gtar ga lta bu'i dpyad drag po mi bya bar dpyad 'jam po bya'o/ /lus kyi bye brag kyang rnam pa gsum du 'dod de/ lus skem pa la ni sha bskyed pa'i sman bya'o/ /sha che ba la</text></item>

<item><p>193b.6</p><section></section><text>dgar zhing sra ba rnams las nan tan du rtogs par bya'o/ /snying stobs ni mi 'gyur bar byed pa ste/ sdug bsngal bar gyur tam/ ma thos par gyur na/ de dang ldan pas sro shi ba dang / ha cang dga' bar mi 'gyur ba ni/ snying stobs dang ldan pa'i mi yin</text></item>
<item><p>193b.7</p><section></section><text>no/ /goms pa ni gang la zas dang skom la sogs pa rang bzhin gyis mi mthun pa yin yang / bde ba nyid du 'gyur ba de ni goms pa zhes bya bar shes so/ /mi rlung gi rang bzhin can ni/ lus skem zhing rtsub pa dang / skra srab pa dang / sems rgod</text></item>
<item><p>194a.1</p><section></section><text>pa dang / lus rgod pa dang / smra ba mang ba dang / rmi lam na nam mkha' la lding ba yin no/ /mi mkhris pa'i rang bzhin can ni/ dus la ma bab par skra dkar ba dang / sha mdog dkar ba dang / rdul snyi ba dang / spro thung ba dang /</text></item>
<item><p>194a.2</p><section></section><text>sems rno ba dang / rmi lam du me 'bar ba mthong ba yin no/ /mi bad kan gyi rang bzhin can ni/ sems brtan pa dang / lus grims pa dang / bu mang ba dang / skra snum pa dang / rmi lam na chu dang / dkar bag rmi ba yin no/ /nad gzhi cha gnyis</text></item>
<item><p>194a.3</p><section></section><text>'dus pa dang / cha gsum 'dus pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi ni/ 'dres pa'i mtshan mas rtogs par bya ste/ nad gzhi gzhan dag yod du zin kyang / gang shas che ba'i rang bzhin yin par bshad do/ /khong na yod pa'i me'i drod ni bad kan dang / mkhris pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>194a.4</p><section></section><text>rlung rnams re re nas shas che bar gyur pa dang / shas mnyam par gyur pa 'di bzhi las me'i drod kyang shas chung ba dang / shas che ba dang / drod ma snyoms pa dang / drod snyoms pa dang rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te/ /go rims bzhin du so sor sbyar ro/ /de la me'i drod</text></item>
<item><p>194a.5</p><section></section><text>snyoms na ni de las mi 'gyur bar bsrung ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /drod ma snyoms pa la ni rlung bsal bar bya'o/ /me'i drod shas che ba la ni mkhris pa bsal ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /drod chung ba la ni bad kan sbyang bar bya'o/ /kha zas ma zhu nas me'i drod bri ba ni nad do cog skye ba'i gzhi</text></item>
<item><p>194a.6</p><section></section><text>yin te/ de'i mtshan ma ni khong ltam ltam por gyur pa dang / kha chu skyur ba dang / bcud dang dngas ma ma zhu bar lus pa dang / bshang gci thur du mi 'byung ba dang rnam pa bzhi'o/ /de la khong ltam ltam por 'dug pa de la ni/ gsung pa dang mchil ma mang du 'byung ba</text></item>
<item><p>194a.7</p><section></section><text>dang/ bad kan mer mer por byed pa dang / yan man du mi slon mi spo par 'khyil ba de la ni/ /shu dag dang lan tshwa chu'i nang du skol ba blud de skyug tu gzhug go/ /kha chu skyur ba la ni sgreg pa skyur ba dang / mgo 'khor ba dang / skyugs pa dang / skom dang che bar 'gyur te/</text></item>
<item><p>194b.1</p><section></section><text>de la ni chu bskol te bsgrang ba blud la bser bu'i phyogs su 'dug par bya'o/ /bcud dang dngas ma ma zhu bar lus pa ni lus snyom ste/ bya smyang byed pa dang / mgo yor yor pa dang / kha zas mthong na yid du mi 'ong ba la sogs par 'gyur te/ de la smyang</text></item>
<item><p>194b.2</p><section></section><text>bar bya ba dang / nyin par thun 'ga' nyal na 'ju'o/ /zas smyung ba drags na rlung nad mi ldang bas ran tsam du bya'o/ /thur du mi 'byung ba las ni ltor zug cing na ba dang / be'u snabs su 'byung ba dang / phyi sa dang gcin 'gag par 'gyur te/ de la ni lums bya</text></item>
<item><p>194b.3</p><section></section><text>zhing tsha chu blud do/ /'di ltar kha zas mi 'phrod pa zos pa las nad do cog byung bas na/ de'i phyir mi 'phrod pa de dag spangs la phan pa rnams bza' ba'i rigs so/ /de la kha zas mi 'phrod pa ni/ rma bya dang sreg pa dang / srog chags go d+ha dang / gong ma sreg dang /</text></item>
<item><p>194b.4</p><section></section><text>'di rnams e raN+Ta'i mar gyis bskus te/ e raN+Ta'i shing gi mes btsos pa mi bza'/ mar dang sbrang rtsi cha mnyam ste mi bza'/ mar 'khar ba'i snod kyi nang du zhag bcu phan chad lon pa mi bza'/ sbrang rtsi chu dron pos 'phul zhing mi bza'/ char</text></item>
<item><p>194b.5</p><section></section><text>pa'i chu dang yang sbyar zhing mi bza'/ de bzhin du sbrang rtsi dang / phag sha dang / la phug dang yang lhan cig mi bza'/ chu skyar gyi sha chang dang lhan cig tu mi bza'/ zho dang bya gag gi sha lhan cig tu mi bza'/ ldum bu ka tsa ma tsa dang bu ram lhan cig tu mi</text></item>
<item><p>194b.6</p><section></section><text>bza'/ nya sha dang ldum bu u po da ka lhan cig tu mi bza'/ bag phye dang til mar bsres pa'i snum khur/ rtsabs lhan cig mi bza'/ nya sha dang bu ram lhan cig mi bza'/ ldum dang / rngad dang / shing tog skyur ba'i bag dang / til gyi tshigs ma</text></item>
<item><p>194b.7</p><section></section><text>dang/ rgya sran dang / lan tshwa dang / smyig ma de'u dang / zho dang / nya sha dang / 'di rnams shas cher 'o ma dang mi mthun te lhan cig mi bza'/ pri yaM ku'i lde gus lus bskus bzhin du/ 'bras kyi 'o thug mi btung / thi bI sha yungs mar gyis bskus te</text></item>
<item><p>195a.1</p><section></section><text>g.yos pa rnams mi bza'/ nya'i zhag dang pi pi ling lhan cig mi bza'/ sbyar thug ces bya ba 'bras dang / til dang / mon sran sde'u bsres pa'i thug pa dang / chang dang 'bras kyi 'o thug rnams lhan cig mi bza'/ nya sha dang /</text></item>
<item><p>195a.2</p><section></section><text>yos dang / mar dang / dar ba rnams lhan cig spags te mi bza'/ mi gang gis ro dang nus pa mi mthun pa'i zas 'di lta bu dang cha 'dra ba dag /ma shes te zos par gyur na/ de ni nad kyis nyam thag pa'am/ yang na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar kha zas mi</text></item>
<item><p>195a.3</p><section></section><text>mthun pa zos pa las nad du gyur pa la ni/ bkru sman dang skyug sman gyis bsal bar bya'o/ /goms pa dang / me'i drod tsha ba dang / nyams stobs che ba la ni gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyud kyi le'u ste dang po rdzogs so// //de nas sman</text></item>
<item><p>195a.4</p><section></section><text>gyi sde tshan gyi le'u bshad par bya ste/ sman ta ri dang / ba spru ba dang / e raN+Da dang / dz+ha sha dang / zangs rtsi ba dang / dzi ba ka dang / gze ma dang / nye'u shing dang / lang gu li dang / shi ra bi da ri dang / hA na sa bA di ka dang / pr-i ha ti dang / dri/ ci ka li dang / dwe pa he</text></item>
<item><p>195a.5</p><section></section><text>pa dang / sran ma at+ma kup+ta dang / sman gyi sde tshan 'di rnams ni/ skem pa'i nad dang / skran dang / rlung nad dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / lud pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad sel to/ /shing n+ya gro d+ha dang / u du m+bA ra dang / p+lak+Sha dang / ma du ka</text></item>
<item><p>195a.6</p><section></section><text>dang/ a shwat+tha dang / ti n+tu ka dang / pi la ya dang / rgya shug dang / pa da ra dang / pA ra tha dang / naN+Ta dang / br-ik+Sha dang / a mra dang / lcang ma dang / pa lA sha dang / go byed dang / shre ta dang / seng phrom dang / dzam+bu dang / sman gyi sde tshan 'di ni mkhris pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>195a.7</p><section></section><text>khrag lung pa'i nad dang / slon pa dang myos pa'i nad sel to/ /rma dang mngal gyi nad sel to/ /gcin nad sel zhing rma dang lus tsha ba dang mngal gyi nad sel to/ /pi pi ling dang / kru trug tre sa dang / shu dag dang / dug mo nyung dang / rgya shug dang / bod ra dang /</text></item>
<item><p>195b.1</p><section></section><text>pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang / gla sgang dang / bca' sga dang / sug smel dang / bong nga dkar po dang / ha ra N+ya ka dang / dbyi mong dang / na le sham dang / la la phud dang/ ga bra'i rtsa ba dang / mu rA dang / ma ha nim+ba'i 'bras bu dang / go snyod dang / yungs kar dang / shing kun dang /</text></item>
<item><p>195b.2</p><section></section><text>spu tse shel dang / byi dong ka dang / sman gyi sde tshan 'dis ni rlung dang bad kan sel to/ /sug smel dang / rgya spos dang / gla sgang dang / ha re N+ya ka dang / shing rtsa dang / gan+d+ha pa tra dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / gur kum dang / bca' ba dang / tsan dan dang / yas tsal</text></item>
<item><p>195b.3</p><section></section><text>dang/ nA ga puspa dang / thang shing dang / guts+tsha ra sa dang / gu gul dang / sra tsi pog dang / nya phyis dang / da d+hi dang / byu ma dang / pog dkar po dang / bye g+h+ra na kha dang / stag gi sder mo dang / spong spos dang / ru rta dang / sman gyi sde tshan 'dis ni/ phol mig dang /</text></item>
<item><p>195b.4</p><section></section><text>g.yan pa dang / dug dang rlung dang bad kan sel to/ /ba'u na dang / arta ga la dang / nye'u shing dang / bca' sga dang / go snyod dang / bi sha ni ka dang / sa'i re ya dang / br-iha tI rnam gnyis dang / rtswa dUr ba dang / spu ti ka dang / shi gru ka dang / a ru ra dang / ag+na</text></item>

<item><p>195b.6</p><section></section><text>dang/ pa ta la dang / murba dang / d+ha na ta dang / sle tres dang / ra Ta dang / pag tha dang / rtsa mkhris pa dang / ku la ka dang / ka rany+dza dang / spyi bzhur shun pa dang / dug mo nyung dang / se'i re ya dang / u sha bI dang / ba 'gal dang / sman gyi sde tshan 'dis ni gcin nad dang /</text></item>
<item><p>195b.7</p><section></section><text>mdze dang / rims dang / skyug pa dang / bad kan dang / dug sel to/ /seng phrom rnam gnyis dang / sla ba dang / a sho ka dang / chu shing dang / pa la dang / e la ba lu ka dang / ka dam+ba dang / dzi gi ni dang / shr-i par+Ni dang / sle tres dang / sman gyi sde tshan 'dis ni</text></item>
<item><p>196a.1</p><section></section><text>bad kan dang / tshil rgyas pa'i nad skems shing / mngal gyi nad sel te rma 'tsho bar byed la 'khru ba gcod/ dug thams cad sel to/ /am+b+ha s+tha dang / d+ha ta ki dang / seng phrom dang / sa mab ga dang / pad+ma'i ze ba dang / shing mngar dang /</text></item>

<item><p>196a.3</p><section></section><text>tu che bar byed/ ha cang ro tsa bar byed la/ ha cang me'i drod che bar yang mi byed do/ /'bras bu gsum zhes bya ba/ a ru ra dang / ba ru ra dang / skyu ru ra rnams ni/ rims ldang dub can sel zhing / mig la phan te drod bskyed la/ gcin nad dang / mdze dang mkhris pa</text></item>
<item><p>196a.4</p><section></section><text>dang/ bad kan sel to/ /br-i ha tI dang / d+ha nga ki dang / pA thA dang / shing mngar dang / dug mo nyung dang / sman gyi sde tshan 'dis ni tshos par byed pa ste nad gzhi gsum las gyur pa'i gcin nad sel to/ /pa to li dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / mur+pa dang pu tse shel</text></item>
<item><p>196a.5</p><section></section><text>dang/ pA tha dang sle tres dang / sman gyi sde tshan 'dis ni mkhris pa dang bad kan dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / skyug pa dang rims dang / g.ya' ba dang dug sel to/ /sle tres dang nim+pa dang / 'u su'i 'bras bu dang / shing mngar dang tsan dan dkar po dang sman gyi sde tshan</text></item>

<item><p>196b.2</p><section></section><text>ba sel bar byed do/ /mig sman skyer khaN+Da dang / rtsa sh+yam dang / nA ga ge sar gyi ze ba dang / pad+ma'i ze ba dang shing mngar dang / sman gyi sde tshan 'dis ni khrag lud pa'i nad dang / dug dang lus tsha ba'i nad sel to/ /shu dag dang / gla sgang dang / a ru ra dang / thang</text></item>

<item><p>197b.1</p><section></section><text>sa bon dang / shaM gi ni dang / shas ste dang / dong ka dang / ti lwa ka dang / kim+ba la ka dang / ka rany+dza dang / bya rnu dang / sman gyi sde tshan 'di ni rtug skam dang / dmu rdzings dang / lto spo ba dang / dug dang skran sel to/ /bilba dang / ag+ni man+tha dang / tun T+ya ka</text></item>

<item><p>197b.7</p><section></section><text>'gyur du bya/ mar las kyang sman gyi khu ba bzhi 'gyur du byas te bskol la/ sman gyi khu ba gdu nas/ sman gyi phye ma legs par 'dres par gyur na tshos pa yin no/ /de la btung ba dang / mas btang ba gnyis ni 'dra ste tshos ran tsam du bya'o/ /lus bsku ba ni tshos</text></item>
<item><p>198a.1</p><section></section><text>rab tu bya'o/ /snar blugs pa ni tshos pa nyid du mi bya ste/ gsum char yang btsags nas spyad par bya ba 'di ni spyi'i cho gar bstan pa yin no/ /sman gyi sde tshan gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //kha zas dang / btung ba ma</text></item>

<item><p>198a.4</p><section></section><text>dang mkhris pa sel to/ /'bras zhag drug cus smin pa dkar po ni ro mngar la bsil zhing lci ba yin te nad gzhi gsum 'joms par byed do/ /'bras zhag drug cus smin pa shun lpags nag po ni snga ma las ro dang / zhu ba'i mthu cung zad tsam gyis chung ngo / /bre</text></item>
<item><p>198a.5</p><section></section><text>rgod ni rtsub pa yin te skem par byed cing rlung bskyed la/ bad kan dang mkhris pa sel to/ /khre dang ci tse dang ko ra du sha rnams kyang de dang 'dra bar bshad do/ /nas ni bsil ba yin te/ 'phyen che zhing phyi sa mang la mkhris pa dang bad kan sel bar byed do/ /gro</text></item>
<item><p>198a.6</p><section></section><text>ni bsil zhing lci la mngar ba yin te ro tsa bar byed cing rlung sel to/ /mon sran sde'u ni bska zhing mngar ba yin te yang la bad kan dang mkhris pa dang khrag nad sel to/ /mon sran gre'u ni snum zhing lci la drod che ste 'dzag sgo dgu'i dri ma mang ba dang ro tsa bar byed cing rlung sel</text></item>
<item><p>198a.7</p><section></section><text>to/ /mon sran dkar po ni ro tsa bar mi byed cing / bad kan dang mkhris pa sel la rlung gis nyam thag par byed do/ /rgya sran ni dbugs mi bde ba dang / skyigs bu dang / gzhang 'brum dang / bad kan dang / khu chu dang rlung sel lo/ /mon sran na gu ni bsil ba</text></item>
<item><p>198b.1</p><section></section><text>yin te/ khrag lud pa'i rims sel zhing phyis 'gag par byed do/ /mon sran tsa na ni/ nyal po la zhen par byed cing khrag gi nad dang / bad kan dang mkhris pa sel la rlung skyed par byed do/ /sran chung ni bsil zhing ro mngar te phyi sa 'gag par byed cing bad</text></item>
<item><p>198b.2</p><section></section><text>kan dang mkhris pa sel to/ /sran chung ni sran cung dang 'dra bar bshad do/ /ce sran yang de dang 'dra ba las lhag par rlung skyed par byed do/ /til ni thal ba'i ro bro ba dang mngar zhing kha la drod che ste/ nyams stobs dang mkhris pa bskyed do/ /spyir na gang bu can</text></item>
<item><p>198b.3</p><section></section><text>sna tshogs rnams ni bsil zhing rtsub pa yin te/ nyams stobs 'bri bar byed do// //da ni sha'i bye brag bshad de/ ra sha ni ha cang bsil ba yang ma yin/ ha cang phyi ba yang ma yin/ ha cang snum pa yang ma yin te/ nad gzhi skyed par mi byed cing sel bar</text></item>
<item><p>198b.4</p><section></section><text>byed do/ /lug sha ni mngar zhing bsil la lci ba yin te/ phyi sa 'gag pa dang sha skye bar byed do/ /ma he'i sha ni snum zhing lci ba yin te gnyid 'ong bar byed la khu chu mang bar byed cing sha skye bar byed do/ /phag sha ni lci ba yin te ro tsa bar byed cing rlung sel la</text></item>
<item><p>198b.5</p><section></section><text>rdul snyi bar byed do/ /ri bong gi sha ni me drod bskyed cing / bad kan dang mkhris pa sel la/ rlung ni skyed brir mi byed de tha mal ba'o/ /khar go sol gyi sha ni bsil ba yin te nad gzhi gsum sel zhing phyi sa dang gcin sri bar byed do/ /rma bya'i sha ni rlung</text></item>
<item><p>198b.6</p><section></section><text>sel zhing rna ba gsang ba dang / mig rno ba dang / sha mdog bzang ba dang / skad snyan pa dang / khu chu 'phel bar byed do/ /bya gag gi sha ni/ snum zhing lci la drod che ba yin te rlung sel cing ro tsa bar byed do/ /sreg pa'i sha ni ha cang lci ba yang ma yin/ ha cang</text></item>
<item><p>198b.7</p><section></section><text>drod che ba yang ma yin/ ha cang mngar ba yang ma yin te nad gzhi thams cad sel to/ /'ur ba dang / co ga dang / brta ka rnams kyi sha ni drod skyed cing 'dus pa'i nad sel to/ /mchil pa'i sha ni 'dus pa'i nad sel cing bad kan dang khu chu 'phel bar</text></item>
<item><p>199a.1</p><section></section><text>byed do/ /gong ma sreg gi sha ni bsil zhing yang ba yin te bad kan dang khrag lud pa'i nad sel to/ /phug ron gyi sha ni bsil zhing lci ba yin te khrag lud pa'i nad sel to/ /phug ron sngon po dang thi ba'i sha ni de las cung zad tsam gyis</text></item>
<item><p>199a.2</p><section></section><text>yang ngo / /chu bya rnams kyi sha ni snum zhing drod che la lci ba yin te ro tsa bar byed cing rlung sel to/ /de dag gi nang nas bya ngang pa'i sha ni ro tsa bar byed cing shas cher rlung sel to/ /nya sha ni snum la drod che zhing lci ba yin te rlung sel cing mkhris pa'i nad dang khrag lud pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>199a.3</p><section></section><text>nad skyed de/ /chu'i srog chags bu lu ki dang / rus spal dang / karka Ta rnams kyi sha ni rlung dang mkhris pa sel zhing ro tsa bar byed do// //da ni ldum dang rngad kyi bye brag bshad de/ ldum ka ka ma tsi ni nad gzhi gsum sel to/ /ka lam ni nu zho 'phel ba dang ro tsa bar</text></item>
<item><p>199a.4</p><section></section><text>byed do/ /tsi ge ri ni bad kan dang rlung sel to/ /yungs kar gyi lo mas ni nad gzhi thams cad skyed do/ /rgya sne'u dang / sne'u tshul li dang / sne'u rgod dang / mon sne'u dmar ru ste 'di rnams ni rlung dang bad kan sel zhing phyi sa bde bar 'byung ba dang / khrag lud</text></item>
<item><p>199a.5</p><section></section><text>pa'i nad med par byed do/ /la phug rjen pas nis nad gzhi skyed par byed do/ /btsos pa ni rlung dang bad kan sel to/ /la phug gzhon nu ni nad gzhi thams cad sel zhing snying dang lkog ma la phan no/ /karko Ta ka dang / bArta ka dang / pa to pa dang / karbe la ka dang / 'di</text></item>
<item><p>199a.6</p><section></section><text>rnams ni mdze dang gcin nad dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / lud pa dang / mkhris pa dang bad kan sel to/ /kush+mam Da ni nad gzhi thams cad sel zhing snying la phan te chu so sbyang ngo / /ka ling ka'i 'bras bu dang / ku ba ni mkhris pa sel zhing rlung bskyed do/ /gru sa</text></item>
<item><p>199a.7</p><section></section><text>dang ga gon ni rlung dang bad kan skyed la mkhris pa sel to/ /smyig mde'u dang / nye'u shing dang pa'i to rto dang / ke bu ka ste 'di rnams ni bad kan dang mkhris pa sel to/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / shA lu ka dang / shr-i gA Ta dang / ma lu ka dang / ka she ru ka dang / 'di rnams ni</text></item>
<item><p>199b.1</p><section></section><text>lci zhing bsil te/ khrag lud pa'i nad sel zhing ro tsa ba dang nu zho 'phel bar byed do// //da ni shing tog gi bye brag bshad de/ bal po se'u ni phyi sa sri bar byed cing 'khru ba gcod/ rlung sel la/ bad kan dang mkhris pa dang yang mi 'phrod pa ma yin no/ /skyu</text></item>
<item><p>199b.2</p><section></section><text>ru ra ni de dang 'dra ba la zos pa'i rjes la ro mngar bar 'gyur zhing / nad gzhi 'jig pa dang 'khru ba dang ro tsa bar byed do/ /kha lud ni skran dang / rlung dang / bad kan dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang lud pa rnams sel to/ /ka bit+tha'i shing thog smin pa ni lci ba yin te phyi sa</text></item>
<item><p>199b.3</p><section></section><text>sri bar byed cing nad gzhi dang dug sel to/ /shing tog a mra ni rlung sel zhing sha skye ba dang / khu chu 'phel ba dang / sha mdog bzang ba dang nyams stobs skye bar byed do/ /dzam+bU'i shing tog ni rlung skye bar byed la/ bad kan dang mkhris pa sel te phyi sa sri zhing spo bar</text></item>
<item><p>199b.4</p><section></section><text>byed do/ /tin+du ka'i 'bras bus ni bad kan dang mkhris pa sel to/ /rgya shug gi shing tog ni rlung dang mkhris pa sel to/ /bilba'i shing tog ni rlung skyed cing thur du mi 'byung bar byed do/ /bi ya la'i shing tog ni rlung sel to/ /shing tA la dang / rA dzA da na dang /</text></item>
<item><p>199b.5</p><section></section><text>chu shing gi 'bras bu dang / pa na sa dang / na li ke ra rnams kyi shing tog ni mngar zhing snum la lci ba yin te/ khu chu dang sha skye bar byed do/ /rgun dang ma d+hu ka dang / 'bra go dang / taM bal dang / pa ru sha ka ste 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu ni/ /rlung dang mkhris pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>199b.6</p><section></section><text>khrag gi nad sel la/ phyi sa bde bar 'byung bar byed do/ /sha mi'i shing tog gis skra 'byi bar byed do/ /ko sha ma mra dang / nyo ti dang / dan+ta sha tha dang / karma rda dang / shing tog 'di rnams ni khrag lud pa'i nad skyed par shes par bya'o/ /pi lu'i shing tog ni skran</text></item>
<item><p>199b.7</p><section></section><text>sel lo// //da ni spod kyi bye brag bshad de/ bca' sga dang / na le sham dang pi pi ling ni bad kan dang rlung sel to/ /de la na le sham ni ro tsa bar mi byed do/ /bca' sga dang pi pi ling gnyis ro tsa bar byed do/ /shing kun ni skran dang gzer ba dang phyi sa 'gags pa</text></item>
<item><p>200a.1</p><section></section><text>sel cing / rlung dang bad kan 'joms par byed do/ /la la phud dang 'u su'i 'bras bu dang go snyod ni rlung dang bad kan sel ba'i mchog yin no/ /da ni lan tshwa'i bye brag bshad de/ rgyam tsha ni mig la phan zhing ro tsa bar byed la nad gzhi gsum zhi bar byed</text></item>
<item><p>200a.2</p><section></section><text>do/ /kha ru tsha ni drod che ste phyi sa 'gags pa dang snying na ba sel lo/ /rtsabs ru tsha ni drod che zhing rno ba yin te snying na ba sel zhing rlung dang 'phrod do/ /tsho kha da ni de dang 'dra ba las cung zad tsam gyis mthu chung ngo / /rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa ni lci ba yin te kha zas 'drul bar byed do/ /nas</text></item>
<item><p>200a.3</p><section></section><text>tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba ni/ dug dang snying na ba dang skya rbab dang / lkog ma'i nad sel cing me'i drod skyed do/ /swa rtsi ka'i thal ba ni rno ba yin te lus tsha bar byed cing khong pa'i drod skyed la pags pa 'jig par byed do/ /da ni btung ba'i bye brag bshad de/ char pa'i chu ni</text></item>
<item><p>200a.4</p><section></section><text>yang ba yin te nad gzhi sel zhing snying la phan te/ dug sel lo/ /char pa'i chu sa gzhi dang / sna tshogs tha dad pa dang phrad pa las ni de'i ro'i bye brag dang / mthu yang tha dad par 'gyur ro/ /'bab chu ni rtsub pa yin te rlung skyed do/ /mtsho'i chu ni mngar la yang ngo / /</text></item>
<item><p>200a.5</p><section></section><text>rdzing bu'i chu ni rlung dang bad kan sel lo/ /lteng ka'i chu ni rlung skyed do/ /chu mig gi chu ni rtsub pa yin te me'i drod skyed do/ /brag mthon pa'i kha nas bab pa'i chu ni yang zhing bad kan sel lo/ /khron pa'i chu ni drod che bar byed cing rlung skyed do/ /chu mig 'phar ba'i</text></item>
<item><p>200a.6</p><section></section><text>chu ni mkhris pa sel to/ /chu rnyog cing srin bu dang nya lcib yod de ma rung bar gyur cing / nyi ma mi mthong ba'i chu ni blang bar mi bya'o/ /skyon de dag med pa'i chu ni blang bar bya'o/ /chu skol ba ni rims dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / tshil rgyas pa'i nad dang /</text></item>
<item><p>200a.7</p><section></section><text>rlung dang / bad kan sel lo/ /chu bskol te bsgrangs pas ni nad gzhi gsum sel lo/ /de nyid zhag lon par byas na nad gzhi skyed par byed do// //da ni 'o ma'i bye brag bshad de ba'i 'o ma ni snum zhing lci ba yin te rlung dang mkhris pa sel zhing tshe ring</text></item>
<item><p>200b.1</p><section></section><text>bar byed do/ /ma he'i 'o ma ni pa'i 'o ma bas lci zhing snum pa yin te bye brag tu drod 'bri bar byed do/ /ra'i 'o mas ni khrag tshad sel zhing / lud pa dang / skom pa dang / rims med par byed la dreg na pa'i steng du blugs na dreg med par 'gyur ro/ /lug gi 'o mas ni mkhris</text></item>
<item><p>200b.2</p><section></section><text>pa dang bad kan skyed do/ /rnga mo'i 'o mas ni skrangs pa dang / dmu rdzings dang / lto spo ba dang / srin bu dang gzhang 'brum dang / bad kan dang rlung sel to/ /bud med kyi 'o mas ni lce la phan pa dang / mig tu blugs na mig la phan pa dang / snar blud na khrag lud pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>200b.3</p><section></section><text>nad sel to/ /zho ni nyams stobs skyed cing rlung sel te tsa bar byed pa mkhris pa dang bad kan skyed do/ /zho ma langs pas ni nad gzhi gsum skyed do/ /zho kha chu ni 'dzag sgo sbyong bar byed do/ /mar ni pho ba'i nad dang gzhang 'brum dang / bzhin g.yo ba dang</text></item>
<item><p>200b.4</p><section></section><text>mjing pa yo ba'i nad sel to/ /'o ma las sna gzhan du bskyur ba chur ba la sogs pa ni lci ba yin te mdze nad kyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /dar ba'i ro mas na nad gzhi gsum sel zhing pho ba'i nad dang / skrangs pa dang / gzhang 'brum dang / skya rbab dang / 'khru ba dang / skran</text></item>
<item><p>200b.5</p><section></section><text>'joms par byed do/ /ba mar ni zhu ba'i 'og tu mngar te/ rlung dang mkhris pa sel zhing yid gzhungs par byed pa dang / mig la yang phan la/ de sman gzhan dang sbyar na nad gzhi gsum yang sel bar byed/ mar rnying pas ni brjed byed dang / smyo ba dang / sbyar ba'i</text></item>
<item><p>200b.6</p><section></section><text>dug dang / brgyal ba rnams sel to/ /ra la sogs pa'i mar ni so so'i 'o ma'i yon tan bzhin du rig par bya'o/ /glang po che dang / rta dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / ma he dang / ba dang / ra dang / lug dang 'di rnams kyi gcin ni gcin rnam pa brgyad ces bya ste/</text></item>
<item><p>200b.7</p><section></section><text>de dag ni bad kan dang rlung dang / srin bu dang dug med par byed cing / skya rbab dang / dmu rdzings dang / mdze dang / gzhang 'brum dang / skrangs pa dang / skran dang / gcin nad rnams sel to// //da ni 'bru mar gyi bye brag bshad de/ til mar ni rlung dang bad</text></item>
<item><p>201a.1</p><section></section><text>kan sel zhing / pags pa'i mdog bzang bar byed la skra bzang du skye bar byed do/ /yung mar ni srin bu dang / g.ya' ba 'joms par byed pa dang / bad kan dang tshil rgyas pa'i nad dang rlung sel to/ /zar ma'i mar ni mig la gnod</text></item>
<item><p>201a.2</p><section></section><text>cing/ mkhris pa skyed la rlung sel to/ /ba ru ra'i mar ni/ bad kan dang / mkhris pa sel cing skran la phan te mig dang rna ba brta bar byed do/ /sbrang rtsi ni nad gzhi gsum sel zhing / skyigs bu dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / srin bu dang / skyug pa dang</text></item>
<item><p>201a.3</p><section></section><text>gcin nad dang / skom pa'i nad dang / dug rnams med par byed de/ kha cig gis ni rlung skyed ces kyang bshad do/ /bu ram shing rnams ni/ khrag lud pa'i nad sel zhing / nyams stobs skyed cing ro tsa bar byed la bad kan skyed do/ /bu ram shing so so 'o ma ste zos</text></item>
<item><p>201a.4</p><section></section><text>pa'i khu ba ni phan par 'gyur ro/ /bu ram shing btsir ba'i khu ba ni lci ba yin te phyi sa 'gag par byed do/ /bu ram ni mkhris pa sel ba tsam ma yin la/ ro tsa bar byed cing rlung sel te bad kan skyed do/ /bu ram rnying pa ni phan zhing mkhris pa sel ba'i mchog yin te khrag</text></item>
<item><p>201a.5</p><section></section><text>dang bar byed do/ /bu ram gyi kha ra ni snum pa dang ldan te khrag lud pa'i nad sel zhing ro tsa bar byed do/ /sbrang rtsi'i kha ra ni rtsub pa yin te tshim par byed cing skyug pa dang 'khru ba sel to// //da ni chang gi bye brag bshad de/ chang ngo cog ni mkhris pa skyed la skyur</text></item>
<item><p>201a.6</p><section></section><text>ba'i phyir na bad kan dang rlung sel te/ ran cing tshong zin par 'thungs na drod skyed cing dga' bar byed pa dang nyams stobs skyed do/ /de ltar ma byas na dug tu 'gyur ro/ /de la 'bru'i chang ni gzhang 'brum la phan te skem pa sha skye bar byed cing rlung sel/ bu ram</text></item>
<item><p>201a.7</p><section></section><text>chang ni 'khru bar byed cing smin par byed de/ /bu ram shing gi chang ni bad kan dang tshil rgyas pa'i nad sel to/ /rgun chang ni rlung dang mkhris pa sel to/ /ma du ka'i me tog gi chang ni rtsub pa yin te rlung dang mkhris pa skyed do/ /tshwa dang rtsabs kyi rigs su gtogs pa</text></item>
<item><p>201b.1</p><section></section><text>rnams ni rno ba yin te khrag lud pa'i nad skyed do// //da ni thug pa'i bye brag bshad de/ 'bras brngos te btags pa'i thug pas ni smin par byed cing drod skyed de phan pa yin no/ /'bras thug ni yang ba yin te rlung dang 'phrod cing chu so sbyang ngo / /'bras thug gar</text></item>
<item><p>201b.2</p><section></section><text>po ni tshim par byed de 'khru ba gcod cing snying la phan te nyams stobs skyed do/ /'bras kyi 'o thug ni bad kan skyed la nyams stobs skyed par byed do/ /sbyar thug ces bya ba 'bras dang til dang mon sran sde'u gsum sbyar ba'i thug pas ni rlung sel bar byed do// //</text></item>
<item><p>201b.3</p><section></section><text>da ni bza' ba'i bye brag bshad de/ 'bras legs par bkrus pa dang / khu ba gzar bcad pa dang / tshos pa dang grang dro ran tsam du byas pa'i 'bras chan ni yang ba yin no/ /'bras chan rdo gu dang / sha dang / shing tog dang / mar dang lhan cig tu btsos pa ni lci ba yin te</text></item>
<item><p>201b.4</p><section></section><text>sha skye bar byed do/ /'bru'i tshod ma ni/ shun lpags bshus la yid tsam brngos te shin tu tshos par byas pa yang ba yin no/ /sngo tshod ni shin tu bshur la tshos par byas te/ sdor dang legs par sbyar bas phan pa yin no// //da ni khu bcud kyi bye brag bshad de/</text></item>
<item><p>201b.5</p><section></section><text>bal po se'u dang skyu ru ra sbyar ba'i khu bcud ni drod skyed cing rlung dang mkhris pa sel to/ /la phug dang sbyar na dbugs mi bde ba dang / lud pa dang / cham pa dang / bad kan yang sel to/ /nas dang / rgya sran dang / rgya shug gi 'bras bu sbyar ba'i khu bcud ni lkog ma la phan te rlung sel</text></item>
<item><p>201b.6</p><section></section><text>to/ /mon sran sde'u dang / skyu ru ra sbyar ba'i khu bcud ni 'khru ba gcod cing mkhris pa dang bad kan sel to/ /sbyar tshod dmar po zhes bya ba zho dang bu ram dang rgun sbyar ba'i tshod ma ni yang zhing sha skye ba dang yi ga 'byed par byed de skyug pa sel to/ /zho dang bu ram sbyar te</text></item>
<item><p>201b.7</p><section></section><text>dkrugs pa'i nang du dri bzhi sbyar ba zhes bya ba/ shing tsha dang / sug smel dang / nA ga ge sar dang / gan+d+ha pa tra 'di bzhi sbyar ba dang spod sna tshogs btab pa ni sha skye zhing ro tsa bar byed do/ /zho'i nang du bu ram btab pa ni rlung sel to/ /phye ni rtsub pa yin te phyi sa sla bar byed</text></item>
<item><p>202a.1</p><section></section><text>cing rlung skyed la nyams stobs skyed cing tshim par byed do/ /nas bsgrus dang / nas khral khrol tsam du btags pa'i chan dang nas kyi khu ba ni gcin nad dang rtug skom sel to/ /zhu ba bu ram gyis btab pa ni lci la sha skye bar byed cing</text></item>
<item><p>202a.2</p><section></section><text>rlung sel to/ /zhi te'u ni me'i drod bskyed de rlung dang mkhris pa sel zhing ro tsa bar byed do/ /peM tam la sogs ba khur ba sha dang sbyar ba ni/ sha skye ba dang nyams stobs skyed cing mkhris pa dang rlung sel to/ /be rag sha dang spod la sogs pas brdzangs pa ni lci</text></item>
<item><p>202a.3</p><section></section><text>zhing tshim par byed do/ /'bras brdungs pa'i lce khur ni lci ba yin te drod che la bad kan dang mkhris pa skyed do/ /mon sran sde'u la sogs pa'i khur ba ni lci ba yin te bad kan skyed cing phyi sa sla bar byed do/ /khur ba bu mar gyi nang du btsos pa ni rlung dang mkhris pa</text></item>
<item><p>202a.4</p><section></section><text>sel zhing / lus kyi mdog bzang ba dang mig rno bar byed do/ /khur ba 'bru mar gyi nang du btsos pa ni/ mig rtul bar byed cing rlung sel la mkhris pa skyed do// //da ni tshal nan gyi bye brag bshad de/ zan zos pa'i 'og tu tshal nan btung ba ni ngoms pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>202a.5</p><section></section><text>'ju bar byed pa dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / nyams stobs skyed pa dang / sha skye ba dang / yi ga 'bye ba dang / zan zos pa gnas su son par byed de/ rlung nad can la ni tshal nan du/ snum bag dang dron po dge'o/ /mkhris pa can la ni tshal nan du</text></item>
<item><p>202a.6</p><section></section><text>mngar ba dang bsil ba dge'o/ /bad kan can la ni tshal nan du rtsub pa dang dro bag dge'o/ /nad khong skem yod pa la ni tshal nan du sha khu bzang ngo / /bud med kyis dub pa dang / lam gyis dub pa dang / smyung bas dub pa dang / mang du smras pas dub pa</text></item>
<item><p>202a.7</p><section></section><text>dang / tsha bas gdungs pas dub pa dang / de rnams la ni tshal nan du 'o ma bzang ngo / /sha che ba la ni tshal nan du sbrang rtsi dang chu sbyar ba bzang ngo / /rid pa la ni tshal nan du chang bzang ngo / /glo 'grams pa dang / skad 'gags pa dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang /</text></item>
<item><p>202b.1</p><section></section><text>lud pa dang / skyigs bu dang / mchil ma mang du 'byung ba dang / nam tshod yan chad kyi nad kyis nyam thag pa la ni/ tshal nan 'thungs na mi bzang ngo / /de ltar kha zas dang btung ba rnams gzhung la brten te ci rigs par sbyar na/ nad pa yang 'tsho la/ sman</text></item>
<item><p>202b.2</p><section></section><text>pa de'ang 'jig rten na grags pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /zas lci ba ni nyung ngu bza'/ zas yang ba ni mang du za zhing / dus dang / me'i drod dang / tshod shes par sbyar ba'i bye brag dang / goms pa dang / me'i drod shes par byas nas ci rigs par byas na ni/</text></item>
<item><p>202b.3</p><section></section><text>kha zas lci ba yang yang bar 'gyur la/ yang ba yang lci bar 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do/ /kha zas dang btung ba'i cho ga bshad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //rims nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rims nad ni nad do cog gi rgyal po yin par</text></item>
<item><p>202b.4</p><section></section><text>bshad do/ /de bas na 'dir de gso ba'i cho ga 'di thog ma kho nar bshad de/ rims ni thog mar lha chen po drag po zhes bya ba la drang srong shes nyan can zhes bya bas brnyas te/ lha chen po drag po khros nas dbugs btang ba las byung ba/ rlung dang mkhris</text></item>
<item><p>202b.5</p><section></section><text>pa dang bad kan so so'i rims dang / rlung dang mkhris pa 'dus pa'i rims dang / mkhris pa dang bad kan gnyis 'dus pa'i rims dang / rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum 'dus pa'i rims dang / glo bur gyi rims dang / rims rnam pa brgyad</text></item>
<item><p>202b.6</p><section></section><text>du gyur to/ /de la rims thog mar byung ba'i thabs ni/ kha zas kyis nyes pa dang / 'dug nyal la sogs pas gnas pa'i nyes pa las nad gzhi rnams pho ba'i nang du zhugs te/ khong pa'i drod phyi rol tu bton pa de dang / dngas ma dang 'dus shing</text></item>
<item><p>202b.7</p><section></section><text>gnas par gyur pas ni rims skyed par byed do/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i rims kyi mtshan ma ni/ lus grang zhing 'dar ba dang / mgo 'khor ba dang / sla ba dang / ba spu langs pa dang / slal zhing bya rmyang byed pa dang / mgo bo dang rked pa dang brla dang rtsib</text></item>
<item><p>203a.1</p><section></section><text>logs na zhing byin snying skyur ba dang / skom dad che ba dang / mig dang pags pa'i mdog dang / sen mo dang / phyi sa dang / gcin rnams mdog gnag cing khar ro bska ba bro ba dang / 'gram pa na ba dang / dbugs mi bde zhing lud pa 'gog</text></item>
<item><p>203a.2</p><section></section><text>tu mi btub pa rnams yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rims kyi mtshan ma ni/ lus shin tu tsha ba dang / khong pa tsha ba dang / skom dad che ba dang / brgyal ba dang / rngul 'byung ba dang / kha'i ro tsha bar bro ba'am/ mgo 'khor ba dang / sla ba dang / sna'i</text></item>
<item><p>203a.3</p><section></section><text>nad dang / kha'i nad dang / mchu dang lkog ma rnams su 'brum pa 'byung ba dang / khro zhing shin tu khro ba dang / bsil ba 'dod pa dang / mig dang / sen mo dang / pags pa'i mdog dang / phyi sa dang / gcin rnams kyi mdog ser ba dang / sgregs pa'i ro kha ba</text></item>
<item><p>203a.4</p><section></section><text>dang/ 'khru ba rnams yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i rims kyi mtshan ma ni/ dbugs mi bde ba dang / lud pa lu ba dang / cham pa dang / mchil ma mang ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / skyug pa dang / gnyid che ba dang / lus lci ba dang / dang ga mer mer por gyur</text></item>
<item><p>203a.5</p><section></section><text>pa dang / slod par gyur pa dang / khar mngar ba bro ba dang / grang 'bum 'byung ba dang / mig dang sen mo dang / pags pa'i mdog dang / phyi sa dang / gcin gyi mdog skya ba dang / dro ba 'dod pa rnams yin no/ /rlung dang mkhris pa gnyis 'dus pa las gyur pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>203a.6</p><section></section><text>rims kyi mtshan ma ni/ skom dad che ba dang / lus tsha ba dang / lkog ma skom pa dang / kha skom pa dang / spu langs pa dang / gnyid mi 'ong ba dang / skyug pa dang / tshigs dang / klad pa rab tu na ba rnams yin par bshad do/ /rlung dang bad kan gnyis 'dus pa las</text></item>
<item><p>203a.7</p><section></section><text>gyur pa'i rims kyi mtshan ma ni/ snyom pa dang / slod par gyur pa dang / lus tsha ba dang / tshigs dang klad pa na ba dang / lus lci ba dang / lus grang ba dang / lud pa dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / lus rngul ba rnams las rtogs par bya'o/ /mkhris pa dang bad kan</text></item>
<item><p>203b.1</p><section></section><text>gnyis 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rims [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]tshul ni/ phyed grang phyed tsha ba dang / yig 'chus pa dang / rdul 'byung ba dang / lu ba dang / snyom pa dang / khar ro kha ba bro ba dang / rmongs pa dang / sgyid lug pa dang / skom dad che ba rnams yin no/ /rlung dang mkhris pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>203b.2</p><section></section><text>bad kan gsum 'dus pa las rims nad du gyur pa'i tshul ni/ tshigs dang rus pa dang / klad pa na ba dang / phyed grang phyed tsha ba dang / snyom pa dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / mgo 'khor ba dang / lkog ma ngar ngar zer ba dang / rna bar zug pa dang / mig dmar zhing yon</text></item>
<item><p>203b.3</p><section></section><text>por gyur pa dang / kha nas mkhris pa dang khrag 'byung ba dang / skyug pa dang / skom dad che ba dang / nub mo gnyid mi 'ong ba dang / lce tshig pa bzhin nag por 'gyur zhing reg na rtsub pa dang / lus kyi mdog sngo bsangs su gyur cing / 'brum bu dmar po 'thon pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>203b.4</p><section></section><text>rnams yin te/ rnam pa 'di dag thams cad tshang bar gyur na gsor mi rung ngo / /tshad par gyur na gso dka' bar bshad de/ glo bur gyi rims ni/</text></item>
<item><p>203b.5</p><section></section><text>sems 'khrug pa'i gdung ba las mkhris pa'i rims tsha bar 'gyur te/ de yang 'dod pa dang / mya ngan dang / 'jigs pa dang / khro ba rnams sems 'khrug</text></item>
<item><p>203b.6</p><section></section><text>mkhris pa dang / bad kan gsum gang byung ba las rims su gyur pa de dag so so'i mtshan mas bstan to/ /rims nad gso ba'i thabs ni/ rims thog ma byung ma thag tu nyams stobs la mi gnod par smyung ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /</text></item>
<item><p>203b.7</p><section></section><text>de la rlung dang ngal ba dang / khro ba dang / mya ngan dang / lud pa lu ba dang / glo rdol ba rnams la rims su gyur pa la ni smyung ba'i cho ga mi bya'o/ /smyung bar bya ba'i tshad ni bkres shing skom par gyur pa dang / phyi sa dang gcin tshul bzhin du 'byung bar gyur pa dang / lus</text></item>
<item><p>204a.1</p><section></section><text>yang bar gyur na smyung ba'i cho ga legs pa yin no/ /smyung ba'i cho ga ha cang drags na ni skem pa'i nad dang / snyom pa dang / mgo 'khor ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / ngal ba'i nad du 'gyur ro/ /de la bad kan dang rlung gi rims</text></item>
<item><p>204a.2</p><section></section><text>la ni/ skom du chu skol ba dron po blud do/ /mkhris pa dang tsha ba dang dug las gyur pa'i rims la ni skom du ro kha ba skol ba'i khu ba grang mo blud do/ /bca' sga dang / /ba le ka dang / ldum bu skra lo dang / pu shel tse dang / gla sgang dang tsan dan rnams</text></item>
<item><p>204a.3</p><section></section><text>skol ba'i khu ba grang mo blud na yang skom pa dang skyug pa dang / rims dang / lus tsha ba sel to/ /smyung ba'i cho ga byas pa'i rjes la/ kha zas smin pa ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan so so'i tshos par byed pa'i sman gang yin pa'i khu ba las gzhi blangs pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>204a.4</p><section></section><text>thug pa phan zhing 'phrod par blud do/ /yang na 'bras yos btags pa'i thug pa sla ba bca' sgas btab pa blud do/ /yang na rlung gi rims la ni/ sA lu'i chan ri dgas dang ri bya'i sha khu bcad dang bcas pa sbyin no/ /des zhi bar ma gyur na/ zhag bdun</text></item>
<item><p>204a.5</p><section></section><text>lon pa'i 'og tu tshos par byed pa'i sman dang zhi bar byed pa'i sman blud do/ /zhag bdun gyi snga rol rims gsar bu byung ba'i tshe/ sman btang ba ni sman de nyid kyis nad gzhi shin tu skyed par byed de/ de la rlung las gyur pa'i rims la ni tshos par byed pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>204a.6</p><section></section><text>sman bi lba la sogs pa rtsa ba lnga skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /yang na pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang / sle tres dang / bca' sga rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /yang na sle tres dang / gla sgang dang / byi tsher dang / bca' sga rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud</text></item>
<item><p>204a.7</p><section></section><text>do/ /yang na skyu ru ra dang / gla sgang dang / rtsa ba lnga pa dang / sle tres dang / 'u su'i 'bras bu rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /yang na rtsa mkhris dang / gla sgang dang / sle tres dang / pa la ka dang / br-i ha tI rnam gnyis dang / gze ma rnams lhan cig skol</text></item>
<item><p>204b.1</p><section></section><text>ba'i khu ba blud do/ /yang na s+thi ra dang / ka le shi dang / bca' sga rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud na rlung nad la phan no/ /yang na thal tres dang / pi pi ling dang / rgun dang / shu ti'i 'bras bu dang / ha re nu ka rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /yang</text></item>
<item><p>204b.2</p><section></section><text>na thang shing dang / br-iMk+Sha da ni dang / sman ra sna dang / sgron shing dang / e la ba lu ka rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /yang na/ sle tres dang / aM shu ma ti dang / rgun dang pa t+ya la ka rnams lhan cig skol ba'i ba blud do/ /yang nar sna dang / shing</text></item>
<item><p>204b.3</p><section></section><text>mngar dang / dong ka dang / taM pa la dang / shal ma li dang / bal rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /yang na khyi lce ba dang / rgun dang shi ri sar ni dang / thal tres dang / sle tres rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /'di rnams ni rlung las gyur</text></item>
<item><p>204b.4</p><section></section><text>pa'i rims sel bar byed do/ /gong nas thal tres zhes smos pa man chad kyi sbyor ba lnga po 'di dag kun gyi khu ba ni bu ram dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rims la ni/ tshos par byed pa'i sman skyu ru ra dang / rgun dang / ba la ka dang /</text></item>
<item><p>204b.5</p><section></section><text>rtsa mkhris rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /yang na pu tse shel dang / rgun dang / nim+pa dang / shing mngar rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /yang na am bra dang / rtsa mkhris pa dang / byi tsher pa dang / sro lo rnams lhan cig skol ba'i</text></item>
<item><p>204b.6</p><section></section><text>khu ba blud do/ /yang na dug mo nyung dang / pu tse shel dang / gla sgang dang / shing mngar rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /yang na seng phrom dang / me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / thal tres dang / sle tres rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba kha ra dang</text></item>
<item><p>204b.7</p><section></section><text>sbyar ba'am/ /yang na sro lo skol ba'i khu ba grang ba blud na mkhris pa'i rims sel to/ /yang na khyi lce ba dang / sro lo dang / ba la ka dang / pu tse shel dang / rtsa mkhris dang / byi tsher rnams lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar zhing blud na</text></item>

<item><p>205a.4</p><section></section><text>rtsa mkhris dang / rtsa sh+ya ma dang / sro lo dang / ba sha ka rnams lhan cig bskol te bsgrangs pa'i khu ba kha ra dang sbyar te blud na khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rims sel to/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i rims la ni/ tshos par byed pa'i kha lung gi rtsa ba dang / bca'</text></item>

<item><p>205b.7</p><section></section><text>la zhag lon par byas pa'i nang du/ 'bras so brngos la phub ma bsal te btags pa dang / sbrang rtsi dang / khar dang sbyar te blud na/ rlung dang mkhris pa'i rims dang / lus tsha ba dang / skom pa'i nad dang / brgyal ba dang / skyug bro ba dang / mgo 'khor</text></item>

<item><p>206a.7</p><section></section><text>chung na gang shas chung ba de'i stobs bskyed par bya'o/ /gcig shas che la gnyis shas chung na gang shas che ba'i stobs dbri bar bya'o/ /yang na gang shas chung ba de'i stobs bskyed par bya ste/ de ltar shas che chung mi mnyam pa la ni/ mdor na gang shas che ba'i</text></item>

<item><p>206b.6</p><section></section><text>ror 'byin pa'i nad de mi la thebs par gyur na/ shi ba'i khongs su bcug ste/ so shi bsngo bar dam bcas nas/ snod chur bying ba snyeg pa bzhin du/ bang bya stod la myur du nyams su blang zhing gso bar bya'o/ /de la gso ba'i thabs ni/ shing tog kha lung gi</text></item>
<item><p>206b.7</p><section></section><text>khu ba shing kun dang / bca' sga dang / sman ro tsha ba dang / kha ba dang / rno ba dag dang sbyar ba'i khu ba btsags pa slar dran par ma gyur gyi bar du khar blugs so/ /shing ma d+hu ka'i snying po dang / rgyam tsha dang / shu dag dang / na le sham dang / pi pi ling rnams</text></item>
<item><p>207a.1</p><section></section><text>cha mnyam la chu'i nang du bdar te btsags nas snar blugs na yang slar dran par 'gyur ro/ /shi ri sha'i 'bras bu dang / pi pi ling dang / na le sham dang / rgyam tsha dang / skyer khaN+Da dang / byi sku dang / ldong ros dang / shu dag rnams</text></item>
<item><p>207a.2</p><section></section><text>cha mnyam la ba gcin gyi nang du bdar te btsags nas mig tu bskus na yang dran par 'gyur ro/ /gang cho ga de ltar byas te/ /yang na slar dran par gyur pa de ni 'phral ba'am/ rkang pa gnyis kyi rting par lcags kyi thur mas bsreg go/ /bya g+h+ri dang / byi</text></item>
<item><p>207a.3</p><section></section><text>tsher dang / b+ha gi dang / li zur ba dang / bu bran shing dang / ma nu rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba 'thungs na yang / bad kan dang / ror 'byin pa'i nad rims rmang du zhi bar byed do/ /kha lung dang / shing skasma b+hi dang / bilba dang / bya g+h+ri dang /</text></item>
<item><p>207a.4</p><section></section><text>pA thA dang / e raN+Da'i rtsa ba rnams skol ba'i khu ba lan tshwa dang ba gcin dang sbyar te blud na yang ror 'byin pa'i nad dang / lto sbo zhing rtul ba'i nad sel to/ /ka ra bi dang / ma nu dang / e raN+Da'i rtsa ba dang / khyi lce ba dang / ba sha ka dang / sle tres dang / sngar bshad</text></item>
<item><p>207a.5</p><section></section><text>pa'i rtsa ba lnga pa chen po zhes bya ba bilba la sogs pa dang / rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu zhes bya ba pr-iSh+Na par+Ni la sogs pa dang / lnga tshan che chung gnyis bsdus pa'i ming ni/ rtsa ba bcu pa zhes ste/ bcu po de dag dang / li zur ba dang / bu bran shing dang / byi tsher dang / b+hargi dang /</text></item>
<item><p>207a.6</p><section></section><text>pu na sna ba dang / 'di rnams cha mnyam la ba gcin gyi nang du bskol te 'thungs na yang dran pa sor chud par 'gyur zhing / ror 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i rims tshabs chen po dang / ngal ba'i nad tshabs chen po yang myur du sel bar byed do/ /ka raN+Da dang / kru trug</text></item>
<item><p>207a.7</p><section></section><text>tres dang / btsod dang / khyi lce ba dang / bilba dang / ku la ka dza dang / br-i ha tI rnam gnyis dang / ka ra bI dang / tsha ba gsum dang / 'di rnams skol ba'i khu ba 'thungs na yang / ror 'byin pa'i nad kyi rkyen gyis mid pa 'gags shing sgra ngar ngar por gyur pa</text></item>
<item><p>207b.1</p><section></section><text>yang sel bar byed do// //da ni rims ldang dub kyi dus mi 'dra bar bshad de/ dngas ma la sogs pa lus zungs bdun gyi gnas rnams rlung la sogs pa nad gzhi gsum po rnams zhugs pa las rims ldang dub can du gyur te/ de yang rgyun chags</text></item>
<item><p>207b.2</p><section></section><text>kyi rims dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / nyin re ba'i rims nyi ma gnyis shing lan gcig gi ldang ba'i rims dang / nyi ma gsum zhing lan gcig ldang ba'i rims dang / rnam pa lngar gyur te de dag gso ba'i thabs ni/ tshos par byed pa'i sman shing nim ba dang</text></item>
<item><p>207b.3</p><section></section><text>a ru ra dang / sle tres dang / gla sgang dang / ba to la dang / dug mo nyung gi 'bras bu rnams cha mnyam ste lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / khyi lce ba dang / pu tse shel dang / ba tha dang / thal tres rnam gnyis dang / 'di rnams cha mnyam ste lhan cig sbyar ba dang / pa to la</text></item>
<item><p>207b.4</p><section></section><text>dang / a rish+ta dang / rgun dang / dod gdang / 'bras bu gsum dang / pa tha sha ka sha mas cha mnyam ste lhan cig sbyar ba dang/ tsan dan dkar po dang / pu shel tse dang / 'u su'i 'bras bu dang / gla sgang dang / sle tres dang / bca' sga rnams cha mnyam ste lhan</text></item>
<item><p>207b.5</p><section></section><text>cig sbyar ba dang / thang shing dang / s+thi ra dang / bca' sga dang / ba sha ka dang / skyu ru ra dang / a ga ru rnams cha mnyam ste lhan cig sbyar ba dang / sman gyi sbyor ba lnga po 'di dag so sor skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi dang sha kha ras bskyed de sbyar ba so sor</text></item>
<item><p>207b.6</p><section></section><text>'thungs na/ sman gyi sbyor ba re res gong du smos pa'i rims nad rnam pa lnga po re re sel bar byed do/ /rims nad kyi grangs dang sman gyi sbyor ba'i grangs kyi go rim bzhin du so sor sbyar ro/ /yang na rims lnga po re re zhing yang sman gyi sde tshan lnga char gyis so so nas sel</text></item>
<item><p>207b.7</p><section></section><text>bar yang bshad do/ /de ltar tshos par byed pa'i cho ga bshad nas/ rims nad can gyi khong na nad gzhi tshos par gyur pa na gnas pa slar ma phyin na yang gnod pa chen por gyur te/ de bas na khong na nad gzhi tshos par gyur pa dang / tshos par ma gyur pa yod</text></item>
<item><p>208a.1</p><section></section><text>pa/ nyams stobs dang dus dang nad las dpags te ci rigs par bkru sman gyis dbyung bar bya'o/ /de la bkru sman ni shing mngar dang / dong ga dang / rgun dang / pu tse shel dang / pa tha dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / pa to la</text></item>
<item><p>208a.2</p><section></section><text>rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du/ a ru ra'i phye ma btab pa ni bkru bar byed de rims sel to/ /pa to la dang / dong ga dang / pu tse shel dang / bi shal dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / shing nye rang rnams skol ba'i khu ba nas tshig 'khus pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>208a.3</p><section></section><text>thal ba dang sbyar ba ni 'khru bar byed do/ /rims thams cad sbyong ngo / /pu tse shel dang / a ru ra dang / shing nye rong dang / dan+ti'i rtsa ba dang / khyi lce ba dang / dong ga dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang/ mar dang / rgyam tsha rnams lhan cig skol</text></item>
<item><p>208a.4</p><section></section><text>ba'i khu ba yang 'khru bar byed de rims sel to/ /'bras bu gsum dang / pi pi ling dang / shing nye rong dang / rtswa sh+ya ma rnams zhib tu btags la/ kha ra dang / sbrang rtsi dang sbrus te ri lur byas pa yang 'khru bar byed pa yin te/ 'dus pa'i rims dang /</text></item>
<item><p>208a.5</p><section></section><text>'or nad skrangs pa dang / khrag lud pa'i nad sel to/ /rims rnying dang / bad kan zad par gyur pa la ni 'o ma bdud rtsi dang 'dra'o/ /rims gsar bu la ni de dug dang 'dra ste mi gsod par byed do/ /de la 'o ma gtang ba'i thabs ni/ 'o ma rtsa ba lnga pa</text></item>
<item><p>208a.6</p><section></section><text>dang bskol te bsgrangs pa'am/ yang na 'o ma chu bzhi 'gyur dang bskol te chu du bar byas pa'am/ yang na 'o ma shing sha pa'i snying po dang skol ba'am/ yang na 'o ma bzhos pa'i 'phro la dron po 'thungs na rims sel to/ /'o ma pi pi ling dang / shing mngar</text></item>
<item><p>208a.7</p><section></section><text>dang/ rgun dang / ldum bu pa la dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / thal tres rnams dang lhan cig bskol te 'thungs na rims myur du sel to/ /'o ma shing bilba gzhon nu dang skol ba'am/ yang na e raN+Da'i rtsa ba dang skol ba 'thungs na de ma thag tu gdug pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>208b.1</p><section></section><text>rims sel bar byed do/ /'o ma bu ram dang / bca' sga dang / ba la dang / bya g+hi dang / gze ma dang lhan cig bskol te bsgrangs pa 'thungs na/ skrangs pa dang / rims dang / phyi sa dang / gcin 'gags pa zhi bar byed do/ /'o ma'i tshogs kyang ma smon te/</text></item>
<item><p>208b.2</p><section></section><text>rims kyi drod kyis mdongs med par byas pa la ni gso ba'i thabs gzhan bya ste/ mar khu nyi tshe'am/ yang mar sman dang skol ba'i me'i drod las dpags te btung bar bya'o/ /de la mar sman dang skol ba ni/ rgun dang skol ba'am/ yang na ba la dang skol ba 'am</text></item>
<item><p>208b.3</p><section></section><text>yang na shing mngar dang skol ba'am/ yang na 'bras bu gsum dang skol ba'am/ yang na sle tres dang skol ba'i mar 'thungs na de ma thag tu rims sel bar byed do/ /ba sha ka chen po'i mar zhes bya ba ni/ shing ba sha ka dang / shing a ri sh+ta dang / sle tres dang /</text></item>
<item><p>208b.4</p><section></section><text>b+hargi dang / rtsa ba lnga pa dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / byi tsher dang / shing mngar dang / rgun dang / btang pa la rnams btags pa'i phye ma zho gnyis gnyis mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang bskol te chu du bar byas pa'i mar 'di'i ming</text></item>
<item><p>208b.5</p><section></section><text>ni ba sha ka chen po'i mar zhes bya ste/ de la tshod ran par 'thungs na rims thams cad sel to/ /ba sha ka chung ngu'i mar bya ba ni/ shing ba sha ka skol ba'i khu ba dang / ba sha ka nyid phye mar btags pa rnam pa gnyis kyis mar skol la sman gyi khu ba du bar byas te</text></item>
<item><p>208b.6</p><section></section><text>bsgrangs nas sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i ming ni ba sha ka chung ngu'i mar zhes bya ste/ de las tshod ran par 'thungs na/ rims dang glo gcong chen po zad byed kyi nad dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / lud pa dang / skya rbab dang / mkhris pa dang / khrag lud pa'i nad</text></item>
<item><p>208b.7</p><section></section><text>sel to/ /dge ba'i mar zhes bya ba ni/ ru rta dang / sug smel dang / rgya spos dang / bal bu dang / dan+ta'i rtsa ba dang / thang shing dang / e la ba lu ka dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / ut+pa la dang / btsod dang / bi sha la dang / br-i ha tI rnam gnyis dang /</text></item>
<item><p>209a.1</p><section></section><text>yung dang / skyer pa dang / thal tres rnam gnyis dang / bar+Ni rnam gnyis dang / ha re nu ka dang / pad+ma'i ze ba dang / byi dong ka dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / rtsa sh+ya ma dang / sri shing rna ma'i me tog dang / bal po se'u</text></item>
<item><p>209a.2</p><section></section><text>rnams cha mnyam ste/ zho gnyis gnyis zhib tu btags la mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang / lhan cig tu bskol nas/ chu du bar byas pa ni dge ba'i mar zhes bya ste/ 'di ni nyams stobs skyed cing bzhin mdog bzang ba dang /</text></item>
<item><p>209a.3</p><section></section><text>bu mang bar byed la/ rims dang brjed byed dang / smyo phyed dang / gcin snyi ba'i nad dang / skrangs ba dang dug sel te/ dreg dang / skya rbab dang / skren dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / skyigs bu 'ong ba dang / gcin 'gags pa drag po rnams kyang 'joms</text></item>
<item><p>209a.4</p><section></section><text>par byed do/ /dge ba chen bo zhes bya ba'i mar ni/ gong ma dge ba'i mar de dang / sman de dag nyid kyi steng du/ 'tsho byed ces bya ba'i sman sna bcu ste/ dzi ba ka dang / ri sha ba ka dang / me da dang / ma hA me da dang / bu tshad rto dang / ra mnye ba dang / mung+ga</text></item>
<item><p>209a.5</p><section></section><text>par+Ni dang / ka sha par+Ni dang / dzi ban+ti dang / shing mngar rnams dang / rtsab bcu sngar smos pa rnams kyis kyang bsnan la/ 'o ma mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol te/ 'o ma du bar byas pa'i mar gyi ming ni dge ba chen po'i mar zhes bya ste nad do cog sel</text></item>
<item><p>209a.6</p><section></section><text>to/ /dug mo nyung dang / pu shel tse dang / ti ra dang / pu tse shel dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / bong nga dkar po dang / gla sgang dang / khyi lce ba dang / thal tres dang / bilba dang / rgun dang / ta ma la ka dang / pi pi ling dang / skyu ru ra dang / bya</text></item>
<item><p>209a.7</p><section></section><text>g+h+ri dang / 'di rnams zhib tu btags te/ sngar phye ma'i sman sbyar ba'i thabs bstan pa bzhin du skol ba'i mar ni rims sel zhing / glo gcong chen po zad par byed ba dang / lus tsha ba dang / lud pa 'jam por byed de/ glo 'or dang klad pa na ba yang med par</text></item>
<item><p>209b.1</p><section></section><text>byed do/ /gla sgang dang / a ri sta dang / s+thi ra dang/ byi tsher dang / ba la dang / sro lo dang / gze ma dang / khyi lce ba dang / da pa ni dang / bya g+h+ri dang ka la shi rnams lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba dang / mar gyi nang du phye ma'i sman ma nu dang / rgun dang / med dang / skyu</text></item>
