<item><p>209b.2</p><section></section><text>ru ra dang / dzad dang / dan+ta'i rtsa ba rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma skol la sman gyi khu ba du bar byas te btsags pa'i mar ni rims dang / glo gtsong zad byed dang / lud pa dang / klad pa'i nad sel to/ /dpyad de dag gis kyang rims rnying thams cad la/ nad</text></item>
<item><p>209b.3</p><section></section><text>gzhi long ga na gnas pa ma phyin na/ sman mar mas btang ba dang / bkru sman drag po mas btang ba gnyi ga cho ga bzhin du bya'o/ /de la sman mar mas btang ba ni/ tsan dan dkar po dang / me tog ut+pal dang / ta ba la dang / shing mngar dang / a ka ru dang /</text></item>
<item><p>209b.4</p><section></section><text>ku la ka rnams dang / til mar dang / lhan cig skol ba mas btang na rims thams cad sel to/ /yang na pa to la dang / po son cha dang / a rista dang / sle tres dang / shing mngar rnams dang til mar lhan cig pa'i sman mar mas btang na des kyang rims sel</text></item>
<item><p>209b.5</p><section></section><text>to/ /yang na 'jam rtsi mas btang ba la phan pa zhes bya ba'i sman/ d+ha ba ni dang / pa shi ka dang / thang shing dang / sug smel dang / pa tha dang / ra sna dang / pa la dang / shu dag dang / dzi ba ka dang / zangs rtsi ba dang / med dang / med chen po dang / ru rta dang /</text></item>
<item><p>209b.6</p><section></section><text>par+N-i rnam gnyis dang / pi pi ling dang / sle tres dang / ga tha ma dang / po son cha dang / bu bran shing dang / shing mngar dang / a ri sta dang / ba sha ka dang / a shwa gan+d+ha rnams las zho gnyis gnyis zhib tu btags la/ til mar srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad</text></item>
<item><p>209b.7</p><section></section><text>dang / chu til mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang / 'di rnams lhan cig tu skol la chu du bar byas nas btsags pa'i til mar 'di las tshod ran par mas btang na rims nad thams cad sel zhing / rlung nad tshabs chen po thams cad med par byed do/ /bkru sman drag po mas</text></item>
<item><p>210a.1</p><section></section><text>btang ba zhes bya ba ni/ pa to la'i rtsa ba dang / po son cha dang / pu tse shel dang / gze ma dang / dong ga dang / stir dang / ba la dang / a ri sha dang / gla sgang dang / pu shel tse rnams lhan cig tu 'o ma dang / chu 'o ma phyed kyi nang du skol la/</text></item>
<item><p>210a.2</p><section></section><text>chu du bar byas te/ 'o ma nyi tshe lus pa bsgrangs la/ sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang sbyar ba'i nang du/ po son cha dang / gla sgang dang / pi pi ling dang / dug mo nyung dang / shing mngar rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma dang sbyar ba 'di rims so cog bsal ba'i phyir</text></item>
<item><p>210a.3</p><section></section><text>mas btang na/ nad gzhi phyir 'byung zhing lus shin tu dag par 'gyur te de ma thag tu rims med par byed do/ /yang na bkru sman drag po mas btang ba ni/ po son cha dang / dong ga dang / pu tse shel dang / shing mngar dang / lo ma rnam bzhi zhes bya ba/ sa</text></item>
<item><p>210a.4</p><section></section><text>la brti dang / br-iSh+N-i bar+Ni dang / mung+ga par+Ni dang / ma sha par+Ni rnams skol ba'i khu ba dron mo'i nang du/ rtswa sh+ya ma'i rtsa ba dang / nye'u shing gi rtsa ba dang / gla sgang dang / shing mngar dang / po son cha rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar</text></item>
<item><p>210a.5</p><section></section><text>dang bu ram sbyar ba ni bkru sman btang ba'i nang na mchog yin te/ btang ma thag tu rims rnying gi gnod pa thams cad sel to/ /yang na bkru sman drag po mas btang ba ni/ pr-iSh+Na bar+Ni dang / s+thi ra dang / po son cha dang / ba la rnams skol ba'i khu ba dron mo'i</text></item>
<item><p>210a.6</p><section></section><text>nang du/ pi pi ling dang / po son cha dang / shing mngar dang / gla sgang rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sha ra'i khu ba dang / rgyam tsha bro ba tsam dang / 'di rnams sbyar te mas btang na rims sel cing yi ga 'bye ba</text></item>
<item><p>210a.7</p><section></section><text>dang / rngul phyin pa dang / nyams stobs skyed par byed do/ /sman mas btang ba'i cho ga 'di dag gi skabs su/ sman gyi tshad la sogs pa cho ga bzhin du ma smos pa ni/ 'og nas las lnga'i le'u las rgyas par 'byung ngo / /rims ldang dub can gyis</text></item>
<item><p>210b.1</p><section></section><text>gnod par gyur pa la ni/ 'o ma skol ba pi pi ling gi phye ma dang sbyar te gzhan mi bsam par btung ngo / /yang na 'o ma skol ba'i nang du/ nyin re bzhin pi pi ling bcu bcur bskyed de btab pa 'thungs la/ pi pi ling gi grangs brgyar phyin nas slar yang nyin re bzhin bcu</text></item>
<item><p>210b.2</p><section></section><text>bcu bri ste btung bar bya'o/ /'o ma dang mar bskol te bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang / kha ra dang / pi pi ling dang sbyar te dkrugs pa 'thungs na/ rims ldang dub can dang / snying na ba dang / glo rdol pa dang / lud pa dang / glo gcong zad byed kyi nad sel to/ /bi wa'i phye</text></item>
<item><p>210b.3</p><section></section><text>zhun mar dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na dar ba dang sbyar ba'am yang na 'o ma dang / ba lang gi lce ba'i khu ba dang sbyar ba 'thungs na rims ldang dub can sel to/ /thog ma rims kyis 'debs par tsher ma thag tu ni mar khu mang du 'thungs la phyir skyug par bya'o/ /yang na rims</text></item>
<item><p>210b.4</p><section></section><text>kyis thog mar 'debs pa tshor ma thag tu/ kha zas 'grangs par zos la/ chang zhim po mang du 'thungs te nyal na 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na shing kun dang / rgyam tsha dang / mar rnying pa gsum sbyar te blugs so/ /yang na rims la/ ldong ros dang / pi pi ling</text></item>
<item><p>210b.5</p><section></section><text>dang / rgyam tsha rnams las 'bras kyi 'bru tsam re re zhib par til mar dang lhan cig btags te mig tu bsku'o/ /rims ldang dub can la ni/ nas dang / yungs kar dang / ru rta dang / nim+ba'i lo ma dang / rtsa ba pha la sha dang / shu dag dang / a ru ra</text></item>
<item><p>210b.6</p><section></section><text>rnams cha mnyam ste/ zhun mar dang sbyar la bsregs te snar bdug par bya'o/ /yang na sa he de ba dang / shu dag dang / gla sgang chen po dang / na khu li rnams btags te lhan cig tu sbyar ba bsregs te snar bdug go/ /yang rims zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sman de</text></item>
<item><p>210b.7</p><section></section><text>dag gong ma gnyis kyis lus bsku ba'am lus dril bar bya'o/ /shi ri sha dang / bilba dang / a mra dang / a d+hid tha dang / a rdzun rnams kyi lo ma dang / skye ba dang / skyer pa dang / 'di rnams btags la lhan cig tu sbyar te bsregs pas bdugs na yang</text></item>
<item><p>211a.1</p><section></section><text>rims so cog dang / gdon thams cad sel to/ /gu gul dang / d+h+ya ma ka dang / shu dag dang / sra rtsi pog dang / nim+ba dang / arka dang / a ka ru dang / thang shing dang / 'di rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba'i bdug pa 'di'i ming ni</text></item>
<item><p>211a.2</p><section></section><text>gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ste/ des bdugs na yang rims nad thams cad sel to/ /rgya skyegs kyi khu ba dang / til mar gnyis las srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang / zho kha chu til mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du/ a sho gan+d+ha dang / yung dang / thang</text></item>
<item><p>211a.3</p><section></section><text>shing dang/ ha re nu ka dang / ru rta dang / gla sgang dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / murba dang / spod dang / ra sna dang / shu ti dang / la phug rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu bskol te/ til mar 'ba' zhig lus pa'i ming ni rgya skyegs la sogs pa'i mar</text></item>
<item><p>211a.4</p><section></section><text>zhes bya ste/ des lus bsku ba la sogs pa byas na rims so cog dang / zad byed kyi nad dang / smyo byed dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / brjed byed dang / rlung sel cing / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po 'joms par byed la/</text></item>
<item><p>211a.5</p><section></section><text>sgrum ma rnams la yang dge ba yin no/ /mi mkhris pa'i nad drag pos btab nas lus shin tu tsha bar gyur pa la ni/ khong pa bsil zhing bser bu 'ong ba'i gnas su bzhag la/ bsil ba'i cho ga 'og nas 'byung ba 'di dag bya'o/ /de la bsil bar bya</text></item>
<item><p>211a.6</p><section></section><text>ba'i cho ga ni skyu ru ra mar gyi nang du brngos te btab pa'i phye ma rtsabs skyur pos 'dag gu byas pas lus la bskus na tsha ba zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na chu'i lbu ba'am/ rgya shug gi lo ma brdungs te/ rtsabs skyur bas btab pa'am/ nya lcibs shin tu</text></item>
<item><p>211a.7</p><section></section><text>bsil ba 'am/ rtswa dUrba btags pa rtsabs skyur bas btab pa'am/ 'dam shin tu bsil bas lus thams cad bsku bar bya'o/ /yang na sngar smos pa'i shing n+ya gro d+ha la sogs sman gyi sde tshan nam/ me tog ut+pal la sogs pa sman gyi sde tshan</text></item>
<item><p>211b.1</p><section></section><text>phye mar byas la/ rtsabs skyur po dang sbyar bas lus la bsku bar bya'o/ /yang na sman gyi sde tshan de gnyis las gang yang rung ba skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs ba'i nang du/ tsha ba mi bzod pa'i mi nyid 'ju bar bya'o/ /yang na bu ram chang ngam/ rgun chang gi</text></item>
<item><p>211b.2</p><section></section><text>tsha'am/ chang tham le pa'am/ rtsabs skyur ba'am/ 'o ma'i rgun lus la byug na yang tsha ba sel te bzang ngo / /shug pa dang / me tog ut+pal dang / ka lta ra dang / pad+ma'i rtsa lag dang / le brgan rtsi dang / pu shel tse dang / btsod dang / pad+ma dang /</text></item>
<item><p>211b.3</p><section></section><text>btsag dang / ka tal dang / thal tres rnam gnyis dang / seng phrom dang / gla sgang dang / rgun dang / 'bra go dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / skyu ru ra dang nye'u shing rnams lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du/ sman de dag nyid kyi phye ma dang / rgya skyegs kyi khu</text></item>
<item><p>211b.4</p><section></section><text>ba dang / 'o ma dang / tsha dang / rtsabs kyi dngas ma dang / zho kha chu dang til mar rnams blugs te bskol la til mar nyi tshe lus par byas la btsags pa 'di ni pags pa'i mdog bzang zhing / lus tsha ba dang / skom pa'i nad sel ba'i mchog yin te lus la bsku bar</text></item>
<item><p>211b.5</p><section></section><text>bya'o/ /ka ling ya ka dang / rgya shu ka dang / a dan+ta dang / shing mngar dang / btsag rnams btags la zhun mar dang sbyar te mgor bskus na yang skom pa'i nad dang / lus tsha ba'i gnod pa sel to/ /bal po se'u dang / rgya shug dang / seng phrom dang / da d+hi tha</text></item>
<item><p>211b.6</p><section></section><text>dang/ kha lung rnams btags la zhun mar dang sbyar/ 'dis kyang skom pa'i nad dang lus tsha ba sel to/ /mgo bsku bar bya'o/ /pad+ma'i lo ma dang / chu shing gi lo ma dang nyi sngo ba'i steng du nyal la/ shing tA la'i lo ma tsan dan brdar ba'i khu ba'i nang du dmyugs pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>211b.7</p><section></section><text>bsil g.yob kyis g.yabs na yang lus tsha ba'i gnod pa sel to/ /rdzing bu'i me tog pad+ma kha bye ba dang ldan pa'i phyogs sam/ chu 'dren ba'i 'khrul 'khor yong ba'i phyogs su bsil khang bzang po byas pa'i nang du 'dug cing / bud med kyi lus tsan dan gyi 'dag</text></item>
<item><p>212a.1</p><section></section><text>gus byugs pas mthar sbyar na yang / lus tsha ba'i gnod pa sel to// //da ni bad kan dang / rlung gi rims kyis thebs te/ grang bas nyen pa'i cho ga bshad de/ de ltar grang bas nyen pa la ni/ khyim dron po'i nang</text></item>
<item><p>212a.2</p><section></section><text>du 'dug la rngul gdon pa'i dugs bya zhing gos lci ba la sogs pa bgo bar bya'o/ /sman ka ya sta dang / na gu li dang / pu tse shel dang / sle tres dang / a ka ru dang / na ku ta ku dang / sa ha de ba dang / shu dag rnams lhan cig sbyar bas lus byug cing de</text></item>
<item><p>212a.3</p><section></section><text>dag bsregs pas lus bdugs na yang grang ba sel to/ /yang na sman de dag nyid btags pa'i phye ma dang / lan tshwa dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang / tshwa dang rtsabs skyur ba la sogs pa dang / til mar rnams lhan cig tu skol ba'i til mar nyi tshe</text></item>
<item><p>212a.4</p><section></section><text>lus pas lus la bskus na yang grang ba sel to/ /zho kha chu 'am/ ba gcin nam/ tshwa dron pos lus la byug gam/ yang na byi'u rug pa dang / zan tig li dang / shi kru rnams brdungs pas lus la bskus na yang grang ba sel to/ /yang na sbrebs par</text></item>
<item><p>212a.5</p><section></section><text>gyur pa la ni rlung sel ba'i rtsi shing rnams dang / gso ma brdungs ba'i khu ba dron po'i nang du/ lums su 'jug par bya'o/ /yang na thang shing dang a ka ru bsregs pas bdug gam/ yang na pog dang / k+Sha bu ka bsregs pas bdug par bya'o/ /</text></item>
<item><p>212a.6</p><section></section><text>bud med lang tshol bab pa nu ma rgyas shing 'bur la yid tsam dbyibs dgu zhing / rked pa la sogs pa'i lus/ a ka ru'i lde gus byugs pa dang / mthar sbyar na yang grang ba shin tu sbrebs pa med par byed do// //da ni rims nad can gyi kha zas kyi</text></item>
<item><p>212a.7</p><section></section><text>bye brag bshad de/ rims nad can la ni/ kha zas 'bras sA lu shun lpags dmar po la sogs pa dang / 'bras zhag drug cus smin pa bzang ngo / /tshod ma dang / khu bcud du ni/ sran chung dang / mon sran tsa na dang / mon sran sde'u dang / rgya</text></item>
<item><p>212b.1</p><section></section><text>sran dang / mon sran na gu bzang ngo / /bya na dang / khu bcud ni/ ri bong dang / dgo ba dang / 'ur ba dang / bya bar ti ra dang / brta ka dang / gong ma sreg rnams kyi sha bzang ngo / /tshod ma ni shing pa ta la'i lo ma dang / brta ka dang / karko ta la</text></item>
<item><p>212b.2</p><section></section><text>sogs pa bzang ngo / /de la cho gar bsrung ba'i mdo ni/ rims na ba'am/ rims byang nas nyams ma brtas kyi bar du kha zas lci ba dang / bsil ba dang / chu grang mo dang / nyin par nyal ba dang / mgo mi 'thub ste ngal bar gyur pa rnams bsgrims te bsdad</text></item>
<item><p>212b.3</p><section></section><text>par bya'o/ /rims la nad bla gnyan 'byung ba mgo 'khor ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / skom dad che ba dang / skyug pa la sogs par gyur na/ rims nyid la gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i so so'i sman gang 'os pa rnams kyis de bsal bar bya'o/ /rims</text></item>
<item><p>212b.4</p><section></section><text>drag po 'byung du mi btub cing cho ga gzhan gyis ma slon pa la ni sman chen po lus la gdags pa dang / sman gyi khu ba'am sngags chus khrus bya ba dang / zhi ba'i cho ga dang / sbyin sreg dang / gtor ma sbyin pa dang / dka' thub spyad pa dang / grub pa'i sngags kyi</text></item>
<item><p>212b.5</p><section></section><text>cho ga rgyas par bya ba rnams kyis zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rims nad byung ba'i mtshan ma ni/ kha zas 'dod pa dang / mgo g.ya' ba dang / sbrid pa 'byung ba dang / lus yang ba dang / rdul 'byung ba dang / khar 'byung ba rnams la rtogs par bya'o/ /rims</text></item>
<item><p>212b.6</p><section></section><text>nad gso ba'i le'u ste lnga pa rdzogs so// //'chi ltas kyi le'u bshad pa/ nad pa zad par ma shes te/ gya tshom du sman gyi las byas na/ ngal gyi snon de las sto bar zad do/ /de bas na phrin pa dang / 'chi ltas dang / mtshan ma 'di gsum las</text></item>
<item><p>212b.7</p><section></section><text>tshe rtogs par bya'o/ /de 'chi ltas ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba de'i ngang tshul dang / lus kyi mdog dang / dbang po dang / spyod pa'i tshul rnams 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ mdor na sman pa mchog gis 'chi ltas su rig par bya'o/ /de la dbang po rnams don</text></item>
<item><p>213a.1</p><section></section><text>rnams la log par 'dzin la/ sman pa dang mdza' bo bla ma la sdang zhing dgra la dga' bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /nam thang ba la sprin dang / 'ja' dang / glog mthong zhing / gzhal med khang dang bzhon pa rnams</text></item>
<item><p>213a.2</p><section></section><text>kyis nam mkha' khebs par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/ /skar ma lha mo sgrib med ces bya ba dang / skar ma gong cug dang / dgu tshigs mi mthong ba dang / sa chen po gom pa brgyad khor khor yug tsam du chung ngur mthong ba de ni srog gi</text></item>
<item><p>213a.3</p><section></section><text>dbang po 'das zin pa yin no/ /nyin par skar ma me 'bar ba 'dra ba mthong ba dang / nyi ma'i mdog kha dog sna tshogs su mthong ba dang / rlung la gzugs yod par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni nges par 'chi bar bstan to/ /nyi ma 'char ba'i ngos la bu gu</text></item>
<item><p>213a.4</p><section></section><text>dod par mthong ba dang / mar me shi ba'i dri snar mi tshor ba de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /me long la sogs pa la bdag gi gzugs brnyan yan lag ma tshang bar mthong ngam/ yang na ye med par mthong ba dang / sems can sna tshogs kyi cha byad mthong na</text></item>
<item><p>213a.5</p><section></section><text>de ni gshin rje'i khyim na gnas pa yin no/ /mig g.yon pa khung du bros pa 'am/ lce nag por gyur tam/ sna'i dbyibs 'gyur ram/ mchu nag por gyur cing dbyibs nyams sam/ kha mnam por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni spang bar bya'o/ /</text></item>
<item><p>213a.6</p><section></section><text>mig dmar por gyur pa dang / mig dmar bar gyur pa dang / mig mi 'gyur ba dang / mchi mas gang ba dang / ya yor gyur pa dang / smin ma zhum pa dang / ya yor gyur pa de ni ror gyur par shes par bya'o/ /bzhin gyi mdog dmar ba dang /</text></item>
<item><p>213a.7</p><section></section><text>gnag pa dang / ser ba dang / sdo sangs su gyur pa dang / ngo tsha med pa dang / mdog mi sdug par gyur pa dang / dran pa nyams pa gang yin pa de'i tshe ni 'das zin par shes par bya'o/ /mgo bo la ba lang gi lci ba'i phye mas stug por khebs pa</text></item>
<item><p>213b.1</p><section></section><text>lta bur snang ba dang / skra bshig pa dang / sen mo dang / so mdog mi sdug par gyur cing zho byung bar gyur na/ de ni tshe zad par shes par bya'o/ /dpral rtsa ser skya dang / dud ka dang / dmar ba dang / sngo sangs dang / nag po dang / dkar po lta bur</text></item>
<item><p>213b.2</p><section></section><text>gyur pa gang la snang ba ni gshin rje'i khyim du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /dpral ba la shig 'gro ba dang / gtor ma bya rog mi 'dod pa dang / ha cang gnyid che ba dang / ha cang gnyid med par gyur pa de'i tshe ni ring por mi thub po/ long bu dang / pus mo'i lha</text></item>
<item><p>213b.3</p><section></section><text>nga dang / dpral ba dang / phrag pa dang / mkhur tshos dang / 'gram pa dang / mur 'gram gyi sha lhod pa dang / sha 'phyang bar gyur ba gang yin pa de ni srog ring por mi thogs par spong bar 'gyur ro/ /sha bros la skad kyi gdangs che bar gyur pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>213b.4</p><section></section><text>nyams stobs yod bzhin du skad zhom par gyur pa dang / skra mtshams bye ba gang yin pa de 'chi ba'i dus kyi zhags pas zin par shes par bya'o/ /kha zas zos kyang sha bros pa dang / kha zas ma zos kyang nyams stobs skye ba dang / bzhin gyi mdog</text></item>
<item><p>213b.5</p><section></section><text>snum par gyur tam/ kha dog gzhan du gyur pa de ni srog gi dbang po 'das zin pa yin no/ /glo bur du dri mi zhim pa dang / dri mi zhim pa zhig tu gyur tam/ sbrang ma sngon po 'khor bar gyur na de 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /da ni mtshan ma'i bye brag bshad de/ rmi</text></item>
<item><p>213b.6</p><section></section><text>lam du lus snum gyis byugs pa dang / lho phyogs su 'gro ba dang / phag dang / ma he dang / gcan gzan dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo la zhon pa rmi lam mi bzang ngo / /bud med skra bshig cing gos nag po dang / dmar bag gyon pas bcings te dgod</text></item>
<item><p>213b.7</p><section></section><text>bzhin du lho phyogs su khrid pa rmis na mi 'dod pa yin no/ /gshin dog dang / mu stegs can gyi rab tu byung ba la sogs pa dang phrad pa dang / de dag dang 'grogs pa dang / sbrang rtsi dang / 'bru mar 'thung ba dang / 'ji bas lus byugs te gar byed pa</text></item>
<item><p>214a.1</p><section></section><text>rmis na mi bzang ngo / /ri dang / brag la sogs pa las lhung ba dang / bcing ba dang / gzhan gyis thub pa dang / bya rog la sogs pas mchus btsugs pa dang / lhung ba rmis na mi dge'o/ /lha ste'i shug to dang / rgya</text></item>
<item><p>214a.2</p><section></section><text>skyegs kyi shing dang / grog mkhar dang / shing pa ri pat+t+ra rnams la 'dzegs pa dang / 'bru mar dang / shing bal dang / 'bru mar btsir ba'i tshigs ma dang / lcags rnyed pa rmis na mi rung bar 'gyur ro/ /rmi lam na bag ma len pa dang / me tog</text></item>
<item><p>214a.3</p><section></section><text>dmar po'i phreng ba thogs shing gos dmar bag gyon pa dang / chus khyer ba dang / sha btsos pa za zhing rmi ba ni mi 'dod pa yin no/ /rmi lam du rnam pa 'di lta bu dang / gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs de 'dra ba dag mthong na/ mi na pa ni nad kyis 'debs</text></item>
<item><p>214a.4</p><section></section><text>par 'gyur ro/ /na ba ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro// //da ni mtshan ma bzang po'i bye brag bshad de/ lha dang / bram ze dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / khyu ba dang / me tog pad+ma dang / rgyal po dang / me tog dkar po dang / gos</text></item>
<item><p>214a.5</p><section></section><text>dkar po dang / chu dang ba dang / me 'bar ba dang / mdza' bo gson po dang / mi dge zhing des pa dang / bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong zhing rmis na bzang ngo / /rmi lam du khyu ba dang / rta zhon pa dang / ri la 'dzeg pa dang / shing 'o ma yod pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>214a.6</p><section></section><text>'bras bu yod pa la 'chag pa dang / me long dang / sha rjen pa dang / me tog gi phreng ba rnyed pa dang / chu chen po las brgal ba rmis na/ mi na bas ni nor rnyed par 'gyur/ nad pa zhig na ni nad myur du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// //da ni phrin</text></item>
<item><p>214a.7</p><section></section><text>pa'i bye brag bshad de/ phrin pa rigs ngan nam/ yan lag ma tshang ba'am/ mu stegs can gyi rab tu byung ba la sogs pa'am/ zhags pa dang / dbyig pa lag na thogs shing / rgod bag tu gyur pa dang / gos dmar po dang / nag po dang /</text></item>
<item><p>214b.1</p><section></section><text>rnying pa gyon pa dang / khyed reng can dang / 'di rnams mi 'dod pa yin par bshad do/ /phrin pa lag pa nyed pa dang / mchi ma zag pa dang / mgo lus mar gyis byugs pa dang / rtswa shing gcod pa dang / bud med dang / ma ning phrin par 'ong ba dang /</text></item>
<item><p>214b.2</p><section></section><text>bud med kyi rtsig gi ming dang / ldan pa sna la sogs pa dang / ma ning gi rtsig gi ming dang ldan pa / mig la sogs pa la lag gis nom pa dang / pho mtshan gyi phyogs su lag pas nom pa dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / ma he zhon te 'ongs pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>214b.3</p><section></section><text>bsdad cing duHkhar smra ba 'di dag ni mi rung ba yin no/ /de dag las ldog pa ni dge ba yin no/ /sman pa nad pa'i gan du 'gro bar chas pa na/ glang po che'i skad thos pa dang / 'brug sgra dang / rnga sgra la sogs pa thos pa dang / rin po che dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang /</text></item>
<item><p>214b.4</p><section></section><text>sha rjen pa dang / gdugs dang / bum pa gang ba la sogs pa mthong na bzang ngo / /sman pa chas te 'gro ba na/ pho'i ming dang ldan pa/ bya ngang pa dang / phug ron la sogs pa g.yon logs na gnas shing snang la/ mo'i ming dang ldan pa skyung ka dang / ri</text></item>
<item><p>214b.5</p><section></section><text>skegs la sogs pa g.yas logs na gnas shing snang ste/ nad pa'i khyim gyi nang du 'gro ba'i tshe legs par bsu na bya ba de don du 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/ /rta babs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / shing 'o ma can dang / 'bras bu dang me tog yod pa'i shing</text></item>
<item><p>214b.6</p><section></section><text>mthong ba dang / g.yas logs sam g.yon logs nas bya 'phur ram 'dug cing skad snyan pa sgrog pa thams cad kyang dge ba yin no/ /khyi dang wa g.yas phyogs su song na dge'o/ /srog chags go d+ha dang / sbrul dang / klu sbrul mthong ba ni dus</text></item>
<item><p>214b.7</p><section></section><text>thams cad du mi 'dod pa yin no/ /de ltar sman pa gang gis bsgrims te legs par brtags shing bye brag phyed par byas nas las nges par rtsom pa de'i grags pa ni dge ba mang po tshogs pa'i nang du me tog gi phreng ba rnying pa bzhin du mdzes par 'gyur ro/ /</text></item>
<item><p>215a.1</p><section></section><text>'chi ltas kyi le'u ste drug pa rdzogs so// //da ni 'khru ba gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /de la 'khru ba ni kha zas mi 'phrod pa dang / ha cang lci ba dang / ha cang snum pa dang / ha cang rtsub pa dang / ha cang tsha</text></item>
<item><p>215a.2</p><section></section><text>ba za zhing 'thung ba dang / ha cang mang du za ba dang / ha cang nyung ngu za ba la sogs pas me drod med par byas nas/ nad gzhi shas rnyed pa las 'khru bar 'gyur te/ de yang nad gzhi gsum re res gyur pa dang / kun 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / mya ngan</text></item>
<item><p>215a.3</p><section></section><text>las gyur pa dang / 'jigs pa las gyur pa dang rnam pa drug yod de/ de dag gi mtshan ma yang bshad par bya ste/ de la rlung las gyur pa'i 'khru ba'i mtshan ma ni/ phyi sa 'i mdog rtsa dmar ba dang / dbu ba can dang rtsub pa dang / nyung</text></item>
<item><p>215a.4</p><section></section><text>ngu nyung bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dang yang du 'byung ba dang / be'u snabs su 'byung ba dang / 'khrog pa dang / sgra dang bcas su 'byung ba rnams so/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'khru ba'i mtshan ma ni/ phyi sa'i mdog ser ba dang / dmar ba</text></item>
<item><p>215a.5</p><section></section><text>dang/ nag pa dang / sngo ba dang / ljang gur 'dug pa dang / shin tu mnam pa dang / sla ba dang / gzhang kha tsha 'ur 'ur por gyur cing 'brum pa 'byung ba dang / skom dad che bar gyur pa rnams yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i 'khru ba'i mtshan ma ni/ phyi sa'i</text></item>
<item><p>215a.6</p><section></section><text>mdog dkar ba dang/ dri bshul ba dang / bska ba dang / snum pa dang / grang ba dang / cher mi 'khrog pa dang / yi ga 'chu ba dang / brang tsha zhing kha nas chu 'byung ba rnams yin no/ /nad gzhi gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa'i 'khru ba'i mtshan ma ni/</text></item>
<item><p>215a.7</p><section></section><text>phyi sa phag tshil 'dra ba dang / mar dang / 'bru mar 'dra ba dang / sha bkrus pa'i khu ba 'dra ba rnams yin te gso dka' bar shes par bya'o/ /phyi sa sbrang rtsi 'dra ba dang / mar dang 'bru mar 'dra ba dang / mchin pa'i dum bu 'dra ba 'byung ba dang / 'o ma 'dra ba</text></item>
<item><p>215b.1</p><section></section><text>dang/ sha brdungs brdungs pa 'dra ba dang / tshon sna tshogs su 'dug pa dang / dri shin tu dku ba dang / zhag tshig tshig po yod pa ni mi 'tsho/ gzhang khar 'brum pa 'byung ba dang / gzhang phyir byung ba dang / sha zad pa dang / dbugs mi bde ba</text></item>
<item><p>215b.2</p><section></section><text>la sogs pa'i nang bla gnyan gyis thebs pa dang / me drod nyams pa dang / ther zug tu lto gang ba dang / mkhal rked na ba rnams kyang mi 'tsho ba'i mtshan ma yin no/ /'jigs pa dang / mya ngan gnyis las gyur pa'i 'khru ba'i mtshan ma ni/</text></item>
<item><p>215b.3</p><section></section><text>rlung las gyur pa'i 'khru ba'i mtshan ma dang 'dra bar shes par bya ste/ de gnyis la yang rlung bsal ba'i cho ga bya zhing dga' ba bskyed pa dang snying mal du dbab par bya'o/ /de ltar 'khru ba rnam pa drug po thams cad kyang / smin pa dang / ma smin</text></item>
<item><p>215b.4</p><section></section><text>pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te/ de la 'khru ba smin pa la ni/ smyung ba'i cho ga dang / skyug pa'i cho ga go rim bzhin du bya'o/ /'di'i skom dang / zas ni bca' sga dang / ba le ka skol ba'i khu ba dang / kha zas yang ba'i bag</text></item>
<item><p>215b.5</p><section></section><text>dge'o/ /'khru ba ma smin pa bcad sngas na skran dang mdze la sogs pa'i nad du 'gyur te/ de la 'khru ba ma smin pa ni/ phyi sa chu'i nang du btang na zhabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'khru ba smin pa ni chu'i nang du btang na steng du 'ong zhing byer bar 'gyur</text></item>
<item><p>215b.6</p><section></section><text>ro/ /de la 'khru ba ma smin pa la ni smyung ba'i cho ga dang skyug pa'i cho ga go rim bzhin du bya'o/ /'di'i skom dang / zas ni bca' sga dang / ba le ka skol ba'i khu ba dang / kha zas yang ba'i bag dge'o/ /'khru ba ma smin pa gcad pa sngas na/</text></item>
<item><p>215b.7</p><section></section><text>skran dang / mdze la sogs pa'i nad du 'gyur te/ de bas na thog mar a ru ras bkrus la phyi sa bcad pa'i cho ga byas na bzang ngo / /de la bcad pa'i thabs ni/ pi pi ling la sogs pa'i sde tshan sngar bshad pa rnams skol ba'i sman gyi khu ba</text></item>
<item><p>216a.1</p><section></section><text>las gzhi blangs te/ 'bras thug dang / khu bcud byas pa 'am/ dar ba'i thug pa blud do/ /de la dar ba'i thug pa ji ltar sbyar ba'i thabs ni 'og nas zhib tu ston to/ /yang na yung la sogs pa'i sde tshan nam/ shu</text></item>
<item><p>216a.2</p><section></section><text>dag la sogs pa'i sde tshan skol ba'i khu ba las gzhi blangs la 'bras thug byas te blud na 'khru ba ma smin pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na bca' sga dang / bong nga dkar po dang / shing kun dang / gla sgang dang / dug mo nyung dang / kru trug tres rnams</text></item>
<item><p>216a.3</p><section></section><text>lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / gla sgang dang / te dze ba ti dang / ba tha dang / pi pi ling dang / dug mo rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / /rgyam tsha dang / dug mo nyung gi 'bras bu dang / shu dag dang / pu tse shel rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / rtsabs ru tsha</text></item>
<item><p>216a.4</p><section></section><text>dang/ shu dag dang / a ru ra dang / ba thA dang / byi dang ka dang bca' sga rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / sug smel dang / dug mo nyung gi 'bras bu dang / sha ba ra'i seng phrom dang / yung dang / skyer pa rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / dug mo</text></item>
<item><p>216a.5</p><section></section><text>nyung gi shun lpags dang / bong nga dkar po dang / bca' sga dang / gla sgang rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / smin par byed pa'i sman gyi sbyor ba drug po 'di dag las gang yang rung ba skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /yang na sman gyi sbyor ba 'di dag las</text></item>
<item><p>216a.6</p><section></section><text>gang yang rung ba zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma chu gtsang mar bskol ba'am/ chang ngam rtsabs skyur po'i nang du btab ste blud do/ /yang na/ tsha ba gsum dang / bong nga dkar po dang / shing kun dang / shu dag dang / kha ru tsha dang / a ru ra rnams zhib tu</text></item>
<item><p>216a.7</p><section></section><text>btags pa'i phye ma chu skol ba'i nang du btab ste blud na 'khru ba ma smin pa tshabs chen po sel bar byed do/ /yang na/ shu dag dang / bilba dang / pi pi ling dang / bca' sga dang / ru rta dang / go snyod dang / ku la ka dang / byi dang ka rnams zhib tu</text></item>
<item><p>216b.1</p><section></section><text>btags pa'i phye ma chu skol ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na 'khru ba 'chad do/ /da ni 'khru ba smin pa'i cho ga bshad de/ de la pho ba'i drod chung ste/ 'khru ba smin pa yang dang yang du 'byung bar gyur pa la ni/ gcod sman gyi cho ga smyur te bya'o/ /de la</text></item>
<item><p>216b.2</p><section></section><text>gcod pa'i sman ni ldum bu sa mang ga dang / shing shal+ma li'i lo ma dang / seng phrom dang / pa tha dang / d+ha thA dang / da ta ka'i me tog rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / shing lwang ko dang / gan+d+ha pri yaM ku dang / me tog pad+ma dang / ti ri tra dang / bilba'i</text></item>
<item><p>216b.3</p><section></section><text>shing tog gi shegs ma rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / shing dir g+ha brin+ti'i shun lpags dang / bca' sga dang / shing mngar rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / dug mo nyung gi shun lpags dang / bal pho se'u dang / seng phrom dang / d+ha ta ki</text></item>
<item><p>216b.4</p><section></section><text>dang/ gan+d+ha ma lig lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / sman gyi sbyor ba 'di bzhi las gang yang rung ba zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na 'khru ba smin pa gcod par 'gyur ro/ /yang na 'khru ba smin</text></item>
<item><p>216b.5</p><section></section><text>pa la/ gla sgang bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te blud do/ /de bzhin du seng phrom la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang / am pa sh+ta la sogs pa'i sde tshan sngar bshad pa'i yon tan chen po 'di gnyis las gang yang rung ba cig bskol ba'i khu ba</text></item>
<item><p>216b.6</p><section></section><text>bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te blud do/ /yang na taM pa la dang / me tog pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang / shing ro tsha ba'i shun lpags rnams lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa/ pad+ma'i ze ba dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te 'thungs na gcod par 'gyur ro/ /shing</text></item>
<item><p>216b.7</p><section></section><text>n+ya grod+ha la sogs pa'i sde tshan sngar bshad pa zhib tu btags pa'i phye mas phye sreg pa'i kho pa bkang la/ snod kha bcad pa'i nang du btsos pa'i khu ba bsgrangs pa/ sbrang rtsi dang kha ra dang sbyar te 'thungs na dmu rdzings sel bar byed cing / 'khru ba gcod do/ /</text></item>
<item><p>217a.1</p><section></section><text>yang na rtsa ba lnga pa dang / ba la dang / bilba dang / 'u su'i 'bras bu dang / ut+pal dang / bca' sga rnams skol ba'i khu ba las gzhi blangs pa'i 'bras thug bal po se'us skyur por byas pa'am/ yang na kha ra dang / sbrang</text></item>
<item><p>217a.2</p><section></section><text>rtsi dang / rgun la sogs pas mngar bar byas pa blud do/ /yang na kat+pal dang / bong nga dkar po dang / gla sgang dang / dug mo nyung dang / bca' sga rnams skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te blud na/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'khru ba</text></item>
<item><p>217a.3</p><section></section><text>sel to/ /yang na ut+pal dang / d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang / bca' sga dang / bal po se'u'i shun lpags rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / ldum bu sa mang ga dang / ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / seng phrom dang / chu shing gi 'bras bu'i khu ba dang / til rnams</text></item>
<item><p>217a.4</p><section></section><text>lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / dug mo nyung dang / gla sgang dang / rtsa mkhris dang / skyer khaN+Da rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / seng phrom dang / ut+pa la dang / bca' sga rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / ba tha dang /</text></item>
<item><p>217a.5</p><section></section><text>byi tsher dang / bca' sga dang / shing lwang kho dang / dzam+bU'i shing tog gi rus pa dang / kat+pal rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / bilba dang / skyer pa'i shun lkogs dang / byi tsher dang / ba la rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / d+ha ta ki dang / bong nga dkar po</text></item>
<item><p>217a.6</p><section></section><text>dang/ bca' sga dang / dug mo nyung gi shun lbags dang / 'bras bu dang / skyer khaN+Da rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / kat+pal dang / shing mngar dang / seng phrom dang / bal po se'u 'i shun lpags rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / shing lwang kho dang /</text></item>
<item><p>217a.7</p><section></section><text>d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang / ldum bu sa mang ga dang / pad+ma rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / dug mo nyung gi shun lbags dang / skyer pa dang / pa tha dang / pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang / bca' sga rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / sman gyi sbyor ba bcu pa 'di dag las</text></item>
<item><p>217b.1</p><section></section><text>gang yang rung ba zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i nang du btags te 'thungs ni mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'khru ba sel to/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'khru ba yod bzhin du/ mkhris pa dang mi 'phrod pa'i kha zas zos pas</text></item>
<item><p>217b.2</p><section></section><text>khrag 'khrugs par byas nas/ khrag las gyur pa'i 'khru ba tshabs chen por gyur pa la na khrag lud pa'i nad sel ba'i cho ga smyur te bya'o/ /de la khrag lud pa'i nad bsal ba'i cho ga ni/ btung ba dang / kha zas dang / mas btang ba kun la yang ra'i 'o ma</text></item>
<item><p>217b.3</p><section></section><text>dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /ba ya s+ya dang / thal tres dang / seng phrom dang / kha ra dang / shing mngar rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma 'o ma grang mo dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na yang khrag nad las gyur pa'i 'khru ba sel to/ /pog dang /</text></item>
<item><p>217b.4</p><section></section><text>rgya shug dang / shing dzam+bU dang / bi yal dang / a mra dang / ardzu na rnams las gang yang rung ba'i shun lpags zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma/ 'o ma dang / sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na yang / khrag nad las gyur pa'i 'khru ba</text></item>
<item><p>217b.5</p><section></section><text>sel to/ /ut+pa la dang / a mang+ga dang / chu shing gi 'bras bu dang / pad+ma'i ze ba rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / til dang / sha ba ra'i seng phrom dang / shing mngar dang / sa mag dang / thal tres dang / ut+pa la rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /</text></item>
<item><p>217b.6</p><section></section><text>ut+pa la dang / shal+ma la'i shun lpags dang / shing mngar dang / sha ba ra'i seng phrom dang til rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / sman gyi sbyor ba 'di dag gsum las gang yang rung ba btags pa'i phye ma 'o ma dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs</text></item>
<item><p>217b.7</p><section></section><text>na yang khrag nad las gyur pa'i 'khru ba sel to/ /tsan dan dkar po 'am/ gan+d+ha pri yaM ku gnyis las gang yang rung ba'i phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang / kha ra sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na yang khrag nad las gyur pa'i 'khru ba</text></item>
<item><p>218a.1</p><section></section><text>sel to/ /yang na char pa'i chu dang / sbrang rtsi dang / bu ram gyi dbu ba sbyar ba'i nang du dug mo nyung gi shun lpags zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma btab ste 'thungs na yang khrag nad las gyur pa'i 'khru ba sel to/ /yang</text></item>
<item><p>218a.2</p><section></section><text>na shing mngar dang / ut+pa la dang / chu srin gyi sen mo dang / kha ra rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba btang ngo / /khrag tshad dang / phyi sa thal ba snrel zhi byung ba la ni 'o ma'i nang du 'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma btab pa'am/ yang na 'o</text></item>
<item><p>218a.3</p><section></section><text>ma bzhos ma thag pa dron mo ci ran par 'thungs te lan mang du 'khrus na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i 'khru bas gnod par gyur pa la ni/ kha zas sman bu ti ka dang / tsha ba gsum dang / bilba dang / kru trug tres dang / dar ba dang /</text></item>
<item><p>218a.4</p><section></section><text>bal po se'u dang / shing kun rnams dang legs par sbyar ba'i khu bcud dang ldan pa bza' bar bya'o/ /dbyi mong dang / bong nga dkar po dang / ru rta dang / ba tha dang / pu tse shel rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / a ru ra dang / gla sgang dang / bca' sga</text></item>
<item><p>218a.5</p><section></section><text>dang/ bilba dang / karka ti ka rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / kru trug tres dang / pi pi ling dang / pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang / pi pi ling chen po rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba rnams dang / phyi dang ka dang / shu dag dang / shang shing dang / 'u su'i</text></item>
<item><p>218a.6</p><section></section><text>'bras bu dang / tsha ba gsum po rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba ste sman gyi sbyor ba 'di bzhi las gang yang rung ba lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba blud na yang bzang ste/ me drod dang nyams stobs bskyed do/ /yang na a ru ra dang / kru trug tres dang / pa tha dang /</text></item>
<item><p>218a.7</p><section></section><text>shu dag dang / pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang / dug mo nyung dang / bca' sga rnams skol ba'i khu ba dron mo'am/ yang na de dag gi phye ma'i sman byas na bad kan las gyur pa'i 'khru ba sel to/ /shing aM ko ta'i rtsa ba dang / skyer ba rnams las srang re re btags te</text></item>
<item><p>218b.1</p><section></section><text>char pa'i chus brdzis la zho gnyis tsam reng bur byas te mas btang na 'khru ba thams cad kyang sel bar byed do/ /bilba dang / gla sgang dang / d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang / pa thA dang / bca' sga rnams kyi phye ma dang / chu shing gi 'bras bu'i khu ba rnams cha mnyam</text></item>
<item><p>218b.2</p><section></section><text>la bu ram dang / dar ba sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na yang 'khru ba gcod do// //da ni rlung las gyur pa'i 'khru ba'i cho ga bshad de/ khrag dang / phyi sa byung ba'i rjes la rlung gi mthus phyi sa 'gags te be'u snabs dbu ba 'dra bar 'byung zhing /</text></item>
<item><p>218b.3</p><section></section><text>'khrog pa'i nad kyi ming ni be'u snabs su 'byung zhing 'khreg pa zhes bya ste/ de la ni me drod chen po zhig na/ kru trug tres dang / bilba 'o mar skol ba'i khu ba/ bu ram dang / til mar dang sbyar te nad par 'thungs na/ phyi sa 'gags pa bde bar 'gyur ro/ /</text></item>
<item><p>218b.4</p><section></section><text>'o ma bskol te phyung ba'i nang du/ pi pi ling gi phye ma'am/ yang na na le sham gyi phye ma btab ste zhag gsum gyi bar du 'thungs na be'u snabs su 'byung zhing 'khreg pa yun ring du lon pa yang sel to/ /til mar dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / kha ra dang /</text></item>
<item><p>218b.5</p><section></section><text>bca' sga dang / bu ram gyi khu ba rnams lhan cig tu sbyar la dkrugs te 'thungs na yang de ma thag tu be'u snabs su 'byung zhing 'khreg pa sel to/ /d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang / rgya shug gi lo ma dang / shing ka pit+tha dang / drub mar cang dang / seng phrom rnams kyi</text></item>
<item><p>218b.6</p><section></section><text>phye ma zho dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang be'u snabs su 'byung zhing 'khreg pas nyam thag pa sel to/ /bilba'i 'bras bu'i shags ma dang / bu ram dang / seng phrom dang / til mar dang / na le sham rnams lhan cig tu sbyar te/ zos na yang be'u snabs su</text></item>
<item><p>218b.7</p><section></section><text>'byung zhing / 'khregs pas dub par gyur pa myur du sel zhing bde bar 'gyur ro/ /des kyang zhi bar ma gyur na/ shing mngar dang / til mar mas btang ba'i cho ga ni/ shing shal ma li'i lo ma btsos dkris la 'jim pas g.yogs te/ me mar mur</text></item>
<item><p>219a.1</p><section></section><text>gyi nang du bcug la/ 'jim pa ni skams/ lo ma ni tshos par gyur nas/ lo ma de gtun gyi nang du zhib tu brdungs pa'i phye ma/ mar dang / shing mngar gyi phye ma dang ldan par 'o ma srang sum cu rtsa gnyis bskol te phyung ba'i nang</text></item>
<item><p>219a.2</p><section></section><text>du brdzis pa'i ming ni mas btang ba'i sman 'jam zhing 'khyil ba zhes bya 'di mas btang na/ rims dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'khru ba sel zhing / skran dang/ tshad rnying 'joms par byed la/ pho ba'i nad dang / skrangs pa med par byed do/ /da ni</text></item>
<item><p>219a.3</p><section></section><text>pho ba'i me drod nyams pa gso ba'i cho ga bshad de/ me drod bri nas nad gzhi rnams kyis pho ba'i me drod dkrugs pa las/ pho ba'i me drod 'khrugs pa'i nad/ rlung dang mkhris pa dang / bad kan gsum so so las gyur pa dang / kun 'dus</text></item>
<item><p>219a.4</p><section></section><text>pa las gyur pa rnam pa bzhir gyur te/ de dag mtshan ma dang gso ba'i thabs ni 'khru ba dang 'dra'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i pho ba'i me drod 'khrugs par gyur pa'i mtshan ma dang / gso ba'i thabs ni/ rlung las gyur pa'i 'khru ba'i mtshan ma dang</text></item>
<item><p>219a.5</p><section></section><text>gso ba'i thabs dang 'dra'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / kun 'dus pa las gyur pa yang de bzhin du so sor sbyar ro/ /de la me drod bskyed pa'i thabs ni/ sman a dza mo dang / kru trug tres dang / dbyi mong dang /</text></item>
<item><p>219a.6</p><section></section><text>tsha ba gsum dang / rgyam tsha dang / sngar bshad pa'i thal ba rnam gnyis dang / pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang / shing kun rnams shing tog kha lung gi khu bas ri lur byas te zos na me drod skyed par byed do/ /'bras bu gsum dang / ga bye'i 'bras bu dang /</text></item>
<item><p>219a.7</p><section></section><text>tsha ba gsum dang / rgyam tsha dang / kha ru tsha dang / rtsabs ru tsha rnams btags te rdze'u kha sbyar gyi nang du btab ste 'thungs na/ skya rbab kyi nad dang / pho ba'i nad dang / skran dang / zug cing na ba rnams sel to/ /sman la la phud dang / tsha ba gsum</text></item>
<item><p>219b.1</p><section></section><text>dang/ rgyam tsha dang / go snyod rnam gnyis dang / shing kun rnams kyi phye ma mar khu dang brdzis pa kha zas kyi snga rol tu zos na/ rlung sel cing me drod skyed do/ /shu ti dang / 'u su'i 'bras bu dang / pa thA dang / bilba dang / kru trug tres dang /</text></item>
<item><p>219b.2</p><section></section><text>bca' sga dang / la la phud dang / pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang / rgya shug gi 'bras bu rnams kyi phye ma/ mar dang / zho mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang / ldum bu cang ge ri'i khu ba mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang / 'di rnams skol la mar nyi tshe lus par byas te ji</text></item>
<item><p>219b.3</p><section></section><text>ran par 'thungs na/ pho ba'i nad dang / gzhang 'brum dang / gzhang byung ba dang / gcin sri ba dang / lto sbos pa dang / be'u snabs su 'byung zhing 'khreg pa dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / skya rbab kyi nad dang / skom pa'i nad dang / lud pa</text></item>
<item><p>219b.4</p><section></section><text>dang/ drag tu skyug cing 'chad du mi btub pa rnams sel cing yi ga 'bye bar byed de/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i pho ba'i me drod 'khrugs pa'i nad la ni/ skyer pa'i khaN+Da dang / bong nga dkar po dang / bilba dang / byi tsher gyi shun lpags dang / byi</text></item>
<item><p>219b.5</p><section></section><text>tsher gyi 'bras bu dang / gla sgang dang / pA thA dang / d+ha ta ki dang / pu tse shel dang / bca' sga rnams kyi phye ma char pa'i chu sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na/ gzhang 'brum dang / be'u snabs su 'byung zhing 'khreg pa dang / khrag nad</text></item>
<item><p>219b.6</p><section></section><text>dang/ mkhal rked na ba dang gzhang nad rnams sel to/ /dug mo nyung gi shing dang / tsha ba gsum dang / gla sgang dang / rtsa mkhris dang / pu tse shel rnams cha mnyam pa dang / kru trug tres cha'i nyis 'gyur dang / dug mo nyung gi shun lpags cha'i</text></item>
<item><p>219b.7</p><section></section><text>bcu drug 'gyur dang / 'di rnams kyi phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na/ pho ba'i nad dang / mig ser dang / skya rbab kyi nad dang / gcin nad dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / 'khru ba dang / skran dang / skem pa'i nad dang rims</text></item>
<item><p>220a.1</p><section></section><text>sel to/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i pho ba'i me drod 'khrugs pa'i nad la ni/ sman sha thi dang / tsha ba gsum dang / a ru ra dang / thal ba rnam gnyis dang / pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang / kha lung gi 'bras bu dang / rgyam tsha</text></item>
<item><p>220a.2</p><section></section><text>rnams kyi phye ma chu bskol te phyung ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /ma d+hu ka'i me tog bskol te gdus pa'i khu ba bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi de'i bzhi cha blugs pa sbyar te/ bum pa'i nang pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / /a ka ru dang / til mar</text></item>
<item><p>220a.3</p><section></section><text>rnams sbyar bas byugs pa'i nang du blugs te zla ba gcig gi bar du nas kyi nang du bzhag pa las ran par 'thungs na me drod skyed do/ /pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang / kru trug tres dang / a ru ra dang / pi pi ling dang / byi tang ga rnams lhan cig tu sbyar bas</text></item>
<item><p>220a.4</p><section></section><text>rdza ma ri nang du bskus la/ de'i nang du ngar ba blugs te/ nas kyi nang du zla ba gcig gi bar du bzhag pa las ran par 'thungs na pho ba'i nad dang / gzhang 'brum dang / lung pa dang / skran dang srin bu rnams sel to/ /de ltar pho ba'i me drod 'khrugs</text></item>
<item><p>220a.5</p><section></section><text>pa'i nad kyis thebs pa la ni mdor na tshabs che chung la sogs pa las dpags te shin tu bye brag phyed par byas nas/ me drod bskyed pa'i kha zas dang / btung ba dang / sman gyi phye ma dang / sman gyi khu ba btung ba dang / sman mar la sogs pa ci rigs par</text></item>
<item><p>220a.6</p><section></section><text>btang ngo / /'khru ba dang / pho ba'i me drod 'khrugs pa'i nad las/ srin bu'i nad 'byung ba'i phyir/ de 'og tu skabs 'dir/ srin bu'i nad kyi bye brag dang / de'i mtshan ma dang / gso ba'i thabs bshad de/ de la srin bu'i nad kyi mtshan ma ni/ rims</text></item>
<item><p>220a.7</p><section></section><text>na bar 'gyur ba dang / sha mdog ngan pa dang / ru shing na ba dang / snying na ba dang / lus sbrid pa dang / mgo 'khor ba dang / kha zas mthong na yid du mi 'ong ba dang / 'khru bar gyur na/ stor srin bu skyes pa'i mtshan ma yin no/ /de gso ba'i thabs ni/</text></item>
<item><p>220b.1</p><section></section><text>sman byi tang ga dang / rgyam tsha dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang / kam+pi l+ya ga dang a ru ra rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma dar ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na/ srin bu thams cad sel to/ /shi kru dang / skyer pa dang / mu sha par+Ni dang / gla sgang dang / 'bras</text></item>
<item><p>220b.2</p><section></section><text>bu gsum dang / 'di rnams skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du/ pi pi ling dang byi tang ga'i phye ma btab ste sbyar ba 'thungs na yang srin bu sel to/ /su sha par+Ni btags pa'i phye ma dang / 'bras bsregs pa'i khu ba zos la/ tshal nan du rtsabs skyur po 'thungs na yang</text></item>
<item><p>220b.3</p><section></section><text>srin nad sbyang ngo / /byi tang ga'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te zos na yang srin bu sel to/ /shing pa ri b+had tra ka'i lo ma'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang srin bu sel to/ /yang na 'bras bu gsum dang / shu dag dang / dan+da'i rtsa ba dang / kaM pa l+ya</text></item>
<item><p>220b.4</p><section></section><text>ka rnams kyi phye ma mar dang / ba gcin mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol la/ ba gcin du bar byas nas tshigs ma btsags pa'i mar ji ran par 'thungs na yang srin bu sel to/ /'khru ba gso ba'i le'u ste bdun pa rdzogs so// //de la</text></item>
<item><p>220b.5</p><section></section><text>khrag lud pa'i nad ni/ nyi ma dang me la sogs pa'i tsha ba bsten pa dang / kha zas la sogs pa tsha ches pa dang / skyur ba dang / lan tshwa dang / thal ba rnon po'i sman dang / ro tsha ba'i bag zos pas/ mkhris pa 'khrug par gyur pa las mchin pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>220b.6</p><section></section><text>mcher pa'i nang na khrag gnas pa lud par gyur te/ yar yang 'byung la mar yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i khrag lud pa'i mtshan ma ni/ khrag gi mdog sngo skyar 'dug pa dang / dmar ba dang / sla ba dang / dbu ba can rnams yin no/ /</text></item>
<item><p>220b.7</p><section></section><text>mkhris pa las gyur pa'i khrag lud pa'i mtshan ma ni/ khrag gi mdog gos tshon nag por btsos pa'i kha dog 'dra ba dang / dud khar 'dug pa dang / ba gcin gyi mdog 'dra ba dang / skyer khaN+Da'i mdog 'dra ba rnams yin no/ /bad kan las gyur</text></item>
<item><p>221a.1</p><section></section><text>pa'i khrag lud pa'i mtshan ma ni/ khrag gi mdog snum pa dang / yid tsam skya ba dang / 'byil ba dang / bska ba rnams yin no/ /nad gzhi gnyis gnyis 'dus pa las gyur pa'i khrag lud pa'i mtshan ma ni 'dres mar 'gyur ro/ /</text></item>
<item><p>221a.2</p><section></section><text>nad gzhi gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa'i khrag lud pa'i mtshan ma ni/ kun gyi mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/ /de la nad gzhi re re las gyur pa'i khrag lud pa gyen du 'byung ba ni gso sla'o/ /nad gzhi re re las gyur pa dang / gnyis gnyis</text></item>
<item><p>221a.3</p><section></section><text>'dus pa las gyur pa'i khrag lud pa thur du 'byung ba ni/ kha zas dang / sman gyi cho gas mi ldang bar gso tsam du rung ste/ nad gzhi gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa'i khrag lud pa ni/ gyen du 'byung ba yang rung thur du 'byung yang rung ste shin tu gso dka' ba yin no/ /</text></item>
<item><p>221a.4</p><section></section><text>khrag lud pa'i rkyen gyis skyugs pa dang / brgyal ba dang / rims dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / lud pa dang / skad 'gags pa dang / lus tsha bar gyur pa dang / khrag gi mdog shing dzam+bU'i 'bras bu 'dra ba dang / 'ja' 'dra ba dang / mi ro'i</text></item>
<item><p>221a.5</p><section></section><text>dri mnam pa ni gso ba'i thabs med do/ /de la nyams stobs dang ldan zhing za phod pa ni/ nad khrag ngan pa thog ma nas bcad na/ de las lkog nad lha gor dang / skran dang / gzhang 'brum dang / rims dang / mdze la sogs pa'i nad du 'gyur ro/ /de bas</text></item>
<item><p>221a.6</p><section></section><text>na sngar gcad par mi bya'o/ /khrag lud pa la thog mar ni/ ci nus kyis smyung ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /de'i skom ni tsan dan dkar po dang / pu shel tse dang / sro lo dang / gla sgang rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /khrag lud pa gyen du 'byung ba la ni thog</text></item>
<item><p>221a.7</p><section></section><text>mar brta ba dang / bkru sman bya'o/ /thur du 'byung ba ni nyams stobs dang sbyar zhing / thog mar 'bras thug gi cho ga dang / skyugs pa'i cho ga bya'o/ /de la lus brta ba ni/ mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / 'bras brngos pa'i phye ma dang kha ra rnams sbyar ba'i nang du/</text></item>
<item><p>221b.1</p><section></section><text>skyu ru ra dang / bal po se'u btab ste ro skyur bar byas pa blud do/ /de la bkru sman ni dong ka'i tshig gu dang / skyu ru ra dang / shing nye rong dang / a ru ra 'di rnams las gang yang rung ba'i phye ma chu bskol te bsgrangs pa'i nang du btab la/ kha ra dang sbrang rtsis sbyar</text></item>
<item><p>221b.2</p><section></section><text>te gtang bar bya'o/ /skyug sman ni/ gla sgang dang / dug mo nyung dang / shing mngar skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa/ po son cha'i tshig gu dang / 'o ma dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba ni khrag lud pa'i nad sel ba'i mchog yin te btung bar bya'o/ /sha zad pa</text></item>
<item><p>221b.3</p><section></section><text>dang nyams stobs zad pa dang / byis pa dang / rgad po dang / skem pa'i nad yod pa la ni/ skyug sman dang bkru sman byar mi rung ste/ khrag 'byung ba gcad pa'i cho ga bya'o/ /de la khrag 'byung ba bcad pa'i cho ga ni/ pa to la dang / sna ma'i me tog</text></item>
<item><p>221b.4</p><section></section><text>dang/ nim+pa dang / tsan dan rnam gnyis dang / shug pa rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / mon sran sde'u dmar ru dang / ba sha ka dang / seng phrom dang / sa nag po dang / ma da yan ti ka rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / ka ko la dang / ra mnye'i</text></item>
<item><p>221b.5</p><section></section><text>rtsa ba dang / thal tres rnam gnyis dang / shing mngar dang / nye'u shing gi rtsa ba rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / 'bras sgang dang / skyu ru ra dang / d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang / dug mo nyung gi shun lpags dang / sro lo rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / sman</text></item>
<item><p>221b.6</p><section></section><text>gyi sbyor ba 'di bzhi las gang yang rung ba cha mnyam ste skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa dang / kha ra dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sbyar ba ni khrag lud pa'i nad myur du sel ba'i mchog yin te shin tu grang mor btung ngo / /pri yaM ku dang / skyer khaN+Da dang / sa tshig</text></item>
<item><p>221b.7</p><section></section><text>pa dang / seng phrom rnams lhan cig tu zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma/ ldum bu ba sha ka brdungs pa'i khu ba'am/ bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa gang yang rung ba kha ra dang / sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na yang khrag lud pa'i nad sel</text></item>
<item><p>222a.1</p><section></section><text>to/ /chu srin gyi sen mo dang / shug pa dang / gan+d+ha pri yaM ku dang / seng phrom dang / btsag rnams las gang yang rung ba'i phye ma char ba'i chu kha ra dang sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na yang khrag 'byung ba gcod do/ /seng ldeng</text></item>
<item><p>222a.2</p><section></section><text>dang / sap+ta parna dang / par+tha dang / shal+ma li dang / ko bi da ra rnams kyi me tog gi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te zos na yang khrag lud pa sel to/ /u dum ba ra dang / taM pa la dang / a ru ra dang / 'bra go dang / rgun rnams kyi 'bras bu smin pa las gang</text></item>
<item><p>222a.3</p><section></section><text>yang rung ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te zos na yang khrag lud pa'i nad sel to/ /ku shan+ma da'i 'bras bu rlon pa shun lpags bshus la nang gi sa bon rnams kyang bor te/ bar gyi sha kham tshad du gtubs la/ brngos pa srang brgyad bcwo Da srang brgyad dang zhun mar bzang po srang</text></item>
<item><p>222a.4</p><section></section><text>sum cu rtsa gnyis lhan cig tu skol ba'i nang du/ dri gsum zhes bya ba/ shing tsha dang / gan+d+ha ba tra dang / sug smel rnams dang / 'u su'i 'bras bu dang / na le shaM dang / 'di rnams la srang phyed phyed dang / pi pi ling dang / bca' sga dang / go snyod</text></item>
<item><p>222a.5</p><section></section><text>rnams las srang gnyis gnyis dang / 'di rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma btab ste bsgrangs la/ sbrang rtsi zhun mar gyi phyed dang sbyar te zos na yang khrag lud pa'i nad sel to/ /glo rdol ba dang / glo gcong zad byed kyi nad dang / dbugs mi bde</text></item>
<item><p>222a.6</p><section></section><text>ba'i nad dang / snying stor ldang ba dang / thibs byed ces bya ba dang / rims dang / skom pa'i nad dang / lud pa dang / skyug pa rnams kyang 'joms par byed la/ glo la phan zhing / sha skye ba dang / ro tsa ba dang / nyams stobs bskyed pa dang / sha</text></item>
<item><p>222a.7</p><section></section><text>mdog bzang ba dang / skad snyan par 'gyur ro/ /rgun dang / 'o ma bzhi pa zhes bya ba/ sa la par+Ni dang / phri shaM par+Ni dang / mung+ga par+Ni dang / ma sha par+Ni rnams dang / ba la dang / bca' sga dang / gze ma dang / nye 'u shing gi rtsa ba dang / 'di rnams</text></item>
<item><p>222b.1</p><section></section><text>las gang yang rung ba 'o ma dang bskol te 'thungs na yang khrag nad sel to/ /kha ra dang / e ya ba lu ka dang / rtsa dUrba dang / tsan dan rnam gnyis dang / gla sgang dang / shug pa dang / me tog ut+pa la'i gze ma dang / btsod dang / pu she la tse rnams</text></item>
<item><p>222b.2</p><section></section><text>kyi phye ma cha mnyam ste/ ra'i mar dang / 'o ma mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang / char ba'i chu'i nang du bskol te mar gyi nyi tshe lus pa las btung ba dang / mas btang ba dang / lus bsku ba dang / snar blugs pa gang yang rung ba byas na yang khrag lud pa'i nad</text></item>
<item><p>222b.3</p><section></section><text>sel to/ /bi da ri dang / shing mngar dang / me da rnam gnyis dang / di na ta li'i shing tog dang / bal po se'u dang / nye'u shing dang / ldum bu ka ko la dang / kha lung gi shags ma dang / 'di rnams cha mnyam ste zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma/ mar dang /</text></item>
<item><p>222b.4</p><section></section><text>'o ma mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang chu'i nang du bskol te mar nyi tshe lus pa las ci ran par zos na rims sel cing phyi sa 'gags pa dang / lto sbos pa dang / zug cing na ba 'joms par byed de/ lud pa dang / khrag lud pa'i nad med par byed do/ /sna nas</text></item>
<item><p>222b.5</p><section></section><text>khrag 'byung ba la ni/ dung dang / btsag dang / d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang / shing mngar rnams gang yang rung ba'i phye ma btsags pa bud med kyi nu zho dang sbyar te snar blugs na gcod par 'gyur ro/ /bal po se 'u'i khu ba dang / rtsa dUrba 'i khu ba dang / shing log</text></item>
<item><p>222b.6</p><section></section><text>kog gi tshig gu dang / kun dong gi khu ba 'di rnams las gang yang rung ba snar blugs na yang sna khrag zag pa gcod do/ /khrag lud pa thur du byung ba la ni/ khrag tshad kyi cho ga sngar bshad pa bzhin du bya'o/ /khrag lud pa pho mtshan nas 'byung ba la ni/</text></item>
<item><p>222b.7</p><section></section><text>mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gcin nad kyi cho ga rgyas par 'og nas 'byung ba bzhin du bya'o/ /khrag lud pa bud med kyi mo mtshan las 'byung ba la ni/ 'o ma kha ra sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba blud na phan te zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na btsag yug snam/ shing dzam+bU'i</text></item>
<item><p>223a.1</p><section></section><text>lo ma dang / ut+pa la'i rtsa ba rnams las gang yang rung ba'i phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na yang mo mtshan nas 'byung ba'i khrag 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /yang na sman a nan+da dang /</text></item>
<item><p>223a.2</p><section></section><text>gan+d+ha pri yaM ku dang / tsan dan dang / nA ga ge sar rnams gang yang rung ba'i phye ma chang dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang mo mtshan nas 'byung ba'i khrag 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /yang na mon sran sde'u dmar ru'i rtsa ba'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang / skyer khaN+Da</text></item>
<item><p>223a.3</p><section></section><text>rnams 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba sbyar te dkrugs la 'thungs na yang / mo mtshan nas 'byung ba'i khrag gi rnam grangs thams cad sel bar byed do/ /yang na ldum bu bun sna ba dang / sha lu ka dang / sran chung dang / a lam bu sa</text></item>
<item><p>223a.4</p><section></section><text>rnams las gang yang rung ba btsos pas mo mtshan la dugs byas na yang na ba sel to/ /yang mung+ga par+Ni btags te til mar dang lhan cig btsos pa'i nang du/ srin bal lam/ shing bal smyugs la mo mtshan gyi nang du bzhag na yang khrag gcod</text></item>
<item><p>223a.5</p><section></section><text>cing 'jam la bde bar 'gyur ro/ /spyir na khrag lud pa'i nad yod pa la ni/ chu grang mo'i nang du 'jug pa dang / lud la chu grang mo thugs par sogs pa dge ba yin te/ kha zas kyang sA lu dang / mon sran sde'u la sogs pa dang / ri dgas dang bya'i</text></item>
<item><p>223a.6</p><section></section><text>sha bsil ba'i bag rnams bzang ngo / /khrag rgyas pa'i nad gso ba'i le'u ste bdun pa rdzogs so// //de nas gcong chen po gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /de la gcong chen po'i nad ni/ nad gzhi bzhi las 'byung ste/ de yang</text></item>
<item><p>223a.7</p><section></section><text>brtsal drags pa dang / zad byed kyi nad dang / phyi sa dang / gcin 'gags pa dang / dus su mi za ba dang rgyu 'di bzhi las 'byung ngo / /de'i mtshan ma ni/ skad 'gags pa dang / lud pa dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>223b.1</p><section></section><text>rims dang / klad pa na ba dang / thal gong na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / snying na ba dang / mkhal rked na ba dang / khrag dang / bad kan skyugs pa dang / rnam pa bcu gcig po 'di rnams yin no/ /mtshan ma de dag gis nyam thag par gyur</text></item>
<item><p>223b.2</p><section></section><text>la/ sha brad cing nyams stobs med par gyur pa ni dor bar bya'o/ /de ma yin pa gzhan ni sman dang ldan pa zhig na cho ga smyur te bya'o/ /kha nas rnag 'dra ba dang / bad kan dmar ba dang / sngo skya dang / ljang gu dang / sngon po dang / ser po 'byung la dbugs mi bde</text></item>
<item><p>223b.3</p><section></section><text>ba dang / lud pas dgar te nyam thag pa dang skad 'gags pa ni mi 'tsho'o/ /kha zas phal cher phyi sa dang gcin 'ba' zhig tu gyur la/ sha skam zhing lus zungs zad de/ phyi sa khong na yod pa tsam gyis srog zungs byas pa gang yin pa de la ni khong na yod pa de mi</text></item>
<item><p>223b.4</p><section></section><text>bkru bar rtag tu bsrung bar bya'o/ /nyams stobs yod la gcong chen po na ba la ni/ gso ba'i las skyug sman dang / bkru sman dang / sman snar blugs pa dang / bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang / 'jam rtsi mas btang ba'i las 'di lnga bya'o/ /</text></item>
<item><p>223b.5</p><section></section><text>lus kyi sha zad pa la ni las lnga po 'di dag byas na de dag nyid dug dang 'dra bar 'gyur te byar mi rung ngo / /gcong chen po na ba'i kha zas ni/ 'bras sA lu dang / 'bras zhag drug cu pa smin pa dang / gro dang / nas dang mon sran sde'u la sogs pa dge'o/ /</text></item>
<item><p>223b.6</p><section></section><text>skom du ni chang bzang ngo / /bya nad ni bya dang ri dgas kyi sha nad de dang 'phrad pa'i sha rnams rung ngo / /de'i sman ni pi pi ling dang / rgun dang / kha ra rnams kyi phye ma til mar dang / mar sbrang rtsis sbyar ba'am/ yang na a shwa gan+d+ha dang / pi pi ling dang / kha ra</text></item>
<item><p>223b.7</p><section></section><text>rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang zhun mar dang sbyar ba zos na gcong chen po sel bar byed do/ /yang na bu bran shing dang / rgun dang / pi pi ling dang / a ru ra dang / 'bra go dang / byi tsher rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / bu ram dang / skyu ru ra dang / 'bras yos dang / kru trug tres dang /</text></item>
<item><p>224a.1</p><section></section><text>pi pi ling dang / bca' sga rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / ma nu dang / li zur ba dang / ra mnye ba dang / kha ra dang / byi'u rug pa rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / sman gyi sbyor ba 'di rnams las gang yang rung ba'i phye ma mar dang sbrang</text></item>
<item><p>224a.2</p><section></section><text>rtsi shas bskyed de sbyar ba zos na/ lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba sel cing / skad 'gags pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bal bu'i lo ma dang / na le sham dang / bca' sga dang / pi pi ling rnams yas kyi rim bzhin du dang po cha las re res bskyed pa</text></item>
<item><p>224a.3</p><section></section><text>dang/ shing tsha dang / sug smel dang / bal bu'i tshad kyi phyed phyed dang / kha ra pi pi ling gi brgyad 'gyur dang / 'di rnams btab ste lhan cig tu sbyar ba'i phye ma'i sman gyis ni/ lud pa dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>224a.4</p><section></section><text>mcher pa na ba dang / rims dang / skem pa'i nad dang / pho ba'i me drod chung ba rnams sel zhing snying la phan te/ 'khru ba dang / skran dang / gzhang 'brum dang / skyug pa rnams sel to/ /bca' sga dang / pi pi ling dang / na le sham</text></item>
<item><p>224a.5</p><section></section><text>dang/ nA ga ge sar gyi me tog dang / shing tsha dang / sug smel dang / 'di rnams mas kyi rim bzhin du tha ma'i cha re res bskyed pa dang de rnams bsdams pa'i tshad dang mnyam pa'i kha ra dang / 'di rnams btags te sbyar ba'i phye ma ni lkog ma</text></item>
<item><p>224a.6</p><section></section><text>'gags pa la phan zhing / snying na ba dang / skran dang / gzhang 'brum gyis nyam thag pa rnams sel to/ /shing tsha dang / sug smel dang / pi pi ling dang / smyig rkang dang / kha ra rnams yas kyi rim bzhin du dang po'i cha nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyis</text></item>
<item><p>224a.7</p><section></section><text>bskyed de btags pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang mar sbyar ba'i phye ma ni rtsib logs na ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / lud pa sel zhing yi ga 'bye bar byed do/ /nye'u shing dang / pi da ri dang / a shwa gan+d+ha dang / a ru ra dang / pu rna Na ba</text></item>
<item><p>224b.1</p><section></section><text>dang/ ba la dang / /a ti ba la dang / na ga ba la dang / gze ma rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te zos na zad byed kyi gcong chen po zad par byed do/ /brag zhun dang / sbrang rtsi dang / tsha ba gsum dang / drub mar cang dang lcags kyi phye ma rnams</text></item>
<item><p>224b.2</p><section></section><text>sbyar te zos la/ kha zas su 'bras chan dang / 'o ma ldan par za ba gang yin pa de'i gcong chen po ni myur du 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sbrang rtsi dang / drub mar cang dang / byi dong ga dang / brag zhun dang / lcags kyi phye ma dang / mar dang a ru ra</text></item>
<item><p>224b.3</p><section></section><text>rnams sbyar ba za zhing kha zas mthun zhing 'phrod pa za ba ni gcong chen po mi bzad pa sel bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na gcong chen po'i nad yod pas/ kha ra dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gsar sbyar ba'am/ yang na mar dang / sbrang rtsi cha mi mnyam par</text></item>
<item><p>224b.4</p><section></section><text>sbyar ba zos la/ kha zas su 'bras chan dang / 'o ma dang ldan par zos na sha brta bar 'gyur ro/ /sman nir gun+ti'i rtsa ba dang / lo ma dang bcas par brdungs pa'i khu ba mar de'i bzhi cha dang lhan cig tu skol la/ mar nyi tshe lus pa las ran par 'thungs na/</text></item>
<item><p>224b.5</p><section></section><text>gcong chen po'i nad kyis lus zungs zad par gyur pa las slar nyams stobs bskyed cing brta bar byed de nad do cog kyang sel to/ /ma nu dang / li zur ba dang / rgu na dang / ba la dang / me tog ut+pa la dang / pi pi ling dang / dz+ha ta dang / dzi bin+ta</text></item>
<item><p>224b.6</p><section></section><text>dang / shing mngar dang / bya g+h+ri dang / khyi lce ba dang / byi tsher dang / dug mo nyung gi shun lpags dang / gze ma rnams cha mnyam ste btags pa'i phye ma mar de'i bzhi 'gyur dang / chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang lhan cig tu bskol la mar nyi tshe lus par</text></item>
<item><p>224b.7</p><section></section><text>byas te btsags pa las tshod ran par khu bcud dang sbyar ba'am/ sha khu 'am/ 'o ma skol ba'am/ shing kun la sogs pa skol ba gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na/ gcong chen po'i mtshan ma rnam pa bcu gcig dang ldan pa sel bar 'gyur ro/ /</text></item>
<item><p>225a.1</p><section></section><text>ra'i mar dang ra'i 'o ma dang ra'i zho dang ra'i gcin dang / ra'i ril ma'i khu ba 'di rnams lan tshwa rnam pa lnga dang bskol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa las ran par 'thungs la de'i rjes la/ ra'i 'o ma 'thungs na gcong chen po sel to/ /nas las</text></item>
<item><p>225a.2</p><section></section><text>byas pa'i kha zas zos la ra'i ra bar nyal te ra'i 'o ma 'thung zhing ra'i ril ma dang gcin gyis lus dril ba dang / khrus byas na yang zad byed kyi gcong chen po sel to/ /til mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis/ 'o ma de'i bzhi 'gyur dang / shing</text></item>
<item><p>225a.3</p><section></section><text>mngar gyi phye ma srang gcig dang bskol te 'o ma du nas til mar btsags te dang zhing dri ma med par byas la/ yang 'o ma bzhi 'gyur dang / shing mngar gyi phye ma srang gcig dang bskol te 'o ma du nas til mar btsags la/ 'o ma dang shing mngar gyis snga</text></item>
<item><p>225a.4</p><section></section><text>ma bzhin du bsnan zhing / skol ba de lta bu'i tshul du shin tu bsgrims te lan brgyar skol ba'i til mar gyi btung ba dang / snar blugs pa dang / lus la bsku ba dang mas btang ba rnams byas na/ gcong chen po dang / snying na ba dang / rlung nad</text></item>
<item><p>225a.5</p><section></section><text>dang skya rbab rnams sel cing / nam tshong yan chad kyi nad dang / smyo byed dang / khrag lud pa'i nad dang / me dbal rnams med par byed do/ /bilba la sogs pa rtsa ba lnga pa dang / gla sgang dang / ba la dang / lo ma rnam pa bzhi ste/ sa la par+Ni</text></item>
<item><p>225a.6</p><section></section><text>dang/ sri shan par+Ni dang / mung+ga par+Ni dang / ma sha par+Ni rnams dang / ldum bu rit+thi dang / pi pi ling dang / li zur pa dang / a ru ra dang / dzi ba ka dang / zangs rtsi ba dang / sle tres dang / rgun dang / bun sna ba dang / me da dang / dzi bin+ta dang / ka</text></item>
<item><p>225a.7</p><section></section><text>ka na si ka dang / me tog ut+pa la dang / sug smel dang / dza da dang / bu bran shing dang / bu tsha rto dang / byi tsher dang / tsan dan dang / gyi da ri dang / gze ma dang / bya g+h+ri dang / ma nu rnams las srang re re dang / skyu ru ra 'bru lnga brgya dang / 'di</text></item>
<item><p>225b.1</p><section></section><text>rnams chu phul gang la srang brgyad du brtsis pa de lta bu phul drug cu rtsa bzhi'i nang du bskol te/ chu bzhi cha gcig lus pa btsags la/ khu ba'i nang du/ til mar dang / zhun mar phyed ma srang bcu gnyis dang / kha ra srang lnga bcu blugs te yang bskol la</text></item>
<item><p>225b.2</p><section></section><text>byog tu rung ba tsam du gyur te/ tshos nas phyung la bsgrangs pa'i nang du/ pi pi ling gi phye ma srang gnyis dang / smyig rkang srang bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi srang drug dang / dri sna bzhi zhes bya ba/ shing tsha dang / g+han+d+ha pa tra dang / sug smel dang / nA ga ge sar</text></item>
<item><p>225b.3</p><section></section><text>rnams cha mnyam pa sbyar ba srang gcig dang / 'di rnams sbyar ba'i sman gyi lde gu'i ming ni/ drang srong ts+ya pa na'i sman zhes bya ste/ 'di las ran par zos na/ snying na ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / skom pa'i nad dang / lud pa dang / dreg dang /</text></item>
<item><p>225b.4</p><section></section><text>zad byed kyi gcong chen po rnams kyis nyam thag pa sel cing / yid gzhungs pa dang / skad snyan pa dang / ro tsa bar byed de sman bcud kyis len du 'gyur ro/ /shing ka pit+ta'i 'bras bu dang / byi shal gnyis las srang bco lnga bco lnga dang / skyu ru ra</text></item>
<item><p>225b.5</p><section></section><text>rlon pa srang sum cu rtsa gnyis/ skom na srang bcu drug dang / a ru ra de'i phyed dang / pi pi ling dang / e la ba lu ka dang / seng phrom dang / byi dang ga dang / na le sham rnams las srang gnyis gnyis chu phul drug cu rtsa bzhi'i nang du bskol la/</text></item>
<item><p>225b.6</p><section></section><text>bzhi cha gcig lus pa'i khu ba btsags te bsgrangs pa'i nang du bu ram srang nyis brgya blugs te sbyar ba de 'thungs na/ gzhang 'brum dang / gcong chen po dang / mdze nad sel zhing / skrangs pa dang / skya rbab dang / rims dang / mcher pa na ba dang /</text></item>
<item><p>225b.7</p><section></section><text>snying na ba dang / mkhal rked na ba dang / skran med par byed la/ pho ba'i nad dang / mig ser dang / sha bkra dang / srin bu dang / yi ga 'chus pa rnams sel to/ /gcong chen po'i nad la rims la sogs pa'i nad bla gnyan gzhan zhig byung na/</text></item>
<item><p>226a.1</p><section></section><text>gsor rung ba gang yin pa de dag so so'i gso ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /mdor na skem pa'i nad gcong chen po yod pa la ni lus bkru ba dang / dri ba la sogs pas lus brta zhing / nyams stobs bskyed par bya'o/ /gcong chen po gso</text></item>
<item><p>226a.2</p><section></section><text>ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //skran kha zas kyis nyes pa dang / 'dug nyal la sogs pa gnas pa'i nyes pa las rlung la sogs pa shin tu 'khrugs nas/ khong pa'i nang du skran phur ma lta bur 'dug pa rnam pa lngar 'gyur te/ lnga po de dag</text></item>
<item><p>226a.3</p><section></section><text>gi gnas ni/ glo g.yas g.yon dang / snying ga dang chu so rnams yin no/ /gzhan gang de'i mtshan ma dang / gso ba'i thabs dang bcas pa yang bstan par bya ste/ de la skran no cog ni yi ga 'chus pa dang / phyi sa dang / gcin sri ba dang / rlung gi shas che</text></item>
<item><p>226a.4</p><section></section><text>ba dang / rgyu ma 'khrug pa dang / lto sbo ba dang / sgregs pa mang du 'ong ba'i mtshan ma rnams kyis rtogs par bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i skran gyi mtshan ma ni/ zug cing gzer ba dang / lto sbo ba dang / phyi sa dang gcin 'gags pa dang / skran</text></item>
<item><p>226a.5</p><section></section><text>nyid 'phar ba dang / gnas 'pho ba dang / che chung du 'gyur ba dang / ltag pa dang / mgo bo dang / za 'gram du zug pa dang / ru shing na ba rnams yin par bstan to/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skran gyi mtshan ma ni/ lus tsha ba dang / skom dad che</text></item>
<item><p>226a.6</p><section></section><text>ba dang / mgo 'khor ba dang / rngul 'byung ba dang / sgregs pa skyur ba dang / khar kha ba bro ba dang / skran nyid reg tu mi bzod pa rnams yin par bstan to/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i skran gyi mtshan ma ni/ mchil ma mang ba dang / yi ga</text></item>
<item><p>226a.7</p><section></section><text>'chus pa dang / brang tsha zhing kha nas chu 'byung ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / lud pa dang / kha zas 'jur mi btub pa dang / skran nyid sra zhing phyir rlo ba dang skyugs pa rnams yin no/ /'dus pa las gyur pa'i skran gyi mtshan ma ni/ skran nyid mi bzad</text></item>
<item><p>226b.1</p><section></section><text>par na zhing tsha 'ur 'ur por 'dug pa dang / rdo bzhin du sra zhing phyir rlo ba dang / sems dang / lus dang / me'i drod nyams par byed pa rnams yin te/ gsor mi rung ngo / /bud med kyi khrag skran ni/ mngal rlug pa dang / bu byung ba dang / zla mtshan</text></item>
<item><p>226b.2</p><section></section><text>'dzags pa las 'gyur te/ skran nyid na zhing tsha ba 'ur 'ur por 'dug pa sbrum ma dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /de la skran gyis nyam thag ste/ rul sbal bzhin du phyi rol tu rlo zhing rtsa mngon la nad mang po bla gnyan gzhan gyis kyang thegs shing / snying ga dang / lte</text></item>
<item><p>226b.3</p><section></section><text>ba'i phyogs dang / rkang lag skrangs te mi bzod par gyur pa ni spang bar bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i skran la ni/ thog mar sman mar blud do/ /de'i 'og tu phye ma'i sman dang / lus snum gyis bsku ba dang / dug dang / bkru sman drag po mas</text></item>
<item><p>226b.4</p><section></section><text>btang ba dang / 'jam rtsi mas btang ba rnams kyis gso bar bya'o/ /de la sman mar ni byi dang ga dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / tsha ba gsum dang / dbyi mo'i lo ma dang / 'u su'i 'bras bu dang / kru trug tres rnams kyi mar dang / 'o ma dang / chu'i</text></item>
<item><p>226b.5</p><section></section><text>nang du bskol la mar nyi tshe la lus pa las ran par 'thungs na rlung las gyur pa'i skran sel to/ /kha ru tsha dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang / shu dag dang / pu tse shel dang / a ru ra dang / kru trug tres dang / byi dang ga dang / tsha ba gsum po</text></item>
<item><p>226b.6</p><section></section><text>rnams kyi phye ma zho gnyis gnyis/ mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'o ma de dang mnyam pa dang / chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa las ran par 'thungs na yang / rlung las gyur pa'i skran na ba dang / bcan du sel cing</text></item>
<item><p>226b.7</p><section></section><text>skyigs bu dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / srin bu dang / mcher pa'i nad dang lud pa rnams sel to/ /bca' sga dang / dbyi mong dang / kru trug tres dang / pi pi ling dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang / rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma srang re re/</text></item>
<item><p>227a.1</p><section></section><text>sman tsi ri dang / bilba skol ba'i khu ba dang / mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi nang du bskol te mar nyi tshe lus par byas pa ni skran dang / rtug skam dang / skya rbab dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / pho ba'i nad dang lud pa rnams</text></item>
<item><p>227a.2</p><section></section><text>sil cing / rims dang / cham pa drag po dang / mcher pa'i nad dang / gzhang 'brum rnams zhi bar byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /shing kun dang / star bu dang / tsha ba gsum dang / bye'u rug pa dang / sug smel dang / shu dag dang / rtsabs ru</text></item>
<item><p>227a.3</p><section></section><text>tsha dang / kha ru tsha dang / 'u su'i 'bras bu dang / go snyod dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang / bal po'i se'u dang / ma nu dang / a dza g+han+d+ha dang / li zur pa dang / kru trug tres dang / la la phud rnams kyi phye ma mar dang / zho mar dang bzhi</text></item>
<item><p>227a.4</p><section></section><text>'gyur gyi nang du bskol te/ mar nyi tshe lus par byas pa ni rlung las gyur pa'i skran dang / zug cing na ba dang / lto sbo ba'i nad rnams sel to/ /spa ma'i 'bras bu dang / sug smel dang / kru trug tres dang / tsha ba gsum dang / dbyi mong dang /</text></item>
<item><p>227a.5</p><section></section><text>la la phud dang / rgyam tsha dang / go snyod dang / pi pi ling gi rtsa ba rnams kyi phye ma/ rgya shug gi 'bras bu dang / la phug lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba skyur por gyur pa/ zho dang mar 'o mar ldan pa'i nang du bskol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pas skran dang zug cing</text></item>
<item><p>227a.6</p><section></section><text>na ba dang / phyis 'gags pa sel cing / mngal gyi nyes pa dang / zas 'jur mi btub pa dang / gzhang 'brum dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / snying na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba rnams med par byed do/ /mar dang sbyor ba'i sman bstan pa 'di dag nyid</text></item>
<item><p>227a.7</p><section></section><text>zhib tu btags te chu skol ba dang / zho kha chu dang / chang dang / rtsabs skyur po dang / tsha rnams las gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang / skran dang / zug cing na ba la sogs pa sel bar byed do/ /shing kun dang / shu dag dang / rtsabs ru</text></item>
<item><p>227b.1</p><section></section><text>tsha dang / bca' sga dang / la la phud dang / a ru ra dang / kru trug tres dang / ru rta rnams yas kyi rim bzhin du/ dang po'i cha res bskyed de btags pa'i phye ma chang la sogs pa gong du smos pa gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na/ skran dang /</text></item>
<item><p>227b.2</p><section></section><text>lto sbo ba dang / dmu rdzings sel te/ zug cing na ba dang / gzhang 'brum dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / lud pa 'joms par byed la/ pho ba'i drod bskyed par bshad do/ /shing kun dang / kha lud dang / star bu dang / bal po'i se 'u dang / rgyam</text></item>
<item><p>227b.3</p><section></section><text>tsha dang / rtsabs ru tsha rnams kyi phye ma chang bzang po dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang rlung las gyur pa'i skran sel to/ /rtsabs ru tsha dang / kha ru tsha dang / star bu dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang / shing kun rnams kyi phye ma zho kha chu la sogs pa gang yang</text></item>
<item><p>227b.4</p><section></section><text>rung ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na/ skran dang / zug cing na ba dang / phyi sa 'gags pas nyam thag pa bde bar byed do/ /byi dang ga dang / bri ha tI dang / dan+ta 'i rtsa ba dang / snu ha k+Shi ra dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma zho gnyis gnyis</text></item>
<item><p>227b.5</p><section></section><text>mar srang brgyad dang / chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol la/ mar nyi tshe lus pa las nyin re srang phyed phyed sha khu dang sbyar te 'thungs nas thur du bkrus pas/ kha zas sha dang ldan par zos na/ skran dang / rtug skam dang / mdze dang / gzhang 'brum</text></item>
<item><p>227b.6</p><section></section><text>dang/ me'i drod nyams pa dang / dmu rdzings rnams med par 'gyur ro/ /shing nye rong dang / snum ha k+Shi ra dang / skyu ru ra dang / ba la ka dang / kam bi l+ya ka rnams las srang re re dang / rgyam tsha srang phyed dang / 'di rnams kyi phye ma mar srang brgyad</text></item>
<item><p>227b.7</p><section></section><text>dang/ chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa'i ming ni d+hi bin+du'i mar zhes bya ste/ 'di las nyin re zhing zho gnyis gnyis 'thungs la/ chu skol ba dron pos phul te thur du bkrus na skran no cog dang dmu rdzings thams cad 'joms par</text></item>
