<item><p>228a.1</p><section></section><text>byed do/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skran yod pa la ni/ thog mar bu tshang rto la sogs pa'i sman mar dang / ma hA tik+ta zhes bya ba'i sman mar dang / ba sha ka la sogs pa'i sman mar rnams las gang yang rung ba btang ste/</text></item>
<item><p>228a.2</p><section></section><text>lto 'jam por byas pa'i rjes la bkru sman btang nas de'i 'og tu bcud mas gtang bar bya'o/ /n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang / ut+pal la sogs pa'i sde tshan sngar bshad pa rnams las gang yang rung ba skol ba'i khu ba dang / mar gyi nang du sman 'tsho</text></item>
<item><p>228a.3</p><section></section><text>byed ces bya ba sna bcu sngar bstan pa rnams kyi phye ma btab ste bskol la mar nyi tshe lus pa las ran par 'thungs na mkhris pa las gyur pa'i khrag lud pa'i skran sel to/ /a ru ra'i phye ma mar a ru ra'i bzhi 'gyur dang / skyu ru ra skol ba'i khu ba mar gyi bzhi 'gyur</text></item>
<item><p>228a.4</p><section></section><text>gyi nang du btab ste bskol la mar nyi tshe lus pa las ran par 'thungs na yang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skran myur du sel to/ /yang na mkhris pa'i skran yod pa la ni 'bras bu gsum skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du shing nye rong gi phye ma btab pa blud dam/</text></item>
<item><p>228a.5</p><section></section><text>yang na kha ra dang / kam byi la'i sbrang rtsis sbyar ba btab ste thur du bkru bar bya'o/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i sman ni dugs dang / bcing ba'i dugs dang / sman mar btung ba dang / bkru sman rnon po dang / 'jam rtsi mas btang ba rnon po dang / bkru sman drag po mas btang</text></item>
<item><p>228a.6</p><section></section><text>ba rnon po dang / sngar rlung skran gyi cho gar bstan pa rnams kyis kyang gso bar bya'o/ /drod bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i sman bca' sga dang / pi pi ling dang / pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang / kru trug tres dang / dbyi mong dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba rnams kyi</text></item>
<item><p>228a.7</p><section></section><text>phye ma srang re re mar dang 'o ma srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang / chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa'i ming ni srang drug pa'i mar zhes bya ste/ 'di las ran par 'thungs na yang bad kan las gyur pa'i skran sel to/ /pho ba'i nad</text></item>
<item><p>228b.1</p><section></section><text>dang/ skya rbab kyi nad dang / mcher pa'i dang / lud pa dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / rims 'joms shing skrangs pa dang / rtug skam med par byed do/ /dong ka la sogs pa'i sde tshan skol ba'i khu ba dang / mar gyi nang du drod bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i sman</text></item>
<item><p>228b.2</p><section></section><text>rnam pa drug po gong du smos pa rnams btags pa'i phye ma mar nyi tshe lus pa'am/ yang na pi pi ling la sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i mar sngar bshad pa las ran par 'thungs na yang bad kan las gyur pa'i skran sel to/ /kha ru tsha dang / kru trug tres dang / shing</text></item>
<item><p>228b.3</p><section></section><text>kun rnams kyi phye ma/ dar ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang me'i drod bskyed do/ /rtsabs ru tsha dang la la phud kyi phye ma dar ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang bad kan dang rlung dang 'phrod/ bud med kyi mngal gyi khrag las skran du gyur pa zla ba bcu 'das na bu ma yin</text></item>
<item><p>228b.4</p><section></section><text>te skran yin par gyur na/ sman mar blud pa dang dugs byas pas lto 'jam por byas pa'i 'og tu snum pa'i cho ga bya ste bkru sman btang ngo / /shu ti dang / tsi ri bil ba'i shun lpags dang / thang shing dang / brgi dang / pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma til</text></item>
<item><p>228b.5</p><section></section><text>mar skol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang mngal gyi khrag las gyur pa'i skran sel to/ /til skol ba'i nang du/ bu ram dang / tsha ba gsum dang / zhun mar dang / brgi rnams kyi phye ma btab ste 'thungs na yang khrag gi skran sel to/ /bud</text></item>
<item><p>228b.6</p><section></section><text>med zla mtshan mi 'byung ba la ni/ skyu ru ra skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du shing king+shu ka'i thal ba blugs la bskol te yang blud do/ /yang na nas tshig 'khus pa'i khu ba dang / tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma chang dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang khrag gi skran sel to/ /</text></item>
<item><p>228b.7</p><section></section><text>khrag gi skran khong du gram ste mngal gyi khrag drag tu 'byung zhing mi chod pa la ni/ khrag lud pa'i cho ga sngar bstan pa dang / rlung nad sel ba'i cho ga sngar bstan pa rnams kyis bcad cing na ba yang zhi bar bya'o/ /rlung la sogs pa las gyur pa'i nad 'byang du mi btub pa</text></item>
<item><p>229a.1</p><section></section><text>la ni/ sman pa sngon byed pa mthong zhing goms pas lag pa'i rtsa gtar zhing / bad kan dang rlung las gyur pa'i skran la me btsa' gdab par bya'o/ /skran can la ni mdor na/ kha zas lci ba dang / bad kan skye bar 'gyur ba'i bag spang</text></item>
<item><p>229a.2</p><section></section><text>zhing/ me'i drod dang / nyams stobs rtag tu bsrung bar bya ste/ kha zas dang btung ba rnams tshabs che chung las dpag cing bza' bar bya'o/ /skran gso ba'i le'u ste dgu pa rdzogs so// //de nas dmu rdzings gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /dmu</text></item>
<item><p>229a.3</p><section></section><text>rdzings ni me'i drod chung ba dang / kha zas mi 'phrod pa zos pas nad gzhi 'khrugs nas/ lus rngul ba dang / chu grang mo 'thungs te rtsa dang 'dzag sgo rnams 'gags pa las/ dmu rdzings kyi nad ma rungs pa rnam pa brgyad skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de la rlung las</text></item>
<item><p>229a.4</p><section></section><text>gyur pa'i dmu rdzings kyi mtshan ma ni/ ltor zug cing na ba dang / rdol la thug pa ltar na ba dang / sgra 'byung ba dang / rkang lag dang rlig pa skrangs pa dang / gnyer ma nag po 'byung zhing rtsa mngon par 'byung ba rnams yin par bshad do/ /mkhris pa las gyur</text></item>
<item><p>229a.5</p><section></section><text>pa'i dmu rdzings kyi mtshan ma ni/ lto sha reg na 'jam pa dang / rims kyis 'debs pa dang / rngul 'byung ba dang / skom dad che ba dang / lus tsha ba dang / mgo 'khor ba dang / rtsa sngon po dang / ser pos g.yogs par 'dug pa rnams yin par bshad</text></item>
<item><p>229a.6</p><section></section><text>do/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i dmu rdzings kyi mtshan ma ni/ mchil ma mang ba dang / lus lci ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / gnyid che ba dang / skrangs pa dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / rims kyis 'debs pa dang / 'byang dka' ba dang / lto 'khrang</text></item>
<item><p>229a.7</p><section></section><text>ba dang / pags pa stug pa dang / rtsa mdog dkar pos g.yogs pa rnams yin par shes par bya'o/ /'dus pa las gyur pa'i dmu rdzings ni/ bud med kyi dbang du bya ba'i phyir skra dang sen mo la sogs pa byi ste zos pa dang / 'bebs par byed pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>229b.1</p><section></section><text>lus ma rung bar byed pa'i dug las kyang 'byung ste/ mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /dmu rdzings glo g.yas phyogs su 'byung ba la ni/ mchin pa'i dmu rdzings zhes bya'o/ /g.yon phyogs su 'byung ba ni mcher pa'i dmu rdzings</text></item>
<item><p>229b.2</p><section></section><text>zhes bya ste/ 'di gnyis ka yang bad kan dang khrag 'khrugs pa las 'byung ste/ mkhris pa dang bad kan gnyis 'dus pa las gyur pa yin no/ /kha zas bya sgro dang spu 'dres pa zos te/ rgyu ma 'gags te phyi sa mi 'byung ba las gyur pa'i dmu rdzings/</text></item>
<item><p>229b.3</p><section></section><text>snying ga dang lte ba'i bar gyi nang du dmu rdzings skye ba ni 'byung dka' ba yin te gzhang 'gags pa'i dmu rdzings zhes bya'o/ /kha zas zag rngu dang bcas pa zos na rgyu ma nang nas brtol te/ kha zas kyi khu ba phyir zags pa las nang du gyur te/ lte ba'i 'og tu zug</text></item>
<item><p>229b.4</p><section></section><text>cing na ba byung ba'i ming ni rgyu ma rdol ba'i dmu rdzings zhes bya ste/ de'i mtshan ma ni chu sor zug pa'i mtshan ma la sogs pa sngar bshad pa dang 'dra'o/ /chu'i dmu rdzings zhes bya ba ni/ snum bag 'thungs sam/ skyug sman nam bkru sman btang ba'i rjes</text></item>
<item><p>229b.5</p><section></section><text>la/ chu grang mo 'thungs pa las nad du gyur na/ lto ba'i phyogs su zlum zhing cher gyur te/ mdog snum la lto rkyal ba gang ba bzhin du gyur pa yin no/ /dmu rdzings rnam pa brgyad po 'di rnams kyi nang du rgyu ma brdol ba'i dmu rdzings dang / gzhang 'gags</text></item>
<item><p>229b.6</p><section></section><text>pa'i dmu rdzings gnyis ni gsor mi rung ngo / /lhag ma gzhan ni gso dka' bar bshad de/ de dag las kyang chu'i dmu rdzings su gyur pa ni spang bar bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i dmu rdzings la ni sman s+thi ra la sogs pa'i sde tshan btags pa'i phye ma</text></item>
<item><p>229b.7</p><section></section><text>dang/ skol ba'i sman mar blud pa dang / dugs bya ba dang / snum bag gi bkru sman btang la lto zhi bar gyur nas/ lto phyir mi skye bar ras kyis bcing ba dang / nad de dang 'phrod pa'i sman sbyar bas lto bskus pa'i steng nas/ pags pa drod che zhing spu</text></item>
<item><p>230a.1</p><section></section><text>'jam la ma rul ba la lig to byas pa 'am/ de med na dar srin bal can gyi lig to 'am/ lug lpags kyis bcings pa'i dugs byas la/ kru trug tres kyi phye ma dang / til mar lhan cig skol ba'i 'jam rtsi</text></item>
<item><p>230a.2</p><section></section><text>mas btang ba dang / sman s+thi ra la sogs pa'i sde tshan skol ba'i khu ba dang / sbyar ba'i bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang / kha zas 'o ma dang / khu bcud dang sha khu gang yang rung ba dang ldan par bza' ba rnams rim bzhin du bya'o/ /mkhris</text></item>
<item><p>230a.3</p><section></section><text>pa las gyur pa'i dmu rdzings la ni/ thog mar 'jam rtsi sman ro mngar ba'i phye ma dang mar skol ba 'thungs la/ de'i 'og tu shing nye rong dang / 'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma mar gyi nang du skol ba'i bkru sman btang ngo / /yang na shing n+ya gro d+ha la sogs</text></item>
<item><p>230a.4</p><section></section><text>pa'i sde tshan skol ba'i khu ba mar dang skol la mar nyi tshe lus pa sbrang rtsi dang kha ra dang sbyar bas bkru sman drag po mas gtang bar bya ste/ de yang sngar 'jam rtsi mas btang ba dang ldan par bya'o/ /'jam rtsi mas btang ba ni/ n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa'i sde tshan</text></item>
<item><p>230a.5</p><section></section><text>skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du sman gyi sde tshan de nyid kyi phye ma dang / til mar dang lhan cig tu bskol te/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa btang ngo / /de nas 'bras kyi 'o thug bska bas bcing ba'i dugs bya ste/ kha zas kyang sman s+thi ra la sogs pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>230a.6</p><section></section><text>sde tshan skol ba'i khu ba 'o ma dang bskol la 'o ma nyi tshe lus pa dang ldan par bza'o/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i dmu rdzings la ni thog mar 'jam rtsi pi pi ling la sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i sman mar sngar bshad pa btang nas dugs byas pa'i 'og tu/ shing</text></item>
<item><p>230a.7</p><section></section><text>snu ha ga shi ri dang / skol ba'i mar gyi bkru sman btang ngo / /de nas sman mu ska ka la sogs pa'i sde tshan skol ba'i khu ba til mar dang / ba gcin dang / tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma rnams dang sbyar ba'i bkru sman drag po mas gtang bar bya zhing / 'jam rtsi mas btang ba'i cho ga yang bya ste/ 'jam rtsi</text></item>
<item><p>230b.1</p><section></section><text>mas btang ba'i cho ga yang bya ste/ 'jam rtsims gtang ba ni sman gyi sde tshan gong ma nyid skol ba'i khu ba dang / til mar dang / tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma lhan cig tu bskol te til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa btang ngo / /de nas phabs dang / la phug gi sa</text></item>
<item><p>230b.2</p><section></section><text>bon dang / yungs kar rnams sbyar re bas bcing ba'i dugs bya'o/ /kha zas ni rgya sran gyi khu bcud dam 'o ma tsha ba gsum dang ldan pas dpag cing bza'o/ /'dus pa las gyur pa'i dmu rdzings la ni/ rlung las gyur pa'i dmu rdzings la sogs gong du smos pa rnams</text></item>
<item><p>230b.3</p><section></section><text>kyi cho ga sngar bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang sbyar bar bya'o/ /yang na 'di la ni/ bog dang / shaM ki ni'i phye ma dang mar lhan cig tu skol ba'i bkru sman yang btang ngo / /mcher ba'i dmu rdzings can la yang / 'jam rtsi dang / dugs dang / /bkru sman la sogs</text></item>
<item><p>230b.4</p><section></section><text>pa'i cho ga byas la/ lag pa g.yon pa'i gru mo'i nang gi rtsa yang gtar bar bya'o/ /byi dang ga dang / kru trug tres dang / rgyam tsha dang / phye dang / shu dag rnams cha ma chom du brdungs la mar gyis bskus te/ snod kha sbyar gyi nang du bsnos nas/ zhib tu btags</text></item>
<item><p>230b.5</p><section></section><text>la 'o ma dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang skran dang mcher pa'i dmu rdzings sel to/ /yang na le sham dkar po skol ba'i khu ba/ rgyam tsha dang / kru trug tres dang / pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na na le sham dkar po skol ba'i khu ba shing</text></item>
<item><p>230b.6</p><section></section><text>ba la sha'i thal ba dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang sbyar te blud do/ /ro hi ta ka dang / a ru ra'i phye ma ba gcin nam/ chu'i nang du spangs te/ 'thungs na yang dmu rdzings thams cad dang / mcher pa'i nad dang / gcin snyi ba'i nad dang / gzhang</text></item>
<item><p>230b.7</p><section></section><text>'brum dang / srin bu dang / skran sel to/ /yang na rgyam tsha 'am nya lcibs bsregs pa'i thal ba 'o ma dang sbyar te tshod ran par btung bar bya'o/ /yang na 'cher pa'i dmu rdzings la/ pi pi ling gi phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar te blud do/ /mtsher pa'i dmu rdzings</text></item>
<item><p>231a.1</p><section></section><text>gso ba'i cho gar bstan pa de thams cad ni mchin pa'i dmu rdzings la yang gtang bar bya'o/ /yang na mchin pa'i dmu rdzings la ni/ lag pa g.yas pa'i gru mo'i nang gi rtsa gtar bar bya'o/ /dmu rdzings rnams la ni phyi sa la sogs</text></item>
<item><p>231a.2</p><section></section><text>pa lto'i dri ma shas che bas ni/ bkru sman lan mang du bya bar bstan to/ /de nas de'i 'og tu dmu rdzings kyi spyi'i cho ga zhes pa yang bstan par bya ste/ dmu rdzings la ni e raN+Ta'i mar 'o ma dang ba gcin gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te lan mang du btung bar bya'o/ /</text></item>
<item><p>231a.3</p><section></section><text>yang na til mar shing kun dang / swa rtsi ka'i thal ba dang sbyar ba 'am/ sman dz+yo ti ka'i phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba blud do/ /mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'o ma mar gyi brgyad 'gyur gyi nang du/ snu ha k+Shi ri srang gcig dang / shing nye rong gi phye ma srang drug</text></item>

<item><p>231a.5</p><section></section><text>shel dang / shing nye rod dang / rgyam tsha dang / pi pi ling gi phye ma ba gcin dang / chu skol ba dron mo dang / sha khu rnams las gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang skran dang / dmu rdzings dang / mtsher pa'i nad dang / mdze dang / gzhang 'brum dang /</text></item>
<item><p>231a.6</p><section></section><text>khrag tshad dang / skrangs pa 'or thabs rnams kyis nyam thag pa thams cad sel to/ /sman big sha la dang / shing khi ni dang / dan+da'i rtsa ba dang / shing nye rong dang / shing dong dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / yung dang / byi dang ga dang / kaM bi l+ye ka</text></item>
<item><p>231a.7</p><section></section><text>rnams kyi phye ma/ ba gcin dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang dmu rdzings sel to/ /zhag bdun gyi bar du kha zas dang skom gzhan mi bza' mi btung bar/ ma he'i gcin dang 'o ma sbyar ba 'ba' zhig btung ngam/ yang na zla ba gcig gi bar du kha zas dang skom</text></item>
<item><p>231b.1</p><section></section><text>gzhan mi bza' mi btung bar/ rnga mo'i 'o ma 'ba' zhig 'thungs na yang skrangs pa 'or thabs su skrangs pa dang dmu rdzings sel to/ /yang na dmu rdzings can la pi pi ling gi phye ma shing snu ha'i 'o ma zags pa'i nang du spangs pa las ci ran par btung</text></item>
<item><p>231b.2</p><section></section><text>ngo / /yang na dmu rdzings zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ dbyi mong dang / dan+da'i rtsa ba dang / kru trug tres dang / byi dang ga dang / tsha ba gsum rnams kyi phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na thang shing dang / kru trug tres kyi phye ma 'o ma dang / sga skol ba'i khu ba</text></item>
<item><p>231b.3</p><section></section><text>gnyis las gang yang rung ba dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na dbyi mong dang / bca' sga'i phye ma 'o ma dang sga skol ba'i khu ba gnyis las gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o/ /nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang / swa rtsi ka'i thal ba dang / kru trug tres</text></item>
<item><p>231b.4</p><section></section><text>dang/ tsha ba gsum dang / shi dong dang / lan tshwa rnam lnga rnams kyi phye ma mar khu dang sbyar te 'thungs na/ skran dang dmu rdzings thams cad sel to/ /dmu rdzings so cog bsal ba'i phyir/ sman byi sha la dang / shing ki ni dang / dan+da'i rtsa ba dang / shi dong dang /</text></item>

<item><p>231b.6</p><section></section><text>ba'i dmu rdzings dang / chu'i dmu rdzings dang / gzhang 'gags pa'i dmu rdzings 'di gsum la ni/ sman pa cho ga shes pas so shi rdo bar dam bcas la lta dbug pa dang dral ba'i cho ga yang bya'o/ /dmu rdzings rnams kyis nyam thag pa'i kha zas su ni/ /</text></item>
<item><p>231b.7</p><section></section><text>'bras sA lu rnams dang / nas dang / mon sran sde'u dang / 'o ma dang / srog chags rnams skam sa na gnas pa'i sha khu rnams nyams stobs las dpags te dal zhing btung bar bya'o/ /dmu rdzings can la ni chu btung ba dang nyin par gnyid log pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>232a.1</p><section></section><text>kha zas lci ba dang / bad kan bskyed pa'i bag dang drag shul gyi bag mi bya'o/ /bzhon pa la zhon pa rnams yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /dmu rdzings gso ba'i le'u ste bcu pa rdzogs so// //de nas gcin snyi</text></item>
<item><p>232a.2</p><section></section><text>ba'i nad gso ba bshad par bya ste/ kha zas mi 'phrod pa zos pa dang / 'dug nyal la sogs pa gnas pa'i nyes pa las/ gcin snyi ba'i nad rnam pa nyi shu 'byung bar bshad de/ de yang gcin snyi ba'i nad du gyur</text></item>
<item><p>232a.3</p><section></section><text>gcin snyi pa'i nad yin no zhes drang srong thub pa rnams kyis gsungs so/ /gcin snyi ba'i nad des thog mar 'debs pa'i mtshan ma ni/ so la sogs pa shin tu dri ma che bar 'gyur ba dang / rkang lag tsha ba dang / lus kyi</text></item>
<item><p>232a.4</p><section></section><text>mdog dmar por gyur pa dang / skom dad che ba dang / khar mngar ba bro ba rnams yin no/ /de la bad kan las gyur pa'i gcin snyi ba'i nad kyi ming ni/ chu 'dra ba zhes bya ba dang bu ram shing gi khu ba dang 'dra ba dang / chang 'dra ba dang / 'bras</text></item>
<item><p>232a.5</p><section></section><text>phye 'dra ba dang / phye ma 'dra ba dang bska ba dang / 'bred ba dang / lan tshwa 'dra ba dang / dbu ba 'dra ba dang / khu chu 'dra ba zhes bya ba dang rnam pa bcu'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gcin snyi ba'i nad kyi ming ni ljang ser zhes bya ba dang / sngon po dang / btsod</text></item>
<item><p>232a.6</p><section></section><text>kha dang / thal kha dang / khrag 'dra ba dang / skyur ba tshos pa zhes bya ba dang rnam pa drug go/ /rlung las gyur pa'i gcin snyi ba'i nad kyi ming ni/ mar khu dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba dang / sbrang rtsi 'dra ba dang / glang po che'i gcin 'dra ba dang / zhag 'dra ba zhes</text></item>
<item><p>232a.7</p><section></section><text>bya ba dang rnam pa bzhi'o/ /gcin snyi ba'i nad 'di dag thams cad kyi mtshan ma ni/ so so'i ming du smos pa'i don bzhin du lta'o/ /de la bad kan las gyur pa rnams ni gso sla bar bshad do/ /rlung las gyur pa rnams ni/ gsor mi rung bar mthong ngo / /</text></item>
<item><p>232b.1</p><section></section><text>mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams ni/ kha zas dang / sman gyis gso tsam du 'jog nus so/ /de las bad kan las gyur pa'i gcin snyi ba'i nad yod pa la ni/ sman la la phud dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / sle tres dang / a ru ra rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / ba tha dang /</text></item>

<item><p>232b.3</p><section></section><text>dang/ la la phud rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / a ka ru dang / ru rta dang / thang shing rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / kat+pa la dang / gla sgang dang / pa tha dang / ti ri ta dang / a ru ra rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / aM pa sh+tha</text></item>

<item><p>232b.7</p><section></section><text>seng phrom dang / ardzu na dang / tsan dan dkar po rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / sman gyi sbyor ba lnga po 'di rnams las gang yang rung ba skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs la sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te blud do/ /gcin snyi ba'i nad la/ rlung gtso bor gyur la/ bad kan</text></item>
<item><p>233a.1</p><section></section><text>dang/ mkhris pa gnyis las/ gcig grogs su gyur na/ gang grogs su gyur pa rtogs par bya ste/ bad kan grogs su gyur pa la ni de dang 'phrad pa'i sman ro tsha zhing drod che ba'i mthu dang ldan pa rnams kyi phye ma til mar</text></item>
<item><p>233a.2</p><section></section><text>dang / sman gyi khu ba til mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol te/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa las ci ran par blud do/ /mkhris pa grogs su gyur pa la ni/ de dang 'phrod pa'i sman ro mngar zhing bsil ba'i mthu dang ldan pa rnams kyi phye ma/ mar dang / sman gyi khu ba mar</text></item>
<item><p>233a.3</p><section></section><text>gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol te mar nyi tshe lus pa ci ran par blud do/ /sle tres rlon pa'i khu ba btsir ba 'am/ skam po skol ba'i bsgrangs pa la sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang gcin snyi ba'i nad thams cad sel to/ /skyu ru ra rlon pa btsir pa'i khu</text></item>

<item><p>233a.6</p><section></section><text>te 'thungs na yang gcin snyi ba'i nad thams cad sel ba'i mchog yin no/ /yang na 'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/ brag zhun sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/ lcags kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/ a ru ra'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/ /sman</text></item>
<item><p>233a.7</p><section></section><text>gyi lde gu gcin snyi ba'i nad bzlog pa'i phyir bza' bar bya'o/ /seng phrom dang / sug smel dang / kru trug tres dang / dan+da'i rtsa ba dang / pa tha dang / gan+d+ha pa tra dang / shing tsha dang / nA ga ge sar dang / gla ba dang / ma nu dang / tsha ba gsum dang / rtsa mkhris dang /</text></item>
<item><p>233b.1</p><section></section><text>thang shing / dug mo nyung dang / bi shal dang / bong nga dkar po dang / brgi dang / ru rta dang / mu rwa dang / gan+d+ha pri yaM ku dang / byi dang ga dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / pu tse shel dang / dbyi mong dang / pi pi ling dang / rtsa ba dang/ la la phud rnams kyi phye ma</text></item>
<item><p>233b.2</p><section></section><text>zho gnyis gnyis chu phul gang la srang brgyad du brtsis pa phul drug cu rtsa bzhi'i nang du bskol te/ chu bzhi cha gcig lus nas bsgrangs te btsags la/ sbrang rtsi sman gyi khu ba gdus pa de'i phye dang sbyar nas/ bum pa mar snod du byas pa'i nang du blugs te kha bcad la</text></item>
<item><p>233b.3</p><section></section><text>zla ba phyed kyi bar du nas kyi nang du bzhag pa'i sbrang chang 'di las nyin re bzhin srang gnyis gnyis 'thungs na yang gcin snyi ba'i nad sel zhing / pho ba'i nad dang / skya rbab kyi nad dang / gzhang 'brum dang / mdze dang / yi ga 'chus pa rnams 'joms</text></item>
<item><p>233b.4</p><section></section><text>par byed do/ /gcin snyi ba'i nad yod pa'i kha zas ni/ tshod ma kha ba'i bag dang / skam sa na gnas pa'i ri dwags sha bkra'i sha dang / bya sha dang / nas las byas pa'i kha zas dang / mon sran sde'u dang / 'bras sA lu dang / zhag drug cu smin pa rnams dge'o/ /</text></item>
<item><p>233b.5</p><section></section><text>skom du ni bu ram dang / rgun chang dang / seng ldeng gi snying po la sogs pa skol ba'i khu ba dang / sbrang chang dang / rtswa ku sha skol ba'i khu ba dang / 'bras bu gsum skol ba'i khu ba rnams gcin snyi ba'i nad la bsngags pa yin no/ /gcin snyi ba'i nad kyi rkyen gyis</text></item>
<item><p>233b.6</p><section></section><text>phol mig rnams mang po 'byung ste/ thog ma 'byung ba'i tshe ni rtsa nas khrag dbyung bar bya'o/ /phol mig smin pa ni brtol la rma gso ba'i cho ga bzhin du bya'o/ /gcin snyi ba'i nad gso ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa rdzogs so// //sman dpyad gces pa</text></item>
<item><p>233b.7</p><section></section><text>grub pa zhes bya ba bam po bzhi pa'o/ /de nas mdze nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /mdze nad ni sdig can dang / kha zas ngan pa zos te nad gzhi gsum 'khrugs nas/ pags pa dang / sha dang / khrag dang / chu ser rnams ma rung bar gyur pa la mdze nad</text></item>
<item><p>234a.1</p><section></section><text>rnam pa bco brgyad du 'gyur te/ mdze nad u dum+bA ra zhes bya ba/ u dum+bA ra'i 'bras bu 'dra ba dang / sha gzi gu zhes bya ba dung gi kha dog 'dra ba dang / ka ka na zhes bya ba 'ol ma se'i 'bras bu smin pa dang 'dra ba dang / pags</text></item>
<item><p>234a.2</p><section></section><text>pa shul grub ces bya ba glang po che'i pags pa 'dra ba dang / pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba rang gi ming gi mdog 'dra ba dang / ri dwags ri sha'i lce 'dra ba zhes bya ba rtsub po dang / rma kha brgya pa zhes bya ba rma mang po dang / khyab pa rdul med ces bya ba dang / pags pa</text></item>
<item><p>234a.3</p><section></section><text>myags pa zhes bya ba pags pa zad pa dang / rkang pa zhigs pa zhes bya ba rkang pa ser ga mang po 'gas pa dang / mdze nad rnam pa bcu po 'di dag ni gsor mi rung ngo / /lhag ma brgyad ni gsor rung ba yin te/ mdze nad gya mo 'dra ba zhes bya ba mdog</text></item>
<item><p>234a.4</p><section></section><text>gnag cing rtsub pa dang / me dbal zhes bya ba rma kha chen po dang / 'brum bu phra mo zhes bya ba sha rmen 'dra zhing / mdog sngo skyar 'dug pa dang / shu ba zhes bya ba 'brum bu mang po phyogs gcig nas 'bud pa dang / sha bkra zhes bya ba ku ba'i me tog</text></item>
<item><p>234a.5</p><section></section><text>'dra ba dang / thig le zhes bya ba mdog snum zhing 'byang dka' ba dang / g.yan pa zhes bya ba 'brum bu mdog dkar zhing dmar ba dang / rkang shu zhes bya ba 'brum bu 'dzag pa rnams so/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i mdze ni/ mkhrang zhing mdog sngo skyar</text></item>
<item><p>234a.6</p><section></section><text>'dug pa dang dmar zhing rtsub la mi bzad par na ba yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mdze ni lus tsha zhing shin tu myags la khrag 'dzag pa yin par bshad do/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i mdze nad ni lus rul zhing pags pa stug la g.ya' zhing mdog snum pa dang</text></item>
<item><p>234a.7</p><section></section><text>dkar zhing lci ba yin no/ /de la nad gzhi gsum las gyur pa'i mdze nad kyi mtshan ma ni tshul thams cad dang ldan pa'am/ nad bla gnyan mang pos thebs pa gang yin pa de ni spang bar bya'o/ /mdze bo cog ni phal cher nad gzhi gsum char 'dus pa dang / khrag</text></item>
<item><p>234b.1</p><section></section><text>rgyas pa las 'byung bar bshad pas na/ mdze nad tshabs chen po nyams stobs yod la sngar yang snum bcud btang ba la ni rtsa gtar zhing khrag dbyung bar bya'o/ /mdze nad tshabs chung ngu la ni zhal zhal gdab pa dang / rngab rus gzhibs pa dang / ku</text></item>
<item><p>234b.2</p><section></section><text>bas khrag drang ba dang / srin bu pad pa la 'jib tu gzhug go/ /nad gzhi ci 'dra ba las skyug sman dang bkru sman yang btang ngo / /mdze nad gtar ga byar mi rung ba dang / tshor ba med pa bem bem po la ni sman mu ka'i thal ba dang / til gyi sog</text></item>
<item><p>234b.3</p><section></section><text>ma'i thal ba la sogs pas gdab bo/ /mdze tshor ba med pa bem bem bor gyur pa dang / pags pa mkhrang por 'dug pa dang 'byang du mi btub pa rnams la ni/ mda' dug la sogs pas sngags dang ldan par bya ste lus la bsku bar bya'o/ /</text></item>
<item><p>234b.4</p><section></section><text>pa to la dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / a riSh+Da dang / sle tres dang / d+ha ba ni dang / ba sha ka dang / ka rany+dza rnams btags pa'i phye ma dang chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'i ming ni rdo rje can zhes bya ste/ de las</text></item>
<item><p>234b.5</p><section></section><text>ran par 'thungs na mdze nad sel to/ /kha ba chen po ci skrigs zhes bya ba'i mar ni/ rtsa mkhris dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / pu shel tse dang / pa Tha dang / a riSh+Ta dang / gla sgang dang / byi tsher dang / shing mngar dang / thal tres rnam</text></item>
<item><p>234b.6</p><section></section><text>gnyis dang / pu tse shel dang / khyi lce ba dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / sle tres dang / pi pi ling dang / shug pa dang / shu dag dang / pi sha la dang / dug mo nyung gi 'bras bu dang / ba sha ka dang / murba dang / pa to la dang / dong ka dang /</text></item>
<item><p>234b.7</p><section></section><text>sro lo dang / bong nga dkar po dang / yung dang / ba mkhal dang / nye'u shing gi rtsa ba dang / 'di rnams kyi phye ma spyir mar gyi bzhi cha gcig dang / skyu ru ra'i khu ba mar gyi nyis 'gyur dang / chu mar gyi brgyad 'gyur dang / 'di rnams mar dang bskol te mar nyi tshe lus</text></item>
<item><p>235a.1</p><section></section><text>par byas nas btsags te/ de las ran par zos na yang rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad drag po dang / mdze dang / 'bras dang / skya rbab rnams sel cing / rims dang smyo ba dang / 'bras kyi phreng ba rnams med par byed do/ /</text></item>
<item><p>235a.2</p><section></section><text>mkhris pa dang / khrag shas che ba'i mdze nad la ni/ mar pa To la'i phye ma dang skol ba'am/ skyer pa'i phye ma dang skol ba'am/ seng ldeng gi phye ma dang skol ba'am/ nim pa'i phye ma dang skol ba'i mar blud do/ /yang na sman a brta ka'i phye ma srang brgyad</text></item>
<item><p>235a.3</p><section></section><text>mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / chu srang brgya'i nang du bskol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa las ci ran par rtsabs dron po dang sbyar te 'thungs la sman khong du zhu ba'i 'og tu zas su ko dra ba'i chan bza' bar bya ste/ zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin re bzhin cho ga de</text></item>
<item><p>235a.4</p><section></section><text>ltar byas pa'i 'og tu zhag gsum gyi bar du sman mi btang bar mthun zhing 'phrod pa'i kha zas zos la/ yang zhag bdun gyi bar du sman gyi cho ga snga ma ltar bya ba de lta bur ma sos kyi bar du byas na/ mdze dang / skran dang / dmu rdzings dang / mtshan par</text></item>
<item><p>235a.5</p><section></section><text>rdol ba'i nad rnams las thal bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na dzA ti ka'i 'bras bu dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / tsha ba gsum pa rnams btags la/ 'bru mar dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na ldong ros dang / na le sham btags pa'i til mar dang /</text></item>
<item><p>235a.6</p><section></section><text>shing arga'i lo ma rnams lus la bskus na yang mdze'i nad ngo cog sel to/ /a ru ra dang / ka rany+dza dang / yungs kar dang / yung dang / bal guny+dza dang / rgyam tshwa dang / byi dang ka rnams lhan cig tu btags la ba gcin dang sbyar te lus bskus</text></item>
<item><p>235a.7</p><section></section><text>na yang mdze nad sel to/ /ru rta dang / a raN+Da dang / e da ga dza rnams lhan cig tu til mar ram/ ba gcin dang sbyar te lus la bskus na yang mdze nad thub po/ seng phrom dang / skyer khaN+Da dang / rgyam tshwa dang / phra puN+Da rnams kyang bsku ba'i</text></item>
<item><p>235b.1</p><section></section><text>rnam grangs su bshad do/ /ru rta dang / rgyam tsha dang / yungs kar dang / byi dang ga dang / e da ga dza rnams lhan cig tu btags la rtsabs dang sbyar te bskus na yang shu ba dang mdze thig le zhes bya ba sel to/ /mu zi dang / ba bla dang / ldong ros dang / ru rta dang /</text></item>
<item><p>235b.2</p><section></section><text>sman ka li dang / phu shel tse dang / gan+d+ha pa tra rnams btags la chu dang sbyar te bskus na yang sha bkra la sogs pa mdze'i nad do cog sel to/ /gan+d+ha pa tra dang / na le sham dang / nag tshur dang / ru rta dang / ldong ros rnams kyi phye ma til mar dang sbyar la/ khar ba'i</text></item>
<item><p>235b.3</p><section></section><text>snod kyi nang du zhag bdun gyi bar du bzhag ste lus la bskus na yang sha bkra dang / sha gzi gu med par byed do/ /mu zi dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba'am/ chu shing gi thal ba'am/ shing kha ra'i me tog gi thal ba gang yang rung ba til mar dang sbyar te lus</text></item>
<item><p>235b.4</p><section></section><text>bskus na yang sha bkra sel bar byed do/ /sman da ku na nyi rma bya'i mkhris pa dang sbyar ba 'am/ sman pa la ka'i thal ba rma bya'i mkhris pa dang sbyar ba'am/ sna ma'i me tog glang po che'i rdul las sbyar ba rnams las gang yang rung bas lus la bskus na yang sha gzi gu</text></item>
<item><p>235b.5</p><section></section><text>med par byed do/ /ru rta dang / sman a shu mar dang / shing arga'i shun lpags dang / rgyam tsha dang / pu shel tse dang / kru trug tres rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin dang til mar gyi nang du bskol te til mar nyi tshe lus pa lus la bskus na yang mdze nad sel to/ /</text></item>
<item><p>235b.6</p><section></section><text>ru rta dang / a shwa mar dang / b+hing ga ra dza dang / arga dang / rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin dang / shing snu ha'i lo ma dang / til mar gyi nang du bskol la til mar nyi tshe lus pa'i nang du mda' dug cung zad tsam btab ste lus la bskus na yang shu ba</text></item>
<item><p>235b.7</p><section></section><text>dang/ rkang shu la sogs pa sel to/ /btsod dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / rgya skyegs dang / yung dang / ldong ros dang / ba bla dang / mu zi rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma til mar dang sbyar te nyi tshan gyi drod kyis bsros pa lus la bskus na</text></item>
<item><p>236a.1</p><section></section><text>yang g.yan pa sel bar byed do/ /sman ka ka na si ka dang / u dum+bA ra dang / nim+pa dang / gla sgang dang / tsha ba gsum dang / byi dang ga rnams kyi phye ma nim+pa skol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang pags pa'i nyes pa'o cog sel</text></item>
<item><p>236a.2</p><section></section><text>to/ /sle tres skol ba'i khu ba dang / 'bras bu gsum skol ba'i khu ba dang / ba gcin skol ba dron mo rnams las gang yang rung ba gu gul dang sbyar te zla ba gcig gi bar du 'thungs na yang pags pa'i nyes pa dang / rma dang lus skem pa rnams sel to/ /</text></item>
<item><p>236a.3</p><section></section><text>brag zhun dang / yung dang / skyer khaN+Da rnams las gang yang rung ba sbrang rtsi dang ba gcin gyis sbyar te zla ba gcig gi bar du 'thungs na yang / mdze dang skya rbab kyi nad sel to/ /zhag bdun gsum gyi bar du khang pa dron po 'am/ nyi ma tsha ba la 'dug</text></item>
<item><p>236a.4</p><section></section><text>cing / sman tsha ba skol ba'i khu ba dron mo dang / sman pa ku tsi'i khu ba dang sbyar te 'thungs la kha zas 'o ma dang ldan par zos na yang mdze las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /ba ku tsi'i phye ma mar sar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar te zos la/ de'i rjes la dar ba 'thungs shing /</text></item>
<item><p>236a.5</p><section></section><text>kha zas kyang dar ba dang spags te zos na mdze nad kyi 'jigs pa med do/ /til dang / mar dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / sbrang rtsi dang / tsha ba gsum dang / go bye dang / kha ra dang / rnam pa 'di bdun cha mnyam ste sbyar ba'i ming ni bdun cha mnyam pa zhes bya</text></item>
<item><p>236a.6</p><section></section><text>ste/ de las ci ran par zos na ro tsa zhing yid gzhungs par byed la/ mdze nad sel te 'di la cho ga bsrung ba med do/ /byi dang ga dang / kru trug tres dang / kha ra dang / skyu ru ra dang / lcags kyi so dog dang / pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma til mar dang</text></item>
<item><p>236a.7</p><section></section><text>sbyar te zos na mdze'i nad do cog shin tu tshabs che ba yang sel bar 'gyur te/ a ru ra dang / til dang / go bye rnams kyi phye ma bu ram dang sbyar te brdzis pa zos na yang mdze nad sel to/ /go bye dang / byi dang ga dang / so ma ra tsi ka rnams kyi phye ma bu ram dang brdzis</text></item>
<item><p>236b.1</p><section></section><text>pa 'am/ byi dang ga dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang brdzis pa zos na yang / mdze dang / srin bu dang / gcin snyi ba'i nad dang / rma 'khyims pa dang mtshan par rdol gyi nad rnams sel bar byed do/ /pags</text></item>
<item><p>236b.2</p><section></section><text>pa'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba la dug mo nyung gi phye ma mar khu dang sbyar ba yang btung bar bya'o/ /yang na til dang / so ma ra dza ka'i phye ma cha mnyam ste sbyar ba cho ga bsrungs bzhin du lo gcig gi bar du bza' 'o/ /seng ldeng dang / brag zhun dang / sbrang rtsi dang /</text></item>
<item><p>236b.3</p><section></section><text>zhun mar dang / byi dang ga rnams sbyar te zos nas cho ga bzhin du bsrungs na/ skrangs mdze dang / skrangs pa'i nad ring po mi thogs par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /seng ldeng gi rtsa ba bsregs pa'i khu ba bum pa'i nang du bzags pa/ skyu ru ra'i khu ba dang mar dang</text></item>
<item><p>236b.4</p><section></section><text>sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te zos na yang mdze nad sel zhing sman bcud kyis len du 'gyur ro/ /seng ldeng skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang skyer khaN+Da dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na 'bras bu gsum dang / byi dang ga'i phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar te zos na yang mdze nad</text></item>
<item><p>236b.5</p><section></section><text>sel to/ /seng ldeng skol ba'i khu bas lus la bsku ba dang / lus la dril ba dang / khrus bya ba dang / btung ba dang / kha zas g.yo ba'i chu la sogs pa spyad cing rtag tu 'thungs na mdze nad pags pa'i nyes pa thams cad sel to/ /ji ltar seng ldeng mdze nad bzlog</text></item>
<item><p>236b.6</p><section></section><text>pa'i cho gar sbyar ba bzhin du/ shi sha ba dang / dong ka dang / a riSh+Ta dang / skyer pa dang / shing ro hi ta ka dang a sa na rnams kyang de bzhin du bya'o/ /mdze nad can la ni kha zas su 'bras sA lu dang / ko dra ba dang / gro dang / nas dang / mon sran sde'u la sogs</text></item>
<item><p>236b.7</p><section></section><text>gang bu can rnying pa rnams dang / tshod ma ro kha ba'i bag dang / ri dwags skam sa na gnas pa'i sha dang sbyar ba rnams phan zhing 'phrod pa yin no/ /mdze nad gso ba'i le'u bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so// //de nas gzhang 'brum dang / mtshan par</text></item>
<item><p>237a.1</p><section></section><text>rdol gyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /de nas gzhang 'brum ni nad gzhi gsum re re las gyur pa dang / kun 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / khrag nad las gyur pa dang / thog ma nas lhan cig skyes pa dang rnam pa drug yod de/ gzhang</text></item>
<item><p>237a.2</p><section></section><text>ka'i gnyer ma gsum yod pa'i gnas su 'byung bar rig par bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum gyi mtshan ma ni/ 'brum bu chung zhing ma rgyas pa dang / skam pa dang / rtsa dmar zhing sngo skyar 'dug pa dang / snum bag med cing rtsub pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>237a.3</p><section></section><text>'brum bu rnams mtho dman yod cing mi mnyam pa dang / na zhing 'gag par byed pa la sogs pa rlung gi tshul thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum gyi mtshan ma ni/ mdog dmar zhing ser la gnag ste reg tu mi bzod cing /</text></item>
<item><p>237a.4</p><section></section><text>'jam la khrag 'dzag cing chu ser can la mgo 'khor zhing lus tsha ba la sogs pa mkhris pa'i tshul rnams dang ldan pa yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum gyi mtshan ma ni/ mdog dkar ba dang ser skyar 'dug pa dang / 'byang dka' ba dang / snum</text></item>
<item><p>237a.5</p><section></section><text>zhing 'byil ba dang / 'brum bu che zhing tshor ba med pa dang / bad kan gyi tshul rnams dang ldan pa yin no/ /kun 'dus pa las gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum dang / thog ma nas lhan cig skyes pa'i gzhang 'brum gyi tshul ni thams cad kyi mtshan ma dang ldan pa yin</text></item>
<item><p>237a.6</p><section></section><text>no/ /khrag las gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum gyi mtshan ma ni mdog dmar zhing khrag 'dzag pa yin par bstan to/ /de la nang gi gnyer ma'i gnas su 'byung ba dang / nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / thog ma nas lhan cig skyes pa 'di gsum ni spang bar</text></item>
<item><p>237a.7</p><section></section><text>bya'o/ /lhag ma gzhan rnams ni gso dka' bar bshad/ gzhang 'brum can la nad bla thabs su skyug pa dang / mod mod pa'i nad dang / ngu shing na ba dang / skom dad che ba dang / rims dang / snying na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / khar 'brum pa 'byung ba dang / gzhang</text></item>
<item><p>237b.1</p><section></section><text>kar 'brum pa phre'u 'byung ba dang / sha zad pa rnams spang bar bya'o/ /yang na gzhang 'brum ni rnam pa gnyis su 'dus te/ gzhang 'brum skam pa ni bad kan dang rlung gnyis 'dus pa las gyur pa yin no/ /mkhris pa dang / khrag nad 'dus pa las gyur pa ni/</text></item>
<item><p>237b.2</p><section></section><text>gsher zhing 'dzag pa yin par shes par bya ste/ de la thog mar gzhang 'brum skem pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ gzhang 'brum zhi bar bya ba la/ ba lang gi lci ba'i dugs dang / zan dron gyi dugs dang / la phug gi dugs dang / shu ta'i dugs rnams gang</text></item>
<item><p>237b.3</p><section></section><text>yang rung bya ba zhing / gso ma skol ba'i khu ba blugs pa dang / sbrul nag po dang / byi la dang / rnga mo dang / phag dang / srog chags dza du ka rnams gang yang rung ba'i tshil bsregs pa'i dud pas bdug pa dang / yang na yung gi phye ma shing snu ha'i 'o ma dang</text></item>
<item><p>237b.4</p><section></section><text>sbyar te bsku ba dang / yang na pi pi ling dang / lung gi phye ma ba lang gi mkhris pa dang sbyar bas bsku bar bya'o/ /yang na srardzi ka'i thal ba dang / dan+da'i rtsa ba dang / lung ga la'i rtsa ba dang / kru trug tres rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin dang / pi pi ling dang / shing shir</text></item>
<item><p>237b.5</p><section></section><text>sha'i sa bon dang / shing arga'i 'o ma dang / ru rta dang / rgyam tsha rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / yung dang / bya gag gi rtug pa dang / 'ol ma se'i 'bras bu dang / pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin dang sbyar ba dang / bsku ba'i sman rnam pa 'di gsum</text></item>
<item><p>237b.6</p><section></section><text>ni/ gdon mi za ba yin te gang yang rung bas bskus na gzhang 'brum med par byed do/ /dan+da'i rtsa ba dang / a shwa mar dang / nag tshur dang / byi dang ga dang / ba bla dang / kru trug tres dang / rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma shing arga'i 'o ma dang / til mar</text></item>
<item><p>237b.7</p><section></section><text>gyi nang du bskol te/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pas bskus na yang gzhang 'brum sel te/ yang na/ a ru ra bu ram dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na a ru ra zhag gcig gi bar du ba gcin gyi nang du sbangs pa'am/ yang na a ru ra dang pi pi ling mar</text></item>
<item><p>238a.1</p><section></section><text>gyi nang du brngos pa'am/ yang na a ru ra dang / shing nye rong dang / dan+da'i rtsa ba rnams sbyar ba bza' bar bya'o/ /yang na go bye btags pa'i phye dang dar ba sbyar ba'am/ yang na dar ba dang / phye kru trug tres dang / la la phud btags</text></item>
<item><p>238a.2</p><section></section><text>pa'i phye ma dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na dar ba dang / phye bca' sga dang / bilba dang sbyar ba nan tan du byas te btung ngo / /yang na rdza ma kru trug tres kyis bskus pa'i nang du zho mnan de langs nas zho 'am dar ba gang yang rung ba btung ngo / /yang de nyid kyi cho ga bzhin</text></item>
<item><p>238a.3</p><section></section><text>du/ pi rga dang / po ta dang / sle tres rnams kyis rdza ma bskrus pa'i nang du zho mnan la zho 'am dar ba gang yang rung ba btung ngo / /yang na dbyi mong dang / kru trug tres phye ma chang dang sbyar te rtag tu 'thungs na gzhang 'brum sel to/ /yang na bca' sga dang /</text></item>
<item><p>238a.4</p><section></section><text>kru trug tres rnams kyi phye ma bu ram dang chang dang sbyar te btung ngo / /yang na gzhang 'brum can la/ dan+da'i rtsa ba dang / go bye dang / kru trug tres dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / 'di rnams cha mnyam pa dang / rgyam tsha cha nyis 'gyur rnams snod kha sbyar gyi nang</text></item>
<item><p>238a.5</p><section></section><text>du brngos la/ tshig mar gyur pa'i phye ma kha zas gzhan dang sbyar zhing bza' bar bya'o/ /til nag po zho gnyis gnyis nang par bzhin zos la chu grang mos phul na yang gzhang 'brum zhi bar 'gyur zhing so brtan la sha skyi bar 'gyur ro/ /mar dang / shing pa la sha'i</text></item>
<item><p>238a.6</p><section></section><text>thal ba'i khu ba mar gyi chu sum 'gyur gyi nang du tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma bskol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa las ran par 'thungs na yang the tshom med par gzhang 'brum 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /'bras bu gsum dang / rtsa ba bcu dang / kru trug tres dang / dan+da'i rtsa ba rnams</text></item>
<item><p>238a.7</p><section></section><text>kyi phye ma srang re re chu phul gang la srang brgyad du brtsis pa phul drug cu rtsa bzhi'i nang du bskol te/ chu bzhi cha gcig lus pa btsags la bu ram srang brgyad dang sbyar te mar snod kyi nang du blugs la/ zla ba gcig gi bar du mnan pa'i ming ni/ dan+da'i rtsa ba'i</text></item>
<item><p>238b.1</p><section></section><text>chang zhes bya ste/ 'di las ran par 'thungs na/ gzhang 'brum dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / rtug skam dang / pho ba'i nad dang / skya rbab kyi nad rnams sel to/ /bi sha la dang / ka pit+tha dang / kru trug tres dang / pa tha rnams las srang</text></item>
<item><p>238b.2</p><section></section><text>gnyis gnyis dang a ru ra dang / skyu ru ra srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang / 'di rnams kyi phye ma chu phul brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi nang du bskol te/ chu bzhi cha gcig lus pa btsags la bu ram srang brgya dang sbyar te mar snod kyi rdza mar blugs la/ zla ba</text></item>
<item><p>238b.3</p><section></section><text>phyed kyi bar du mnan pa'i ming ni 'bras bu'i chang zhes bya ste/ 'di las ran par 'thungs na pho ba'i nad dang / gzhang 'brum dang skran sel to/ /gzhang 'brum na zhing 'khru ba la ni/ rlung las gyur pa'i 'khru ba'i cho ga sngar bstan pa bzhin du bya'o/ /gzhang</text></item>
<item><p>238b.4</p><section></section><text>'brum na zhing phyi sa skam ste 'byung du mi btub pa la ni/ rtug skam gyi cho ga 'og nas 'byung ba bzhin du lan mang du bya'o/ /shu ti dang / bilba dang / pi pi ling dang / kru trug tres dang / shu dag dang / shing mngar dang / thang shing dang / ma nu dang /</text></item>
<item><p>238b.5</p><section></section><text>li zur ba dang / ru rta dang / po son cha rnams btags pa'i phye ma til mar dang / 'o ma til mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol la/ til mar nyi tshe lus par byas te/ btsags pa las ran par 'jam rtsi mas btang na/ rlung dang 'phrod cing /</text></item>
<item><p>238b.6</p><section></section><text>phyi sa be snabs su 'byung ba dang / gzhang 'brum dang / gzhang na ba dang gcin 'gag pa rnams sel to/ /pu tse shel la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang / rtsa ba bcu sngar bshad pa 'di gnyis las gang yang rung ba dang / po son cha dang / shing mngar dang /</text></item>
<item><p>238b.7</p><section></section><text>sh+ya ti dang/ ru rta dang / gan+d+ha bri yang ku dang / gla sgang dang / rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma/ mkhris pa dang / rlung gang las gyur pa'i nad kyi skabs dang sbyar te/ mar dang / til mar gnyis las gang 'os pa zhig dang / 'o ma chu'i nang du bskol te/ mar</text></item>
<item><p>239a.1</p><section></section><text>ram/ til mar nyi tshe lus pas/ bkru sman drag po mas gtang bar bya'o/ /gzhang 'brum na ba la khrag 'dzag par rtogs na khrag lud pa'i nad kyi cho ga bzhin du bya zhing thog mar sman dang / kha zas la sogs pa kha ba'i bag</text></item>
<item><p>239a.2</p><section></section><text>las sbyar zhing zos na me'i drod bskyed cing nad gzhi tshos par byed do/ /khrag nad kyi gzhang 'brum can la tshos par byed pa'i sman pu shel tse dang / ya ri ta dang / skyer pa'i shun pags rnams lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa 'am/ yang na bca'</text></item>
<item><p>239a.3</p><section></section><text>sga dang / tsan dan dang / rtsa mkhris dang / byi tsher rnams skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa blud de/ yang na skom pa'i nad dang khrag nad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ nim+pa'i shun lpags dang / dug mo nyung gi 'bras bu dang / skyer khaN+Da dang / bong nga dkar po</text></item>
<item><p>239a.4</p><section></section><text>rnams kyi phye ma/ sbrang rtsi dang 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar ba blud do/ /sa maM ga dang / ut+pa la dang / chu shing gi 'bras bu dang / ti ri ta dang / til dang / tsan dan rnams kyi phye ma ra'i 'o ma dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang gzhang 'brum khrag 'dzag pa</text></item>
<item><p>239a.5</p><section></section><text>sel to/ /yang na khrag nad kyi gzhang 'brum can la/ kha zas ra'i 'o ma dang ldan par bza' zhing / sman dug mo nyung gi shun lpags dang / sbrang rtsi dang / bu ram gyi lbu ba rnams sbyar ba 'am/ yang na sman ma yu ra ka'i phye ma/ sbrang rtsi dang / 'bras bkrus</text></item>
<item><p>239a.6</p><section></section><text>pa'i khu ba dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na pad+ma'i ze ba sbrang rtsi dang / mar sar dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na pad+ma'i ze ba kha ra dang sbyar ba zos na/ gzhang 'brum khrag 'dzag pa bde bar 'gyur ro/ /dbyi mo'i lo ma dang / bal bu'i lo ma dang / na le sham</text></item>
<item><p>239a.7</p><section></section><text>rnams las srang re re dang / pi pi ling dang / pi pi ling gi rtsa ba srang gnyis gnyis dang / dri sna bzhi zhes bya ba/ shing tsha dang / sug smel dang / gan+d+ha pa tra dang / nA ga ge sar rnams dang / pu shel tse dang / 'di rnams las zho gnyis gnyis</text></item>
<item><p>239b.1</p><section></section><text>dang/ bca' sga srang gsum dang / bu ram sman spyir bsdoms pa'i sum 'gyur dang / 'di rnams sbyar te ri lur byas pa'i ming ni/ bal bu'i ri lu zhes bya ste/ 'di las ran par zos la/ chang dang / khu bcud dang / sha khu dang / 'o ma dang / zho kha chu dang /</text></item>
<item><p>239b.2</p><section></section><text>rtsabs rnams las gang yang rung bas nad gzhi gang shas che ba dang sbyar te phul na/ me'i drod bskyed cing gzhang 'brum thams cad dang / skyug pa dang / snying na ba dang / lud pa dang / skran dang / rims rnams sel to/ /cho ga de rnams kyis kyang zhi bar ma</text></item>
<item><p>239b.3</p><section></section><text>gyur na/ sman pa mkhas shing sngon byed pa mthong bas/ nad pa rkang pa dgug cing bcing ba la sogs pa ci nas kyang gzhang ltar snang ba'i thabs byas te/ 'brum bu ga la 'dug pa brtag na/ rwa 'am/ lcags kyi sbubs 'jam po/ ba'i nu sor gyi dbyibs 'dra</text></item>
<item><p>239b.4</p><section></section><text>ba/ kha'i sbubs sor bzhi/ srid du sor lnga yod par byas la/ glo logs su phu chen po gsum tsam byas te/ rkub tu brdzangs la/ glo'i bu gud 'brum bu ga la yod pa'i thad kar gtad de/ 'brum bu sbubs kyi nang du byung ba la/ rlung dang / bad kan las</text></item>
<item><p>239b.5</p><section></section><text>gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum zhig yin na/ 'brum bu mtshon gyis bcad la 'phro lcags kyis bsreg go/ /yang na mi bcad par bsreg go/ /yang na gzhang 'brum rnam pa drug po gang yang rung ste/ 'brum bu gang gi nang du byung ba la/ sman mu ka ka'i thal ba phrad dar sbyar bas bsku bar bya'o/ /gzhang</text></item>
<item><p>239b.6</p><section></section><text>'brum na ba la ni mdor na gang ci yang rung ste/ mi'i stobs bskyed pa dang / rlung dang 'phrod pa'i sman dang / kha zas dang / btung ba gang yin pa de 'ba' zhig las tshabs che chung dang sbyar zhing gtang bar bya'o/ /gzhang 'brum can gyis ni nad gzhi so so'i 'khrug par</text></item>
<item><p>239b.7</p><section></section><text>'gyur ba'i kha zas dang / stan mkhrang po la 'dug pa dang / tsog tsog pur 'dug pa dang / phyi sa dang / gcin phro bzhin du mnag pa dang / rta la sogs pa zhon pa rnams spang bar bya'o// //da ni mtshan par rdol ba'i bye brag bshad par bya ste/ rkub</text></item>
<item><p>240a.1</p><section></section><text>kha nas sor gnyis kyi tshu rol gyi glo logs su nyam thag par byed pa'i phol mig 'byung ste/ de rdol ba'i ming ni mtshan par rdol zhes bya ste/ de yang rnam pa lnga yod par bshad do/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i phol mig</text></item>
<item><p>240a.2</p><section></section><text>gi ming ni/ rma kha brgya pa zhes bya ste/ mdog dmar la mi bzad par zug cing na ba yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i ming ni/ rda me mgrin zhes bya ste mdog dmar la me 'bar ba bzhin du tsha ba yin par bshad do/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>240a.3</p><section></section><text>ming ni/ kun tu 'dzag pa zhes bya ste/ mdog dkar la g.ya' ba yin par bshad do/ /nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa'i ming ni/ dung 'khyil ba zhes bya ste/ thams cad kyi mtshan ma dang ldan pa yin no/ /kha zas zug rngu dang bcas</text></item>
<item><p>240a.4</p><section></section><text>pa zos te/ gcin 'ong ba'i sbubs su zug pa las gyur pa'i ming ni/ log par song ba zhes bya ste/ 'di rnams las nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / zug rngu zug pa las gyur pa gnyis ni spang bar bya'o/ /lhag ma rnams ni</text></item>
<item><p>240a.5</p><section></section><text>gso dka' ba yin no/ /de la phol mig dang po byung ste ma smin pa la ni/ de'i nyen 'khor ram rtsa nas khrag dbyung ba dang / nan rtsis bsku ba dang / nad gzhi gang las gyur pa dang / 'phrod pa'i sman skol ba'i khu ba grang dro gang 'os pas steng du</text></item>
<item><p>240a.6</p><section></section><text>blugs pa dang / til mar dang / nad dang 'phrod pa'i sman sbyar nas bsku zhing mnye ba dang / bsku sman btang ba'i bar du cho ga rim bzhin du bya'o/ /rdol bar gyur pa'i cho ga yang bshad par bya ste/ dang por rdol ba'i rma zabs ci tsam yod pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>240a.7</p><section></section><text>srol gang logs su byung ba/ lcags kyi thur ma 'jam pos brtag pa dang / rma'i srol gar gyur par dral ba dang / sman muska ka la sogs pa'i thal bas gdab pa dang / bsreg pa la sogs pa go rim bzhin du mthar gyis byas nas rma gso</text></item>
<item><p>240b.1</p><section></section><text>ba'i cho ga bzhin du/ nad gzhi gang las gyur pa dang yang sbyar zhing mthun mthun sman bya'o/ /de la rma gso ba'i cho ga ni/ dong ga dang / yung dang / rgya shug gi 'bras bu rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/ gcin 'dzag pa'i rma mtshan par</text></item>
<item><p>240b.2</p><section></section><text>rdol ba la bskus na/ rma sbyor zhing mi mched par 'gyur ro/ /shing nye rong dang / te dzo ba ti dang / dan+da'i rtsa ba dang / btsod dang / yung dang / skyer pa dang / skyer khaN+Da dang / nim+ba'i lo ma rnams sbyar bas bskus na yang rma 'khyims pa sel to/ /</text></item>
<item><p>240b.3</p><section></section><text>mtshan par rdol gyi nad la/ ka ra bi ra dang / yung dang / dan+da'i rtsa ba dang / lang ka'i li dang / rgyam tsha dang / kru trug tres dang / kha lung dang / arka dang / dug mo nyung rnams skol ba'i khu ba dang / til mar gyi nang du/ sman de dag nyid kyi phye ma</text></item>
<item><p>240b.4</p><section></section><text>bskol la/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa rma la bsdu bar bya'o/ /mtshan par rdol gyi nad yod pa'i mis ni/ rma sos pa'i 'og tu yang lo gcig gi bar du phyugs zhon pa dang / nyal ba dang / stobs 'gyed pa dang / brtsal ba dang / kha zas</text></item>
<item><p>240b.5</p><section></section><text>lci ba rnams shin tu bsgrims te spang bar bya'o/ /gzhang 'brum dang / mtshan par rdol ba gso ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa rdzogs so// //de nas skya rbab kyi nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ skya rbab kyi nad ni/ kha zas la sogs pa rno</text></item>
<item><p>240b.6</p><section></section><text>ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tshwa dang / sngon ma goms pa'i kha zas dang / sa zhag rnams las ha cang mang du zos pa las skya rbab kyi nad du 'gyur te/ de yang nad gzhi gsum so sor nas gyur pa dang / kun 'dus pa las gyur pa'i bye brag gis rnam</text></item>
<item><p>240b.7</p><section></section><text>pa bzhir 'gyur ro/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i skya rbab kyi mtshan ma mi lus kyi mdog gnag la/ rlung gi mtshan ma dang / rlung nad kyi bla gnyan rnams dang yang ldan pa yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skya rbab kyi mtshan ma ni/ mkhris pa las</text></item>
<item><p>241a.1</p><section></section><text>ba rnams 'byung zhing / mig dang / pags pa dang / phyi sa dang / gcin rnams ser ba yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i skya rbab kyi mtshan ma ni/ mdog dkar la bad kan las gyur pa'i nad rnams dang ldan pa yin no/ /</text></item>
<item><p>241a.2</p><section></section><text>nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa'i skya rbab kyi mtshan ma ni/ thams cad kyi mtshan ma dang ldan par shes par bya'o/ /de la skya rbab kyi nad yod la/ khrag zad pa dang / glo 'grams pa dang / sha zad pa dang / skyugs pa dang / skom pa la sogs</text></item>
<item><p>241a.3</p><section></section><text>pa'i bla gnyan yod pa dang / mdog ser zhing snang ngo cog dkar por mthong ba ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /skya rbab kyi nad thams cad la/ dang por ni sman mar btung bas khong 'jam por byas la/ de'i 'og tu nad gzhi dang sbyar zhing / gyen du skyugs pa dang thur</text></item>
<item><p>241a.4</p><section></section><text>du bkru ba'i sman rnon pos sbyar bar bya'o/ /de'i sman mar ni mur ba dang / pu tse shel dang / yung dang / byi tsher dang / pi pi ling dang / tsan dan dang / sro lo dang / khyi lce ba dang / dug mo nyung dang / rtsa mkhris dang / pa to la dang / gla sgang dang</text></item>
<item><p>241a.5</p><section></section><text>thang shing rnams kyi phye ma zho gnyis gnyis/ mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'o ma mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa las/ ran par 'thungs na/ skya rbab dang / rims dang / 'brum bu dang / skrangs pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>241a.6</p><section></section><text>gzhang 'brum dang / khrag lud pa'i nad rnams sel to/ /'bras bu gsum dang / sle tres dang / ba sha ka dang / pu tse shel dang / rtsa mkhris dang / nim+pa rnams skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang / skya rbab kyi nad</text></item>
<item><p>241a.7</p><section></section><text>dang mig ser can yang sel to/ /yang na skya rbab kyi nad yod pa la/ a ru ra ba gcin dang sbyar ba btung zhing / kha zas 'o ma dang ldan pa bza' bar bya'o/ /yang na lcags kyi phye ma ba gcin gyi nang du yun ring du sbangs pa bza' zhing 'o mas dbul lo/ /</text></item>
<item><p>241b.1</p><section></section><text>'bras bu gsum dang / kru trug tres dang / gla sgang dang / byi dang ga dang / tsha ba gsum rnams kyi phye ma dang / lcags kyi phye ma dang / sman de rnams spyir bsdoms pa'i tshad dang mnyam pa dang / 'di rnams sbrang rtsi dang mar dang sbyar te zos na yang /</text></item>
<item><p>241b.2</p><section></section><text>skya rbab dang / mig ser dang / skrangs pa dang / gcin nad sel to/ /til dang / tsha ba gsum dang / rgya shug gi 'bras bu dang / drub mar cang rnams kyi phye ma dang / lcags kyi phye ma/ sman de rnams spyir bsdoms pa'i tshad dang mnyam pa dang</text></item>
<item><p>241b.3</p><section></section><text>'di rnams sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te ma brdzis pa las ran par zos na yang / skya rbab kyi nad drag po dang skrangs pa sel to/ /mig ser gyi nad ni/ skya rbab kyi nad yal bar bor ba las/ mkhris pa 'khrugs nas/ mig ser gyi nad du 'gyur bas na/</text></item>
<item><p>241b.4</p><section></section><text>de yang skabs 'dir bshad de/ de'i mtshan ma ni/ mig dang lus kyi mdog ser ba yin no/ /mig ser chen po zhes bya ba yang / mig ser gyi nad la dang por nad tshabs chen por gyur pa las 'byung ste/ de gnyis la ni snum pa'i bkru sman</text></item>
<item><p>241b.5</p><section></section><text>btang ngo / /ba la dang / yung dang / nim+pa dang / 'bras bu gsum dang shing mngar rnams cha mnyam ste btags la 'o ma dang / ma he'i mar dang skol nas mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa las ran par 'thungs na yang mig ser gyi nad sel to/ /</text></item>
<item><p>241b.6</p><section></section><text>sle tres dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / skyer pa dang / nim+pa rnams gang yang rung ba'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te nang par bzhin rtag tu 'thungs na yang / mig ser gyi nad sel to/ /lcags kyi phye ma dang / yung dang / skyer pa dang / 'bras bu gsum dang /</text></item>
<item><p>241b.7</p><section></section><text>pu tse shel rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang mar dang sbyar te zos na yang mig ser gyi nad sel to/ /skyu ru ra dang / lcags kyi phye ma dang / tsha ba gsum dang / yung rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang mar dang / kha ra dang sbyar te zos na/ mig ser tshabs chen</text></item>
<item><p>242a.1</p><section></section><text>po yang myur du sel to/ /pi pi ling dang / pi pi ling chen po dang / pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang / kru trug tres dang / la la phud dang / na le sham dang / rgyam tsha dang / byi dang ga dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / 'u su'i 'bras</text></item>
<item><p>242a.2</p><section></section><text>bu dang / rgya shug gi 'bras bu dang / go snyod dang / nu shing gi 'bras bu rnams kyi phye ma srang re re dang / shing nye rong gi phye ma dang / til mar srang brgyad brgya dang / skyu ru ra'i khu ba srang dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / bu ram srang lnga bcu dang 'di rnams lhan</text></item>
<item><p>242a.3</p><section></section><text>cig tu skol ba'i ming ni/ sman gyi lde gu dge ba zhes bya ste/ 'di las ran par zos na yang / skya rbab dang / mig ser dang / gzhang 'brum dang sbyar ba'i dug rnams sel cing / gcin nad dang / mdze dang / rims dang / dbugs mi</text></item>
<item><p>242a.4</p><section></section><text>bde ba dang / pho ba'i nad rnams med par byed la sman bcud kyi len du yang 'gyur ro/ /mig ser gyis nyam thag pa ni/ sman dron pu shi ba'i khu ba'i mig bzang ngo / /yang na yung dang / btsag dang / skyu ru ra'i phye ma zhib mo sbyar bas kyang bsku bar bya'o/ /</text></item>
<item><p>242a.5</p><section></section><text>yang skran ka rko ta ka'i rtsa ba'i phye ma'am/ dza li na'i 'bras bu'i phye ma snar blugs so/ /yang na mig ser gyis nyam thag pa la/ e raN dang / pi pi ling gi phye sbyar ba snar blugs so/ /nad ljang gu kha zhes bya ba ni/ rlung dang mkhris pa las 'byung ste/</text></item>
<item><p>242a.6</p><section></section><text>de'i mtshan ma ni/ lus kyi mdog ljang gu khar 'dug pa dang / sngo sangs dang / ser ba dang / rims kyis 'debs pa dang / skom dad che ba dang / me'i drod chung bar byed cing sgyid lug pa dang snyom pa rnams yin te skya rbab kyi nad yod pa la 'byung ngo / /</text></item>
<item><p>242a.7</p><section></section><text>de ni kha zas dang / skom mngar bag dang / rlung dang mkhris pa sel ba'i sman rnams kyis thub par 'gyur te/ mig ser dang / skya rbab kyi nad kyi cho gar bstan pa bzhin du/ nad ldang khu kha 'di la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /skya rbab kyi nad gso ba'i le'u ste</text></item>
<item><p>242b.1</p><section></section><text>bcu bzhi pa rdzogs so// //de nas skyigs bu'i nad dang / dbugs mi bde ba'i nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ skyigs bu dang / dbugs mi bde ba la ni/ rlung dang mkhris pa'i nad las 'das te/ bad kan gyi rjes su 'brang</text></item>
<item><p>242b.2</p><section></section><text>bar 'gyur ba las/ skyigs bu dang / dbugs mi bde ba drag po skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de gnyis re re la yang rnam pa lnga lnga yod do/ /de la skyigs bu'i nad rnam pa lnga ni/ skyigs bu chen po zhes bya ba/ sgra che zhing shugs drag la gnad la gnod pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>242b.3</p><section></section><text>skyigs bu'i nad zab mo zhes bya ba/ lte ba'i phyogs nas ldang zhing sgra zab tu 'byung ba dang / skyigs bu'i nad btud ma zhes bya ba/ skyigs bu gnyis gnyis btud cing shugs drag tu 'byung la mi bzad par na zhing mgo 'dam par byed pa dang / skyigs</text></item>
<item><p>242b.4</p><section></section><text>bu chung ngu zhes bya ba shugs dal la/ brang dang / nam tshong nas ldang zhing 'byung ba dang / skyigs bu zas las 'byung ba zhes bya ba/ ha cang mang du zos zhing 'thungs pas rlung gi gnas dog par gyur pa las 'byung ba rnams yin te/ 'di rnams kyi nad ni</text></item>
<item><p>242b.5</p><section></section><text>skyigs bu chung ngu dang / zas las 'byung ba zhes bya ba gnyis ni gso sla ba yin no/ /lhag ma rnams ni srog gcod par bshad do/ /dbugs mi bde ba rnam pa lnga la/ sgra chen po zhes bya ba/ dbugs che zhing ran pa dang / snying dang / lta ba</text></item>
<item><p>242b.6</p><section></section><text>rnams log par bsgyur zhing / snga ma pa zhes bya ba gyen du lta zhing / dbugs drag tu 'byung la/ myos par byed cing snying dang rtsib logs su zug pa dang / skabs su 'chad pa zhes bya ba/ dbugs skabs skabs su 'chad cing / drag tu 'byung</text></item>
<item><p>242b.7</p><section></section><text>ba gang yin pa dang / rmugs byed ces bya ba/ cham pa drag pos 'debs shing snying myos la/ nam langs pa'i tshe lhag par tshabs che bar 'gyur ba dang / dbugs chung ngu zhes bya ba mi dga' ba las 'byung la dal zhing gnod pa mi byed pa rnams yin te/ de</text></item>
<item><p>243a.1</p><section></section><text>dag gi nad ni dbugs chung ngu zhes bya ba gso sla ba yin no/ /rmugs byed ces bya ba ni/ kha zas dang / sman gyis sos tsam du 'jog nus so/ /lhag ma rnams ni 'chi bar byed pa yin te spang bar bya'o/ /de la skyigs bu'i nad</text></item>
<item><p>243a.2</p><section></section><text>dang/ dbugs mi bde ba'i nad kyis thebs pa la ni/ dang por til mar gyis lus bsku ba dang dugs byas na bzang ngo / /nyams stobs yod pa la ni gyen du skyugs pa dang thur du bkru bas sbyang bar bya'o/ /rid cing nyam chung ba la ni zhi bar bya ba'i sman/</text></item>
<item><p>243a.3</p><section></section><text>rgya shug gi tshig gu dang / skyer khaN+Da dang / 'bras yos rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / pu tse shel dang btsag lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / pi pi ling dang / skyu ru ra dang / kha ra dang / bca' sga</text></item>
<item><p>243a.4</p><section></section><text>rnams lhan cig sbyar ba dang / nag mtshur dang / pog dkar po lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang shing pa Ta la'i 'bras bu dang me tog lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / pi pi ling dang / 'bra go'i yal ga'i thor to dang lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / sman gyi sbyor ba rnam pa drug</text></item>
<item><p>243a.5</p><section></section><text>po 'di rnams las gang yang rung ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar la sman gyi lde gur byas te zos na/ skyigs bu'i nad sel to/ /shing mngar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba dang / pi pi ling kha ra dang sbyar ba dang / bca' sga bu ram dang sbyar ba 'di gsum las gang yang</text></item>
<item><p>243a.6</p><section></section><text>rung ba snar blugs na yang skyigs bu'i nad sel to/ /sbrang ma'i rtug pa bud med kyi nu zho 'am/ le brgan rtsi'i khu ba gang yang rung ba dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na tsan dan dkar po bud med kyi nu zho las brdar te/ snar blugs na yang skyigs bu'i nad</text></item>
<item><p>243a.7</p><section></section><text>sel to/ /yang na skyigs bu'i nad zhi bar bya ba la/ ldong ros dang / ba lang gi rwa dang / ru rta dang / sra rtsi pog dang / rtswa ku sha rnams las gang yang rung ba mar dang sbyar te/ snod kha sbyar gyi nang du bsregs la/ 'u'i nang nas dud pa drang zhing / kha snar</text></item>
<item><p>243b.1</p><section></section><text>brngubs na yang skyigs bu'i nad sel to/ /mar bzang po srang gnyis bzhu ste tshos par byas la/ rgyam tsha srang gcig dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba mar bzang po bzhus te tshos par byas pa'i nang du btab pa 'thungs na yang skyigs bu'i nad</text></item>
<item><p>243b.2</p><section></section><text>kyis nyam thag pa sel to/ /dbugs mi bde ba'i nad gso ba'i cho ga ni/ byi tsher dang / pi pi ling dang / rgun dang / bu bran shing dang / a ru ra rnams zhib tu btags la/ sbrang rtsi dang mar sbyar te zos na/ dbugs mi bde ba dang / lud pa dang rlung nad rmugs</text></item>
<item><p>243b.3</p><section></section><text>byed rnams sel to/ /bu ram dang / na le sham dang / yung dang rla rna dang / rgun dang pi pi ling rnams btags la til mar dang sbyar te zos na yang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad drag po sel to/ /yang na sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang ga bra'i rtsa ba dang / shing mngar</text></item>
<item><p>243b.4</p><section></section><text>gyi phye ma sbyar te bza' bar bya'o/ /a ru ra dang / rtsa mkhris dang / pi pi ling dang / byi tsher rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi mar dang sbyar te zos na yang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad sel to/ /shing ram b+ha dang / kun+da dang / shi ri rnams kyi me tog dang / pi pi ling rnams</text></item>
<item><p>243b.5</p><section></section><text>btags la/ 'bras bkrus pa'i chu dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad sel to/ /yang na skyigs bu'i nad dang / dbugs mi bde ba'i nad la ga bra'i rtsa ba dang / bca' sga'i phye ma chu skol ba dron mo dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o/ /yang na bca' sga dang /</text></item>
<item><p>243b.6</p><section></section><text>kha ra dang ga bra'i rtsa ba dang / kha ru tsha rnams kyi phye ma chu skol ba dron mo dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o/ /yang na shing tsha dang / sug smel dang / za la ka dang li zur ba dang / bca' sga dang / dzi ban+di dang / ma nu dang / dz+ha ta dang / bca' ba dang / a ga ru dang / pi pi</text></item>
<item><p>243b.7</p><section></section><text>ling dang / gla sgang dang / byi 'u rug pa dang / spang spos rnams cha mnyam ste btags pa'i phye ma dang kha ra sman de rnams spyir bsdoms pa'i brgyad 'gyur dang sbyar ba'i phye ma'i sman 'di zos na/ skyigs bu'i nad dang / dbugs mi bde ba'i nad sel zhing / lud</text></item>
<item><p>244a.1</p><section></section><text>pa dang / rims dang / snying na ba dang / rtsib logs su zug pa rnams med par byed do/ /rma bya'i rkang pa 'am sgro'i rtsa ba gang yang rung ba bsregs pa'i thal ba/ mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na byi thur gyi sha bsregs</text></item>
<item><p>244a.2</p><section></section><text>la/ mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te zos na yang skyigs bu'i nad dang / dbugs mi bde ba'i nad sel to/ /skyigs bu'i nad dang / dbugs mi bde ba'i nad kyis shin tu nyam thag pa'i skom du ni rtsa ba bcu pa skol ba'i khu ba 'am/ thang shing skol ba'i khu ba</text></item>
<item><p>244a.3</p><section></section><text>'am/ chad rnams las ran par 'thung bar bya'o/ /skyigs bu'i nad dang / dbugs mi bde ba'i nad yod pa la/ sman pas tshabs che chung la sogs pa'i bye brag shin tu phyed par bya ste/ bad kan dang rlung sel ba'i kha zas dang btung ba'i cho ga sbyin par</text></item>
<item><p>244a.4</p><section></section><text>bya'o/ /skyigs bu'i nad dang / dbugs mi bde ba'i nad gso ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa rdzogs so// //de nas lud pa'i nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ lud pa ni nad gzhi gsum re re las gyur pa dang / glo 'grams pa las gyur</text></item>
<item><p>244a.5</p><section></section><text>pa dang / nad khong skems las gyur pa dang rnam pa lnga yod de/ de dag kyang rlung rnam pa lnga po/ dbugs rgyu bar byed pa zhes bya ba dang / ngag 'byung bar byed pa dang / legs par 'jog pa dang / skyod pa dang / dri ma 'byin pa zhes bya ba rnams</text></item>
<item><p>244a.6</p><section></section><text>'khrugs pa las 'byung ste/ snying ga dang / brang dang / phrag pa dang / lkog ma la sogs pa nad 'dru zhing / rko ba ni lud pa zhes bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa'i mtshan ma ni/ snying na ba dang / klad pa na ba dang / rtsib logs su zug pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>244a.7</p><section></section><text>lud pa skam zhing 'gogs su mi btub pa dang / skad 'gags pa rnams yin par bshad do/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/ skom dad che ba dang / lus tsha ba dang / khar tshwa bro ba dang / skyugs pa'i ro tsha zhing mdog ser la tsha ba rnams yin no/ /</text></item>
<item><p>244b.1</p><section></section><text>bad kan las gyur pa'i lud pa'i mtshan ma ni/ lus lci zhing mchil ma mang du 'ong ba dang / cham pas 'debs shing yi ga 'chus pa rnams yin no/ /glo 'grams pa las gyur pa'i lud pa'i mtshan ma ni/ lud pa khrag tu 'ong ba dang / ru shing na ba dang / dbugs</text></item>
<item><p>244b.2</p><section></section><text>mi bde ba dang / glo las rnag 'byung ba rnams yin no/ /nad khong skems las gyur pa'i lud pa'i mtshan ma ni/ lud pa khrag dang rnag tu 'byung zhing / nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las byung ba yin no/ /de rnams kyi nang na glo 'grams pa las gyur pa'i lud pa ni kha zas dang</text></item>
<item><p>244b.3</p><section></section><text>sman la sogs pas sos tsam du 'jog nus so/ /nad khong skems las gyur pa'i lud pa ni mi 'tsho'o/ /lhag ma gsum po rnams ni gsor rung ngo / /de la gso ba'i cho ga ni/ bca' sga dang / byi tsher dang / bu bran shing dang / rgun dang li zur ba dang /</text></item>
<item><p>244b.4</p><section></section><text>kha ra rnams btags pa'i phye ma/ til mar dang sbyar te zos na/ rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa mi bzad pa sel to/ /li zur ba dang / bu bran shing dang / pi pi ling dang / ga bra'i rtsa ba dang / gla sgang dang / byi tsher rnams kyi phye ma bu ram dang til mar dang</text></item>
<item><p>244b.5</p><section></section><text>sbyar ba'i sman gyi lde gu 'di'i ming ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ste/ rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa sel to/ /kon ti dang / rgyam tsha dang / tsha ba gsum dang / byi dang ga dang / ru rta dang / shing kun rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i sman gyi lde gu</text></item>
<item><p>244b.6</p><section></section><text>'di ni lud pa'i nad dang / skyigs bu'i nad la bsngags pa yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i lud pa'i nad yod pa la ni/ pi pi ling dang / kha ra dang / smyig rkang dang / 'bras yos dang / skyu ru ra dang rgun rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /</text></item>
<item><p>244b.7</p><section></section><text>shing mngar dang / pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang / murba dang / rgun dang / bca' sga rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / pi pi ling dang / 'bra go dang / smyig rkang dang / gze ma rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / sman gyi sbyor ba 'di gsum las gang yang</text></item>
<item><p>245a.1</p><section></section><text>rung ba/ mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang sbyar la sman gyi lde gur bya ste bza' bar bya'o/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i lud pa'i nad yod pa la ni/ gla sgang chen po dang / a ru ra dang / skyu ru ra dang / pi pi ling dang / ta malka</text></item>
<item><p>245a.2</p><section></section><text>rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / a ru ra dang / pi pi ling dang / gla sgang dang / thang shing dang bca' sga rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / kru trug tres dang / pi pi ling dang / pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang / pi pi ling chen po rnams kyi</text></item>
<item><p>245a.3</p><section></section><text>phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / sman gyi sbyor ba rnam pa 'di gsum las gang yang rung ba/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar la sman gyi lde gur byas te zos na bad kan las gyur pa'i lud pa'i nad sel bar rig par bya'o/ /btsod dang / skyer khaN+Da dang murba dang /</text></item>
<item><p>245a.4</p><section></section><text>kru trug tres dang / pA thA dang / pi pi ling dang / yung rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi shas bskyed de sbyar ba zos na glo 'grams pa las gyur pa dang / nad khong skems pa las gyur pa'i lud pa'i nad sel to/ /thang shing dang ba la dang / ra sna dang 'bras bu gsum</text></item>
<item><p>245a.5</p><section></section><text>dang/ rtsa ba gsum dang / shug pa dang / byi dang ga rnams kyi phye ma kha ra sman de rnams spyir bsdoms pa'i tshad dang mnyam par sbyar ba'i phye ma'i sman 'dis ni/ lud pa'i nad rnam pa lnga char sel to/ /a gas sti zhes bya ba'i sman gyi lde gu sbyar ba'i</text></item>
<item><p>245a.6</p><section></section><text>thabs ni/ sman shang ka pu shi ba dang / srad ma at+ma gup+ta dang / kru trug tres dang / rtsa ba bcu dang / li zur ba dang / ba la dang / rgya shug gi 'bras bu dang / ga bra'i rtsa ba dang / shing a pa marga dang / pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang / ma nu rnams las srang gnyis</text></item>
<item><p>245a.7</p><section></section><text>dang/ a ru ra 'bru brgya dang / nas phul bu bcu drug dang / 'di rnams lhan cig tu chu nas kyi lnga 'gyur gyi nang du bskol la/ nas legs par tshos nas phyung ste btsags pa'i khu ba'i nang du/ a ru ra de rnams bu ram srang brgya dang mar srang brgyad dang / til mar</text></item>
<item><p>245b.1</p><section></section><text>srang brgyad dang / pi pi ling gi phye ma srang brgyad dang / lhan cig tu me mi che bar yang bskol te/ nur nur po skya bas drang du rung ba tsam du gyur pa phyung ste bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi srang brgyad blugs te sbyar ba'i sman bcud kyi len 'di las nang re bzhin a ru ra</text></item>
<item><p>245b.2</p><section></section><text>'bru gnyis gnyis/ sman gyi lde gu dang bcas te zos na lud pa'i nad thams cad dang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad dang nad khong skems rnams sel cing pho ba'i nad dang yi ga 'chus pa dang / skyigs bu'i nad dang / gzhang 'brum dang / rims dang / snying</text></item>
<item><p>245b.3</p><section></section><text>na ba dang / skrangs pa rnams sel te/ kaN+Da ka ri skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du/ ra sna dang / ba la dang / tsha ba gsum dang / gze ma rnams kyi phye ma mar dang lhan cig tu bskol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa las ran par 'thungs na yang</text></item>
<item><p>245b.4</p><section></section><text>lud pa'i nad rnam pa lnga char sel to/ /ldong ros dang / ba la dang / a ku ta dang / shing mngar dang / gla sgang dang / spang spos rnams bsregs pa'i dud pa kha snar bdug cing / de'i rjes la bu ram dang 'o ma sbyar ba 'thungs te/ thabs de ltar zhag gsum gyi bar</text></item>
<item><p>245b.5</p><section></section><text>du byas na yang lud pa'i nad thams cad sel to/ /lud pa'i nad gso ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa rdzogs so// //de nas skyug pa'i nad dang skom pa'i nad gso ba bshad par bya ste/ de la skyug pa'i nad ni nad gzhi gsum 'khrugs</text></item>
<item><p>245b.6</p><section></section><text>pa re re las gyur pa dang / gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / mi sdug cing yid du mi 'ong ba dang / rul zhing myags pa la sogs pa mthong ba dang reg pa dang / snom pa dang gtam thos pa dang / bsams pa rnams las gyur pa dang / rnam pa</text></item>
<item><p>245b.7</p><section></section><text>lnga yod de/ de dag gi mtshan ma bstan par bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i skyug pa'i mtshan ma ni/ skyugs pa'i ro bska zhing dang la mdog gnag pa dang / dbu ba can dang / shugs drag cing na ba rnams yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mtshan</text></item>
<item><p>246a.1</p><section></section><text>ma ni/ skyug pa tsha zhing ser ba dang / dmar ba dang ljang gur 'dug la lus tsha ba rnams yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/ skyug pa 'byil zhing ro mngar la grang zhing bska ba rnams yin no/ /kun 'dus pa las gyur</text></item>
<item><p>246a.2</p><section></section><text>pa'i mtshan ma ni/ mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan par shes par bya'o/ /mi sdug cing yid du mi 'ong ba las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/ dul ba dang / mi sdug pa dang / sems gdungs pa la sogs pa thog ma bskyed pa'i rgyur smos pa de dag nyid</text></item>
<item><p>246a.3</p><section></section><text>las rtogs par bya'o/ /de la skyug pa khrag dang bcas par 'byung zhing / zhag tshig tshig po yod la sha zad de nyam chung ba dang / nad bla gnyan gzhan gyis kyang thebs pa ni mi 'tsho ste spang bar bya'o/ /skyug nad thams cad ni ma zhu</text></item>
<item><p>246a.4</p><section></section><text>ba'i gnas pho ba las 'byung bas na/ rlung las gyur pa'i skyug pa ma gtogs par dang por smyung ba'i cho ga byas la des ma zhi na phyis bkru sman btang ngo / /rlung las gyur pa la ni dang por de dang 'phrod pa'i sman gyis zhi bar bya'o/ /de la bkru</text></item>
<item><p>246a.5</p><section></section><text>sman ni a ru ra'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te lde gur byas pa'am/ yang na bkru sman zhim zhing yi gar 'ong ba gzhan yang gtang bar bya'o/ nyams stobs yod pa la ni/ skyug sman dang bkru sman bya'o/ /rid cing nyam chung ba la ni zhi bar bya ba'i sman</text></item>
<item><p>246a.6</p><section></section><text>gtang bar bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i skyug pa'i nad zhi bar bya ba'i cho ga ni/ /rgyam tshwa dang mar sbyar ba btung ba 'am/ yang na rgyam tsha dang / kha ru tsha dang / rtsabs ru tsha ba dang / tsha ba gsum dang / 'di rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbyar</text></item>
<item><p>246a.7</p><section></section><text>te btung bar bya'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skyug pa'i nad zhi bar bya ba la ni/ ba la dang / btsag gi phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar ba'am/ pu shel tse'i phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i phye ma dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na pu shel tse'i phye skyu</text></item>
<item><p>246b.1</p><section></section><text>ru ra'i khu ba grang mo dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i skyug pa'i nad yod pa la ni/ byi dang ga dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / nim+ba rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na byi dang ga dang gla ba dang bca' sga rnams kyi phye ma</text></item>
<item><p>246b.2</p><section></section><text>sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te bza' bar bya'o/ /shi ra phi la dang / sle tres dang / murba rnams las gang yang rung ba skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na murba'i phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na/ rlung las gyur</text></item>
<item><p>246b.3</p><section></section><text>pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams kyi skyug pa'i nad sel to/ /pi pi ling dang / na le sham dang / ldong ros rnams kyi phye ma dang / de rnams spyir bsdoms pa'i tshad dang mnyam pa'i 'bras yos kyi phye ma</text></item>
<item><p>246b.4</p><section></section><text>dang/ sbrang rtsi rnams ka pit+tha'i 'bras bu dang / kha lung gi 'bras bu skol ba'i khu ba grang mo'i nang du blugs te 'thungs na yang skyug pa'i nad sel to/ /rgya shug gi tshig gu dang / pi pi ling dang / skyu ru ra rnams kyi phye ma dang lhan cig tu</text></item>
<item><p>246b.5</p><section></section><text>sbyar ba dang / 'bras yos dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / bca' sga rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / rtsa sh+ya ma ka dang / skyer khaN+Da dang / gla sgang dang / rgya shug gi rus pa rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / sbrang ma'i rtug pa</text></item>
<item><p>246b.6</p><section></section><text>dang/ kha ra dang / pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / pi pi ling dang / na le sham dang / ka pit+tha dang / ba la rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / shing tsha dang / sug smel dang / gan+d+ha pa tra rnams kyi phye ma</text></item>
