<item><p>246b.7</p><section></section><text>lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / sman gyi sbyor ba rnam pa drug po 'di rnams las gang yang rung ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/ sman gyi lde gur byas pa zos na yang skyug pa'i nad sel to/ /skyug pa'i nad ring du lon pa la ni dge ba zhes bya ba'i sman mar dang / 'o ma'i</text></item>
<item><p>247a.1</p><section></section><text>sman dang ro tsa bar byed pa'i sman dang / sha'i khu bcud la sogs pa rlung sel ba'i cho ga rnams bya'o/ /skom pa'i nad kyang / nad gzhi gsum so so las gyur pa dang / zas ma zhu ba las gyur pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>247a.2</p><section></section><text>glo 'grams nas nad khong skems su gyur pa las 'byung ba dang rnam pa lnga yod de skom pa'i nad do cog gi gzhi ni/ shas cher rlung dang mkhris pa gnyis yin pas na/ skom pa'i nad la thog mar de gnyis bsal ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /de la</text></item>
<item><p>247a.3</p><section></section><text>skem pa'i nad yod pa'i skom du ni sbrang rtsi char pa'i chu dang sbyar ba 'am/ de ma rnyed na chu tha mal pa dang sbyar ba btung bar bya'o/ /yang na bong pa bsregs pa chur bcug pa'i khu ba 'bras brngos pa'i phye dang sbrang rtsi kha ra dang sbyar</text></item>
<item><p>247a.4</p><section></section><text>ba btung bar bya'o/ /yang na kha ra dang / nA ga ge sar dang / pi pi ling dang / ba be dang / bal po se'u rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i sman gyi lde gu'am pi pi ling dang / shing 'o ma can gyi myu gu sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i sman gyi lde gu</text></item>
<item><p>247a.5</p><section></section><text>gang yang rung ba la zos na yang skom pa'i nad sel bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na shing ba ta'i yal ga'i thor to dang / ru rta dang / 'bras brngos pa'i phye dang / ut+pal sngon po dang / 'bras bu gsum rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar</text></item>
<item><p>247a.6</p><section></section><text>pa'i ri lu khar bzhag na yang skom pa'i nad myur du sel to/ /rgun dang bu ram shing gi khu ba dang / 'o ma dang / sbrang rtsi rnams kyi nang du shing mngar dang / ut+pa la'i phye ma blugs te 'thungs na yang skom pa'i nad gdon mi za bar byed do/ /</text></item>
<item><p>247a.7</p><section></section><text>'o ma dang / bu ram shing gi khu ba dang / rgun chang dang / bu ram chang dang / bu ram chab dang / sbrang chab dang / star bu'i khu ba dang / rtsabs skyur po rnams gang yang rung ba/ khar yun ring du bzhag cing / phyir pho na yang rkan</text></item>
<item><p>247b.1</p><section></section><text>skams pa sel par byed do/ /skyug pa'i nad dang / skom pa'i nad gso ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa rdzogs so// //bam po lnga pa'o/ /de nas gcin sri pa'i nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /gcin sri ba la sogs</text></item>
<item><p>247b.2</p><section></section><text>pa'i nad na/ kha zas la sogs pa shin tu rno ba za zhing 'thung ba dang / shin tu mang bar za zhing 'thungs pa'i gnod pa las gcin sri ba'i nad rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur te/ de la rlung las gyur pa'i gcin sri ba'i nad ni shin tu mi bzad par na ba yin no/ /</text></item>
<item><p>247b.3</p><section></section><text>mkhris pa las gyur pa ni gcin nyid tsha rab tu 'ong ba yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa ni chu so'i phyogs lci ba bem por 'dug cing skrangs pa yin no/ /nad gzhi 'dus pa las gyur pa ni ma rungs pa yin no/ /khrag nad las gyur pa ni gcin khrag</text></item>
<item><p>247b.4</p><section></section><text>rtsa 'ong ba yin no/ /khu chu las gyur pa ni khu chu 'gags pa las 'byung ba yin no/ /gcin rde'us 'gags pa ni rlung gis khu chu dang bad kan bsgangs nas rdo 'dra bar gyur pa yin no/ /gcin bstus pa ni chu so lgang pa'i kha mi bzad par na zhing rde'u</text></item>
<item><p>247b.5</p><section></section><text>zhig pas gcin 'gags par gyur pa yin par bshad do/ /de dag gso ba'i thabs ni sman mar dang / til mar gyis lus bsku ba dang / sman mar btung ba dang / dugs bya ba dang / bkru sman drag po mas btang zhing / de'i rjes</text></item>
<item><p>247b.6</p><section></section><text>la 'jam rtsi mas gtang ba rnams bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i gcin sri ba la ni/ rtswa ku sha la sogs pa'i sde tshan nam/ sman ti ri la sogs pa'i sde tshan gang yang rung ba skol ba'i khu bas btsos pa'i sha khu dang ldan par kha zas</text></item>
<item><p>247b.7</p><section></section><text>bza' 'o/ /mkhris pa dang / khrag nad las gyur pa la ni/ skyu ru ra skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du skyer pa'i rtsa ba'i phye ma dang sbrang rtsi blugs pa'am/ yang na e la ba lu ka'i sa bon dang / shing mngar dang / skyer pa rnams kyi phye ma</text></item>
<item><p>248a.1</p><section></section><text>'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba'i nang du btab pa btung bar bya'o/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i gcin sri ba zhi bar bya ba la ni/ sug smel zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma/ ba gcin dang / chang dang / chu shing gi khu ba btsir ba</text></item>
<item><p>248a.2</p><section></section><text>rnams las gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o/ /khu chu 'gags pa las gcin sri bar gyur pa la ni/ brag zhun sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i sman gyi lde gu bza' bar bya'o/ /yang na ro tsa bar bya ba'i sman gyis lus zungs bdun brtas la/ na</text></item>
<item><p>248a.3</p><section></section><text>chung bzang mo dang nyal po bya'o/ /gcin sri ba'i nad rnams la/ le brgan rtsi'i sa bon btags pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang / 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na brag zhun dang / sru sru dang / pi pi ling dang / sug smel</text></item>
<item><p>248a.4</p><section></section><text>rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang / 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o/ /rgun dang / kha ra'i phye ma zho kha chu dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na 'o ma skol ba dron mo bu ram dang sbyar ba las ji tsam nus pa 'thungs na yang gcin sri ba'i</text></item>
<item><p>248a.5</p><section></section><text>nad sel to/ kha ra dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang sbyar te zos na yang gcin sri ba'i sna grangs thams cad sel to/ /shi kru'i rtsa ba skol ba'i khu ba'am/ yang na sman ro tsha zhing drod che ba'i bag gang ci yang rung ba zos shing 'thungs</text></item>
<item><p>248a.6</p><section></section><text>na rde 'us 'gags pa sel bar byed do/ /gze ma dang / e raN+Da dang / ha re nu ka dang / sug smel dang / shing mngar dang / pi pi ling dang / sru sru'i rtsa ba rnams skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du brag zhun gyi phye ma btab ste 'thungs</text></item>
<item><p>248a.7</p><section></section><text>na yang / gcin bstus pa dang rde 'us 'gags pa myur du sel to/ /sman ka ta bang ka'i rtsa ba btags pa'i phye ma chang la sogs pa dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang rde 'us 'gags pa sel to/ /sman pa ru na'i rtsa ba'i shun lpags skol ba'i khu ba</text></item>
<item><p>248b.1</p><section></section><text>btsags pa'i nang du de nyid kyi phye ma btab ste sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na bca' sga dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang / a ru ra dang / ka li ya ga rnams kyi phye ma zho kha chu dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang rde 'us 'gags</text></item>
<item><p>248b.2</p><section></section><text>pa'i nad shin tu drag po yang myur du sel to/ /yang na sman bi ra ta ra la sogs pa'i sde tshan gyi sbyor ba'i thabs kyi rnam pa thams cad kyang sbyar bar bya'o/ /cho ga de dag gis kyang zhi bar ma gyur na/ so shi brdo bar dam bcas la</text></item>
<item><p>248b.3</p><section></section><text>rde'u 'byin pa shes pas dral te 'byung bar bya'o/ /da ni pho mtshan gyi nad bshad par bya ste/ pho mtshan gyi nad ni/ sen mos snad pa dang / sos zin pa dang / drag shul las rma byung ba dang / bud med mi gtsang ba dang nyal ba la sogs</text></item>
<item><p>248b.4</p><section></section><text>pa'i nad gzhi rnams las 'byung ngo / /de yang rnam pa lnga yod par bshad de/ rlung las gyur pa'i pho mtshan gyi nad ni/ pags pa 'gags shing na la/ yang grang ba dang / mdog sngo skyar 'dug cing rtsub pa yin no/ /mkhris</text></item>
<item><p>248b.5</p><section></section><text>pa las gyur pa ni tsha zhing mdog dmar ba yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa la ni g.ya' zhing mkhrang ba yin no/ /khrag nad las gyur pa la ni khrag 'dzag cing 'brum bu nag po 'byung la/ shin tu tsha ba yin no/ /nad gzhi gsum</text></item>
<item><p>248b.6</p><section></section><text>char 'dus pa las gyur pa ni/ mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/ /de rnams kyi nang na srin bu zhugs pa ni pho mtshan zhig par 'gyur ro/ /'di rnams la thog mar ni pho mtshan mar gyis bsku zhing dugs byas la/ pho mtshan</text></item>
<item><p>248b.7</p><section></section><text>gyi rked du gtar ka bya'o/ /yang na srin bu pad+ma 'jib tu gzhug pa dang / yang skyugs pa dang / thur du bkru ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /rlung las gyur pa'i pho mtshan gyi nad la ni/ dza puN+Da li ka dang shing mngar dang / sgron shing dang /</text></item>
<item><p>249a.1</p><section></section><text>a ga ru dang / thang shing dang / ra sna dang / ru rta dang / sman bri sh+tsi ba rnams lhan cig tu brdar te bsku ba dang / skol ba'i khu ba dron mos blug par bya'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i pho mtshan gyi nad</text></item>
<item><p>249a.2</p><section></section><text>la ni/ skyer khaN+Da dang / ut+pa la dang / btsod dang / pu shel tse dang / btsag dang / shing mngar dang / shug pa rnams kyi phye ma chu dang sbyar bas bsku'o/ /yang na 'o ma dang / chu grang mo rnams gang yang rung bas steng du</text></item>
<item><p>249a.3</p><section></section><text>blugs so/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i pho mtshan gyi nad la ni/ shing d+ha ba dang / tha rams dang / shing sA la rnams kyi phye ma chu dang sbyar bas bsku bar bya'o/ /yang na dong ga la sogs pa'i sde tshan skol ba'i khu ba blug na bzang ngo / /</text></item>
<item><p>249a.4</p><section></section><text>pho mtshan la rnag zhugs nas pho mtshan zad par byed pas na/ ci nas kyang rnag tu mi 'gyur bar sman gyis bsku ba dang / sman gyi khu ba la sogs pa steng du blugs pa rnams kyis bsgrims te bsrung bar bya'o/ /rnag 'jug pa lta na</text></item>
<item><p>249a.5</p><section></section><text>gtar ka myur te byas la/ rma gso ba'i cho ga bzhin du byas te/ me tog ku mu da dang / ut+pa la dang / ka la lha ra dang / pad+ma rnams kyi phye mas gdab po/ /yang na 'bras bu gsum mar dang lhan cig tu snod kha sbyar gyi nang du brngos</text></item>
<item><p>249a.6</p><section></section><text>pa'i tshig mas bsku bar bya'o/ /yang na skyer khaN+Da dang / shi ri sha'i phye ma dang sbyar ba'am/ a ru ra'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba gang yang rung bas bskus na pho mtshan gyi nad thams cad sel to/ /pho mtshan gyi nad 'dus pa</text></item>
<item><p>249a.7</p><section></section><text>las gyur pa dang / khrag nad las gyur pa gnyis ni so shi brdo bar dam bcas la/ nad gzhi rnams kyi shas che chung bye brag phyed par byas nas/ gang shas che ba dag gzhil ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /da ni rlig rlugs kyi nad bshad par bya ste/</text></item>
<item><p>249b.1</p><section></section><text>rlig rlugs kyi nad ni gzhi gsum gyis rlig pa'i 'bras bu dang / pags pa ma rung bar byas pa las/ rlig rlugs kyi nad rnam pa bdun 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs kyi nad ni rlig pa lgang ba rlung gis gang ba 'dra ba yin no/ /</text></item>
<item><p>249b.2</p><section></section><text>mkhris pa las gyur pa ni/ u dum bA ra'i shing thog 'dra bar dmar ba yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa ni mkhrang zhing zlum pa yin no/ /khrag nad las gyur pa ni mkhris pa'i mtshan ma dang 'dra'o/ /tshil rgyas pa'i nad du gyur pa ni che la 'jam mo/ /</text></item>
<item><p>249b.3</p><section></section><text>gcin las gyur pa ni rkyal pa gang ba bzhin du 'dug pa yin no/ /rgyu ma rlugs pa las gyur pa ni/ rlung gis rlig pa'i 'dab tu rgyu ma'i ltab ma mthar gyis phul nas rlig pa rkyal pa bus pa bzhin du ring por 'gyur ba yin te/ rlig rlugs kyi nad de ni mi</text></item>
<item><p>249b.4</p><section></section><text>'tsho'i/ de la rlung las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs kyi nad la ni/ sman mar btung zhing bsku ba dang / dugs kyis bdugs pa dang / sman gyi khu ba blugs pa dang / snum pa'i bkru sman btang ba dang / bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang / 'jam rtsi</text></item>
<item><p>249b.5</p><section></section><text>mas btang ba rnams bya bar bshad do/ /de la snum gyi bkru sman ni/ 'o ma dang / e raN+Da'i mar bskol te sbyar ba nyams stobs las dpags te btung bar bya'o/ /mkhris pa dang / khrag nad las gyur pa la ni/ srin bu pad pa rlig pa las khrag 'jib</text></item>
<item><p>249b.6</p><section></section><text>tu gzhug pa dang / sman bsil bas bsku zhing / sman gyi khu ba grang mos steng du blugs na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bad kan las gyur pa la ni/ sman drod che ba btags pa'i phye ma ba gcin dang sbyar ba srin pos bsku zhing skyer pa'i rtsa ba skol pa'i khu ba gcin dang</text></item>
<item><p>249b.7</p><section></section><text>sbyar ba btung bar bya'o/ /tshil rgyas pa las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs kyi nad la ni/ dugs bya ba dang / byi'u rug pa la sogs pa'i sde tshan zhib tu btags te chu dang sbyar bas bsku bar bya'o/ /gcin las gyur pa la ni/ dang por rlig pa dugs byas pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>250a.1</p><section></section><text>rjes la rlig pa'i 'og gi srubs nas brtol te re zhig rna rtsi mi sbyar bar gce 'us bsu zhing ring du 'dzag tu bzhug go/ /rgyu ma rlugs pa las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs da dung tshabs chen por gyur pa la ni/ bsreg pa dang / rlung sel ba'i</text></item>
<item><p>250a.2</p><section></section><text>sman rnams bya'o/ /bsreg gcig la ni bsregs pa'i 'og tu rna la cho ga ji ltar bya ba bzhin du bya'o/ /gcin sri ba'i nad sel ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa rdzogs so// //da nas rtug skam gyi nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rtug skam gyi nad</text></item>
<item><p>250a.3</p><section></section><text>ni/ dri ma 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i rlung long ka na gnas pa 'khrugs te shas che bar gyur pas phyi sa bskams nas thur du 'ong ba'i lam 'gags te gyen du 'khyil bar gyur pa ni rtug skam gyi nad bskyed par bshad do/ /de'i mtshan ma ni snying dang mkhal rked dang /</text></item>
<item><p>250a.4</p><section></section><text>rtsib logs na ba dang / lgang pa chu so skrangs pa dang / lto sbo ba dang / skad 'gag cing lkog nad lha gor du 'gyur ba dang / rims kyis 'debs shing skyugs pa dang / mig ldongs shing 'on par 'gyur ba dang / skom pa'i nad la sogs pa nad kyi sna grangs</text></item>
<item><p>250a.5</p><section></section><text>'di rnams skye bar 'gyur te/ rtug skam gyi nad yod pa la ni dang por lus skam gyis bsku zhing dril ba dang / dugs byas la sman gyi reng bus gzhug pa dang / bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang / sman mar btung ba dang / 'jam rtsi mas btang ba dang / bkru</text></item>
<item><p>250a.6</p><section></section><text>sman btang ba'i las rnams bya'o/ /de la sman reng bu mas btang ba'i cho ga ni po son cha dang / khyim gyi du ba dang / rtsabs ru tsha dang / tsha ba gsum dang / bu ram rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin gyi nang du/ khaN+Da tshos pa tsam du bskol te reng bu mthe bong tsam</text></item>
<item><p>250a.7</p><section></section><text>du byas nas mar gyis bskus te mas btang na phyi sa 'byung bar 'gyur la lto sbo zhing na ba yang sel to/ /yang na khyam gyi du ba dang / pi pi ling dang / po son cha dang / yungs kar dang / bu ram rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin gyi nang du khaN+Da tshos pa tsam bskol te snga ma</text></item>
<item><p>250b.1</p><section></section><text>bzhin du reng bur byas pa yang bzang ngo / /yang na shing kun dang / shu dag dang / ru rta dang / swa rtsi ka'i thal ba dang / rtsabs ru tsha rnams yas kyis rim bzhin du dang po'i cha gnyis kyis bskyed de btags la chu bskol ba dron po dang sbyar te 'thungs</text></item>
<item><p>250b.2</p><section></section><text>na yang lto sbo ba dang / zug cing na ba dang / snying na ba dang / skran rnams sel to/ /shing nye rong cha gnyis dang / pi pi ling cha bzhi dang / a ru ra cha lnga rnams btags te de rnams sbyar ba bsdoms pa'i tshad dang mnyam pa'i bu ram gyi nang du khaN+Da</text></item>
<item><p>250b.3</p><section></section><text>tshos pa tsam du bskol la ril lu byas pa des ni phyi sa 'gags pa'i nad sel bar byed do/ /kha zas su ni nas rjen pa khram khrom du btags pa'i chan 'o ma 'am sha khu dang ldan pa'am/ gzhan yang gang de dang 'phrod pa'i kha zas rnams bza' bar bya'o/ /</text></item>
<item><p>250b.4</p><section></section><text>ltar rlung gis g.yos nas phyi sa 'gags par 'gyur ba las mkhris pa dang bad kan bla gnyan du gyur pa la ni de gnyis la phan pa'i sman mas btang ba rnam gnyis bya'o/ /rlung las gyur pa'i phyi sa 'gags pa'i nad ni chu sor zug par byed do/ /</text></item>
<item><p>250b.5</p><section></section><text>mkhris pa las gyur pa ni lte ba'i phyogs tsha ba yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa ni snying na ba dang / dang ka mer mer po dang / kha nas chu 'byung bar byed do/ /nad gzhi gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin te</text></item>
<item><p>250b.6</p><section></section><text>spang bar bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i phyi sa 'gags pa'i nad la ni/ la la phud dang / shing kun dang / rgyam tshwa dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang / kha ru tshwa dang / a ru ra rnams kyi phye ma chang zhim po dang sbyar te 'thungs na sel bar</text></item>
<item><p>250b.7</p><section></section><text>byed do/ /yang na kha ru tsha dang shu dag dang / go snyod dang / na le sham rnams yas kyis rim bzhin du snga ma snga ma las nyis 'gyur du bskyed de btags pa'i phye ma kha lung gi khu ba dang sbyar te brdzis pa'i ril bu zos na yang rlung las gyur pa'i phyi sa 'gags pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>251a.1</p><section></section><text>nad sel to/ /yang na rlung las gyur pa'i phyi sa 'gags pa'i nad la/ tshwa dang / star bu dang / tsha ba gsum dang / la la phud dang / rgyam tsha dang / kha ru tsha dang / rtsabs ru tsha rnams kyi phye ma/ kha lung gi khu ba dang sbyar te ril lur</text></item>
<item><p>251a.2</p><section></section><text>byas pa bza' bar bya'o/ /ldum bu se yab dang / a ru ra dang / shing kun dang / ma nu dang / rgyam tsha dang / kha ru tsha dang / rtsabs ru tsha rnams kyi phye ma nas btsos pa'i khu ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang rlung las gyur pa'i phyi sa 'gags pa dang / skran dang /</text></item>
<item><p>251a.3</p><section></section><text>rlung nad/ rmugs byed rnams sel to/ /mkhris pa yas gyur pa'i phyi sa 'gags pa'i nad la ni/ skyu ru ra'i khu ba dang / bi da ri'i khu ba dang / khyi lce ba'i khu ba dang / rgun gyi khu ba rnams las gang yang rung ba kha ra dang sbyar te 'thungs na de ma thag tu sel to/ /yang</text></item>
<item><p>251a.4</p><section></section><text>na skyu ru ra'i phye ma dang / sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i 'bras brngos pa'i phye ma dang / kha ra sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba btung ngo / /bad kan las gyur pa'i phyi sa 'gags pa'i nad la ni/ shu dag dang / gla sgang dang / kru trug tres dang / a ru ra dang / pu tse shel rnams kyi</text></item>
<item><p>251a.5</p><section></section><text>phye ma ba gcin dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na bilba la sogs pa'i sde tshan skol ba'i khu ba dron mo nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal pa dang sbyar ba btung bar bya'o// //da ni snying na ba'i bye brag bshad par bya ste/ snying na ba la ni/ rlung la sogs pa nad gzhi gsum so so las</text></item>
<item><p>251a.6</p><section></section><text>gyur pa dang / kun 'dus pa las nad du gyur pa dang srin bu'i nyes pa las gyur pa dang rnam pa lnga yod de/ thams cad kyang zug cing na ba yin no/ /bye brag tu na srin bu las gyur pa ni/ snying g.ya' zhing na/ de la rlung las gyur pa'i snying na ba la ni/ tsang shu bsres</text></item>
<item><p>251a.7</p><section></section><text>pa'i nang du/ til mar dang rgyam tsha blugs te btung bar bya'o/ /yang na til mar skol ba ba gcin dang sbyar te 'thungs na/ skran dang / zug cing na ba dang / lto sbo ba yang sel to/ /yang na a ru ra'i 'brum bu lnga bcu'i phye ma dang / kha ru tsha srang gnyis/ mar</text></item>
<item><p>251b.1</p><section></section><text>srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa las ran par 'thungs na snying na ba dang dbugs mi bde ba dang skran rnams sel to/ /bca' sga dang / kha ru tsha dang / shing kun dang / bal bo se'u dang / star bu rnams kyi phye</text></item>
<item><p>251b.2</p><section></section><text>ma chu skol ba dron po dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang dbugs mi bde ba dang snying na ba sel to/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i snying na ba la ni/ sman bsil ba'i khu ba la sogs pas lus la blugs pa dang / sman bsil ba'i lde gus bsku ba dang / sman mngar nag gi</text></item>
<item><p>251b.3</p><section></section><text>bkru sman btang ngo / /yang na pu tse shel gyi phye ma 'am/ shing mngar gyi phye ma gang yang rung ba kha ra chu dang sbyar ba'i nang du blugs te btung ngo / /sman sti ra la sogs pa'i sde tshan btags pa'i phye ma/ mar dang / chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang / 'o ma dang /</text></item>
<item><p>251b.4</p><section></section><text>bu ram shing gi khu ba dang / rgun gyi khu ba gsum las gang yang rung ba mar gyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i nang du bskol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa las ran par 'thungs na yang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i snying na ba sel to/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>251b.5</p><section></section><text>snying na ba la ni/ pi pi ling dang / li zur ba dang / shu dag dang / ra sna dang / bca' sga dang / a ru ra dang / ma nu rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin bsres pa dang sbyar ba btung ngam/ yang na sman de dag nyid ba gcin dang bskol te bzhi cha lus pa btung bar</text></item>
<item><p>251b.6</p><section></section><text>bya'o/ /nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa'i snying na ba la ni/ thog mar smyung ba'i cho ga byas la de'i 'og tu nyams stobs dang sbyar zhing / rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan gang shas che ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /srin bu las gyur pa'i snying na ba la ni/</text></item>
<item><p>251b.7</p><section></section><text>byi dang ga dang / ru rta'i phye ma ba gcin dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o/ /rtug skam gso ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa rdzogs so// //de nas smyo byed dang / brjed byed kyi nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /de la smyo byed kyi nad ni gzhan gyis ngan</text></item>
<item><p>252a.1</p><section></section><text>du byas pa dang / zas dang skom mi gtsang ba zos shing 'thungs pa dang / 'jigs shing sngangs pa dang / mya ngan gyis gdungs nas/ yid dang blo dang / dran pa log cing 'khrug pa yin no/ /de yang rnam pa lnga yod par bshad de/</text></item>
<item><p>252a.2</p><section></section><text>de la rlung las gyur pa'i smyo byed kyi mtshan ma ni/ rang nyid la tsham rngam bya zhing rdeg pa dang / ngu ba dang / dgod pa dang / glu len pa rnams yin par shes par bya'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/ khro ba dang / bsal ba 'dod pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>252a.3</p><section></section><text>bsdigs pa dang / snyegs pa la sogs pa rnams yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/ gnyid che ba dang / smra ba nyung ba dang / 'ud med la dga' zhing snyeg pa dang / kha zas mi 'dod pa rnams yin no/ /kun 'dus pa las gyur pa ni mtshan ma thams cad</text></item>
<item><p>252a.4</p><section></section><text>dang ldan te/ ma rungs pa yin gyi spang bar bya'o/ /glo bur las gyur pa'i smyo byed ni/ lha la sogs pa'i gdon 'khrugs pas ngan du byas pa las gyur pa yin te/ mi ma yin pa'i shes pa dang / shes nyen dang / stobs dang / tshig dang / dpa'</text></item>
<item><p>252a.5</p><section></section><text>ba la sogs pa dang ldan par shes par bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i smyo byed kyi nad la ni/ thog mar sman mar btung bar bya'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa la ni/ thog mar bkru sman btang ngo / /bad kan las gyur pa la ni thog mar skyug sman</text></item>
<item><p>252a.6</p><section></section><text>btang ngo / /de ltar so so'i cho ga sngar bya ba rnams byas pa'i 'og tu 'jam rtsi mas btang ba dang / bkru sman drag po mas btang ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rim bzhin bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu yung dang / skyer pa dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / shing nye rong</text></item>
<item><p>252a.7</p><section></section><text>dang/ shu dag dang / yungs kar dang / shing kun dang / shi ri sha dang / kaT b+hi dang / shwe ta dang / btsod dang / tsha ba gsum dang / thang shing dang / ka rany+dza rnams kyi phye ma mar dang ba gcin gyi nang du bskol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags</text></item>
<item><p>252b.1</p><section></section><text>pa las ran par 'thungs na smyo byed kyi nad sel to/ /yang na sman de dag nyid kyi phye ma mar dang ra gcin gyi nang du bskol te mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'i ming ni sman gnod sel zhes bya ste/ 'di btung na brjed byed kyi nad dang dug sel bar byed do/ /sman pa</text></item>
<item><p>252b.2</p><section></section><text>tha dang / a ru ra dang / shig gru dang / shu dag dang / tsha ba gsum dang / rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma srang re re dang / mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis ra'i 'o ma'i nang du bskol te mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'i ming ni lce bde bar byed pa zhes bya ste 'di las ran par</text></item>
<item><p>252b.3</p><section></section><text>zos na/ dran pa gsal ba dang yid gzhungs par 'gyur zhing / 'on pa dang / dig pa dang / lkugs pa rnams kyang de'i mthus sel bar byed do/ /yang na shing mngar dang / shing kun dang / shu dag dang / rgya spos dang / shi ri sha dang / sgog skya dang / ru rta</text></item>
<item><p>252b.4</p><section></section><text>rnams ra gcin gyi nang du brdar te btsags pa'i khu ba snar blugs shing / mig tu bsku bar bya'o// //smyo byed kyis thebs pa la/ thog ma nas bcing ba dang / brdeg pa dang / gar yang mi btang bar bsrung zhing / thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsdigs</text></item>
<item><p>252b.5</p><section></section><text>la de'i 'og tu tshig 'jam pos gzhom par bya'o/ /glo bur las gyur pa'i smyo byed kyi nad kyis thebs pa la ni/ sman pa gtsang zhing re ba med pas mchod pa dang / gtor ma dang / bshos dang / mchod sbyin dang / sbyin sreg dang / sngags dang / mig tu</text></item>
<item><p>252b.6</p><section></section><text>bsku ba dang / snar blugs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bsal bar bya'o// //da ni brjed byed kyi bye brag bshad par bya ste/ brjed byed ni/ mun pa 'dra bas sems non nas nad gzhi shas cher 'khrugs pa las dran pa nyams shing khro bar gyur pa la</text></item>
<item><p>252b.7</p><section></section><text>brjed byed kyi nad ces bya'o/ /de yang rnam pa bzhi ste ma rungs pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa rnams kyi mtshan ma ni/ mdog gnag pa dang / ser ba dang / dkar ba rnams yin</text></item>
<item><p>253a.1</p><section></section><text>te go rim bzhin du sbyar ba dang / ci mthong ngo cog kyang de dag so so'i rnam pa mthong ba yin no/ /nad gzhi gsum car 'dus pa las gyur pa'i brjed byed kyi nad ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa ste/ gso dka' ba yin pas de dag</text></item>
<item><p>253a.2</p><section></section><text>la thog mar ni bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang / 'jam rtsi mas gtang ba dang / skyug sman btang ba dang / bkru sman btang ba dang / sman snar blugs pa dang / cho ga rnam pa lnga po 'di rnams nad gzhi ji lta ba bzhin du gtang bar bya'o/ /de la rlung las</text></item>
<item><p>253a.3</p><section></section><text>gyur pa la ni bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang / 'jam rtsi mas btang bar bya'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa la ni bkru sman btang ngo / /bad kan las gyur pa la ni skyug sman btang ngo / /sman snar blugs pa ni so so'i sman las sbyar na kun la yang</text></item>
<item><p>253a.4</p><section></section><text>phan no/ /kun 'dus pa las gyur pa la ni/ gang shas che ba dang yang sbyar zhing cho ga de rnams las gang 'os pa gtang bar bya'o/ /cho ga de dag gis lus rab tu dag par gyur nas/ de'i 'og tu ni smyo byed kyi nad bsal ba'i cho ga sngar bstan pa bzhin du</text></item>
<item><p>253a.5</p><section></section><text>bya'o/ /yang na sman shad ka pu shi pa dang / shu dag dang / ru rta rnams kyi phye ma sman bram m+hi khu ba dang / mar rnying pa lo du ma lon pa'i nang du skol la mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te ci ran par 'thungs na brjed byed dang / smyo byed can sel zhing yid gzhungs par</text></item>
<item><p>253a.6</p><section></section><text>byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /mar dang til mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang / 'o ma mar gyi bcu drug gi nang du 'tsho byed ces bya ba'i sman sna bco lngar bshad pa rnams kyi phye ma srang re re skol la mar dang til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te ran par 'thungs na</text></item>
<item><p>253a.7</p><section></section><text>yang brjed byed kyi nad sel to/ /shing kru dang / ru rta dang / ldong ros dang / go snyod dang / sgog skya dang / tsha ba gsum dang / shing kun rnams kyi phye mar gcin dang / til mar gyi nang du skol ba'i mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te snar blugs na yang</text></item>
<item><p>253b.1</p><section></section><text>brjed byed kyi nad sel to/ /smyo byed kyi nad dang / brjed byed kyi nad la/ chu dang / me dang / shing dang / brag la sogs pa gnas ngan pa rnams ni spang bar bya'o/ /sems gsal zhing yid gzhungs par 'gyur ba'i sman bcud kyis len ni</text></item>
<item><p>253b.2</p><section></section><text>bsgrims te rtag tu bza' bar bya'o/ /smyo byed dang / brjed byed kyi nad gso ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa rdzogs so// //de nas rlung nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rlung nad rnam pa brgyad cu ni/ rlung 'khrugs pa las 'byung ste/ de rnams spyi'i mtshan ma ni</text></item>
<item><p>253b.3</p><section></section><text>na ba dang / yan lag chag pa snyam byed pa dang / zug pa dang / yan lag 'khums pa dang / sha skam pa dang / drag tu btsir ba 'dra bar na ba rnams yin no/ /de la rlung nad dam po zhes bya ba ni rang dbang med par lus 'gul ba yin no/ /rlung nad sgur po gzhu 'khums</text></item>
<item><p>253b.4</p><section></section><text>bzhin du 'dug pa'o/ /rlung nad gzhogs phyed na ba zhes bya ba ni/ lus kyi gzhogs phyed ril gyis na bar byed pa'o/ /rlung nad lag pa ya gcig 'jes pa zhes bya ba ni/ rlung gis phrag pa'i rtsa 'khums par byas pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /rlung nad dpyi mig man</text></item>
<item><p>253b.5</p><section></section><text>chad zug pa'i nad ni/ brla man chad du na ste/ brkyang bskum mi nus shing / rting pa nas sor mo'i bar du na zhing 'gro mi shes par byas pa yin no/ /rlung nad kha yon zhes bya ba ni/ rlung gis kha phyogs gcig tu yo bar byas pa yin par bshad do/ /rlung nad pus mo skrangs</text></item>
<item><p>253b.6</p><section></section><text>ba zhes bya ba ni/ rlung dang khrag rgyas pas pus mo'i lha nga skrangs par byed pa yin no/ /de la sman mar gyis lus bsku ba dang / dugs bya ba dang / sman mas btang ba dang snar blugs pa dang / snum gyis bkru sman btang ba dang / kha zas snum pa dang / skyur ba dang /</text></item>
<item><p>253b.7</p><section></section><text>lan tshwa dang / mngar ba dang / ro tsa bar byed pa'i bag rnams ni rlung nad sel to/ /sman ba la dang / se ri ya gang yang rung ba skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du de nyid kyi phye ma/ til mar dang 'o ma lhan cig tu bskol la/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te 'thungs na/ rlung</text></item>
<item><p>254a.1</p><section></section><text>nad kyi sna grangs thams cad sel to/ /yang na/ til mar dang / 'o ma srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang / sman a shwa gan+d+ha srang lnga bcu skol ba'i khu ba mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du/ spang spos dang / shing tsa dang / gan+d+ha</text></item>
<item><p>254a.2</p><section></section><text>pa tra dang / btsod dang / tra ban+ti dang / byi'u rug pa dang / dzA ti dang / ba la dang / thang shing dang / sti ra dang / shing mngar dang / ra sna dang / sug smel dang / ma nu dang / shu dag dang / gze ma dang / ru rta dang / pu ti ka dang / shu ti dang / puD+Na Na ba dang /</text></item>
<item><p>254a.3</p><section></section><text>praM ha tI dang / pu shel tse dang / bi ra ri rnams btags pa'i phye ma zho gnyis gnyis lhan cig tu bskol te til mar 'ba' zhig lus pa btsags pa'i ming ni a shwa gan+da la sogs pa'i til mar zhes bya ste/ btung ba dang / lus bsku ba dang / snar blugs pa dang / mas</text></item>
<item><p>254a.4</p><section></section><text>btang ba rnam pa bzhi po dag tu sbyar na rlung nad thams cad sel to/ /til mar dang / la phug gi khu ba srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang / zho dang / rtsabs skyur po dang / 'o ma rnams las re re yang til mar gyi bzhi 'gyur bzhi 'gyur dang / 'di rnams kyi nang du/</text></item>
<item><p>254a.5</p><section></section><text>shu dag dang / ba la dang / ra sna dang / ma nu dang / bca' sga dang / kru trug tres dang / shi kru dang / rgyam tsha dang / gze ma dang / pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma skol la til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'i til mar gyi sman yang rlung nad kyis nyam thag pa thams cad sel</text></item>
<item><p>254a.6</p><section></section><text>ba yin no/ /til mar dang / 'o ma srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang / sman pra sa ra ni srang brgya skol ba'i khu ba til mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang / 'di rnams kyi nang du sman dzi ba ka dang / ri sha b+ha ka dang / me da rnam gnyis dang / bu tshad rtong dang / ra mnye dang / ru rta dang /</text></item>
<item><p>254a.7</p><section></section><text>tsan dan rnam gnyis dang / shu ti dang / thang shing dang / btsod dang / ra sna rnams kyi phye ma skol la til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa 'di las mas btang ba la sogs par sbyar na yang rlung sel to/ /til mar dang / 'o ma srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang /</text></item>
<item><p>254b.1</p><section></section><text>gze ma'i khu ba til mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bu ram dang / bca' sga'i phye ma srang brgyad brgyad lhan cig tu skol la til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te ran par 'thungs pa'i 'og tu 'o ma 'thungs la thur du 'khrus pa chod pa'i rjes la/ bca' sga dang bu ram sbyar ba zos nas sman</text></item>
<item><p>254b.2</p><section></section><text>snga ma btang ba dang / zhu bar gyur pa'i 'og tu kha zas 'o ma dang lhan cig tu zos na rlung nad mi bzad pa thams cad sel to/ /mar srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / sgog skya srang brgya skol ba'i khu ba mar gyi bzhi 'gyur rnams kyi nang du dbyi mo dang / kru trug tres dang / pi pi</text></item>
<item><p>254b.3</p><section></section><text>ling rnams kyi phye ma zho gnyis gnyis dang / bca' sga dang / shing kun dang / lan tshwa rnam lnga dang / 'di rnams las srang re re dang / star bu srang phyed dang / 'di rnams lhan cig tu skol la mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'i ming ni sgog skyal sogs pa'i sman mar zhes bya ste/</text></item>
<item><p>254b.4</p><section></section><text>'di las ran par 'thungs na rlung nad dang / rlung nad rkang zug ya gcig 'jas pa dang / rlung nad gzhogs phyed na ba dang / skran la sogs pa sel to/ /dbyi mong dang / kha ru tshwa dang / tsha ba gsum dang / shig gru dang / rgyam tshwa dang / 'u su'i 'bras bu rnams</text></item>
<item><p>254b.5</p><section></section><text>kyi phye ma zho gnyis gnyis dang / mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / la phug gi khu ba dang / sge'u gsher gyi khu ba dang / sha khu dang / tshwa dang / rtsabs skyur po dang / zhog chu dang / dar ba rnams las srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang / 'di rnams kyi nang du skol</text></item>
<item><p>254b.6</p><section></section><text>la mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa las ran par 'thungs na yang rlung nad sel to/ /rlung nyi tshe'i nad la ni/ snum rnam pa bzhi po/ zhag dang rkang dang / mar dang / til mar rnams kyi sman gtang bar bya'o/ /rlung yod pa'i steng du/ bad kan dang / mkhris pa'i bla gnyan gyis</text></item>
<item><p>254b.7</p><section></section><text>thebs pa la ni re zhig bla gnyen btsan par byas te de zhi bar bya ba'i cho ga je bya'o/ /de la bad kan la ni sman drod che zhing rno ba rnams btang ngo / /mkhris pa la ni sman mngar zhing bsil ba'i bag gtang bar bya'o/ /rlung nad rkang zug ya gcig 'jas pa dang / rlung nad pus</text></item>
<item><p>255a.1</p><section></section><text>mor skrangs ba la ni/ thog mar gtar te khrag phyung la/ de nas rlung nad sel ba'i cho ga thams cad bya'o/ /brla'i nad ni bad kan dang / tshil 'dug pa gnyis ldan pas rlung non te/ brla rings pa'i nad drag po bskyed pa'i nad kyi</text></item>
<item><p>255a.2</p><section></section><text>mtshan ma ni shin tu lci bar gyur cing sgyid lug pa yin te/ de la ni thog mar bad kan sel ba'i sman rtsub po cog gi cho ga byas la/ de'i 'og tu rlung bsal ba'i cho ga thams cad bya'o/ /dreg ni/ mi skyed de bar 'dug cing sdug ma myong ba las ngal ba la sogs pa drag</text></item>
<item><p>255a.3</p><section></section><text>shul gyi bag byas pas rlung dang khrag 'khrugs pa las 'byung ste/ thog ma ni rkang lag gi nang na gnas la phyi sa lus la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /de la rlung shas che ba'i dreg gi mtshan ma ni/ na ba dang / rus pa grum zhing 'gas pa dang / lus skem pa dang / rtsub pa</text></item>
<item><p>255a.4</p><section></section><text>dang/ mdog gnag pa rnams yin par bshad do/ /khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i dreg gi mtshan ma ni/ mdog dmar zhing skrangs pa dang / lhang lhang por na ba dang / chu ser 'dzag cing 'jig pa dang / na ba dang / lus tsha ba dang / mdog 'jam pa rnams</text></item>
<item><p>255a.5</p><section></section><text>yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i dreg gi mtshan ma ni/ cher mi na la/ lus g.ya' zhing rengs pa dang / cher skrangs pa rnams yin no/ /nad gzhi gnyis gnyis 'dus pa dang / gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa'i dreg gi mtshan ma ni/ mtshan ma gong du bstan</text></item>
<item><p>255a.6</p><section></section><text>pa rnams cha 'dres pa las rtogs par bya'o/ /dreg nad gzhi gcig las byung la/ gsar pa ni gso sla ba yin no/ /nad gzhi gnyis 'dus pa las byung ba/ lo gcig tshun chad lon pa ni/ kha zas dang sman gyis gso tsam du 'jog nus so/ /nad gzhi</text></item>
<item><p>255a.7</p><section></section><text>gsum char 'dus pa las byung la/ rma rdol zhing 'dzag ste rus pa 'gas pa gang yin pa ni gsor mi rung ste spang bar bya'o/ /de la dreg gso ba'i thabs ni/ thog mar sman mar blud de/ nyams stobs bskyed pa'i 'og tu/ rlung nyi tshe las gyur pa ma</text></item>
<item><p>255b.1</p><section></section><text>gtogs pa gzhan rnams la gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung ngo / /de'i 'og tu nad gzhi gang yin pa dang sbyar zhing bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang / 'jam rtsi mas btang ba dang / skyug sman dang / bkru sman dang / sman snar blugs pa dang / cho ga</text></item>
<item><p>255b.2</p><section></section><text>rnam pa lnga po sngar bstan pa 'di rnams las gang 'os gtang bar bya ste/ rlung las gyur pa la ni/ sman mas gtang ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa la ni bkru sman btang ngo / /bad kan las gyur pa la ni skyug sman btang ngo / yang na rlung shas che ba las</text></item>
<item><p>255b.3</p><section></section><text>gyur pa'i dreg la ni/ bag phye mar dang / ra'i 'o ma dang sbyar bas bskus na sel bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na til brngos pa'i phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'am/ zar ma'i phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'am/ shu ta'i phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'am/ e raN+Ta'i sa bon gyi phye</text></item>
<item><p>255b.4</p><section></section><text>ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba gang yang rung bas bsku bar bya'o/ /yang na chu na gnas pa'i srog chags nya la sogs pa'i sha gang yang rung ba zhib tu brdungs pa ste/ spod sna tshogs kyis btab la legs par btsos pas bsku bar bya'o/ /mkhris pa shas che ba las gyur pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>255b.5</p><section></section><text>dreg la ni/ shing mngar gyi phye ma mar dang / 'o ma dang / phye rnams sbyar ba'i lde gus bsku'o/ /yang na 'tsho byed ces bya ba'i sman sna bcu po rnams btags pa'i phye ma mar dang sbyar bas bsku bar bya'o/ /bad kan shas che ba las gyur pa'i dreg la ni/ a shwa gan+d+ha dang /</text></item>
<item><p>255b.6</p><section></section><text>til gyi phye ma 'am/ yang na yungs kar gyi phye ma'am/ yang na pur+Na rna ba dang / shi kru'i phye ma dang / 'di rnams gang yang rung ba ba gcin dang sbyar te bsku bar bya'o/ /dreg go cog la ni a ru ra'i phye ma bu ram dang sbyar ba bza' bar bya'o/ /yang na sle tres</text></item>
<item><p>255b.7</p><section></section><text>skol ba'i khu ba btung bar bya'o/ /yang na pi pi ling 'o mar skol ba'i sman bcud kyis len btung bar bya ste/ nyin gcig bzhin du pi pi ling lnga lngas bskyed de/ pi pi ling gi grangs brgyar phyin nas/ nyin gcig bzhin pi pi ling lnga lngas phri ste/ pi pi ling lnga</text></item>
<item><p>256a.1</p><section></section><text>la thug nas yang snga ma bzhin du bskyed de/ bskol ba de lta bu'i cho gas legs par bsrung zhing rtag tu btung bar bya'o/ /rlung nad gso ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so// //de nas chang nad</text></item>
<item><p>256a.2</p><section></section><text>gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /dug la phan gnod rnam pa bcu yod par bstan pa gang yin pa de rnams ni chang la yang yod de/ de btung nyes pa las nad gzhi rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan rnams 'khrugs nas/ chang nad drag po skye</text></item>
<item><p>256a.3</p><section></section><text>bar 'gyur ro/ /de la rlung gis tshul gyur ba'i mtshan ma ni/ smra ba thogs pa dang / mang du smra ba dang / smra ba la bskam pa dang / tshig mi brtan zhing khral khrul ba dang / lus rtsub cing mdog sngon por 'gyur ba dang / dmar por 'gyur ba dang / myos</text></item>
<item><p>256a.4</p><section></section><text>pa rnams yin no/ /mkhris pa'i tshul gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/ mdog dmar zhing ser ba dang / khro zhing 'thab par dga' ba yin no/ /bad kan gyis tshul 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma ni/ smra ba nyung ba dang / tshig 'brel pa dang / sems pa</text></item>
<item><p>256a.5</p><section></section><text>dang/ bzhin mdog dpal skya ba dang / rgyud zhen pa rnams yin no/ /nad gzhi kun 'dus pa las tshul gyur pa ni de dag thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i chang nad kyi mtshan ma ni/ snying dang/ klad pa dang / rtsib logs</text></item>
<item><p>256a.6</p><section></section><text>na ba dang / lus rengs pa dang / skyigs bus 'debs pa dang / lud pa lu ba rnams yin no/ /mkhris pa las byung ba'i chang nad kyi mtshan ma ni/ skom dad che ba dang / lus tsha ba dang / rngul 'byung ba dang / mdog ser por 'gyur</text></item>
<item><p>256a.7</p><section></section><text>ba dang/ mi dran zhing myos pa rnams yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i chang nad kyi mtshan ma ni/ mer mer po dang / kha nas chu 'byung ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / skyugs pa dang / lus rengs pa rnams yin no/ /nad gzhi gsum 'dus</text></item>
<item><p>256b.1</p><section></section><text>pa las gyur pa'i chang nad ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan par rig par bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i chang nad la ni/ chang snga ma 'thungs pa zhu bar gyur pa'i 'og tu/ chang gi nang du kha ru tsha dang / tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma dang / chu nyung zad</text></item>
<item><p>256b.2</p><section></section><text>cig blugs te 'thungs na sel bar byed do/ /yang na chang gi nang du tsha dang kha ru tsha dang / na le sham dang / zim thig le dang / la la phud rnams kyi phye ma blugs te 'thungs na yang / rlung las gyur pa'i chang nad drag po sel to/ /yang na rlung las</text></item>
<item><p>256b.3</p><section></section><text>gyur pa'i chang nad bsal ba'i phyir/ chang 'ol kon gyi skyo mar byas pa'i nang du/ rgya shug gi 'bras bu dang / bal po se'u dang / tin+ti la'i 'bras bu dang / la la phud dang / rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma blugs te btung bar bya'o/ /skom du ni kha lung dang /</text></item>
<item><p>256b.4</p><section></section><text>bal po se'u skyur chu'i nang du mnyes te btung bar bya'o/ /ri dgas skam sa na gnas pa'i sha khu snum dang ldan pa'am/ rgyam tsha dang / bal po se'u dang sbyar ba yang btung ba dang / kha zas sbag par bzang ngo / /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i chang nad la ni/ chang dang chu</text></item>
<item><p>256b.5</p><section></section><text>phyed mar byas la/ sbrang rtsi dang / khar dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o/ /yang na sman mngar bag bskol ba'i khu ba kha ra dang sbyar ba'am/ mon sran sde 'u'i khu bcud kha ra dang sbyar ba 'am sman mngar bag bskol ba'i khu ba las sha btsos te bsdus pa'i khu ba</text></item>
<item><p>256b.6</p><section></section><text>rnams las gang yang rung ba btung bar bya ste/ thams cad kyang grang mos byas pa yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i chang nad la ni skyug sman chang dang sbyar te skyug tu gzhug pa dang / nyams stobs dang sbyar te smyung ba'i cho ga yang bya'o/ /yang na drod bskyed pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>256b.7</p><section></section><text>sman gyi phye ma chang dang sbyar ba'am/ 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba/ tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma dang sbyar ba btung zhing cho ga bsrung bar bya'o/ /kha zas ni nas las byas pa'i kha zas la phug skam po'i khu bcud dang / rgya sran gyi khu bcud gang yang rung bas</text></item>
<item><p>257a.1</p><section></section><text>spod tsha bas sha skyed de sbyar ba dang / ri dgas skam sa nas gnas pa'i sha snum bag chung ba dang lhan cig tu bza'o/ /chang nad kyi rkyen gyis bskam pa'i nad dang / rims dang / lud pa dang / rtsib logs na ba</text></item>
<item><p>257a.2</p><section></section><text>dang/ 'khru ba la sogs pa'i nad bla gnyan gang yang rung ste/ de dag la ni so so'i sman btang bas zhi bar bya'o/ /chang gis lus kyi sha zad par gyur pa la ni/ bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang / 'jam rtsi mas btang ba dang / snum gyis</text></item>
<item><p>257a.3</p><section></section><text>lus bsku zhing dril ba dang / khrus bya ba dang / sman mar dang / 'o ma blud pa rnams kyis brta bar bya'o/ /de la sman mar ni nye'u shing dang / pur+Na r+Na ba dang / shing mngar gyi phye ma mar chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa</text></item>
<item><p>257a.4</p><section></section><text>las ran par btung ngo / /yang na ba la dang / a ti la ba bskol ba'i khu ba 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'thungs na zad byed kyi nad sel to/ /pu rna rna ba bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du/ mar dang / 'o ma dang / shing mngar gyi phye ma blugs te/ bskol</text></item>
<item><p>257a.5</p><section></section><text>la mar nyi tshe lus pa btsir ba las ran par 'thungs na yang / chang 'thungs pas mdangs med par byas pa phyir brta zhing sor chud par byed do/ chang nad gso ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so// //de nas me dpal gso ba'i</text></item>
<item><p>257a.6</p><section></section><text>le'u bshad par bya'o/ /me dbal ni/ lan tshwa dang / skyur ba dang / tsha ba dang / drod che zhing rno ba la sogs pa'i kha zas rtag tu zos pas nad gzhi 'khrugs par byas pa las me dbal rnam pa bdun du shes par bya ste/ me dbal zhes bya ba ni</text></item>
<item><p>257a.7</p><section></section><text>lus thams cad du mched cing 'jug pa yin no/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i me dbal gyi mtshan ma ni/ 'brum bu 'jam zhing mdog gnag pa dang / skrangs pa dang / rims kyis 'debs pa dang / gzer ba rnams yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>257b.1</p><section></section><text>me dbal gyi mtshan ma ni/ 'brum bu'i mdog ser zhing dmar ba dang / lus tsha ba dang / rims kyis 'debs pa rnams yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i me dbal gyi mtshan ma ni/ 'brum bu'i mdog dkar zhing dbal skya ba dang / g.ya'</text></item>
<item><p>257b.2</p><section></section><text>zhing bad kan gyi rims 'debs pa yin no/ /kun 'dus pa las gyur pa'i me dbal ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/ /glo rdol ba las gyur pa'i me dbal ni/ khrag dang / mkhris pa gnyis las 'byung ste/ 'brum pa'i mdog</text></item>
<item><p>257b.3</p><section></section><text>gnag pa dang / sngo skyar 'dug pa dang / dmar ba dang / skrangs pa dang brnags nas rdol ba dang / lus tsha ba dang / rims bdo bar byed pa rnams yin par bshad do/ /me'i me dbal zhes bya ba ni/ rlung dang mkhris pa dag las 'byung</text></item>
<item><p>257b.4</p><section></section><text>ste/ 'brum bu'i mdog mes bsregs pa 'dra la/ nye skor me mdag bzhin du dmar zhing / lus tsha ba dang / skom dad che ba dang / 'khru ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma las rtogs par bya'o/ /me dbal rdzab 'dra zhes bya ba ni/ bad kan dang mkhris</text></item>
<item><p>257b.5</p><section></section><text>pa las 'byung ste/ 'brum pa'i mdog dbal skya zhing dmar ba dang / gnag cing 'tsher te dri mas g.yogs pa dang / tsha zhing nye skor du chu ser gyis 'dam zhing 'dug pa rnams yin no/ /de la nad gzhi gsum so so las gyur pa'i me dbal ni gso</text></item>
<item><p>257b.6</p><section></section><text>sla ba yin no/ /lhag ma gzhan rnams ni gsor mi rung bar bshad do/ /lus kyi phyi nang gnyis kar byung ba dang / tshigs kyi steng du byung ba ni/ bdun char yang lhag par gsor mi rung ngo / /de la rlung las gyur pa'i me dbal la ni/ rtsa ba lnga'i sman</text></item>
<item><p>257b.7</p><section></section><text>lnga phrugs lnga sngar bshad pa'i nang nas/ rtsa'i rtsa ba lnga pa ma gtogs par rtsa ba lnga pa rnam pa bzhi po rnams las gang yang rung bas lus bsku ba dang / nad kyi steng du blugs pa dang / sman mar sbyar ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /yang na 'bras dang / nas dang /</text></item>
<item><p>258a.1</p><section></section><text>shing mngar rnams kyi phye ma mar dang 'o ma'i nang du bskol te/ thug pa tshos par byas pas na ba'i steng du bsku bar bya'o/ /yang na 'o ma na ba'i steng du blugs par bya'o/ /yang na mar gyi snying po steng du blugs par</text></item>
<item><p>258a.2</p><section></section><text>bya'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i me dbal la ni/ sman phra puN+Ta rI ka dang / btsod dang / shug pa dang / pu shel tse dang / tsan dan dang / shing mngar dang / ut+pal rnams kyi phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar te bsku bar bya'o/ /yang na shing n+ya gro d+ha la sogs</text></item>
<item><p>258a.3</p><section></section><text>pa'i sde tshan sngar bshad pas nad kyi steng du khu ba blugs pa dang / bsdu ba dang / sman mar sbyar ba rnams byas na bzang ngo / /yang na mar gzhu zhing 'khyag tu bcug pa de lta bur lan brgya'i bar du byas te/ rul bar gyur pa'i nang du/ shing mngar gyi phye ma shas cher</text></item>
<item><p>258a.4</p><section></section><text>blug ste sbyar bas bsku bar bya'o/ /yang na liklu mig dang / pu shel tse dang / tsan dan dang / gla sgang dang / mu tig dang / nor bu rin po che dang / btsag rnams kyi phye ma/ mar dang 'o mar sbyar te/ bskus na mkhris pa las gyur pa'i me dbal sel to/ /</text></item>
<item><p>258a.5</p><section></section><text>bad kan las gyur pa'i me dbal la ni/ seng ldeng dang / sap+ta paR+Sha dang / gla sgang dang / shing d+ha ba dang / dong ga dang / thang shing dang / ku raN+Ta rnams brdar ba'i lde gus bskus na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na shing mngar dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / bu tshad rto dang /</text></item>
<item><p>258a.6</p><section></section><text>shi ri sha rnams brdar ba'i lde gus bsku'o/ /yang na bad kan las gyur pa'i me dbal la/ sman pa ru na la sogs pa'i sde tshan gyis bsku ba dang / khu bas blugs pa dang / sman mar sbyar ba la sogs pa byas na bzang ngo / /pa to la dang / nim+ba dang / skyer pa'i rtsa ba'i</text></item>
<item><p>258a.7</p><section></section><text>shun lpags dang / pu tse shel dang / khyi lce ba dang / shing mngar rnams bskol ba'i khu ba 'thung na yang me dbal thams cad sel to/ /gla sgang dang / nim+ba dang / pa to la rnams bskol ba'i khu ba 'thungs na yang / me dbal lo cog sel to/ /yang na skyu ru ra dang / ba to la dang /</text></item>
<item><p>258b.1</p><section></section><text>mon sran sde'u rnams bskol ba'i khu ba mar dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o/ /mdor na me dbal la ni/ dang por skyug sman dang / bkru sman gyis sbyang ba dang / gtar zhing khrag dbyung ba rnams kyang bya'o/ /cho ga de ltar byas pa las kyang 'brum bu rnag ste</text></item>
<item><p>258b.2</p><section></section><text>rdol ba las gyur pa la ni/ rma gso ba'i cho gar bstan pa thams cad bya'o/ /me dbal bsal ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs so// //sman dpyad gces pa grub pa zhes bya ba/ bam po drug pa'o/ /de nas skrangs pa'i nad gso ba'i le'u</text></item>
<item><p>258b.3</p><section></section><text>bshad par bya'o/ /skrangs pa'i nad ni/ mi bzad pas/ kha zas lci ba dang / skyur ba dang / bad kan skye bar 'gyur ba'i zas zos nas/ nad gzhi rnams 'khrugs pa las skrangs pa'i nad mi bzad pa rnam pa drug 'byung bar 'gyur te/ skrangs so cog gi mtshan</text></item>
<item><p>258b.4</p><section></section><text>ma ni gso sla ba yin no/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i skrangs pa'i nad kyi mtshan ma ni/ skrangs pa nyid phan tshun du 'pho zhing / gar mnan pa'i mal shong der 'dug pa dang / mdog gnag cing dmar ba dang mi bzod par na ba rnams yin no/ /mkhris pa las</text></item>
<item><p>258b.5</p><section></section><text>gyur pa'i skrangs pa'i mtshan ma ni/ myur du smin cing rdol ba dang / mdog 'jam pa dang / ser zhing dmar ba dang / tsha ba dang / lus tsha bar byed pa rnams yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i skrangs pa'i mtshan ma ni mdog snum zhing dkar ba dang / dbal</text></item>
<item><p>258b.6</p><section></section><text>skya ba dang / mkhrang ba dang / g.ya' ba rnams yin no/ /khrag las gyur pa dang / glo bur gyis skrangs pa'i mtshan ma ni/ mkhris pa'i mtshan ma dang 'dra'o/ /kun 'dus pa las gyur pa'i skrangs pa'i mtshan ma ni thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/ /de la nad gzhi pho</text></item>
<item><p>258b.7</p><section></section><text>ba'i nang na gnas na ni/ ro stod skrangs par 'gyur ro/ /nad gzhi long ga'i nang na gnas na ni/ ro smad du skrangs par 'gyur ro/ /nad gzhi bar na gnas na ni bar du skrangs par 'gyur ro/ /nad gzhi thams cad du khyab na ni/ lus ril gyis skrangs</text></item>
<item><p>259a.1</p><section></section><text>bar 'gyur ro/ /de la skrangs pa'i nad gzhi gcig las gyur pa yin la/ nad bla gnyan gzhan gyis kyang ma thebs te/ mi nyal stobs chen po zhig la byung na ni gso sla ba yin no/ /lus ril gyis skrangs pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>259a.2</p><section></section><text>mas yar mched de skrangs pa ni ma rungs pa yin no/ /skrangs pa'i nad la sman pas nad gzhi dang sbyar zhing nad gzhi so so'i sman gyi sde tshan rnams kyis sman mar sbyar ba dang til mar gyi sman sbyar ba dang / bsku ba dang / nad kyi steng du blugs pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>259a.3</p><section></section><text>btung ba rnams su sbyar bar bya'o/ /las rnam pa lnga po bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang / 'jam rtsi mas btang ba dang / skyug sman dang / bkru sman dang / sman snar blugs pa rnams kyang tsha bas che chung dang sbyar shing cho ga bzhin du gtang</text></item>
<item><p>259a.4</p><section></section><text>bar bya'o/ /de ma yin pa skrangs pa'i nad zhi bar bya ba'i spyi'i cho ga gzhan yang bshad par bya ste/ thang shing dang / a ru ra dang / bca' sga dang pu na rna ba rnams kyi phye ma chu skol ba dron po dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na byi dang ga dang /</text></item>
<item><p>259a.5</p><section></section><text>bong nga dkar po dang / dug mo nyung gi shun lpags dang / bca' sga dang / thang shing dang / na le sham rnams kyi phye ma chu bskol ba dron po dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na tsha ba gsum dang / lcags kyi phye ma dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>259a.6</p><section></section><text>thal ba rnams kyi phye/ 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang skrangs pa'i nad sel to/ /yang na pu tse shel dang / lcags kyi phye ma dang / tsha ba gsum dang / shing nye rong rnams kyi phye ma/ 'bras bu gsum</text></item>
<item><p>259a.7</p><section></section><text>bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na gu gul dkar po ba gcin dang sbyar ba dang / yang na pi pi ling gi phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba btung bar bya'o/ /yang na bu ram a ru ra'i phye ma dang cha bsnyams te sbyar ba'am/ yang na bu ram bca' sga dang cha bsnyams te</text></item>
<item><p>259b.1</p><section></section><text>sbyar ba bza' bar bya'o/ /yang na bu ram dang / sge'u gsher tshod ran par bza'o/ /rlung las gyur pa la ni kha zas sha khu dang lhan cig bza'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa ni kha zas 'o ma dang lhan cig bza'o/ /bad kan las gyur pa la ni kha zas khu bcud</text></item>
<item><p>259b.2</p><section></section><text>rtsub pa'i bag dang lhan cig bza' bar bya'o/ /cho ga de ltar byas na skrangs pa'i nad dang / skems pa'i nad dang / dmu rdzings dang / smyo byed dang / skran dang / gzhang 'brum dang / dbugs mi bde ba rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /thang shing dang /</text></item>
<item><p>259b.3</p><section></section><text>bu na rna ba dang / bca' sga rnams kyi phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na kru trug tres dang / tsha ba gsum dang / shing nye rong dang / thang shing rnams bskol ba'i khu ba 'thungs na yang skrangs pa'i nad sel to/ /rkang 'bam zhes bya ba ni tshil dang / sha'i nad</text></item>
<item><p>259b.4</p><section></section><text>las gyur te/ rkang pa gnyis bum pa 'dra bar skrangs pa yin no/ /de yang nad gzhi gsum la bad kan shas che ba las gyur pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum yod de nad gzhi so so'i mtshan mas bstan to/ /de ni dus thams cad du grang zhing ser che la/ skam du mi btub pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>259b.5</p><section></section><text>sar skye bar 'gyur te/ lo gcig lhag pa dang / rkang 'bam grog mkhar lta bu ni mi 'tsho'o/ /de la gso ba'i cho ga ni nad gzhi dang 'phrod pa'i sman gyis bsku ba dang / dugs bya ba dang / gtar te khrag dbyung ba la sogs pa'i cho ga dang / skrangs pa'i nad gso ba'i cho</text></item>
<item><p>259b.6</p><section></section><text>gar bstan pa thams cad kyang ci rigs par bya bar bshad do/ /lba ba ni rlung las gyur pa dang / tshil las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum yod de/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i lba ba'i mtshan ma ni/ mdog nag cing dmar ba dang / kha dri mi zhim pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>259b.7</p><section></section><text>rkan skam par byed pa yin no/ /tshil las gyur pa'i lba ba'i mtshan ma ni/ 'jam zhing snum pa yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i lba ba'i mtshan ma ni shin tu che zhing sra ba yin no/ /de la rid de ba la byung ba dang / lo gcig phan chad lon pa ni gsor mi rung ngo / /'bras kyi phreng ba</text></item>
<item><p>260a.1</p><section></section><text>zhes bya ba ni/ lkog mar bad kan dang / tshil gnyis las skyu ru ra'i rus pa 'dra bar rmen bur gyur pa mang pos bskor ba'i ming ni 'bras kyi phreng ba zhes bya ste yun ring du mi 'byang bar 'dug pa yin no/ /de la lba ba gso ba'i cho ga</text></item>
<item><p>260a.2</p><section></section><text>ni/ sman pas nad gzhi dang sbyar zhing / nad gzhi so so'i sman gyi sde tshan gyis dugs bya ba dang / bsku ba dang / lums bya ba dang / gtar zhing khrag dbyung ba dang / skyug sman dang bkru sman btang ba dang / til mar gyi sman btung ba rnams kyis lba</text></item>
<item><p>260a.3</p><section></section><text>ba med par bya'o/ /'bras kyi phreng ba la ni/ sman sha ko ta ka'i shun lpags kyi phye ma til mar dang chu'i nang du bskol te til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'am/ yang na ni m+pa dang / a shwa ma ra dang / ni rgun+ti rnams kyi phye ma til mar dang chu'i nang du</text></item>
<item><p>260a.4</p><section></section><text>bskol la/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa bcags te snar blugs so/ /yang na 'bras kyi phreng ba ma smin pa la ni dral te rmen bu phyung la rma kha bsreg go /smin cing rdol ba la ni sman mu ga ka'i thal ba'i sman sbyar bas bsku zhing sbyangs la 'di gnyi ga yang rma'i</text></item>
<item><p>260a.5</p><section></section><text>cho ga bzhin du gso bar bya'o/ /yang na rting pa nas sor bcu gnyis kyi gong du phyin pa dral te byin pa'i nang na tshil gyi rmen bu nya'i sgo nga 'dra ba 'dug pa rnams phyung la/ rma kha bsregs te rma gso ba'i cho ga bzhin du bya'o/ /sha rmen ni nad gzhi gsum so</text></item>
<item><p>260a.6</p><section></section><text>so las gyur te khrag dang sha dang tshil rnams kyi rmen bu yin no/ /de ni nad gzhi so so'i mtshan ma las shes par bya ste/ de la khrag dang sha las gyur ba'i sha rmen ni/ gsor mi rung ngo / /sha rmen gso ba'i thabs ni/ lba ba gso ba'i cho gar</text></item>
<item><p>260a.7</p><section></section><text>bshad pa bzhin du bya'o/ /yang na dral ba dang / bsreg pa dang / sman gyi thal bas gdab pa rnams kyang bya zhing / ras ma'am lo mas g.yogs par bya'o/ /skrangs pa'i nad gso ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so// //</text></item>
<item><p>260b.1</p><section></section><text>de nas rma gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rma ni lus nyid las 'byung ba dang / glo bur du 'byung ba'i bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis yod par rig par bya'o/ /de la snga ma ni nad gzhi rnams las gyur pa yin no/ /phyi ma ni mtshon la sogs pas rmas</text></item>
<item><p>260b.2</p><section></section><text>pa yin no/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i rma'i mtshan ma ni/ rma'i nye skor rtsub cing mdog dmar la sngo skyar 'dug pa dang / 'dzag pa nyung zhing 'dar ba dang / cher mi na ba rnams yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rma'i mtshan ma ni/ rma dang nye</text></item>
<item><p>260b.3</p><section></section><text>skor gyi mdog ser zhing dmar la sngo ba dang / 'dzag pa che ba dang / lus tsha ba rnams yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i rma'i mtshan ma ni/ mkhrang zhing dbal skya ba dang / chu ser skya bo 'dzag cing grang la bska ba rnams yin no/ /khrag nad las</text></item>
<item><p>260b.4</p><section></section><text>gyur pa'i rma'i mtshan ma ni/ mdog dmar zhing khrag 'dzag pa yin no/ /nad gzhi gnyis 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rma'i mtshan ma ni gang dang gang 'dus pa de dang de'i mtshan ma 'dres pas bstan to/ /de la thog ma ma</text></item>
<item><p>260b.5</p><section></section><text>smin pa'i tshe ni/ zhi bar 'gyur ba'i nan rtsis bsku'o/ /rnag tu cha ba la ni smin par bya ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /rnag zin pa la ni brtol te 'jib pa'i sman gyis rnag dang chu ser dag par bsal nas rma'i sha'u skye ba'i sman bya'o/ /de la rnag par bya ba'i sman</text></item>
<item><p>260b.6</p><section></section><text>ni/ til dang / phabs dang / zar ma dang / ru rta rnams kyi phye ma dang / phye dang rgyam tsha rnams zho skyur po dang sbyar te/ brdzis pa'i gong bu ni smin par byed pa'i mchog yin par 'dod do/ /de la rnag tu tsha ba'i mtshan ma ni/ tsha ba 'ur 'ur</text></item>
<item><p>260b.7</p><section></section><text>por 'dug pa dang / na zhing zug pa dang / mdog dmar ba dang skrangs pa rnams yin par bshad do/ /rnag pa'i mtshan ma ni gong ma smin du che ba'i mtshan ma rnams rtse gzhil bar 'gyur la/ gnyer ma 'dus shing phyogs gcig tu mthon po cog cog</text></item>
<item><p>261a.1</p><section></section><text>por 'byung ba yin no/ /rdol bar bya ba'i sman ni/ shing nye rong dang / snu ha k+Shi ra dang / asmari dang / tsi ri bil ba la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang / kru trug tres dang / thi ba dang / bya gag dang / mchil pa'i rtug pa rnams</text></item>
<item><p>261a.2</p><section></section><text>kyi phye ma sbyar ba'am/ yang na mu ska'i thal ba'i sman sbyar bas bsku ba ni rdol bar bya ba'i sman gyi nang na mchog yin no/ /'jib pa'i sman gyis rnag dang chu ser bsal ba'i thabs ni/ til dang / rgyam tsha dang / shing mngar dang / nim+pa'i lo ma dang /</text></item>
<item><p>261a.3</p><section></section><text>yung dang / skyer pa dang / shing nye rong rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbyar te bsku bar bya'o/ /yang na nim+pa ba tra dang / til gyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te bskus na yang rma sbyong bar byed do/ /rma'i sha'u skye ba'i sman ni/ nas rjen par btags pa'i phye ma/</text></item>
<item><p>261a.4</p><section></section><text>mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te bskus na rma 'drub par 'gyur ro/ /rma rub pa'i mtshan ma ni/ skrangs pa med la 'jam zhing snum pa dang / lce'i mdog 'dra bar dmar ba dang / na ba med cing 'dzag pa chad pa dang / rlob med pa rnams yin te</text></item>
<item><p>261a.5</p><section></section><text>rma dag par 'gyur ba'i rtags su bshad do/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i rma la ni sman rtsa ba lnga pa'i sde tshan che chung gnyis cho ga thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rma la ni shing n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa'i sde tshan cho ga thams cad du sbyar</text></item>
<item><p>261a.6</p><section></section><text>bar bya'o/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i rma la ni dong ga la sogs pa'i sde tshan cho ga thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/ /yang ut+pal sngon po dang / ba la dang / skyer pa dang / me da dang / shing mngar dang / tsan dan dang / sa mang+ga dang /</text></item>
<item><p>261a.7</p><section></section><text>d+ha ta ki rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbyar te bskus na yang rma'i sha'u skye bar byed do/ /yang na shing 'o ma can gyi myu gu'i phye ma mar dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na 'bras bu gsum dang / shing ba ta'i yal ga'i thor to dang / seng ldeng dang / seng phrom rnams</text></item>
<item><p>261b.1</p><section></section><text>kyi phye ma mar dang sbyar bas bskus na rma kha 'drub par 'gyur ro/ /yang na shing ardzu na dang / u dum bA ra dang / a shwad+tha dang / seng phrom dang / dzam bU'i shun lpags dang / shing mngar dang / kat+pa la dang / rgya skyegs rnams kyi phye mas</text></item>
<item><p>261b.2</p><section></section><text>btab pa na yang / rma'i sha'u skye bar 'gyur ro/ /pu tse shel dang / spra tshil dang / yung dang / shing mngar dang / nak+ta ma la'i 'bras bu dang / lo ma dang / ma la ti dang / nim+pa'i lo ma rnams kyi phye ma mar dang chu'i nang du bskol te/ mar</text></item>
<item><p>261b.3</p><section></section><text>nyi tshe lus pa yang rma la phan pa yin no/ /yang na pra puN+Da rI ka dang / shing mngar dang / bu tshang rto dang / ra mnye dang / tsan dan rnams kyi phye ma dang / shing 'o ma can bskol ba'i khu ba rnams til mar gyi nang du bskol te/ til mar nyi tshe</text></item>
<item><p>261b.4</p><section></section><text>lus pa btsags pa yang rma 'tsho bar byed do/ /rma kha sman gyis bskus pa'i steng du/ shing ka rany+dza dang / p+lak+Sha dang / dzam bU la sogs pa'i lo mas glan la de'i steng du ras la sogs pas dkri ba ni bzang ste rma sbyong zhing 'tsho bar byed do/ /rma la</text></item>
<item><p>261b.5</p><section></section><text>'bu zhugs pa la ni byi'u dug pa la sogs pa'i sde tshan sbyar bas rma kha dang rma'i nang du bskus na phan no/ /rma sos pa'i mal shong du gyur pa la ni/ sran ma dang / mon sran sde'u la sogs pa sran ma'i rigs rnams kyi lo ma'i phye ma chu dang sbyar</text></item>
<item><p>261b.6</p><section></section><text>ba'am/ yang na shing tog ko sha'am/ shing lbang ko btags pa'i phye ma chu dang sbyar bas bskus na slar gang bar 'gyur ro/ /rma 'khyims pa la ni cho ga shes pas rma'i bag gar byung ba brtags te/ mtshon gyis dral la dag par bsal zhing / rnag</text></item>
<item><p>261b.7</p><section></section><text>dang / chu ser 'jib pa'i sman gyis bskus te myang ba ste/ rma khar sha'u skye zhing 'drub pa'i sman la sogs pa rma'i cho ga thams cad rim bzhin du bya'o/ /rngu ba khong na yod pa'i rma la ni/ rngu ba skam pas drangs te phyung la/ rma gso ba'i sman gyi cho ga</text></item>
<item><p>262a.1</p><section></section><text>bstan pa rim bzhin du bya'o/ /rma rnying ring du lon pa'i rkyen gyis sha zad cing skam par gyur pa la ni/ sha rtas pa'i sman gyi cho ga yang bya zhing / rma yang gso bar bya'o/ /rma rang pa la ni rma'i nye skor gtar zhing khrag dbyung</text></item>
<item><p>262a.2</p><section></section><text>ba dang / skyug sman dang bkru sman btang / glo bur gyi rma la rma byung ba'i mod la/ mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang sbyar bas bskus te bcings la/ mkhris pa dang khrag gi drod tsha ba dbri zhing bsil ba'i cho ga rnams bya'o/ /rus pa chag gam tshigs byung</text></item>
<item><p>262a.3</p><section></section><text>ba la ni/ cho ga shes pas srang zhing / tshigs bcug la/ mar dang shing mngar gyis bskus te bcings la ras kyis dam du dkris la/ shing 'o ma can gyi shun lpags kyis mi 'gul bar dbang du byas te ci nas kyang ma rnag par nan tan du</text></item>
<item><p>262a.4</p><section></section><text>bsrung bar bya'o/ /rma dang / chag grugs dang bur ba'i kha zas ni 'bras sA lu dang / mon sran sde'u dang nas las byas pa dang / ri dwags skam sa na gnas pa'i sha rnams bza'o/ /zho dang / 'o ma dang / skyur bag dang / kha zas lci</text></item>
<item><p>262a.5</p><section></section><text>ba'i bag dang nyal po rnams spang bar bya'o/ /rma gso ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so// //de nas mig sman gyi rgyud kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /mig sman gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos bshad pa gang yin pa ni</text></item>
<item><p>262a.6</p><section></section><text>rgya ches pas na/ 'dir de dag thams cad mi bshad par cha tsam zhig bshad par bya'o/ /de la mig gi rang bzhin ni gong bur 'dug pa dang / dmar ba dang / dkar ba dang / gnag pa yin no/ /de yang 'byung ba chen po sa dang / chu dang me</text></item>
<item><p>262a.7</p><section></section><text>dang rlung rnams dang ldan par bshad do/ /gnas khung bu yin pas na nam mkha' dang yang ldan no/ /de la rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / khrag gi nyes pa rnams kyi bye brag las mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa zhes bya ba drag po rnam pa bzhir</text></item>
<item><p>262b.1</p><section></section><text>'gyur te/ de ni phal cher mig nad do cog 'byung ba'i gzhi yin no/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa'i mtshan ma ni/ mchi ma grang ba dang / rngu ma skam po yod pa dang / na zhing ha re 'dug pa rnams yin par bshad do/ /mkhris</text></item>
<item><p>262b.2</p><section></section><text>pa las gyur pa'i mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa'i mtshan ma ni/ mchi ma tsha ba dang / rngu ma ser ba dang / tsha ba 'ur 'ur por 'dug cing rtsa dmar ba rnams yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa'i mtshan ma ni/ rngu ma dkar pos</text></item>
<item><p>262b.3</p><section></section><text>yogs pa dang / mchi ma 'byar 'byar po dang / g.ya' zhing skrangs pa rnams yin no/ /khrag gi nyes pa las byung ba'i mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa'i mtshan ma ni/ mig dmar zhing tsha ba 'ur 'ur por 'dug la/ dmar po shar shar por 'byung zhing /</text></item>
<item><p>262b.4</p><section></section><text>mchi ma rtsa dmar ba rnams yin no/ /kha zas mi 'phrod pa zos pa dang / dus bzhin du mi za ba'i rkyen gyis mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa zhes bya ba tsha bas chen por gyur pa la ni/ mig nad rdung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ mig dang klad pa'i phyed mi bzad</text></item>
<item><p>262b.5</p><section></section><text>par na bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i mtshan ma yang gong du smos pa bzhin du nad gzhi so so'i mtshan ma dang sbyar zhing rtogs par bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i mig nad gso ba'i cho ga ni/ kha ra dang / seng phrom dang / rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma chu</text></item>
<item><p>262b.6</p><section></section><text>'jam tsam dang sbyar te btsags pa'i khu ba'am/ yang na kha ra dang / bca' sga dang / sha ba ri'i seng phrom rnams cho ga gong ma bzhin du byas te mig tu blugs par bya'o/ /yang na ku sta ra'i me tog dang / shing mngar dang / kha ra dang /</text></item>
<item><p>262b.7</p><section></section><text>bca' sga rnams kyi phye ma zho kha chu 'jam tsam dang sbyar te btsags pa'am/ yang na bca' sga dang / rgyam tsha dang / shing mngar dang / seng phrom rnams kyi phye ma mar gyi nang du brngos pa'i khu bas mig tu blugs so/ /yang na shing mngar dang / tsan</text></item>
<item><p>263a.1</p><section></section><text>dan dang / btsod dang / seng phrom dang / btsag yug snam rnams kyi phye ma chu 'jam tsam dang sbyar te btsags pa'am/ yang na bilba la sogs pa'i sde tshan bskol bas mig gi nang du blugs na yang mig nad mi bzad par na ba sel</text></item>
<item><p>263a.2</p><section></section><text>to/ /yang na e raN+Da 'i rtsa ba ra'i 'o ma'i nang du bskol te/ 'jam tsam du bsgrangs la mig gdangs te/ ras dkar po gtsang mas g.yogs pa'i steng du/ mig 'gram logs nas rgyun ma chad par blugs pa ni/ mig sman tshags las btang ba</text></item>
<item><p>263a.3</p><section></section><text>zhes bya ba'i mchog yin no/ /yang na pi pi ling dang / bal ka dang / shing mngar dang / rgyam tsha rnams ra'i 'o mar bskol te 'jam tsam du bsgrangs pa snga ma bzhin du tshags las btang ba'i sman byas na yang mig nad mi bzad pa na ba sel to/ /yang</text></item>
<item><p>263a.4</p><section></section><text>na lcags sam zangs kyi snod du rgyam tsha dang zho sbyar ba'am/ yang na zangs sam lcags kyi gtun gyi nang du 'khar ba'i gtun bus yung dang pi pi ling zhib tu brdungs la zho dang sbyar te snod de nyid kyi nang du zhag lon par bzhag pa zangs dang lcags kyi mig sman</text></item>
<item><p>263a.5</p><section></section><text>gyi thur mas blang zhing mig tu bskus na mig mi bzad par na ba sel to/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mig nad la ni pra puN+Da rI ka dang / shing mngar dang / yung dang / skyu ru ra dang / shug pa rnams bskol ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang khar sbyar te sngar</text></item>
<item><p>263a.6</p><section></section><text>bsten pa bzhin du/ tshags las btang zhing rgyun du blugs na mig nad sel to/ /yang na tsan dan dang / ari sh+ta'i lo ma dang / shing mngar dang / skyer pa dang / lce myang tsha rnams kyi phye ma chu grang mo dang sbyar te/ sbrang rtsi dang / kha ra dang ldan</text></item>
<item><p>263a.7</p><section></section><text>par byas la tshags las btang zhing rgyun du blugs so/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i mig nad la ni/ dud pa dang / yungs kar cha re dang / yung dang / skyer pa cha gnyis gnyis dang / 'di rnams kyi phye ma chu 'jam tsam dang sbyar te tshags las btang</text></item>
<item><p>263b.1</p><section></section><text>zhing rgyun du blugs na mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa sel to/ /yang na snod kha sbyar nim+pa'i khu ba bskus pa'i nang du/ seng phrom cha bzhi dang / dud pa dang / yungs kar cha re rnams kyi phye ma tshig mar brngos te btags nas/ chu 'jam tsam dang sbyar ba</text></item>
<item><p>263b.2</p><section></section><text>yang tshags las btang zhing rgyun du blugs par bya'o/ /khrag las gyur pa'i mig nad la ni/ sman ti ri ta dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / shing mngar dang / kha ra dang / gla sgang chen po rnams kyi phye ma chu grang mo dang sbyar te tshags las btang zhing</text></item>
<item><p>263b.3</p><section></section><text>rgyun du blugs na mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa sel to/ /seng phrom dang / shing mngar dang / ldong ros dang / skyer pa dang / skyer khaN+Da rnams kyi phye ma ra'i 'o ma dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na skyer pa'i khu ba bsgrangs te sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba thur mas</text></item>
<item><p>263b.4</p><section></section><text>blangs la mig la bskus na mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa thams cad sel to/ /thog ma mig nad kyis btab ste na ba bdo ba la ni/ seng phrom dang / skyu ru ra khrel bur sbyar ba mar gyi nang du bsnos te zhib tu btags la ldong ros dang sbyar te/ chu dang brdzis</text></item>
<item><p>263b.5</p><section></section><text>pas mig gi phyi rol pags pa'i steng du bsku'o/ /yang na mig sman tsak+Shu ras gtsang ma'i nang du phur la/ ba lang gi gci ba'i nang du btsos te/ chan tshos rab tu gyur pa'i shun lpags med par byas te bskams la zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma nyal gar lan</text></item>
<item><p>263b.6</p><section></section><text>cig rgya mig tu blugs pa tsam gyis/ de ma thag tu mig nad mi bzad par bdo ba yang med par byed do/ /yang na mig na ste bdo ba la/ shi kru'i sa bon cha gcig dang seng phrom cha brgyad dang / ldong ros cha gsum dang / 'di rnams zhib tu btags</text></item>
<item><p>263b.7</p><section></section><text>pa'i phye ma sbyar bas ras gtsang ma la gzhan par btab ste mig g.yogs par bya'o/ /yang na skyer khaN+Da dang / a ru ra dang / skyer pa dang / btsag dang / rgyam tsha rnams lhan cig tu chu dgas mar byas la/ mig gi phyi rol pags pa'i steng du bskus</text></item>
<item><p>264a.1</p><section></section><text>na yang mig nad do cog sel to/ /mig nad rdung ba thams cad la ni/ dpral rtsa gtar te khrag phyung la/ mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa'i skabs su so so'i rkyen tu/ sman gyi cho ga ji ltar bstan pa rnams kyang mthun mthun du bya'o/ /</text></item>
<item><p>264a.2</p><section></section><text>mig gi 'bras bu na gu'i steng du dkar po'i thig le byung ba ni/ ling tog ces bya ste/ bad kan las gyur par shes par bya'o/ /mig gi sprin gyi steng du dmar po byung ba ni/ ling tog dmar po zhes bya ste/ khrag gi nyes pa las 'byung ba yin no/ /de</text></item>
<item><p>264a.3</p><section></section><text>la ling tog dkar po zhi bar bya ba'i thabs ni/ drub mar chang dang / me tog ma d+hu ka'i shing gi snying po dang / ba ru ra'i tshi gu dang / rgyam tsha rnams las gang yang rung ba'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te mig la bskus na ling tog med par 'gyur ro/ /yang na</text></item>
<item><p>264a.4</p><section></section><text>ga bur dang / na le sham dang / shing mngar dang / dung dang / ba lang gi so dang / rgyam tsha dang / ldong ros dang / tsan dan rnams kyi phye ma shig gru'i khu ba dang sbyar te ri lur byas pas bskus na yang ling tog dkar po sel bar byed do/ /</text></item>
<item><p>264a.5</p><section></section><text>rgya mtsho'i lpu ba dang / khyim bya'i sgo nga'i shun lpags dang / rgyam tsha dang / dung dang / shi gru'i 'bras bu'i tshi gu rnams kyi phye ma chu dang sbyar te ri lur byas pas bskus na yang ling tog la sogs pa gris bzhogs pa bzhin du med par byed do/ /khyim</text></item>
<item><p>264a.6</p><section></section><text>bya'i sgo nga'i shun lpags dang / ldong ros dang / dung dang / mching bu dang / tsan dan dang / rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma cha bsnyams pa'i steng du/ mig sman gyi thur ma bsgres pas mig byug na yang / ling tog dang / mig 'dzer la</text></item>
<item><p>264a.7</p><section></section><text>sogs pa med par byed do/ /tsan dan dang / rgyam tsha dang / a ru ra dang / rgya skyegs rnams kyi phye ma yas kyi rim bzhin du dang po'i cha res bskyed de sbyar ba'i nang du mig sman gyi thur mas bsgres pas mig byug na yang ling tog dang / mig</text></item>
<item><p>264b.1</p><section></section><text>'dzer la sogs pa med par byed do/ /sna ma'i me tog kha ma 'bus ba dang / rgya skyegs dang / btsag yug snam dang / tsan dan rnams kyi phye ma cha mnyam la chu dang sbyar ba'i ri lus mig bskus na yang mig snad cing rma byung ba dang / ling tog</text></item>
<item><p>264b.2</p><section></section><text>rnams sel zhing khrag gis rgyas pa dang bar byed do/ /ling tog dmar po la ni dung gi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/ ka ta ka'i 'bras bu rgyam tsha dang sbyar ba'am/ rgya mtsho'i lbu ba kha ra dang sbyar ba rnams las gang yang rung bas mig byug par</text></item>
<item><p>264b.3</p><section></section><text>bya'o/ /sna ma'i lo ma'i khu ba dang sbrang rtsi dang / yung dang / skyer pa'i phye ma dang / skyer khaN+Da rnams kyi mig sman nam/ yang na pi pi ling ras gtsang ma'i nang du phur te ba lang gi gci ba'i khu ba'i nang du btsos la skams pa'i phye mas mig</text></item>
<item><p>264b.4</p><section></section><text>byugs na/ mtshan mo mi mthong ba'i mig nad sel to/ /ldong ros dang / cu gang dang / stang zil dang / tsha ba gsum ba lang gi mkhris pas sbrus la/ sran tsam gyis reng reng po dril la/ chu las brdar ba'am/ yang na thang shing gi phye mar</text></item>
<item><p>264b.5</p><section></section><text>gcin gyis sbang zhing skams pa de lta bur lan grangs mang du byas pas mig bskus na mig mchi mas gang ba sel to/ /yang na/ ba bla dang / thang shing dang / shu dag rnams kyi phye ma bye'u rug pa'i lo ma'i khu ba dang sbyar te/ ri lur byas la grib</text></item>
<item><p>264b.6</p><section></section><text>mar bskams bas mig bskus na yang mig tshag rnying sel to/ /ba bla dang / stang zil dang / de gnyis bsdoms pa'i nyis 'gyur gyis zangs rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma'i nang du/ mig sman gyi thur ma bsgres pas mig byug gam/</text></item>
<item><p>264b.7</p><section></section><text>yang na tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma dang / skyer khaN+Da chu dang sbyar te bskus na yang mig tshag po sel to/ /mig nad rab rib tu gyur pa thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan ma ni shin tu zi zi por gyur pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /so so'i bye brag gzhan yang bshad de/</text></item>
<item><p>265a.1</p><section></section><text>de la rlung las gyur pa'i rab rib kyi mtshan ma ni ci mthong ngo cog rtsa dmar zhing g.yo ba dang / lang long bor snang ba yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rab rib kyi mtshan ma ni/ kha dog sngon po dang / ser por snang zhing / me 'bar</text></item>
<item><p>265a.2</p><section></section><text>ba dang / srin bu me khyer dang glog lta bu mthong ba rnams yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i rab rib kyi mtshan ma ni mthong ngo cog mdog 'jam zhing skya ba dang / bstan par snang ba rnams yin no/ /'dus pa las gyur pa'i rab rib kyi mtshan ma ni/</text></item>
<item><p>265a.3</p><section></section><text>mtshan ma de dag thams cad lta bur mthong ba yin no/ /khrag las gyur pa'i rab rib kyi mtshan ma ni mthong ngo cog shin tu dmar bar mthong ba yin no/ /mig nad rab rib ces bya ba yal bar bor te/ tshabs chen po las gyur pa la ni mig nad bris</text></item>
<item><p>265a.4</p><section></section><text>g.yogs pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ de'i mtshan ma yang thog mar ni nad gzhi gang las gyur pa'i mtshan ma rab rib kyi skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra ba las/ phyir zhing 'khrul tshabs che ba dang mi mthong bar 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/ /de rnams</text></item>
<item><p>265a.5</p><section></section><text>kyi nang na bad kan las gyur pa'i mig nad bris g.yogs pa ni gso sla ba yin te rtsa gtar zhing khrag dbyung na bzang ngo / /de la rab rib gso ba'i cho ga ni/ a ru ra'i tshi gu dang / shing mngar dang / skyu ru ra dang / na le sham dang / spangs</text></item>
<item><p>265a.6</p><section></section><text>ma rnams chu btags su byas pa'i ri lus bskus na mig nad rab rib rnams sel to/ /tsha ba gsum dang / lcags kyi phye ma dang / rgyam tsha dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / stang zil rnams chu btags su byas te legs par sbyar ba'i ri</text></item>
<item><p>265a.7</p><section></section><text>lu'i ming ni ri lu nag po zhes bya ste 'di bskus na yang mig nad rab rib sel to/ /yung dang / skyu ru ra dang / pi pi ling dang / ka ta ka'i 'bras bu dang / yungs kar rnams kyi phye ma char pa'i chu dang sbyar te/ ri lur byas pas bskus</text></item>
<item><p>265b.1</p><section></section><text>na yang mig nad do cog sel to/ /bya g+h+r-i dang / gla sgang dang / shing thog a mra dang / shing mngar dang / pi pi ling dang / rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma zangs kyi snod kyi nang du ra'i 'o ma dang spangs pa'i ri lus bskus na yang / mig nad</text></item>
