<item><p>265b.2</p><section></section><text>thams cad sel to/ /rkang bzhi ba phyugs la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i so dang / rgya skyegs dang / ka rany+dza'i 'bras bu dang / bri ha tI'i 'bras bu dang / gla ba dang / rnga mo'i rus pa dang / nya rus dang / byi dang ka ra dang / tsha ba</text></item>
<item><p>265b.3</p><section></section><text>gsum dang / ru rta rnams cha bsnyams te/ chu btags su byas pa'i ri lu'i ming ni so'i ri lu zhes bya ste/ 'dis bskus na mig nad rab rib dang / pris g.yogs pa dang / mig 'dzer dang / 'brum pa byung ba dang / rma byung ba dang / ling</text></item>
<item><p>265b.4</p><section></section><text>tog la sogs pa sel to/ /ldong ros dang / rgyam tsha dang / nag tshur dang / dung dang / tsha ba gsum dang / skyer khaN+Da rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i khu ba'i mig sman gyis bskus na yang mig nad bris g.yogs pa dang / ling tog dang /</text></item>
<item><p>265b.5</p><section></section><text>mig 'dzer dang / rab rib rnams sel to/ /shing ka bit+ta'i khu ba mu zi'i khu ba nyis gyur dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na skyer khaN+Da dang / stong zil dang / gla sgang gi bzhi 'gyur gyi phye ma dang sbyar ba'i nang du mig sman gyi thur ma bsgres te mig byugs na</text></item>
<item><p>265b.6</p><section></section><text>yang rab rib sel to/ /yang na li shi cha gcig dang / zangs cha gnyis dang / stong zil cha gsum dang / mu zi cha lnga dang / nA ga ge sar cha gsum dang / 'di rnams kyi phye ma snod kha sbyar gyi nang du tshig par brngos la zhib tu btags pas mig</text></item>
<item><p>265b.7</p><section></section><text>sman gyi thur ma la bsgo zhing rtag tu mig byug par bya'o/ /stong zila'am/ skyu ru ra gang yang rung ba'i phye ma mar dang / sbrang rtsir sbyar te/ a ru ra'i snying po phyung ba'i skyin par khong du bcug la slar kha sbyar te bag zan gyis g.yogs nas/ rgya shug</text></item>
<item><p>266a.1</p><section></section><text>gi me'i nang du bsregs la/ bag zan tshig ste dud pa chad nas slar phyung ste bsgrangs la/ a ru ra'i khong na sman 'dug pa btags pa'i phye mas mig sman gyi thur ma la bsgo zhing mig la byugs pa ni rab rib sel ba'i mchog yin no/ /</text></item>
<item><p>266a.2</p><section></section><text>yung dang / skyer pa dang / a ru ra dang / spang spos dang / ru rta dang / pi pi ling rnams zhib tu btags ba'i phye ma 'di'i ming ni/ sangs rgyas pa'i mig sman zhes bya ste/ snga ma bzhin du mig sman gyi thur ma la bsgo zhing mig la byugs na mig nad</text></item>
<item><p>266a.3</p><section></section><text>thams cad sel to/ /yang na stang zil dang / spang spos dang / gan+d+ha pa tra rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbyar la/ sbrul nag po shi ba'i mgo bcad pa'i khar bcug la 'jim pas g.yogs te bsregs la/ 'jim pa tshig ste dmar por gyur nas</text></item>
<item><p>266a.4</p><section></section><text>phyung ste bsgrangs la/ de'i nang gi sman zhib tu btags pa'i phye mas mig sman gyi thur ma la bsgo zhing mig byugs na yang rab rib sel to/ /dug mo nyung gi sa bon mar dang sbyar la/ shing pa to'i lo mo'i nang du phur mar byas te chu'i nang du bskol la</text></item>
<item><p>266a.5</p><section></section><text>tshos par gyur nas/ nang gi khu ba bsgrangs pa mig tu blugs pa'am/ yang na dug mo nyung gi sa bon gyi skyin par bya skams na gnas pa'i sgo nga snga ma bzhin du btsos pa'i khu ba mig tu blugs na mig blta bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na 'bras bu gsum</text></item>
<item><p>266a.6</p><section></section><text>dang / lcags kyi phye ma dang / shing mngar rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba nyal khar rtag tu zos na mig nad do cog sel cing / ro tsa bar yang 'gyur ro/ /'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba dang / 'o ma dang / mar gyi nang du</text></item>
<item><p>266a.7</p><section></section><text>'bras bu gsum gyi bye ma bskol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa las nub mo zhing ran par 'thungs na yang ring mo mi thogs par rab rib sel to/ /sman ra sna dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / rtsa ba bcu pa rnams bskol ba'i khu ba dang / mar gyi nang</text></item>
<item><p>266b.1</p><section></section><text>du sman 'tsho byed ces bya ba sna bcu pa'i phye ma bskol to/ /mar nyi tshe lus pa las ran par 'thungs na yang rab rib sel to// //da ni rna ba'i nad kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ de la rlung las gyur pa'i rna ba'i nad kyi mtshan ma ni/ rna ba gnyis su</text></item>
<item><p>266b.2</p><section></section><text>zug cing na la 'on zhing sgra 'byung ba dang 'dzag pa rnams yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa ni tsha ba 'ur 'ur por 'dug pa yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa ni rna ba'i nang skam la dri mnam pa yin no/ /de dag gso ba'i sman ni/ sman mu raM ga dang / chu</text></item>
<item><p>266b.3</p><section></section><text>shing dang / shi kru dang / la phug dang / sge'u gsher rnams las gang yang rung ba'i khu ba rgyam tsha dang sbyar ba dron pos rna ba gang bar blugs la/ nang du chub par bsgul zhing phyir phos na rna ba'i nad sel to/ /rgyam tsha btags pa shing arga'i lo ma ser</text></item>
<item><p>266b.4</p><section></section><text>po'i nang du phur la/ de'i phyi rol tu yang / arga'i lo ma rim pa bdun gyis g.yogs te me mar mur gyi nang du bcug la/ lo ma nang rim ma tshig tsam du bsregs nas lo ma phyi rim rnams kyang bor/ nang gi rgyam tsha yang bor la/ nang rim gyi lo ma</text></item>
<item><p>266b.5</p><section></section><text>ser po la gsher bag yod pa btsir ba'i khu ba rna bar blugs na yang rna ba'i nad sel to/ /bilpa la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang / thang shing dang / sgron shing rnams las gang yang rung ba'i shing bu'i thor to ras kyis dkris te/ til mar gyi nang du</text></item>
<item><p>266b.6</p><section></section><text>smyugs la bsregs te/ 'bad du bcug pa'i khu ba zags pa dron po rna bar blugs na yang rna ba'i nad sel to/ /ru rta dang / bu bran shing dang / shu dag dang / thang shing dang / shu ti dang / shing kun dang / rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye mar</text></item>
<item><p>266b.7</p><section></section><text>gcin dang / til mar gyi nang du bskol te/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa dron po rna bar blugs na yang rna ba'i nad kyis nyam thag pa sel to/ /ru rta dang / a ru ra la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du shing mngar dang / bu tshangs sto dang / mon</text></item>
<item><p>267a.1</p><section></section><text>sran sde'u dang / 'u su dang / phag tshil rnams bskol te/ phag tshil gyi zhag nyi tshe lus pa las rna bar blugs na yang rna ba na zhing sgra byung ba sel to/ /rna ba mi bzad par na zhing / sgra 'byung la/ chu ser 'dzag pa la</text></item>
<item><p>267a.2</p><section></section><text>bsros pa dron po dang / lce myong tsha sbyar ba rna bar blugs so/ /yang na shing ba ru na dang / ka pit+ta dang / a mra dang / dzam+bU rnams kyi lo ma'i phye ma til mar dang chu'i nang du bskol te til mar nyi tshe lus pa'am/ yang na sna ma'i lo ma'i khu ba rna bar blugs</text></item>
<item><p>267a.3</p><section></section><text>na/ rna ba nas rnag 'dzag pa'i na ba sel te/ thabs de ltar byas pa las kyang / rnag skam po nang du lus pa la ni/ sngar til mar ram/ sman mar gyis sbyar zhing 'byung du btub par bya ba'i sman snum bag blugs pa dang dugs kyis bdugs pa rnams</text></item>
<item><p>267a.4</p><section></section><text>byas nas/ de'i 'og tu skra gzhar 'jam pos rul ba bru bar bya'o// //da ni sna'i nad kyi bye brag bshad de/ de la sna'i nad cham pa zhes bya ba ni/ nad gzhi rnam pa gsum las 'gyur te/ rlung las gyur pa ni sna nas 'dzag pa sla ba yin no/ /</text></item>
<item><p>267a.5</p><section></section><text>mkhris pa las gyur pa ni 'dzag pa'i mdog ser ba yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa ni 'dzag pa dka' ba yin no/ /nad gzhi kun 'dus pa las gyur pa ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/ /de la cham pa'i sman ni/ mgo snum gyis</text></item>
<item><p>267a.6</p><section></section><text>bsku ba dang / dugs bya ba dang / snar sman blug pa dang / skyug sman btang ba dang / sman mar btung ba dang / kha zas ni tsha zhing skyur ba bza' ba la sogs pa sman pas cho ga bzhin du bya'o/ /yang na cham pa la ni sman dri zhim mo cog snod kha sbyar</text></item>
<item><p>267a.7</p><section></section><text>gyi nang du bsregs pa'i dud pa spyi'us drangs te/ kha snar brngub par bya'o/ /yang na dri sna bzhi zhes bya ba/ shing tsha dang / sug smel dang / gan+d+ha pa tra dang / nA ga ge sar rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba'am/ yang na tha phe nag po phur mar 'phur te snar</text></item>
<item><p>267b.1</p><section></section><text>bsnam par bya'o/ /li zir ba dang / ta ma la dang / tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma mar dang bu ram gyi nang du bskol te/ sbyar ba zos na yang cham pa dang / glo rdol ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / snying na ba dang / mkhal rked na ba rnams sel to/ /</text></item>
<item><p>267b.2</p><section></section><text>bya g+h+r-i dang / dan+da'i rtsa ba dang / shu dag dang / shi kru dang / byi'u rug pa dang / tsha ba gsum dang / rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma til mar dang chu'i nang du bskol te/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa snar blugs na/ cham pa yal bar bor ba las sna las rnag 'dzag</text></item>
<item><p>267b.3</p><section></section><text>pa'i lud sel to// //da ni lce nad kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ de la lce nad ni rnam pa gsum ste/ rlung las gyur pa'i lce nad ni/ kha zas kyi ro mi tshor zhing slo slo bor gyur pa dang / 'gags pa dang / shwing a sha ka'i lo ma bzhin du dmar ba rnams</text></item>
<item><p>267b.4</p><section></section><text>yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/ lce rtsub cing tsha ba 'ur 'ur por 'dug la tsag tsag tsha ba yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/ lce ril gyis stug po bem bem por 'dug pa yin no/ /de ltar lce bem bem por gyur pa la</text></item>
<item><p>267b.5</p><section></section><text>ni/ lce bzhar zhing nad khrag ngan pa phyung la nad gzhi gang las gyur pa dang sbyar te/ nad gzhi so so'i sman gyi sde tshan las snar blugs pa dang / mkhur ba bkang zhing phyir dbo ba dang / lce la bsku ba rnams kyi cho ga bya'o// //da ni swo na ba'i cho ga</text></item>
<item><p>267b.6</p><section></section><text>bshad de/ so nad zug cing na ba dang / brtse ba rnam pa gnyis ni/ rlung las gyur pa yin te/ de gnyis la yang / mar ram til mar rlung sman dang sbyar ba dron po'am/ rlung sman bskol ba'i khu ba dron pos kha bshal zhing phyir dbo ba'am yang na pu tse</text></item>
<item><p>267b.7</p><section></section><text>shel dang / gla sgang dang / te dzo ba ti dang / pa tha dang / yung dang / skyer pa dang / seng phrom dang / ru rta dang / sa mang+ga rnams kyi phye mas so drud na/ so'i drud g.ya' ba dang / so khrag 'dzag pa dang zug cing na ba rnams sel to/ /bca' ldan</text></item>
<item><p>268a.1</p><section></section><text>zhing kha nas 'brum pa 'byung ba ni/ khrag dang mkhris pa 'khrugs pa las 'gyur te/ de la ni khrag dbyung ba dang / bkru sman btang ba dang / mar dang / til mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / 'o ma dang / ba gcin rnams las gang</text></item>
<item><p>268a.2</p><section></section><text>yang rung bas kha bkang la ring du bzhag la phyir dbo'o/ /yang na sna ma'i lo ma dang / sle tres dang/ rgun dang / byi tsher dang / skyer pa dang / 'bras bu gsum po rnams bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar bas mkhur ba bkang zhing byir</text></item>
<item><p>268a.3</p><section></section><text>pho na tsha ldan zhing khar 'brum pa byung pa sel to/ /rkan gyi phug nas lce'u chung 'dug pa'am skrangs pa'i nad ni/ bad kan dang / khrag 'khrugs pa las gyur pa yin te/ de ni brtol la/ tsha ba gsum dang / rgyam tsha dang / shu dag dang / sbrang</text></item>
<item><p>268a.4</p><section></section><text>rtsi rnams sbyar ba khar bzhag cing khu ba phyir dbo bas bad kan drang bar bya'o// //lkog ma'i nad sha lu ka zhes bya ba/ lkog ma'i nang du 'brum pa rgya shug gi 'bras bu 'dra ba ril ril por 'byung ba ni/ bad kan las gyur pa yin te/ de'i cho ga ni gtar</text></item>
<item><p>268a.5</p><section></section><text>ba'i dpyad mdzub mo gtsags bu phre'u bcings pas brtol te/ snga ma bzhin du de dang 'phrod pa'i sman mur zhing / khu ba phyir dbo bar bya'o/ /lkog ma'i nad ro hi ni zhes bya ba/ lkog ma'i nang du sha lhag myu gu ltar skye ba ring po zhig 'byung ba ni nad</text></item>
<item><p>268a.6</p><section></section><text>gzhi gsum po re re dang / kun 'dus pa dang / khrag gi nyes pa rnams las gyur pa yin te/ so so'i mtshan ma'i sgo nas rtogs par bya'o/ /de'i cho ga mchis te cher skyes na/ srog la yang 'bab par byed pas na cho ga myur te bya'o/ /de la</text></item>
<item><p>268a.7</p><section></section><text>cho ga ni de dag thams cad la yang gtar ga bya zhing khrag phyung la/ nad gzhi so so gang las gyur pa'i sman sbyar bas kha na bzhag bzhag cing bad kan drang bar bya'o/ /de las rlung las gyur pa la ni/ rgyam tsha dang / kha ru tsha dang / rtsabs</text></item>
<item><p>268b.1</p><section></section><text>ru tsha rnams sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba khar bzhag cing khu ba phyir dbo bar bya'o/ /mkhris pa dang/ khrag las gyur pa la ni/ kha ra dang / rma shing gi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba kha na bzhag cing / bad kan las gyur pa la ni/ khyim gyi du ba dang /</text></item>
<item><p>268b.2</p><section></section><text>tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba khar bzhag cing khu ba phyir dbo bar bya'o/ /sman ra sna dang / kha ru tsha dang / tsha ba gsum dang / khyim gyi du ba dang / gla sgang dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/ khar</text></item>
<item><p>268b.3</p><section></section><text>bzhag cing khu ba phyir pho na yang / lkog ma'i nad do cog 'byong bar byed do/ /yang na rgyam tsha dang / ba bla dang / ldong ros dang / rgya skyegs dang / skyer pa rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te khar bzhag cing bad kan drang ba ni/ lkog ma'i nad rnams dang /</text></item>
<item><p>268b.4</p><section></section><text>kha nad rnams sel ba'i mchog yin no/ /shing tsha dang / sug smel dang / gan d+ha pa tra dang / na le sham dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang / shing pa ta'i thal ba dang / shing ku sha'i thal ba dang / tsha ba rnam lnga la pi pi ling dang / pi pi ling gi rtsa</text></item>
<item><p>268b.5</p><section></section><text>ba dang / dbyi mo dang / kru trug tres dang / bca' sga rnams kyi phye ma bu ram dang chu bskol te tshos par byas nas phyir phyung ba dang sbyar te/ ri lur byas pa khar bzhag cing khu ba phyir pho na yang lkog ma'i nad sel to/ /skyer pa'i rtsa ba'i shun lpags dang / te</text></item>
<item><p>268b.6</p><section></section><text>dzo ba ti dang / pi pi ling dang / skyer khaN+Da rnams kyang snga ma bzhin du bu ram bskol ba dang sbyar te ri lur byas pa khar bzhag cing khu ba phyir pho na yang lkog ma'i nad rnams dang khar 'brum pa 'byung ba'i nad rnams sel to/ /dug mo nyung dang / bong dkar</text></item>
<item><p>268b.7</p><section></section><text>bo dang / thang shing dang / pa tha dang / pu tse shel dang / gla sgang rnams ba gcin gyi nang du bskol la bzhi cha lus pa bsgrangs te btsags nas sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'thungs na yang lkog ma'i nad sel to// //da ni klad pa'i nad kyi bye brag bshad de/ rlung</text></item>
<item><p>269a.1</p><section></section><text>las gyur pa'i klad pa'i nad ni/ klad pa stong par 'dug pa snyam byed pa dang zug cing na ba yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa ni shin tu tsha ba yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa ni lci ba bem bem por 'dug pa yin no/ /gsum</text></item>
<item><p>269a.2</p><section></section><text>char 'dus pa las gyur pa ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/ /klad pa'i nang na srin bu yod pa'i nad ni g.ya' zhing zug ste na ba yin no/ /klad pa'i nad nyi ma bzhin du 'khor ba zhes bya ba nyi ma shar nas ldang ba nyi ma nub nas zhi bar 'gyur ba</text></item>
<item><p>269a.3</p><section></section><text>dang / klad pa'i phyed na ba dang 'di gnyis ni rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur par shes par bya'o/ /klad pa'i nad za 'gram du zug cing mi bzad par na ba ni/ rlung dang / khrag dang / bad kan las gyur pa yin te gsor mi rung gi spang bar bya'o/ /de la</text></item>
<item><p>269a.4</p><section></section><text>rlung las gyur pa'i klad pa'i nad la ni/ rlung nad gso ba'i sman gyi cho ga rnams bya'o/ /yang na rlung sel ba'i sman gyi khu ba las gzhi blangs te sbyar thug ces bya ba/ 'bras dang til dang mon sran sde'u gsum bsres pa'i thug pa'am/ 'bras kyi 'o</text></item>
<item><p>269a.5</p><section></section><text>thug la sogs pas mgo bsku zhing dugs par bya'o/ /yang na pi pi ling dang / ru rta dang / shu ti dang / ut+pal dang / tsan dan rnams kyi phye ma/ shing karko ta'i khu ba dang / til mar gyi nang du bskol te/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags</text></item>
<item><p>269a.6</p><section></section><text>pa snar blugs so/ /yang na sman gyi phye ma dang / sman gyi khu ba rnams mar dang sbyar te mgor bsku bar bya'o/ /yang na shing mngar dang / ba bla dang / ra sna dang rtsa ba bcu pa rnams bskol ba'i khu ba dang / mar gyi nang du sman 'tsho byed ces bya ba sman</text></item>
<item><p>269a.7</p><section></section><text>bcu la sogs pa sman ro mngar ba rnams kyi phye ma bskol la mar nyi tsha lus pa btsags pa las ran par 'thungs na/ nam tshong yan chad kyi nad thams cad sel to/ /dzi ba ka dang / zangs rtsi ba dang / rgun dang / kha ra dang / shing mngar dang /</text></item>
<item><p>269b.1</p><section></section><text>ba la dang / ut+pal rnams kyi phye ma til mar dang / 'o ma phyed ma'i nang du bskol la til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te ran par snar blugs na rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i klad pa'i nad sel to/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i klad pa'i nad la ni/ ba la dang/</text></item>
<item><p>269b.2</p><section></section><text>stag gi sen mo dang / pu shel tse dang / shing mngar dang / ut+pal dang / tsan dan rnams kyi phye ma'o ma dang lhan cig tu btags te mgor bsku'o/ /yang na 'o ma'am/ sman bsil ba'i khu ba la sogs pa mgo bor blugs so/ /yang na shing</text></item>
<item><p>269b.3</p><section></section><text>tsha dang / gan+d+ha pa tra dang / kha ra rnams kyi phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar te btsags nas snar blugs so/ /yang na rgun dang / kha ra dang / shing mngar rnams kyi phye ma mar dang 'o ma'i nang du bskol la/ mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te</text></item>
<item><p>269b.4</p><section></section><text>snar blugs so/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i mgo bo'i nad kyis nyam thag pa la ni/ sngar shing ma d+ha ka'i snying po cham chom du brdungs te bskol ba'i phur mas phur bas klad pa dugs kyis bdug gam/ yang na thang shing dang / ro hi sha dang / sha</text></item>
<item><p>269b.5</p><section></section><text>raM ga ta dang / rgyam tsha dang / sgron shing rnams kyi phye ma chu dang lhan cig tu btags pas mgo bskus la/ de'i 'og tu sman snar blugs pas sna nas chu ser dbyung bar bya'o/ /de la sna las chu ser 'byung ba'i sman ni/ shu ti dang / e raN+Da'i rtsa ba dang /</text></item>
<item><p>269b.6</p><section></section><text>shu dag dang / rgya spos dang / bya g+h+ri'i 'bras bu rnams kyi phye ma/ til mar dang chu'i nang du bskol la til mar nyi tshe lus pa snar blugs na/ rlung dang bad kan las gyur pa'i mig nad rab rib dang / nam tshong yan chad kyi nad thams cad sel to/ /</text></item>
<item><p>269b.7</p><section></section><text>nad gzhi gsum ga las gyur pa'i klad pa'i nad yod pa la ni mar rnying pa btung bar bya'o/ /yang na nad gzhi gsum la phan pa'i sman gyi cho ga gang yin pa rnams kyang bya'o/ /srin bu las gyur pa'i klad pa'i nad yod pa la/ tsha ba gsum dang / rgya spos</text></item>
<item><p>270a.1</p><section></section><text>dang / shig gru'i sa bon rnams bskol ba'i khu ba snar blugs na srin bu sel to/ /yang na shing a ba marga'i 'bras bu dang / tsha ba gsum dang / yung dang / bsha' ba dang / shing kun dang / byi dong ka rnams kyi phye ma ba</text></item>
<item><p>270a.2</p><section></section><text>gcin dang til mar gyi nang du bskol la/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te snar blugs na srin bu sel to/ /grang ba'i nad nyi ma shar nas nub kyi bar du na ba dang klad pa'i phyed na ba gnyis la ni/ thal tres dang / shing mngar dang / ru rta rnams kyi</text></item>
<item><p>270a.3</p><section></section><text>phye ma rtsabs skyur po dang sbyar te mgor byug go/ /yang na rlung dang mkhris pa la phan pa'i sman bskol ba'i khu bas mgor blug par bya'o/ /kha zas ni zhi ti'u la sogs pa rlung dang mkhris pa la phan pa'i kha zas bza' bar bya'o/ /sna ma'i thal ba dang /</text></item>
<item><p>270a.4</p><section></section><text>gla sgang dang / shing tsha dang / ras bal gyi 'bras bu rnams bskol ba'i khu ba'am/ yang na shing mngar gyi phye ma mar dang bskol la btsags te snar blugs na klad pa'i nad thams cad sel to/ /yang na bca' sga dang / byi dong ka dang / shing mngar</text></item>
<item><p>270a.5</p><section></section><text>rnams kyi phye ma/ b+h+ring ga rA dza bskol ba'i khu ba dang / mar gyi nang du bskol ba las thigs pa drug snar blugs na nam tshong yan chad kyi nad thams cad sel to// //da ni skra dkar po'i rtsi bshad de/ pra puN+Da ri ka dang / shing mngar dang /</text></item>
<item><p>270a.6</p><section></section><text>pi pi ling dang / u t+pal dang / tsan dan rnams kyi phye ma skyu ru ra bskol ba'i khu ba dang til mar gyi nang du bskol la til nyi tshe lus pa snar blugs na/ skra dkar ba dang / skra ser ba med par byed do/ /yang na sman ram dang / she lu dang / til dang /</text></item>
<item><p>270a.7</p><section></section><text>ba ru ra rnams kyi mar b+h+ri ng+ga rA dza dang / ni li dang / ku ran d+ha dang / shri sha rnams kyi khu ba dang bskol te mar nyi tshe lus pa las rtag tu snar blugs na skra dkar med par gyur/ rma bya'i mkhris pa dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / shing la ko dang / ma ta</text></item>
<item><p>270b.1</p><section></section><text>yan ti dang / stong zil dang / ut+pal dang / ni li dang / b+h+ring+ga rA dza dang / nag tshur rnams kyi phye ma ba ru ra'i mar dang chu'i nang du bskol te/ ba ru ra'i mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags la zla ba gcig gi bar du lcags kyi snod du bzhag ste/ mgo la bsku</text></item>
<item><p>270b.2</p><section></section><text>zhing snar blugs na/ de ma thag tu dus la ma bab par skra dkar ba dang / dus la ba ba ste skra dkar ba med par byed do/ /lcags kyi phye ma dang / rgyam tsha dang / 'bras rnams rtsabs skyur po dang / tshwa dang / zho kha chu rnams gang yang rung ba'i nang</text></item>
<item><p>270b.3</p><section></section><text>du bskol bas nub mo mgo la byugs la/ nang par 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu bas bkrus na skra nag por 'gyur ro/ /skra 'khor ling du byi ba la ni/ sman sra ha ta'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te bskus na skye bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na 'ol ma se'i rtsa ba</text></item>
<item><p>270b.4</p><section></section><text>dang / 'bras bu gang yang rung ba ba gcin dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na go bye'i khu bas byug par bya'o/ /shing pa ta'i myu gu dang / b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i phye ma sle tres kyi khu ba dang sbyar te nyi tshan gyi drod kyis bsros pas bskus na yang skra mi skye ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ /</text></item>
<item><p>270b.5</p><section></section><text>mig nad la phan par 'dod pas ni rtag tu mar btung ba dang / 'bras bu gsum gyi sman sbyar ba dang / gtar ga gdab pa dang / bkru sman btang zhing kha zas su 'bras dang / mon sran sde'u dang / nas dang / ri dwags skam sa na gnas pa'i sha</text></item>
<item><p>270b.6</p><section></section><text>bza' bar bya'o/ /mig sman gyi rgyud kyi le'u rtsa drug pa rdzogs so// //sman dpyad gces pa grub pa zhes bya ba/ bam po bdun pa ste tha ma'o// //de nas dug gso ba'i rgyud kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /dug ni rtsi dug dang / sdig sbrul</text></item>
<item><p>270b.7</p><section></section><text>gyi za dug dang rnam pa gnyis so/ /de la rtsi dug ni rtsa ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin/ phyi ma ni sbrul la sogs pa las byung ba yin no/ /dug la phan gnod rnam pa bcu yod de/ ya nga ba dang / ro mi bro ba dang / cha phras te rtsar 'gro ba dang / rtsub</text></item>
<item><p>271a.1</p><section></section><text>pa dang / drod che ba dang / myur ba dang / khyab pa dang / bad kan sdud cing 'dren pa dang / dri sbyor ba dang / rno ba rnams yin par bshad do/ /sbrul ni mgo che ba'i rigs dang / lus 'khyil ba'i rigs dang / khra bo'i rigs</text></item>
<item><p>271a.2</p><section></section><text>'di gsum gyi bye brag las/ rlung gi rang bzhin can dang / mkhris pa'i rang bzhin can dang / bad kan gyi rang bzhin can dang gsum yod par bshad de/ go rim bzhin du so sor sbyar ro/ /rigs 'dres pa ni mtshan ma gnyis gnyis 'dres pa dang</text></item>
<item><p>271a.3</p><section></section><text>ldan pa yin no/ /de la sbrul mgo chen po'i rigs kyis zin pa ni/ rma kha gnag pa yin no/ /rlung nad kyi rnam grangs dang / mtshan ma thams cad bskyed do/ /sbrul lus 'khyil ba'i rigs kyis zin pa ni/ rma kha che la mdog ser zhing skrangs</text></item>
<item><p>271a.4</p><section></section><text>pa yin te/ mkhris pa'i nad gyi sna grangs dang mtshan ma thams cad skyed do/ /sbrul khra bo'i rigs kyis zin pa ni/ rma dbal skya zhing / skrangs pa myur du 'dzub tu mi btub la 'byil zhing snum pa dang / khrag 'dzag pa shin tu bska ba rnams yin te/</text></item>
<item><p>271a.5</p><section></section><text>bad kan gyi nad kyi sna grangs dang / mtshan ma thams cad skyed do/ /rgyu skar mchu dang / lag dang / smin drug dang / skag dang / bra nye dang / gre dang / chu stod dang / khrums smad rnams kyi nyin par sbrul gyis zin pa ni shin tu bsgrims na</text></item>
<item><p>271a.6</p><section></section><text>'ga' zhig 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /tshes bzhi dang / lnga dang / drug dang / dgu dang / nyi shu dgu dang / dus tshigs gnyis te/ nam langs ka dang / nam tshab tshub dang / 'di rnams kyi dus su sbrul gyis zin pa yang mi bzad pa yin par bshad do/ /</text></item>
<item><p>271a.7</p><section></section><text>sbrul gyis zin pa las/ skra 'byi ba dang / lus phrugs sam blud na/ rjes mi snang ba dang / shin tu grang mos kyang ba spu mi ldang zhing / grang 'brum mi 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni sbang bar bya'o/ /de la thog ma zin ma thag tu snying la dug mi 'dzin par bsrung</text></item>
<item><p>271b.1</p><section></section><text>ba'i phyir smyur te mar sbyin no/ /de nas gang zin pa bcing ba dang / brdabs ru la sogs pas gzhib cing drang ba dang / gar zin pa chu bkor du bcas pa dang / rma kha bsreg pa dang / rma kha dang / nyen kor nas gtar zhing khrag dbyung ba rnams bya bar bshad do/ /</text></item>
<item><p>271b.2</p><section></section><text>de la sbrul mgo chen po'i rigs kyis zin pa la ni/ nir rgun thi dang / shwe ti'i khu ba 'thungs na sel bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na srin bu ba ra dza'i rtsa ba'i phye ma rang gi khu ba dang brdzis te skams la slar yang brdzi zhing bskam pa de lta bur lan mang du bskol te btung bar</text></item>
<item><p>271b.3</p><section></section><text>bya'o/ /sbrul lus 'khyil ba'i rigs kyis zin pa la ni/ shing ba ta'i yal ga'i thor to dang / btsod dang / dzi ba ka dang / zangs tsi ba dang / kha ra dang / taM ba la dang / shing mngar rnams kyi phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba'am chu bskol te bsgrangs ba dang</text></item>
<item><p>271b.4</p><section></section><text>sbyar ba btung ngo / /sbrul khro bo'i rigs kyis zin pa la ni/ ha re Nu ka dang / ru rta dang / rgya spos dang / tsha ba gsum dang / pu tse shel dang / bong nga dkar po dang / shing mngar dang / khyim gyi dud pa rnams kyi phye ma chu bskol ba grang mo dang sbyar te 'thungs na</text></item>
<item><p>271b.5</p><section></section><text>dug sel bar byed do/ /spang spos dang / tsan dan dang / rgyam tsha dang / pi pi ling dang / shing mngar dang / na le sham dang / ut+pal dang / ba lang gi mkhris pa rnams kyi phye ma chu dang sbyar te btsags la mig bskus na dug gis phog ste brgyal ba slar</text></item>
<item><p>271b.6</p><section></section><text>langs par 'gyur ro/ /yang na na k+ta ma la dang / po son cha dang / tsha ba gsum dang / bilba'i rtsa ba dang / yung dang / skyer pa dang / byi'u rug gi me tog dang / 'di rnams phye ma ra gcin dang sbyar te btsags pas mig bskus na yang slar dran par</text></item>
<item><p>271b.7</p><section></section><text>'gyur ro/ /ma yu ra ka'i sa bon dang / shi ri sha'i sa bon dang / rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma 'am/ yang na nas dang / po son cha'i sa bon dang / pa ta rnams kyi phye ma chu dang sbyar te btsags pa snar blugs na yang slar dran par 'gyur ro/ /sman karko ta'i</text></item>
<item><p>272a.1</p><section></section><text>rtsa ba'i phye ma ra gcin gyis lan mang du bsgos la/ rtsabs dang lhan cig tu btags te btsags pa stsar blugs na yang dug gis sems nyams par byas pa las slar dran par 'gyur ro/ /shi ri sha dang / a rish+ta dang / nak+ta</text></item>
<item><p>272a.2</p><section></section><text>ma la dang / ba la dang / do dasha ta ka'i 'bras bu rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin dang lhan cig tu btags te btsags pa ni dug sman gyi mchog yin te/ btung ba la sogs pa byas na dug sel bar byed do/ /a ko ta dang / a rish+ta dang / d+ha dur dang /</text></item>
<item><p>272a.3</p><section></section><text>snu hak+Shi ri dang / karany+dza dang / a sho ma ra dang / pu na rna ba dang / kru trug tres dang / pha li dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / dug mo nyung gi shun lpags dang / arka rnams sbyar ba yang dug sman chen po yin no/ /rgya spos dang / na le sham dang /</text></item>
<item><p>272a.4</p><section></section><text>ldong res dang / thang shing dang / nak+tam la dang / arka dang / yung dang / skyer pa dang / shi ri sha dang / pi pi ling rnams sbyar ba yang dug sman yin te/ dug sel bar byed do/ /sku ba ro kha ba'i sa bon ba lang gi mkhris pa dang lhan cig tu btags</text></item>
<item><p>272a.5</p><section></section><text>pa 'di ni tshangs pa'i dug sman zhes bya ste btung ba la sogs pa byas na dug thams cad sel to/ /shi ri shi'i rtsa ba dang / shun lpags dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / sa bon rnam pa 'di lnga ba gcin dang lhan cig tu btags pa'i sman 'di</text></item>
<item><p>272a.6</p><section></section><text>yang dug sel ba yin no/ /btsod dang / sug smel dang / yung dang / skyer pa dang / rgya skyegs dang / spang spos dang / shing mngar dang / ha re Nu ka rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'di yang dug sman yin te/ dug sel ba dang / brgyal</text></item>
<item><p>272a.7</p><section></section><text>ba las slar dran par byed pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad byed do/ /lan tshwa rnam pa lnga dang / shing nye rong dang / dan+ti mu la dang / ba shi la dang / tsha ba gsum dang / yung dang / skyer pa dang / btsod rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i dug</text></item>
<item><p>272b.1</p><section></section><text>sman dwa'i nang du bzhag pa yang las thams cad byed pa yin no/ /tsan dan dang / ba bla dang / ldong ros dang / ru rta dang / shing tsha dang / gan+d+ha pa tra dang / sug smel dang / gla sgang dang / yungs kar dang / spang spos dang / shug pa dang / rgya</text></item>
<item><p>272b.2</p><section></section><text>spos dang / gur gum dang / bye'u rug pa dang / e ka hA dang / smyig rkang dang / spri ka dang / shing kun dang / ba la ka dang / la mats+tsha dang / shu ti dang / gan+d+ha pri yaM ku rnams kyi phye ma sbyar ba'i dug sman gyi ming ni/ zla shar zhes bya ste dug thams cad</text></item>
<item><p>272b.3</p><section></section><text>'joms par byed do/ /shing nye rong dang / nAg ge sar dang / pa ta li dang / pi piling dang / btsod dang / ki ni hi dang / ldong ros dang / go byi tar dang / na le sham dang / rgya spos dang / yung dang / skyer pa dang / pog dkar po dang / a pa ra</text></item>
<item><p>272b.4</p><section></section><text>dzi ta dang / briha tI dang / shing mngar rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin dang lhan cig btags pa'i dug sman 'di'i ming ni/ nyi shar zhes bya ste/ dug dang gdon thub po/ /i shwar dang / chu shing dang / nagi dang / tsan dra dang / shwe ta dang / mon sne'u</text></item>
<item><p>272b.5</p><section></section><text>dmar ru dang / nirgun+ti rnams sbyar ba'am/ yang na re re yang rung ste dug gsod pa'i mchog yin no/ /rgya skyegs shing gi thal ba pa chu dang sbyar te btsags la dri ma dang snyigs ma bor ba'i nang du/ ha re Nu ka dang / ru rta dang / rgya spos dang / tsha ba</text></item>
<item><p>272b.6</p><section></section><text>gsum dang / bye'u rug pa dang / thal tres dang / gla sgang dang / spang spos dang / shing kun dang / yung dang / skyer pa dang / shing mngar dang / byi dang ga dang rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma bskol te gzar bu la chags su btub pa tsam du tshos nas/</text></item>
<item><p>272b.7</p><section></section><text>rwa'i nang du bzhag pa las nang re bzhin rgya shug gi 'brum bu tsam re re 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba'am/ 'o ma'am char pa'i chu gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na dug gi mthu chen po yang sel cing / gcong dang / skran dang / dmu rdzings dang / gzhang</text></item>
<item><p>273a.1</p><section></section><text>'brum dang / gcin snyi ba'i nad dang / drod chung ba dang / rims rnams med par byed do/ /yang na dug 'thungs pa la/ ba lang gi gci ba'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i skyug sman blud de skyug tu gzhug go/ dug sman gyi sbyor ba mang</text></item>
<item><p>273a.2</p><section></section><text>po rnams las gang gtang yang rung ste/ thog mar snying la dug mi 'dzin par bsrung ba'i phyir smyur te mar blud par bya'o/ /rtsa ba'i dug dang / mda' dug can gyis rmas pa la ni/ yung dang / rgyam tshwa dang / sbrang rtsi rnams sbyar ba'i mar mchog tu bzang ste btung</text></item>
<item><p>273a.3</p><section></section><text>bar bya'o/ /zangs dang / gser gyi phye ma khar dang sbrang rtsis sbyar ba'i lde gu zos na dug sbyar ma shin tu drag po thams cad kyang zhi bar byed do/ /sdig pas zin pa la ni shing tA la'i lo ma dang / nim+pa'i lo ma dang / skra dang / ras rnying pa rnams mar dang sbyar te bsregs</text></item>
<item><p>273a.4</p><section></section><text>pa'i dud pa'am/ yang na rma bya'i sgro 'o ma dang skyar te bsregs pa'i dud pas bdugs par bya'o/ /yang na pa la sha'i sa bon shing arka'i 'o ma dang lhan gcig btags pa'i lde khu dang / yang na pi pi ling dang shi ri sha'i 'bras bu sbyar ba'i lde gus rma khar skus na</text></item>
<item><p>273a.5</p><section></section><text>sdig pa'i dug gis nyam thag pa sel to/ /yang na ldong ros dang / rgyam tsha dang / shing kun dang / sna ma'i lo ma dang / bca' sga rnams kyi phye ma ba lang gi lci ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te btang la ri lu byas pa yang sdig pa'i dug gis nyam thag pa sel to/ /byi ba'i</text></item>
<item><p>273a.6</p><section></section><text>sos zin pa'i dug la ni/ til gyi rtsa ba dang / karko ta'i rtsa ba dang / til ka'i rtsa ba dang / gi karni ka'i rtsa ba rnams [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]phye ma kha ra dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang / sbyar te 'thung na byi bas zin pa'i dug sel to/ /yang</text></item>
<item><p>273a.7</p><section></section><text>na byi bas zin pa'i dug la/ ha tsa ra'i rtsa ba'i phye ma dang / sbrang rtsi 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na ti la ka'i me tog gam lo ma gang yang rung ba 'o ma dang / lhan cig tu btags te btung bar</text></item>
<item><p>273b.1</p><section></section><text>bya'o/ /yang na byi la'i sha'am/ ne'u le'i sha gang yang rung ba btsos pa'i khu ba 'thungs na/ byi bas zin pa'i dug bla gnyan gyi nad dang bcas pa yang myur du sel to/ /khyi smyon gyis zos pa la ni/ shing a ko ta'i yal ga'i thor to dang rtsa ba bskol te</text></item>
<item><p>273b.2</p><section></section><text>gdus pa'i khu ba srang gsum gyi nang du zhun mar srang gcig btab ste 'thungs na khyi smyon gyis zin pa'i dug sel to/ /yang na bu mar dang / til btags pa'i phye ma shing arka'i 'o ma dang til mar gyis sbyar te 'thungs na khyi so gdug pas zin pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>273b.3</p><section></section><text>dug 'tsho dka' ba yang myur du sel bar byed do/ /srog chags phra mo'o cog gis zin pa'i dug sman ni/ nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang / swa rtsi ka'i thal ba dang / tsha ba gsum dang / shu dag dang / shing kun dang / byi dang ka dang / rgyam tsha</text></item>
<item><p>273b.4</p><section></section><text>dang / rgya spos dang / aM brta dang / bong nga dkar po dang / ru rta rnams kyi phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu bar btab cing bsku bar bya'o/ /shing nye rong gi rtsa ba dang / mon sne'u dmar ru'i phye ma cha bsnyams te/ mar dang sbyar ba 'thungs na yang srog</text></item>
<item><p>273b.5</p><section></section><text>chags phra mo thams cad kyi dug shin tu mthu che ba yang myur du sel lo/ /yang phug ron gyi rtug pa dang / dan ti mul dang / ba lang gi so dang / rgyam tsha dang / shing nye rong dang / le brgan rtsi'i sa bon dang / slu ha shiri dang / kru trug tres dang /</text></item>
<item><p>273b.6</p><section></section><text>karni kar rnams sbyar ba yang srog chags phra mo'i dug sel ba'i mchog yin no/ /tsan dan dang / shug pa dang / ru rta dang / rgya spos dang / pu shel tse dang / pa ta la dang / nirgun thi dang / thal tres dang / she lu rnams sbyar ba ni srog chags</text></item>
<item><p>273b.7</p><section></section><text>phra mos kha dug go cog gi dug sel ba'i sman yin no/ /ka pit+tha dang / pa ta li dang / she lu dang / shi ri sha dang / pu na rna ba rnam gnyis dang / shwe ta rnam gnyis dang / 'di rnams sbyar ba yang srog chags phra mos kha dug go cog gi dug thams cad</text></item>
<item><p>274a.1</p><section></section><text>sel ba'i sman yin no/ /sdig pas zin pa'i dug ma gtogs pa dug gis nyam thag pa gzhan thams cad la ni/ kha zas dang / sman la sogs pa bsil ba'i cho ga rnams bya'o/ /dug gis phog go cog la khro ba dang / nyi ma la</text></item>
<item><p>274a.2</p><section></section><text>'dug pa dang / nyin bar nyal ba dang / nyal po rnams byar mi rung ngo / /dug gis phog pa las rims la sogs pa'i bla gnyan gyi nad gzhan gyis thebs pa rnams la ni so so'i sman gang yin pa smyur te gso bar bya'o/ /dug gis nyam thag pa rnams</text></item>
<item><p>274a.3</p><section></section><text>la kha zas kyang tsha ba bskyed par mi 'gyur ba rnams bza' zhing btung bar bya'o/ /dug gso ba'i rgyud kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs so// //de nas sman bcud kyis len dang / ro tsa bar bya ba'i rgyud kyi le'u ba shad par bya'o/ /de la sman</text></item>
<item><p>274a.4</p><section></section><text>gang skra dkar ba dang / na ba med bar byed ba de ni bcud kyis len zhes bya ba yin no/ /de yang na tshong dang / pho gzhon nu'i tshe'am/ yang na bar ma'i tshe bsgrub par bya ste/ sngar skyug sman dang / bkru sman dang / khrus la sogs pas lus kyi phyi nang dag</text></item>
<item><p>274a.5</p><section></section><text>par byas nas brtsam par bya'o/ /de la sgrub pa'i thabs ni/ mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / lcags kyi phye ma dang / skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu'i phye ma rnams sbyar pas bum pa bkang la/ lo phyed kyi bar du nas kyi dkyil du bzhag pa las rgyun tu bran par zos</text></item>
<item><p>274a.6</p><section></section><text>na/ skra dkar por gyur pa med par byed do/ /yang na a ru ra dang / pi pi ling dang / byi dang ga dang / skyu ru ra dang / kha ra rnams kyi phye ma dang / lcags kyi phye ma rnams mar dang til mar dang sbyar te zos na rgas pas mi tshugs so/ /byi dang ga dang /</text></item>
<item><p>274a.7</p><section></section><text>sa p+ta par+Na dang / skyu ru ra dang / lcags byi bye ma rnams sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang / til mar rnams dang sbyar ba ji ste mis zos nas gzhon nur gyur pa de ni ngo mtshar mi che'o/ /byi dang ka dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma dang /</text></item>
<item><p>274b.1</p><section></section><text>lcags kyi phye ma rnams mar dang / kha ra dang / sbrang rtsi rnams dang sbyar te rgyun tu zos na yang rgas pa dang / skra dkar por gyur pa sel to/ /lcags kyi phye ma dang / kha ra dang / bca' sga dang / pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma dang / mar dang / til mar</text></item>
<item><p>274b.2</p><section></section><text>rnams 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du blugs te/ gzar bu la chags su btub pa tsam du bskol ba yang sman bcud kyis len du 'gyur ro/ /lcags glebs te dmar por bsregs la 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa'i nang du smyug cing</text></item>
<item><p>274b.3</p><section></section><text>khol bcad par bya ba de lta bur lan mang du byas pa'i lcags te se brdar gyis brdar ba'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang mar dang sbyar te zos na yang tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na skyu ru ra bskol ba'i khu ba dang / mar sbrang rtsi rnams cha bsnyams te srang brgya brgya dang / lcags</text></item>
<item><p>274b.4</p><section></section><text>kyi phye ma srang nyis brgya dang / 'di rnams sbyar ba lcags kyi snod du blugs te bzhag pa yang tshe ring bar byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /drub mar chang dang / 'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma dang / sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te zos na yang / gshin rje'i snga ltas skra dkar</text></item>
<item><p>274b.5</p><section></section><text>por gyur ba med par byed do/ /byi dang ga'i phye ma dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / lcags kyi phye ma rnams cha bsnyams te sbyar ba bum pa'i nang du blugs la/ mon sran sde'u'i dkyil du bzhag pa las ran par zos na/ skra mthing gar 'gyur zhing stobs</text></item>
<item><p>274b.6</p><section></section><text>dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /taM pa la phye ma srang brgya dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi srang brgya sbyar te zla ba gcig gi bar du snod kyi nang du bzhag pa las/ rgyun tu zos la kha zas 'o ma dang ldan par zos na skra dkar po med par byed cing zla ba bzhin du mdzes par 'gyur ro/ /</text></item>
<item><p>274b.7</p><section></section><text>sman par hi'i rtsa ba'i phye ma srang brgya sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/ mthar gyis za zhing 'o mas phul la kha zas 'o ma dang mar dang ldan par za zhing / nan tan du byas na lang tsho dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /yang na zla ba gcig gi bar du sman ba ra hi zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma sbrang</text></item>
<item><p>275a.1</p><section></section><text>rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu zos la/ de'i 'og tu ba ra hi'i phyi ma 'o ma dang bskol te bsgrangs la btsags pa 'thungs na yang sman bcud kyi len du 'gyur ro/ /pu na rna ba'i rtsa ba zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma srang phyed 'o ma bskol te phyung ba'i nang du btab</text></item>
<item><p>275a.2</p><section></section><text>ste zla ba gnyis sam lo gcig gi bar du rgyun du 'thungs na yang rga ba med par 'gyur ro/ /nye 'u shing dang / sab+ta bar+Na dang / pu shel tse dang / pa tha dang / ba la dang / na ga ba la dang / bi di ra dang / thal tres dang / bya g+t+ri rnams kyang re re nas bun</text></item>
<item><p>275a.3</p><section></section><text>rna ba'i cho ga gong du bshad pa bzhin du byas na/ yon tan de bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /sha skye bar 'dod pa la ni/ zla ba phyed kyi bar du/ sman a sho gan+d+ha'i phye ma/ til mar dang / mar dang 'o ma dang / chu bskol ba dron so rnams las gang yang rung ba dang</text></item>
<item><p>275a.4</p><section></section><text>sbyar te 'thungs nas kha zas 'phrod pa bza' bar bya'o/ /sman bcud kyis len sgrub par 'dod pa rnams kyis ni/ rtag tu kha zas 'bras zhag drug cus smin pa'i chan 'o ma dang / mon sran sde'u'i khu bcud dang / rkang 'gros dang / ri dwags skams na</text></item>
<item><p>275a.5</p><section></section><text>gnas pa'i sha khu rnams las gang yang rung ba dang bsreg cing bza' bar bya'o/ /ro tsa bar bya ba'i cho ga ni/ shing mngar gyi phye ma zho gnyis mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/ rtag tu zos la de'i rjes la 'o ma 'thungs na rgan po yang ro tsa bar byed do/ /mon</text></item>
<item><p>275a.6</p><section></section><text>swan sde'u srang re re cho ga gong ma ltar byas na yang de bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /ad+ma gup+ta'i sa bon dang / gze ma'i rtsa ba dang / kha ra rnams kyi phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na sman uts+tsha de'i phye ma kha ra dang / 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'thungs na yang / ro tsa bar 'gyur</text></item>
<item><p>275a.7</p><section></section><text>ro/ /byi da ra'i phye ma de nyid kyi khu bas lan mang du bsgos pa btags te/ mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gus ni shin tu ro tsa bar bshad do/ /ra dug pa'i ldag pa'i 'bras bu 'o ma'i nang du legs par btsos te zhu bar byas pa'i nang du/ til lan mang du</text></item>
<item><p>275b.1</p><section></section><text>bsgos pa zos ba'i rjes la/ 'o ma 'thungs pa gang yin pa de'i pho mtshan rtag tu bsgreng bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na mon sran sde'u shun lpags bshus te zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma 'o ma dang mar gyi nang du bskol te/ thug pa bska rab tu gyur nas phyung la</text></item>
<item><p>275b.2</p><section></section><text>bsgrangs te sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i ri lu shing bilba'i 'bras bu tsam du byas pa nyin gcig bzhin du zos na yang / pho mtshan bsgreng zhing nyal po nus par 'gyur ro/ /'bras phye'i nang du til dang / ad+ma gup+ta dang / mon sran sde'u rnams kyi phye mas bsres te/</text></item>
<item><p>275b.3</p><section></section><text>'o ma dang sprus pa'i khu ba mar gyi nang du btsos pa zos na yang shin tu ro tsa bar bshad do/ /kha zas dang / btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rol mo sgra skad yid du 'ong ba dang / spos dang / byug pa la sogs pa dri zhim po sna tshogs dang / me tog dang / phreng</text></item>
<item><p>275b.4</p><section></section><text>ba dang / gos dang / rgyan bzang po la sogs pa yang mi ro tsa bar byed pa'i rgyu yin no/ /sman bcud kyi sa len dang / ro tsa ba'i rgyud kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// //de nas byis pa'i rgyud kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /de la bud med ni dga'</text></item>
<item><p>275b.5</p><section></section><text>bar bya ste/ gnas dam pa yin la/ bu rin thang med pa bskyed pa yin pas/ de'i mo mtshan la nad byung na dga' ba dang bu 'byung ba gnyig med par 'gyur te/ de bas na de gso ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i mo mtshan gyi nad kyi mtshan</text></item>
<item><p>275b.6</p><section></section><text>ma ni/ mo mtshan na ba dang / mdog rtsub pa dang / yon por 'gyur ba dang / mkhrang pa dang / phal phal byed pa rnams yin no/ /mkhris pa 'khrugs pa'i mtshan ma las gyur pa ni/ mo mtshan tsha ba 'ur 'ur por byed pa dang / khrag 'dzag pa dang / rims</text></item>
<item><p>275b.7</p><section></section><text>kyis 'debs pa rnams las rtogs par bya'o/ /bad kan 'khrugs pa las gyur pa'i mo mtshan g.yeng ba dang / grang ba dang / bem bem por 'dug pa dang / 'bras khu 'dra bar dkar zhing / sbyin po 'byar 'byar po 'dzag pa rnams yin no/ /de la rlung</text></item>
<item><p>276a.1</p><section></section><text>las gyur pa'i mo mtshan gyi nad gso ba'i cho ga ni/ 'bras kyi 'o thug gi dugs sam/ mon sran sde'u'i chan gyi dugs sam/ yang na ras ma 'jam po til mar dron po'i nang du smyugs pa'i nang du btso zhing dugs bya'o/ /mdor na rlung</text></item>
<item><p>276a.2</p><section></section><text>las gyur pa'i mo mtshan gyi nad la ni/ sman mar btung ba dang / dugs bya ba dang / sman mas btang ba rnams bzang ngo / /yang na mo mtshan gyi nad la ni/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang / zin thig le'i rtsa ba'i phye ma chang dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na pi pi ling dang / u</text></item>
<item><p>276a.3</p><section></section><text>bkun rtsi ka'i sa bon dang / kha ru ch+wa rnams kyi phye mchang dang sbyar te blud do/ /pha bong gi dreg pa dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / b+ha rgi dang / ra sna dang / sle tres dang / nye'u shing dang / yung dang / skyer pa dang / pu na rna ba dang / med dang / 'di rnams kyi phye</text></item>
<item><p>276a.4</p><section></section><text>ma zho gnyis gnyis/ mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'o ma mar gyi tshad kyi nang du bskol te mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa la ran par 'thungs na yang rlung las gyur pa'i mo mtshan gyi nad sel zhing / mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mo mtshan gyi nad la yang bzang la/</text></item>
<item><p>276a.5</p><section></section><text>bu chags par byed pa'i mchog kyang yin no/ /mkhris pa 'khrugs pa las gyur pa'i mo mtshan gyi nad la ni/ khrag lud pa'i nad bsal ba'i cho ga sngar bshad pa bzhin du bya'o/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i mo mtshan gyi nad la ni/ dong ga la sogs pa'i sde</text></item>
<item><p>276a.6</p><section></section><text>tshan gyi btung ba dang / bkru ba dang / steng du blug pa dang / byug pa la sogs pa thams cad bya'o/ /de ltar mo mtshan gyi nyes pa dang / nad med par byas nas bu chags par bya ba'i thabs ni/ skyes pa snga nas sman dang kha zas bzang pos lus brta zhing</text></item>
<item><p>276a.7</p><section></section><text>nyal po mi bya bar 'dug la/ bud med zla mtshan byung nas zhag bzhi lon pa'i 'og tu khrus byas nas nyal na bu 'chags par 'gyur te/ de la zla mtshan byung nas zhag bzhi lon pa dang / zhag drug dang / brgyad dang / bcu dang / bcu gnyis lon pa'i tshe/</text></item>
<item><p>276b.1</p><section></section><text>nyal na bu khye'ur 'gyur ro/ /zla mtshan byung nas zhag lnga dang / bdun dang / dgu dang / bcu gcig lon pa'i tshe nyal na bu mor 'gyur ro/ /de la skyes pa'i khu ba mang la bud med kyi khrag nyung na ni khye'ur 'gyur ro/ /skyes pa'i khu ba nyung la bud med</text></item>
<item><p>276b.2</p><section></section><text>kyi khrag mang na ni bu mor 'gyur ro/ /zla mtshan byung nas zhag bcu lon gsum lon phan chad ni bur mi 'gyur ro/ /de la khye'ur 'gyur bar 'dod na/ rgyam tsha 'am shing pa ta'i yal ga'am rtse mo gang yang rung ba'i phye ma 'o ma dang btags te btsags pa'i khu</text></item>
<item><p>276b.3</p><section></section><text>ba las thigs pa bzhi ma nyal ba'i snga rol tu bud med kyi sna g.yon par blugs na khye'ur 'gyur ro/ /bud med zla mtshan dang ldan pa'i tshe/ kha lung gi sa bon nam/ nA ga ge sar gang yang rung ba'i phye ma mar khu dang sbyar te bud med kyis 'thungs la skyes pa dang</text></item>
<item><p>276b.4</p><section></section><text>nyal na yang bu chags par 'gyur ro/ /de la bu 'chags pa'i mtshan ma ni nu ma'i thor to mdog sngo skya bar 'dug na bu yod par shes par gyis shig /de ltar sbrum mar gyur nas las drag shul can dang / mya ngan dang / 'tsher ba dang / khro ba'i bag bsrung zhing</text></item>
<item><p>276b.5</p><section></section><text>gang yid la 'dod pa dang 'phrod pa rnams sbyin par bya'o/ /'jigs shing skrag pa dang / brdegs shing snad pa dang kha zas dang skom po tsha ba dang brod ches bzos shing 'thungs na ni bu 'byil bar 'gyur te/ de yang khrag 'dzag cing na ba'i mtshan mas shes par</text></item>
<item><p>276b.6</p><section></section><text>byas la slar gso ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /de lta bu gso ba la ni/ sman gyi khu ba grang mo lus la blugs pa dang sman gyi khu ba grang mo'i nang du 'jug pa dang sman bsil ba'i bag gis lus byugs pa rnams bzang ngo / /gzhan yang bu 'byil du byed pa slar gso ba'i sman ni/</text></item>
<item><p>276b.7</p><section></section><text>sman 'tsho byed sna bcu 'o ma dang bskol te btsags la kha ra dang sbyar te blud do/ /yang tsan dan dkar po dang / bu tshang rto dang / rgun dang / bu shel tse dang / kha ra rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / shing mngar dang / rgya shug gi 'bras bu dang / sug</text></item>
<item><p>277a.1</p><section></section><text>smel dang / btsod dang / d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang kha ra rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig sbyar ba dang / kha ra dang / ut+pal dang / shing mngar dang / seng phrom dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / thal tres rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang /</text></item>
<item><p>277a.2</p><section></section><text>sman gyi sbyor ba 'di gsum las gang yang rung ba 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar te blud do/ /yang na sman gyi sde tshan sngar bshad pa'i nang nas/ ut+pal la sogs pa'i sde tshan smos pa rnams btags la/ kha ra dang 'o mar sbyar te blud do/ /yang na n+ya gro d+ha la</text></item>
<item><p>277a.3</p><section></section><text>sogs pa'i sde tshan rnams kyi lo ma gzhon nu 'am/ yang na de rnams kyi shun lpags kyi phye ma gang yang rung ba kha ra dang 'o mas sbyar te blud do/ /yang na pad+ma la sogs pa'i chu'i nang nas skyes pa'i rtsa ba'i sman rnams bskol ba'i khu ba btsags pa 'bras phye dang kha</text></item>
<item><p>277a.4</p><section></section><text>ras sbyar ba'am/ yang na rtsa ba'i sman de rnams 'o ma dang bskol te btsags la kha ra dang sbyar ba blud do/ /sbrum pa'i kha zas ni thog ma sbrum nas zla ba gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum lon gyi bar du mngar bag dang / bsil ba'i kha zas sbyin no/ /zla ba</text></item>
<item><p>277a.5</p><section></section><text>bzhi la bab pa'i tshe ni kha zas mar dang ldan par sbyin no/ /zla ba lnga la bab pa'i tshe ni kha zas zhun mar dang 'o ma dang ldan par sbyin no/ /zla ba drug dang bdun la bab pa'i tshe ni thug pa bzang po dang / gze ma la sogs pa'i sman mar ram/ sngar bstan pas btab pa</text></item>
<item><p>277a.6</p><section></section><text>blud do/ /zla ba brgyad pa'i tshe kha zas 'o ma dang ldan par sbyin zhing / til mar dang / shing mngar 'o mar bskol te til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'i bcud mas btang ngo / /de phan chad kyi kha zas ni thug pa dang / rkang 'gros dang / ri dgas skam sa</text></item>
<item><p>277a.7</p><section></section><text>na gnas pa'i sha khu snum che bas sngag cing zos na bzang ngo / /de nas byis pa btsas na/ de'i lte bsor brgyad tsam lus pa bcad de/ chu dro 'jam tsam gyis byis pa bkrus la/ zhun mar dang / sbrang rtsi cha mi mnyam pa mang du sbyar ba cung zad tsam khar gzhug</text></item>
<item><p>277b.1</p><section></section><text>go/ /de nas gser gyi phye ma dang / shu dag dang / sman bram+hi dang / a ru ra dang / ru rta rnams kyi phye ma zhib mo zhun mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu 'am/ yang na gser gyi phye ma/ sman bra m+ti bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar ba las nyung ngu nyung ngu rgyun du</text></item>
<item><p>277b.2</p><section></section><text>byin na bu de yid gzhungs shing mdog bzang bar 'ong ngo / /bud med bu ma byung ba de ni/ thog ma bu byung nas zhag gsum mam/ zhag lnga'i bar du til mar ram/ mar khu tshod ran par blud cing / kha zas snum bag yod pa sbyin no/ /sha ma 'byung du mi btub</text></item>
<item><p>277b.3</p><section></section><text>pa la ni/ pi pi ling la sogs pa'i sde tshan sngar bshad pa rnams kyi phye ma chang dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na 'bras kyi rtsa ba'i bye ma zho gnyis tsam pa gcin rtsa bas skyur bo gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te blud na 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba grangs tshang na yang 'byung du mi btub</text></item>
<item><p>277b.4</p><section></section><text>pa la ni/ shing ba du sha ka'i rtsa ba dang / lang ga li dang / ba sha ka rnams las gang yang rung ba'i phye ma mar dang sbyar bas mo mtshan dang lte bar bskus na 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bu byung ba'i 'og tu bud med la nad a la ka zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ de'i mtshan ma</text></item>
<item><p>277b.5</p><section></section><text>ni snying na ba dang / klad pa dang / klad pa chu sor zug cing na ba yin te/ de la nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal pa mar ram yang na chu bskol ba dron po gang yang rung ba dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na pi pi la sogs pa'i sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba rgyam tsha dang sbyar ba'am/</text></item>
<item><p>277b.6</p><section></section><text>yang na 'u su'i 'bras bu bskol ba'i khu ba/ bu mar dang / tsha ba gsum dang dri sna gsum zhes bya ba shing tsha dang / sug smel dang / gan+d+ha pa tra rnams kyi phye ma dang sbyar te blud do/ /yang na bu byung ba las nad du gyur pa la ni/ rtsa ba lnga skol ba'i khu ba'i nang</text></item>
<item><p>277b.7</p><section></section><text>du lcags dmar po bsregs / pa gzhug cing / de lta bu lan mang du byas pa'am/ yang na chang gi nang du snga ma ltar lcags bsregs pa bcug ste blud na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bu'i ma'am/ nu ma snun pa'i ma mas kha zas dang btung ba lci ba'i bag zos shing 'thungs</text></item>
<item><p>278a.1</p><section></section><text>pa dang / dus snga phyi dang / tshad che chung zos shing 'thungs pas rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi gsum 'khrugs nas nu zho ma rung bar gyur pa las ni bu la nad rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de la nu zho rlung gis ma rung bar byas</text></item>
<item><p>278a.2</p><section></section><text>pa'i mtshan ma ni/ nu zho nyid ro bska zhing chu'i nang du blugs na steng du 'byung bar 'gyur ba las rtogs par bya'o/ /nu zho mkhris pa las ma rung par byas pa'i mtshan ma ni/ nu zho ro tsha skyur/ nu zho chu'i nang du blugs na steng du ser po shar shar por 'byung ba yin</text></item>
<item><p>278a.3</p><section></section><text>no/ /nu zho bad kan gyis ma rung bar byas pa'i mtshan ma ni nu zho skam zhing shin tu lci ba 'byar 'byar po chu'i nang du blugs na zhabs su 'bying ba yin no/ /nu zho nad gzhi rnams kyis ma rung bar gyur pa ma yin pa tha ma la ni chu'i nang du blugs na chu dang 'dres par</text></item>
<item><p>278a.4</p><section></section><text>gyur cing mdog skya bor 'dug pa yin no/ /de la nad gzhi rnams kyis nu zho ma rung bar bur pa'i nyes pa bsal zhing slar gso ba'i thabs ni/ bu'i ma'am/ nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma thog mar mar khu blud la/ de'i 'og tu pi pi ling gi phye ma dang / sbrang rtsi nim+pa</text></item>
<item><p>278a.5</p><section></section><text>bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar ba'i skyug sman blud de skyug tu gzhug go /kha zas ni mon sran sde'u'i khu bcud dang / sha khu dang ldan par sbyin no/ /yang na nu zhom rung par gyur pa la ni tshos par byed pa'i sman/ brgi dang / thang shing dang / shu dag dang / pa tha dang /</text></item>
<item><p>278a.6</p><section></section><text>bong nga dkar po rnams bskol ba'i khu ba'am/ yang na dang ga la sogs pa'i sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba'am/ yang na gla sgang la sogs pa sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba 'thungs pas sbyang bar bya'o/ /byis pa'i rims kyis thebs pa la ni/ 'bras brngos pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>278a.7</p><section></section><text>skyer khaN+Da dang / kha ra dang / smyig rkang dang / shing mngar rnams kyi phye ma cha bsnyams te/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu byin na rims thams cad sel to/ /yang na pi pi ling dang / bong nga dkar po dang / bu bran shing rnams btags pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar</text></item>
<item><p>278b.1</p><section></section><text>ba'am/ yang na bong nga dkar po gcig bu'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu byin na/ rims dang / lud pa dang / skyug pa'i nad rnams sel to/ /'bras yos dang / rgyam tsha dang / shing long kog rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu byin na skyug pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>278b.2</p><section></section><text>nad sel to/ /smyig rkang dang / sbrang rtsi dang skyar ba'i lde gu byin na yang byis pa'i lud pa dang / dbugs mi bde ba'i nad sel to/ /'bras yos dang / rgyam tsho'i phye ma/ kha lung gi shing thog gi phye mas sbyar ba'i lde gu'am/ yang na 'bras yos dang / kha ra dang /</text></item>
<item><p>278b.3</p><section></section><text>rgyam tsha dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi rnams sbyar ba'i lde gu byin na yang skyug pa dang / skyigs bu'i nad sel to/ /pi pi ling chen po dang / d+haha ki dang / seng phrom dang / bi lnga dang / ba la ka rnams btags pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu 'am/ yang na sman</text></item>
<item><p>278b.4</p><section></section><text>de dag nyid bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba byin na byis pa'i dmu rdzings dang / lto ba cher skyes pa sel to/ /sa maM ga dang / d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang / thal tres dang / seng phrom rnams bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs la/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te byin na yang dmu</text></item>
<item><p>278b.5</p><section></section><text>rdzings sel to/ /byis pa rnams kyi mig nad dang / ku ku la zhes bya ba dang / bod thaka ces bya ba la ni/ la la phud dang / byi dang ka dang / ba li dang / ldong ros dang / skyer pa dang / rgya skyegs dang / bcag yug snam rnams kyi phye ma'i mig sman blug</text></item>
<item><p>278b.6</p><section></section><text>par bya'o/ /yang na thang shing dang / btsag dang / bla sgang rnams kyi phye ma ra'i 'o ma dang ltan cig tu btsags pa'i lde gus mig gi phyi rol bskus na mig nad sel to/ /byis pa'i khar 'brum pa byung ste btsa' langs pa la ni/ shing a sho tha'i shun lpags</text></item>
<item><p>278b.7</p><section></section><text>dang / ru rta'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu'am/ yang na skyer pa dang / shing mngar dang / a ru ra dang / sna ma'i lo ma rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba bsku bar bya'o/ /sman go'u ri dang / shing mngar dang / nye'u shing gi rtsa ba dang / seng</text></item>
<item><p>279a.1</p><section></section><text>phrom dang / sa la par+Na dang / priSh+Na par+Na dang / ra dza dan dang / kha ra dang / shug pa dang / tsan dan dang / rgun dang / me tog pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / ut+pal dang / dzi ba ka dang / zangs rtsi ba dang / me ta dang / bu tshang rto</text></item>
<item><p>279a.2</p><section></section><text>dang / mar nye ba dang / thal tres rnam gnyis dang / 'di rnams kyi phye ma dang / 'o ma srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang / shun lpags rnam lnga zhes bya ba/ shing n+ya gro d+ha'i shun lpags dang / u dum+ba ra'i shun lpags dang / a shwat+tha'i shun lpags dang /</text></item>
<item><p>279a.3</p><section></section><text>p+lak+Sha'i shun lpags dang / be ta'i sa'i shun lpags rnams dang / rtsa ba lnga pa dang / 'di rnams bskol ba'i khu ba mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du bskol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'i ming ni/ go'u ri la sogs pa'i sman mar zhes bya ste/ nad dz+yo ti ka</text></item>
<item><p>279a.4</p><section></section><text>zhes bya ba dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa'i me dbal dang / btsa' nad khar 'brum pa 'ong ba dang / gdon gyis zin pa rnams la bzang ste/ ran par blud na byis pa'i nad do cog sel to/ /byis pa mtshan mo gnyid log tu mi btub par ngu zhing nur mi btub pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>279a.5</p><section></section><text>dri mi zhim par gyur pa dang / lus dang rkang lag g.yob pa la sogs pa'i tshul sna tshogs byed de/ so 'cha' zhing sen mo 'brad par byed pa rnams ni gdon nad las gyur pa yin te/ de la ni sgog skya dang / nim+pa'i lo ma dang / rgya skyegs dang / smyig ma'i shun</text></item>
<item><p>279a.6</p><section></section><text>lpags lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / yungs kar dang / nim+la'i lo ma dang / smyig ma'i shun lpags dang / rgya skyegs rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ sbrul gyi lpags pa brjes pa dang / sgra dang lha la phul ba'i me tog rnyings pa dang / yungs kar rnams</text></item>
<item><p>279a.7</p><section></section><text>lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / bdug pa sbyar ba rnam pa 'di gsum las gang yang rung ba mar dang sbyar te bsregs ba'i du bas bdugs na gdon thams cad sel to/ /shing sap+ta par+Na'i shun lpags dang / mur+pa dang / pu tse shel rnams btags pa'i phye ma chu dang</text></item>
<item><p>279b.1</p><section></section><text>sbyar bas byis pa'i lus dril na yang gdon thams cad sel to/ /ma d+hu ka'i me tog dang / shing a shwa t+tha dang / sab+ta par+Na dang / be lu ka dang / 'di rnams kyi lo ma lhan cig bskol ba'i khu ba grang mos khrus byas na yang gdon sel to/ /yang na gdon</text></item>
<item><p>279b.2</p><section></section><text>zhi bar bya ba'i phyir las thams cad byed pa'i sngags 'dis gtor ma sbyin pa dang / zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi las rnams bya ba dang / sngags kyis sbud pa gdags pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de la sngags ni/ na mo spag pa ste/ ga ru DA ya/ na masta ma ba ka ya/</text></item>
<item><p>279b.3</p><section></section><text>sat+ya sat+ya ta nu te swA hA/ byis ba'i rgyud kyi le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa rdzogs so// //de nas las rnam lnga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /las rnam pa lnga ni/ skyug sman dang / bkru sman dang / sman snar blugs pa dang / bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang /</text></item>
<item><p>279b.4</p><section></section><text>'jam rtsi mas btang ba rnams yin par shes par bya ste/ de dag gi cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /de la skyug sman mas btang ba'i thabs ni/ thog mar sman pas nad pa la mar dang / til mar la sogs pa snum bag gang yang rung ba'i 'jam rtsi blud la/</text></item>
<item><p>279b.5</p><section></section><text>de'i 'og tu dugs rnam lnga zhes bya ba khyim dron por lus mes bsro ba dang / rdo bsregs pa'i steng du chu blugs pa'i rlangs pas bdug cing rngul gdon pa dang / nyi tshan gyis bdug pa dang / dugs kyi sman bsros pa'i phur mas dugs bya ba dang /</text></item>
<item><p>279b.6</p><section></section><text>gos dang /rdo la sogs pa bsros pa'i dugs rnam pa 'di lnga gang yang rung bas lus legs par dros par byas nas gos dron po bskon te/ skyug sman btang / rkub rten pus mor phyin tsam gyi steng du 'dug ste/ e raN+Da'i sdong bu 'am/ bya sgro la</text></item>
<item><p>279b.7</p><section></section><text>sogs pa 'jam pos gre ba nas dkrug cing skyug tu gzhug go/ /de la skyug sman ni/ pi pi ling dang / po son cha dang / rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma dang / sbrang rtsi dang / shing mngar bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar ba 'di ni skyug sman gyi mchog yin te/</text></item>
<item><p>280a.1</p><section></section><text>dron por 'og dros kyis gzung ste blud la skyug tu gzhug go /yang na sbyar dug ces bya ba/ 'bras dang til dang / mon sran sde'u gsum bsregs pa'i thug ba/ po son cha dang / legs par btsos pa'am/ yang na po</text></item>
<item><p>280a.2</p><section></section><text>son cha'i sa bon 'o ma dang sbyar te bskol ba 'am/ yang na pi pi ling la sogs pa'i skyug sman sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa gong du smos pa rnams po son cha'i 'bras bu lnga bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te dron por 'thungs na snying tshim par skyugs par 'gyur ro/ /ku</text></item>
<item><p>280a.3</p><section></section><text>ba ro kha ba dang / thang shing dang / dug mo nyung gi 'bras bu dang / kri ta b+ha tan dang / d+ha marga ba rnams kyang skyug sman yin te/ so sor po son cha dang 'dra bar sbyar ro/ /de nas skyugs pa'i rjes la/ mkhris pa byung ba dang / lto dang / snying kha dang /</text></item>
<item><p>280a.4</p><section></section><text>mgo bo yang bar gyur na skyug sman legs pa yin no/ /'di ltar ma gyur pa ni/ skyug sman ma legs pa yin par bshad do/ /skyug pa'i tshod ma rig ste drags na nad du 'gyur te/ de'i mtshan ma ni/ snying ga na ba dang / glo 'grams pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>280a.5</p><section></section><text>mgul pa snad pa dang / dran pa nyams shing myos pa dang / lus 'dar ba dang / khrag skyugs pa rnams las rtogs par bya'o/ /de la skyug sman ni/ bad kan las gyur pa'i nad dang / cham pa drag po dang / gcin snyi ba'i nad dang / mdze nad dang /</text></item>
<item><p>280a.6</p><section></section><text>lkog nad lha gor dang / dug 'thungs pa dang / bsud pa rnams la nyams stobs dang sbyar te gtang bar bya'o/ /mig nad rab rib yod pa dang / da mu rdzings can dang / skran dang / skom pa'i nad dang / rtug skam gyi nad kyis nyam thag pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>280a.7</p><section></section><text>sbrum pa dang / rlung nad can dang / skya rbab kyi nad yod pa rnams la ni/ skyug sman du btang du mi rung ngo / /bkru sman btang ba'i thabs ni/ thog mar mar dang til mar la sogs pa snum bag gang yang rung ba'i 'jam rtsi blud la/ de'i 'og tu sngar bshad pa</text></item>
<item><p>280b.1</p><section></section><text>bzhin du dugs kyis lus bsros te skyug sman btang la/ de'i 'og tu bkru sman btang / bkru sman btang ba'i thabs de ltar ma byas te cho ga log par byas na pho ba'i nad skyed par bshad do/ /de la mkhris pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi ni lto snyi'o/ /rlung dang bad kan gyi</text></item>
<item><p>280b.2</p><section></section><text>rang bzhin can gyi mi ni lto sra ba yin no/ /nad gzhi rnams stobs mnyam pa'i lto ni 'bring ste/ de dag la sman gyi tshod ci rigs par dpag cing gtang bar bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i nad kyis nyam thag pa'i mi la bkru sman btang ba'i thabs ni/ shing nye rong dang /</text></item>
<item><p>280b.3</p><section></section><text>rgyam tsha dang / ba bla/ sga rnams kyi phye ma rtsabs skyur po'am/ rkang 'gros dang / ri dgas skam sa na gnas pa'i sha'i khu ba gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad yod pa la ni/ shing nye rong phye ma sman ro mngar ba</text></item>
<item><p>280b.4</p><section></section><text>dang / kha ba la sogs pa mkhris pa'i nad la phan pa'i sman gang yang rung ba bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar ba'i bkru sman gtang bar bya'o/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i nad kyis gnod par gyur pa la ni/ 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba tsha ba gsum gyi phye</text></item>
<item><p>280b.5</p><section></section><text>ma dang ba gcin gyis sbyar ba'i bkru sman gtang bar bya'o/ /pi pi ling dang / bca' sga dang / shing nye rong dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu 'di ni bad kan las gyur pa'i nad do cog gi bkru sman gyi mchog</text></item>
<item><p>280b.6</p><section></section><text>yin te bza' bar bya'o/ /a ru ra dang / rgyam tsha dang / pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma chur bskol ba'i khu ba dron po dang sbyar ba'i bkru sman lcags mda' zhes bya ba 'di ni nad do cog sel ba'i bkru sman gyi mchog yin te btung bar bya'o/ /hwags srang</text></item>
<item><p>280b.7</p><section></section><text>gcig dang / shing nye rong gi phye ma srang gcig dang / pi pi ling gi phye ma zho gnyis te 'di rnams sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu'i bkru sman las ren par zos na yang nad do cog sel to/ /tsha ba gsum dang / dan+da'i rtsa ba dang / shing nye rong dang /</text></item>
<item><p>281a.1</p><section></section><text>a ru ra dang / shing dong rnams kyi phye ma dang / dri sna gsum zhes bya ba shing cha dang / sug smel dang / gan+d+ha ba tra rnams kyi phye ma btab la/ bu mar dang sbyar te/ gong bur bsgongs ba'i bkru sman gyis kyang nad do cog sel to/</text></item>
<item><p>281a.2</p><section></section><text>dmu rdzings la sogs pa la ni/ shing nye rong dang / shing dod kyi phye ma/ shing snu ha'i lo mas lan mang du bsgos la/ bu mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar te dri sna gsum gyis btab pa'i lde gu'i bkru sman btang ngo / /de nas 'khrus pa'i rjes la/ bad kan byung</text></item>
<item><p>281a.3</p><section></section><text>ba dang / bkres par gyur pa dang / lus yang ba dang / mdangs gsal bar gyur na bkru sman legs pa yin no/ /lus g.ya' ba dang / lus la thig le khra bor byung ba dang / lus lci bar gyur pa rnams ni bkru sman ma legs pa'i mtshan mar</text></item>
<item><p>281a.4</p><section></section><text>shes par bya'o/ /bkru sman drags pa'i mtshan ma ni/ na ba dang / brgyal ba dang / gzhang 'brum 'byung ba dang / rlung 'jug pa dang / dran pa nyams pa dang / sha rjen bkrus pa'i khu ba 'dra ba mthur du 'byung ba rnams yin no/ /de la bkru sman ni/</text></item>
<item><p>281a.5</p><section></section><text>mdze dang / gzhang 'brum dang / sren bu'i nad dang / me dbal dang / dreg dang skya sbab kyi nad yod pa rnams la gtang bar bya'o/ /zad kyi nad yod pa dang / rid ba dang / bud med sgrum ma rnams la ni bkru sman btang du mi rung ngo / /skyug sman btang</text></item>
<item><p>281a.6</p><section></section><text>ba las ha cang mang du skyug cing 'chad du mi btub pa la ni/ sman pas bkru sman zhim zhing yid gar 'ong ba las chung zad tsam byin na skyug pa 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /bkru sman btang ba las ha cang mang du 'khru zhing 'chad du mi btub pa la ni skyug sman cung</text></item>
<item><p>281a.7</p><section></section><text>zad btab na 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /bkru sman ha cang drags pa ni/ shug pa dang / bu shel tse dang / nAg ge sar dang / tsan dan rnams kyis lus byugs pa dang / lus blugs pa dang btung ba rnams bya'o/ /sman snar blugs pa zhes bya ba ni/</text></item>
<item><p>281b.1</p><section></section><text>mar dang / til mar ram sman snar blugs pa yin te/ de yang mar ram til mar nyi tshe snar blugs pa dang / sman mar ram sman gyi til mar blugs shing / bad kan dang chu ser sna nas drang ba dang / snum gyis sna'i nang du bsku ba dang / sman gyi</text></item>
<item><p>281b.2</p><section></section><text>phur ma sna sgor btsir zhing blugs pa dang / sman gyi phye ma lce'i nang du blugs te/ snar bud pa dang / rnam pa lnga yod par shes par bya ste/ sman snar blugs pa'i rnam grangs de dag btang ba'i thabs ni/ nad thang ba'i nyin par/ zan ma zos pa'i snga rol tu</text></item>
<item><p>281b.3</p><section></section><text>lag pa gnyis drag du drud pa'i drod kyis/ kha sna dang / gdor thams cad legs par mnye zhing bsros la/ kha sna dang mtshul ba'i dri ma thams cad dag par bsal nas mgo smad de gtang bar bya'o/ /sman snar blugs pa'i cho ga byed pa des mgo bkru</text></item>
<item><p>281b.4</p><section></section><text>ba dang / khro ba dang / nyal po dang / nyin par gnyid log pa la sogs pa mi rung ba rnams spang bar bya'o/ /de la mar dang til mar snar blugs pa'i tshod ni thigs pa brgyad dam/ yang na mdzub mo'i tshigs pa gnyis phan chad lan gcig smyugs</text></item>
<item><p>281b.5</p><section></section><text>pa la ci chags pa snar blugs so/ /tshad rnam gcig ni/ srang phyed snar blugs pa yin no/ /tshad rnam gcig ni nyams stobs che chung las dpags te thigs pa bzhi 'am drug gam brgyad blugs par bya ste/ tshad kyi sna grangs mang po bstan pa</text></item>
<item><p>281b.6</p><section></section><text>'di kun kyang nad pa'i nyams stobs che chung dang sbyar zhing gtang bar bya'o/ /sman mar ram/ til mar snar blugs shing bad kan dang chu ser sna nas drang ba ni nam tshong yan chad kyi nad rnams la btang ba yin no// //da ni sman mar gyi 'jam</text></item>
<item><p>281b.7</p><section></section><text>rtsi dang / bcud mas btang ba'i cho ga bshad de/ sman mas btang ba'i dpyad ni/ lcags dang zangs la sogs pa gang yang rung ba las byas pa'i gce'u srid sor bcu gnyis pa la/ gnag gi mjug snying gi dbyibs bzhin du byin gyis phra zhing zlum</text></item>
<item><p>282a.1</p><section></section><text>par byas la/ rtsa ba sboms pa ni the bong shong tsam du bya/ thor to phra mo ni srin shong tsam la 'jam por byas te/ thor to phra mo logs nas sor gsum gyi tshu rol du phang lo tsam zhig gags byas la/ rtsa ba sbom po logs kyi khar yang</text></item>
<item><p>282a.2</p><section></section><text>sman blugs pa'i snod gnag gi lgang pa bzang po dam por gdags shing / lgang pa mi 'bud pa'i gags ci ran pa kha gnyis su bcad la de'i bar du lgang pa'i kha bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas sman btang ba'i tshe sngar kha zas zos nas glo g.yon phyogs kyis</text></item>
<item><p>282a.3</p><section></section><text>nyal la/ rkang pa g.yon pa ni brkyang / g.yas pa ni bskums te/ gzhang kha dang lce'u snum gyis byugs la/ sman shu ti dang / rgyam tsha'i phye ma mar ram til mar dang / chu dang ldan par bskol la/ mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'am/ sman gzhan</text></item>
<item><p>282a.4</p><section></section><text>yang rung ste/ tshad srang gnyis sam/ srang gsum mam/ srang bzhi mi nyid kyi nyams stobs dang sbyar zhing tshod ran pa dang / dron por mas btang zhing gce'u'i rtse mo nang du bcug la/ gags la thug par byas te/ lag pa g.yon pas gce'u'i</text></item>
<item><p>282a.5</p><section></section><text>sked pa nas dam du bzung zhing lgang pa'i nang du rlung ma song bar byas te/ ha cang mi drag mi ngal ba dang / bar du mi gda' mi bcad cing / rgyun chags par lan gcig gis rdzogs par lag pa g.yas pas lgang pa btsir la rlung nang du mi 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir</text></item>
<item><p>282a.6</p><section></section><text>sman gyi lhag ma chung zad tsam lus par bya'o/ /sman btang zin nas gan rkyal du bsnyal te/ rkang lag bzhi char gyen du bteg la lan gsum gyi bar du drag tu brkyang zhing bskum pa byas nas/ kha sbub tu zlog ste/ bdag nyid kyi rting pas rkub tshos la</text></item>
<item><p>282a.7</p><section></section><text>lan gnyis gsum du brdabs la/ de'i 'og tu mi gzhan gyis rkang pa'i mthil du khu tshur gyis lan gnyis gsum du brdegs nas/ ro smad stod de nyal du gzhug go/ sman mar gyi cho ga 'di ni zhag lon gyi bar du 'khyil te phyir ma byung yang mi</text></item>
<item><p>282b.1</p><section></section><text>rung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas kyang yun ring du phyir 'byung du ma btub na/ phyi sa 'gags pa'i cho ga sngar bstan pa bzhin du/ sman gyi reng bu mas gzhug pa'am/ yang na bkru sman 'jam pos myur du dbyung zhing sbyang bar bya'o/ /ji ste phyir ma byung yang mi bde</text></item>
<item><p>282b.2</p><section></section><text>ba'am lci ba'i bag med cing / tha mal bar 'dug pa la ni bkru sman la sogs pa btang mi dgos te/ chu bskol ba'i dron po 'thungs pas kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de la mar dang phyi sa 'dres par 'byung ba ni sman legs pa'i mtshan ma yin no/ /phyi</text></item>
<item><p>282b.3</p><section></section><text>sa ma 'dres par mar nyi tshe 'byung ba dang lus tsha bar gyur pa ni sman ma legs pa'i mtshan ma yin no/ /mar ni ma byung la phyi sa ni tha mal par byung la/ lto mi bde ba'i bag tu ma gyur na yang me'i drod che bas sman khong du zhu bar gyur pa yin te mi rung ba med do/ /</text></item>
<item><p>282b.4</p><section></section><text>kha zas ni sman btang nas nam bkres par gyur na/ gdod yang zhid 'phrod pa'i bag las bza'o/ sman mas btang nas ring po ma lon par phyir byung na sman don du ma gyur ba yin te/ yang na cho ga snga ma bzhin du bzlas te gtang bar bya'o/ /de la sman mar</text></item>
<item><p>282b.5</p><section></section><text>gyi 'jam rtsi'i bcud mas btang ba dang / bkru sman drag po mas btang ba gnyi ga yang rlung nad kyi bag yod pa la gtong bar bya'o/ /zad byed kyi nad dang / mdze nad dang / gzhang 'brum dang / skyug pa'i nad dang / gcin snyi ba'i nad dang / dmu rdzings yod pa</text></item>
<item><p>282b.6</p><section></section><text>la sogs pa la ni gtang du mi rung ngo / /bkru sman drag po mas btang ba'i cho ga ni sngar zhag gnyis gsum gyi snga rol du sman mar gyi 'jam rtsi mas btang la bkru sran drag po nyid mas btang ba'i nyin par nyi ma dron po la snga dro nas lus snum gyis byug cing mnye ba dang /</text></item>
<item><p>282b.7</p><section></section><text>dugs sna tshogs kyis lus shin tu dros shing sha grol bar byas la/ nang par nas kha zas kyi bag mi bza' mi btung bar nyi ma phyed yol tsam na sman mas gtang bar bya'o/ /de la btang ba'i thabs ni gan rkyal du bsnyal la sman mar gyi bcud mas btang ba bzhin du</text></item>
<item><p>283a.1</p><section></section><text>gce'u dang lgang par sbyar nas sman ha cang mi tsha ha cang mi grang bar dron por byas te lgang pa lag bas btsir la/ ha cang mi drag mi ngal ba dang / bar du mi gda' mi bcad par rgyun chags par lan gcig gis rdzogs par btang ngo / /dri</text></item>
<item><p>283a.2</p><section></section><text>ma byung ba'i snod dam/ khung bu yang snga nas drung du bsnyen la/ sems gud du mi g.yeng bar sman lto na 'dug pa rnams 'byung la thug go snyam du bsam pa gtad par bya'o/ /de la dbyung ba'i tshod ni/ sman mas btang nas yi ge'i 'bru sum cu drag dal ran</text></item>
<item><p>283a.3</p><section></section><text>tsam du brjod cing zin tsam na 'byung ba'i rigs te/ tha mal pa tsog tsog por 'dug la dbyung bar bya'o/ /de nas nad ma phyin tam/ ma zhag par gyur na bsnan bzod dang mi bzod mi'i nyams stobs las dpags te/ bzod pa 'dra na snga ma bzhin du</text></item>
<item><p>283a.4</p><section></section><text>lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du bsnan te bkrus nas/ de'i 'og tu chu dron pos khrus byas la/ kha zas sha khu dang ldan pa bzang po zos nas/ de'i rjes la lus rlung 'jug pa lta na/ de'i mod la mar gyi 'jam rtsi'i bcud mas btang ba cho ga</text></item>
<item><p>283a.5</p><section></section><text>sngar bshad pa bzhin du bya'o/ /'phral du rlung 'jug pa'i dogs pa med na/ zhag gnyis sam gsum gyis bcad de/ gdod mar gyi 'jam rtsi'i bcud mas btang ngo / /bkru sman drag po khong du btang ba des ma byung na/ phyi sa 'gags pa'i nad dang /</text></item>
<item><p>283a.6</p><section></section><text>zug cing na ba dang / lto spo ba la sogs pa'i nad mang por 'gyur te/ nyen che bas na de la ni/ du 'byung ran pa'i dus las yol ma thag tu 'jam rtsi snon po mas btang ba dang / bkru sman btung ba dang / skrag par bya ba la sogs pa'i cho ga byas na</text></item>
<item><p>283a.7</p><section></section><text>bzang ngo / /bkru sman drag po mas btang ba'i cho ga 'di ni phan yon che zhing nyen yang che bas na gya tshom du btang du mi rung ste/ cho ga de la mkhas pa'i sman pa mang po tshogs pas legs par dpyad cing gtang bar bya'o/ /de la bkru sman drag pa mas btang</text></item>
<item><p>283b.1</p><section></section><text>ba la ni/ sman gyi khu bsrang drug dang / mar ram til mar cha gcig dang / sman gyi phye ma srang gsum dang / rgyam tsha dang / sbrang rtsi ci ran pa dang / 'di rnams ni spyi'i cho ga yin te/ gzhi 'di rnams kyi steng du/ rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad</text></item>
<item><p>283b.2</p><section></section><text>kan gang gi sman du btang ba las/ de dag so so'i sman 'og nas 'gyung ba bzhin du bsnan te/ skam gsher spyir srang nyi shu rtsa bzhi byung bar grangs bkang zhing cho ga 'og nas rgyas par 'byung ba bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de la rlung nad bsal ba'i bkru sman drag po</text></item>
<item><p>283b.3</p><section></section><text>mas btang ba ni/ rlung sel ba'i sman gang yin pa rnams bskol ba'i khu ba dang / shing nye rong gi phye ma dang / rgyam tsha bro ba tsam dang / rtsa bas skyur po rnams lhan cig tu sbyar te dron por btang ngo / /rgya shug la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang / rtsa ba bcu dang /</text></item>
<item><p>283b.4</p><section></section><text>rgya sran dang / la phug skam po rnams las sna re re yang srang gnyis gnyis lhan cig tu chu phul gang la srang brgyad du brtsis pa chu phul drug cu rtsa bzhi'i nang du bskol te/ chu'i brgyad cha gcig lus pa btsags pa dang / shu dag dang / u pa kuny+dzi ka dang /</text></item>
<item><p>283b.5</p><section></section><text>pi pi ling dang / shu nyi dang / rgyam tsha dang / gla sgang rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang / rtsa bas skyur po dang ba gcin rnams sbyar ba'i bkru sman drag po mas btang ba yang rlung nad sel bar byed do/ /mkhris pa bsal ba'i bkru sman drag po mas btang ba'i sman</text></item>
<item><p>283b.6</p><section></section><text>ni/ shing n+ya grod+ha la sogs pa'i sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba dang / bu tshang rto la sogs pa'i sde tshan btags pa'i phye ma dang / mar dang / 'o ma dang / kha ra rnams sbyar ba btang na mkhris pa sel to/ /bad kan sel ba'i bkru sman drag po mas btang ba'i sman ni/</text></item>
