<item><p>283b.7</p><section></section><text>dong ga la sogs pa'i sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba dang / pi pi ling la sogs pa'i sde tshan btags pa'i phye ma dang / ba gcin dang sbrang rtsi rnams sbyar te btang na bad kan sel to/ /bu tse shel dang / gla sgang dang / pu shel tse dang / btsod dang /</text></item>
<item><p>284a.1</p><section></section><text>ba la dang / ra sna dang / bu na rna ba dang / gra ha tI dang / sle tres dang / sa la bar+No dang / priSh+Na bar+Ni dang / dong ka dang / ba ru ra dang / gze ma dang / po son cha rnams las srang re re lhan cig tu chu phul drug cu rtsa bzhi'i nang du</text></item>
<item><p>284a.2</p><section></section><text>bskol te khu ba brgyad cha gcig lus pa btsags la/ 'o ma phul brgyad dang bskol te/ 'o ma nyi tshe lus pa'i nang du/ gan+d+ha pri yaM ku dang / shing mngar dang / sha ti dang / dug mo nyung gi shun lpags dang / ba ru ra rnams kyi phye ma zho gnyis gnyis dang / rgyam</text></item>
<item><p>284a.3</p><section></section><text>tsha dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / srog chags skam sa na gnas pa'i sha khu rnams ci ran pa dang / 'di rnams sbyar ba'i bkru sman drag po mas btang ba 'di ni rlung dang mkhris pa sel ba yin te/ ro tsa bar byed cing me drod shin tu bskyed pa dang na ba dang / skran</text></item>
<item><p>284a.4</p><section></section><text>dang / glo rdol ba dang / gcong chen po za byed kyi nad dang / gcin 'gag pa dang / phyi sa 'gags pa rnams kyang sel to/ /sbrang rtsi dang / til mar cha bsnyams la de gnyis bsdoms pa'i tshad kyi kru trug tres bskol ba'i khu ba dang / shu ti'i phye ma</text></item>
<item><p>284a.5</p><section></section><text>srang gcig dang / rgyam tsha zho gnyis 'di rnams sbyar ba'i bkru sman drag po mas btang ba 'di ni cho ga bsrung mi dgos te ro tsa bar bya ba dang / me'i drod bskyed pa dang / sha skye bar bya ba dang / phyi sa 'gag pa dang / srin bu dang / skran rnams bsal</text></item>
<item><p>284a.6</p><section></section><text>ba la dge ba yin te/ gnod pa'i nyen du mi 'gyur ro/ /sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang / 'o ma dang / til mar rnams las srang gnyis gnyis dang / spa ma'i 'bras bu dang / rgyam tsha zho gnyis gnyis te 'di rnams sbyar ba'i bkru sman drag po mas btang ba ni</text></item>
<item><p>284a.7</p><section></section><text>brtag par byed pa'i mchog yin te/ de la mar gyi 'jam rtsi'i bcud mas btang ba'i tshad ni spyir srang gsum du bya'o/ /bkru sman drag po mas btang ba'i tshad ni de'i brgyad du bya'o/ /tshos par byed pa'i sman dang / bkru sman gnyis la ni sman gyi phye ma srang</text></item>
<item><p>284b.1</p><section></section><text>re re btang ngo / /yang nyams stobs kyis ji tsam nus pa dang sbyar ro/ /ji ltar shing gi rtsa ba chus bran na/ lo ma sngo zhing snum pa skye ba de bzhin du mi la yang mar gyi 'jam rtsi'i bcud mas btang ba dang / bkru sman drag po mas btang ba'i cho ga 'di dag ltar</text></item>
<item><p>284b.2</p><section></section><text>btang na mdog snum zhing nyams stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /las rnam lnga'i le'u ste sum cu pa rdzogs so// //da ni cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /sgog skya la ni ro rnam pa drug las/ skyur ba ma gtogs par mang ra ba dang / kha ba</text></item>
<item><p>284b.3</p><section></section><text>dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba dang / lan tshwa'i ro 'di lnga yang yod de/ de ni tshim pa med par byed pa yin no/ /de sman gzhan dang sbyar na nad gzhi gsum char yang sel to/ /de la mi mi na ba nyams stobs skye bar 'dod pas ni/ dpyid zla 'bring po'i ngo la</text></item>
<item><p>284b.4</p><section></section><text>bza' bar bya'o/ /nad yod pa la ni dus kun yang bza' bar bya'o/ /sgog skya nar son cing rdo gu grung bor gyur la/ skyon med cing yon tan dang ldan pa de nyid kyi khu ba cho ga bsrung bzhin du/ gzar zhing zho gnyis gnyis kyis bskyed de btung bar bya'o/ /</text></item>
<item><p>284b.5</p><section></section><text>de la srang gnyis sam bzhi 'am/ drug gi bar du rab 'bring tha ma'i tshad las nyams stobs dang sbyar zhing btang bar bshad do/ /de la rlung dang bad kan gnyis la ni/ sman pas rtsabs skyur po dang / tshwa dang chang la sogs pas dbul/ mkhris</text></item>
<item><p>284b.6</p><section></section><text>pa la ni 'o ma 'am/ khu ba mngar po rnams kyis dbul lo/ /kha zas ni gro las byas pa'i bag /skam sa na gnas pa'i bya sha gang yin pa rnams kyi sha khu dang ldan par za zhing / khro ba dang / nyal po dang / mya ngan la sogs pa dang / sman</text></item>
<item><p>284b.7</p><section></section><text>dang / kha zas mi 'ju ba rnams spang bar bya'o/ /de'i cho ga ni nad las dpag cing / zhag bdun nam bdun gnyis sam/ zhag bdun gsum gyi bar du tshad rab 'bring rnam pa gsum du shes par bya'o/ /de la sgog skya'i khu ba mar dang sbyar ba ni</text></item>
<item><p>285a.1</p><section></section><text>mkhris pa sel to/ /til mar dang sbyar ba ni bad kan dang rlung sel to/ /tshil lam rkang dang sbyar ba ni glo brdol ba'am zad byed kyi nad las brta bar byed do/ /sgog skya zhib tu brdungs la 'o ma dang bskol te kha ra dang sbyar ba 'thung</text></item>
<item><p>285a.2</p><section></section><text>zhing / sman zhu ba'i 'og tu kha zas 'o ma 'am sha khu dang ldan par zos na/ khrag lud pas nyam thag pa dang / zad byed kyi nad dang / rlung nad dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / smyo byed dang / brjed byed rnams sel zhing chag grugs byung ba dang / zug</text></item>
<item><p>285a.3</p><section></section><text>cing na ba dang / srin bu'i nad dang / khu ba zad pa dang / mo gsham rnams la bzang ngo / /gzhang 'brum can dang / tshad pa be'u snabs su 'byung bas nyam thag pa dang / 'bras kyi phreng ba yod pa dang / lus shin tu rid pa dang / bud med sbrum pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>285a.4</p><section></section><text>bud med bu nu bzhin pa rnams kyis ni btung bar mi bya'o/ /kun dong ni sgog skya las chung zad tsam gyis mthu chung ste de yang cho ga bzhin du bza' bar bya'o/ /rlung nad tsam la ni/ e raN+Da'i mar chang dang / rtsa bas skyur po dang / rtsa ba lnga pa bskol ba'i khu ba</text></item>
<item><p>285a.5</p><section></section><text>dang / srog chags skam sa na gnas pa'i sha khu rnams las gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te/ bsros la nyams stobs dang sbyar zhing tshod ran par btung bar bya'o/ /e raN+Da'i mar 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te btang na/ bad kan dang mkhris</text></item>
<item><p>285a.6</p><section></section><text>pa sel to/ /rtsa ba bcu pa bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te btang na rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad sel to/ /ra'i 'o ma 'am/ rgun chang gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na gcin sri ba dang rde'us 'gags pa sel to/ /'o ma dang sbyar na rlung skran</text></item>
<item><p>285a.7</p><section></section><text>sel to/ /mig ser dang / skya rbab dang / tshad par 'khru ba dang / skyugs pa dang / mdze dang / rims dang / bad kan nyi tshe dang / khrag lud pa nyi tshe ba rnams kyis ni btung bar mi bya'o/ /go byi'i cho ga ni go byi'i 'bras bu lnga cho ga bzhin du</text></item>
<item><p>285b.1</p><section></section><text>ba'i gcin gyi nang du bskol te bzhi cha lus nas mnyes la tshig ma bor ba'i khu ba grang mo mchu dang rkan mar gyis bskus te btung zhing thabs de ltar nyin gcig bzhin du go byi'i 'bras bu lnga lngas bskyed/ go byi'i 'bras bu bdun cu la thug gi bar du snga ma</text></item>
<item><p>285b.2</p><section></section><text>bzhin du btung / de nas nyin re bzhin lnga lngas phri ste/ 'brum bu lnga la thug nas slar yang de bzhin du bskyed cing dbri'o/ /sman 'thungs pa zhu bar gyur pa'i 'og tu kha zas ni 'bras chan grang mo mar dang 'o ma bskol te bsgrangs pa dang ldan par bza' bya ste/</text></item>
<item><p>285b.3</p><section></section><text>sman bcud kyi len gyi cho ga 'dis ni yid gzhungs par byed cing / gnyer ma dang skra dkar med par byed la/ mdze dang / gzhang 'brum dang / khrag tshad dang srin bu'i nyes pa rnams sel to/ /khu chu la nad yod par gyur pa yang sbyong bar byed do/ /go byi'i</text></item>
<item><p>285b.4</p><section></section><text>mar nyams stobs dang sbyar zhing / zla ba gcig gi bar du ran par 'thungs na nad kyi gnod pa thams cad las thar te/ lus brtan por lo brgya'i bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /me dang nyi ma 'de ba dang / nyin par gnyid log pa dang / 'bru mar dang / kha</text></item>
<item><p>285b.5</p><section></section><text>zas lci ba rnams ni spang bar bya'o/ /sman gyi mjug bcad nas kyang ji srid kyi bar du sman btang ba'i dus kyi nyis 'gyur gyi bar du cho ga bsrung bar bya'o/ /mkhris pa shas che ba'i mi la ni/ sman 'di byed pa'i tshe khar 'brum pa 'byung ba dang / lus skrangs pa</text></item>
<item><p>285b.6</p><section></section><text>dang / rims la sogs pas 'debs par 'gyur te/ de la ni sman bsil ba'i lde gu'am khu ba grang mos lus byug pa dang / steng du blugs pa dang btung ba rnams bya'o/ /pi pi ling bskyed pa'i cho ga ni/ 'o ma bskol te phyed du nas phyung ba'i nang du/ pi</text></item>
<item><p>285b.7</p><section></section><text>pi ling 'brum bu lnga btags te btung zhing / de ltar zhag bcu'i bar du nyin re zhing pi pi ling 'brum bu lnga lngas bskyed de btung bar bya'o/ /de nas nyin re zhing pi pi ling lnga lngas phri ste/ /pi pi ling 'bru ma lnga la thug nas/ yang snga ma bzhin du bskyed cing phri la/</text></item>
<item><p>286a.1</p><section></section><text>kha zas 'o ma dang ldan par bza' zhing cho gas bsrungs na/ dreg dang / skya rbab dang / skran dang / gzhang 'brum dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / skrangs pa dang / dmu rdzings rnams sil zhing rims ldang dub kyis dus mi 'dra ba med par</text></item>
<item><p>286a.2</p><section></section><text>byed do/ /ro tsa bar 'gyur ro/ /brag zhun gser dang lcags la sogs pa las 'byung ste/ de dag ni mthu dang ldan zhing / de dag gi mdog dang 'dra la/ ba gcin gyi dri bro ba dang / snum zhing lci la rdo med pa bzang ste/ nges chu chus bkrus ba dang / ba</text></item>
<item><p>286a.3</p><section></section><text>gcin gyi nang du mnye bas cho ga bzhin du btul nas/ de'i phye mas nad gzhi gsum gang gi sman du btang ba de'i sman gyi sde tshan bskol ba'i khu bas lan mang du bsgo zhing bskams la/ nad gzhi gang gi sman du btang ba de'i sman gyi sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba</text></item>
<item><p>286a.4</p><section></section><text>dang sbyar te 'thungs na nad do cog sel to/ /cho ga de bzhin du drub mar chang gi phye ma yang sman bskol ba'i khu bas bsgo zhing sbyar te 'thungs na nad do cog sel to/ /sman 'di gnyis kyi cho ga byed pas thi ba'i sha dang / rgya sran bza' bar mi bya'o/ /a ru ra'i</text></item>
<item><p>286a.5</p><section></section><text>cho ga ni/ a ru ra'i phye ma rgyam tsha dang sbyar na rlung sel to/ /mar dang sbyar na mkhris pa sel to/ /bca' sga dang sbyar na bad kan sel to/ /bu ram dang sbyar na nad do cog sel to/ /skyu ru ra'i cho ga ni/ skyu ru ra'i khu ba phul gang la srang brgyad du brtsis pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>286a.6</p><section></section><text>phul bcu drug btsags la/ bum pa sbrang rtsis bskus pa'i nang du blugs te kha bcad nas yun ring du bzhag la/ dgun nam/ dgun smad dam dbyar btung bar bya ste/ skyer khaN+Da dang / 'o mar sbyar na khrag lud pa gyen du 'byung ba dang mkhris pa sel to/ /kha ra</text></item>
<item><p>286a.7</p><section></section><text>dang sbyar na skya rbab kyi nad sel cing / mo mtshan gyi khrag mi chod pa chod par byed do/ /sbrang rtsir sbyar na bad kan gyi nad sel to/ /tsha ba gsum dang sbyang na drod chung ba las drod skyed par byed do/ /sman so ma rA dza dang sbyar na mdze nad sel to/ /dug</text></item>
<item><p>286b.1</p><section></section><text>mo nyung gi shun lpags dang sbyar na gzhang 'brum sel to/ /'di ltar bdag gis tshe'i rig byed kyi rgya mtsho drang srong gzhung la skyes kyi bu dang / drang srong rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa'i gzhung rnams bltas nas/ gso ba'i dpyad kyi zer tsam gyi rgyud le'u sum cu</text></item>
<item><p>286b.2</p><section></section><text>rtsa gcig po 'di rnams rim bzhin phab cing sbyar ba ni/ pho bo lha bsrungs skya rbab kyi nad kyis btab pas byed du bcug nas/ de'i phyer sman dpyad 'di nyi mas bsrungs pas byas so/ /cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// //sman dpyad gces</text></item>
<item><p>286b.3</p><section></section><text>pa grub pa zhes bya ba/ nub phyogs pa rta mkhan bgrod dkas bsrungs pa'i bu nyi mas bsrungs pas byas pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / a ti rgya warma dang / lo tsA ba ban+de tsan+d+ras bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o/ /bdag gis</text></item>
<item><p>286b.4</p><section></section><text>rig mchog gces grub 'di bris pas/ /rlung mkhris bad kan nad gzhi dug gsum dang / /'phral gyi rkyen gyur nyon mongs gsum brgyad kyis/ /mnar med sems can mtha' yas thams cad kun/ /sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur nas nyam thag</text></item>
<item><p>286b.5</p><section></section><text>pa'i/ /rlung mkhris dug gsum la sogs gtan spangs te/ /sa rab bgrod dka' lam gyi nyes bsal nas/ /g.yung drung bla med chen po myur thob shog// //[]@/ /'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa'i ngag zab mo bzhugs/ /</text></item>
<item><p>286b.6</p><section></section><text>@##/ /srid pa gsum gyi bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa klu sgrub zhal snga nas/ /bkod par gyur pa rtsa ba'i mdzod/ /sems can kun la rjes brtse bas/ /bdag gis rab tu brjod par bya/ /ka na ka pany+tsa d+gi blangs nas a lam bu Sha</text></item>
<item><p>286b.7</p><section></section><text>dang / chang gi sa bon dang / /sge'u gsher dang / pi pi ling gi sa bon dang / 'di rnams kany+dzi ka dang btags nas pri Sha Na la byugs na/ ku ra N+Da sel bar byed do/ /ma he'i mar sar dang nas kyi phye dang / nA ga ba la dang / shu dag dang / a ti ba lA dang /</text></item>
<item><p>287a.1</p><section></section><text>ba lA dang / 'di dag thams cad gcig tu byas nas nyed par byas na sbom por byed pa'i mchog go/ /gtun shing lta bur 'gyur ro/ /mar sar dang / shu dag dang / ru rta dang / ba lA dang / /nA ga ba lA rnams kyis nu ma mchog tu mnyes na</text></item>
<item><p>287a.2</p><section></section><text>de yis bA ma pa lta bur 'gyur ro/ /nam:sa ba rA NaM ha ri dra swA hA/ so rtsi la lan bdun bsngags pa byas nas gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /tshangs ma dang / shu dag dang / bA ma dang / pi pi ling dang / sbrang rtsi dang / rgyam tsha dang / sing lding rnams</text></item>
<item><p>287a.3</p><section></section><text>mtshan mo bdun gyi nye bar sbyor bas ngag mi gsal ba dag par 'gyur ro/ /byi dang ga'i snying po srang gcig /a rur srang gcig /ba ru ra srang gcig dang / bu ram srang drug ste 'di dag mnyam pa chu dang bcas pa zos/ rlung nad ma lus pa sel bar</text></item>
<item><p>287a.4</p><section></section><text>the tshom med/ tshangs pa'i dbyug pa dang / shu dag dang / ru rta dang / pri yang ku dang / nA ga ge sar rnams/ so rtsi dang bcas pa bud med la byin na gzhan gyis dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/ /skar ma rgyal la myos byed kyi 'bras bu blangs te/ skar ma</text></item>
<item><p>287a.5</p><section></section><text>skag la shun pa dang / skar ma me bzhi la 'dab ma dang / skar ma nag pa la me tog dang / skar ma snrubs la rtsa ba rnams blangs te/ 'di rnams phye mar byas nas sbrang dang lhan cig ril bu byas te/ ras kyis bcings ba san tso nas dril te brdungs nas phye</text></item>
<item><p>287a.6</p><section></section><text>mar byas te/ so rtsi dang mnyam du gang la byin pa de thams cad mod la dbang du 'gyur ro/ /hrIM g+huM bi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ sngags 'di 'dab ma la bris nas gang la byin pa de'i nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>287a.7</p><section></section><text>rims mi bzad pa sel bar byed do/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nam a r+YA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twa ya/ ma tA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tar+ya thA/ oM ka ri kari/ bi ka re sta ma b+ha ni bi ka re sta ma b+ha ni/ sarba ro ga pra sha ma ni swA hA/ sngags 'di lan</text></item>
<item><p>287b.1</p><section></section><text>nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ kha la byabs shing / gos la mdud pa byas nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na rgyal bo khros pa rab tu dang bar 'gyur ro/ /ba lang gi so dang bya rog gi brun mnyam par btags te/ gang gi mgo la gtor ba de thams cad dbang du</text></item>
<item><p>287b.2</p><section></section><text>'gyur ro/ /yungs kar dkar po dang / shi ba ni rmA l+ya/ gang gi khyim du bzhag na de skrod par byed do/ /sA kho Ta ka'i rtsa ba dang / ba ru ra'i rtsa ba gcig tu byas nas gang gi khyim du bzhag na de'i khyim du rtag tu 'thab mo 'byung ngo / /lga dang / pi pi ling</text></item>
<item><p>287b.3</p><section></section><text>dang / phob ris dang / 'jam 'bras dang / yung ba dang / skyer pa dang / rgyam tsha dang / ri'i bi lba dang / rgya spos kyi rtsa ba dang / saM khya nA b+hi ste/ 'di dag thams cad chu la btags te mig sman byas na/ rab rib ma lus pa sel bar byed do/</text></item>
<item><p>287b.4</p><section></section><text>wA ku dzi kA byi gang dang / rgyam tsha dang / ra'i 'o ma cha mnyam pa byas nas/ ba lang gi chu dang mnyam par spyar te zangs kyi snod du bzhag nas/ de lus la dril phyi byas na mdze nad ma lus pa sel bar byed do/ /lcags kyi phye ma dang / maM sA ka Sh+Ta dang / de</text></item>
<item><p>287b.5</p><section></section><text>bzhin du skyur ru ra'i 'bras bu dang / khu ba srang bcu dang / khu ba des bsgos nas nyi ma la bzhag ste/ slar yang wA gu dzi kA'i phye ma zho gang byas nas dkrugs te/ rgas pa 'o ma'i bza' ba dang lhan cig zos na zhag bdun gyis mdzes nad sel bar byed do/ /de yang</text></item>
<item><p>287b.6</p><section></section><text>gal te las kyi dbang gis na mi 'grub po/ /de bzhin du skyu ru cha bcu dang / byi tang ga cha lnga dang / a ru ra cha bcu dang / tsi tra ka cha lnga dang / wA gu dzi cha bdun dang / lcags phye cha brgya dang/ ra mo shag cha dgu dang / til mar bsres pa zla ba</text></item>
<item><p>287b.7</p><section></section><text>gcig gis skra dkar 'joms so/ /'di ni byug pa mdor bsdus ba'o/ /bye'u khany+tsa rI Ta'i rus pa dang / sbrul gyi mgrin pa'i bags pa dang / shing gang la sbyin pa'i 'dug pa de shing de'i drung du mnyam par dor ro/ /bye'u khany+tsa rI Ta'i sha dang sbrang rtsi</text></item>
<item><p>288a.1</p><section></section><text>lhan cig spyar te/ pya ba'i dus su skye gnas byugs te/ bud med gang la skyes bu mngon par bsgrod par byed na de dang po bzhin du skyes ba de'i bur 'gyur ro/ /dgon pa'i 'ug pa bzung nas de'i mig dang pi pi ling gis byugs te/</text></item>
<item><p>288a.2</p><section></section><text>de'i rngul lhung bas mig la mig sman byas na/ de sbas pa de mi mthong ngo / /sA pI ti ta byA d+ha tra ro paN+naM pra ya ts+tsha ti/ nas kyi phye ma dang / yung ba'i phye ma dang / ba'i chu dang / mar dang / spos dkar dang / shing mngar rnams mnyam par sbyar te/ gdong</text></item>
<item><p>288a.3</p><section></section><text>la dril phyi byas na/ gdong pad+ma lta bur 'gyur ro/ /rkang pa dag pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bur 'gyur ro/ /bud med thams cad rgyal po'i pho brang du mdzes shing sdug par 'gyur ro/ /yang shing mngar dang btags te ril bu sbyar nas chu'i bum par bcug na/</text></item>
<item><p>288a.4</p><section></section><text>bsil bar 'gyur ro/ /oM ma hA ba li dza ye swA hA/ gos la yongs su bzlas te bsgos na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/ /rig pa 'dzin pas spre'u'i 'jug ma blangs te sbrang dang btags nas lte ba'i phyogs su byugs na ling ga gyen du 'gyur bar/</text></item>
<item><p>288a.5</p><section></section><text>the tshom med do/ /tUrba dkar po dang / shu dag dang / ru rta dang / paN+Di ta ga ra'i rtsa ba dang / srin lag gi khrag rnams mnyam par sbyar te/ dur khrod kyi thal ba dang 'di dag sbyar bas skyes pa dang bud med dbang du byed do/ /thang phrom pa dang /</text></item>
<item><p>288a.6</p><section></section><text>shu dag dang / ru rta dang / kaN+Da ka ri dang / sa tA ba ri dang / 'di dag cha mnyam par byas nas til mar gyis smin par byas pa'i til mar des/ ling+ga nyed par byas na sbom par byed pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /lce'i dri ma dang / shu dag dang / ru</text></item>
<item><p>288a.7</p><section></section><text>rta dang / ni rma la cha mnyam par phye mar byas nas gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /a ga ru dang / gu gul dang / sheng shu Sh+ka dang / ut+pal sngon po dang / bu ram sbyar bas bdug pa byas nas bdag nyid rgyal po'i pho brang du song na mchod pa chen po thob</text></item>
<item><p>288b.1</p><section></section><text>cing btsun mo rnams kyis dri snom par byed do/ /bye'u kha ny+tsa rI Ta'i brun blangs te/ si ri sa'i sa bon byugs pas 'chi ba sel to/ /bya rog gi lce dang / shu dag dang / ru rta dang / pi pi ling dang / 'bras bu thug po che bdun dang / bdag nyid kyi khu sbyar te gang</text></item>
<item><p>288b.2</p><section></section><text>la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /shu dag dkar po'i rtsa ba dang / gi wang lhan cig btags te de'i thig le byas nas gang la bltas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ daN+Do t+pa la'i rtsa ba dang / sbrang rtsi lhan cig btags te ril bu byas nas gang la byin nas gang las rtsi dang lhan cig byin pa de</text></item>
<item><p>288b.3</p><section></section><text>dbang du 'gyur ro/ /oM bA ra s+ya mu kham dri Sh+TA bA la rkas ma te dza sA/ tsa tu r+tha ka m+ma hA g+hor ma k+Shi pra me ba bra ta s+ya ti/ sngags 'di gro ga'i 'dab ma la bris te lag pa la btags na rims nyin bzhi pa phral du nyams par byed do/ /bA gu dzi ka'i 'bras bu'i phye ma</text></item>
<item><p>288b.4</p><section></section><text>dar ba dang lhan cig btags nas de dril te/ dar ba'i zan dang / skyur ba thams cad dang lhan cig zos na gzhang 'brum dang / rkang 'bam dang / 'brum phran dang / mdze dang / mtshan bar rdol ba dang dug rnams sel bar byed do/ /bA gu dzi ka'i 'bras</text></item>
<item><p>288b.5</p><section></section><text>bu dar ba dang lhan cig btags nas de dril bas mdze thams cad dang / bitsa rtsi ka la sogs pa sel bar byed do/ /pA gu dza ga bre gang dang / seng ldeng zho gang mnyam par byas te/ chu bre brgyad dang bskol bar bya'o/ /de ni cha phyed lus pa na btud sa te/ bya</text></item>
<item><p>288b.6</p><section></section><text>rog gi lce dang / shu dag dang / ru rta dang / bilbi'i 'dab ma dang / gur gum dang / bdag nyid kyi khrag dang mnyam par sbyar bas shing yang dbang di byed do/ /o pi shA tsI rU be NA lid+ba ya tsu m+ba ya/ b+ha gaM sa ny+tse ya nya swA hA/ sngags kyi tshig 'di chu khyor ba gang la</text></item>
<item><p>288b.7</p><section></section><text>lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te nyal ba'i dus su rig ma gang gi ming smos nas btab na/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis mi'i dbang po'i btsan mo yin na'ang dbang du 'gyur na gzhan lta ci smos/ khrag skrod pa'i rtsa ba/ ka rmar ng+ga'i rtsa ba dang si h+ya'i lo ma dang /</text></item>
<item><p>289a.1</p><section></section><text>'di dag mnyam par byas rkang pa'i mthil la byugs na sa bon 'ching bar byed do/ /a ru ra dang/ zhu mkhan dang / lung thang gi 'dab ma dang / d+ha dur dang/ sa 'bru'i shun pa dang / sa kha s+ya na d+ga pra ma do mA nAM tA ye paSh+Ti sa si khaM ka</text></item>
<item><p>289a.2</p><section></section><text>ro ti/ oM ra tsa NI ma hAr d+NA ya swA hA/ sngags 'dis bdun du mngon par bsngags nas gos la sogs par mdud pa byas na bya ba ma lus pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ na ma:sA k+Shi:ka pA la mA li thA hA/ gzhan yang byi la'i khrag blangs nas/ 'jam 'bras til</text></item>
<item><p>289a.3</p><section></section><text>mar gyis bsgos te/ pad+ma'i skud pas sdong bu byas nas dbang phyug gi mdun du dud pa 'chags par byas te mig la byugs pa tsam gyis mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ oM tsi ti he he/ sngags 'dis chu dkrugs te mig byugs na the tshom med par grub par 'gyur ro/ /</text></item>
<item><p>289a.4</p><section></section><text>bya rog gi khrag dang / ce spyang gi mkhris pa dang / 'ug pa'i rus pa dang / 'di dag cha mnyam pa'i phye ma zhib mor byas te/ rgyur skar nabs sol btags te/ mig la byugs na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sA la pa r+Ni lag pa la bcings nas/ sa ma re</text></item>
<item><p>289a.5</p><section></section><text>kA N+Ta zlog par byed do/ /na ma sh+tsa N+Da badzra bA Na ye ma hA ya k+Sha senA pa ta ye/ ta d+ya thA/ oM badzra hri k+ShI s+phaT/ rig sngags 'di lan cig brjod cing / oM saM tso raM staM b+ha ya swA hA/ kA la si mI ka'i rtsa ba dang / ga bur dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / 'di dag cha mnyam</text></item>
<item><p>289a.6</p><section></section><text>par byas nas/ chu dang btags te ril bu byas nas grib ma la bskams te/ ril bu de la yang dag par reg pa'i skyes bu'i lag pa g.yas par pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa kun nas bris te/ lag pa des bud med kyi lag pa g.yas pa bzung na bud med de mod la</text></item>
<item><p>289a.7</p><section></section><text>dbang du 'gyur ro/ /dri bzang chen po'i rtsa ba rked la bcings na khu ba rengs par byed pa'i mchog tu bstan no/ /ba rA ha kA n+ta'i rtsa ba chu dang btags te rkang pa'i mthil la byugs na khu ba rengs par byed do/ /namaHsarba si d+ha b+h+yaHsid+he r+b+ha ba tra me swA hA/</text></item>
<item><p>289b.1</p><section></section><text>sngags 'dis mngon par bsngags te/ ba bla dang / ldong ros dang / spang spos dang / ru rta dang / mu sta ka ste thams cad gcig tu cha mnyam par byas nas/ zhib tu btags te bud med kyi mgo la bsnun na/ mngag gzhug tu 'gyur ro/ /namaH</text></item>
<item><p>289b.2</p><section></section><text>kriSh+Na sarba rA ya ma sa kA nAM ku N+DaM bam+d+hA mi swA hA/ ji srid nyi ma shar gyi bar du/ oM ra k+Sha ra k+Sha ra k+Sha swA hA/ sngags 'dis chu khyor ba gang la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ phyogs bzhir gtor na/ sbrang bu rnams skrod par byed do/ /ka ra bI ra dmar po'i rtsa ba</text></item>
<item><p>289b.3</p><section></section><text>lan bdun bsngags te bud med kyi mdun du gtor na bud med de'i mod kho na la dbang du 'gyur ro/ /bra h+ma daNI dang / shu dag dang / lo ma rnams sbrang dang lhan cig btags nas ling+ga la byugs nas 'dod pa byas na bdag po gzhan 'dod par mi byed do/ /</text></item>
<item><p>289b.4</p><section></section><text>pa tsa ka'i mig blangs nas dzA hi dang sun+d+ha dang lhan cig gcig tu byas nas phye ma des mig sman byas nas/ skyes bu dbang du 'gyur ro/ /be tsa ka'i snum blangs nas ba'i mar dang lhan cig gcig tu byas nas dud pa dbab par bya'o/ /ris mig sman byas nas</text></item>
<item><p>289b.5</p><section></section><text>'byung bo dang sha za rnams kyi dbus su rtse bar byed do/ /be tsa ka'i snying blangs nas chang dang lhan cig lus la byugs nas 'dod pa spyad na bud med thams cad skyes pa'i dbang du 'gyur ro/ tshangs pa'i shing gi rtsa ba khar bcug na khu ba rengs par byed do/ /</text></item>
<item><p>289b.6</p><section></section><text>lga dang / pi pi ling dang / na le sham dang / rgya skyegs dang / zir dang / zi ra nag po dang / shing kun dang / sgog pa dang / lan tsha dang / 'dab ma dang / ku Ta rnams chang dang btags te/ phra hA ro s+thi te na/ a she ShA dzi r+NA</text></item>
<item><p>289b.7</p><section></section><text>ta n+ha bA shwar+ya ro bya:/ thams cad nyams par byed do/ /gang zhig su N+Thi bcu gnyis 'thungs/ /bad kan tshogs ni 'joms byed cing / /rlung yang nye bar 'dren par byed/ /a dzi r+Na dzir sa r+ya su pI ha ma Sh+To da ka ni saM/ rang dga' ba/ a dza mo da tsha ba gsum/ /</text></item>
<item><p>290a.1</p><section></section><text>rgyam tsha zi ra rnam gnyis dang / /shing kun cha brgyad mnyam par bzung / /'di yi phye ma mar sar dang / /skye bo gang zhig za byed pa/ /rlung gi nad ni sel bar byed/ /mU la ma ya stu pu na b+hu ba ya: bi ba ti k+Shi ra Na ba pra t+ya</text></item>
<item><p>290a.2</p><section></section><text>tsu r+Na n+tA s+ya gu Do sam hi ta ba to dzI r+Ne ya Sh+Ta si na: hI nAM go \u0f85 pi sadzA ya to\u0f85 rtsi ta pI lAM haM sen+d+ra ku n+tA pra b+h+raM/ mra so ni bar+ng+hi ra ShU ba r+Sha ba ya sA mu k+Sho dza rA byA d+hi b+hi:a ru ra srang gcig /ba ru ra srang gcig /skyu ru ra srang gcig /ci tra kaM srang gsum/</text></item>
<item><p>290a.3</p><section></section><text>lga srang gcig /pi pi ling srang gcig/ /na le sha ma srang gcig/ nA ga ge sar gyi phye ma zho bzhi/ pho ba ris dkar po zho do/ /sdig srin rwa zho do/ /dug zho do/ /'di dag thams cad phye ma zhi ba mor byas nas bu ram srang lnga bcu rtsa lnga dang</text></item>
<item><p>290a.4</p><section></section><text>bsres te gang gis zos pa de me stobs su 'gyur ro/ /thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /mdze nad bco brgyad nyams par 'gyur ro/ /thang byed kyi nad dang / glo dang 'bugs dang / de bzhin du/ mchin nad dang / skya rbab dang / 'bras</text></item>
<item><p>290a.5</p><section></section><text>dang / rlung nad dang / sprul dang / srin bu lU ta dang / dug nad sel bar byed do/ /de bzhin du brtag pa dang g.yo ba 'ang ngo / /stobs glang po che dang mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /shugs rta lta bur 'gyur ro/ /zla ba gcig gis mer 'gyur</text></item>
<item><p>290a.6</p><section></section><text>ro/ /rna ba phag lta bur 'gyur ro/ /mig bya rgod lta bur 'gyur ro/ /'di thams cad kyis mi 'dregs par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i ril bu yongs su rdzogs so// //[]na mo ra t+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsa N+Da badzra pA NaM ye ma</text></item>
<item><p>290a.7</p><section></section><text>hA ya k+Sha se na pa ta ya/ ta t+ya thA/ oM dz+wa ra gri Nu dz+wa ra gri Nu gardza gardza/ ts+chardu ts+tsha rdu/ muny+tsa mu ny+tsa/ nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / rims mi bzad pa rnams/ aT ha Ta phyag na rdo rje'i bka'</text></item>
<item><p>290b.1</p><section></section><text>bzhin du/ hu ru hu ru/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ si ri muny+tsa ka NAM muny+tsa twa zhi da yaM muny+tsa muny+tsa/ Da da raM muny+tsa/ ka Ti muny+tsa muny+tsa ka N+tha muny+tsa/ ha sti muny+tsa/ bA do muny+tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT che ge mo'i rims nyams par gyis shig swA hA/ rims bzlog</text></item>
<item><p>290b.2</p><section></section><text>pa'o/ /dbang po'i nas dang / zhu mkhan dang / pu she tsi dang ma sar/ spos dkar/ pa ma/ bI tA/ ni phaTa'i 'dab ma rnams gcig tu byas nas btags te gdong la byugs na gdong zla ba lta bar 'gyur ro/ kA ma yA'i rtsa ba gcug tu bcings</text></item>
<item><p>290b.3</p><section></section><text>na gnyid du 'gyur ro/ /ku ThA ra ts+tshi N+ma'i rtsa ba khar bcug na ral gri la sogs pa zlog par byed do/ /a laM muShA'i rtsa ba rna ba gnyis la bcings na rims nyin bzhi pa nyams par byed do/ /dur khrod du skyes pa'i dro Na pu Sh+pa'i khu bas mig bkang na mig</text></item>
<item><p>290b.4</p><section></section><text>gi me tog sel bar byed do/ /k+Shu dgra i ni ka'i rtsa ba dang / gi waM lha cig btags nas thig le byas na rgyal po'i sgor mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /shri gA la bstu kA'i rtsa ba rna ba la bcings na mig nad sel bar byed do/ /sa kho Ta ka'i rtsa bas</text></item>
<item><p>290b.5</p><section></section><text>mgul nad sel bar byed do/ /b+hu mi tsam pa ka'i rtsa ba btags nas btungs na lto ba'i zug sel bar byed do/ /dka' thub pa'i chu 'ongs pa dang/ 'bras sA lu dang / 'bras thug po che dang/ ka ra dkar po dang lhan cig btungs na</text></item>
<item><p>290b.6</p><section></section><text>bud med rnams kyi khrag 'bab pa sel bar bar byed do/ /tri shru li ka'i rtsa ba khar bcug na glang po che dbang du 'gyur ro/ /pr-i ha tI dkar po'i rtsa ba 'bras thug po che'i chu dang btags nas btungs na rde nad sel bar byed do/ /su bAN+Na se phA li</text></item>
<item><p>290b.7</p><section></section><text>ka'i rtsa ba dar ba dang lhan cig btags nas byug pa byas na khyi rdo sel bar byed do/ /mngon par bgrod pa'i dus su a g+ni ba stu ka'i rtsa ba khar bcug na mod la bud med dbang du 'gyur ro/ /a la mu ShA'i rtsa ba kaM dzi ka dang btags</text></item>
<item><p>291a.1</p><section></section><text>nas mgo bo la byabs na mgo'i nad sel bar byed do/ /arka dkar po'i rtsa ba dar ba dang btags nas btungs na mig ser sel bar byed do/ /nA ga lam dzA ti'i rtsa ba khar bcug na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'o ma dang lhan cig</text></item>
<item><p>291a.2</p><section></section><text>zos nas chags pa byas na bu skyes bar 'gyur ro/ /b+ho dza nany+tsa e ka ba la yA dug+hi na sa ha kA ra dang / mkhan pa'i rtsa ba dang / dro Na pu Sh+pa'i rtsa ba dang / yung ba dang / 'bras thug po che lhan cig byas nas/ dri la phyi byas te/ chus dkrus na gsal</text></item>
<item><p>291a.3</p><section></section><text>por smra bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du nA ga ge sar dang / s+tha la ku m+b+hI dang / nAg dam na ka dang / dmar ka puSha pa rnams kyi rtsa bas dril phyis byas te chus bkrus na/ klu nor rgyas kyi bu'ang dbang du 'gyur ro/ /na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye ma hA ya k+Sha se</text></item>
<item><p>291a.4</p><section></section><text>nA pa ta ye/ ta d+ya thA/ a na le a na le hu tu sA hA/ sngags 'di tsha ba'i til mar la brgyad mngon par bsngags par byas te rkang pa gnyis la byugs na dpag tshad du mar mi ngal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum byas pas</text></item>
<item><p>291a.5</p><section></section><text>so/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyis phyag rgya 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /bcings pa grol ba las bzlas bar bya'o/ /na ma:ku su mA li kA ya hi ma ra dU re sa ba ri swA hA/ byi ba sgrib par byad pa'i sngags so/ /a pA marga'i rtsa ba la bdun bsngags pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>291a.6</p><section></section><text>srad bu yongs su bcings na rims nyin gcig pa sel bar byed do/ /ba rA ha krAn+ta'i rtsa ba lag pa la bcings na lang tsho nyams pa la'ang bu 'byung ngo / /daN+Do t+pa la'i rtsa ba dang / gi waM lhan cig btags nas thig le byas te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/</text></item>
<item><p>291a.7</p><section></section><text>rgyal po'i pho brang la sogs pa yul 'khor kyi skye bo dga' bar 'gyur ro/ phag gnon pa/ /ka ke la'i rtsa ba phrad par byas na so'i zug rngu sel bar byed do/ /tang s+thA kr-im ya:nA sha ya ti/ b+h+ri ga rA dza'i rtsa ba dang / a par dzi ta'i rtsa ba dang / me tog phyungs</text></item>
<item><p>291b.1</p><section></section><text>te mgrin par bcings na lkog 'bras sel bar byed do/ /bstu ka'i rtsa ba bA sa'i chu dang bcas pa btungs na skya rbab kyi nad sel bar byed do/ ti k+ta la shu'i rtsa ba kany+dzi ka dang btags te spyi bor byugs na mgo bo'i zug sel bar byed do/ /su bar+Nase phA li ka'i rtsa</text></item>
<item><p>291b.2</p><section></section><text>ba sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig btungs na/ dri chu 'gags pa sel bar byed do/ sidz+dza'i rtsa ba bu ram dang lhan cig zos na gnyid du 'gyur ro/ /baTa'i rtsa ba btags nas byin na mig ser sel bar byed do/ /kaN+Ta kA ra'i rtsa ba rked pa la bcings na mig nad sel</text></item>
<item><p>291b.3</p><section></section><text>bar byed do/ /sU ma pa t+ta dang / b+hany+dza na'i rtsa ba btags nas lga'i khu ba dang / rgyam tsha dang / til mar lhan cig bsres te rna ba bkang na rna ba'i zug rngu sel bar byed do/ kriSh+na sA ka'i rtsa ba btags na so'i zug rngu sel bar byed do/ /guny+dza'i rtsA ba dum du</text></item>
<item><p>291b.4</p><section></section><text>bdun du byas nas srad bu bdun rked par bcings na gzhang 'brum gyi nad sel bar byed do/ /na ba ma li'i rtsa ba ma bkrus pa bya rog ma grag pa'i dus su bde bar phyung nas srad bu bdun dang bcas ba rked par bcings na tsi tUn sel bar byed do/ sma ru mgo nag/</text></item>
<item><p>291b.5</p><section></section><text>pa T+yA'al ka'i rtsa ba'i sa shing zos na mig ser sel bar byed do/ /sba'i rtsa ba bskol nas btungs na mdze nad sel bar byed do/ /skyu ru ra dang ni m+pa'i lo ma lhan cig btags nas zos te/ sA kho Ta ka'i rtsa ba dang / kany+dzi ka btags nas byugs na rlung /</text></item>
<item><p>291b.6</p><section></section><text>'bras sel bar byed do/ /sa Na'i rtsa ba so rtsi dang lhan cig thos na dbang po'i nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'dab ma dang bcas pa'i dman ka'i rtsa ba btags nas btungs na yongs su 'gyur ba'i zug rngu sel bar byed do/ /su wa r+Na sa phA li ka'i rtsa ba khar</text></item>
<item><p>291b.7</p><section></section><text>btsug na rgyan rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /ba so rta ra'i si pha phyung nas lte ba'i phyogs su bcings na bud med bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dza ya n+ti'i rtsa ba khar bcug na tha snyad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /b.rA ha kA n+ta'i rtsa ba lag pa la bcings na tha snyad kyis</text></item>
<item><p>292a.1</p><section></section><text>mi thub par 'gyur ro/ /a par dzi ta'i rtsa ba skar ma rgyal la phyung nas ras bal la snum byugs te dud pa dbab bar bya'o/ /des mig sman byas na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /kunA'i rtsa ba skar ma rgyal la byung ste/ bu sA</text></item>
<item><p>292a.2</p><section></section><text>ra ka'i gnas su bzhag na tshong rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /ma yu ra si khA'i rtsa ba rang gi khu ba dang btags nas sor mo la byugs na bud med 'dzag par the tshom med do/ /rnya ma dA ti'i rtsa ba 'dab ma dang bcas pa btags nas se phal byugs na bud med 'dzag go /nA</text></item>
<item><p>292a.3</p><section></section><text>ga ge sar gyi yu ba/ a sho ka'i rtsa ba dang / so rtsi dang chang rma bya'i gtsug phud gang la sbyin pa de'i a mats+tsha ka zhi bar byed do/ /su ri dang su nA la so rtsi bcos bzos na/ khu ba rengs ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /d+h+ri d+ga rA dza'i rtsa ba rang gi khu bar btags bas</text></item>
<item><p>292a.4</p><section></section><text>mig sman byas na/ gang dang gang mthong ba de dang de dbang du byed do/ /rang gi khrag dang gi waM gis thig le byas na bud med gang mthong ba de dbang du byed do/ /byi tang ga dang / b+ha l+lA ta ka dang / tsi tra ka dang / a b+ha yA dang / da mong sha sa nA ga rA dang mnyam pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>292a.5</p><section></section><text>ril bus mar sar lhags na gang ngal bar 'gro ba'i skyes bu de rlung dang mtshungs bar 'gyur ro/ /bud shing gi khu ba dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / lcags kyi phye ma dang / bdam gyi pad+ma dang / b+h+ri d+ha'i khu bas kyang ngo / /a rma pa b+hu thun mos ba ni Sh+TaM/</text></item>
<item><p>292a.6</p><section></section><text>rany+dza ti ka sha ka pA lan san+ha haM/ gu ny+dza dkar po'i rtsa ba skar ma rgyal byung nas/ te na daSh+Ta ka s+ya na sa bA ma nA si kA ya: pra Te pra do t+te tsan+tsha te/ buny+dza dkar po'i rtsa ba rked pa la bcings na bdag nyid kyi khrag sel bar byed do/ /de'i rtsa ba skye gnas la</text></item>
<item><p>292a.7</p><section></section><text>byugs par byin na mngal bsdams pa bca' bar byed do/ /guny+dza dkar po'i rtsa ba phye ma zhib mor byas nas ma he'i 'o ma la bcug na zho smin par 'gyur ro/ /sA kho Ta ka'i 'o ma thigs pa gnyis bcug ste/ legs par smin pa nyi ma gsum pa la bsrubs</text></item>
<item><p>292b.1</p><section></section><text>pa'i mar gsar blangs te/ dar ba/ ta kra ny+dza dza hra sA pa ya/ me tog dkar po gtor bya'o/ nyi ma gzhan la de'i me tog nag por 'gyur ro/ mar sar des thod par mig sman du 'gyur ro/ /dzaM bI ra'i rtsa ba btags na/ dza n+ti ka'i nad sel bar byed do/ /</text></item>
<item><p>292b.2</p><section></section><text>pan+nAg pa ti ka'i rtsa ba btags na bems po'i nad sel bar byed do/ /r-i tubI tI'i 'byung po'i nyi ma bzhi pa la nA ga ge sar gyi lo ma dang / kha dog gcig pa'i ba'i 'o ma btungs na/ nyi ma bzhi pa la skyes bu'i mdze nad sel bar byed do/ /skyu ru ra ge sar las</text></item>
<item><p>292b.3</p><section></section><text>skyes ba'i khu ba dang lhan cig lcags kyi snod du btags te mig sman byas na rab rib sel bar byed do/ pU na rna wa'i rtsa ba dang / so so b+ha ny+dza na'i rtsa ba dang / 'bras thug po che'i chu dang btags nas de nyid btungs na mkhris pa sel ba'i mchog go /ta n+Tu li kA'i</text></item>
<item><p>292b.4</p><section></section><text>rtsa bas mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dag gis bzung ba'i snying gi zug rngu sel bar byed do/ /ka ny+tsa nA'i rtsa ba dang / shun pa dang / dar ba mnyam par btungs na zas kyis brnabs pa sel bar byed do/ /I shra ra'i rtsa ba dang kany+dzi ka btags nas byugs na gdug</text></item>
<item><p>292b.5</p><section></section><text>pa'i rma sel bar byed do/ /de bzhin du gdug pa'i rma'i gnas su byug par yang bya'o/ /tri sU li kA'i rtsa ba btags nas byug par byin na/ dug nad sel bar byed do/ /ta N+Du li kA'i 'dab ma dang bcas pa'i rtsa ba dang / a g+ni bstu ka'i rtsa ba'i khu ba btags</text></item>
<item><p>292b.6</p><section></section><text>nas lus la byugs na bcud skam sel bar byed do/ /su da r+sha ka'i rtsa ba btags nas byugs na mig nad zhi bar byed do/ /go dzi hwe'i rtsa ba ras bal la bcings na tha snyad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /a shwa gan+ng+ha'i rtsa ba mar dang lhan cig btugs na mang la</text></item>
<item><p>292b.7</p><section></section><text>brtan par byed pa'i mchog go/ /su ra b+ha ti ga ra'i rtsa ba btags nas byugs na srin bu lU ta'i dug sel bar byed do/ /gi rI ka r+Ni ka'i rtsa ba btags na lkog 'bras sel bar byed do/ /u t+pal sngon po dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rtsa ba so rtsir byin na</text></item>
<item><p>293a.1</p><section></section><text>dbang du byed pa'i mchog go/ /a pA mA rga'i rtsa ba dang / rgyam tsha dang / gam dzi ka lhan cig zangs kyi snod du sbyar nas mig sman byas na mig tshag pa sel bar byed do/ /dza yan+ta'i rtsa ba til mar gyis smin par byas na zos na bcud</text></item>
<item><p>293a.2</p><section></section><text>nyams par byed do/ /ka rany+dza'i rtsa ba dang / ma hA kA la'i rtsa ba dang / ta Ni la'i chu btung bar byin na sa'i dug sel bar byed do/ /de bzhin du bu na rna bA dkar po'i rtsa ba phyung nas sna bug tu byin na gdug pa'i dug sel bar byed do/ /pA tha'i rtsa ba dang</text></item>
<item><p>293a.3</p><section></section><text>ba dang lhan cig btags na tshad pas 'khru ba sel bar byed do/ /man+dA rA'i rtsa ba 'o ma dang lhan cig btungs na rlung nad sel bar byed do/ /arka'i rtsa ba dang / ri Shi pU To li ka'i rtsa ba sa bon dang lhan cig cha mnyam par byas nas chu dang btags te ra shang lam</text></item>
<item><p>293a.4</p><section></section><text>du byugs na gzhang 'brum sel bar byed do/ /dri sI li ka'i rtsar 'o ma dang btags te gi wi rang lhan cig zangs kyi snod du bzhag nas mig la byugs na/ rab rib sel bar byed do/ /a ru ra dang / zhu mkhan dang / lung thang gi 'dab ma dang / shing khun dang /</text></item>
<item><p>293a.5</p><section></section><text>shu dag rnams cha dang lhan cig btags nas gal te sos btab na 'chi bde'i tshe yang 'di byin na rnal du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /ko ki lA k+Sha'i rtsa ba dang / ku DU tsi dang / dbyug pa'i ut+pal dang / su wa rtses ph+wa li ka'i sa bon dang / bri ha ti'i rtsa</text></item>
<item><p>293a.6</p><section></section><text>ba dang / cha mnyam par byas nas yungs kar gyi snum dang lhan cig btungs na rkang 'bam dang rlung nad sel bar byed do/ /go dzi tra'i rtsa ba dar ba dang lhan cig btungs na rked pa'i nad sel bar byed do/ /ut+pala'i rtsa ba ba'i mar dang lhan cig btungs na pri Sha Na'i klu</text></item>
<item><p>293a.7</p><section></section><text>sel bar byad do/ /ku dza Ta'i rtsa ba phye mar byas nas sprang dang lhan cig byin na rtsa'i rma sel bar byed do/ /pa ra me swa ra'i rtsa ba dang shu dag byugs na 'bras sel bar byed do/ su NI kA'i rtsa ba dang / lga dang lhan cig lag pa la byugs na mi rengs par byed do/ /ban+d+hu</text></item>
<item><p>293b.1</p><section></section><text>ki'i rtsa ba snar byin na sna nad sel bar byed do/ /bA rA ha krAn+ta'i rtsa ba yungs kar gyi mar dang lhan cig khar bcug na/ skye bo thams cad kyi mig 'ching bar byed do/ /bra thA mA laM/ oM khang+ga wA ri NI swA hA/ zhes pa'i sngags kyis kha la btabs nas mtshon bza' bar bya'o/</text></item>
<item><p>293b.2</p><section></section><text>a ga ru dang / gu gul dang / shrI wA sa dang / tsan dan dang / ne pA li kA'i 'dab ma dang / ni rmAs rnams bu ram dang lhan cig cha mnyam par byas nas bdag nyid bdugs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin na skye bo thams cad kyis de'i dri snom par byed cing / thams</text></item>
<item><p>293b.3</p><section></section><text>cad mngag gzhug tu 'gyur ro/ /til nag po dang / skyu ru ra dang / b+h+ri ng+ga rA dza dang / 'di dag cha mnyam par byas nas mar dang lhan cig zos na skra dkar dang / rab rib dang / skya rbab rnams sel bar byed do/ /kA ka dzi g+ha'i rang bzhin bshad par bya ste/ sman</text></item>
<item><p>293b.4</p><section></section><text>chen po kA ka dzi g+ha a ti bA lA/ de bzhin du ba la NaM dang / ba ra N+Du'i 'dab ma dang / khu ba dang / yungs kar dkar po dang / maN+Du ka'i ril ma bre gang gis smin par byas te/ 'dis rtsa ba bkrus na chu klung gi shugs kyang zhi bar byed do/ /kA ka dzi g+hA'i khu ba</text></item>
<item><p>293b.5</p><section></section><text>blangs te/ 'di'i rtsa ba dang btags nas rma la btab na rma gso ba'i mchog go /'di'i 'dab ma dang / 'bras thub po che'i chu dang btags te bkrus shang bskams nas rma til mar gyis bkang na rtsa gso ba'i mchog go /'di'i 'dab ma'i khu ba dang / ba</text></item>
<item><p>293b.6</p><section></section><text>lang gi chu lhan cig khar bzung na kha'i nad sel bar byed do/ /kA ka dzi g+hA dang / skyu ru ra dang / ba ru ra dang / b+h+ra d+ga rA dza'i khu ba blangs nas/ til mar gyis smin par byas na khi nya 'phel bar byed do/ /thos pa rengs pa sel bar byed do/ /sbrang dang lhan cig</text></item>
<item><p>293b.7</p><section></section><text>gis lkog 'bras sel bar byed do/ b+hal+lA ta ka dang / lhan cig zos na mdze nad sel bar byed do/ /mar sar dang lhan cig gis skyigs bu'i nad sel bar byed do/ /spos dkar dang lhan cig gis mtshan bar rdol ba sel bar byed do/ /spos dkar dang lhan cig gis mtshan bar rdol ba sel bar byed do/ /kha N+Da dang lhan cig gis kha</text></item>
<item><p>294a.1</p><section></section><text>nad sel bar byed do/ /ba'i chu dang lhan cig gis me dbal sel bar byed do/ /'phags pa rtsa ba'i mdzod sman chen po'i rim pa slob dpon dpal ldan 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //[]pri yaM</text></item>
<item><p>294a.2</p><section></section><text>ku dang / ka ko la dang / shu dag dang / ru rta dang / yungs kar dkar po dang / nA ga pu ShA dang / spos dkar rnams kyi bdug pa byas na myur du tshor 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sgog pa zos na a ru dang / ku Ta btags na dri ma med par 'gyur ro/ /chang btungs</text></item>
<item><p>294a.3</p><section></section><text>nas du rba btags na dri ma med par 'gyur ro/ /pa ro lI'i khu ba btab na chang dkar por 'gyur ro/ /yang / so so'i bI ra btab na rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /kA ra sum kha dkar po'i rtsa ba dang rma bya'i gtsug phud kyi rtsa ba dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa dkar</text></item>
<item><p>294a.4</p><section></section><text>bo'i rtsa ba rnams gcig tu byas nas btags te grib ma la bskams pa'i ril bu khar bcug cing / lus la byugs pa byas na g.yul las mtshon cha bzlog par byed do/ skyu ru ra'i rtsa ba dang / me tog phyung nas khar bcug na g.yul las mtshon cha rengs bar byed do/</text></item>
<item><p>294a.5</p><section></section><text>u ng+d+ha d+t+ha ga l-i taM ba nA ni si k+ta mr-i t+ti kAM gr-i d+ya dak+to da ra ma d+h+ye pra kI s+ya ya ta gr-i ha phaT la sbrA ye ta/ ha hra i Sh+mi kA ya tan+ti/ tsa tu rda sh+yAM/ ba tu bA ra bri k+Sha s+ya dak+Shi Na sA khAM gr-i h+ya ka ra yi tA shri d+ga ma tI sh+ma shad g+ni/ tA d+hi taM/ phug ron gyi brun dang / lham bu chu gsher gyi chu</text></item>
<item><p>294a.6</p><section></section><text>dang / gu gul dang / shing tsha dang / na gi dang / ru rta dang / gan ka'i sa bon dang / 'di dag gis bdugs pa'i ril bu sbyar te/ bdug spos 'dis rnyed pa dang bcas pa'i tshong 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sngags ni 'di 'o/ /oM na mo ca N+Da ku Sha ku ru ku ru sA hA/</text></item>
<item><p>294a.7</p><section></section><text>'di ni byams gling gi gzims khang du rgya dpe bzhugs pa las chos rje rin po che ngag gi dbang phyug bsod nams rnam rgyal dpal bzang po'i bka' bzhin du/ zha lu lo tsA ba dge slong chos skyong bzang pos rgya dpe bzhin ji ltar go ba rnams bsgyur ro// //bla ma</text></item>
<item><p>294b.1</p><section></section><text>dang sangs rgyas sman gyi bla drang srong tshe'i rig byed 'dzin pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thog mar nad kyi mtshan nyid brtag ba ni/ /pho ba'i nad rnams rlung la brten/ sems 'khrul pa dang za zir 'byung ba mkhris pa la brten/ rang bzhin gyis 'khrul ba bad kan</text></item>
<item><p>294b.2</p><section></section><text>la brten/ tshad pa ma 'ju ba la brten/ rlung gi chad pa'i nad yun gyin tshad zhag bdun/ mkhris tshad zhag bcu/ bad kan tshad pa zhag bcu gnyis/ rlung tshad kyi brtan pa ni/ tshigs rnams brdungs pa lta bur na/ g.yal stong 'byung zhing bya snyong byed snying 'dod/</text></item>
<item><p>294b.3</p><section></section><text>grang shum shin tu che/ lus kyi ba spu ldang / mgo dang chu rgyus rtsib logs mur gong rkang mthil rnams lhag par na/ sgreg pa yang yang 'byung / rna ba 'on/ kha la ro bska/ mig dang sen mo shin tu dmar/ lus la rngul 'byung / de rnams chang ba 'am shas che na</text></item>
<item><p>294b.4</p><section></section><text>nges par rlung dang ldan pa'o/ /rtags de rnams shas che zhing rtsar mkhris pa dang bad kan gnyis ka 'dug na 'dus pa'i rtags so/ mkhris tshad kyi rtags la/ chu yang yang 'tshag snying 'dod cing btsags tshe na zug kyang cung zad 'byung / lus drod shin tu che/</text></item>
<item><p>294b.5</p><section></section><text>mchu skam/ kha'i nang dang lce sogs la thor pa chung ngu mang du 'byung / sna khrag 'bab/ mig mnan pa lta bu 'degs dka'/ gos gon 'bud byed snying 'dod/ mig dang sen mo mdog ser/ kha nas dri ngan pa 'byung / kha ra ro kha/ de rnams tshang ba'am shas che</text></item>
<item><p>294b.6</p><section></section><text>na mkhris pa ldan pa'o/ /rtags 'di rnams shas che zhing rtsar rlung rtsa dang bad kan gnyis ka 'dug na 'dus pa'i nad kyi rtags so/ bad kan kyi rtags la/ lus dang shes pa l+tsi bas gang yang byed mi 'dod pa/ dang kha 'gags shing zas gang la'ang bro ba med</text></item>
<item><p>294b.7</p><section></section><text>mig mnan pa lta bur lci ba/ lus rtse ba yang byed/ lus la drod cung zad yod pa/ sems rtsa 'khrug/ /nyal snying 'dod/ kha la ro skyur/ mchil ma mang du 'byung zhing skyur dgos ba/ lus mdog mdangs med thal kha dang tshi che/ mig dang sen mo'i mdog</text></item>
<item><p>295a.1</p><section></section><text>ljang / de rnams tshang ba'am shas che na bad kan yin zhing / gong gi rtags rnams phal cher tshang la rtsar rlung dang mkhris pa gnyis ka ldan pa 'dus pa'i rtags so/ /gzhan yang 'dus pa'i rtags la gtam chal chol smra/ gnyid che</text></item>
<item><p>295a.2</p><section></section><text>mig dmar zhing mchi ma 'dzag/ /l+tse 'gags so/ /nad glo bur ba'i rtags la/ mig mdongs nas blta nan che zhing g.yo 'gul nyung / lus sdod mi tshugs so/ /de ltar rtags dang rtsa mthun na rkyang pa dang / dper na rlung gi rtags la mkhris pa'i rtsa/ mkhris</text></item>
<item><p>295a.3</p><section></section><text>pa'i rtags la rlung gi rtsa lta bu 'dug na mkhris rlung ste des rigs bsgres te shes par bya'o/ /rtsa la brtag pa la/ rtsa ba rlung mkhris bad kan gsum gyi rtsa/ de las gyes ba bcu bzhi ste/ rlung gi gnas su rlung / mkhris pa/ bad kan dang nye ba'i rlung /</text></item>
<item><p>295a.4</p><section></section><text>mkhris pa'i gnas su mkhris pa/ rlung / bad kan/ bad kan dang nye ba'i mkhris pa/ bad kan gyi gnas su bad kan/ rlung / mkhris pa/ mkhris pa dang nye ba'i bad kan te bcu gnyis/ gsum ga'i gnas su rgyu ba'i khrag dang chu'i rtsa ste bcu bzhi'o/ /de</text></item>
<item><p>295a.5</p><section></section><text>la rlung gi rtsa ni sbom la mgyogs/ mkhris pa'i rtsa ni grims la mgyogs/ bad kan gyi rtsa ni lhod la dal ba yin la/ de yang zhogs pa las ma 'khrugs shing zas gang yang ma zos gong du blta ste mkhrig ma'i gnyer ma dang po nas rim bzhin nam mkha'/ rlung /</text></item>
<item><p>295a.6</p><section></section><text>me/ chu/ sa lnga las nam mkha' dang sa'i gnas bor bi rlung me chu gsum gyi gnas mtshon kan chag gsum gyi 'og tu rim pa ltar rlung mkhris bad kan gsum gyi gnas su bzung la/ rlung gnas rang gi rlung / mkhris pa'i gnas kyi rlung / bad kan gyi gnas</text></item>
<item><p>295a.7</p><section></section><text>kyi rlung gsum/ de yang rlung gnas rang gi rlung rtsa sarba sbrul gyi 'gros lta bur 'phar/ mkhris gnas kyi rlung b+ha i ba bya rog gi 'gros ltar 'phar/ bad kan gnas kyi rlung rma ma yU ra bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar/ de bzhin du mkhris gnas rang gi mkhris rtsa la bsreg</text></item>
<item><p>295b.1</p><section></section><text>pa 'phur ltar 'phar/ rlung gnas kyi mkhris rtsa shing gi 'gros ltar 'phar/ bad kan gnas kyi mkhris rtsa 'bab chu ltar 'phar ba/ bad kan rang gnas kyi rtsa ngang ba'i rgyal po'i 'gros ltar 'phar/ rlung gnas kyi bad kan gyi rtsa sin 'bu pad+ma can gyi 'gros ltar</text></item>
<item><p>295b.2</p><section></section><text>'phar/ mkhris gnas kyi bad kan gyi rtsa sbal pa'i 'gros dzuM ltar 'phar/ khrag la'ang gsum ste rlung pA Ni gnas kyi khrag rtsa nya'i 'gros ltar 'phar/ haMs rA dza mkhris gnas kyi khrag rtsa'i byi'u'i skad ltar 'phar/ dzo 'u ka bad kan gnas kyi khrag rtsa</text></item>
<item><p>295b.3</p><section></section><text>phu ron gyi 'gros ltar 'phar/ chu la maN+Du ka gnyis te rlung gnas dang mkhris gnas kyi chu'i rtsa rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar/ bad kan mcho li gnas kyi chu'i rtsa khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar la/ rlung ci re gi gnas su sbrul gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na rang gnas su rang</text></item>
<item><p>295b.4</p><section></section><text>ka bU ta/ /'gros te nad med kyi rtsa/ sreg pa'i 'gros ltar 'phar na mkhris rlung gi nad tshan re wa che zhing bcos dka'/ chu'i 'gros ltar 'phar na 'bring kya kuTi shig gi 'gros ltar 'phar na mkhris rlung yin kyang tshan chung la bcos sla/ go rim de bzhin ngang pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>295b.5</p><section></section><text>rgyal bo sbal ba srin bu pad+ma can gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na bad rlung che 'bring chung gsum/ nya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na khrag rlung yin kyang tshan chung / bye'u ltar 'phar na khrag rlung 'bring po/ phug ron ltar 'phar na khrag rlung gi nad babs lci/ de bzhin du rta'i 'gros</text></item>
<item><p>295b.6</p><section></section><text>ltar 'phar na rlung gi chu gso sla/ khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na gzhi che/ mkhris pa'i gnas su sreg pa 'phar ba ltar 'phar na rang gnas su rang ste nad med kyi rtsa/ sbrul dang rma bya'i 'gros bya rog gi skad gsum rim pa ltar mkhris rlung che 'breng chung gsum</text></item>
<item><p>295b.7</p><section></section><text>ngang ba'i rgyal po srid 'bu pad+ma can/ sbal pa gsum gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na bad mkhris che 'breng chung gsum/ byi'u'i skad ltar 'phar na khrag 'phar na khrag mkhris chung ngu / nya dang khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na khrag mkhris tshan che/ rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na chu</text></item>
<item><p>296a.1</p><section></section><text>dang mkhris pa gzhe chung / khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na gzhi che/ bad kan gyi gnas su ngang pa'i rgyal po'i 'gros ltar 'phar na rang gnas su rang ste nad med/ sbrul dang bya rog rma bya gsum rim pa ltar bad rlung che 'breng chung</text></item>
<item><p>296a.2</p><section></section><text>gsum/ sreg pa shig chu gsum bad mkhris che 'breng chung gsum/ nya byi'u phug ron gsum par khrag che 'breng chung gsum/ rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na chu dang bad kan shas che/ khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na chu dang bad kan yin kyang shas chung ngo / de yang</text></item>
<item><p>296a.3</p><section></section><text>mtshon gyi mas sner mkhris rtsa dang / dkan gyi yas snar rlung rtsa/ dkan gyi mas sner bad kan gyi rtsa dang / chag gi yas sner mkhris pa'i rtsa 'phar na nye ba'i gnas yin pas skyon chung ngo / /rlung gi gnas su mkhris rtsa shig gi 'gros ltar 'phar na rlung mkhris</text></item>
<item><p>296a.4</p><section></section><text>yin kyang bcos na myur du bde zhing ma bcos kyang 'cho'o/ /rlung gnas su bad kan gyi rtsa srin bu pad+ma can gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na mgo na/ glo dgog pa sogs 'byung zhing skyon chung yang ma bcos na ngang pa'i rgyal po'i 'gros ltar song dogs pa'i nyin yod do/ /</text></item>
<item><p>296a.5</p><section></section><text>'phral du nad zug gzer che yang rlung gi gnas su khrag gi rtsa nya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na bcos kyang myur du bde zhing ma bcos kyang mi ring par 'tsho ba'o/ /rlung gi gnas su chu'i rtsa rta'i 'gros lta bu 'phar na dbugs kha mi bde ba/ mig dmar zhing mig 'dag</text></item>
<item><p>296a.6</p><section></section><text>mang pa sogs 'byung / mkhris pa'i gnas su rlung rtsa bya rog gi 'gros ltar 'phar na kha skam skom dad che/ tshags tshogs sogs khol bur na yang gso sla/ mkhris pa'i gnas su bad kan gyi rtsa sbal pa'i 'gros ltar 'phar na mgo bo na/ kha nas mchil ma</text></item>
<item><p>296a.7</p><section></section><text>yang yang 'bo dgos shing mkhris pa'ang cung zad skyug go /mkhris pa'i gnas su khrag gi rtsa byi'u'i skad ltar 'phar na lus la rtse yas byed ci nas khrag cung zad 'dzag pa dang / thor ba chung ngu 'byung / mig gi</text></item>
<item><p>296b.1</p><section></section><text>mdangs dmar ser du 'ong ngo / /mkhris ba'i gnas su chu'i rtsa rta'i 'gros lta bur 'phar na dngas ma 'dzag /lus 'khyoms shing 'khor/ mig na zhing mig chu 'dzag go /bad kan gyi gnas su rlung gi rtsa rma bya'i 'gros lar 'phar na lus grang shum byed cing rkang</text></item>
<item><p>296b.2</p><section></section><text>lag gi mgo drod med/ mdog snum/ zhag chung zhing skya thal po baspos pa dang 'khrog pa 'byung ngo / /bad kan gyi gnas su mkhris pa'i rtsa 'bab chu'i 'gros ltar 'phar na glo dgog/ /brang tsha/ 'grim zhing dbugs mi bde/ bad kan gyi gnas su khrag gi rtsa</text></item>
<item><p>296b.3</p><section></section><text>phug ron gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na lus drod che/ rngul 'bab/ 'og sgor khrag cung zad 'dzag /'phongs lug pa sogs 'byung / bad kan gyi gnas su rtsa khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na tshigs na zhing cung zad skrangs pa/ lus kyi mdangs mi gsal zhing tshi</text></item>
<item><p>296b.4</p><section></section><text>che/ lus dri mi zhim mo/ /rlung gi gnas su mkhris pa'i rtsa sreg pa 'phur ba lta bur 'phar na/ dngas ma 'dzag /rked pa na/ lus drod che/ lus las rngul mang du 'dzag /lus gyong / mkhris pa skyug /mig ser/ chu ser por 'bab pa sogs</text></item>
<item><p>296b.5</p><section></section><text>'byung zhing 'di ni mkhris rlung gi gtso bo ste bcos la bzab po/ /rlung gi sa ru mkhris pa'i rlung gi rtsa bya rog gi 'gros lta bur 'phar na/ lus brdungs ba ltar na/ pho ba sbos/ rna ba 'on/ lus la thor pa dang shu ba sogs 'byung ngo / /rlung gi gnas su</text></item>
<item><p>296b.6</p><section></section><text>mkhris pa'i bad kan gyi rtsa sbal pa'i 'gros ltar 'bar na/ lus 'dar zhing g.yo/ gos gon mi 'dod/ cung zad 'thur du 'khru/ bya snyong dang / g.yal stong byed/ pho ba 'khrogs pa sogs 'byung / rlung gi gnas su mkhris pa'i khrag gi rtsa byi'u'i</text></item>
<item><p>296b.7</p><section></section><text>'gros ltar 'phar na/ lus la za phrug byed/ tshags chigs dang mgo bo na/ mig na ba sogs 'byung / rlung gi gnas su mkhris pa'i chu'i rtsa rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/ so rnyi la skrangs shing chu ser dang khrag 'byung / mkhris tshad bskyed/ dbugs</text></item>
<item><p>297a.1</p><section></section><text>mi bde/ gnyid che/ lus lci ba sogs 'byung ngo / /rlung gi gnas su bad kan gyi rtsa ngang ba'i rgyal po'i 'gros ltar 'phar na lus brdungs shing gcus pa ltar na/ mgo bo 'khor/ dang kha 'gags/ lus khol bur</text></item>
<item><p>297a.2</p><section></section><text>na/ chu gtong dka' ba sogs 'byung zhing 'di ni bad rlung gi gtso bo ste bcos la bzab po/ /rlung gi gnas su bad kan gyi rlung gi rtsa rma bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na pho ba gcus pa ltar na/ rtsa gtor dka'/ rked pa dang chu rgyus na/ rlung sgra na sogs</text></item>
<item><p>297a.3</p><section></section><text>'byung ngo / /rlung gi gnas su bad kan gyi mkhris pa'i rtsa 'bab chu'i 'gros ltar 'phar na brang tsha/ grang bsil che/ kha skom/ mig dang sen mo'i mdog ljang khur snang ba/ dngas ma 'dzag pa sogs 'byung ngo / /rlung gi gnas su bad kan kyi</text></item>
<item><p>297a.4</p><section></section><text>khrag gi rtsa phug ron gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na/ rngul 'dzag /shu ba dang thor ba 'ong / /mig dmar zhing 'byed 'dzums nyung ba sogs 'byung ngo / /rlung gi gnas su bad kan gyi chu'i rtsa khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na mig 'grib/ pags pa gyong /</text></item>
<item><p>297a.5</p><section></section><text>chu gsog 'byung / rtsa 'bur mor dod/ za 'phrug long zhing brad pa dang chu ser 'dzag /pho bar srin 'bu 'phel ba sogs 'byung ngo / /mkhris gnas su rlung gi rtsa sbrul lnga bur 'phar na/ lus kyi tshags tshigs brdungs pa ltar na/ chu 'tshag</text></item>
<item><p>297a.6</p><section></section><text>dka' zhing zug che/ kha skom zhing thor pa mang / grang bsil che/ skom dad che/ pho ba na ba sogs 'byung zhing 'di ni mkhris rlung gtso bo ste bcos la bzab pa gces/ mkhris gnas su rlung gi mkhris pa'i rtsa shig gi 'gros ltar 'phar na/ tshad pa</text></item>
<item><p>297a.7</p><section></section><text>bskyed/ lus skam zhing drod che/ mig mi gsal/ kha rlungs dang rkang mthil drod che ba sogs 'byung / mkhris gnas su rlung gi bad kan gyi rtsa srin bu pad ma can ltar 'phar na/ sbyi bo na/ le lo dang gnyid che/ mchil ma mang / khar ro kha ba</text></item>
<item><p>297b.1</p><section></section><text>sogs 'byung ngo / /mkhris gnas su rlung gi khrag rtsa nya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/ lus mdog dmar zhing ba sbu'i bu ga nas khrag kyang cud zad 'dzag /mig chu mang ba sogs 'byung ngo / mkhris gnas su rlung gi rtsa rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/ pho ba</text></item>
<item><p>297b.2</p><section></section><text>sbos/ yan lag skam zhing tshigs dang gdong skrangs/ dri chu khrag ltar bab ba sogs 'byung / mkhris gnas su bad kan gyi rtsa ngang ba'i rgyal po'i 'gros ltar 'phar na khar ro mngar/ khong du srin 'bu 'phel/ khog par zo ba'i zho drag chags pa lta</text></item>
<item><p>297b.3</p><section></section><text>bu 'byung ngo / /lus kyi gting drod cung zad che zhing tshags tshigs sogs khol bur na/ mkhris skran 'cha' pa sogs 'byung ste bad mkhris kyi gtso bo yin pas btsos la gzab pa gces so/ /mkhris pa'i gnas su bad kan gyi rlung gi rtsa rma bya'i 'gros</text></item>
<item><p>297b.4</p><section></section><text>ltar 'phar na/ nyin res 'jog tu na/ lus la rngul 'byung zhing dri mi zhim/ mig gi mdangs dkar por 'gro/ /mchil ma mang ba sogs 'byung / mkhris pa'i gnas su bad kan gyi mkhris rtsa chu'i 'gros ltar bur 'phar na/ gnyid che/ lce</text></item>
<item><p>297b.5</p><section></section><text>'gas/ lus gyong / khrag cung zad skyug pa sogs 'byung ngo / /mkhris pa'i gnas su bad kan gyi khrag rtsa phug ron gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na/ sna khrag 'bab/ khrag skran 'cha'/ lte ba gcu zhing gzer/ me lce 'khor lo 'byung / mkhris</text></item>
<item><p>297b.6</p><section></section><text>pa'i gnas su bad kan gyi chu'i rtsa khyim bya'i 'gros lta bur 'phar na/ dang kha mi bde/ me drod 'chor/ ma 'ju ba'i nad dang 'gro 'dug dka' ba sogs 'byung / bad kan gyi gnas su rlung gi rtsa sbrul gyi 'gros ltar 'gros ltar 'phar na/ rkang pa na/</text></item>
<item><p>297b.7</p><section></section><text>'grims/ kha dri mi zhim/ mgo bo 'khor / chu'i mdog ser ba sogs 'byung ste 'di ni bad rlung gi rtsa ba yin pas gzab bar bcos/ bad kan gyi gnas sa rlung gi mkhris rtsa shing gi mkhris rtsa shig gis 'gros ltar 'phar na/ dngas ma 'dzag</text></item>
<item><p>298a.1</p><section></section><text>lus stobs nyams/ ngas chad pa sogs 'byung / bad kan gyi gnas su rlung gi bad kan gyi rtsa srin bu pad ma can gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na/ be snabs skyug cing glo che/ skya rbab dang mig</text></item>
<item><p>298a.2</p><section></section><text>'dag mang ba sogs 'byung ngo / bad kan gyi gnas su rlung gi khrag gi rtsa nya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/ pho ba 'khrog cing na/ dngas ma skams pas lus stobs nyams/ srong long 'byung / nyin re mos kyis na</text></item>
<item><p>298a.3</p><section></section><text>ba'o/ /bad kan gyi gnas su rlung gi chu'i rtsa rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/ pags nad kho la bu na ba sen mo btab kyang reg pa mi tshor ba/ yan lag skam/ dngas ma 'dzag /lus mgo mjug thams cad na ba sogs</text></item>
<item><p>298a.4</p><section></section><text>'byung / bad kan gyi gnas su mkhris pa'i rtsa sreg pa 'phur ba ltar 'phar na/ nyal na ldang 'dod/ ldang na nyal 'dod/ zas skom mi 'dod pa dang chu skyur skyug /lus drod che ba sogs 'byung ste/ 'di yang bad</text></item>
<item><p>298a.5</p><section></section><text>mkhris [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]gtso bo yin pas bcos la bzab/ bad kan gyi gnas su mkhris pa'i mkhris pa'i rlung rtsa bya rog gi 'gros ltar 'phar na/ gsus pa spo/ mas rlung gyen du ldog /gzhang 'brum 'ong ba sogs 'byung / bad</text></item>
<item><p>298a.6</p><section></section><text>kan gyi gnas su mkhris ba'i bad kan gyi rtsa sbal pa'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/ khrag 'grims/ be snams skyugs/ lus dri mi zhim pa sogs 'byung / bad kan gyi gnas su mkhris pa'i khrag gi rtsa byi'u'i skad</text></item>
<item><p>298a.7</p><section></section><text>ltar 'phar na/ chu sogs 'byung / brang tsha/ rtsib logs dang mchin pa na/ dang kha mi bde zhing zas mi 'ju ba sogs 'byung / bad kan gyi gnas su mkhris pa'i chu'i rtsa rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/ mig</text></item>
<item><p>298b.1</p><section></section><text>kyong du rdib/ chus lus skrangs/ kha 'grig /tshigs re mos su na ba sogs 'byung ngo / /mkhris pa'i gnas su mkhris [(]par nga [,]pa rang [)]gi rtsa sbal ba'i 'gros dang khrag rtsa bye'u'i skad ltar dang / rlung gi mkhris rtsa</text></item>
<item><p>298b.2</p><section></section><text>shig gi 'gros gsum res 'jog tu 'phar na 'dus pa ste kha skom zhing 'grig /skom dad che/ lus lci/ shes pa mi gsal na de ni myur du 'chi zhing mi 'tsho'o/ /bad kan gyi gnas su bad kan rang gi rtsa</text></item>
<item><p>298b.3</p><section></section><text>ngang ba'i rgyal po'i 'gros dang rlung gi mkhris rtsa shig gi 'gros so/ /mkhris pa'i bad kan gyi rtsa sbal pa'i 'gros gsum res 'jog du 'bar na/ de yang nad gsum 'dus pa ste mi 'tsho'o/ /lus 'khru ba/</text></item>
<item><p>298b.4</p><section></section><text>skyugs pa/ mgo dang tshags tshigs na ba/ so dang lce nag por song ba/ pho ba dang stod la gzer ba sogs nad rlung mkhris bad kan gsum ga'i rtags tshang zhing / rlung gi gnas su bad kan gyi rtsa ngang</text></item>
<item><p>298b.5</p><section></section><text>pa'i rgyal po'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/ de ni nges par mi 'tsho'o/ rlung mkhris bad kan gsum ka'i gnas su 'gros rnams nges med sna tshogs su rgyu na nad yun ring zhing 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rlung gi</text></item>
<item><p>298b.6</p><section></section><text>gnas su rlung dang / mkhris pa'i gnas su 'ang rlung rtsa 'phar na ma 'dzu ba'i nad ste gso sla'o/ /de ltar rtsa'i dbye ba rnams ma nor bar gtan la phab ste nad gang yin ngos zin pa dang / de'i sman dang sbyod</text></item>
<item><p>298b.7</p><section></section><text>lam rnams bya ba ni gnad do/ /zhes drang srong chen po da nan+d+ra ste sbyin pa'i dbang ba'i mdzad pa'i rtsa ba rtag cing gtan la 'bebs pa'i rab tu dbye ba rdzogs so// //</text></item>
<item><p>299a.1</p><section></section><text>@/ /mtshon 'og 'byung ba rlung gi sa rlung gi gnas so/ /rkang 'og 'byung ba me'i sa mkhris pa'i gnas so/ /chag gi 'og 'byung ba chu'i sa bdag na gyi gnas so/ /zas dang spyod lam bstan pa ni/ rlung gi nad mtha' dag la/ dro sar dal bar 'dug /me la sro zhing byug pa byed/ rtsam pa</text></item>
<item><p>299a.2</p><section></section><text>bA da/ pi ta/ ka pha/ bA da/ sarba/ pi ta/ bA da/ ka pa/ pi ta/ ka pa/ bA da/ pi ta/ ka pha/ dang mar/ sha dang de'i khu ba gtong / mkhris pa'i nad la bA la dang shri khaN gnyis zhib par btags la chur sbyar ba'i byug pa byed/</text></item>
<item><p>299a.3</p><section></section><text>rlang mkhris pa bad kan rlung sbrul mkhris pa rlung bad kan mkhris pa bad kan rlung mkhris pa/ bad kan grang sar bsdad/ nad tshabs che na lto bkag gtong / gzhan pag thug kho na bsten no/ /bad kun la grang dro ran par byas la dal</text></item>
<item><p>299a.4</p><section></section><text>dzuM/ dza lu ka /rak+ta/ la bka /ba is/ ma Tu ka haM sa radza/ ma yU ra/ pA Ni/ rak+ta/ bus 'chag /sran rtsam sogs zas yang zhing 'ju ba'i rigs bsten/ bcud can dang lci ba'i rigs 'dzem mo/ /dngul chu 'dul</text></item>
<item><p>299a.5</p><section></section><text>shag srin bu pad+ma can khrag phreg ba bya rog sbal pa ngang pa'i rkyal po rma bya chu khrag lugs la/ rdo gzhong gi nang du dngul chu zho nyi shu rtsa bzhi blug /de dang rdza rnying pa'am so phag khyor gang tsam dang mnyam du nyin gnyis</text></item>
<item><p>299a.6</p><section></section><text>pA Ni/ ma tsha li/ re ba/ rak+ta/ pA Ni/ tsi ri/ re ba/ pA Ni/ ka phu tra/ ku k+ki+uTi/ kyi bar du nyed/ de nas chu gtsang mar bsrings te dngul chu dang sa rang sar phye/ chu khog ma phyed tsam blug de la 'bras bu gsum dang</text></item>
<item><p>299a.7</p><section></section><text>chu nya rta khrag chu byi'u rta chu phug ron khyim bya rgya gar stod ja zhib par btags pa khyor gang tsam zhig blug /gong gi dngul chu ras gtsang mas dril la skud pas kha bsdams te</text></item>
<item><p>299b.1</p><section></section><text>chur sor bzhi tsam ma reg par khebs gcod la gtags te kha legs par bsgrigs nas rlangs pa mi 'chor ba byed/ nyi ma'i bzhi cha gcig tsam me btang la rlangs pas btsos/ chu grang thag chod pa dang bton te rdo gzhong legs par bkrus pa'i nang du</text></item>
<item><p>299b.2</p><section></section><text>blugs la shing g+hi wa kwa ra'i shing gzhogs dang mnyam du nyin gsum gyi bar grib ma la brdung ba dang nyi ma la bsro ba chu tshod re tsam gyi bar re mos su byed/ de nas shing che la chang gar mas khu ba byas nas nyin gsum gyi bar la nyed cing / 'di nas</text></item>
<item><p>299b.3</p><section></section><text>gzung nyin rer nyi mar 'jog thengs gnyis tsam las sngon ma lugs kyi re mos mi dgos/ de nas skyes pa'i chu dang ra'i 'o ma/ ba'i 'om/ ba sar pa'i chu rnams dang mnyam du rim pa bzhin nyin gsum re nyed/ de nas nyi ma me tog gi lo ma</text></item>
<item><p>299b.4</p><section></section><text>logs su brdungs pa'i khu ba/ sgog skya rdzogs pa'i khu ba/ ba sar pa'i chu rnams dang mnyam du go rim bzhin nyin re nyed/ de nas mu zi ser po zho nyi shu rtsa bzhi zhib par btags/ lcags snod du ba mar sar pa bskol ba'i btsag chod ba dang</text></item>
<item><p>299b.5</p><section></section><text>btab la me cung zad btang nas ba'i 'o ma'i nang du dal bus blug la snyigs ma ma shor ba byed cing / 'khang pa dang / mar dang 'o ma gnyis 'dres nas mu zi gting du 'khur ba ltar chags yod pa de dang gong gi dngul chu gnyis bsres nas cung zad nyed/</text></item>
<item><p>299b.6</p><section></section><text>rdo gzhong zhig tu su ma la zho phyed bzhir ra'i 'o ma cung zad re blug nas nyed/ yang skam pa dang ldugs pa sogs nyin gsum gyi bar byed/ ba sar pa'i chu dang 'o ma so sor rim bzhin nyin gsum re'i bar gong bzhin skam 'thag byas la tshar ba dang gong</text></item>
<item><p>299b.7</p><section></section><text>gi dngul chu dang mu zi'i zla la bsres/ rdo gzhong nang du rgya tsha zho do skyes pa'i chu dang mnyam du skam 'thag gong bzhin nyin gsum gyi bar byas nas dngul chu'i zla la bsres pa de rnams rdo gzhong gi nang du nyin bdun gyi bar du skam nyed byed/ de nas bzhu</text></item>
<item><p>300a.1</p><section></section><text>shel gyi dam pe ras kyis dril la 'jim pa byugs/ de skams pa dang yang ras dang 'jim pa rim pa bdun gyi bar dril ba'i nang du gsum gnyis tsam gang ba blug /lcags kyi skya ba dam per bcug /rdza'i khog ma gting du bye ma</text></item>
<item><p>300a.2</p><section></section><text>sor gsum tsam gting ba'i steng du bzhag se kha 'tshams shepar bye mas stems/ dam pe'i nang du zha nye zho phyed do blug ste/ lcags mdas dal bus dkrugs pa dang nyi shar nas nyi ma rgas tsam gyi bar me gtong / de nas lcags mda' bton la kha</text></item>
<item><p>300a.3</p><section></section><text>rgya cha btags pa'i chus brdzis pa'i 'dam gyis bcad/ de steng bye ma bkab ste khebs rgyab la nyin zhag phrug gcig gi par me shin tu tsha ba mtshams ma chad par btang / de nas bye ma grang thag ma chod ring tho ma btang bar bzhag /grang nges pa</text></item>
<item><p>300a.4</p><section></section><text>dang bton la dal bus dam pe bcag la phyung bas dngul chu dug bral lhad med du yod do/ ! /yang lugs gcig la/ dngul chu zho do/ /mu zi ser po zho do/ /shing a d+ha dza ri gsum/ na kA tsa le tshom pa re/ tu la pa'i khu ba rnams sgang</text></item>
<item><p>300a.5</p><section></section><text>sgogs nang du blugs/ 'jim pa spyin pos kha legs par bcad/ de nas ras bdun brtsegs par 'jim pa dang bcas gril lugs gong ltar byas la khog ma'i nang du bye ma blugs nas bye ma dang bcas me gtong lugs gong 'dra'i nyin zhag phyed</text></item>
<item><p>300a.6</p><section></section><text>par btang la grang ba dang bton te sgo nga dal bus bcags pas dngul chu dug bral lhad med du 'byung ngo / /yang lugs gcig la dngul chu zho bdun dang pi pi la'i shun pa nyag gang bcas rdo gzhong du nyin bdun gyi bar du nyid/ b+ha ga re'i thang chu</text></item>
<item><p>300a.7</p><section></section><text>blug la slar yang nyin bdun nyed/ de nas rdza sa'i bar du skam thag legs par chod pa'i nang du li shi zho do dang bcas blug la kha legs par bcad bar du pi pi ling 'jim pa blug pa'i ras rim pa gsum gyis dril/ khog ma bye mas brgyangs</text></item>
<item><p>300b.1</p><section></section><text>par kha bcad de me gtong lugs sogs gong bzhin nyin zhag phrugs gcig gi bar byas te grang ba dang bton pas kyang dug bral lhad med du 'byung / zha nye dkar po/ zha nye nag po/ gsha' tshe gsum mang nyung ji ltar byed kyang cha bsnyams la khog ma'i</text></item>
<item><p>300b.2</p><section></section><text>nang du blug /de la me btang ste zhu ba dang snod gzhan zhig tu ba mar sar pa btsags legs par bcad/ de nas lcags skyogs chung ngu zhig gis mar rang+ka nyung zad re blug la nyishu khas rba lha ti tsha yang zer/ dkrug /mar blug pa'i du ba yal ba dang yang</text></item>
<item><p>300b.3</p><section></section><text>mar blugs pa sogs lan bdun gyi bar byas/ de nas byA Ta'i lo ma dang d+hu ti gnyis cha mnyam zhib par btags pa'i phye ma gsha' dkar sogs mi mngon par 'debs shing dkrugs/ de nas kha bcad la nyi ma'i bzhi cha tsam gyi bar la me shin tu che ba</text></item>
<item><p>300b.4</p><section></section><text>btang / de nas me thag bcad de grang ba dang bton la/ se ba bzhi nas phyed gsum gyi bar nad babs lci yang dang bstun te btang bas rlung mkhris bad kan gsum ka la phan zhing nA ga ra sa ste de dang ka ra bsres nas zos na dwangs ma 'dzag pa la mchog tu phan/</text></item>
<item><p>300b.5</p><section></section><text>a ru ra bsnan nas btang na mgo bo na ba la phan no/ /rdza'i par bu'i nang du zha nye dkar po nyag gang blug  /de la me btang nas zhu ba dang dngul chu nyag phyed blugs la me mtshams ma bcad par gtong zhing skya bas dkrug pa dang mnyam du ba bla btags</text></item>
<item><p>300b.6</p><section></section><text>nang du blug /de la me btang ste zhu ba dang snod gzhan zhig tu ba mar sar pa btsags legs par bcad/ de nas lcags skyogs chung ngu zhig gis mar rang+ka nyung zad re blug la nyishu khas rba lha ti tsha yang zer/ dkrug /mar blug pa'i du ba yal ba dang yang</text></item>
<item><p>300b.7</p><section></section><text>mar blugs pa sogs lan bdun gyi bar byas/ de nas byA Ta'i lo ma dang d+hu ti gnyis cha mnyam zhib par btags pa'i phye ma gsha' thudakar sogs mi mngon par 'debs shing dkrugs/ de nas kha bcad la nyi ma'i bzhi cha tsam gyi bar la me shin tu che ba</text></item>
<item><p>300b.8</p><section></section><text>btang / de nas me thag bcad de grang ba dang bton la/ se ba bzhi nas phyed gsum gyi bar nad babs lci yang dang bstun te btang bas rlung mkhris bad kan gsum ka la phan zhing nA ga ra sa ste de dang ka ra bsres nas zos na dwangs ma 'dzag pa la mchog tu phan/</text></item>
<item><p>300b.9</p><section></section><text>a ru ra bsnan nas btang na mgo bo na ba la phan no/ /rdza'i par bu'i nang du zha nye dkar po nyag gang blug /de la me btang nas zhu ba dang dngul chu nyag phyed blugs la me mtshams ma bcad par gtong zhing skya bas dkrug pa dang mnyam du ba bla btags</text></item>
<item><p>300b.10</p><section></section><text>pa nyag phyed rim bzhin btab ste gsum ga legs par 'dres pa dang par bu'i kha bcad rlung mi 'chor bar bya/ de nas ras dang rdzas khrag gang rigs kyis brdzis pa'i 'jim pa byugs shing yang ras dkri ba sogs rim pa sum brtsegs su byas/</text></item>
<item><p>300b.11</p><section></section><text>de skams pa dang nyin zhag lnga me mtshams ma chad par btang / de nas grang thag chod pa dang bton/ ba'i zho ras la btsags te khu ba legs par bton pas brdzis pa srab 'thug sor gang tsam yod pa'i sgor mor btang la ras kyis bdun brtsegs</text></item>
<item><p>301a.1</p><section></section><text>tsam dril nas skud pas bsdams te gci ba'i me'i dkyil du bcug la ras tshig tsam gyi tshod bzhag /de nas grang thag chod pa dang bton la phye mar nyes pa dang zhos khu ba byas nas brdzis te bsreg pa sogs gong ltar lan nyi shu'i bar byas</text></item>
<item><p>301a.2</p><section></section><text>pa ni bang+ge shwa ra zer te stobs bskyed dang / nad tsha grang gsar rnying thams cad la phan zhing / nad gzhi che ba la gtong na thun tshad sran ma tsam dang / gzhi chung ba dang nad med la 'bras nyis 'gyur tsam re gtong ngo / /'di'i phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab</text></item>
<item><p>301a.3</p><section></section><text>po/ /zangs mang nyung ci 'dod pa sbrang gshog legs par brdungs/ rdza snod kyi nang du ba'i gcin la chu cung zad bsres par kha ri lu Na dang mnyam du btab la nyin phyed kyi bar du me btang la btsos/ de nas bton la snod bkrus pa'i nang du slar yang</text></item>
<item><p>301a.4</p><section></section><text>das+b+ha aM baM li'i 'bru chur btab pa'i nang du nyin phyed 'tshed/ de nas chu de pho la snod bkrus te sgyu ru ra chur btab pa'i nang du nyin phyed 'tshed/ de nas ba'i dar bar kha ri lu Na btab pa'i nang du zhag bdun gyi bar du 'jog cing 'di skabs me gtong mi</text></item>
<item><p>301a.5</p><section></section><text>dgos/ de nas zangs gshog ston la legs par bkrus te mu zi ser po dang cha mnyam bteg pa phye mar byas la rdza'i par bu'i nang du mu zi bting / de steng zangs gshog gcig bzhag /yang mu zi bting / de steng zangs gshog 'jog pa yogs kyi</text></item>
<item><p>301a.6</p><section></section><text>zangs gshog grangs du yod par brtsegs la kha 'grig par bcad de rlung mi 'chor bar byas/ de ras kyis gtums shing 'jim pas 'byug pa sogs sum rim tsam byas la slar yang phyi 'jim pas legs par gtums la skam thag chod pa dang / de</text></item>
<item><p>301a.7</p><section></section><text>nas sa dong brus par gci ba'i me'i nang du nyin gcig gi bar du bsregs/ thal ba grang thag chod pa dang btan la rdo gzhong gi nang du nyes nas phye mar byas la thun sran ma bzhi tsam gyi tshod re btang bas grang ba'i rigs dang / rlung / bad rlung / dang kha 'byed pa/</text></item>
<item><p>301b.1</p><section></section><text>lus stobs bskyed pa/ rked pa na ba rnams la phan/ yang sho mos zho gang phe mar btags pa dang gong gi zangs thal se ba bzhi bsres pa thun re byas btang bas yan lag zha 'khums la mchog tu phan no/ /su ma sog gser zho do dang se ba brgyad la sbrang gshog</text></item>
<item><p>301b.2</p><section></section><text>'than/ mtshal seb bco lnga dang bil ba'i nang gi 'bru mithi gnyis zhib par btags par chu cung zad kyang blugs pa'i skyo ma gser shog la byugs /de nas gser shog sgril la bil ba'i nang du bcug kho Da yon sog gser kha legs par bcad de ras kyis dril</text></item>
<item><p>301b.3</p><section></section><text>la 'jim pa sor phyed tsam byugs/ skam thag chod pa dang sa dong brus par gci ba'i me nang du nyin gcig bsregs la grang thag chod pa dang bton te phye mar byas la 'bras nyis 'gyur tsam kyi tshad lga ser dang mnyam du zos na glo nad dang dbugs mi bde ba g.yal ba</text></item>
<item><p>301b.4</p><section></section><text>rnams la phan zhing skyug pa chod/ ba'i gci ba'i thal ba dang mnyam du zos na dang kha dang skom nad la phan/ lga dang mnyam du btang na skran/ shu ba'am khye rngo / pho srin/ rlung skran rnams rtsa ba nas 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /lcags phye nyag gang la dngul chu nyag phyed</text></item>
<item><p>301b.5</p><section></section><text>bsres te zhib par nyes/ chu la shing gi wa kwa ra'i khu ba blugs nas gar sla zho tsam byas la/ rdo gzhong nang du nyi mar nyed cing skams pa dang khu ba gar sla sogs gong ltar byas pa lan brgya dang brgyad kyi bar byed/ de nas rdza'i par bu'i nang du blug /kha rlung mi 'chor bar</text></item>
<item><p>301b.6</p><section></section><text>legs par bcad/ de nas 'jim pa dang ras spel mar lan bdun gyi bar sgril bskam thag chod pa dang rdza'i khog ma che ba mthil du bug pa rgya khab kyi rtse tshud pa tsam yod pa zhig bye mas brdzangs pa'i dkyil du bcug /kha legs par bsgrigs te rlung sogs ye mi 'chor ba byas</text></item>
<item><p>301b.7</p><section></section><text>te nyin zhag bzhi'i ring me shin tu tsha ba mtshams ma chad pa gtong / 'di skabs las byed mi ma gtogs 'grul gcod/ de nas grang thag chod pa dang bton la thun tshad 'bras tsam re bya/ 'di ni spyi 'joms chen mo ste/ rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa rims sogs nad gsar</text></item>
<item><p>302a.1</p><section></section><text>rnying gar dang gang la yang 'dis mi phan pa med pas sman thams cad kyi rgyal po lta bu'o/ /zha nye nag po nyag phyed lcags snod kyi nang du bzhu/ sa ser zhib par btags pa'i nang du blug /yang bton la bzhu ba sogs lan nyer gcig gi bar byed/ ldong</text></item>
<item><p>302a.2</p><section></section><text>ros dang tsha la nyag re bsres la zhib par btags/ rdza snod du zha nye blug la me btang ste zhu ba dang gong gi tsha la sdong ros bsres pa'i phye ma cung zad re 'debs pa dang mnyam du skya bas dkrugs/ legs par 'dres nas thal bar song ba dang shing gi wa nam sil</text></item>
