<item><p>302a.3</p><section></section><text>krara'i khu so sngag ba blug ste skya bas dkrug cing nyin phyed kyi bar me btang / thal bar song ba dang kha legs par bcad la nyin mtshan lnga dang nyi ma'i bzhi cha gcig gi bar me btang / de nas grang ba dang bton la thun tshad sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam sbrang rtsi dang mnyam du btang na</text></item>
<item><p>302a.4</p><section></section><text>rlung gi nad gsar rnying thams cad la phan/ ka ra dang mnyam du btang na khrag gi rigs la phan/ lga dang mnyam du btang na bad kan gyi rigs dang ma 'ju ba sogs pho ba'i nad la phan/ a ru ra'i phye ma dang mnyam du btang na mkhres pa'i rigs la phan/pi pi ling dang</text></item>
<item><p>302a.5</p><section></section><text>mnyam du btang na dang kha 'byed/ khrag dang rlung la brten nas dwangs ma 'dzag na bu ram rnying pa dang mnyam du btang / mkhris pa la brten nas 'dzag na a ru ra dang mnyam du btang / ba mar gsar pa dang mnyam du zos na stobs skyed par byed/ gcong gis zin pa'i nad</text></item>
<item><p>302a.6</p><section></section><text>lus shin tu rid dun gur gum dang mnyam du gtong zhing gzhan yang nad tshod dang bstun te kha bsgyur byas te btang bas kun la phan par 'gyur ro/ /ti tsha'am gsha' tshe nyag gang rdza snod du bzhu la pa ra ki ri nyag phyed dang / so ra nyag phyed bsres te zhib par btags pa'i phye</text></item>
<item><p>302a.7</p><section></section><text>ma cung zad re 'debs/ shing lcags kyi gzar bu chung ngu'i ltag pas nyed cing dkrug nyin phyed kyi bar byas pas 'dres te thal bar song ba dang khed sa rgyab la nye ma'i bzhi cha gcig me btang / grang thag chod pa dang bton la phye mar byas te dar la btsags/ de nas phye ma de</text></item>
<item><p>302b.1</p><section></section><text>dang / li shi/ /dzA ti gsum se ba re/ po ris/ lga/ pi pi ling gsum se ba gsum re rnams zhib par btags/ sbrang rtsis rta byas la ril bu sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam sgril la ril bu re btang bas byis pa 'khru ba'i nad dang 'cham pa la phan zhing gnyid ma khug par btang bas kyang</text></item>
<item><p>302b.2</p><section></section><text>la lbaMb/ gnyid dza yi pa la du 'gro/ a mir tse shut+Thi pi pi li ru ra dang bsres nas btang na dbug sa mi bde ba la phan/ mgo bo na na ril bu chur brdar la sna bug tu blug pas phan par 'gyur/ ga bur dang bsres nas btang na kha'i dri ngan pa rtsa ba nas 'byin/ zho dang mnyam du btang na skran</text></item>
<item><p>302b.3</p><section></section><text>thon/ kha ru tsha dang mnyam du btang na ma 'ju ba'i nad sel lo/ /zangs mang nyung gang byed kyang sbrang gshog legs par 'than la jem rtses chung ngur gtubs pa dang mu zi ser po zangs che chung gang yin gyi phyed mar gtang ba dam pe'i khog par blug la skyu ru ra dang nem bu'i chu blug</text></item>
<item><p>302b.4</p><section></section><text>la kha legs par bcad de nas kyi dkyil du zla ba gcig bzhag /de nas bton la phye mar byas te thun tshad se ba bzhi'i rtsis chu grang gis 'phul la btang na dug dang mkhris pa'i nad 'phral du skyugs nas phan zhing srin nad la btang na yang 'khru sgyug yong la/ gzhan</text></item>
<item><p>302b.5</p><section></section><text>yang skyugs kyis phan pa'i nad gang la 'ang btang bas sgyug sman gyi mchog go/ /kha par+sang+ha nyag phyed pa brdar ba'i phye ma dang / mu zi ser po nyag phyed/ dngul chu spor gang gsum rdo gzhong du nyi ma'i bzhi cha gcig gi ring zhib par nyes la gi wa kra ra'i khu bas gar sla zho tsam</text></item>
<item><p>302b.6</p><section></section><text>byas pa nyi ma dang grib ma phyed khyer du nyes/ skam thag chod pa dang slar yang khya ba lugs ti tsha'am gsha' cha/ pa sogs nyin bcu gsum gyi bar byed/ bzhu shel gyi dam per ras dang 'jim pa spel mar byugs pa bdun brtsegs byas pa skam thag chod pa dang blug la kha rdzas</text></item>
<item><p>302b.7</p><section></section><text>spyin po mgar ba'i so rdog /a ra ka /bu ram/ rgya gar stod ja rnams cha mnyam pa zhib par btags pa ba'i 'o mas brdzis la 'dam btags nyin gcig byas pa'i 'jim pas dam pe'i kha shin tu dam par bkag /de ras kyis gtums la gong gi 'jim pas dam pe yongs</text></item>
<item><p>303a.1</p><section></section><text>rdzogs la 'byug /de skam pa dang khog ma che ba zhig gi nang bye ma'i dkyil du bcug la kha legs par bcad de nyin zhag bzhi'i bar me mtshams ma chad par btang / de nas grang ba dang bton la nad babs che na sran ma gcig tsam nas nad med la 'bras</text></item>
<item><p>303a.2</p><section></section><text>nyis 'gyur gyi bar 'os 'gab btang bas nad ngos zin ma zin gsar rnying gang la yang phan zhing / nad med kyis zos na rgas kha sra ba dang stobs bskyed pa la sogs pa phan yon bsam mi khyab po/ /zha nye dkar po nyag gang lugs kong du bzhu la legs par bzhu ba</text></item>
<item><p>303a.3</p><section></section><text>dang snum gyi dkyil du blug /de 'khang pa dang yang bzhu blug gong ltar lan gsum gyi bar du byed/ de nas snod che ba zhig tu bzhu la 'bras bu gsum zhib par btags pa'i bye ma thal 'debs pa ltar rim bzhin btabs nas thal bar ma song bar lcags skyogs chung ngu'i</text></item>
<item><p>303a.4</p><section></section><text>ltag pas nyid/ de nas kha legs par bcad la nyi ma'i brgyad cha tsam rmi bar me btang / grang thag chod pa dang bton la zho ras la btsags te khu ba legs par bton pas brdzis te srab ma thug sor gang tsam yod pa'i sgor mor btang / de ras kyis bdun brtsegs tsam dril</text></item>
<item><p>303a.5</p><section></section><text>la skud pas bsdoms/ gci ba'i me'i dkyil du bcug la ras tshig tsam gyi tshad bzhag /de nas me shi zhing grang thag chod pa dang bton la zhib par btags/ yang lugs gcig la/ gsha' dkar srab ma thug shog bu tsam brdungs la/ bod kyi so ma ra ce'i lo ma zhib</text></item>
<item><p>303a.6</p><section></section><text>par 'phur ba/ ras kha gang las phad bu bzos pa'i nang du so ma ra tsa bting la/ gsha' dkar sbrang gshog de'i steng du rim brtsegs su bzhag pa'i bar mtshams su so ma ra tsa sor gsum yod pa byas la kha btsems te/ steng 'og thams cad la lci ba ser kha ma sor bzhi re</text></item>
<item><p>303a.7</p><section></section><text>yod pa'i dkyil du bcug ste me chung ngu btang shing lci ba tshig pa dang grang du bcug /de nas lci thal bsal te so ma ra tsa'i dkyil du tshal dkar me la bsregs rtepa ltar 'ong ba de gzhan dang ma 'dres par 'don/ so ma ra tsa nyung ba dang me tshas na gsha' dkar thig bur 'dril 'ong bas</text></item>
<item><p>303b.1</p><section></section><text>ran pa gal che/ de ba sing+ng+hi bang+ga zer te thun tshad se ba gsum nas bzhi'i bar nad gzhi che chung dang bstun nas gtong / de kha bsgyur byed lugs ni/ ga pur cung zad dang mnyam du zos na kha'i dri ngan pa sel/ dzAti nyis 'gyur bsres nas btang na lus kyi stobs 'phel bar</text></item>
<item><p>303b.2</p><section></section><text>'gyur/ yang ba mar dang mnyam du btang kyang nus pa gong dang 'dra/ tul pa'i lo ma'i thang chu dang bsres nas btang na dwangs ma tsha grang gang gis 'dzag pa yang chod/ shel dkar dang mnyam du btang kyang nus pa gong dang 'dra/ ba mar sar pas rta byas btang na mkhris pa</text></item>
<item><p>303b.3</p><section></section><text>sha ser dang grang rlung la phan/ ra ma'i chus rta byas btang na rlung gis lto ba sbos pa sel/ tsha la mer bsregs pa'i phye mdang mnyam du btang na khrag skran thon par 'gyur/ yung ba dang mnyam du btang na khrag mkhris thon par 'gyur zhing grang mkhris la phan/</text></item>
<item><p>303b.4</p><section></section><text>bye kar dang mnyam du btang na bad kan smug po la phan/ pA na dang mnyam du btang na dwangs ma 'phel/ pi pi ling dang mnyam du btang na dang kha 'byed/ 'o mas rta byas btang kyang gong dang 'dra/ a ru ra dang mnyam du btang na steng rlung dang dbugs kha mi bde ba la</text></item>
<item><p>303b.5</p><section></section><text>phan/ sa mu dwa phal dang mnyam du btang na sna'i nad la phan/ li shi dang mnyam du btang na pho nad la phan/ gla rtsi dang mnyam du btang na rdo rje las su rung zhing 'dod pa spyod nus par 'gyur ro/ /yang khang byil gyi brun chur sbyangs la lte bar byugs te sman</text></item>
<item><p>303b.6</p><section></section><text>zos kyang nus pa gong dang 'dra/ go yu'i phye ma dang mnyam du btang na ma 'ju ba'i nad sel/ sgog skya dang mnyam du btang na yan lag gum pa la phan/ bdar dang mnyam du btang na mig ser la phan/ se 'bru'i shing gi lo ma dang mnyam du</text></item>
<item><p>303b.7</p><section></section><text>btang na skyug sman gyi mchog tu 'gyur te zas spyod skabs dang sbyar ro/ /daN+Da'i rtsa ba/ 'u su'i rtsa ba/ sle tres/ gla sgang / purna na ba/ lga rnams cha mnyam gyi thang chu sum gnyis la bsdus te a nAr btang na rlung la brten pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>304a.1</p><section></section><text>nad thams cad la phan/ gla sgang / lga/ kuT ki/ tig ta/ 'u su'i 'bru rnams cha mnyam gyi thang gong bzhin btang na mkhris pa la brten pa'i nad thams cad la phan/ 'ba' zho rgun 'brum li shi /pi pi ling / a ka ra/ lga/</text></item>
<item><p>304a.2</p><section></section><text>la la phud chung ba rnams cha mnyam/ tsI rA ya ta cha gnyis bcas chur ri nga yar btab la sum gnyis bsdus pa'i thang zhag gsum gyi bar du btang na tshad pa'i nad rigs kun la phan zhing gos kyis byibs la rngul kyang 'don no/ /shing kun dkar cha</text></item>
<item><p>304a.3</p><section></section><text>gcig /zi ra dkar po dang cha gsum re/ kha ru tsha cha gnyis rnams chu la bsdus pa'i thang btang na rlung dang pho ba'i nad la tsha log byed pa zas ma 'ju ba rnams la phan/ rgya skyegs/ 'u su/ la la phud rnams cha mnyam chur zhag gcig spangs pa'i thang</text></item>
<item><p>304a.4</p><section></section><text>ka ras rta byas tho rengs btang na lus drod me ltar 'bar ba la phan/ 'u su dang kha ru tsha mnyam pa'i thang btang na rlung dang pho ba'i nad la tsha log byed pa zas ma 'ju ba rnams la phan/ a karkA ra/ la la phud/ ku ba kha ru tsha/ lga rnams cha mnyam gyi</text></item>
<item><p>304a.5</p><section></section><text>thang gong bzhin bsdus la btang na bad kan la brten pa'i nad thams cad la phan/ sle tres/ gla sgang / u tI sa'i rtsa ba/'u su'i 'bru/ lga/ ku ba rnams cha mnyam gyi thang gong bzhin bskol nas btang na 'dus pa'i nad thams cad la phan</text></item>
<item><p>304a.6</p><section></section><text>no/ /gur guM/ gla rtsi/ gi waM/ ga pur/ shrI khan+Da rnams cha mnyam phye mar btags la chus khu ba byas te lus la bsku mnye byas na/ rlung mkhris bad kan la brten pa'i sha drod che ba lus rngul 'dar shing ba spu sgreng ba/ shes pa 'khrug shing 'gro sdong sna</text></item>
<item><p>304a.7</p><section></section><text>tshogs byed pa/ gdon b+he gyis tsan+da kar po zin pa lta bus mig 'bur tshugs su blta zhing / mig sngar sna tshogs mthong ba/ nyin gnyid mi thub cing shes pa zi ba/ gos yang yang 'bud pa sogs nad glor bur ba la phan no/ /spyi 'joms mu sa la'i</text></item>
<item><p>304b.1</p><section></section><text>sbyor ba ni/ mu sa ya rdza snod gsar pa'i nang du blug par ba'i 'o ma lhad med sor gang tsam gyis mtho ba blug /kha legs par bcad de rlung mi 'chor bar byed/ me chung ngu yun ring pos khu ba rang thim par 'tshed/ de nas grib bskams byas la skam pa dang zhib par</text></item>
<item><p>304b.2</p><section></section><text>btags pa dar la btsags pa nyag gang /li shi la waM ga dang dza yi pha la zho bzhi re/ mi ra tsa dang su tha/ pi pa la gsum zho bcu gnyis re rnams zhib par btags la ba'i chus rta byas nas btang na chu bsags la phan zhing gzhan yang rtag pa'i rims dang</text></item>
<item><p>304b.3</p><section></section><text>khrag bshal ba dang / chu lam du khrag 'dzag pa rnams la mchog dzAti phan no/ /bo ris chu grang lga gis pi pi ling / rta byas la btang na rims nyin gcig pa dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang rims drag po dang / rlung nad kyis lus drod med</text></item>
<item><p>304b.4</p><section></section><text>pa rnams la phan no/ /sbrang rtsis rta byas la btang na tshad pa gsar rnying dang mkhris pa sha ser la phan no/ /nim bu'i khu bas rta byas nas btang na mkhris pa mig ser la mchog tu phan/ li shi bsnan te zos na glo la phan/ ba mar sar pa btsags bcad</text></item>
<item><p>304b.5</p><section></section><text>pas rta byas nas btang na lus stobs shor nas spyod mi nus par dwangs ma 'phel bar 'gyur/ lasu na brdungs pa'i khu bas rta byas te ril bu dril bas btang na skad 'gag pa la phan zhing skad sman yang yang ngo / /chang gis rta byas nas btang na byis pa</text></item>
<item><p>304b.6</p><section></section><text>btsa' ma thub pa myur du btsa' bar 'gyur/ ku me DA'i khu bas rta byas nas btang na chu rlung gis lto ba sbos pa sel/ dzA mu Na'i 'bru dang pags pa brdungs pa'i khu bas rta byas nas sna bug la blug na mi rga zer ba'i mgo bor 'bu yod pa'i nang chu/ me/ nyi ma/</text></item>
<item><p>304b.7</p><section></section><text>'od can sogs mthong bas rkyen byas nas rgyal zal lta bu zhig long ba de la phan no/ /rgya gar stod ja dang mnyam du btang na pho dbang las su rung bar 'gyur ro/ /shu dag /btsa dang mnyam du btang na tsha ba'i skom dad kyi rigs dang srod long la phan/ mu zi ser</text></item>
<item><p>305a.1</p><section></section><text>po dang cha mnyam btags la btang na rlung gis rna ba 'on pa dang mig gis mi mthong ba la phan/ gong gi mu sa li'i gcig po dang / pho ril/ pi pi ling / lga bzhi cha mnyam btags la sman thun che phyogs gnyis kyi rtsis chu grang gis 'phul</text></item>
<item><p>305a.2</p><section></section><text>nas btang na rgyu dang mi rgyu/ sbyar dug sha dug sogs dug rigs kun la phan te 'di yan mu sa lir kha bsgyur byas pa'i spyor sde'i 'phros don yin no/ /nad gzhi che ba'i rigs la sbyong gtong ba'i shal sman ni/ smin drug /mgo /rgyal/ mchu rnams kyi zla ba</text></item>
<item><p>305a.3</p><section></section><text>la/ dze+e pa la se ba bcu gnyis/ hA Da Da se ba ni/ mi ra tsa zho gang / tsu ka se ba phyed gsum zhib par btags la ril bu lnga byas/ thun tshad ril bu rer mar sar gyis dril la mid/ de'i rjes su chu bskol hub gsum tsam re btang pag nad ro rnams sbyangs nas</text></item>
<item><p>305a.4</p><section></section><text>mang du dan rog bshal bar 'gyur/ a ru ra /sbyangs zin  pho ris nas ni mkhu'i chu gcod sman a phI ma/ dzA ti/ am+b+ha ki ko li/ bi dza ya rnams cha mnyam thog mar dzA ti dang a shI ma gnyis mar sar chung ngu dang mnyam du btags/ de nas bzhi ga chabs cig</text></item>
<item><p>305a.5</p><section></section><text>zhib par btags la bye kar ram sbrang gang rigs kyis rta byas la ril bu sgyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam sgril nas ril sha 'bras kyi nang / so mar tsa bu re btang / des 'grim pa'i rigs gang yin kyang chod do/ /yang na dzA ti'i khog brus pa'i nang du a phI ma sran ma nyis</text></item>
<item><p>305a.6</p><section></section><text>'gyur tsam zhig blug ste kha bcad la gro zhib kyi pag gis dril la gci ba'i me du ba yal ba'i dkyil du bsregs/ bag de bag leb tshos pa tsam gyi tshad du sleb pa dang bton la dzA ti de nas thun tshad sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam re zos pas nges par chod do/ /yang</text></item>
<item><p>305a.7</p><section></section><text>na zla ba gong gi bzhi po la sbyongs sman/ ngan rog dzai pa la/ dngul chu pA ra/ mu zi ser po gan+ng+ha ka po ris /mi ro tsa/ pi pi ling pi pa la/ lga shuNI rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags/ thun tshad sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam re chu skol gyis phul nas btang na nad ro sbyong bar</text></item>
<item><p>305b.1</p><section></section><text>'gyur ro/ /de gcod lugs gong dang 'dra'o/ /yang na dzai pa la se ba bcu gnyis/ mi ra tsa zho do/ tsa lbo la 'bru lnga bcu rnams zhib par btags pa skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu'i tshod tsam re mar sar gyis dril la btang / de'i rjes su chu skol hub gsum tsam re 'thung /</text></item>
<item><p>305b.2</p><section></section><text>yang na se hUM Da/ du ba ral pa/ r+b+hau rA Da/ ha ra ta ka'i tshig gu'i nang gi snying po rnams/ po ril cha mnyam 'bram btags la thun tshad sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam re bu ram gyis dril la btang / de rjes chu skol phul gang tsam re 'thungs pas bshal sgyug gnyis ka</text></item>
<item><p>305b.3</p><section></section><text>shri Sharta 'byung / yang na dzai pa la pags pa bshus pa zho brgyad kyi tshod tsam ras dri ma med pas gtums la skud pas kha bsdams/ snod gang rigs su 'o ma bre do tsam blugs la gong gi ras thum de sor bzhi tsam 'o mar ma reg pa skud pas khebs gcod la</text></item>
<item><p>305b.4</p><section></section><text>btags/ de nas khebs dan rog rgyab la rlangs pa mi 'chor bar gtums nas 'o ma de phyed tsam skam tshod kyi bar la me btang / de nas sman phyung gshags la lce bton/ de dang shwa ta dzi ra/ a dze ba Na/ mir tsa/ pi pa le lnga cha bsnyams la btags/ de nas gong</text></item>
<item><p>305b.5</p><section></section><text>gi 'o mas khu ba byas nas ril bu skyu ru ra tsam dril/ ril bu re btang la de nas chu skol 'thung ngo / /dbo/ nag pa/ nya/ snron/ chu stod/ dbyu gu rnams kyi a ram Da'i 'bras bu/ dzai pa la/ zir dkar gol la phung phi ris pi pi ling Shai ra/ tsa lpol/ sen+ng+ha/ tsir tsa rnams cha</text></item>
<item><p>305b.6</p><section></section><text>mnyam btags la bod kyi thun tshad che phyogs tsam chu grang gis rta byas gtong / zla ba'i khyad ma gtogs phan yon dang nus pa 'dra/ yang na dzai pa la btul ma/ daN+Da pi pa la/ dan ngog mi ra tsa/ shwe ta dzi ra/ tsuka rnams cha mnyam btags/ pho ris</text></item>
<item><p>305b.7</p><section></section><text>lga'i chu'i nang du zhag gcig sbangs lag nas snon te rdzogs nas ras kyi khung du bcir ba'i khu bas rta byas la ril bu skyu ru ra tsam sgril/ ril bu re dan rog chu grang gis rta byas nas gtong bo ris zir dkar po ngo / /yang na dzai pa la dan rog chu'i khol thengs</text></item>
<item><p>306a.1</p><section></section><text>re la brje thengs re byas pa lan brgyad kyi bar btsos/ de nas lce bton/ de dang a ga ra/ khaN+Da gsum cha mnyam la zhib par btags thun tshad bod dang 'dra ba chu grang gis rta byas la btang ngo / /yang na/ ni la ka waM gis brdungs pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>306a.2</p><section></section><text>khu bar skyu ru ra zhib par btags pa btab nim+bu'i chu cung zad blug lcags skyogs kyi nang du zhag ar skya gcig bye kar bzhag /skra dang sma ra dkar por song bar zhag gsum gyi bar/ nyin re la 'khru thengs re la byugs thengs re byed/ sla dkar nA</text></item>
<item><p>306a.3</p><section></section><text>gong bzhin byed/ me la ka rA sa/ bud med kyi 'o ma gsum sbyar la lte sa byugs pas kyang phebs so/ yang na/ suM Da/ kA ka Da sing+gi / ng+ha b.ra'i me tog gsum cha mnyam la bu ram gyis dril la btang thun tshad gong dang 'dra'o/ /gcod sman gong dang 'dra/</text></item>
<item><p>306a.4</p><section></section><text>bse dug gi sman la/ pi lo wa/ a dza lba Na/ bu ram rnying pa gsum zho bcu gnyis re cha mnyam btags la/ dngul chu se ba bzhi bsres de la ril bu dgu bcos la nyi ma dgu'i bar re re khyur mid byed/ de'i bar pag dang thug pa tshwa sor med pa ma gtogs gzhan</text></item>
<item><p>306a.5</p><section></section><text>ma za btung thams cad 'dzem/ mnu zag can la la phung des 'phral du phan par 'gyur ro/ /yang na ha ra Da/ mi ra tsa/ ni la tho tha gsum cha mnyam zhib par btags te sman tshags la btsags la ba mar sar bar sbyar nas rma gang 'dug la byugs pas 'phral du phan par</text></item>
<item><p>306a.6</p><section></section><text>'gyur zhing de yang gdon/ chu 'tshag pa sogs nas 'gos pa yin na phan sla'o/ /yang na/ a rung pA ra/ pho ris phig pan gan+ng+ha ka /gro/ zhib dar btsags/ bu ram rnams cha mnyam la zhib par btags/ a d+ha dz+ha ra chu ru sbangs pa'i khu bas rta byas la ril bu skyu ru ra</text></item>
<item><p>306a.7</p><section></section><text>tsam sgril la ril bu re khyur mid byed do/ /ldong ros/ /yang na ma na si la/ ba bla hA rita la/ ru rta ku Tha/ yung ba ha dra tul chul nga / mu zi ser po/ khyung sder smyug po gu Ni pu ts+tsha'i rtsa ba rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la ba'i chus rta byas nas khong du gtong / sman de ra'i 'om la</text></item>
<item><p>306b.1</p><section></section><text>sbyar nas rma gang yod la 'byug go /yang pA rA/ gan+ng+ha ka /hA ri ta la/ dza yi pha la/ /dza mu Na'i pags pa'i phye ma rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags sbrang gis rta byas la ril bu sgyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas te mid par bya'o/ /yang na/ pA ra se ba bzhi/ ha la da</text></item>
<item><p>306b.2</p><section></section><text>se ba bzhi/ a dzAwa Na se ba bzhi/ Shai ra se ba dngul chu mu zi ser po ba bla bzhi/ dzAti bil wa zho gang / laDa gu Da se ba bcu drug rnams zhib par btags la ril bu skyu ru ra tsam byas nyi ma bdun gyi bar la re re za zhing sman zos nas ma 'ju bar dngul chu la dro yul ba</text></item>
<item><p>306b.3</p><section></section><text>bcos byed do/ la la phud /yang pA rA/ til nag /gan+ng+ha ga /a dza lba Na/ su nya/ guDa rnams man nu khrag can se ba bu ram bzhi re/ bil wa zho do se ba brgyad rnams zhib par btags/ auM gA chu la sbangs pa'i khu bas rta byas la ril bu sgyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam dril la</text></item>
<item><p>306b.4</p><section></section><text>gtong zhing de bar zas dngul chu 'bras dang 'o ma le la chu ring po/ la la bud lga ma gtogs bu ram 'dzem/ so rnyil dang rke la sogs mnu khrag can pa skrangs kyang sman lngar chags su btang bas grol bar 'gyur ro/ /yang smyug ma'i lo ma'i rtse/ saM b+hA lu'i lo ma/ oM</text></item>
<item><p>306b.5</p><section></section><text>gA'i lo ma/ swe ta d+hU pa'i lo ma/ hing+gu la rnams se ba bzhi re cha mnyam pa btags la thun bcu bzhi bzo la thun re gang sa gsar pa lta bur 'than nas mgo lus gtums te du ba rma gang yod la 'bung / de'i bar la dro bcos dang rlung ma 'phog pa gal</text></item>
<item><p>306b.6</p><section></section><text>che'o/ /yang / dza hu'i me tog zhib mtshal par btags pa dar la btsags bu ram dang cha mnyam la ril bu skyu ru ra tsam dril ba nyin bdun gyi bar re re khong du btang / pA rA/ ni ba gnyis se ba bzhi bzhi zhib par btags/ nim+bu'i thang chus 'khar</text></item>
<item><p>306b.7</p><section></section><text>sder gyi nang du sbrus la rkang pa dang lag pa la sman za ba dang mnyam du byugs/ de'i bar gyi dri chu rdza snod lta bur bsags pa'i chu'i nang du gong gi dngul chu se ba'i grangs gang btang ba de yong zhing de 'phral phan par 'gyur ro/</text></item>
<item><p>307a.1</p><section></section><text>'di'i bar la bag thug las dngar sgyur sogs 'dzem/ gzhang 'brum gyi nad dang mtshan bar rdol pa la/ pi pi la'i pags pa zhib par btags pa thur mgo do tsam pa'i zho phul gang tsam la btab ste 'thungs pas myur du phan/ yang na/</text></item>
<item><p>307a.2</p><section></section><text>nad pa mgo zhabs bzlog ste rkang pa gdung ma lta bur btags la ba'i gci bas rtsa lam nan cher bkrus/ de nas ma nu khrag can gyi khrag bton la byugs/ de steng u da zhib par btags pa'i phye ma chus sbrus pa'i pag gis bkab/ de'i thog tu sol me lta bu me rdog</text></item>
<item><p>307a.3</p><section></section><text>chung ngu zhig chu tshod gcig tsam gyi bar bzhag /de nas me bsal la de shul du su ma la sro ma tsam zhig chu tshod gcig tsam gyi bar bzhag /de nas bag dang bcas pa bsal bas 'bu mang du thon 'ong zhing phan no/ /yang na bu ram dang pi pi leng cha mnyam la pi pi ling zhib</text></item>
<item><p>307a.4</p><section></section><text>par btags pa bu ram gyis rta byas ril bu go yu tsam re zos na phan par 'gyur zhing 'di khyad par byis pa chung ngu la phan no/ /yang na lugs snod nang mar gsar pa'i nang du a ru ra sol bar ma song tsam btsos/ de nas bton te zhib par btags pa'i phye ma slar yang</text></item>
<item><p>307a.5</p><section></section><text>gong gi mar de la btab nas ril bu dzAti tsam re zos pas kyang phan par 'gyur ro/ /yang na/ til/ bil ba/ ang Da/ guDa/ tsi tA rnams cha mnyam la zhib par btags/ sbrang rtsis rta byas la ril bu skyu ru ra tsam byas nas zos na yang phan no/ /yang na/ ha la</text></item>
<item><p>307a.6</p><section></section><text>da zhib par btags pa dang ni/ hUM shi khaN+Da cha bsnyams pa rtsa lam gyi khung btab khams kyis bsdams te bzhag pas kyang phan no/ /yang 'phongs lugs gci ba'i me du ba med pa'i steng du sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa btab pa'i du ba bdug sa na 'phral du phan/ dzA rAM ku sha phung ba</text></item>
<item><p>307a.7</p><section></section><text>ste rims 'phrog lcags kyu'i spyor ba bdun pa ni/ dan rog dug bral/ dngul chu dug bral/ btsan dug /pho ris/ pi pi ling/ lga/ tsha la bsregs pa rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun tshad sran ma tsam bu ram kyis ril bu byas nas btang na grang rlung sogs</text></item>
<item><p>307b.1</p><section></section><text>grang ba'i rigs thams cad la phan zhing cung zad thur du'ang 'khru'o/ /btsan dug phyung la mu zi bsnan te thun tshad sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam bye dkar gyis ril lu byas btang na khrag tshad/ mkhris tshad/ rlung tshad/ bad kan gyi tshad pa sogs tshad pa gsar rnying thams cad la</text></item>
<item><p>307b.2</p><section></section><text>phan no/ /dan rog dug bral/ /dngul chu btul ma/ mu zi ser po/ tsha la bsregs pa'i thal ba/ mtshal rnams cha mnyam btags pa nim+bu'i khu bas ril bu sma ru mgo nag tsam sgril la btang na rlung mkhris bad kan sogs nad kyi rigs gsar rnying gang la yang phan</text></item>
<item><p>307b.3</p><section></section><text>no| /dan rog dug bral/ dngul chu btul ma/ mu zi ser po/ mtshal/ ba ru ra/ a rur rnams cha mnyam btags pa bye dkar gyis rta byas nas ril bu sma ru mgo nag tsam dril la btang na tshad pa gsar rnying pa dang mkhris pa dang tsha ba'i rigs la phan/ dan</text></item>
<item><p>307b.4</p><section></section><text>rog dug bral/ dngul chu btul ma/ mu thi ser po/ mtshal/ zangs phye btul ling nga ma/ tsi tA/ pi pi ling / a ru ra/ ba ru ra/ skyu ru ra rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la/ b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i chus sbrus la skam thag chod pa dang phye ma thur mgo re tsam btang</text></item>
<item><p>307b.5</p><section></section><text>bas rims tshad kyi rigs mtha' dag la phan no/ /dan rog dug bral/ dngul chu btul ma/ mu zi ser po/ pho ris/ pi pi ling / tsha am la la rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la bye dkar dang mnyam du ba mar gsar pas sgril la btang na khrag tshad/</text></item>
<item><p>307b.6</p><section></section><text>mkhris tshad/ rlung tshad/ bad kan gyi tshad pa/ rgyu tshad/ cham tshad/ 'khrugs tshad/ rims tshad de tshad pa brgyad la mchog tu phan no/ /dan rog dug bral dang daN+Da se ba bcu gnyis/ pho ris/ tshal bsregs pa'i thal ba/ pi pi ling gsum se ba bzhi re</text></item>
<item><p>307b.7</p><section></section><text>rnams zhib par btags/ b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i khu bas sbrus la ril bu sma ru mgo nag tsam byas pa thun tshad ril bu gsum re btang bas rims tshad kyi rigs mtha' dag la phan no/ /des rims 'phrog lcags kyu'i sbyor ba bdun pa rdzogs so// //go yu/ supa ri mu</text></item>
<item><p>308a.1</p><section></section><text>sa li/ 'jam 'bras kyi 'bru/ pi pi ling dang pi pi ling gi rtsa ba/ lga/ po Sha ra'i rtsa ba/ pho ris/ la la phud/ seng+ga Da/ a shwagan+b+ha/ byi thang ka /la la phud chung ba/ b+haugi rnams zho bco lnga re cha mnyam zhib par btags/</text></item>
<item><p>308a.2</p><section></section><text>bi ra kan d+huzho bzhi zhib par btags te chus btsos la gar sla bag tsam du song dus sman rnams dang bsregs/ so ma ra tsa zho brgyad cu/ chu khar khal gcig tsam gyi nang du btab la chu bre gsum tsam du skam skam par gdus grang ba dang ras la btsags pa</text></item>
<item><p>308a.3</p><section></section><text>la dug mo nyung gong gi sman btab nas 'dres par byas/ de nas ba'i 'o ma lhad med khal gcig tsam snod du mer go mu'i bzhi 'gyur mgar ba byas gdus nas sum gcig tsam du lus pa dang / de la blug ste skya bas dkrug cing skyo ma gar ba tsam du 'dus pa</text></item>
<item><p>308a.4</p><section></section><text>dang ta'u Shi rang nyab la dkrug cing zan dron tsam du sleb pa dang me thag bcad de grang du bcug la ril bu skyu ru ra che phyogs tsam re btang bas 'di ni go yur brten pa'i spyi 'joms chen mo ste rlung mkhris/ bad kan/ 'dus pa/ tshad pa gsar rnying / dug gi rigs/</text></item>
<item><p>308a.5</p><section></section><text>skran/ dmu chu/ khrag sogs mdor na nad kyi rigs gang la'ang 'dis mi phan pa med do/ /yang gong gi ril bu dang mnyam pa'i shel kar lcags snod du chu cung zad blugs la sgor/ chu thag chod nas/ dzA ti/ li shi/ dzA ti'i me tog /sug smel bzhi</text></item>
<item><p>308a.6</p><section></section><text>shel kar gyi bcu cha re zhib par btags pa dang gong gi ril bu btab la cung zad sgor te ril bu sgyu ru ra nyes 'gyur tsam sgril la tho rangs zas ma zos pa'i gong du ril bu re rgyun du bsten na stobs 'phel zhing rgas kha sra ba/ lus yang ba/ dong kha bde ba/ rtsal che ba/ blo</text></item>
<item><p>308a.7</p><section></section><text>rno ba| mig gsal ba/ rna ba gsang gso brtan pa/ skra dkar gnyer ma mi 'byung ba/ 'dod pa spyod nus pa/ nad dkon pa sogs phan yon bsam las 'das so/ /chu bsags tsha grang gang la'ang bi sa lo tsa na/ cu gang/ se ma la khA ra dkar po</text></item>
<item><p>308b.1</p><section></section><text>dang ser po/ rgya gar stod ja/ bi la wa rnams cha mnyam pa zhib par btags pa na'i khu bas zho sla ba tsam byas pa nyin gsum gyi bar rdo gzhong gi nang du nyes te bag tsam song ba dang ril bu sran chung tsam byas pa skrangs che na ril bu gnyis dang gzhan la re ste</text></item>
<item><p>308b.2</p><section></section><text>ba mar gsar pa btsags bcad pas 'phul la ma nu khrag can btang / sman gtong ring pag thug dang mar gsar ma gtogs gzhan 'dzem/ nad ji ltar tshan che yang thun bdun gyis nges par thon no/ /bAMg dang ShADa cha mnyam la phye mar btags so/ /</text></item>
<item><p>308b.3</p><section></section><text>ba'i zho phul gyi sum cha tsam la btab nas 'thungs na yang phan par 'gyur zhing / bcos byed ring dmar skyur dang kha tsha rul sums 'dzem/ so mar tsa dang bye dkar cha mnyam pa zho hub gang la sbyar nas btang na som ra byo kar  khrag mkhris las gyur pa'i chu nad</text></item>
<item><p>308b.4</p><section></section><text>thon zhing mkhris pas 'grim pa yang tshod do/ /yang tshod dang rgyas par dus kyi rtsa ba gang byas khog ma'i nang du blug la de ltar yang khebs gcod rgyab la rlangs pa mi 'chor ba byas pa'i chu sum gnyis bsdus pa'i khu ba tshan mo phor pa gang</text></item>
<item><p>308b.5</p><section></section><text>btungs la gos kyis byebs la rngul thon par byed pa gnad du che'o/ /tsan dan dmar po dang btsag rdo gnyis cha mnyam pa zhib par btags la chus rta byas ril bu go yu'i 'bru tsam dril te btang bas kyang phan no/ /'u su lo ma 'dru bcas rdzogs</text></item>
<item><p>308b.6</p><section></section><text>pa'i khu bas bsku mnye byas kyang skrangs pa 'phral du 'joms par 'gyur ro/ /sa mu dra pha la ge tu mang nyung ji tsam yod kyang ra'i gcin gyi kha phrus nyin re la lan gsum re btab pa/ de bzhin ba'i 'o ma/ b+h+ring+ga ra dza'i khu ba rnams kyis nyin bdun re</text></item>
<item><p>308b.7</p><section></section><text>skem bkru byed/ de nas zhib par btags la thun tshad sran ma gsum nas gcig gi bar nad babs che chung skabs dang bstun/ ra ma'i gcin gyis khu ba byas nas mgo phyed na bar gang na ba'i phyogs kyi mig la 'byug pa'am sna la blug pas phan zhing mig</text></item>
<item><p>309a.1</p><section></section><text>la byugs pas mig ser por song ba la yang phan/ bye ma ka ra dang mnyam du btang na tshad pa gsar rnying thams cad la phan/ ba'i dar bas rta byas te 'thungs na rlung rgyu mkhris kyi nad zug bzhin du che ba la phan/ hing+ga dang mnyam du btang na mkhris srin skye</text></item>
<item><p>309a.2</p><section></section><text>thur gzugs dang srin leb srin 'bu chung ngu sogs len nas bde bar 'gyur ro/ /sbrang rtsi la sbyar nas bse dug gi rma dang thor ba la bskus na 'phral du phan par 'gyur zhing / lce dig pas gtam yun ring mi thon pa dang pho ba shing kun sbos pa la khong du btang bas phan/</text></item>
<item><p>309a.3</p><section></section><text>yung ba dang mnyam du btang na skyug sman gyi mchog tu 'gyur/ rang chu 'am ra ma'i chus rta byas btang na ma 'ju ba la phan zhing sbyongs kyang phebs par 'gyur ro/ /b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i khu bas ril bu byas la btang na mig ser la phan/ pi pa la'i pags pa dang</text></item>
<item><p>309a.4</p><section></section><text>mnyam du zos na mas rlung gyen ldog dang rlung rgyu mkhris la mchog tu phan no/ /yang ra ma'i chus rta byas btang na skya rbab la phan/ a jo dzA Da'i khu bas ril bu byas btang na dwangs ma 'dzag pa la phan no/ /la la phud dang mnyam du btung na rims nad nyi ma</text></item>
<item><p>309a.5</p><section></section><text>re mos kyis na ba la phan no/ /ba'i 'o ma dang mnyam du btang na stobs bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /lga dang mnyam du btang na dwangs ma 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /a ka la ka ra phye mar byas pa dang mnyam du btang na khong pa'i srin 'bu thams cad phyir 'thon nas</text></item>
<item><p>309a.6</p><section></section><text>bde'o/ /nim bu'i khya ba dang mnyam du btang na 'dus pa'i nad la phan no/ /rang chu khyor gsum gyis 'phul te btang bas ni nA bI zer ba'i rkang lag gi sor mo dang sna gang la thebs kyang chad 'gro ba zhig yong ba de la phan/ yang nad de la sngags byed na/</text></item>
<item><p>309a.7</p><section></section><text>sang bcos kha byed rgyu'i do nub nad pa'i lus bkrus la mal bde bar nyal bcug sang zhogs sngags mkhan gyis phyin la nad pa las 'dom do tsam gyis 'gyangs byas la bsdad/ rkang lag gang na ba de bstan la 'og gi sngags 'dren pa dang mnyam du 'bras</text></item>
<item><p>309b.1</p><section></section><text>sin+ng+hAr bsres pas nad pa brab/ rkang lag gang yin kyang mi gnyis tsam gyis zin kyang mi thub par sngags mkhan gyi sngar sleb yong bas khru gang tsam du sleb pa dang gris 'phred la re khA gsum 'then/ gang na ba de 'bras btsos pa'i zan dang sin+ng+hU ra bsres pas</text></item>
<item><p>309b.2</p><section></section><text>gtums la bzhag pas phan no/ /sngags ni/ oM gA rdza ta g+ho rata A ba tA tsha ra tshe du u tA ra ta a ba tA ha ya/ na ba nA ri ba ha tra ko Sh+Tha su Sha ba ra tA A ba ta ha ya/ kA hA te A ba ra ha ya ga D+ng+ha ga ya ni te A ba tA ha ya/ kA ba ru ko ko ta bA la</text></item>
<item><p>309b.3</p><section></section><text>di lI ko pa ta sA ha/ se Sha silA ra ru ru ka ni ke pu ta ma ha ma dA pi ra man+t+ra pa D+ng+ha ta/ ba d+hiShu rA sa na b+he dz+ye b+hu ta pAM ng+haMpre ta pAM d+hipre ta pAM ng+nyi dA nobAMng+ti/ ma ri yA ma sA na bAM d+hi kAl b+hi ro bAMd+hi/ aSh+Ta b+hai ra ba pAM d+hi lo ha ro ha bo nA si d+ha sha d+ha paM d+hi pA na phu la ko bAM ng+hi/ te la ta le ko</text></item>
<item><p>309b.4</p><section></section><text>pAM d+hi b+hA ta du d+ha ko pAMd+hi/ ka ra na ka ra tu ti ko bAd+ha Shi ra She raM She hra pA la bAM ng+haM/ a Tho ta ra so nInA i pAM d+hi bA rA s+ya ma sAn pAM ng+hi te rA s+ya ka ru bA pAM d+hi/ tso dA s+ya b+haMsA su ra pAM d+hi saM Sha nI Di ka nI pAM d+hi pa ta/ tsha nI pAM d+hi b+he ga na pAM d+ha to bA bA A da ma kI do hA I/ bi bi phAta</text></item>
<item><p>309b.5</p><section></section><text>mA ki du hA i su ba ra mu ra DA/ pi pi phA ta mA ke dA ba na gi ra/ na ba lA Sha a si ha dzA ra pi ra pi kaM ba ra bA ng+hi Da ri/ a ba de Shore ma ha ma dwA pi te re man+ta ki sak+tI/ u ta ra ko u ta ra pAM d+hI/ da tsha na ko da tsha na nAM ng+hi pa tshI ma ko pa tshi ma b-I d+hi/ purba ko purba</text></item>
<item><p>309b.6</p><section></section><text>pAMd+hi/ kA Tha kI ro Ti bAM d+hi phi re ma ha ma dA pi rA se Sha si la ra paT+d+ta ta man+t+ra/ bA d+hi DA rI me rI b+hak+tIgu ru kI sik+ta phu ro man+t+ra sI swa ri bA tsA/ zhes pa'o/ /rA sa rA dze shwa ra te bcud len dbang phyug rgyal po'i sbyor ba ni/ dngul chu dug bral/ mu zi ser po/ /mr-i ta</text></item>
<item><p>309b.7</p><section></section><text>sA ra/ chu shing nag pos go chod tsam/ zangs phye/ tA la ka /btsan dug /tshal dkar/ si maM la/ ldong ros /rgya tshwa/ lcags phye/ zha nye dkar po'i phye ma/ dzAti/ bong nga dmar po nang / hi ti m+b+hi si ljang gu/ mu sa li/ dza ba Sha ra/ nI ba/</text></item>
<item><p>310a.1</p><section></section><text>pa ya bi rang+ga/ skyer pa/ a ka la ka ra/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba/ gur gum/ nA ga ge sar chung ba/ tsu ka /ru d+ha/ kA ka ra seng+gi/ ma la kA na/ gu ni/ bong nga dmar po/ la la phud/ khu ra sa ni a dza wa na/ musha m+ba ra/</text></item>
<item><p>310a.2</p><section></section><text>sa mu dra pha la/ lga/ pi pi ling / da tu ha ri dra pho ba ris/ 'bras bu gsum/ zi ra nag po rnams cha mnyam dang ga pur nyis 'gyur/ kuT de thams cad dang dan rog dug dbyung tshar ba ni ri b+hi si/ bsnyams par btags la dar la btsags/ b+hing+ga rA dza'i khu</text></item>
<item><p>310a.3</p><section></section><text>bas sgrus la zhag nyer gcig gi bar btags te ril bu pho ris tsam sgril/ ril bu re b+h+ring+ga kAradzIr/ rA dza'i khu bas rta byas kru'am/ btang na rlung tshad gsar rnying thams cad la phan/ bye kar dang mnyam du btang na mkhris tshad gsar rnying thams cad la phan zhing</text></item>
<item><p>310a.4</p><section></section><text>zas gang zos kyang 'grims 'gro ba la btang na yang chad par 'gyur ro/ /chang la pi pi ling phye ma btab pas rta byas btang na bad kan la brten pa'i tshad pa 'joms par 'gyur ro/ /ra ma'i gcin gyis rta byas nas btang na pho ba'i nad mA la dz+wa re la phan/</text></item>
<item><p>310a.5</p><section></section><text>so pha dang pho ris bsna nal btang na tshad pa'i rigs thams cad la phan/ skyu rur dang ba'i mar bsnun la btang na pho bo na zhing dbugs mi thon pa la phan/ nI ba'i lo ma dang mnyam du zos na i ka'i nad la phan/ b+h+ring+ga ra'i khu bar dang ga mi 'deb dang lcags dreg gi nad</text></item>
<item><p>310a.6</p><section></section><text>go snyod sbyar te mig la byugs na mig ser la phan no/ /so pha dang ya la phud pa snad ti byin na bud mad kyi bu btsas pa'i rjes su sked pa dang tshang ran pa la phan/ ka ra dang mnyam du btang na zas skyis bu'i skom tsha grang gang 'grims pa gcod par 'gyur ro/ /pA na dang</text></item>
<item><p>310a.7</p><section></section><text>mnyam du btang na mkhris pa'i nad la phan/ ba'i mar sar dang mnyam du zos na bud med mngal chags nas mi gnas pa gnas par 'gyur ro/ /ra'i 'o mas rta byas btang na dwangs ma 'dzag pa chod do/ /skyu ru ra'i khu bas rta byas te btang na dmu chu 'jog pa la phan</text></item>
<item><p>310b.1</p><section></section><text>par 'gyur ro/ /nim bu'i khu bar sbyar la sna bug tu blug na mgo phyed na ba la phan zhing mig la byugs na 'byung po'i gnod pa la phan/ 'u su dang ba mar bsnan nas btang na sbrul gyi dug la phan/ lga'i khu bas rta byas nas btang na sdig pa'i dug la phan/</text></item>
<item><p>310b.2</p><section></section><text>nA ga put+pa dang mnyam du btang na gnyid chung ngu 'gro'o/ /ma la kang+gu ni dang mnyam du btang na lus stobs 'phel lo/ /gong gsal rnams nyin bdun re'i bar gtong zhing zas spyod nad so so'i skabs thob sbyor/ spyi sman go ra tso le'i spyor ba ni/</text></item>
<item><p>310b.3</p><section></section><text>li shi/ gla lgang dzA ti'i me tog /sman chen/ ku Ta ki/ mu sa li/ sug sme la/ ba ya pi rang+ga / ma nu khrag can/ gi waM/ ko ra/ ma ra ha Ti/ dngul chu/ bong nga dmar po/ /mu zi ser po/ ba bla/ dan rog dug bral rnams zho gsum re</text></item>
<item><p>310b.4</p><section></section><text>dang / dze la batri/ la la phud zho bco lnga rnams zhib par btags pa dar al tsi la btsags/ zho phyed gnyis b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i khya bas sbrus la rdo gzhong nang du nyin nyi bong nga dkar po bcag nas dkyil lgang khu yod pa gnyis shu rtsa gcig gi bar nyed cing skabs</text></item>
<item><p>310b.5</p><section></section><text>skabs su nyi mar cung zad bstan/ sa ha de pa'i khu bas sbrus la nyin gsum gyi bar nyes la ril bu sma ru mgo nag tsam sgril zhos rta byas nas btang na chu ser rlung ldan la phan/ nyin bdun gyi bar btang ngo / /dan+da phye mar btags/ gong gi ril bu las sum</text></item>
<item><p>310b.6</p><section></section><text>'gyur gyis che ba bcas btang na sbyongs phebs so/ /ba mar gsar pas khu ba byas nyin rer ril bu bzhi re nyi ma bdun gyi bar btang na rlung gi nad dang me drod nyams pa mig gi rab rib la phan no/ /b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i araN+DaM khu bas rta byas nyi ma gcig la ril bu bzhi</text></item>
<item><p>310b.7</p><section></section><text>btang na rlung rigs 'dar bu la phan no/ /ra'i 'o mas rta byas nas btang na dwangs ma 'dzag pa tsha grang gang la yang phan/ pa'i chus rta byas te btang na nas pa gong dang 'dra'o/ /yang dwangs ma chu dang mnyam du 'dzag cing nad zug byed na go yu dang mnyam du btang bas</text></item>
<item><p>311a.1</p><section></section><text>phan no/ /yang khrag tu 'dzag na a ba la'i khu bas rta byas btang na phan par 'gyur ro/ /nim bu'i khu bar sbyar la mig la byugs na 'byung po gang gis kyang glags mi rnyed do/ /'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma thur mgo gsum tsam dang</text></item>
<item><p>311a.2</p><section></section><text>ril bu bzhi mnyam du btang na mas rlung gyen log dang stod sku rur rlung sogs rlung rigs dang yan lag zha ba la phan/ yang zi ra dkar po dang mnyam du btang na yang mas rlung gyen log dang stod rlung sogs rlung rigs la phan no/ /a ma li zho gang dang ril</text></item>
<item><p>311a.3</p><section></section><text>bu bzhi mnyam du btang na chu 'tshag rgyu chen po med pa la lang yang 'tshag dgos shing btsags pa dang na tsha chen po yong ba la phan/ sho mo sa dang mnyam du btang na dwangs ma 'phel zhing 'dod pa spyod nus par 'gyur ro/ /zi ra nag po dang mnyam du chur brdar nas so</text></item>
<item><p>311a.4</p><section></section><text>na ba'i thad kyi phyir la byugs na zug gzer 'phral du zhi'o/ /thang phrom [(]ng+ha d+hu ra [)]gyi lo ma nyung zad dang ril bu re btang na grang mkhris kyi nad la phan/ mi thi si bA ra chu dar sngon po dang lhan du brdar nas bse dug gi rma dang shu ba la byugs na 'phral du phan/ 'bras chur sbangs pa'i khu</text></item>
<item><p>311a.5</p><section></section><text>bas rta byas btang na btsan dug sbyar dug gyur dug sogs dug rigs thams cad la mchog tu phan no/ /bod sdangs kyi khu ba la sbyar nas lus chu dang sngon po la bsku mnye byas na 'dus pa'i nad la phan no/ /b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i khu bas rta byas khong du btang kyang 'dus nad</text></item>
<item><p>311a.6</p><section></section><text>la phan no/ /phag brun mer bsregs pa'i thal ba dang bong bu'i gcin la ril bu brdar nas sna khan gsum gyi la blug na mi rgi'i mgo la 'bu yod pa'i me chu nyi zla sogs 'od can la bltas nas rgyal zer gyi 'gyel 'gro ba'i nad la mchog tu phan/ chang gis rta byas nas btang na</text></item>
<item><p>311a.7</p><section></section><text>par 'gyur ro/ /shing a ka la ka ra'i phye ma dang mnyam du btang na bad kan skya smug mtha' khan gsum gyi dag la phan no/ /zangs kyi snod du ba'i zho khyor gang tsam blug par ril bu btab ste legs par bsnur la khong du btang na ma 'ju ba'i rigs thams cad la phan no/</text></item>
<item><p>311b.1</p><section></section><text>bye kar dang mnyam du btang na mkhris pa la phan/ sbrang rtsi dang mnyam du zos na lus stobs bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /pa thu ba'i lo ma brdungs pa dang mnyam du btang na mkhris pa sha ser dang rdel nad la phan/ ma nu khrag can chung ngu dang mnyam du btang na gseb</text></item>
<item><p>311b.2</p><section></section><text>dri sogs lus kyi rngul chen po'i dri dang chu rtags kyi dri ngan pa la phan/ spe tres dang mnyam du btang na grang ba 'dzag pa tsha grang mtha' spyo dag la phan/ nye shing pa dang mnyam du btang na rlung gis na zug byed pa dang ba byi ba sogs la phan/ la la phud shu dag gnyis phye</text></item>
<item><p>311b.3</p><section></section><text>mar btags pa dang mnyam du btang na rked pa na ba la phan/ bag ni dri la nas za chus rta byas nas lo gsum zla ba gsum zhag gsum nyi ma'i sum cha gsum gyi bar ril bu re bar ma chad par bsten na lus kyi nad gsar rnying thams cad 'byang zhing lus stobs 'phel ba dang rgas kha srab</text></item>
<item><p>311b.4</p><section></section><text>sogs phan yon bsam las 'das so/ /nad par gtong skabs zas spyod sogs nad babs dang bstun te skabs dang sbyar ro / /skran gyi sman la dan+da'i rtsa ba zho bzhi/ lga dang kha ru tsha zho phye do re/ shing kun se ba lnga rnams chu phor pa gsum la btab la tsha gnyis</text></item>
<item><p>311b.5</p><section></section><text>gdus pa'i phor gang khong du btang na rlung skran 'phral du zhig par 'gyur ro/ /yang 'gron bu mer bsregs pa'i thal ba pho ris pi pi ling / lga/ tsi tra/ so tsal lo Na kha ru tshwa rnams zhib par btags pa dang la btsags la thur mgo do</text></item>
<item><p>311b.6</p><section></section><text>tsam chu skol gyis rta byas btang na skran gyi rigs thams cad la phan no/ /shing kun cha phyed/ zi ra dkar po/ lga/ kha ru tsha/ 'u su rnams cha re bcas thang thun tsam chu phor pa gsum gyi nang du btab/ cha gnyis gdus la btang na mkhris skran zhig par</text></item>
<item><p>311b.7</p><section></section><text>'gyur ro/ /kA ka ra sing+gi/ d+ha ba ra'i me tog /lga/ bu ram rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa'i ril bu ba ru ra tsam re btang na ng+hani nya pho skran zhig par 'gyur ro/ /rgya tsha/ sots+ng+ho/ /ba ru tshe/ tsi tra/ lga/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba rnams cha mnyam</text></item>
<item><p>312a.1</p><section></section><text>dang shing tsha phyed bcas zhib par btags la zur mgo do tsam chu skol gyis rta byas btang na skran gyi rigs mtha' dag la phan/ ke la ka'i rtsa ba/ dan+da'i rtsa ba/ lga/ tsi tra/ rgyam tsha rnams cha mnyam dang shing kun cha phyed bcas</text></item>
<item><p>312a.2</p><section></section><text>dang thun tsam chur gdu lugs gong bzhin byas btang na rlung la brten pa'i ma zhu ba'i skran zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /a ru ra dang lga cha mnyam la shing kun cha phyed bcas zhib par btags pa thur mgo do tsam chu skol gyis 'phul te btang na me drod nyams pa'i skran zhi</text></item>
<item><p>312a.3</p><section></section><text>par 'gyur ro/ /rgyam tsha/ kha ru tsha/ lga/ tsi tra/ ba ru ra/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba rnams cha mnyam pa dang shing kun cha phyed bcas zhib par btags la thun tshad gong bzhin chu skol gyis 'phul te btang na khrag la brten pa'i ma 'ju ba'i skran zhi bar 'gyur</text></item>
<item><p>312a.4</p><section></section><text>ro/ /'gron thal/ lga/ pi pi ling / li shi/ dzA ti/ kha ru tshwa rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu skol gyis 'phul btang na rlung skran zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /pho ris/ pi pi ling / lga/ la la phud/ zi ra nag po rnams cha mnyam dang shing kun</text></item>
<item><p>312a.5</p><section></section><text>cha phyed bcas phye mar btags la chu skol gyis 'phul nas btang na chu skran zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /pho ris/ pi pi ling / lga/ la la phud/ rgyam tsha/ tsi tra/ zi ra nag po/ shing kun rnams cha bsnyams pa zhib par btags la chu skol gyis 'phul</text></item>
<item><p>312a.6</p><section></section><text>nas btang na skran gyi rigs thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lga/ tig ta/ pi pi ling / la la phud/ a ka la ka ra/ li shi/ khu ra sha lang thang rtse na/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba rnams cha mnyam thang thun tsam chu sum gnyis gdus pa'i khu ba phor gang btang na</text></item>
<item><p>312a.7</p><section></section><text>mkhris skran zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /pho ris/ pi pi ling / lga/ tsitAyata/ rgyam tsha/ la la phud rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la ba mar lang thang rtsa btsags bcad pas rta byas gtong zhing cung zad lus la byugs na bud med bu btsas pa'i rjes su khrag</text></item>
<item><p>312b.1</p><section></section><text>mkhris kyi skran byung ba la phan no/ /sbrul sha dang lga cha mnyam zhib par btags pa dar la btsags te se ba bcu drug re chu bskol gyis rta byas btang na dmu chu/ skya rbab kyis skrangs pa/ mkhris pa/ rlung / mgo na ba/ pho ba na ba sogs nad gsar rnying</text></item>
<item><p>312b.2</p><section></section><text>mtha' dag la phan/ sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa me la bsregs pa zhib par btags pa mig la byugs na mig gi nad thams cad la phan zhing mig gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /sbrul shun dang ba'i 'o ma mkhur bkang byas na so'i nad thams cad la phan no/ /</text></item>
<item><p>312b.3</p><section></section><text>sbrul shun zhib par btags pa ba zho btsags pas sbrus la ril bu sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam sgril la khong du btang na za 'phrug la phan/ gnyen 'bur gyis skrangs par sbrul gyi khrag byugs na myur du phan/ rma bya'i sgo mdongs me la bsregs pa'i thal ba chu grang</text></item>
<item><p>312b.4</p><section></section><text>gis 'phul nas btang na khrag sogs skyug pa'i rigs chod par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa mer bsregs pa'i thal ba sran ma tsam chu grang gis rta byas btang na rdel nad 'phral du sel zhing bud med kyi nu ma skrangs pa la yang phan no/ /sdig pa mer bsregs pa'i du ba khong</text></item>
<item><p>312b.5</p><section></section><text>par btang na srog chags kyi gnod pa mi 'byung / mi thod zhib par nyes la chur b+hi tshu li sbyar te byugs na 'bras bu skrangs pa la phan/ mi thod mer bsregs la thur mgo do tsam re khong du zhag bdun gyi bar btang na 'bras bu skrangs shin tu che ba la phan no/ /</text></item>
<item><p>312b.6</p><section></section><text>rkang lag gi sen mo gog pa'i nad pa khang byil gyi klad pa byugs na 'phral du phan/ gdong la gro thig yod par khang byil gyi brun chu la sbyar la nyin bdun gyi bar du byugs na med par 'gyur ro/ /spyi ther sogs mgo la skra med par rta'i klad pa nyin bdun gyi bar du</text></item>
<item><p>312b.7</p><section></section><text>byugs na skra skye bar 'gyur zhing rgya dang sma ra/ ciDi sogs 'dod kyang gong 'dod par byugs dz+ha ming pas skye bar 'gyur ro/ /ma he'i ra ma he ka sing+ga skyu ru ra dang mnyam du chu la btsos tshos pa dang bton spyol mer bsregs pa'i g+ho rag na g+dza thal ba gong gi</text></item>
<item><p>313a.1</p><section></section><text>chu ra btab ste mgo bor byugs na skra shin tu bzang ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i rjes su pags mtshams la chu ser 'phel ba'i rtags byung na rwa snum gyi dkyil du btsos la byugs pas zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /pags nad khol bu ba sen mo btab kyang reg pa mi</text></item>
<item><p>313a.2</p><section></section><text>tshor ba dang skom pa la byi ba'i brun chur brdar ba byugs pas phan no/ /mdze'i bcos thabs ni/ thog mar mdze la rigs rnam pa bdun te/ luta kuSh+Tha/ sarba ng+hA tu kuSh+Tha/ pi tsi tra kuSh+Tha/ lA la kuSh+Tha/ su ya kuSh+Tha/ tsan+d+rakuSh+Tha/ Sha Shen+d+rikuSh+Tha/ rnams te de</text></item>
<item><p>313a.3</p><section></section><text>yang chung gi mdze la thog mar sha lkags khol bur za zhing bradan chu ser mang du don yong / mkhris rlung la gzhan ma gong dang cha rlung rbabs la brten pa'i mdze mabris rlung la brten pa'i mdze grang rlung la brtan pa'i mdze khrag la brten pa'i mdze khrag mkhris la brten pa'i mdzo grang mdze sha bas 'dra ba</text></item>
<item><p>313a.4</p><section></section><text>la dod shin tu che zhing mdog kyang cung zad dmar la brang na khrag kyang 'byung ba'o/ /grang rlung la thog mar lus khol bur skrangs shing mdog kyang khra bor yod la rjes su tshigs che chung thams cad skrangs shing chu ser 'dzag pa'o/ /khrag mdze la yan lag dang rna ba sna sogs kyi rtse</text></item>
<item><p>313a.5</p><section></section><text>chad cing rnag khrag 'dzag cing mdog kyang dmar por 'ong ngo / /khrag mkhris la brten pa gzhan ma gong dang 'dra ba la drod shin tu che ba'o/ /grang mdzes mdog dkar zhing rnag khrag chu ser mang du 'dzag go/ /sha bkra la rtogs par sla ba'o/ /de dag gi sman ni/ a</text></item>
<item><p>313a.6</p><section></section><text>ru ra gser mdog dang ma chung / btsod/ du ba ral pa/ btsan dug /ka na bi ra'i rtsa ba rnams zhib par btags la ba'i chus sbrus nas nad gang yod la byugs na chu rlung gi mdze dang mkhris rlung gi mdze la phan no/ /zangs kyi par bu'i nang du/ mu zi ser po/</text></item>
<item><p>313a.7</p><section></section><text>tsha la/ yung ba/ dz+hiriTaraDa/ nanyiSh+Tha graMrkyang ng+ha rasta a ma pa'i sha 'bras kyi skogs pa 'bras bu rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la tsi tA'i shing gong gi cha gcig dang / gi wa kwa ra'i shing cha gsum bcas blugs la kha legs par bcad/ de rdza'i khog ma che ba zhig gi nang du bcug</text></item>
<item><p>313b.1</p><section></section><text>la kha bsdams te thab me rtag pa'i thab gong du zla ba drug gi bar du bzhag /de nas bton bul phye mar byas te ra'i 'o ma dang sbyar nas byugs pas grang rlung gi mdzes tshigs skrangs pa 'phral du zhi'o/ /mu zi ser po/ thang phrom gnyis til snum gyi nang du bskyur</text></item>
<item><p>313b.2</p><section></section><text>dul ma tshig par me btang / de nas grang thag chod pa dang byugs pas mkhris rlung la brten pa'i mdze la phan no/ mu zi ser po/ /'bras bu gsum/ ma nu khrag can/ sgron me shing gi 'bru mngar skyur gnyis yong ba'i skyur ba/ til nag rnams cha</text></item>
<item><p>313b.3</p><section></section><text>mnyam b+h+r-ing+ga rA dza'i thang chu dang mnyam du btags la byugs na khrag mdze la phan no/ kon po dang pags bse ko ltar sang ba'i za phrug la phan/ /hi rim bi cha gcig /pho ris cha gnyis/ tsiDa mi thod bsregs pa'i thal ba cha gsum rnams zhib par btags la chu grang</text></item>
<item><p>313b.4</p><section></section><text>gis rta byas btang bas mdze nad kyi rigs thams cad la phan no/ /khyung sder smug po/ /dong ga'i 'bru/ nI ba/ bA ya bi rang+ga/ bod da dmar po nang ljang gu/ pi pi ling / tsi tra/ mu zi ser po/ bong dmar nang ljang rnams cha mnyam zhib par thur mgo do tsam</text></item>

<item><p>314a.1</p><section></section><text>de steng go ra tsi li'i sbyor ba dang po'i ril bu rnams cha mnyam pa zhib par btags pa grang mje'i rma gang yod la gtsags bu rnon pos rtsa bas de la btab pas phan no/ /mu zi ser po/ /'bras bu gsum/ ma nu khrag can/ tig nag /sgron me</text></item>

<item><p>314b.1</p><section></section><text>tsha ba gsum/ zi ra dar/ bye kar/ a ma li'i 'bru/ ru rta/ shu dag /tsan dan dmar po/ a shwa gadz+ha rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la ba'i chu dang sbyar nas snar blugs na sna nas 'bu don yong zhing phan la mgo 'khor la yang phan no/ /yang pho ris</text></item>
<item><p>314b.2</p><section></section><text>bu ram gnyis cha mnyam btags la chang skyur la sbyar nas snar blugs kyang phan no/ /'bras bu gsum dang pi pi ling cha mnyam btags la sbrang rtsis ril bu byas te khong du btang zhing / sbrang rtsi chur sbyangs pas rta byas snar blugs kyang phan zhing sna khrag 'dzag pa</text></item>
<item><p>314b.3</p><section></section><text>dang kha'i dri ngan pa la phan no/ /nag po la/ sgyu ru ra zhib par mgo gzhogs phyed na bal btags la ba mar ngar mnyam du bskol te gang na sar byugs pas phan/ se 'bru'i me tog dang dU ba gnyis kyi khu ba ra'i 'o ma dang bsres la snar blugs pas phan</text></item>
<item><p>314b.4</p><section></section><text>no| /yang pi pi ling / suM har+ng+na'i 'bru/ bA ya bi rang+ga/ /pho ris rnams cha mnyam btags la pa'i chu la sbyar nas snar byug cing cung zad sna'i nang du btang bas kyang phan zhing sna khrag 'dzag pa yang chod do/ /bye kar dang sbrang rtsi gnyis pa'i 'o ya ma nag po la</text></item>
<item><p>314b.5</p><section></section><text>mar sbyar nas snar blugs na phan no/ /yang bal byi thang ka /po kha che/ se 'bru'i me tog dU ba rnams kyi khu ba ra'i 'o ma dang bsres la snar blugs na phan/ dza mu na'i 'bru/ dU ba/ se 'bru'i me tog gsum gyi khu ba snar blugs na phan zhing sna khrag</text></item>

<item><p>315a.1</p><section></section><text>dkar nag khra gsum gyi bcos rdzogs so// //tsu ka /se 'bru'i skogs/ spos dkar/ la la phud/ dzA ti/ a phI ma/ li ga dur rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun tshad thur mgo do tsam chu grang gis rta</text></item>

<item><p>315a.7</p><section></section><text>tsam sbrang rtsi dang mnyam du btang na myur du phan zhing gzhan yang khrag 'grims pa la phan no/ /yang gong gi lte ba 'phyus pa'i nad de la nad pa rang gis rgyab tu lag pa g.yas kyis rkang pa g.yon gyi mthe bong zin/ lag pa g.yon gyis rkang pa g.yas kyi mthe bong zin/</text></item>
<item><p>315b.1</p><section></section><text>de nas mi zhig gis lag pa bsnol mtshams nas lan bdun gyi bar du btegs pas kyang 'phral du phan zhing nad par 'phral du zug gzer che bar yod yang de la tshad mi dgos so/ /dzA ti/ a phI ma/ ga bur/ glartsi/ thang phrom/ so ma ra tsa rnams cha</text></item>

<item><p>315b.3</p><section></section><text>bu gsum/ rgyam tshwa/ la la phud rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thur mgo do tsam re chu phor gang gi nang du blugs la phyed tsam skam pa dang grang thag bcad ras la btsags te khong du btang na phan no/ /yang mkhris tshad la brten pa kho nas skom na/ bo ris</text></item>
