<item><p>315b.6</p><section></section><text>shel kar dang mnyam du chus rta byas la btang na yang phebs so/ /lha mo dbu mas lha dbang phyug chen po la gsol pa/ kye lha yi lha mchog dbang phyug che/ /khyed ni 'jig rten byed po ste/ /nad kun zhi zhing blo 'phel ba'i/ /kam tsha sman mchog bdag la bstan du</text></item>
<item><p>315b.7</p><section></section><text>gsol/ /zhes gsol pa dang / dbang phyug gis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig ri sras dpal chen mo/ /nad 'joms blo 'phel yon tan gter/ /sman mchog ma la kAMgu ni'i/ /bsten thabs phan yon bshad par bya/ /de la dang por bshal skyugs</text></item>
<item><p>316a.1</p><section></section><text>kyis lus dag par bkrus la nyin dang por ma la rmA gu ni'i 'bru gcig/ /gnyis par gnyis/ de nas rim bzhin nyin bdun gyi par 'bru re spar/ nyin bdun nas bzung zla ba gcig dang zhag bcu'i bar 'bru bdun re bsten/ de bar</text></item>
<item><p>316a.2</p><section></section><text>zas gang la'ang tshwa ba'i rigs 'joms pas rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa sogs tsha grang gsar rnying thams cad rtsa ba nas 'byin par byed cing / lus brtan pa dang / gzi brjid che ba dang / nad dkon pa/ mig gsal ba/ stobs 'phel ba sogs</text></item>
<item><p>316a.3</p><section></section><text>yon tan mtha' yas shing / khyad par blo gros pad+ma kha phye ba ltar gyur nas blo rno ba/ 'dzin bzang ba/ rig pa gsal ba/ brjed mi 'gro ba/ rtsod pa bzang ba sogs blo 'phel gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /yang tshes bco lnga dang gza' nyi ma 'dzom</text></item>
<item><p>316a.4</p><section></section><text>pa'i mtshan mo ma la kAM gu ni'i snum gyi sgron me sbar/ de la rkun po'i thod pa bkab nas du ba chags su bcug pa de mig la byugs na mig chus ma dag par lha 'dre mi gsum gang gis kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yang gza' lhag pa yod pa'i nyi ma kAM gu ni'i snum</text></item>
<item><p>316a.5</p><section></section><text>khol ma rnying pa'i nang du chu blug /de steng ma la kAM gu ni'i zhing par btags pa btab la bskol ba grangs su bcug pa'i snum kha zhag ltar yong ba zos la rting par byugs na mdze rigs kyis yan lag chad 'gro ba sos par 'gyur zhing gdong mdzes shing mdangs dang</text></item>
<item><p>316a.6</p><section></section><text>ldan par 'gyur ro/ /nyin nyer gcig gi bar snum se ba bcu gnyis re khong du btang na mdze'i rigs mtha' dag rtsa ba nas thon par 'gyur ro/ /yang gza' nyi ma yod pa'i nyin snod gtsang mar ba nag mo'i 'o ma bskol/ de la ma la kAM gu ni'i zhib par btags la</text></item>
<item><p>316a.7</p><section></section><text>btab ste ru ma dang bcas zho bsnyal/ de dkrogs te mar bcos la 'bras ba nag mo'i 'o mar bcos pa'i mar de nas se ba bcu gnyis re btab pa zla ba gcig dang zhag bcu'i bar zos na/ skra dang sma ra dkar por song ba slar yang nag por 'gyur ro/ /gza' mig</text></item>
<item><p>316b.1</p><section></section><text>dmar yod pa'i nyin ba nag mo'i mar btsags bcad la phyed tsam grang bar ma la kAM gu ni'i 'bru dang tel nag cha mnyam phye mar btags pa blug ste nyin dang por se ba bcu gnyis/ gnyis par zho gang se ba bzhi sogs nyin bdun gyi bar du cha re spar/ de nas rgyun du bsten</text></item>
<item><p>316b.2</p><section></section><text>thub na rab de min zla gcig dang zhag bcu'i bar du bsten na tshe shin tu ring bar 'gyur zhing gong du 'gro yang mgyogs bul rta dang mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /zhes lha dbang phyug gis lha mo dbu mar gdams pa rdzogs so// //a shwa gan+ng+ha zhib par btags pa'i phye</text></item>
<item><p>316b.3</p><section></section><text>ma zho gsum/ ba dkar rkyang nag rkyang lta bu spu mdog gang yin kyang mdog gzhan ma 'dres pa'i kha gtsang gi mar btsags bcad pa'i nang du btab ste 'khang pa dang bud med dus bab kyi zla mtshan 'dzag nas tshad pa'i nyin khong du btang na bud med phru gu mi yong</text></item>
<item><p>316b.4</p><section></section><text>ba'ang nges par sbrum par 'gyur ro/ /yang siM g+haDa/ lga/ b+ha Ta ka Ti ya/ pi pi ling / nA ga ge sar rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa dar la btsags pa thur mgo gsum pa mdog gcig gi 'o ma khyor gang tsam la btab ste dus gong mtshungs la byin</text></item>
<item><p>316b.5</p><section></section><text>na'ang nges par mngal dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /ma la chags kyang mi gnas par 'jig na/ lA la ka ma la'i rtsa ba ba'i 'o mar btsos/ de nas slar yang ba mar gyi nang du btsos la zhib par btags la gong gi ba mar bzhu ba dang mnyam du btang na 'jig</text></item>
<item><p>316b.6</p><section></section><text>par mi 'gyur ro/ /yang bilba'i 'bru dang smyug ma'i lo ma cha mnyam zhib par btags la chus rta byas nas nyin bdun gyi bar btang kyang mi 'jig go/ /mig sman gyi zhag bdun nad kyang grag 'ong</text></item>
<item><p>316b.7</p><section></section><text>sbyor thabs ni/ surma/ ldong ros/ sa mu dra pha la rgya mtsho sa bu dra phen lbu ba/ mu tig /byi dang ga bsdu ba Sha pa ri ya/ phaT ki Di/ byu ru/ lo d+ha/ pho ris rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags dar la legs par btsags/</text></item>
<item><p>317a.1</p><section></section><text>'khar snod du tsan dan dmar po'i skya ba'i mjug zangs dmar gyis gtums pas nyin phyed tsam skam nyed bya/ de nas bcus nas zhag gcig song ba'i chu cung zad blugs la nyi ma'i bzhi cha gcig tsam bsnur la ril bur dril/ skam pa dang</text></item>
<item><p>317a.2</p><section></section><text>rdo 'jam po'i ngos su chu dang lhan du brdar nas mig la byugs na ling tog /steng 'og gi 'gribs/ sha 'dzer/ mig chu 'dzag pa/ rgyang mig mi gsal ba sogs mig gi nad mtha' dag la phan no/ /ki ka ra'i me tog /rgya gar stod ja/ gla sgang /</text></item>
<item><p>317a.3</p><section></section><text>khi r+Na'i 'bru/ pa Ta ki ri rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa dar la btsags/ ra'i 'o mas khu ba byas la ril bu sgril bzhos khu ba byas brdar nas mig steng 'og gang rigs kyis bsgribs nas mi mthong bar byugs na mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /ri phyugs kyi gci</text></item>
<item><p>317a.4</p><section></section><text>ba ser kha ma me la bsregs pa'i thal ba zhib par btags/ der chur blugs la ras sam dar la tshags thengs gnyis byas/ de nas chu de dwangs su bcug la dal bus pho bas mthil du chags pa'i thal ba de skams pa dang / 'khar snod du pang kha'i skum</text></item>
<item><p>317a.5</p><section></section><text>dang lhan tsan dan gyi skya ba zangs gtums can gyis nyi ma gsum gyi bar bsnur ba chung ngu re mig la byugs na sha 'dzer dang / dmar por song ba sogs khrag la brten pa'i mig nad thams cad la phan/ bdud rtsi mig sman gyi sbyor ba ni/ surma/ gser rdo/ so na mak+Shi/</text></item>
<item><p>317a.6</p><section></section><text>ldong ros/ big pan/ pa Ti ka Ti hirma dzi/ pi pi ling / pho ris/ rgyam tsha/ ku ru pA la/ ba ru ra'i 'bru'i nang gi snying po/ Sha pa ri ya rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa dar la btsogs/ rdo gzhong shin tu 'jam po'i nang du son mak+Shi</text></item>
<item><p>317a.7</p><section></section><text>chu bcus nas zhag gcig song bas gar sla zho tsam sbrus pa skam thag ma chod par nyed thengs gcig /de nas nyi mar cung zad cig bzhag /yang bud med bu skyes pa'i 'o mas gar sla gong tsam byas pa ma skam par nyed thengs gcig /de bzhin du pa'i 'o mas thengs</text></item>
<item><p>317b.1</p><section></section><text>gcig /ra'i 'o mas thongs gcig sbrus pa'i ma skam tsam la ril bu sgril la skam thag chod pa dang sbrang rtsis rta byas brdar nas mig la byugs na rlung la brten pa'i mig nad thams cad la phan/ ra'i 'o mas khu ba byas nas byugs na srod long la phan/ bud</text></item>
<item><p>317b.2</p><section></section><text>med kyi 'o mas khu ba byas nas byugs na khrag rlung la brten pa'i mig nad thams cad la phan/ ba'i gcin gyis khu ba byas nas byugs na mig tsha zhing mig rnag mang du 'dzag pa la phan/ 'u su'i khu bas rta byas byugs na sha 'dzer dang mig dmar por mod</text></item>
<item><p>317b.3</p><section></section><text>ba la phan no/ /de rnams ni bdud rtsi mig sman gyi sbyor ba kha bsgyur dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //ni ram li/ ra tan dze ti skyur ba gnyis cha mnyam zhib par btags 'o mar sbyar te byugs na rgyang mig mi gsal ba la phan/ du ba ral</text></item>
<item><p>317b.4</p><section></section><text>pa zho gang / dngul chu zho gang / rdo thal/ dan rog brgya tham pa lce ston/ pho ris brgyad cu/ dan+da drug cu tham pa rnams ka yib la zer zhib par btags nim+bu'i khu bas 'dam btags byas la ril bu dril te pad kha tsam re chu la sbyar nas</text></item>
<item><p>317b.5</p><section></section><text>byugs na 'byung ngo / /sha za yi dwags la sogs pa gnod pas mig na ba la phan no/ /'khar snod du nim+bu'i chur sma ru mgo nag dkar po zhib par brdar te steng glang po che'i rmig pa nyis 'gyur gyis mang ba zhig tu brdar/ de steng ku kum sma ru mgo nag gi</text></item>
<item><p>317b.6</p><section></section><text>gsum cha gnyis tsam brdar/ de rnams legs par 'dres pa dang mig la nyin gsum nas bdun gyi bar gang rigs 'byug cing sman zhag gang 'byug gi ring phyir mi 'don/ khyad par rlung gi rigs ma phog pa byas pas ling tog /rwa/ sha 'dzer/</text></item>
<item><p>317b.7</p><section></section><text>'gribs sogs mig nad mtha' dag la mchog tu phan no/ /surma/ mi'i skra/ yung ba chung ngu bcas brdar la mi'i 'o mas khu ba byas nas mig la byugs na khrag gis mig dmar por song ba dang sha 'dzer la phan/ hong len bab ra na</text></item>
<item><p>318a.1</p><section></section><text>ser po dang gla rtsi sbyar la byugs na tsha 'khrug mig chu 'dzag ste za phrug byed pa rnams la phan/ rgya mtsho lbu ba/ a phI ma/ si ra sa'i 'bru rnams se ba bzhi re'i rtsis zhib par btags/ ba gsar pa'i chu bye</text></item>
<item><p>318a.2</p><section></section><text>gsum lcags snod nang du skya ba'i mgo zangs kyis gtums pas dkrugs pa dang me btang la chu phyed tsam skams pa dang / gong gi sman btab ste skyo ma gar phyogs tsam byas slar 'byug skabs pa'i chus klad la byugs na bar 'grib chu 'dzag pa</text></item>
<item><p>318a.3</p><section></section><text>za 'phrug /rdzi ma mig la zug pa sogs mig gi nad thams cad la phan no/ /ka ye pha la zhib mor btags pa chur sbyar te byugs na srod long la phan no/ /rwa ling shin tu che bas khebs shing na na ni m+bu'i khu bar rgya tshwa yungs 'bru tsam re brdar</text></item>
<item><p>318a.4</p><section></section><text>nas ra ling gi thog tu nyin gsum gyi bar blugs pas 'phral du zug gzer cung zad 'byung yang myur du phan par 'gyur ro/ 'o ma thang gis /yang mig la ra ling gis cher na na bzhu shel snying po pho ris tsam re zhib par btags la chur sbyar nas nyin gsum kyi bar</text></item>
<item><p>318a.5</p><section></section><text>blugs na nyin dang por zug gzer cung zad ldang / gnyis par mig skrangs po shin tu che zhing zug gzer kyang 'byung / nyin gsum par shug gzer skrangs po zhi ba dang / mnyam du rwa ling gang yang med par 'gyur zhing 'og 'grib kyis mi mthong ba yang</text></item>
<item><p>318a.6</p><section></section><text>gsal bar byed do/ /mig gangs phyid kyis na ba'i zug gzer che na chu grang gtsang ma snod gang yang rung bar blugs la mig ma btsums par gdong chu'i nang du bcug la zug gzer chag par bdugs pas myur du phan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin yan lag</text></item>
<item><p>318a.7</p><section></section><text>kha bas phyid pa yang chu grang mo'i nang du bdugs pas phan no/ /dbang sdong gi thang chu/ ha la d+ha/ phaT ki ri rnams cha mnyam ste ni mA'i khu ba byung na rab de min chur sbyangs nas mig gi phyi nang la byugs pas mig 'bras chen por song zhing mig sprin dmar ba nyin</text></item>
<item><p>318b.1</p><section></section><text>mtshan gnyis kar nad zug shin tu che ba la phan/ ka ni ya ra'i rtsa ba/ mtshal/ tsha la/ ni la tho da/ pi pi ling / pi pi ling gi rtsa ba/ pho ris/ lga bzang po rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags/ lga bzang ba chur sbangs pas khu ba byas nas ril</text></item>
<item><p>318b.2</p><section></section><text>bu sran ma tsam dril la btang bas khrag la brten pa'i tshigs na ba thams cad la phan/ 'o ma bu'i rtsa ba/ lcang nag madz+hanagi rtsa ba dang lo ma/ skyi pa'i ba rtsa ba sdong po lo ma 'bras bu/ gze ma rnams cha mnyam la 'o ma bu dang lcang nag gi rtsa ba cung zad mang ba bcas</text></item>
<item><p>318b.3</p><section></section><text>gzhogs la khog ma che ba mthil du bug pa nas shong ba tsam yod pa zhig gi nang du blugs/ dz+hayu khebs madz+han gcod rgyab la myu ba rlangs pa mi 'chor ba kha legs go sha ru bar bcad de mtshams rdza sa'i 'jim pas gtums ras kyis</text></item>
<item><p>318b.4</p><section></section><text>dril yang 'jim pa 'byug pa dang ras kyis dril ba sogs lnga brtsegs tsam byas/ sa dong brus pa khog ma cung zad chung ba zhig bcug la sas stems/ de'i khar gong gi khog ma bzhag /khog ma gnyis kyi mtshams legs par bsgrigs la 'jim pas</text></item>
<item><p>318b.5</p><section></section><text>rlung mi 'chor bar byas/ de nas khog ma che ba shing dang gci ba'i dkyil du bcug la nyi ma'i bzhi cha tsam zhig me shin tu tsha ba btang / de nas grang thag chod pa dang bton pas khog ma chung bar gsham du chu dang khar snum spris ma ltar chags yod pa de bton la thur</text></item>
<item><p>318b.6</p><section></section><text>mgo re tsam lga dang mnyam du btang na bse dug min pa'i rlung la brten pa'i nad tsha grang thams cad la phan/ li shi dang mnyam du btang na grang ba la brten pa'i nad thams cad la phan/ yung ba dang mnyam du btang na khrag la brten pa'i nad gsar rnying</text></item>
<item><p>318b.7</p><section></section><text>thams cad la phan/ rtsam pa'i pag dang mnyam du btang na bad kan gyi rigs thams cad la phan/ gzhan 'dres med pa'i mkhris pa rkyang pa'i nad dang 'grim pa gnyis por ba'i gzhan ma nad gang la yang mi 'grib med cing khyad par yan lag zha ba</text></item>
<item><p>319a.1</p><section></section><text>skams pa rnams la khong du btang zhing snum byugs pas nad med lta bur sos par 'gyur ro/ /phug ron/ khyim bya/ khang byil/ ri bong / rnga mong rnams kyi brun gang legs par byas pa'i skam po khog ma steng</text></item>
<item><p>319a.2</p><section></section><text>shod du ldugs lugs sogs gong ltar byas pas snum bton la a ka ra ka ra/ lga bzang ba/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba/ ka ru dang u ni pi pi ling / tsi ri shag uDa la la phud chung ba/ so ma ra tsa rnams cha mnyam zhib</text></item>
<item><p>319a.3</p><section></section><text>par btags pa dar la btsags/ de thams cad dang cha mnyam pa'i snum blugs la ril bu skyu ru ra tsam dril la btang na/ rlung / bad kan/ khrag grang ba/ chu ser rnams la phan zhing lus stobs rgyas pa dang khu ba 'phel bas 'dod pa spyod</text></item>
<item><p>319a.4</p><section></section><text>nus pa/ dang kha 'byed pa sogs la phan no/ /ri byugs lo gcig tsam 'gro ba'i lci ba/ ra'i ril ma gnyis skam thag bcad cing gang legs par byas/ khog ma steng shod du me gtong lugs sogs gong ltar byas pas snum 'byung ba sbrang rtsi</text></item>
<item><p>319a.5</p><section></section><text>dang yung ba gang rung dang mnyam du khong du btang zhing snum rgyang pas phyi ma bsku mnye byas pas chu pags 'grams/ za phrug/tshags tshigs na ba sogs chu ser gyi nad thams cad la mchog tu phan zhing mig la 'khyugs kyang rlung chu ser la brten</text></item>
<item><p>319a.6</p><section></section><text>pa'i mig nad la phan no/ /gro dang skyer pa mang nyung mnyam pa dang / shu dag de'i sum cha tsam bcas pas snod du blugs la snum 'don lugs gong ltar byas pa se ba bzhi tsam re khong du btang na'ang nad tsha grang gsar rnying kun la phan pa'i spyi</text></item>
<item><p>319a.7</p><section></section><text>'joms so/ /bri tsha/ song rgyam tsha/ Da ru ha lad pha Ta ki Di rnams cha mnyam bzhu shel gyi dam pe 'jim pa dang ras bsnol mar lnga brtsegs byugs pa zhig gi nang du phyed tsam gong ba blugs/ rdza snod che ba zhig gi phyed tsam gci ba'i mes</text></item>
<item><p>319b.1</p><section></section><text>bkang ba'i nang du gong gi dam pe gyen bsregs nyal stabs su bzhag /khardza snod kyi phyir 'ong ba byas la steng du'ang me btang / khog ma de rdo'i sgyed pu gsum sgram lta bur bzhag pa'i mthil nas kyang me cung zad gtong / khog ma'i phyir bzhu</text></item>
<item><p>319b.2</p><section></section><text>shel gyi dam pe gcig bzhag la dam pe gnyis kyi kha sprad pa'i mtshams la lhang tsher bkab la phyir 'jim pa byugs te rlung mi 'chor ba byas/ me nyi ma'i brgyad cha tsam zhig btang bas/ dam pe phyi ma'i nang du snum 'ong ba de thigs pa gsum tsam re</text></item>
<item><p>319b.3</p><section></section><text>dang / la la phud se ba bzhi tsam zhib par btags pa dang mnyam du btang bas nad tsha grang gsar rnying thams cad la ni mi phan pa med do/ /ze tsha/ rgyam tsha/ pha Ta ki Di/ su ma la dkar po dang ser po/ dza ba Sha ra/ mtshal cog la ma</text></item>
<item><p>319b.4</p><section></section><text>rnams cha mnyam btags pa bzhu shel gyi dam per blugs la snum 'don lugs gong mtshungs byas pa'i snum de mdze'i rma'am/ shu pa gsar rnying / phol mig sogs la byugs na phan no/ /a ru ra/ tsi tra/ pi pi ling / rgyam tsha/</text></item>
<item><p>319b.5</p><section></section><text>a ru bsregs pa rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa dar la btsags/ lga sbangs pa'i chus sbrus la ril bu skyu ru ra tsam sgril ba ril bu re btang na glo dang mgo bo na ba la phan zhing dang kha 'byed do/ /ma ru rtse'i 'bras bu zhib par</text></item>
<item><p>319b.6</p><section></section><text>btags ba la sha la chu grang gis rta byas btang na glo ba'i rnag thon par 'gyur ro/ /sbyi bzhur brdungs pa'i khu ba khong du btang na phyi nang gi rtsa 'phyus pa'i rigs la phan no/ /tha ram brdungs pa'i 'byar khyis rmugs pa'i rma la</text></item>
<item><p>319b.7</p><section></section><text>dkris na phan/ lung kha ri/ lpa tsha yin/ zhes pa'i sman tshad par phan/ dkar sha/ shing sha sogs sha mo'i rigs gang rnyed bye kar dang mnyam du sbyar ba'i thang khong du btang na mkhal nad gzer zug 'phral du gcog</text></item>
<item><p>320a.1</p><section></section><text>/mkhan pa brdungs pa'i khu bar pho ris zhib par btags la btab ste khong du btang na khog pa'i srin nad kun la phan/ mkhan pa'i dugs byas na pho long 'khrog pa myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /spa yag pas skrangs po dang</text></item>
<item><p>320a.2</p><section></section><text>rma la phan/ la la phud cha lnga/ na rub tsi ta cha bdun/ a ru ra cha drug rnams zhib par btags la chu skol gyis rta byas btang na ma 'ju ba/ me drod nyams pa/ glang thabs rnams la phan no/ /bad mar ma dang bu ram sbyar ba chus 'phul</text></item>
<item><p>320a.3</p><section></section><text>la btang na sha ser dang mig ser la phan no/ /ba dmar lga ser gyis khu ba byas la steng grib kyi nad mgor thebs na rna bar blug cing lus gzhan la thebs na khong du btang bas gza'i rigs mtha' tsi tu lbatuT zhing chu la sogs la yid ba'i srog chags dmar po chung du zhig song /</text></item>
<item><p>320a.4</p><section></section><text>dag la phan no/ /de yang gza' nad la/ rA hu'i dug 'phog pa yin na lo phyed gsum/ spen pa'i dug phog na lo lnga/ ke tu'i dug phog na brgyad de de bsgral nas gza'i nad kyis 'tsho 'chi gang byed las mi gnas so/ /rgya khur dang bye kar dang</text></item>
<item><p>320a.5</p><section></section><text>cha mnyam sbyar ba khong du btang bas mi phyugs gang gi yang chu 'gags pa sel lo/ /a ru ra gnyis sbrel mgo gzhogs phyed na ba la gang na phyogs su bsdams pas phan zhing sna khrag kyang chod la ya ma'i 'bus na ba sel lo/ /tsan dan dmar po dang / ng+hu ri</text></item>
<item><p>320a.6</p><section></section><text>btsag zhib par btags khong du'ang cung zad btang zhing gang na sar byugs pas me lce 'khor lo la phan no/ /tsan dan su ra zhib par btags la chu skol gyis 'phul nas btang na khrag la phan no/ /tsha la bsregs pa'i thal ba/ zi ra dkar po/ kha ru</text></item>
<item><p>320a.7</p><section></section><text>tsha rnams zhib par btags la thun tshad thur mgo do tsam re btang na pho bar na zug byed pa rlung dang ma 'ju ba'i rigs kun la phan zhing dang kha 'byed do/ /la la phud cha gnyis/ kha ru tsha cha gcig /tsi tra cha gsum/ pi pi ling cha bzhi/</text></item>
<item><p>320b.1</p><section></section><text>lga dkar po cha drug /a ru ra cha drug rnams zhib par btags dar la btsags te/ thun tshad gong bzhin btang bas ldan 'dus kyi nad gdong ser po dang dmar por song ba mig mi gsal shed chung ba'i mgo bo 'khor ba rnams la phan no/ /</text></item>
<item><p>320b.2</p><section></section><text>a ru ra mer bsregs pa'i thal ba/ tsi tra/ pi pi ling / kha ru tsha / a ru nag chung rnams zhib par btags la lga'i khu bas ril bu sgyu ru ra tsam byas la gong du btang krun glo nad kun dang pho bar rlung zhugs pa khrag skran rus tshad/ dang kha</text></item>
<item><p>320b.3</p><section></section><text>byed cha tsam 'gags pa rnams la phan/ phag brun bsregs pa'i thal ba bong bu'i gcin gyis khu ba byas nas snal blugs pas ya ma klad gzer nya la phan/ ka rany+dza ba'i 'o mar btab pa'i khu ba khong du btang bas khog srin dang gzhang srin kyi nad la</text></item>
<item><p>320b.4</p><section></section><text>phan| sha 'bras dang bye kar cha bsnyams zhib par btags la zho dang sbyar nas btang na tshad 'khru chod par 'gyur ro/ /'gron bu bsregs pa'i thal ba mi'i 'o mar sbyar la rna bar blugs na rnag 'dzag pa chod do/ /dza mu ni zhib par btags</text></item>
<item><p>320b.5</p><section></section><text>pa chu la sbyar nas byugs na grang thor rgyab pa la phan/ skyu ru ra a rag gi nang du sbangs pa'i khya ba byugs na skra tshan che bar 'gyur ro/ /phur mong nag po sha'i srubs rnams la rdzongs na 'bu mi 'byung zhing shing kun dri mas kyang thub bo/ /a ru</text></item>
<item><p>320b.6</p><section></section><text>ra/ pi pi ling / kha ru tsha gsum cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu skol gyis rta byas btang na pho ba dang rked pa na bar phan/ ku Ta ki cha gnyis/ pho ris cha gcig /tshwa cha phyed rnams zhib par btags pa chur sbyar te byugs</text></item>
<item><p>320b.7</p><section></section><text>na so rtsa dam zhing brtan par 'gyur ro/ /la la phud mer bsregs pa'i du ba kha la btang na so srin na ba la phan/ pa Ta ki Ti hong phen i'i 'bru'i du ba 'then pas so srin la phan/ rgun da'i kha 'brum dkar po mkhris pa dang</text></item>
<item><p>321a.1</p><section></section><text>lce skam pa la phan/ ma nu khrag can gyi nang gi khrag rkang lag gi ser kar byugs kyang phan zhing spos dkar gyi phye ma btab kyang phan no/ /bil ba'i nang gi 'bru/ ma dzu pha la/ lga gsum cha mnyam sbrang rtsir sbyar</text></item>
<item><p>321a.2</p><section></section><text>ba btang na khrag 'grim pa'i rigs chod do/ /mtshal/ ldong ros/ dngul chu/ shu dag dkar po/ /btsan dug /mu zi ser po rnams cha mnyam/ pho ris nyis 'gyur bcas zhag brgyad tsam gyi bar zhib par btags la 'bras</text></item>
<item><p>321a.3</p><section></section><text>tsam re rgyun du bsten na lus stobs rgyas/ dang kha 'byed/ drod che/ rlung rnams 'joms so/ /bu kar mul/ shu dag /pho ris/ kha ru tsha/ mtshal/ li shi/ dzA ti/ a ru ra rnams zhib par btags te ba</text></item>
<item><p>321a.4</p><section></section><text>mar dang sbyar nas skyu ru ra tsam re khong du btang na rlung khrag bad kan sogs 'dus pa'i nad kyis pho long gi yul zug gzer che ba rnams 'joms shing phan la sman bsten ring la 'o ma/ 'bras pag thug rnams las gzhan mi za'o/ /</text></item>
<item><p>321a.5</p><section></section><text>sha ma la Do Da'i dkyil gyi ljang gu de bzhi lnga re nyin ltar gyis zos na bad rlung mgo 'khor dang mig mi gsal ba la phan no/ /dngul chu/ so ma la kha ra/ mu zi ser po/ zi ra dkar po rnams cha mnyam phye mar byas pa lugs</text></item>
<item><p>321a.6</p><section></section><text>che chung ril ma las che tsam ma dog smug snum phreng ba byed ba de yin/ kong nang du blug ste kha dam par bcad la rlung mi 'chor bar byas/ de steng ras dang 'jim pas lan gsum gyi bar du sgril la me nyor kyi nang du zhag bdun gyi ring bzhag /de nas</text></item>
<item><p>321a.7</p><section></section><text>sa dong brus la me shin tu tsha pas nyin phyed kyi bar bsregs la grang ba dang bton te b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i khu ba sbyar te lus la bsku mnye byas na kong po dang za 'phrug shu thor sogs la phan no/ /ka ye rak+ta na dze ti yang zer pha la'i pags pa dang</text></item>
<item><p>321b.1</p><section></section><text>bye kar cha mnyam btags la btang na dngas ma tsha grang gis 'dzags kyang phan par 'gyur ro/ /yang ka ye pha la'i phags pa dang rgya gar stod ja gnyis cha mnyam zhib par btags pa gri khyi sogs rma gsar rnying gang la 'ang btab ste ras kyis</text></item>
<item><p>321b.2</p><section></section><text>bsdams la zhag gsum gyi ring kha ma phye bar bzhag des phan nges so/ /'bras dang shu ba gang la yang thog mar sa b+hu Na'i khu bas shin tu dag par bkrus/ de nas nI la tho tha'i phye ma btab la nyin gcig bzhag /nyin phyi ma</text></item>
<item><p>321b.3</p><section></section><text>nI la tho tha dang spos dkar cha mnyam zhib par btags pa til gyi snum dang bsres te cung zad nyed/ de nas chu glang klad cung zad re blugs pa dang lhan du nyin phyed tsam gyi bar du nyes pas mdog shin tu dkar ba zhig 'ong la de byugs</text></item>
<item><p>321b.4</p><section></section><text>pas myur du phan no/ /gnyan 'bur gyis skrangs par ba'i gci ba dang snum bsres pa'i skyo ma drod ma yal ba skrangs pa gang yin la byugs/ de ras kyis bsdams grang ba dang yang brje ba sogs byas pas myur du rnag tu smin par</text></item>
<item><p>321b.5</p><section></section><text>nus shing smin pa de brtol ba la lda ser mer bsregs pa chur brdar la gang brtol sar bug che chung ji ltar 'dod kyi rgyar yang yang byug pas myur du rdol 'ong ngo / spra tshil bzhu ste ras la btsags/ de steng ba mar btsags bcad pa</text></item>
<item><p>321b.6</p><section></section><text>blug ste dkrugs pas legs par 'dres pa mchu dang rkang lag gas par byugs na 'phral du phan no/ /tshigs pa drug pa'i phan tshun du sor bzhi re gzhal sar rtsa hrang nge ba yod pa de'i nang 'debs su me btsa' bzhag pas rlung khrag gis mgo bo na</text></item>
<item><p>321b.7</p><section></section><text>ba dang rtsa dkar la phan/ tshigs pa bco brgyad pa'i g.yas g.yon du sor gsum re gzhal ba'i sa dang bco brgyad rang gi steng ste gsum du me btsa' re bzhag pas rlung / grang ba/ rked pa na ba/ mkhal rtsa bral ba rnams la phan/</text></item>
<item><p>322a.1</p><section></section><text>tshigs pa lnga pa drug pa bdun pa gsum dang mdun gyi dkar nag mtshams su me btsa' re bzhag pas khrag gis brang tsha ba dang stod na ba sogs la phan zhing stod 'tshangs la de steng rke stong bya ra khung du'ang gcig bzhag pas</text></item>
<item><p>322a.2</p><section></section><text>phan no/ /lheng lheng rtse dbus su bzhag pa'i rgya gram sor gsum bsregs pas mkhris pa bad kan mchin skran rlung rnams la phan/ rke stong bya ra khung du me sgor mo a long lta bu bzhag na khrag skyugs pa dang khrag rlung la phan/ me nyams</text></item>
<item><p>322a.3</p><section></section><text>gsang gi g.yas g.yon mtshon re gzhal ba'i sar tshugs re bzhag pas rlung khrag dang khrag skran la pan/ pus mor tshigs chu 'khor na me long ru bzhir tshugs re bzhag pas khrag rlung chu ser sogs sel zhing khyad par rkyang bskum mi</text></item>
<item><p>322a.4</p><section></section><text>thub pa la phan/ zas 'grangs ltogs ma snyoms pa'i po ma 'ju glang thabs la mthil bzhir lcags leb me la dmar por song ba bsregs pa'i 'od ma reg tsam dang ras kyis dar ba 'byug bye pa res 'jog tu byas pas dri shin tu ngan pa zhig don</text></item>
<item><p>322a.5</p><section></section><text>yong zhing de nas myur du phan par 'gyur ro/ /nywa log 'khru skyugs kyi nad la zhag bzhi tshun du lag pa'i mkhrig ma gnyis sam de 'og bsgrad mkhyid gang gis/ dpung 'og gi nywa gnyis sog pa'i mthil gnyis/ brla'i nang gi nywa</text></item>
<item><p>322a.6</p><section></section><text>gnyis/ phyin dkyil gyi nywa nyis rnams la lcags mda' sor gsum pa zhig gis ser mdog thon tsam bsregs pas phan zhing tshan che na ltag khung spu 'khyel gyi thad kyi ltag pa'i chu leb gnyis dang rkang mthil gnyis bsregs na des phan</text></item>
<item><p>322a.7</p><section></section><text>nges so/ /sngar spyod kyi skyon yon rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba dang lus kyi gzi mdangs bzang ba ngan pa dang ngan pa bzang bar 'gyur ba byung na klu gdon gyi nad zhugs pa'i rtags yin pas sor mo nyi shu'i sen snying gi mtshams dang skra mtshams</text></item>
<item><p>322b.1</p><section></section><text>su 'phred la sor lnga ser mdog thon tsam bsregs pas de'i nad sel lo/ /rdo thal chu la sbyangs pa dang so phag rnying pa bsregs pa'i khu ba gnyis gang rung gi gdus du thang btang bas nywa log 'khru skyugs kyi skyug pa sogs skyug pa'i rigs</text></item>
<item><p>322b.2</p><section></section><text>mtha' dag chod do / ! /shrI ga Na shA ya na maH dpal tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi gdams pa/ phyogs gang du 'gro yang lam du nad gdon gnod pa sogs nyer 'tshe gang yang mi 'byung zhing / bya ba gang dang gang yin pa de bde blag tu</text></item>
<item><p>322b.3</p><section></section><text>'grub pa dang / zas gos gnas ma la sogs 'bad med du 'byur bar 'don na/ oMhrIhrIM/ glI pau/ /gAMgAM/ zhes pa 'di thog mar yan lag lnga khrus byas/ gu gul sogs spos kyi dud pa sngags bzla ba'i bar rgyun ma chad pa</text></item>
<item><p>322b.4</p><section></section><text>dang bcas zhag nyer gcig gi ring nyin rer brgya rtsa re ma chag par bzla ba bsnyen pa dang / de nas las spyor nye ring gang du 'gro ba'i dus tshar bdun re'am tha na'ang tshar re bzlas nas phyin na gong du smos pa ltar gnod pa med cing bsam pa thams</text></item>
<item><p>322b.5</p><section></section><text>cad 'grub par 'gyur ba sogs yon tan bsam las 'das pa 'byung nges so/ /na mas+s+wa ra s+t+yai/ 'phags ma dbyangs can ma'i bden tshig gi sngags/ ye ye/ sa paM/ prI yA bi duH ma haM hrIM/ bA ge shwa rI/ shrI ma hi ta no shak+ti/</text></item>
<item><p>322b.6</p><section></section><text>pra tso da ya ta/ ces pa 'di gza' mig dmar gyi res dang gnam gang nam byung la dri bzang po'i dud pa dang bcas tshar bdun re bzlas na bsam pa'i re ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhing / khyad par blo rno ba dang shes rab che bar 'gyur ro/ /oM A</text></item>
<item><p>322b.7</p><section></section><text>de sha gu ru sa ha ra kA ba ru/ kA mi k+Shu de bI/ ta ha bA sha/ a dza pAM rA Ni/ a dza r+pA rA d+d+hA ke pu tra/ sA ta ko na ko na/ tA ba ban+ng+ho/ tI dzA ri ban+ng+ho/ e kAM ta ra ban+ng+ho/ be haM ka rA ban+ng+ho/ na dI ban+ng+ho/ nA la ban+ng+ho/ nA le</text></item>
<item><p>323a.1</p><section></section><text>kA ka nA rA bad+hehUM / /i sa g+ha Ta/ paN+Di ra ha to/ a dza pAM rA nI/ lA dza me ri b+ha k+tI/ /ku ru ki shak+ti/ a dze pA la yo gi la dze phu ro/ man+t+ra I shwa rI bA tsA/ zhes pa'i sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas te nas la</text></item>
<item><p>323a.2</p><section></section><text>phu btab/ tshad pa'i rims nyin gcig pa/ gnyis pa/ gsum pa/ bzhi pa rnams gcig la phyi ma phan/ pa'i tshad rims rnams kyis na bar/ zla bo zhig gis thog mar nad pa'i mgo</text></item>
<item><p>323a.3</p><section></section><text>bo ras kyis bsdams te bzung la rang gis sngags 'dren zhing phus btab pa'i nas des mgo bo brab/ de nas nad par nad ga na 'dug dris la mgo bo phan na skye/ de nas stod/ sked pa sogs rim bzhin ras kyis bsdams pa spo zhing nas</text></item>
<item><p>323a.4</p><section></section><text>kyis brab pas mthar rkang pa'i mtheb mo'i bar byas pas nges par phan par 'gyur zhing slar yang mi 'byung ba'i ched du srad bur mdud pa bdun/ mdud pa rer sngags tshar re bzlas pa'i phus btab pa rke la btags so/ /shin tu zab/</text></item>
<item><p>323a.5</p><section></section><text>grong dang grong rdal gang la'ang mi phyugs kyi rims bsrung bar 'dod na thog mar lcags kyi gzer sor bzhi pa gzer mgo can bzhi/ de'i gdan gro gar chos 'byung gru gsum nyis brtsegs bris pa bzhi/ bya pho nag po gcig /chang</text></item>
<item><p>323a.6</p><section></section><text>bum pa gang / nas/ gro/ sran chung ma/ sran ma/ 'bras/ pad kha/ bra'o / /gzhan 'bru sna gang 'dzom tshon pa re rnams sta gon byas/ tho rengs shin tu snga bar rang gi mchan khung g.yon du bya pho kha phyir bstan la bcug /lcags</text></item>
<item><p>323a.7</p><section></section><text>gzer dang dril bu lag g.yon gyis 'khrol zhing bzung / lag g.yas kyis 'bru sna 'thor zhing ngag bsdams la 'og nas 'byung ba'i sngags 'dren/ zla bo zhig la chang bum bskur la des ku sha lta bus rang gang 'gro'i rjes la chang 'thor zhing yong /</text></item>
<item><p>323b.1</p><section></section><text>thog ma grong khyer gyi shar du slebs pa dang grogs chos 'byung gi re khA can sar bzhag /de steng 'bru sna cung zad blug cing chang gtor te chos 'byung gi dkyil du lcags gzer 'debs shing sngags tshar gcig 'don pa slar yang 'bru sna dang chang</text></item>
<item><p>323b.2</p><section></section><text>cung zad blugs nas bzhag /de nas lho/ nub rnams rim par gzer 'debs lugs sogs gong ltar byas rjes byang du sleb pa dang gzer chos 'byung gi steng du nyal stabs su bzhag la sngags 'dren zhing 'bru sna dang chang blug /sngags tshar</text></item>
<item><p>323b.3</p><section></section><text>gcig song ba dang / gro ga /gzer/ 'bru sna'i lhag /chang dang bcas khyer la lung stong mi med sa zhig tu phyin la bya pho kha phyir bstan la slong / de rjes su chang dang 'bru sna'i lhag phol khyim du log /thog ma khyem nas thon nas nang du ma sleb</text></item>
<item><p>323b.4</p><section></section><text>bar ngag dang phyir mig ma shor ba gal che zhing / nad log pa byung na slar yang 'dab bo/ /'dis ni mi phyugs gang gi yang rims sogs 'gos nad kyi rigs bsrung ba mi thub pa mi srid pa shin tu zab po/ /sngags ni/ o a saM ku bu tra brad+mA ki wa tsa bI</text></item>
<item><p>323b.5</p><section></section><text>tsa De/ nA ba ni raM ta rab+ha ye/ rAb+ha bA DI kA ra na ka re ni ta ShA dza la ga be/ a tsa la dI The stA ba na mi The ba ma ba na/ pha la to Da Sha i/ i ka Da bI ka Te tsa Da Sha ye/ tso ta tse ta ri de lbI bi ra ha na ba tA A ye/ me rI sa ka ta/ gu ru tI b+hak+ti phu ro man+t+ro I swa rI bA tsA</text></item>
<item><p>323b.6</p><section></section><text>ka Ta si re kI pA pi Da ga dza ma tIn ko hA ra pa n+yA ni gA lI pa n+yA Ti laM ka ki ya/ dza har laM ka kA ko Ta sa muM dra ki ShA I b+hA ga b+ha ga si ka nI Da ka ni na b+ha ga ta ba bI ra ha na baM ta kI do hA yI/ zhes pa'o/ /dgra jag rkun ma sogs kyis glags mi rnyed pa'i thabs ni/ oMn</text></item>
<item><p>323b.7</p><section></section><text>mo brah+ma I sa ri ra rak+Sha Tha Tha/ zhes pa 'di rngo kham bu tsam bdun la rdo re ra tshar btab ste sked ba'i g.yas g.yon dang rgyab tu rdo re bsdams/ lag pa gnyis su rdo gnyis re bzung la bsngags 'dren zhing phyin pas dgra jag gang gi 'ang glags mi rnyed do/</text></item>
<item><p>324a.1</p><section></section><text>byis pa skyes nas yang yang mi 'tsho ba la 'khor lo 'di gro ga la/ gla rtsi/ tsan+dan dkar po/ /ga bu ra/ gi haM/ gur gum/ si la/ a ka ru/ shug pa rnams cha mnyam brdar ba'i khu bas bris la srud pa gang rung gis bcings te mgul la btags na nges par 'tsho/ bud med mngal du byis pa chags kyang yang yang shor nas phan ma thogs pa'i rigs la 'khor lo 'di gro gar gong gi dri brgyud kyis bris la srad bus bcings te bud med de'i zla mtshan babs nas zhag gsum gyi thog sked par btags na 'jur bar mi 'gyur zhing nges par phan thogs so/ /'khor lo 'di gro ga la gur gum gyis bris/ gu gul gyi dud pas bdugs srad bu sna lngas bcings te mgul par btags na dug rigs thams cad thub nges so/ /'khor lo 'di gro gar dri brgyud kyis bris la / mgul la btags na 'byung po dang yi dwags gang gis kyang gnod pa mi 'byung ngo / /pho ba'i skran gyis na ba la/ gang na ba'i thad der 'be ta chus bkang ba bzung / de steng du 'khor lo 'di shog bur bris pa mes bsregs/ thal ba chu nang du 'bab pa byas/ chu de phyir pho/ de ltar nad ma drag par byas pas skran nad thon nges so/ /phru gu skye ma thub pa la 'khor lo 'di li sder la snag tshas bris te nad pa'i mig la bstan la re'u mig gi grangs dang ang+gi rnams 'di dang 'di zhes ngo sprod/ de nas chus 'khor lo bkrus la cung zad khong du btang zhing mgo nas bzung rim bzhin garong bas myur du btsa' bar 'gyur ro// phrug gu skyes nas ma la 'o ma 'thung rgyu med na/ 'khor lo 'di gza' mig dmar yod pa'i nyin gro gar/ si la/ tsan+dan dkar po/ /ga bur/ a ga ru/ gur gum rnams kyis bris la skud pas bcings te mgul du btags na 'o ma nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro/ | /nas gos sogs nang gi yo byad dang zhing sogs gang la'ang byi ba'i gnod pa srung na/ 'khor lo 'di gza' nyi ma yod pa'i nyin shog bur gur gum gyis tshar gyis tshar lnga bris te bsrung bya de'i zur bzhi dang / dbus su re re sbas na byi ba gnas gzhan du 'gro zhing / 'khor lo sbas pa'i nang tshun la gnod pa mi 'byung nges pa yang dag pa'o// / ya ma sogs mgo bo phyed na ba la 'khor lo 'di gza' nyi ma yod pa'i nyin gro gar dri brgyad kyis bris te skud pas bcings la mgo bor btags na myur du nad de las grol bar 'gyur ro// ! 'khor lo 'di tA la'i lo mar dri brgyad kyis bris la khrom gyi gang 'dug sa'i gdan lta bu'i 'og mnan na tshong gang 'dod pa de thogs med 'ong zhing rang rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /bza' mi rgyun du mi 'cham par 'thab mo kho na rgyag par/ 'khor lo 'di gro gar gi haM dang gur gum gyis bris la srad bus bcings te skyes pa'i lag pa g.yon dang / bud med kyi lag pa g.yas la btags na 'khrug pa med par shin tu mdza' bar 'gyur ba ni/ nges par myong bas grub pa'o/ /'khor lo 'di gro gar dri brgyad kyis bris te mgo bor btags na/ btson du chud pa lta bu rgyal po dang yul dpon sogs gang gis kyang bcings pa las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo 'di gza' nyi ma yod pa'i nyin gro gar dri brgyad kyis bris/ gu gul gyis bdugs te mgul du btags na/ shags 'gyed ba sogs la rang gis gang lar bden par gyur zhing pha rol po gnyis nas grangs med kyi bar ma la ngan gros rtsom pa sogs la 'di dag gi mdun ma zhig par gyur nas rang gi ngag btsan zhing dbang du 'gyur ro/ /rang gi gnyin bshes sogs mthun pa'i mi thag ring por song nas slar ma ldog na 'khor lo 'di shog bur bris la nyin bdun gyi bar nyin re bzhin 'khor lo re gang du song ba'i lam der 'phangs na nges par myur du 'ong bar 'gyur so/ /sbrum ma matsa' ma thub par 'khor lo 'di li sder la bris/ de thog mar bud med gyi mig la bstan/ de nas snum gyis 'khor lo bkrus te pho bar byugs na myur du btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ ! 'khor lo 'di gza' nyi ma'i nyin snag tshas shog bur bris la skud pas bcings te mgul la btags na rtsa dkar gyi nad thams cad la phan zhing khyad par yan lag dang ske rengs pa dang / 'dar ba dang / skam pa rnams la nges par phan no/ /khrag skyugs nas ma chod na/ nad pa'i lag pa g.yon gyi mthil du 'khor lo 'di bris/ de'i dbus su so ma ra tsa thun tshad chung phyogs tsam zhig bzhag /de la sngags ni/ oM hri/ hUM ldu swA hA/ zhes pa 'di brgya rtsa gcig bzlas la phus btab ste nad pa'i khong du btang na myur du chad nges so/ /mi phyugs gang gi yang chu sris nas na ba la 'khor lo 'di snod gang rigs la snag tshas bris/ sma ru mgo nag dkar po mi la gcig dang / phyugs la gnyis chu dang mnyam du brdar ba'i khu bas 'khor lo bkrus/ de khong du btang bas myur du phebs par 'gyur ro/ /nad pa tshad rlung 'thab pa sogs kha nas gang lab med pa byed pa sngangs sogs smyon pa lta bu 'chol zhing mtshan mo gnyid mi khugs pa sogs la/ grong bdun nas sol ba rdog po bdun gzhan gyis ma mthong ba byas la bslang / phyogs gang rigs nas rde'u bdun sgrugs te lam rgya gram yod pa'i 'dzom du rde'u re la sol rdog res gong gi 'khor lo zur gsum pa de 'dra re bris/ shar nas brtsams te phyogs bzhir rde'u re bor/ rde'u gnyis lam rgya gram gyi dbus der sbas / gcig khyer te nad pa'i sngas 'og tu sbas na sems dran pa zin zhing gnyid kyang khug par 'gyur ro/ /gong gi de dag byed skabs mis ma mthong ba gal che'o/ /mi nad cher med cing lus kyi zungs rims kyis zad pa'i 'chi la thug pa lta bu'i gcong gis zin zhing / sman pas kyang nad gang yin ngos mi zin pas bcos ka gang byas kyang mi phan na/ de ni bzang ngan gang rung gi mi kha phog pa'i nad yin pas de'i bcos la/ 'khor lo 'di shog bur tshar gnyis dang li sder lta bu'i ngos su tshar gcig bris/ shog bur bris pa gcig pa gcig khang pa'i phyi'i sa gang 'os su me la bsregs/ gcig nad pa'i mgul du btags/ li sder la bris pa de chus bkrus te khu ba khong du btang / de nas rkang lag gi sor mo bcu'i sen mo dang / spyi bo'i gtsug tu lcags tshugs re bzhag pas nges par phan no/ /skyes pa'i sgro ba skrangs pa dang / mi phyugs gang gi bu snod lugs pa la 'khor lo 'di lag mthil gnyis la bris/ lham gang rung gi mthil me la bsregs pa'i thal ba dang snum bsres pa lag mthil du phur te sgro ba'am bu snod gang yin la rag la cung zad btsir bcir byas pas phan par 'gyur ro/ /mig la sha cher gyi nad tshabs che ba byug na li snger gyi mthil du 'khor lo 'di snag tshal nang du chu blug /de la nad pa bltar bcug /them mi gcig pa bdun nas nas kyi sogs ma rkad re bslangs la/ rim bzhin sog ma re la me sbar te nad pa'i mgo bor lan gsum re bskor te chu nang du skyur bas chu'i mdog snum lta bur 'gyur 'gro zhing nad de phan par 'gyur ro/ /rmi lam bzang ngan sna tshogs mang du rmis na/ 'khor lo 'di gza' nyi ma'i nyin gro ga la dri brgyad kyis bris te rked par btags na rmi lam sna tshogs rmi bar mi 'gyur ro/ ! /oM na mo A de sha ya guru kum pa wa ni ru pi/ any+dza ni / dzA yo pu ta ha na wan+ta/ dri'/ mu Tha/ tatha/ tI dzA ri/ e kAn+ta rA / be tang+ga rA/ Da wa ru/ dzA nI dzA g+ha bA la/ ne kA la/ e te u/ pa ra ka ri/ ta kha/ dza la/ ba la/ b+ha'i b+hu ta/ me ri b+hak+ta/ gu ru ki shasti / phu ra man+t+ra/ pha Tu swA hA/ rkang lag sogs gnyan nad kyis skrangs 'bur gyis na bar sngags 'di tshar nyer gcig bzlas la sus btab cing rma bya'i sgro mdongs kyis byabs/ de rjes bal skud rkang bdun gcig tu sgril bar mdun pa bdun byas mdud pa re sngags tshar re btab ste nad pa'i mgul du btagasad na myur du nad de las gril bar 'gyur ro/ ! /o na mo A de sha gu ru ko/ si nA pU ra parba ta/ ta hA ba se/ d+ho dz+nyA rA tI/ rA ka shA NI ke/ tsA ra su tra te/ ko na ko na/ an+da su la/ dza la su la/ rAk+ta su la/ bA yu su la/ e te u pa ra/ ka re ta wa/ dza la/ ba la/ me ri b+hak+ta/ gu ru ki shak+Shi/ phu ro man+t+ra/ pa Tu swA hA/ zhes pa'i sngags 'di la la phud mang nyung cha lnga la tshwa cha gcig tsam bsres par btab pa khog par btang / de rjes chu skol hub gang tsam 'thungs bcug na/ srin nad/ glang thabs/ ma 'ju ba/ zas phog byung ba sogs pho ba'i nad glo bur ba phral du phan par 'gyur ro/ ! /'khor lo 'di gza' nyi ma'i res la gro gar lga ser gyis bris/ oM na mo A de sha gu ru ko gang+ga / ya mu nA/ sA d+ha sa ti/ gau tsa rA khe/ gau rA kha Sha dza ti na a we/ mu kha/ na pA ke/ ShA re/ lA la/ go khA la ki/ bA tsa phu rI/ me ri b+hak+ta/ gu ru tI sha sti/ phu ro man+takwa/ pha Tu swA hA/ zhes pa 'di lan bdun bzlas la 'khor lor phus btab ste phyugs ra'i dbus su sbas na kha tsha gor sogs phyugs nad thams cad thub/ de yang nad ma byung gong du byas na bsrung thub/ phyugs nad byung nas byas na de zhi zhing slar 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ ! /oM dz+ha swA hA/ shrI yo lak+Sh+mI na rA ya Na man+t+ra/ sa ha ra kA wa ru/ ka mi k+ng+b+ya de wi/ te ti sa ko Ta de wa tA / ba sun+ng+ha rI/ mar+j+he mA sa ne/ ru She/ br-i Shi/ hA De+e/ bA Di/ e te rak+Sh+ya ka ra NI/ nai nA yo ge nA kI do A+o/ ke hu ka ho/ a ro/ /sI ka ho/ ba ro sbo ka ho/ pi sha la he/ bi sa wa la ho/ To na ho/ TA ma Na ho/ I Tha ho/ dI Tha ho/ mu Tha/ e ti rak+ShA ka ra Ni/ nainA yo ge nA kIdo A+o/ /zhes pa'i sngags 'di skud pa nag po la mdud pa bdun btab pa la bsngags te ske la btags na mi kha'i rigs thams cad dang / mtshan mo gnyid la har lang dred langs sogs la phan nges so/ ! /kA tsa ka Da wa/ b+ha re a/ ka pu ra/ rak+Shu bA bA a da ma hA dzu ra/ bA bA A da ma ki tshu ri/ pha ra dzan+ta kA bA na/ me ri mu kA i/ nA mu ka sa/ ta ba gu ru/ go ra Sha kI do hA I/ la ma kA kA ko Ta/ sa mu dra kI khA i/ phAT pha Ta na phAT sa ta ba rA dza rA ma tsan+d+ra kyo do hA i/ phu ro man+t+ra I shwa rI bA tsa/ sngags 'di ba lang gi gci ba'i thal bar bsngags la skrangs pa gang yod sar byugs na gnyan 'bur mtha' dag la phan zhing khyad par rke na ba la mchog tu phan no/ ! /oM ga dzan+ta/ g+ho ra ta/ a wa ra/ tsha ra tshi du/ u tA ra ta a wa tA ha ya/ na wa nA ri/ bA ha tra/ ko ThA/ su Sha pa ra ta/ A wa ta ya/ kA ha te A wa ta ha ya/ gaD+ha ga ya nI te/ A ba ta ha ya/ kA wa ru ko/ ko ta wa la/ de li ko pA/ tA sA ha/ se Sha se lA ra/ ru ra ka ni ke pu ta/ ma ha ma dA/ bi ra man+t+ra ba d+ha ta/ bAng+he khu rA sA na b+he dz+ye/ b+hu ta bAn+ng+hi/ bre ta bAn+ng+hi/ de wa bAn+ng+hi/ d+ha no bAn+ng+hi/ ma ri ya ma sA na bAn+ng+hi/ kA la bai ro bAn+d+hi/ aSh+Ta b+hair wa bAn+ng+hi/ lo ha ro/ ba Do nA seng+g+ha sa b+ha bAn+ti/ pA na na phu la ko bAn+d+hi/ te la ta le ko bAn+ng+hi/ b+hA ta du ta ko bAn+ng+hi/ ka ra Na ka ra ru hi ko bAn+ng+hi/ She raM She re k+She tra pA la bAn+ng+hi/ a Tho ta ra so ni nA i bAn+to/ bA tA s+ya ma sA na bAn+ng+hi/ te ra gya ka ru wa bAn+d+hi/ /tsau ha s+ya b+hen+sA su ra bAn+ng+hi/ saM Sha ni/ DaM ka ni bAn+d+hi/ pa ta k+Sha ni bAn+d+hi/ be ga na bAn+ng+ha to bA bA A da ma ki do hA i/ bI bi phA ta mA ki de hA i/ su wa ra mu ra dA ra/ bi bi pha ta ma ki dA pha na gi re/ na wa lASha/ a saM hA dzA ra/ bi ra pe kasba ra bA d+hi Da ri/ a wa de Sho ro/ ma hA ma dA pi ra te re man+t+ra ki shak+ti/ u ta ra ko u ta ra bAn+ng+hi/ dak+Sha Na ko dak+Sha Na bAn+ng+hi/ pash+tse ma ko pash+tse ma bAn+ng+hi/ pUrba ko pUrba bAn+ng+hi/ kA Tha ki ro Di bAn+ng+hi/ phi re ma ha me dA pAM ra/ se Sha si lA ra pa d+ha ta man+t+ra/ bA bye DA bI me ri bAk+ti/ gu ru tI shak+ti phu ro man+t+ra i shA rI bA tsa/ sor mo'i nad dang lba ba la sngags 'di su hrug dmar por bris shing / 'bras zan dang 'o mar yang btab ste/ de nas lba ba dang sor mo gang yin la su hrug des dkri sa 'o ma dang 'bras zan bsres pa des brab na phan no/ ! /oM na mo A de sha gu ru kuM/ oM kA ra bin+da san+Yuk+ta/ ni ng+yad+h+ya yan+ti yo ge shwa raM/ kA ma raH mo k+Sha dash+tse wa/ oM kA rA ya na mo na maH na ma ste r-i Sha ya de wA na ma ste tsa su ra ga NA/ na rA nA ma s+ya/ de wa su na kA rA ya na mo nA maH ma hA de wa/ ma hA ta mA ni/ ma hA yo gi ma he shwa ra/ ma hA pa ta ka /ha raM de wa ma kA rA ya na mo na maH shi wa sAn+taM dza gan+nA thaM/ lo kA nAM shAn+taM ka ra NaM/ shi pa me ka ya re de waM/ sha kA rA ya na mo na maH bA ha rna bri Sha b+hash+tsai wa bA su ki kaSh+Tha b+hu sha naM/ bA ma shak+ti d+ha ro de waM/ ba kA rA yan mo na maH ya tra ta tra/ tra ya de wA b+h+rah+mA biSh+tu/ ma te shwa raM/ ya ga ta kA ra tA/ dza gan+nA thaM ya kA rA ya na mo na maH oM kA re mu la tsakra/ na kA re nA b+hi maN+Da le/ ma kA re z-i da ya s+tha na sa kA re/ kaN+Da me wa tsa/ ba kA re ba kra s+tha la/ ya kA re pu dzo ti ya ga traH zhes pa yi ge drug la brten pa'i sngags 'di stan bde ba la 'dug ste rang gis rgyun du bzlas na lus kyi nad thams cad la phan zhing / khyad par rlung mkhris bad kan gsum 'dus pa'i nad sman dpyad gang gis kyang ma phan pa'i rigs la sngags 'di bzlas shing rma bya'i sgro mdongs kyis bya ba na nges par phan par 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo 'di gro ga la dri brgyad kyis bris/ srad bus bcings te ske la btags pas mon mtshams la 'ong ba'i dug ma zhes pa lta bus mi'i rigs kyi mthong dug /reg dug /thog dug rnams kyi gnod pas mi tshugs pa'i bsrung ba yang dag pa'o/ /mda' gri sogs gang gis rma byung ba la/ oM a ru kI/ lA la i Ni/ ban+d+hau g+hA u/ oMtsan+d+ra mA ta/ sUr+ya pi tA/ biDa kartA/ ma nu pa Tu/ bA yu/ bA mu ha nu man+ta kI/ shak+ti phu re/ zhes pa'i sngags 'di gang mang bzlas/ rma gang yin la phus btab pas myur du phan par 'gyur ro/ ! /'khor lo 'di gza' nyi ma'i nyin gro gar dri brgyad kyis bris la sker btags/ tshad rims ma byung ba la 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / byung ba la yang myur du drag par 'gyur ro/ /mes tshig pa la/ oM ma tI Sha/ bA sa ni/ ma hA bi d+ya/ dzam+b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ u tshe da ya/ A g+hi/ s+t+waM b+ha ya/ ThaHThaH zhes pa 'di gang mang bzlas la phus btab/ 'byor na til phye mar btags pa 'o ma dang sbyar nas byugs pas myur du phan par 'gyur zhing / til ma 'byor kyang sngags kho nas zug gzer drag par 'gyur ro/ /mi phyugs gang yin kyang chur shor nas khog pa chus gang ste 'chi bar thug pa la/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ ru drwa ya dza lo s+t+waM b+ha ya/ baHpaH zhes pa 'di gang mang bzlas la rkang pa nas yar phus btab na 'bral du skyug par 'gyur zhing chu nad kyis zin pa la sngags 'di bzlas la rma bya'i sgro la bsngags te mgo bo nas mar byabs pas phan par 'gyur ro/ ! /'khor lo 'di shog bur rgyal dang phur bu 'jom pa'i nyin bris/ tsan dan dkar po/ /gla rtsi/ gur gum/ gsum byugs/ tshon skud sna lngas bcings la sker btags na tshe ring ba/ nad med pa/ longs spyod 'phel ba gzhan gyi yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa yon tan dpag tu med cing / khyad par rang la brnag pa'i dgra gang yin pa de dbang du 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /gshin 'dre'i gnod pa la/ 'khor lo 'di gshin 'dre de'i 'chi sa gang yin gyi sa rtsad chod na de dang / bsrung bya gang yin de'i phyi sgo la sin+d+hU ra'i khu bas bris na khyem de'i mi nor gang la'ang gnod pa mi 'byung nges dag pa'o/ /pho mo gang la'ang 'dra ste zha 'og skrangs nas na ba la/ oM re tsho ra~M` ra~M` oM ra~M` tsho ra~M` oM/ zhes pa'i sngags yig 'bru bcu pa 'di gci ba'i thal bar bsngags thute byugs na myur du phan par 'gyur ro/ /rkang lag gi tshigs chen sogs rus pa na zhing khyug la gzer na/ badzraM kI ShI bi lo he kA ko ShA/ i shwa ra ku tsi/ brad+mA tA laH I sa piN+Da ha mA re pa ya Tha/ i sha paN+Di ku/ dza tI go ra Sha rak+Sha ba la/ zhes pa'i sngags 'di rma bya'i sgro mdongs la bsngags te lan bdun byabs na phan par 'gyur ro/ ! /khyi smyon gyi bcos la/ hA kA tse lA/ bra sa kA/ g+ha Da ShIlu/ sI ba ka ru/ la ka DI/ nI li pi le/ ka pa Di/ li yA brah+ma kA/ dreSha/ tuMhaM/ tshoN+Da naM/ ga phi ra mu kha kA de sa/ zhes pa'aM sngags 'dis sbyin po'i 'dam bag lag gnyis kyis snol zhing sngags tshar gsum re bzlas nas phus btab la nad pa'i mgo bo nas rkang pa'i bar byabs/ yang gong bzhin sngags bsgrangs la 'jim par phus btab nad par byabs/ de 'dra lan kha yar byas nas 'jim pa bcad la bltas pas khye dkar pos 'changs pa yin na khye spu dkar po dang / nag po yin na nag po sogs khye gang yin gyi mdog dang mthun pa'i khye spu 'byung la/ de yang khyi spu grangs bdun nam byung bar bldabs nas bya/ bdun byung ba dang 'jim pa chur skyur bas nad de las nges par grol lo/ ! /so na ba la/ shog bur nad pa'i ming bris/ de ka ba'am gdung gi logs la sbyar/ lcags gzer sor gsum pa zhig ming yig gi steng du bzung la/ oM na mo A de sha gu ru kuM/ ha Di/ ku ha Di/ la ga ki Da/ a si b+har+Sha ki/ ban+ng+ho pi Da/ ki Da dza re/ pi Da mA re/ sa ma ya la/ dzo gi ki/ bA tsa/ me ri/ bak+ta/ gu ru ki shak+ti/ phu ro man+d+ra/ oM na mo A de sha/ zhes pa'i sngags 'di tshar re bzlas la lugs gzer la tho ba cung zad re brdeg /tshar bdun song ba dang sor do tsam gyi bar stim pas myur du phan cing / gzer ma bud bar slar yang na bar mi 'gyur ro/ ! /'khor lo 'di gza' zla ba'i nyin gro gar gi haM dang gur gum gyes bris la/ mgul du btags na bkra shis shing bsam pa'i don thams cad 'grub bo/ /lha mo dbu mas dbang phyug la gsol pa/ 'jig rten kun gyi byed po dbang phyug che/ /kun la phan phyir 'chi med che'i bcud len/ /bskal pa bskal par rdo rje ltar gnas pa/ /nga yis 'dri yi khyod kyis bshad du gsol/ /zhes gsol pas dbang phyug gis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig lha sras yid 'ong ma/ /kun phan 'chi med che'i bcud len/ /karko Ti yi cho ga rnams/ /legs par bstan gyis yid la zung / /de la karkoTi yod sar phyin gza' nyi ma yod pa'i dus la lus legs par bkrus te/ oM na mo ma he sho ri sid+hi shwa ra brnya brnya hu hu phaT swA hA/ zhes pa'i sngags 'di bzla zhing rtsa rtse ma lus pa brkos te gtsang sar grib bskam bya/ bskams pa dang zhib par btags gza' nyi ma yod pa'i dus pa se ba bzhi tsam ba'i 'o ma dang sbrang rtsir sbyar/ nang 'gol sar mtshams bcad/ 'bras btsos pa dang ba'i 'o ma cung zad re las gzhan za btung gi rigs mi byed cing khyad par tshwa ma shor ba gal che zhing tho rengs thang re gtong ba zla ba drug gi bar bsten pas zla ba bzhi song ba dang / skra/ kha spu/ ba spu sogs/ lus kyi spu thams cad byi 'gro zhing / de nas zla ba phyed gnyis tshun la skra dang kha spu sogs gsar pa shin tu legs pa skyel/ skyes pa dang zla ba phyed gnyis kyi bar karko Ta'i 'bru kho na zhib par btags pa thun tshad gong bzhin sbrang rtsi dang bsres pa zos pas lus yang ba dang / gzi brjid che ba dang / sems bde ba dang / nad med pa sogs 'byung zhing / bya rog gnyis kyi tshe tshad ste lo stong gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas zla ba gnyis dang zhag nyi shu'i bar 'bras bu mar dang bsres pa bsten pas bya rog gnyis kyi tshe tshad ste lo nyis stong thub cing nyis stong du slebs pa dang gnyid du song ba lta bu'i lus sems ma bral kyang smra brjod sogs mi thub pa zhig 'ong skebs karko Ta'i 'bru dang dngul chu/ mu zi ser po gsum cha mnyam b+h+ring+ga rA dza' khya bas rta byas nas gtong lugs slob ma lta bur bslabs la bzhag /de nas dran pa rnyed pa dang de ga'i mu 'thud la lo gcig gi bar zos pas lo bzhi stong thub cing / de nas kyang mu 'thud du zos pas chu la mi 'bying / mkha' la bya ltar 'phur ba dang / lus la me chu mtshon la sogs pas mi phigs te/ de ni lus rdo rje dang 'dra ba'o/ /kye rigs sras lha mo/ /'di'i nus pa dang phan yon ni tshul bzhin du ngas kyang brjod par mi nus mod/ 'on kyang cho ga sogs rags pa tsam zhig bstan zin gyis snying dang 'dra bar chongs la 'gro ba'i don gyis shig ces gdams so/ /'khor lo 'di gro ga 'am shog bu la ba'i 'o mas bris la srad bu dkar pos bcings te btags na nad rims thams cad thub cing yod la 'dod pa 'grub po/ /'khor lo 'di tA la'i lo ma'am grog la mu zi ser posad bris la btags na shin tu mgyog pas rkang pa na bar mi 'gyur ro/ /tsa kra 'di gro ga la gi haM gis bris la bu dkar pos bcings te btags na rgyal po dang blon po dbang du 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo 'di shog bu la/ tsan dan dmar po/ gi haM ga bur/ a ka ru gla rtsi gu gul gumar gum rnams kyis bris la mgul du btags na gang 'dod pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ 'khor lo 'di gro ga 'am sin+d+hU ras bris te gu gul gyi dud pa btang ste lag pa g.yas la btags na bud med dbang du 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo 'di shog bu la ri dwags kyi khrag gis bris te btags na ri dwags 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo 'di gro ga 'am shog bu la dri brgyad kyis bris te btags na 'byung bo dang yi dwags kyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo / /'khor lo 'di gi haM gis grog la bris te btags na grags pa che bar 'gyur ro/ /ri sgog rtsa rtse ma rnyings ma rul ba grib bskam byas la zhib par btags ba mar gsar pas rta byas la ril bu skyu ru ra tsam re btang na grang ba dang rlung gi rigs mtha' dag la phan zhing lus kyis sobs 'phel zhing 'dod pa spyod mi nus pa yang nus par 'gyur ro/ gong gi ri sgog sbrang rtsis rta byas nas btang na bud med zla mtshan ma babs pa'i khrag gi nad la mchog tu phan no/ /chu grang gis rta byas nas sna khrag gang gis kyang mchod pa'i snar blug na myur du chod par 'gyur ro/ /yang sna khrag kyang 'dzag cing mgo bo na na/ ri sgog gi 'bras bu mar btsags bcad pa'i nang du ma tshig par bcos pa dang pi pi ling cha mnyam pa zhib par btags pa bod kyi thun tshad gsum tsam re khong du btang bas khrag chod cing nad kyang phan no//zhum bu'i lce grib skam byas la zhib par btags la se ba bcu drug tsam re btang</text></item>

<item><p>332a.7</p><section></section><text>grub| /shi la dza ng+hu gdus pa thang du btang/ /bu bcas sked pa na dang pho na 'joms/ /dug nyung phag brun sbre ro ma nyid brun/ byung na rab cha mnyam nus ldan bsregs pa snum dang sbyar/ /khong btang phyi la byugs pas zha grum nad/ /gsar rnying kun la btang</text></item>
<item><p>332b.1</p><section></section><text>bas 'joms par nges/ /glang chen lci ba'i dud pa mngal na btang / /bu dang sha ma phral du thon par nges/ ! /bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /grub thob chen po gorga nA thas gsungs pa'i dri chu'i rtags la nyin re'i legs nyes brtag pa ni/ dge slong</text></item>

<item><p>332b.3</p><section></section><text>ba spu mthong ba tsam la dri chu dor la de la brtag pa ste/ gsang gnas kyi kha nas dri chu g.yas ngos su 'khyogs nas 'gro na de'i nyin bkra shis shing bde legs dang ldan la bya ba gang brtsams kyang 'grub pa sogs shin tu legs so/ /gzhogs g.yon du 'gro na</text></item>
<item><p>332b.4</p><section></section><text>'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang 'phrog bcom sogs 'byung zhing bya ba brtsams kyang mi 'grub la/ gtam mi snyan pa thos pa sogs 'byung ngo / /chu bying thad kar 'gro zhing gsar gnas kyi mtshams nas 'og tu thigs pa babs na zas gos sogs yid dang mthun pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>332b.5</p><section></section><text>nor zhig nges par rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /gsang gnas kyi mtshams nas chu rkang gcig la de nas gnyis su gyes shing slar gcig tu 'dril nas 'gro na nye du mdza' bshes sogs yid dang mthun pa'i mi phyogs su song ba zhig nges par 'khor zhing 'phrad par 'gyur ro/ /thog</text></item>
<item><p>332b.6</p><section></section><text>mar 'dril zhing de nas leb mo srab por 'gro la slar yang 'dril nas 'gro na rgyal po'i chad pa'am rku jag stor sogs nor la god kha 'byung ngo / /chu bying lbu ba dang bcas nas 'gro zhing 'og tu thigs pa yang 'bab la sar babs pa rnams kyang 'khor zhing lbu ba dang bcas</text></item>
<item><p>332b.7</p><section></section><text>na char chen po 'byung ngo / /sgra dang bcas te byung na mi 'gyangs par byes su 'gro dgos 'byung ngo / /dgo ru ltar g.yon du gcus nas thad kar 'gro na de nyin nor stor ba rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /chu phar mi 'gro ba gyen du tshur log nas gsang gnas kyi steng du 'bab na zhag</text></item>
<item><p>333a.1</p><section></section><text>bcu gsum song ba'i nyin nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /g.yas su gcus nas 'gro na nor stor ba'ang zhag khungs 'dzol ba lta bu ma rnyed pa zhig rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /de rnams rnam dpyod dang ldan pas ma 'khrul bar brtags nas</text></item>
<item><p>333a.2</p><section></section><text>so sor bshad pa'i 'bras bu nges par 'byung ba ni myong bas grub pa'o/ ! /zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dga' byed kyi bden pa'i gtam rang gi lus kyi grib mar legs nyes brtag pa ni/ tshes bco lnga'i mi khye'i skad sogs sems can mi gnas pa'i rkyen med pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>333a.3</p><section></section><text>gnas dben par nam mkha' sprin dang khug rdul sogs kyi grib ma med pa'i shin tu dwangs pa'i skabs brtag ste/ lus gcer bur phyung la lus drong por bsrangs te langs lag pa gnyis cha mnyam du brkyengs/ zla ba rgyab tu khur te brtags la/ de yang</text></item>
<item><p>333a.4</p><section></section><text>thog mar sa la shar ba'i grib ma'i mthe bong nas rim bzhin gyen du 'dzegs te mig dang thad mnyam gyen phyogs kyi nam mkha' la grib ma sprin lta bu zhig 'char la/ de yang nam mkha' 'char ba'i grib ma der lus kyi dbyebs med par zla ba nya lta bu'i bzo dbyibs</text></item>
<item><p>333a.5</p><section></section><text>la shin tu dkar ba zhig snang na tshe ring nad med sdug bsngal mi 'byung / bsod nams dang longs spyod mnga' thang rgyas/ grags pas sa steng khyab pa sogs shin tu legs so/ /lus gzhan mi gsal bar mgrin pa gcig po mthong na sems la sdug</text></item>
<item><p>333a.6</p><section></section><text>bsngal chen po 'byung ngo / /lus thams cad tshang zhing de yang skrangs pa'i dbyibs lta bu sbom por mthong na myur du nad drag po 'byung ngo / /tshad dbyibs sbom phra sogs rang gi lus dang mtshungs par mthong na nad mi 'byung zhing legs so/ /lus bying gsal la mgo</text></item>
<item><p>333a.7</p><section></section><text>bo med na zla ba drug nas nges par 'chi'o/ /lag pa gnyis mi gsal na rang la yang nad 'byung zhing spun zla gcig nges par 'chi'o/ /kha dog nag por snang na nor la god kha chen po 'byung ngo / /brla g.yas g.yon gang rigs la bug pa 'dug na chung ma nges par 'chi'o/</text></item>
<item><p>333b.1</p><section></section><text>lte ba'i thad du bug pa 'dug na 'thab mo dang kha mchu rtsod pa sogs 'byung ngo / /gib ma shin tu ring zhing mgrin pa mi mthong na/ yul gyi rgyal po sogs mi chen po zhig 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /sol ba'i mdog lta bu nag por mthong na/ sa zhing dang nor rdzas la sogs</text></item>
<item><p>333b.2</p><section></section><text>pa longs spyod gzhan gyis 'phrog par 'gyur ro/ /ser por mthong na gzhan gyi mi kha 'bab po/ /dkar por mthong na nad med cing longs spyod thob pa sogs mchog tu legs so/ /mig mi mthong na yid dang mthun pa'i mdza' grogs 'chi ba'am nor stor ba sogs</text></item>
<item><p>333b.3</p><section></section><text>kyis sems la sdug bsngal 'byung ngo / /lus kyi cha shas thams cad tshang zhing gsal la kha dog dkar zhing bkrag dang ldan na lo drug tshun chad du 'chi pa'i 'jigs pa med cing nad drag po mi 'byung ngo / /longs spyod dang snyan grags 'phel zhing bde skyid phun sum</text></item>
<item><p>333b.4</p><section></section><text>tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba 'di yang dag pa'o/ /zhes phyi nang drang srong gi tshe'i rig byed rgya mtsho lta bu'i nang nas mang dag yul dbus 'gyur 'chang du gtsug lag gnyis pa shes pa'i mkhas mang la bsten nas dar rgyas su yod pa'i sman dpyad la mkhas pa kha ba can gyi</text></item>
<item><p>333b.5</p><section></section><text>ljongs 'dir du ma zhig 'ongs tshod du 'dug rung paN+Di ta smr-i ti phan tshun skad kyi brda ma 'phrod pas rta nag tu lug rdzi mdzad pa'i lo rgyus ltar ci yin cha ma 'tshal bar rang yul du phyir ldog ste gzhan phan gyi 'phrin las ma byung ba dang / la las tshe'i rig byed shes pa'i rna</text></item>
<item><p>333b.6</p><section></section><text>thos tsam go yang bod kyi gso rig pas chog shes pas/ legs bshad rin po cher/ tsan dan gser las rin che ba/ /blun pos sol bar byas la ltos/ /zhes pa ltar shes bzhin khyad gsod kyis dor ba'ang mchis rung rab byung bcu gcig pa'i shing</text></item>
<item><p>333b.7</p><section></section><text>'brug gi lor shAkya mu ne'i pho brang chen po'i mdun phyogs rgya gar ba'i mi rigs du ma tshogs khrod du sman pa mkhas pa zhig yod dam zer ba'i gtam thos pas rkyen byas 'dar pa lo chen dri mol byed du bcug pa 'phags yul nub phyogs ma ho ra'i sa'i char bram ze gtsang</text></item>
<item><p>334a.1</p><section></section><text>ma'i rigs su skyes pa saM n+ya se go da ra rany+tsor ste khyim spangs sa spyod ces bya bas rgya gar dbus/ shar/ nub/ lho/ byang / nai pA la dang bcas pa chu bzhin myul nas slob dpon go ta ma b+har+thi/ ut+tA ma gi ri/ u kA ra b+har+thi sogs</text></item>
<item><p>334a.2</p><section></section><text>gus pas bsten pa'i mkhas pa chen por rtogs te 'dar pa paN chen gyis lo tsA ba kyis dar mo sman rams par bslab tu bcug par gso rig gi lag len ngo mtshar ba du ma byung rung phyogs 'dir mi rnyed pa'i sman gyi rigs 'tshol bar rgya bal phyogs su phyir bteg /</text></item>
<item><p>334a.3</p><section></section><text>bal po yam bu'i rgyal blon la rogs don dgos tshul gyi sde pa'i hung rgya'i mtshams sbyor song ba la brten sman gyi rigs rnam grangs shin tu mang ba dang bcas me mo sbrul lo'i dbyar 'byor pa'i rgya bal gyi slob dpon mkhas pa rnams kyi zhal gyi bdud rtsi las 'ongs pa'i tshe'i</text></item>
<item><p>334a.4</p><section></section><text>rigs byed kyi man ngag gnad kyi snying po bsdus pa 'di nyid mi chos gnad phreng las/ sngon dus bod 'di srin po'i rgyal khams 'dra/ /ding sang dus su rgya gar 'phags yul 'dra/ /bsams kyin lo tsA bod la dka' drin che/ /zhes dang / sa skya paN+Di tas/</text></item>
<item><p>334a.5</p><section></section><text>bde bar gshegs pa'i gzhung lugs bla na med/ /zhu chen sgyur byed mchan bu'i gnas thob pa/ /skad gnyis smra mkhas lo tsA de dag ni/ /de dag bdag cag rnams kyi mig bzhin gyur/ /zhes gsungs pa ltar/ pA Ni byA ka ra Na sogs sgra mdo chen po bzhi la</text></item>
<item><p>334a.6</p><section></section><text>blo gros kyi lang tsho mchog tu rgyas pa se dkar rigs kyi thig le 'dar pa lo tsA ngag dbang phun tshogs lhun grub kyis bsgyur cing gso ba rig pa'i gzhung lugs la slob dpon mkhas pa bcu phrag tsam bsten nas sbyangs pa'i yar stod dar mo sman rams pa blo bzang</text></item>
<item><p>334a.7</p><section></section><text>chos grags kyis 'bad pa chen pos gtan la phab pa'o/ /chu gter slar yang ma bsrubs sngon med pa'i/ /rig byed bdud rtsi'i bum pa thob pa'i tshe/ /mes pos dran pa'i gso dpyad dbyar skyes kyi/ /rnga gsangs de la mos pa cung zad lhod/ /ti</text></item>
<item><p>334b.1</p><section></section><text>se'i mdangs ltar rab dkar lhag pa'i yid/ /lus can tshogs la rjes chags kun+da'i tshal/ /'dzum pa'i cho ga gtong min sems bskyed kyi/ /bsil sbyin mkhan po'i cha shas nye bar dgang / /phyogs brgyar zegs ma 'thor ba kaSh+pu ra'i/ /dad pas</text></item>
<item><p>334b.2</p><section></section><text>tsha gdung bcil la mtshar 'dzin na/ /yongs grub brgya dang rtsa gcig bro nad gnyen/ /sman gyi dpag bsam 'khri shing 'di sus bskrun/ /ris su ma chad 'gro ba 'jigs bral ba'i/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs rgyal sras kyi/ /rlabs chen spyod la 'jug rnams</text></item>
<item><p>334b.3</p><section></section><text>sangs rgyas zhes/ /grags can bgrod dka'i sa de mi ring snyam/ /bzod min tshor ba drag po'i nad gnod dang / /de rgyu sgrib gnyis lus pa med bcas pa/ /'joms pa'i sman pa ches mchog rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'grub pa'i skal ba bzang por bdag 'gyur shog /</text></item>
<item><p>334b.4</p><section></section><text>tsan dan 'byug dang te'us brdeg pa la/ /snyoms par zhal 'che'i thugs rje snyigs dus 'dir/ /bskul na 'jig rten gsum gyi duHkha rnams/ /mkhyen brtse nus pas pha mthar mdzad du gsol/ /'gro mang srog zungs bcud len bdud rtsi'i gter/ /myangs pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>334b.5</p><section></section><text>'bras bu nam mkhas gzhal dka' ba'i/ /dge tshogs ma lus mtha' bral sems can kun/ /bla med byang chub 'thob pa'i rgyu ru bsngo/ /zhes tshe'i rig byed mtha' dag gi snying po bsdus pa'i glegs bam gyi che brjod bsgyur byang smon lam gyi rim pa 'di ni za hor gyi ban+de</text></item>
<item><p>334b.6</p><section></section><text>tshangs sras bzhad pa'i rdo rjes dmar ser can gye lo khrums kyi zla ba'i dkar cha'i rgyal ba dang po'i tshes la rgyal khab chen po po ta lar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong 'jam dbyangs grags pas bgyis pa dza yan+tu// //[]@/ /'phags yul pha ha'i sman pa da na da sa'i sman bcos rnams bzhugs so/ /</text></item>
<item><p>334b.7</p><section></section><text>dan rog dang mu zi ser po gnyis cha gnyis re/ dngul chu/ rgya mtshal/ tshal dkar cha re rnams zhib par btags pa'i phye ma la bye dkar sbyar nas chu skol gyis phul nas btang na/ chu nad tsha grang med par sbyong / lus zungs nad stobs dang sbyar te thun gyi kha grangs</text></item>
<item><p>335a.1</p><section></section><text>dpag ste bya/ lcag sogs sgyi dang 'dra/ phyi'i byug sman la/ thar nu khaN+Da/ cu gang / shing mngar/ rgya gar stod ja rnams zho do re/ shu dag /gser mdog /zi ra dmar po rnams zho gsum re/ sman chen zho gang / gla rtsi se ba brgyad/</text></item>
<item><p>335a.2</p><section></section><text>du ba ral pa zho brgyad rnams thog mar so sor btags la bsres nas btags pa'i phye ma lcags snod du chu la sbyar te gar sla zho tsam byas byugs pas phan no/ /ga pur/ zi ra dkar po/ pho ba ris/ rgyam tsha/ sbrang rnams cha re/ bye dkar cha gnyis rnams zhib par</text></item>
<item><p>335a.3</p><section></section><text>btags pa'i ril bu sgyu ngur tsam chu grang gis rta byas btang bas bad kan dang rlung / tshad pa rnyings pa rnams la brten pa'i glo la phan/ ga bur/ ku ci la/ mer bsregs nas pags pa phud pa/ sa mu dra so Sha/ a phi ma/ a ka ra ka ra rnams cha mnyam zhib</text></item>
<item><p>335a.4</p><section></section><text>btags lug gi ril ma tsam re chu grang gis phyul te nyin bcu bzhi'i bar bsten na dbang po las su rung shing 'dod pa spyod nus par 'gyur ro/ /gi haM dang 'jam 'bras zho re/ dom mkhris dang ni la tho tha zho phyed/ ba bla se ba bco lnga rnams zhib par btags thun tshad bod dang</text></item>
<item><p>335a.5</p><section></section><text>'dra ba chu grang gis phul te btang na se dug gsar rnying thams cad la phan no/ /yang se dug gi rma gsar rnying gang yin kyang chu dron mos bkrus la stod ja dang go yu bsregs pa zho do re/ ni la tho tha dang gla rtsi zho phyed re bcas zhib btags nad pa'i mchil mas khu ba byas bya</text></item>
<item><p>335a.6</p><section></section><text>rog gi sgros rma gar yod la byugs pas myur du sos par 'gyur ro/ /'jam 'bras/ shing kun / pho ris rnams zho re/ dan rog zho phyed/ zi ra dkar po zho do rnams zhib par btags pa thun tshad bod dang 'dra ba chu skol gyis rta byas btang bas pho ba sbos khrog /dbugs</text></item>
<item><p>335a.7</p><section></section><text>mi bde ba rnams la phan no/ /rgya gar gyi sha tshe dkar po lcags snod du legs par bzhu la lugs kong lta bu snod mi 'dzag pa zhig tu blug /de steng dngul chu zho gang blug /de nyid 'dres nas khengs pa dang slar bteg pas zho gsum 'byung la/ de ras rnyings pas lan</text></item>
<item><p>335b.1</p><section></section><text>grangs mang por che chung mgo tsam ma byung bar dkris/ de khog ma lta bu'i nang du me shin tu tsha ba'i dkyil du ras rnams rim gyis tshig nas bton pas dngul dkar gyi mdog lta bu 'byung / de nas zho char bteg pa'i ljid nas dang mnyam pa re ba na dang mnyam du btang na mdze</text></item>
<item><p>335b.2</p><section></section><text>rigs gang la yang phan no/ /gong gi sman thun che ba tsam la dzAti rdog po phyed shing tsha dang li shi gnyis se ba bzhi re rnams zhib par btags ljid nas rdog che ba gnyis dang mnyam pa pa na dang mnyam du btang na lus stobs bskyed pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /bar skran rlung</text></item>
<item><p>335b.3</p><section></section><text>la brten pa 'don na khong sman gong gi ka rany+dza brgyad pa khong du btang / skran gang yin la snum byugs la mtha' nas btsir te dung 'khor lta bu'i dkyil du bcur/ de yang phyogs bzhi nas mdzub mos mnan/ dkyil du rgya khab kyi rtse me la bsregs pa sor gang tsam skran</text></item>
<item><p>335b.4</p><section></section><text>thog tu btang / kro srin zhes pa rdo'i rtse snum la bcug ste me la bsros nas khab kyi shul du tshugs ltar mnan pas skran rigs de dag la phan par 'gyur ro/ /gro phye na kha ro spu che/ so ma ra tsa/ spos dkar/ rgya mtshal/ sbug chi rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags</text></item>
<item><p>335b.5</p><section></section><text>pa phye me la btab pa'i du ba bshang lam gyi phar tshur du gzhang 'brum gyi me tog rgyas pa'i khar du bas bdugs pa'i rjes gong gi se dug gi byug sman de rma'i khar nad pa'i mchil mar sbyar te pho rog sgros ma drag par byugs pas sel/ stod ja/ shing sol/ 'bu skyogs</text></item>
<item><p>335b.6</p><section></section><text>me la bsregs pa'i thal ba de gsum cha mnyam zhib par btags pa'i phye ma bshang lam nang gi 'brum pa bcad rjes khrag rlung gis brgyal 'gro ba 'jigs mi dgos/ de rjes kro se na'i rdo'i rtse snum la bcug ste me la bsros nas shin tu tsha bar byas te 'brum pa bcad</text></item>
<item><p>335b.7</p><section></section><text>shul bsregs sa pa'i rjes gong gi sman sna gsum po srin bal gyi steng du snum dang sbyar te phong gi nang du bcug /de'i khar ras kyis kha dam par bsdams te ma grag gi bar du bzhag pas phan no/ /gzhang srin nad la se dug gi byug sman gyi steng du nim bu bsnan te</text></item>
<item><p>336a.1</p><section></section><text>zhib par btags lcags snod du nad pa'i mchil ma dang sbyar ba gzhang srin kyis za phrug gang byed pa'i mthar ma grag par byugs shing skam pas sel lo/ /ya mas mgo bo'i rtsa rgyud glog ltar 'khyug pa la ya khung gi rtsa steng dang ltag pa'i spu 'khyil</text></item>
<item><p>336a.2</p><section></section><text>gyi rtsa steng bsregs pas khrag dang rlung la brten pa'i ya ma'i rigs la phan no/ /mig phye ba'i rjes nyin dang po gu yu dang ni ra mu li gnyis brdar ba'i khu ba mig la byugs te/ de steng srin bal yung ba'i chur sbangs la bkab/ gnyis par skyu ru ra shas che ba/ yung ba cung zad brdar</text></item>
<item><p>336a.3</p><section></section><text>ba'i khu ba mig la byugs srin bal gong ltar bkab mig gi phyi skrangs na kha che sha kham/ skyu ru ra sga ser/ gi ru rnams cha mnyam/ a phi ma cung zad sbyar ba zhib btags chu la sbyar mig gi gang na sar byugs/ mig 'bye dus klo byung na glo sman la/ a dza wan cha gnyis/ d+ha tu ra cha</text></item>
<item><p>336a.4</p><section></section><text>gcig /pi pi ling cha phyed rnams zhib par btags pa chur sbyar la gro phye cung zad btab nas ril bu sran ma tsam sgril ba lto stong du so rtsag mchil ma dang lhan du mid pas phan/ mig 'bye gdong du ngar ma bcud can zos pa'i mi'i ris rnams la nyin zhag re'i zas kyi rigs bkag /</text></item>
<item><p>336a.5</p><section></section><text>skom kyang cung zad las mi gtong / rgan rgon dang zas skya ba'i rigs la mtshan gang re gong bzhin bkag /mig 'byed zas spyod spyi dang 'dra/ skyugs pa sogs byung na rma bya'i sgro mer bsregs pa'i phye ma lug ril tsam chu grang hub re dang sbyar ba khong du btab pas skyug pa thams</text></item>
<item><p>336a.6</p><section></section><text>cad la phan no/ /mig gi 'bras bu dmar por song na/ skyu ru ra/ sha che ba/ sga ser cung zad sbyar ba'i khu bar srin bal sbyar nas mig la btab pas phan no/ /mig gi 'bras bu nag po dkar por song na pha Ta ki ri zho gsum/ tshwa zho gcig bcas zhib par btags pa'i phye</text></item>
<item><p>336a.7</p><section></section><text>ma rdo'i steng du snum cung zad tsam blugs pa dang bsres te go yus 'dres par dkrugs pa'i khu ba mig sman ltar dkar po'i steng du blugs pas sel lo/ /mig gi 'bras bu'i nang du khrag gis dmar por song na/ rdo steng du chu thigs pa gcig blug /de'i steng lan tshwa cung zad</text></item>
<item><p>336b.1</p><section></section><text>brdar/ de steng go yu gong bzhin brdar/ de steng du snum thigs gcig blug /de rnams go yus 'dres par brdar ba'i khu ba mig gi 'bras bu'i steng du mig sman ltar btab pa'i rjes mig btsums te srin bal la snum bskus par tshwa zhib btab pa srin bal gyi phyi la sbyar</text></item>
<item><p>336b.2</p><section></section><text>mig gi steng du rdzas rnams phyi la 'ong ba byas te bkab pas phan no/ /'di dag lag len rgya gar dbus 'gyur pha ta ha'i yul gru nas 'ongs pa'i sman pa da na da sa ste/ sbyin pa'i 'bangs zhes pa las dar mo mtsho byed kyis rnyed pa'o/ /tig ta thang thun tsam zhig chu grang dkar</text></item>
<item><p>336b.3</p><section></section><text>yol gsum gnyis tsam gyi nang du sbangs la kha gcod rgyab/ skar ma mthong sar sa rub nas nam langs par bzhag /khu ba thon nges byas pa'i ro ma pho/ pi pi ling che chung 'bring gsum btags pa'i phye ma btab la zhag gsum gyi bar btungs pas nad zhi ba dang / de min</text></item>
<item><p>336b.4</p><section></section><text>tshad pa rnyings pa'i rigs la lan bdun btang bas tshad pa gsar rnyings thams cad la mi phan pa med do/ /bud med bu skyes pa'i 'o ma thur ma gang tsam la rgya mtsho'i ldu ba zhib par btags pa thun chung ngu zhig btab la/ me la 'jam tsam bsros la rna ba'i nad zug ma grag</text></item>
<item><p>336b.5</p><section></section><text>par blug pas phan/ sman chen sran ma tsam/ sa mu dra pha la gcig zhib btags phye ma nas tsam snag khrag gang 'dzag pa'i rnag rnams srin bal gyis phyis/ de rjes ma grag par skam 'debs byas pas phan/ tsi tra ka'am tsi ta zhib par btags pa thun gsum tsam chu dkar</text></item>
<item><p>336b.6</p><section></section><text>yol phyed tsam gyi nang du sbang ste khu ba btsags pa'i khar 'bu skyogs mer bsregs pa'i thal ba dkar po thun gcig btab pas chu de dmar por 'gro de btungs na mchin pa/ mtsher pa/ pho ba sogs la bad rlung gis sbos te nad zug byed pa la phan zhing kha dog dmar ser du 'grim 'ong du/ zas spyod rtsam</text></item>
<item><p>336b.7</p><section></section><text>pa ja 'bras/ gro bag ma gtogs gzhan ma'i rigs 'dzem sman zhag gsum bar bsten dgos/ 'u su dang 'jag ma rnyings pa cha mnyam nub gcig sbangs pa'i khu ba btsags par bye dkar cha gcig btab pa btungs pas chu lam tsha shar byed pa dang sa bon dkar dmar 'dzag pa la pan no//</text></item>
<item><p>337a.1</text></item>
<item><p>337a.2</p><section></section><text>ro mngar ba/ tshwa/ zho/ 'o ma/ shing tog /chu mang du btungs pa/ nyin mo nyal ba rnams kyis slong ngo / /rlung nad ldang ba'i dus ni/ mgo/ rgyal/ mchu/ mchu stod/ gro bzhin/ khrums stod kyi zla ba rnams la ldang la/ rkyen ni</text></item>
<item><p>337a.3</p><section></section><text>zas bcud med pa zos pa/ gnyid chag pa/ glu dbyangs sogs skad chen po bton pa/ lus 'khyags pa/ sems mi bde ba sogs kyis slong ngo / /mkhris pa'i nad langs pa'i rtags ni lud drod che zhing khol bur na/ kha skom zhing ro kha/ skom dad che ba</text></item>
<item><p>337a.4</p><section></section><text>sogs 'byung la/ bad kan gyi nad langs pa'i rtags ni/ le lo che/ glo slong / lud pa lu/ kha'i ro mngar/ dang kha mi bde/ brang tsha/ sbos 'khrog sogs 'ong la/ rlung nad langs pa'i rtags ni/ sems 'phyo/ lus 'dar/ mtshogs ma drod che</text></item>
<item><p>337a.5</p><section></section><text>zhing lus bying drod chung / 'dug sar mi tshugs pa sogs 'byung ngo / /'tsho ba dang mi 'tsho ba'i mtshan nyid brtag pa ni/ lte ba/ rkang lag bzhi'i mthil/ sna rnams drod dang ldan pa dang / snas dri bzang ngan thams cad tshor zhing zas ro dang ldan la/ gnyid bde</text></item>
<item><p>337a.6</p><section></section><text>zhing za zi med pa sems bde ba sogs byung na nges par 'tsho bas/ rtags de rnams dang ldan na sman gyis bcos par bya/ de las ldog cing khyad par nye ba'i rtags/ rlung gi gnas lte ba/ mkhris pa'i gnas mchin pa/ bad kan gyi gnas brang rnams yin</text></item>
<item><p>337a.7</p><section></section><text>la/ rlung mkhris pa'i gnas su 'phos pas lte bar drod med/ mkhris pa bad kan gyi gnas su 'phos pas de'i rkyen gyis bad kan o stong du 'pho nas phyi dbugs nang du mi 'gro/ mtshan nyid de dag dang ldan na myur du 'chi bas sman dpyad la sogs pa bor te dge ba'i las</text></item>
<item><p>337b.1</p><section></section><text>la 'bad par bya'o/ /yang 'tsho 'chi ba rtag thabs kyi man ngag la/ snod gtsang mar chu blug /de'i steng du mar dang snum bsres pa bskol nas bsgrangs pa blug ste legs par dkrugs la/ de'i nang du nad pa'i gzugs 'char du bcug ste bltas pas lus byings</text></item>
<item><p>337b.2</p><section></section><text>kyi grib ma shar kyang mgo bo'i grib ma med na myur du 'chi zhing / lus tshang ma'i grib ma 'dug na nges par 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar legs par brtags nas/ nad de rnams zhi bar byed pa'i sman gyi sbyor ba bstan pa ni/ tshad pa spyi 'joms legs 'dzin grub pa</text></item>
<item><p>337b.3</p><section></section><text>chung ba'i sbyor ba ni/ shuN+Thi/ /ring+ga ni/ pU ha ka ra mU la/ ka ka ra sing+gi / ka Ta ki/ ka tsu ra/ b+ha ba ne Thi/ gung+tsa/ amA la/ ha la d+hi/ pip+pa la/ ma ri tsi/ ka la uny+dzi/ pi ta ba pa ra/ pra tra dza/ a ga ra/ dzabs/ kuSh+Ta/ ba la lo tsa Na/ ta dza/ a</text></item>
<item><p>337b.4</p><section></section><text>ti sa| de ba da ru/ lga/ na ga ra mo tha/ po To la/ khams kyi ru rta/ adzalba ni/ tsi ta/ pip+pa la mul sma ru mgo nag gi shing li khri skyu rur lga ser drod sman pho ris rnams cha mnyam pa nyag gang dang / tsir yi ta a ka ru spor do bcas sha pho ru rta zhib par btags shing tsha</text></item>
<item><p>337b.5</p><section></section><text>la thun tshad shug pa tshe phyogs tsam rma nu bla sgang re chu grang gis rta la la phud pi pi ling gi rtsa ba byas btang bas mkhris tshad/ rlung tshad/ bad kan la brten pa'i tshad pa/ 'khrugs tshad/ 'grams tshad/ rims tshad sogs tshad pa gsar rnying thams cad zhi bar byed cing /</text></item>
<item><p>337b.6</p><section></section><text>gzhan yang skya sbab/ grang rlung / mig ser/ dbugs mi bde ba rnams la phan no/ /rims 'phrog lcags kyu chen mo'i sbyor ba ni/ shuN+Thi/ ma ri tsi/ pip+pa la gsum zho brgyad re/ kan+da ka/ biSha/ pa ra gsum zho do re rnams zhib par btags la/ d+ha dU ra/</text></item>
<item><p>337b.7</p><section></section><text>bAd/ sga rlon pa rnams kyi khu bas 'dam btags legs par byas nas ril bu sran mche shos tsam re sgril la sga'i khu bas rta byas te ril lga pho ris drod sman bu re btang bas rlung / mu zi ser po sman chen dngul chu mkhris pa/ bad kan/ tshad pa thang phrom</text></item>
<item><p>338a.1</p><section></section><text>so me ra tsa/ gsar rnyings/ rims drag pa/ rims nyin gcig pa/ rims nyin gnyis pa/ rims nyin gsum pa/ rims nyin bzhi pa/ rtag pa'i rims/ ma 'dzub rnams la mchog tu phan no/ /rims 'phrog lcags kyu grub pa'i sbyor ba ni/ shang+ga b+ha dung thal</text></item>
<item><p>338a.2</p><section></section><text>sma dang ha ri ta la gnyis zho brgyad re/ nI la tho tha zho do/ gi pa ko Ti zho gsum rnams zhib par btags pa slar yang gi ba ko Ta'i khu bas 'dam btags byas nas bgangs/ de rdza snod gsar par blug ste kha legs par bcad nas rlung mi 'chor</text></item>
<item><p>338a.3</p><section></section><text>ba byas/ de sa dong khru do gru babla bzhi gting la'ang big ban khru do yod pa zhig brus la gci bas bkang ba'i dkyil tshad du bcug par me sbar te me shi nas grang thag ma chod par bzhag /de nas bton la dma' ru mgo nag re tsam re bye dkar thun tshad tsam re</text></item>
<item><p>338a.4</p><section></section><text>dang mnyam du btang na chad pa'i rigs gsar rnyings gang la'ang phan nges shing / gzhan yang nad kyi rigs tsha grang gsar rnying thams cad la phan pas spyi 'joms chen mo'o/ /rlung mkhris bad kan gsum ka 'dom pa'i tshad pas drag tu na na/ pip+pa la/ ma Ni si la/</text></item>
<item><p>338a.5</p><section></section><text>nim+Da phal gsum cha mnyam zhib par btags la/ ka re li'i khu bas ril bu skyu ru ra tsam sgril la chu grang dang mnyam du btang bas myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mkhris tshad kyis na na/ pi ta pa pa ra zho gang zhib par btags la/ chu cung zad drod sman ma Ni tshal ldong ros</text></item>

<item><p>338b.1</p><section></section><text>byas sna bug tu blug na phan no/ /rlung tshad kyis na na/ shuN+Thi/ lga pany+tsa/ kha ru tsha pip+pa la/ drod sman ma ri tsi/ pho ris lge pho ris tsi ra yi ta/ tig ta drod sman ka Ta ki/ ha ri ta a rur ka rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la bod kyi thun</text></item>
