<item><p>338b.6</p><section></section><text>la'ang phan no/ /yang 'dus pa'i nad la/ yid bzhin pho dis drod sman sman chen[ \[]rbab[</p><section></section><text>nor bu'i bcud kyi sbyor ba ni/ gan+ng+ha ka/ pa ra/ ma ri tse/ shweta dzir/ kal dzir/ sen+ng+ha/ lo Na/ sany+tsalo Na/ saM ba ri lo Na/ kha rilo Na rigs gnyis/ sadzi ba ra/</text></item>
<item><p>338b.7</p><section></section><text>ya ba khar/ sa mu dra khar/ piSha/ alba ra ka/ shu<p>]r+b+Thi?[</p><section></section><text>rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la pA ni'i khu bas ril mu zing ra pa dngur chu pho ris zir dkar pa zir nag po rgyam tshA kha ru tshwa lwa tshwa rigs gnyis bu sran ma tsam bsgril te zi tshwa</text></item>
<item><p>339a.1</p><section></section><text>gyi tshor ba btang bas zhi bar sman chen lhang tsher sgra 'gyur zhing / spos khrog /khrag 'grim pa rnams la yang phan no/ /yang 'dus nad kyi sman la/ ma ri tsi/ pho ris pip+pa la/ drod sman shuN+Thi/ lga pi Sha/ sman chen gan+ng+ha ka/ mu zi ser po pa ru dpung chu</text></item>
<item><p>339a.2</p><section></section><text>rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la ras la btsags/ de nas rdo gzhod nang du thang phrom kyi khu bas gar sla go tsam byas pam skam bar nyed/ slar yang gong bzhin nyin gsum gyi bar mtshams mchad par byas la/ de nas ril bu dma' ru mgo nag</text></item>
<item><p>339a.3</p><section></section><text>tsam byas la tho rangs ril bu re btang bas phan zhing / gzhan yang bad kan/ grang rlung / rus pa khol bur na ba/ dang kha me bde ba rnams la phan no/ /yang ng+hAni/ na gar mo tha/ tsir yi ta/ kuSh+Tha/ in+d+ra ya ba/ de lba da ru/ shung+ha/ ga dza bip+pa</text></item>
<item><p>339a.4</p><section></section><text>la rnams cha mnyam zhib bying dang thun tshad bod kyi thang tsam chu rul brgyad la btab nas chu cha bdun ma bskam par skol la/ de nas dro 'jam tsam la btungs ba'i nad/ ku su ma nu p+pa spang / tig ta sha bo ru rta dug mo nyung shug pa lga kong pon yod pa'i drod sman</text></item>
<item><p>339a.5</p><section></section><text>'dus tshad/ ig gu'i skyigs bu/ skyug pa/ stod bu 'tshams pa rnams la phan no/ /hrikoT/ tri pha la/ hirgu/ btsA/ sen+d+he lo Na/ kuSh+Tha/ sa ri soM/ /sir sa bal rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa ra'i chus khu ba byas nas slar yang</text></item>
<item><p>339a.6</p><section></section><text>brdar te mig la byugs na/ mig gi nad/ sems g.yo zhing 'khrug pa/ mig rab rib/ tsho ba gsum 'bras bu gsum shi kun shudag kum tsha sha pho ru rta bang khang li bru'i 'bru mtshan mo gnyid mi yong ba rnams la phan zhing 'dre gdon gyi gnod pa'ang thub</text></item>
<item><p>339a.7</p><section></section><text>po/ /kuSh+Tha/ lalpang+ga/ pip+pa la/ a ka ra ka ra ha rnams cha mnyam zhib bar btags la sga'i khubs ril bu sku rur tsam sgril la btang bas/ bad kan/ 'dus pa/ mgo bo na pa/ sdang pa rnams la phan no/ /rgyu tshad kyis na zhing khrag 'grim pa sogs mchog</text></item>
<item><p>339b.1</p><section></section><text>sha bo ru rta 'ishi drod sman tu phan no/ li la ba tib Ta'i sbyor ba ni/ ma ri tsi/ pho ris masta ki/ nga Di ma/ se 'bru lbaM sha lo tsan/ cu gang am+pa/ an 'bras lo da/ mar ha Thi/ ng+ha tri/ ng+ha ba kaphu la/ sna bka'i me tog ma dzu pha la/ ma dzu'i 'bru</text></item>
<item><p>339b.2</p><section></section><text>sim+pa ri/ kuSh+Tha/ dza yi pha la/ ba bu ra ka pa la/ kha yi ra/ ko ha Da ka pi dza rnams cha ma ma zhib par btags la ras la btsags te thun tshad che phyogs tsam po sta ka'i khu bas rta byas btang bas phan zhing / sman gtong ring zas spyod 'bras zan ba'i dar ba dang</text></item>
<item><p>339b.3</p><section></section><text>ma nurta rkang sha pho ru rta dzAti ba bu ra'i 'bru rgya gar stod dza ko gar stod dza koha Da'i 'bru mnyam du cung zad re btang / gzhan ma bza' btung gi rigs mi gtong / rgyu tshad spyi 'joms  halo bring+ng+ha gaM gAng+ha ra'i sbyor ba ni/ na gar mo tha/ shuN+Thi/ a ra lu/ ng+ha ba ka phu la/</text></item>
<item><p>339b.4</p><section></section><text>bel/ ati sa/ mo tsa rA sa/ lo ng+ha/ ladza ru/ am+ba/ ka bi dza/ kuN+Tha/ in+d+ra ya ba/ bal lo tsa na rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun tshad che phyogs re 'bras skam po 'phar bal ya ka 'dzin ma ru gla sgang lga bkrus pa'i chu phul d+ha ba'i me tog</text></item>
<item><p>339b.5</p><section></section><text>ba'i ba ma ru rta rkang gi thang chu phyed sbrang ba ru ra tsam re dang mnyam du btang bas as 'bras sha bo ngurta gun mo nyung 'khru ba chod cing myur du phan par 'gyur ro/ /yang la gug ng+gAng+ha ra'i sbyor ba ni/ shuN+Thi/ ng+ha ba ka phu la/ mo tsa ras rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun tshad che phyogs</text></item>
<item><p>339b.6</p><section></section><text>tsam re ba'i dar ba phul phyed byis rta byas btang bas kyang nus pa gong dang 'dra/ yang rgyu tshad gsar rnying gi nad la/ am+bi pi dza/ dza ye phal/ nge la/ kha yir/ gang+b+nga 'dzin chad ba lga ng+ha ba'i me tog ma nu rtargar gi thang chu a phi ma rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu grang</text></item>
<item><p>339b.7</p><section></section><text>dang sbyar te lte ba'i mtha' skor du sor gsum gyi rgya tsam la byugs pas kyang zugs gzer chag cing 'khru ba chod do/ am 'bras dzAti pil ba rgya gar stong dza yang rgyu tshad lan ga ri ng+ha'i thang gi sbyor ba ni/ shuN+Thi/ kuSh+Tha/ a tis/ hing+gu/ na gar mo tha rnams cha mnyam zhib</text></item>
<item><p>340a.1</p><section></section><text>rtsing dang thun tshad bod kyi thang tsam chu phul brgyad la btab nas chu<p>]cha[</p><section></section><text>bdun ma skam par skol la/ de nas dro 'jam tsam la btungs pas phan par 'gyur ro/ /yang rgyu tshad kyis khrag kho grong khyer las lhag pa lga sha phor rta shing kun ma nu gla sgang na 'grim pa la/ ba la lo can/</text></item>
<item><p>340a.2</p><section></section><text>kuSh+Tha/ a ti sa/ na ga ra mo tha/ be la rnams cha mnyam zhib rtsing dang thun tshad sogs gtong lugs gong bzhin byas pas myur du chod par 'gyur ro/ /yang / lo d+ha/ in+d+ra ya ba/ mo tse ra sa/ na ga ra mo tha be la/ d+ha ba ka phu la rnams cha mnyam zhib</text></item>
<item><p>340a.3</p><section></section><text>par btags la bu ram sha po ru rta ma nu bla sgang bil ba gyis rta byas ril bu ba ru ra tsam sgril la btang bas kyang chod do/ /yang rgyu tshad kyis khrag dang ser po gnyis ka 'grims na/ dug ce sbyang ma D+hu rta rkang gi thang shing ma nu gla lgang bil pa ng+ha ba'i me tog sen+ta lo Na/</text></item>
<item><p>340a.4</p><section></section><text>sany+tsar lo Na/ hing+gu/ ba tsa/ ha rAM ta kA/ a ti sa rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun tshad che phyogs tsam re chu skol gyis rta byas btang bas myur du chod cing phan par 'gyur ro/ /pho ba'i me drod nyams nas zas gang zos kyang mi 'ju bar 'grim zhing sbos nyams rgyab tsha</text></item>
<item><p>340a.5</p><section></section><text>ba ru rga shing kun shu dag a+ra byed pa la/ dbang mi bde/ lus shed rim bzhin chag pa'i nad la/ d+ha ni ya/ na ga ra mo tha/ shuSh+Tha/ /mU li ka bi dza rnams cha mnyam thang tshad dang bsdu lugs gong bzhin btang bas phan par 'gyur ro/ /yang na/ na ga ra</text></item>
<item><p>340a.6</p><section></section><text>mo tha/ shuSh+Tha/ a ti sa/ gi lo hi rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun tshad che phyogs tsam re chu skol gyis 'u su ma nu gla sgang lga la phug gi 'bru rta byas btang bas kyang phan no/ /yang / lo d+ha/ baD+hi/ la dza ru/ na ga ra mo tha/ bem/ shuh+Thi/</text></item>
<item><p>340a.7</p><section></section><text>ma zhu gla sgang lga ng+ha ni ya/ a tis/ gurtsa/ ba la lo tsa na/ kuSh+Tha/ d+ha ba ka phul rnams cha mnyam gyi thang tshad dang bsdu lugs gong bzhin byas btang bas phan par 'gyur ro/ /gzhang 'brum gyi nad la/ ma ri tsi pho ris zho gang / shuN+Thi zho do/ ma nu lgang bil ba lga tsi ta zho</text></item>
<item><p>340b.1</p><section></section><text>brgyad/ 'u mu likhri likhri su ra Na zho bcu drug rnams zhib sha pho ru rta ng+ha ba'i me tog par btags la ril bu skyu ru ra las che tsam re btang bas phan zhing / sman gtong ba'i bar la ro mngar ba/ kha ba/ pho ris lga lug gi sha rnams mi za'o yang / ar lu/</text></item>
<item><p>340b.2</p><section></section><text>tsi ta/ in+d+ra ya ba/ shuN+Thi/ sin+ng+nya lo Na/ be la rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la [(]thun [)]tshad che phyogs tsam re ba'i dar ba phul res rta byas btang na phan par 'gyur ro/ /yang gzhang 'brum gyi nad kyis khrag 'dzag pa la/ dU di ba Thi dang la lbang+go rnams cha mnyam zhing</text></item>
<item><p>340b.3</p><section></section><text>par btags pa mang dug mo dung lga rgyam tshwa bil ba nyung zho bdun rer thun re bcad pa ba mar btsag bcad pas rta byas zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du btang bas nges par phan no/ /mtshan bar rdol ba'i nad la/ ha la ng+hi dang / am+pa la gnyis chu'i nang du brdar la gar</text></item>
<item><p>340b.4</p><section></section><text>sla zho tsam rma khar byugs la ras kyis khebs bkab nas bzhag pas phan par 'gyur ro/ /yang bi la yi ka ha Da zhib par btags pa 'bras bu gsum gyi khu ba dang mnyam du legs par brdar la gar sla zho tsam byung lga ser skyu rur ba dang rmar byugs te ras bkab pas</text></item>
<item><p>340b.5</p><section></section><text>phan no/ /yang sen+ta lo Na/ shuN+Thi/ ha lang+hi/ b+ha Ta pa tragu rtsi 'bri dza ya tri rnams cha mnyam bum bu'i rus pa zhib par btags pa zho la sbyar nas rma khar byugs te ras bkab pas kyang phan par 'gyur ro/ /pho skran gyi nad la/ sany+tsa ra lo Na/ sen+ng+ha lo Na/</text></item>
<item><p>340b.6</p><section></section><text>shuN+Thi/ hing+gu / rgyam tshwa lga lga ser a bya ya/ shing b+haTa'i lo ma dzIto'i me tog ping+pa la/ a dza mor/ ya ba khar/ ba yi bi rang+ga rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la ba mar gyis ril bu skyu rur tsam sgril nas btang bas zhi bar kha ru tshwa rgyam ch+wa 'gyur zhing</text></item>
<item><p>340b.7</p><section></section><text>lga shing kun ma zhu ba'i nad gzhan la yang phan no/ /lus kyi mdog ser bor 'gyur zhing drod sman dbyi mong / byi tsher byI thang ga skrangs na/ pip+pa la/ kaT li/ shuT+ThaM/ na gar mo tha/ tsi ta/ pip+pa la/ ka mu la/ ga dza pip+pa la rnams cha mnyam zhib bar btags</text></item>
<item><p>341a.1</p><section></section><text>la thun tshad che phyogs tsam re tshu skol gyis rta byas btang bas phan zhing khog skran dang dang kha mi bde ba la yang phan no/ /yang na/ shuN+Thi/ lga ba yi bi rang+ga/ byi thang ka drod sman lga ma <p>]ru[</p><section></section><text>gla sgang drod sman gyi rtsa ba kong po nas yong ba'i drod sman ha ri ta ke u rur de ma da ru rnams shug la</text></item>
<item><p>341a.2</p><section></section><text>cha mnyam zhib par la thun tshad che shos tsam chu skol gyis rta byas btang bas nus pa gong dang 'dra'o/ /yang na/ dA ru ha ri dra/ eraN+Daka pa la/ ti bi/ ba yi bir sga/ a ti sa/ ma ri tsi/ in+tha ya ba rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la</text></item>
<item><p>341a.3</p><section></section><text>thun tshad che phyogs re chu skol gyis rta pyas btang bas phan bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na/ gu glu la/ ha ri ta ke/ ga dpur+Na/ dA ru ha didra/ gu rtsa skyer pa dgo 'dra'i 'du gyi thang ga rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la pi ngis dug mo nyung ba'i chus rta byas btang bas nus</text></item>
<item><p>341a.4</p><section></section><text>pa gong dang 'dra'o/ /srin nad la/ sen+ng+ha loN/ ti bi/ ba yi pir ng+ga/ bu la a rung gsum cha mnyam zhib par skyer ba li khri btags la thun tshad che phyogs gong dang 'dra ba chu skol gyis phul te btang bas phan no/ /yang na/ tri phal/ tri kuT/ ti bi/</text></item>
<item><p>341a.5</p><section></section><text>ba ro/ nim+pa twa tsa/ kha yir/ kuSh+Tha/ rgya mtshwa byi thang ka ba yi pi ngang+ga rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la ba'i chus rta byas btang bas phan par 'gyur ro/ /pho ba rlung gis sbo sa nas na na/ sany+tsa ralo Na/ hing+g+ru/ shuN+Thi/ gsum cha mnyam 'bras bu gsum tshab gsum</text></item>
<item><p>341a.6</p><section></section><text>shu dag shing gi m+pu'i Sha pa rgya gar snyo dar <p></p><section></section><text>zhib par btags la byi thang ka thun tshad nyis 'gyur tsam re chu skol gyis rta byas btang na phan no/ /yang na/ ma ri tsi/ di b+ba la/ shuN+Thi/ hing+gu/ sen+ng+ha lo Na/ kha ru tshwa ji rba do/ thing dkar nag /a dza mo da rnams cha mnyam zhib par</text></item>
<item><p>341a.7</p><section></section><text>btags la chu skol gyis rta byas btang bas phan bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na/ pib+pa la/ shuN+Thi/ ha ri ta ke/ sany+tsar lo Na/ ti bi rnams cha mnyam zhib par pho ris drod sman lga shin gun rgyam tshwa btags la chu skol gyis rta byas btar bas phan no/[ \[</p><section></section><text>yang na/</text></item>
<item><p>341b.1</p><section></section><text>shiN+Thi/ lga ma ri tsi/ pho res pipA la/ pi pi lir sa<p>]dz+ng+hi bar[</p><section></section><text>tshwa pi pi ling lga a ngur kha ru tshwa rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu skol gyis rta byas btang bang phan no/ /skya sbab dang mig ser gyi nad la/ ga da pur+Na/ tri pha la/ 'bras bu gsum/ kuSh+Tha/ ru rta/</text></item>
<item><p>341b.2</p><section></section><text>tsi ra yi ta/ u ru sa/ ni m+ba/ gurtsa rnams cha mnyam gyi thang tshad dang bsdu lugs snga ma bzhin la/ bsdus tshar ba'i steng / sbrang ba ru ra tsam zhig btab ste btungs pas myur du phan par 'gyur ro/ /yang na/ tri ku Ta/ ha la d+hi/ am+pa la/ lu ha ka dzu r+Na rnams</text></item>
<item><p>341b.3</p><section></section><text>tig ta cham nyam zhib par btags li khri la thun tshad che shos tsam re ba marab ru ra tsam bzhu bar sbrang de nyis 'gyur gyi tshad tsam bcas btab la legs par 'dres pa dang btang na mchog tu phan no/ /mig ser kho na'i nad la/ tshes gsum sga se+er skyu ru ra tri pha la/ lcegs phya kuSh+Tha/</text></item>
<item><p>341b.4</p><section></section><text>ha la d+hi/ dA ru ha la dra skyer pa rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la sbrang dang mar gyi sbyor lugs gong ltar bzos pas phan no/ /yang na/ ge ru/ ha lad+hi/ am+ba la gsum cha mnyam zhib par btags pa chu la sbyar nas mig la byugs pas phan no/ /glo 'grams <p>]'bras[</p><section></section><text>bu gsum <p>]rur+ha[</text></item>
<item><p>341b.5</p><section></section><text>lga ser skye rab kyi nad la/ as gan+g+ha/ shuN+Thi/ pip+pil/ la lbad+ga/ mi sri rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags btsan lga ser skyu rur la chu grang gis rta byas btang bas phan par 'gyur ro/ /yang na/ ya ka ban ka phu la dang la wang+ga gnyis cha mnyam</text></item>
<item><p>341b.6</p><section></section><text>zhib par btags la chus ril baspub lga drod smad lishi shel dkar bu sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam sgril te btang bas phan no/ /yang na/ tri pha la/ shuN+Thi/ ba yi bi rang+ga / /ma ri tsi/ bip+pa la/ nag ra mo tha/ a ka<p>]bzhi'i me tog[</p><section></section><text>'i shi pip+pa la/</text></item>
<item><p>341b.7</p><section></section><text>kamu la/ la lbang+ga/ deb da ru/ e la yatsi/ te dza pa tra/ mang+hu/ nA ga ge sar rnams mnyam zhib par btags pa'i cha gcig dang / shel dkar de'i lbas bu gsum lga byi thang ka nyis bo ris drod sman ma nu gla sgang 'gyur dang bcas thun tshad nyis 'gyur tsam</text></item>
<item><p>342a.1</p><section></section><text>pi pi ling gi rtsa ba li shi shug pa ka ko la chu grang gis rta byas sbrang rtsi nA ga ge sar btang bas phan no/ /g.yig gu'i skyigs bu'i nad la/ ma ni tsha la/ ldongaros ha la d+hi/ sga ser ma ri tsi/ pho ris mi sri/ shel dkar/ la lbang+ga lishi rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags</text></item>

<item><p>342a.3</p><section></section><text>ka ma la ka Ta/ ga dza ke sa ri rnams cha mnyam gyi cha gcig dang / sbrang dang shel dkar gnyis kyi cha gcig byas te ril bu b.ru ra tsam re zos pas myur du phan no/ /yang na/ tsad+dan dkar po[ \[]mnu gla sgang [</p><section></section><text>ka ko la la dzaru/ ha rita ke drod sman li shi[ \[]chid pa kha'i 'bru'i snying po[</text></item>

<item><p>342a.6</p><section></section><text>btad pas myur du phan no/ /glo drag tu ldang zhing lud pa mi gog na/ a rus/ shuN+Thi/ pip+pa la rnams lga 'dur drod sman cha mnyam zhib par btags la sbrang rtsis rta byas ril bu skyu ru ra tsam sgril te btang bas phan no/ /yang na/ a ru sa/ shuN+Thi/ pip+pa la/ tsa sa/</text></item>
<item><p>342a.7</p><section></section><text>ka Ta ri rnams cha gnyis zhib par btags te chu skol gyis rta byas btang bas phan lga drod sman par 'gyur ro/ /zas mi 'ju zhing dang kha mi bde ba la/ pip+pa la/ drod sman/ ti bi/ ha ri ta ke/ a ra \u0f74ra/ shuN+Thi/ lga sany+tsa ra la Na kha rutshwa lga drod sman rnams cha mnyam</text></item>
<item><p>342b.1</p><section></section><text>zhib par btags la chu skol gyis rta byas btang bas phan no/ /yang na/ sen+d+ta lo Na/ ha ri ta ge/ pip+pa la/ tsita rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu skol gyis rta byas btang bas phan par 'gyur ro/ /yang na/ tri pha la/ tri ku Ta/ sany+tsa ra lo na/ hirgya/</text></item>
<item><p>342b.2</p><section></section><text>a dza wa na rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa'i cha gcig dang / rgyam tshwa a ru ra drod sman bu ram gyi cha gcig byas pa'i ril bu skyu ru ra tsam sgril te btang bas kyang phan no/ /yang na/ ser+b+ha lo Na/ sany+tsar lo Na/ 'bras bu gsum tshes gsum kha ru tshwa shing kun</text></item>
<item><p>342b.3</p><section></section><text>ba li bilgang/[ \[</p><section></section><text>ma ri tsi/ pip+pa la/ shuN+Thi/ ha ri ta ke/ beDa ha/ am+pa la/ ti bi/ la lbang+ga / tsi dri ka/ hing+gu/ a dza lban/ dzi ra do/ /nag ra mo tha rnams cha mnyam zhib par rgyam tshwa ba ru tshwa btags la star bu'i khu bas zan tsam brdzis pa skem thengs</text></item>
<item><p>342b.4</p><section></section><text>byi thang ga pho rim drod sman gsum byas lga a rur ba rung skyu rur pa'i bye ma thun tshad nyis <p>]li shi[</p><section></section><text>shing kun mel bsregs pa lal phud zir dkar nag ma nu gla sgang 'gyur tsam re btang bas than nges so/ /'bras bu skrangs pa'i nad la/ shweta dzi ra/ sen+ng+ha lo Na/</text></item>
<item><p>342b.5</p><section></section><text>hi rlu rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la pang kha'i snum me la bsros par btab ste byugs pas myur du phan no/ /yang na/ 'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma ba'i chus rta byas btungs pas zhag bdun nam yun ring yang bcu bzhi'i khongs su drag go/ /yang na/ thing dkar po rgyam tsha</text></item>
<item><p>342b.6</p><section></section><text>shen kun so ma pha zhib par btags pa thun tshad che phyogs tsam re ba mar sgyu ru ra nyis 'gyur tsam dang pang kha'i snum sgong skogs phyed tsam sras par btab ste nyin bdun kyi bar btungs pas phan no/ /yang na/ shwe ta dze ra/ e raN shuSh+Tha/ ba tsa/ hu la hu la hu la ka pa dza rnams cha mnyam</text></item>
<item><p>342b.7</p><section></section><text>zhib btags pa/ go snyon chu bre do tsam gyi nang du 'bras rtsam la ltar btags pa bre gang tsam zhig blug nas me mdag gi steng du zhag gnyis gsum zhig bzhag nas chu de skyur mor song ba dang / de la gong gi sman zing dkar po <p></p><section></section><text>shun dag tu <p></text></item>
<item><p>343a.1</p><section></section><text>myur du skam par 'gyur ro/ /dngas ma 'dzag pa la/ an ra ki ga li dang shwe ta kha yir gnyis cha mnyam zhib par btags pa'i cha gcig dang / shel dkar cha gcig bsres te thun tshad che phyogs re tho rangs dang dgongs mo zhag bdun gyi ring star chags su</text></item>
<item><p>343a.2</p><section></section><text>btang na chod par 'gyur ro/ /yang na/ e la yi rtsa dang shel dkar cha mnyam zhib se 'bru'i me tog stod ja dkar po par btags la thun tshad nyis 'gyur tsam re zos pas phan zhing / sman gtong ring ro skyur ba dang la phug sogs mi bza'/ yang na/ saM kha hu li/ sel</text></item>
<item><p>343a.3</p><section></section><text>yi tsa/ se la dzi rta gsum cha mnyam mug sme pa zhib par btags pa'i cha gcig /shel dkar gyi cha gcig byas la thun tshad nyis 'gyur tsam re chu grang gis kyi rta byas btang bas kyang phan no/ /yang chu dang mnyam du na zug dang bcas te 'dzag na/ e la yi tsa/ a ru sa/</text></item>
<item><p>343a.4</p><section></section><text>sug smel g+hoShur/ ba ma ne Thi/ pip+pa la/ e raN+Da rnams kyi thang thun tshad dang bsdu lugs gong ma rnams dang 'dra ba byas la/ de steng se la dzi ta dang sbrang cung zad re btab ste btung bas myur du phan par 'gyur zhing rdel nad kyang thon par 'gyur ro/[ \[</p><section></section><text>/yang na/ /e raN+Di/</text></item>

<item><p>343a.6</p><section></section><text>zhag yan la byugs na myur du phan nges so/ /rdel nad dang chu 'gags sug smekha ta'o'i 'bru gnyis 'dzom nas na na/ g+ho Shar dza bas/ ha re ta ka pa kha na be+e da rnams cha mnyam bye ba'i brun gyi shang tshad dang bsdu lugs gong dang 'dra ba byas la/ de steng sbrang cung zad tsam</text></item>
<item><p>343a.7</p><section></section><text>zhig btab ste btung bas kyang phan no/ /yang na/ tri pha la/ bzang bu gsum sen+ng+ha lo Na/ rgyas tshwa g+ho Sha ra/ gze ma gze ma a rur ka re li gser me tog brag thun rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun tshad nyis 'gyur tsam re chu skol gyis phul nas btang bas rdel</text></item>
<item><p>343b.1</p><section></section><text>nad chu 'gags gnyis ka la phan no/ /yang rdel nad chu 'gags bcos thabs zab gnad khyad par can ni/ swa ha ga mer bsregs pa'i thal ba chu 'gags la phye ma cung zad re gsang gnas kyi nang du blugs pas de phral chu 'bab cing thun tshad chung</text></item>
<item><p>343b.2</p><section></section><text>phyogs re chu skol gyis phul ste khong du btang bas/ rdel nad myur du zhi ba myong grub khyad par can no/ /mjo'i nad gang la yang / tshal tri pha la/ a ru sa/ nim+ba/ pa ra ba ra ka la ha/ kha la ra/ gurtsa rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu</text></item>
<item><p>343b.3</p><section></section><text>grang gis rta byas te btang bas phan par 'gyur ro/ /yang na/ tri pha la/ ma ny+dzuSh+Tha/ gurtsa/ kaT ki/ nim+pa/ ha lang+hi/ ba tsa/ da ru ha ridra/ 'bram bu gsum ba yi bi rang+ga / a rus/ de lba da ru rnams stod ja li thi/ cha mnyam zhib par btags la thang thun chung</text></item>
<item><p>343b.4</p><section></section><text>phyogs tsam re chu grang gis rta byas zhag nyer gcig gi bar la btang nas phan na dang / 'bras bu gsum btsod li khri ma phan tshe zhag zhe dgu'i lga ser shu dag skye ram bar la btang bas phan la/ byi brang ka shug pa de'i bar rtsam pa dang 'bras kho na las zas gzhan mi gtong la/ sman 'ad za</text></item>
<item><p>343b.5</p><section></section><text>phrug la yang phan no/ /khrag shas che ba'i mdze nad la/ mah+dzuSh+Tha/ tri pha la/ /kuSh+Tha/ ha la d+hi/ /de bad ru/ /btsa rnams kyi thang tshad dang bsdu lugs sngon ma rnams dang 'dra ba byas nas btang bas kyang phan par 'gyur ro/ /mdze dkar po la/ guny+dza/ /ni m+pa/ kuSh+Tha/</text></item>
<item><p>343b.6</p><section></section><text>ba tsa/ /tsi tra ka /cha mnyam zhib par btags la/ bcod 'bras bu pa gsum ru rta sga ser zhug pa shu dag gong 'bras bu skrangs pa'i skabs su bstan pa'i 'bras phye btang ba'i chu skyur mo des khu ba byas nas gar sla zho tsam rma gang 'dug la byugs pas pan no/ de mar rnya mgon na ru rta</text></item>
<item><p>343b.7</p><section></section><text>ru dag yang na/ ma Ni tsha la/ ldong ros/ tsi tra ka /ba ku tsi/ beng+ga na be ga na'i thal ba b+ha sma rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags te gong gi chus rta byas nas byugs na yang phan no/ /za phrug gi nad la/ ma ri tse dang sen+d+tur gnyis cha mnyam zhib par btags la mar la sbyar nas</text></item>
<item><p>344a.1</p><section></section><text>byug pa byas na sel bar 'gyur ro/ /za phrug /g.yan pa/ shu ba gsum la/ ha la d+hi/ ba ku tse/ nimA da la/ am+ba la rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la ba'i chus rta byas la nyin bdun gyi bar du btang bas phan no/ /yang na/</text></item>

<item><p>344a.4</p><section></section><text>mos sbyar te byugs kyang phan no/ /me lce 'khor lo la/ shwe ta tsan dan/ kuSh+Tha/ sam+b+ha lu/ ka ma la ka Ta/ ni mA rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu la sbyar nas byugs pas phan no/ /rgyam tshwa a rur thal dkar rdo rje gnyan 'bur la/ sa rung me la phyed tsam bsregs</text></item>
<item><p>344a.5</p><section></section><text>pa'i thal ba ba'i zhos rta byas thun tshad che phyogs tsam re nyin tsar dan dbar tho chu rta <p></p><section></section><text>ba'i 'bu bdun gyi bar btang na phan par 'gyur ro/ /grang rlung gi nad la/ a sa garnya/ shuN+Tha/ ka la ti la rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa'i cha gcig[ \[</text></item>

<item><p>344a.7</p><section></section><text>par btags pa cha gcig /bu ram gyi cha gnyis byas pa'i ril bu skyu ru ra nyis 'gyur tsam re btang bas phan no/ /drod sman/ /yang na/ basbru ba byi thang ka bAng+ga / so mar tsa sam+ng+ha lu/ bAng+ga ra/ la la lud lga pi pi lir gi rtsa ba muN+Di rnams cha mnyam zhib par</text></item>
<item><p>344b.1</p><section></section><text>btags la chu skol gyis d+hirta byas btang kyang phan no/ /yang na/ shut+Thi/ a raN+Di/ rA san/ da ba da ru/ gurtsa rnams cha mnyam gyi thang bsnga lugs gong ma rnams dang 'dra bar byas nas btang na phan par 'gyur ro/ /grang rlung la brten pa'i yan lag na zhing zha grum skrangs</text></item>
<item><p>344b.2</p><section></section><text>pa sogs la/ po sa ka bi dza/ /d+ha tu ra ka ra sa/ guny+tsa/ bi Sha/ lga daN+Da ng+hatu reka /bi dza shug pa li khri rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la til mar skol bar btab ste byugs na phan par 'gyur ro/ /stong sgyugs dang zas gang zos kyang skrugs na/ e la ya tsi/ /</text></item>
<item><p>344b.3</p><section></section><text>ka ma la ka Ta/ na'o bi 'bru thang phrom gyi thang chu dmar du mgo nag/ sman chen thang phron <p>]gyi bru[</p><section></section><text>'bru kha sur pa ni tshu ba ra gsum cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu grang gis rta byas skyug pa ma chod bar du yang yang btang bas phan par 'gyur ro/ /bad kan la brten pa'i glo drag tu lang na/ ka kol</text></item>
<item><p>344b.4</p><section></section><text>gam la'i 'bru ke sa ra/ ma ri tsi/ pip+pa la/ tam+ba mar/ la wang+ga rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la 'byor na pA Na dang mnyam du bza' zhing ma rnyed na chu dro 'jam gyis phul la btang na phan zhing dbugs kha mi bde ba la yang phan no/ /yang na/ pip+pa la/ rang+ga ri/ la</text></item>
<item><p>344b.5</p><section></section><text>lbang+ga / parang+gi / gur gum pho ris drod sman zangs btal ma li shi shuN+Thi rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu skol gyis rta byas btang kyang phan no/ /phol mig gi nad la/ pip+pa la/ ka tsa na ba ki b+ha ka li tri pha la rnams cha mnyam drod sman zhib par</text></item>
<item><p>344b.6</p><section></section><text>btags la chu skol gyis rta byas btang na bsos par 'gyur ro/ /lga yang na/ ba rang+gi dang / shuN+Di gnyis cha mnyam 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang mnyam du gar sla zho tsam drod sman ka can ra'i sogs pa 'bras bu gsum brdar la rma gang yod la byugs pas</text></item>
<item><p>344b.7</p><section></section><text>myur du bsos so/ /kha nad la/ ti khu ra/ tha rams e laya tsi/ kakol/ kha yi stong ja ra gsum zhib par btags la chus ril bu skyu ru ra tsam sgril la khar bzung na phan no/ /so rnying nas khrag 'dzag na/ a ru sa/ na ga ra mo tha/ ma nugla sgang / kha yi ra stod ja</text></item>
<item><p>345a.1</p><section></section><text>kuSh+Tha/ lo rda/ many+dzuSh+dza rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la so rtsar btab pas phan zhing so brtan par 'gyur ro/ /so srin byis na na/ tri pha la/ da kha/ gurtsa/ tsam+be li ke pa ta/ da ru ha ri dra rnams kyi thang gi steng du sbrang rtsi cung</text></item>
<item><p>345a.2</p><section></section><text>zad re btab la khar bzung ru<p>]rta[</p><section></section><text>bcod zhing pho bas phan no/ /sna ya mas skrangs nas na ba dang rnag gis tha ba la/ ku susba/ ha ri ha ke/ an rag phu la/ 'bras bu gsum rgun 'brum li khri tsam ba'i la'i log skyer pa 'di bu ba then tsam las gong ma lugs bzhin gdu mi dgos bdub</text></item>
<item><p>345a.3</p><section></section><text>rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa nu grang gis sbyar nas zhag drug tsam gyi ring snang blugs pas phan no/ /yang na/ /ma ri tsi rdog bal po kha che a rung se 'bru'i me tog gcig dang son ka sar ki pi dzi/ til 'bru tsam zhig chur brdar la sna nang du blug pas kyang phan no/ /</text></item>
<item><p>345a.4</p><section></section><text>mig na ba la/ ra sa ba te/ sen+ng+ha lo Na/ ha ri ta ke/ ge ru/ /ha la da rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa chu la kro res sbyar te mig gi mtha' skor la byugs pas phan par  son kara'i 'bru 'gyur ro/ /mig na mi na thams cad la phan pa'i mig sman ni/ ni ram li</text></item>
<item><p>345a.5</p><section></section><text>dang rnga sta gnyis me ha ri'i khu rgya mtsha a rur btsag sga ser bas rta byas brdar nas mig la byugs pas na zhi zhing gsal ba bstan pa sogs 'byung ngo / /mig la srod long byung na/ su ra ma dang ha la d+hi gnyis dza ba tri'i khu bas khar ba'i snod du brdar la</text></item>
<item><p>345a.6</p><section></section><text>sha dkar mig la byugs pas phan no/ /mig dmar por song zhing na na/ ma ri tsi/ /ge ru/ /khi ri lo Na gsum cha mnyam zhib par btags pa chu la sbyar nas mig gi phyi'i mtha' skor la byugs na phan par 'gyur ro/ /khrag la brten pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>345a.7</p><section></section><text>mig na na/ sen+ng+ha lo Na rgya mtshwa nas tsam ra snum la brdar nas mig gi nad la lo nges btsag lnga tswa byugs na phan no/ /rlung la brten pa'i mig mi gsal zhing / khyad par rgyang mig mi gsal bal/ pa ra/ dngul chu/ dzasta/ sha dkar/ sing+gi mi sri/</text></item>
<item><p>345b.1</p><section></section><text>muk+ta ka/ uTi ka dam ta/ /a ru sa rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la khar snod du ra'i 'o mas khu ba byas la legs par brdar nas mig nang du pyugs na phan par 'gyur zhing / mig gi 'grib la yang phan no/ /yang na/ mr-i ta tam+ba/ dzasta/ nI la tho tha/ /pha Ta ki ri</text></item>
<item><p>345b.2</p><section></section><text>su rten rngo mong gi so sa mu dra phe rnams cha mnyam zhib phar btags/ de nas khar snod du ba'i mar dang mnyam du legs par snur la mig nad la byugs pas kyang phan no/ /yang mig na ba la/ shwe ta dzi ta/ pha Ta ki ri/ zangs btub ma sha dkar <p>]big ban[</p><section></section><text>tri pha la/</text></item>
<item><p>345b.3</p><section></section><text>sba ba/ ra sa pa ti/ rgya mtsho lbu ba ha lim/ ha la d+hi/ lo d+ha rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags/ ras dri med pa'i nang du gtums la chu gtsang ma cung zad bcug la/ de nas mig la bdugs na phan no/ /zir dkar po yang mig gi rab rib la/ su ra ma/ 'bras bu gsum</text></item>
<item><p>345b.4</p><section></section><text>sen+ng+ha lo Na/ shang+kha/ ma ni tsha la/ tri ku Ta/ sga ser ni ra ma li/ sing+gi mi sri/ sa mu dra phe na rnams zhib par btags la khar snod du ra'i 'o ma dang mnyam du snur la de nas mig nang du byugs pas phan zhing ling tog la yang phan no/ /yang mig 'grib pa/ ling tog /sha</text></item>
<item><p>345b.5</p><section></section><text>dung sdong ros tshab gsum 'dzer/ rab rib la sogs pa mig gi rgya mtsho <p>]lbu ba[</p><section></section><text>nad thams cad la phan pa'i spyi 'joms chen mo ni/ si sa bzhus pa ba dar zhag lon pa skyur mo'i nang du blug /de khengs pa dang slang yang bzhu nas lugs thengs re la dar ba brje thengs</text></item>
<item><p>345b.6</p><section></section><text>re byas pa lan bcu'i bar byas/ slar yang de bzhin gi ba ko Ti'i khu bar lugs thengs bcu byas / a ka ba na'i khu bar lan bcu/ b+hang+ga ra'i khu bar lan bcu/ zhanye ba'i chur lan bcu/ tri pha la'i khu bar lan bcu/ ba'i 'o ma'i spyir lan bcu/ ba'i gci brlon par lan bcu</text></item>
<item><p>345b.7</p><section></section><text>ba'i zhor lan bcu/ til sgrum la lan bcu/ ba'i 'o mar lan bcu/ ba'i mar la lan bcu/ nim+nga'i khu bar lan bcu rnams bzhu lugs rim par byas/ slar bzhu ba'i nang du dngul chu zha nye 'bras bu gsum rang dang ljid mnyam pa zhig blug /de nas 'khar snod gla rtsi dang</text></item>
<item><p>346a.1</p><section></section><text>mnyam du ra'i 'o mas khu ba byas nas brdar te mig la byugs pas kun la phan zhing mig 'grib zin yang bye bar 'gyur ro/ /rna ba na ba la/ a ka ka ra sa/ ka la ti la gsum cha mnyam bsres la rna bar blugs pas phan zhing rnab 'on</text></item>
<item><p>346a.2</p><section></section><text>nas lo mang po ma song bas kyang thos par 'gyur ro/ /yang na/ de wa daru/ ba tsa/ shuN+Thi/ sen+ng+ha lo Na/ sany+tsa lo na rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa a ka'i khu ba sgog skya'i khum ti lan ga ra'i chul btab ste cung zad skol rna bar blugs na'ang nus pa gong dang</text></item>

<item><p>346b.6</p><section></section><text>zhing mo nad bu ram drod sman dngos gzhi la yang phan no/ /ma na'i 'bras bu lnga ser /yang na/ si ra sa ka pa ta/ dza ye phal/ sa mu dra phan/ ba ye bi rang+ga / e la ya dzi/ ga dza ke sa ra rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa thun tshad zho re chus ril bu sgril la ba mdog dkar rkyang ngam</text></item>

<item><p>348a.7</p><section></section><text>a rur rta byas ra'i chu cung zad cig blug mu zi mer po lga drod sman pi pi ling gi rtsa ba ste ril bu skyu ru ra tsam sgril rtsasta ma nu gla sgang sug smel sman chan la btang bas rlung la brten pa'i nad tsha grang gsar rnying gang la yang 'dis mi phan pa med do/ /sman gtong ring ro skyur</text></item>
<item><p>348b.1</p><section></section><text>ba'i rigs dang la phug mi za'o/ /rig pa 'di ni rgya mtsho dang mtshungs te/ /mtsho las dbul sel rin chen mtha' dag 'byung / /'di nyid las ni skye dgu'i tsha grang nad/ /zhi byed bdud rtsi ma tshang med par 'byung / /'di don rtogs shing khongs su chud gyur na/ /rang gzhan kun</text></item>

<item><p>348b.7</p><section></section><text>brdar te mig la byugs na ling tog med par 'gyur ro/ /shel dkar dang mnyam du btang na bud med bu btsas pa'i bang tshad sel bar 'gyur ro/ /ra'i chus rta byas btang na mkhris pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /ba'i dar ba dang mnyam du btang na pho ba na zhing sbos</text></item>
<item><p>349a.1</p><section></section><text>na sel bar 'gyur ro/ /a dza wa na dang mnyam du zos na dug rigs mtha' dag la phan no/ /hing+gu dang mnyam du zos na srin nad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /ha ri tal btul ma dang mnyam du zos na mdze dkar po thon par 'gyur zhing rma gsar rnying thams cad la phan</text></item>
<item><p>349a.2</p><section></section><text>no/ /nim+bu'i khu bas rta byas btang na pho ba'i gzer zhi la la phud bar 'gyur ro/ /nim+bu'i 'bru dang mnyam du shing kun btang na mkhris pa'i nad thams cad la phan no/[ \[]tha [</p><section></section><text>ba la /ha la d+hi dang mnyam du btang kyang phan yon gong dang 'dra/ ra'i chus rta byas btang na lus stobs che</text></item>

<item><p>349a.4</p><section></section><text>lo| /ra'i chus rta byas btang na dngugs gung bum stod du 'tshangs pa sel lo/ /ni ra guN+Tha'i khu bas rta byas zos na bud med dbang du 'dus so/ /sbrang rtsi dang mnyam du btang na lce'i dog sel lo/ /ko ci la 'bras tsam re dang mnyam du btang na skra rgya sma ra sogs dkar por</text></item>
<item><p>349a.5</p><section></section><text>song ba slar yang nag por 'gyur ro/ /ni ra guN+Da'i khu ba dang mnyam du zos na skya rbab sel bar 'gyur zhing chu nad tsha grang gang la yang phan no/ /ha la ng+hi dang mnyam du btang na khrag mkhris kyi nad zhi bar byed do/ /ha la ng+hi dang mnyam du ba mar la sbyar nas lba ba la byugs na</text></item>
<item><p>349a.6</p><section></section><text>skem par 'gyur ro/ /ba mdog gcig ma'i mar la sbyar nas mig la byugs na 'dre gdon gang gis kyang gnod pa mi 'byung ngo / /til mar la sbyar sga ser nas mig la byugs na mig gi nad thams cad la phan sga ser zhing gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /ni ra guN+Da'i khu bar</text></item>
<item><p>349a.7</p><section></section><text>sbyar la snar blug na ya mas mgo phyed na ba sel lo/ /ba dar gyis rta byas btang na dmu rjings kyi nad sel lo/ /tu la se ka tu ba pa'i me tog pa ta dang mnyam du zos na tsha ba'i nad thams cad sel lo/ /tsa ra tsi ri dang mnyam du zos na stobs glang po dang mnyam par</text></item>
<item><p>349b.1</p><section></section><text>'gyur ro/ /ka ro d+ha/ rang+ga ni/ bai ri gsum gyi khu bzho bzhi re dang mnyam du zos na dwangs ma 'phel zhing lus stobs che la mdangs gsal zhing gzhon sha chags pa sogs phan yon dpag tu med do/ /de rnams ni sa mu dra pha la kha sgyur dang bcas pa'o/ /b+hang+ga ra/ saM</text></item>
<item><p>349b.2</p><section></section><text>b+ha lu'i 'bras bu/ lo ma/ gurtsa/ ha ri ta ke/ ba ya ra/ a m+wa la/ tsi ta'i 'dru/ shun pa rnams so sor zho drug cu re gnyis ra/ nag ri mu sa ri zhe lnga bcu nga dgu/ tsaka ba dza gzho nyi shu rtsa drug /dA li tsi ni zho bco lnga rnams zhib par btags la/ bu ram zho drug</text></item>

<item><p>349b.5</p><section></section><text>'gyur/ zla ba bdun gyi bar du zos na gla ba'i mig ltar gsal bar 'gyur la/ zla ba brgyad kyi bar du zos na sems dran pa gsal zhing sngar brjed pa rnams kyang dran par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba dgu'i bar du zos na rgyang ring po yang mig gis mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba bcu'i bar du zos</text></item>
<item><p>349b.6</p><section></section><text>nas 'og gi gter mang po rnyed par 'gyur ba sogs yon tan mtha' yas so/ /ha ri ta ke/ ba yi ra/ am+ba la/ ca ka ba Da/ tsa ra tsi ri/ gurtsa/ b+hang+ga ra rnams so so nas srang bco lnga re/ sadz+ha khar dang lu ha tsur+Na gnyis zho bcu gnyis re/ te dza ba la zho gsum/</text></item>
<item><p>349b.7</p><section></section><text>sesba ri mnurtarkang zho bzhi rnams zhib bar btags la bu ram rnying ba srang drug cu dang a rur ba rur skyu rur thab dkar rdo rje mnyam du snur la legs li khri par 'dres pa dang ril bu sum brgya bsgril zi tsha la de nas snga dro lto rtsags bye stong la ril bu re nyin ltar gyis zla ba gcig gi/</text></item>
<item><p>350a.1</p><section></section><text>bar zos pas khong nang gi nad dang mi gtsang ba mtha' dag dbyung ste lus shel gong ltar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba gnyis kyi bar zos na mdangs gsal bar 'gyur/ zla ba gsum gyi bar du zos na lus stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba bzhi'i bar du zos na</text></item>
<item><p>350a.2</p><section></section><text>bad kan gyi nad thams cad rtsa ba nas thon par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba lnga'i bar du zos na skra dang kha spu dkar por song ba slar nag por 'gyur ro/ /zla ba drug gi bar du zos na so don pa slar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba bdun gyi bar du zos na mig shin tu gsal zhing rgyang ring po'ang</text></item>
<item><p>350a.3</p><section></section><text>mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba brgyad kyi bar du zos na mdze'i rigs thams cad rtsa ba nas thon par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba dgu'i bar du zos na dwangs ma shin tu 'phel zhing lus gzi brjid dang ldan la 'dod pa'ang ci 'dod spyod nus par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba bcu'i bar du zos na</text></item>
<item><p>350a.4</p><section></section><text>mngon par shes pa thogs med 'byung ba sogs phan yon bsam pa'i ra ba las 'das so/ /pa lag sha la brten pa'i man ngag khyad par can kun la med pa'i khyad chos/ slob dpon ha ri ha ri b+ha tsa'i gdams pa zab mo ni/ pa la sha ba dze'i snum legs par bton la/</text></item>
<item><p>350a.5</p><section></section><text>snum se ba phyed/ sbrang rtsi se ba phyed gnyis/ ba mar se ba do ste yongs sgril se ba bzhi'i rtsis re grangs ltar chags rgyun du zos na nyin mo'ang skar ma thams cad mthong / tshe ring thung lha dang mnyam/ gzhan gyis mthong na ba yang sha'i 'bru lus shin tu ring zhing sbom pa</text></item>
<item><p>350a.6</p><section></section><text>blos mi 'khyud pa tsam du mthong / gzi brjid nyi ma dang mnyam pas gzhan gyis glags lta bar mi nus/ lus mdzes shing blta na sdug pa 'dod lha dang mnyam/ gang 'dod du bsam pa tsam gyis sleb/ glo gros phur bu dang mnyam/ gang smras kun gyis bden par 'dzin zhing nyan</text></item>
<item><p>350a.7</p><section></section><text>pa dga' byed dpa' bo dang mtshungs/ lus la gzhan gang gis kyang gnod pas mi tshugs/ rang nyid lus 'dor bar 'dod na ma gtogs stobs rtsal dang ldan par bskal pa grangs med kyi bar du gnas par 'gyur/ yang tho rangs gong bzhin la/ phyi dro pa la sha'i rtsa ba/</text></item>
<item><p>350b.1</p><section></section><text>shing / lo ma/ me tog /'bras bu lnga cha mnyam zhib par btags pa se ba bzhi/ ba mar dang sbrang rtsi se ba do re bcas zos na sa gzhir rkang pa khru gang tsam ma reg par bar snang la 'gro/ lcags dang zangs me la bsregs par dri chu bran na gser du 'gyur/ lus la grib</text></item>
<item><p>350b.2</p><section></section><text>ma mi 'byung ba sogs yon tan dpag tu med pa thob/ de yang thog mar sman btang nas lo bcu gnyis tshun gong gi rtags de rnams rdzogs par rim can du 'byung ngo / /thog ma sman spyor ba dang za ba gnyis ka gza' skar legs pa la byed do/ /nad gsar rnying tsha grang gang</text></item>
<item><p>350b.3</p><section></section><text>la'ang sbyongs 'gro ba'i rigs la gtong na/ bi da ra zhib par btags la zho gsum chu skol gyis phul la btang nas lus ma 'khyags pa byas/ de nas ma dag par chu skol gyis lcag rim bzhin rgyab la gcod mtshams su sleb pa dang rkang lag chu grang mos bkrus par</text></item>
<item><p>350b.4</p><section></section><text>chod la/ rjes kyi zas spyod sogs sbyong spyi dang 'dra'o/ /a dza mong / tsi ta/ ma ri tsi/ pip+pa la/ ba yi birang+ga / de ba da ru/ san+ng+halo Na/ pip+pa la ka mu la shuN+Thi/ si la dza ta rnams srang re/ ha ri ta ka srang lnga rnams zhib par btags la bu ram srang bco lngas rta</text></item>
<item><p>350b.5</p><section></section><text>byas ril bu skyu ru ra tsam sgril la chu skol bzhi cha bsdus pa tsam dbyi mong  gyis phul pho ris drod sman byi thang ka shug pa rgyam tsha pi pi ling gi rtsa pa lga nas tho rangs btang bas pho ba mi bde ba/ a rur tshad pa/ bad kan/ rlung skran/ srin nad/ gzhang 'brum/</text></item>
<item><p>350b.6</p><section></section><text>lte ba'i rlung gzer/ tshags tshigs na ba/ pho ba sgos 'khrog /kha dri mi zhim pa/ rlung gi rigs/ 'dus pa rnams la mchog tu phan zhing dang kha 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /ka ka dze+e gi'i rtsa ba nad pa'i chu la brdar nas rma gang yod la byugs pas mda' gri phog pa sogs rma gsar rnying kun</text></item>
<item><p>350b.7</p><section></section><text>bsos rteshing khrag kyang chad do/ /khyi smyo ba dang ma smyo ba gang gis rmugs kyang / tsa ra tsi ri'i lo ma phyed dang gsum/ bu ram ba ru ra tsam de dang mnyam du khong du btang zhing / lo ma chur brdar ba rma khar yang byugs pas rma myur du bsos zhing byi dug gi gnod pa yang mi 'byung ngo / /gsha'/</text></item>
<item><p>351a.1</p><section></section><text>dkar/ rgya mtshal/ lhang tsher/ zangs/ lcags sogs/ 'dul thabs las/ gsha' dkar 'dul lugs ni/ chang zho bcu bzhu ba'i zhang du dngul chu zho/ sa pa dang rdza'i spar bu lta bu khebs ldan gye nang tshwa zhib mos brgyangs pa'i dkyil du bcug</text></item>
<item><p>351a.2</p><section></section><text>nas kha legs par bcad/ gsha' dkar la sogs pa btus ma 'di rnams sman sbyor gang dang gi skabs su de dang de <p>]bcul[</p><section></section><text>dgos pa byung na so so'i kha skyur rnams der te btags par thug nas phyed tsam gyis gtums/ de nas sa dong khru</text></item>
<item><p>351a.3</p><section></section><text>gang tsam zhig brus la ra'i ril mas bkang ba'i dkyil du btsug /de la me sbar te me ma yal tsam la slar yang ril ma bsnan te zhag gsum gyi ba'i khub srang lnga dang mnyam du blugs la kha legs par bsdams</text></item>
<item><p>351a.4</p><section></section><text>nas kha mtshams 'jim pas byugs la rlung mi 'gro bar byas te nyin phyed tsam gyi bar shing gi me mtshams ma chad par btang / de nas bton la grang thag chod thog rdo gzhong gi nang du zhib par btags/ thog mar gro tsam re dang / de nas sran ma tsam re dzA ti'i bzhi cha re dang mnyam du</text></item>
<item><p>351a.5</p><section></section><text>btang na lus stobs 'phel/ dang kha bde/ gzhon sha chags pa sogs yon tan mtha' yas pa 'byung ngo / /rgya mtshal 'dul thabs ni/ sing+ga ra pha srang do bil ba'i 'bras bu'i kha nas mtheb gang tsam ma chags pa sgor ba'i nang du blug /de nas sgor ba des kha bcad/ ras brdungs</text></item>
<item><p>351a.6</p><section></section><text>pa bsres pa'i 'jim pa sbyin po'i srab mthug nas gang tsam gyis gtums/ de nas sa dong brus la ra'i ril ma'i nang na me gtong lugs yun tshad sogs rgya mtshal gong bzhin tshar ba dang bton/ 'jim pa la sogs gang legs par byas rjes rgya mtshal bil ba dang dbyer med song ba de rdo gzhong</text></item>
<item><p>351a.7</p><section></section><text>gi nang du legs par snur la sran ma tsam re li shi rdog bzhi tsam btags pa dang mnyam du btang kyang yon tan gong dang 'dra'o/ /lhang tsher 'dul thabs ni/ a b+ha lhang tsher ka srang lnga/ snum bton pa'i ro ma ba chu srang bcu dang mnyam du legs par brdungs te srab mthug bag leb tsam</text></item>
<item><p>351b.1</p><section></section><text>byas la skam thag chod pa dang gci ba'i me'i dkyil du nyin phyed tsam gyi bar bsregs/ de nas bton la grang thag chod pa dang gi la ko Ti'i khu ba dang mnyam du rdo gzhong nang du nyin gcig gi ring brdar te slar yang srab mthug bag leb tsam bzosakye/ de skam thag chod pa dang gong bzhin</text></item>
<item><p>351b.2</p><section></section><text>gci ba'i me nang du nyin phyed kyi bar bsregs/ ma he ri'i khu bas nyin gcig gi bar nyed pa dang bag leb tsam bcos nas gci ba'i mer bsregs pa sogs sngar bzhin byas/ ban bu Thi'i khu ba dang mnyam du nyed pa sogs gzhan ma gong dang 'dra ba la gci ba'i mi nang du nyin gcig gi</text></item>
<item><p>351b.3</p><section></section><text>bar bsregs la/ de nas grang thag chod pa dang bton la rdo gzhong nang du zhib par btags la ras la btsags/ de nas 'bras tsam re li shi bzhi tsam brdungs pa'i phye ma dang mnyam du btang bas lus rgyags pa/ brtan pa/ gzi mdangs che ba/ rgas sra ba/ 'dod pa spyod nus pa sogs</text></item>
<item><p>351b.4</p><section></section><text>stobs bskyed kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /zangs 'dul thabs ni/ talba mang nyung ji ltar 'dod pa sbrang gshog legs par 'then te mer bsregs/ de snum gyi dkyil du bcug /yang mer bsregs/ snum nang du 'jug pa sogs lan bdun gyi bar byas/ de bzhin du rim pa</text></item>
<item><p>351b.5</p><section></section><text>ltar/ dar ba/ ba'i chu/ ba'i zho star bu'i khu ba rnams lan bdun zangs re byas rjes/ de nas rdza snod du ra'i chu zangs mang nyung dang bstun pa'i snod kyi phyed tsam gang ba blug la me btang ste/ chu de skam thag chod pa dang chu gtsang mas legs par bkrus/ de nas dngul chu</text></item>
<item><p>351b.6</p><section></section><text>zangs leb gang yod kyi phyi nang tshang mar mdog dkar por ma song bar byugs/ de steng b+hang+ga ri'i khu ba legs par byugs/ de nas zangs dang ljid mnyam pa'i mu zi ser po btags pa zangs brtsegs pa'i srubs la khod snyoms yod pa byas nas khog ma gsar pa'i nang du bcug /</text></item>
<item><p>351b.7</p><section></section><text>khog ma'i kha dam par bcad de kha mtshams 'jim pas gtums nas rlung mi 'gro bar bya/ de lcags sgyed lta bu'i steng du bzhag nas nyin gnyis dang mtshan gcig gi bar me mtshams ma chad par btang / de yang nyin dang po la me cung zad chung ba btang / nyin mtshan</text></item>
<item><p>352a.1</p><section></section><text>phyi ma gnyis la shin tu tshal btang / de nas grang thag chod pa dang ras kyi khung du gtums nas chu gtsang mar 'jug 'don thengs lnga tsam byas/ de rjes skam thag chod pa dang rdo gzhong du zhib par btags/ de nas 'bras tsam re nam zla grang</text></item>
<item><p>352a.2</p><section></section><text>dus li shi dang / dro dus ka ko la dang mnyam du btang bas pho ba'i me drod ches cher bskyed de zas gang zos kyang 'phral du 'ju bas dang kha shin tu bde la lus gzi mdangs dang stobs rtsal che zhing gzhon sha chags pa sogs yon tan dpag tu med pa 'byung ngo / /lcags 'dul</text></item>
<item><p>352a.3</p><section></section><text>lugs ni/ lu ha mang nyung ji ltar 'dod pa srab 'thug nas phyed tsam brdungs pa sor bzhi gru bzhi tsam pa bcos/ de rdza snod kyi nang du bi sa kha pa ri'i khu ba dang mnyam du blug la nyi ma gang tsha sar zhag nyi shu'i bar khu ba skam rim bzhin blug nas bzhag /zhag grangs thim pa dang bton</text></item>
<item><p>352a.4</p><section></section><text>la slar yang gong lcags bzhin la phug btsir ba'i khu ba dang mnyam du zhag nyi shu'i bar bzhag /de nas bton la sol ba'i me nang du skam pas bzung la dmar por tshig pa dang ba'i chu'i nang du bcug /slar yang sreg 'jug gong bzhin lan lnga'i bar byas la/ de nas rdo gzhong nang du</text></item>
<item><p>352a.5</p><section></section><text>zhib par btags la nas tsam re nam zla grong dus lga dang / dro dus ka ko la dang mnyam du zos pas dngas ma 'phel zhing lus stobs bskyed la/ mu sa ba ra dang mnyam du zos na dmu rdzings dang skya rbab sel/ a ka ra ka dang la bang+ga cha mnyam btags pa se ba phyed do dang / gong gi</text></item>
<item><p>352a.6</p><section></section><text>lcags phyes ba phyed bcas btang na dang kha mi bde ba/ glo/ mig ser rnams la phan no/ /zha nye nag po 'dul thabs ni/ shi sha mang nyung dzo ltar 'dod pa su bam thug ras tsa ma brdungs pa sen mo tsam du gtubs/ li shi/ de dang ljid mnyam pa'i pip+ba la dang mnyam du rdo</text></item>
<item><p>352a.7</p><section></section><text>gzhong nang du nyin gnyis kyi bar skam nyed zhib par byas/ de nas ras la btsags pa se ba phyed shel dkar dang li shi cha mnyam  zha nyen nag kho du btags pa zho re dang mnyam du btang na/ lus shin tu rid cing shed med pa sogs la mdangs dang lus drod sman stobs mchog</text></item>
<item><p>352b.1</p><section></section><text>tu bzang bar 'gyur ro/ /gsha' tshe 'dul thabs ni/ sa ta ji ltar 'dod pa lcags snod du bzhu ba de dang ljid mnyam pa'i bku tsi zhib par btags pa thug thal ltar 'debs shing dkrug /de legs par 'dres nas nas khangs pa dang rdo gzhong nang du zhib par btags la ras</text></item>
<item><p>352b.2</p><section></section><text>la btsags pa se ba phyed shel dkar dang ka ko la cha mnyam gsha' tshe du btags pa se ba bzhi dang mnyam du btang na tsha ba'i nad rigs thams cad la phan no/ /bab la 'dul thabs ni/ ha ri ta la ta ba ki srang nyi shu zhib par btags la ras la gtums khog mar gong gi 'bras</text></item>
<item><p>352b.3</p><section></section><text>chu skyur mo'i nang du bcug la ras khog ma'i mthil lam reg pa'i ngos ras thum chu dkyil du yong ba'i thi gu ri thung 'tsham pa btags pa'i shing tshag khog ma'i khar 'jog /khog ma lcags sgyed lta bu'i steng du bab lab tsag bu ltar shun pa 'bye rgyu yod bzhig yod bzhag nas me nyin</text></item>
<item><p>352b.4</p><section></section><text>phyed kyi ring bar ma chad par btang / de nas bton la rdo gzhong nang du a dz+yapa la srang do dang mnyam ras shing gi rtsa bas khu ba byas la nyin gsum gyi bar du snur/ de bzhin du pa la sha'i khu ba/ bang+ga ri'i khu ba/ da ng+hu ri'i khu ba/ ku haDa'i khu ba/ baT ku i'i khu ba rnams kyis rim</text></item>
<item><p>352b.5</p><section></section><text>pa bzhin nyin gsum re'i bar snur la/ de nas srab 'thug bag lo tsam byas la skam/ de nas khog ma'i nang du pa la sha brdar ba'i phye mas khog ma'i phyed brgyangs pa'i steng du bzhag /de steng du yang shing phye khengs par blug la kha gcod legs par 'grig pa'i mtshams 'jim</text></item>
<item><p>352b.6</p><section></section><text>pas gtums nas rlung mi 'chor ba byas/ de lcags sgyed kyi steng du bzhag la thog mar nyin phyed kyi bar me chung brta ma chad tsam re btang / de nas nyin phyed kyi bar de las che tsam btang / de nas nyin mtshan gnyis kyi ring me shin tu tsha ba btang / de nas grang thag chod pa dang bton</text></item>
<item><p>352b.7</p><section></section><text>la rdo gzhong gi nang du zhib par btags la ras la btsags pa se ba phyed dang h+lang+hi sga ser zho do dang mnyam du zos na khrag mkhris kyi nad sel lo/ ba yi bi byi thang ka rang+ga zho gang ha la ng+hi zho do bcas zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi ring zos na skom pa'i nad sel bar 'gyur ro/ /tsa ra tsi ri'i</text></item>
<item><p>353a.1</p><section></section><text>thang chu zho lnga dang sen+d+ha lo Na zho gang bcas pa zla gcig zhag bcu dgu'i bar zos na mdze dkar po'i rigs rtsa ba nas thon no/ /pip+pa la zho do dang a jalba Na zho lnga bcas pa zhag grangs gong 'dra zos na pags nad shu 'gram sogs sel lo/ /ba ku tsi dang na gi zho gsum</text></item>
<item><p>353a.2</p><section></section><text>de bcas pa zla gcig zhag bcu dgu'i rgyam tsha bar zos na mdze nag po'i rigs rtsa ba nas thon no/ /ja ya pa tri dang khu ra sa a dza wa ni zho re bcas pa drod sman bal phud zhag grangs gong 'dra zos na sha bkra'i nad sal lo/ /ni ra guN+Di'i khu ba zho gsum/ la bang+ga zho lnga dang bcas pa zla ba</text></item>
<item><p>353a.3</p><section></section><text>gcig zhag bcu dgu'i bar zos na mdzes sor mo gum pa dang yan lag zha ba sogs sos so/ ja ti'i me tog la la bub chung ba shwe ta su ba ri dang ma ri tsi zhor bcas pa zhag grangs gong 'dra zos na khrag la brten pa'i mdze la phan no/ /pip+pa la'i pags pa dang ja li shi mu ni'i pags pa zho gsum</text></item>
<item><p>353a.4</p><section></section><text>re bcas pa zla gcig zhag bcu dgu'i bar zos na mdzes sor mo'am yan lag chad pa dang / sna chad pa zhom go yu bcag na kha dog dkar mo yod pa pho ris pa sogs sos so/ /pa la lo tsa Na dang pa na zho re bcas pa zhag drod sman grangs gong bzhin zos na rlung la brten pa'i yan</text></item>
<item><p>353a.5</p><section></section><text>lag zha grum/ grang ba sogs bsos par 'gyur ro/ /sbrang rtsi dang mnyam du zhag bcu bzhi'i bar zos na 'dus pa'i nad sel lo/ /la wang+ga se ba bzhi dang mnyam du zhag grangs gong 'dra zos na bse dug gi nad sel lo/ /pip+pa la dang sen+d+ha lo zho re/ la wang+ga zho do dang bcas</text></item>
<item><p>353a.6</p><section></section><text>zla ba gcig zhag bcu dgu'i bar zos na dmu rjings kyi nad thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/ /ke la'i khu ba/ pip+pa la/ gur gsum zho do dang li shi bcas pa zhag grangs gong bzhin zos na mgo gzer gyi nad sel lo/ shuN+Thi dang a sa gan+ng+ha drod sman rgya tsha zho re dang bcas pa li shi bzhag nyi shu rtsa</text></item>
<item><p>353a.7</p><section></section><text>gcig gi bar zos na khong nang gi rlung skran zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /dza la kum+bi zho gsum/ hi ra bi'i khu ba zho gang dang bcas pa zla gcig gam zhag bcu dgu'i bar du zos na mdze rigs thams cad rtsa ba nas thon no/ lag ba spru ba pip+pal drod sman dang dang+hu ra'i thang phrom khu bzhor/ pa na</text></item>
<item><p>353b.1</p><section></section><text>dum tsam dang bcas pa zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du zos na sbrags pa dang 'byin pa sel lo/ /e raN+Da'i rtsa ba dang yi bi rang+ga zho do re/ dza ye pha la zho gang dang bcas pa nyin bcu bzhi'i bar zos na srin nad rtsa ba nas 'byin no/ /na ga da ba ni'i rtsa ba/ ka pa dza/ shuN+Thi gsum zho do</text></item>
<item><p>353b.2</p><section></section><text>ra dang bcas pa zla gcig zhag bcu dgu'i bar zos na rtsa 'dar gyi nad sel lo/ /bang+ga na'i khu ba zho dan+Da byi thang do dang mnyam du dzAti zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar zos na sna'i nad sel lo/ /ti ta ba ro la'i khu ba zho do/ rang+ga ni'i khu ba zho drug dang bcas pa nyin lga bcu bzhi'i bar</text></item>
<item><p>353b.3</p><section></section><text>zos na mtshan bar rdol ba'i nad sel lo/ /nim+bi'i pags pa zho do/ a dza wa ni zho brgyad dang bcas pa zhag nyer gcig gi bar btang na gzhang 'brum gyi nad sel lo/ / pip+pa la'i khu bzho do dang mnyam gser me du zos na mri gi'i nad sel lo/ /tsa ra tsi ri'i khu ba dang / shuN+Di zho</text></item>
<item><p>353b.4</p><section></section><text>gsum re dang bcas pa zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar zos na za phrug gi nad sel lo/ /la la bud sbrang rtsi dang rang+ga ni zho gsum re dang bcas pa zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar zos kyang phan yon gong dang 'dra'o/ /de rnams ni bab la btul ma kha bsgyur dang bcas pa'i phan yon te/ sman de lga</text></item>
<item><p>353b.5</p><section></section><text>rnams gtong ring ro sgyur ba dang la phug mi bza'/ khyad par mdze nad kyi rigs la gtong skabs zas gang la'ang tsha bsrung dgos so/ /gsha' dkar ram zha nye dkar po 'dul lugs ni/ gsha' dkar rang+ga srang phyed gsum srab mthug shog bu tsam brdungs pa sen mo tsam du gtubs/ a dza wa ni</text></item>
<item><p>353b.6</p><section></section><text>dang be Da ha gnyis srang nyi shu re so sor zhib par btags la gci ba khru gang gru bzhi tsam brtsegs pa'i steng du ras bting / de steng gong gi la la phud kyi phye ma'i phyed snyoms par brdal de steng ba ru ra'i phye ma'i phyed snyoms par bting / de steng gong gi zha nye dkar po bkram/ la la phud de steng</text></item>
<item><p>353b.7</p><section></section><text>btur la la phud kyi phyi ma phyed po brdal/ de steng ba ru ra'i phye ma phyed po brdal la gci ba'i me sbar te me ma yal bar bzhag /grang thag chod pa dang zha nye dkar po rnams sgrugs la rdo gzhong du zhib par btags te ras la btsags pa se ba gang / e la ya tsi se ba gang dang shel</text></item>
<item><p>354a.1</p><section></section><text>dkar zho gang bcas zla ba gcig gi bar btang na lus rgyags pa/ brtan pa/ gzi mdangs che ba/ yang ba/ rgas kha sra ba sogs yon tan dpag tu med cing stobs bskyed kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /de ltar slob dpon kun phan bdud rtsi</text></item>
<item><p>354a.2</p><section></section><text>byin gyis mdzad pa'i tshangs pa'i rig byed rgya mtsho'i yan lag 'dzin pa g.yo ba can dang / lha dbang phyug gis tshogs bdag la gnang ba'i sa mu dra pha la'i sbyor ba sogs zur bskol zab gnad can sna tshogs dang bcas sbyor ba kha bsgyur sdom pa sum brgyar nye ba'i</text></item>
<item><p>354a.3</p><section></section><text>bstan bcos 'di ni/ dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi mkhyen brtse nus pa'i spyi gzugs rgyal ba'i dbang po thams cad mkhyen gzigs chen po'i bla'i sman pa/ deng dus bsil ldan gyi ljongs 'dir gso ba rig pa'i ring lugs 'dzin pa la 'gran pa'i zla thams cad</text></item>
<item><p>354a.4</p><section></section><text>dang bral ba yar stod dar mo sman rams pa blo bzang chos grags kyis 'di ltar sgyur cig zhes bka' stsal ut+pa la'i chun po thod du bcings te 'phags yul ma thu rar rgyal rigs mchog gi rigs las tshe'i rig byed 'dzin par gu nA tha dang / gtsang stod 'dar</text></item>
<item><p>354a.5</p><section></section><text>gyi skad gnyis pa ngag dbang phun tshogs lhun grub kyis rab byung bcu gcig pa'i nang gi don 'grub ces pa sa lug nag pas nya ba'i yar tshes dge bar phun tshogs lugs brgya'i mdun sa pho brang chen po po ta lar bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'i yi ge pa ni nyang</text></item>
<item><p>354a.6</p><section></section><text>stod pa 'jam dbyangs dbang pos bgyis pa 'dis kyang 'gro ba mang po la phan par gyur cig /shu b+ha mastu sarba dza ga taM// //[]@/ /'phags yul dbus 'gyur mthu ra'i rgyal rigs kyi sman bar gunA tha'i gdams pa bzhugs so// //</text></item>
<item><p>354a.7</p><section></section><text>@#/ /'dre gdon gyi gnod pa rang gzhan gnyis ka la bsrung na/ a kA sha ki ka mi ni ban+ng+he/ pa ta la ki na gi ni ban+ng+he/ na benA/ tha tsaur si sib+ng+ha ben+ng+hi/ dA he ne na ra sing+ha ban+ng+he/ sa tas ta hu la ban+ng+he/ pany+tsa pa ny+tsa hu la ban+ng+he/ tsaud har ne ban+ng+he/ u</text></item>
<item><p>354b.1</p><section></section><text>Dan+ti a ma sa na ban+ng+he/ rag ti a ma san ban+ng+he/ tsaus Thi yo gi ni ban+ng+he/ ba ba ni par ban+ng+he/ a Tha si ka ru pa ban+ng+he/ de ba ban+ng+he/ da nau ban+ng+he/ ki yo ka ra yo ban+ng+he/ a pa no par o ban+ng+he/ la ge o pa li ge o ban+ng+he/ tsha tis ro ga me ro ga ge /go ha dza ti/ ka</text></item>
<item><p>354b.2</p><section></section><text>pa la te/ tsauMTi te/ na bon rib ha ta ri ko Tha te/ ya haMpa ba hi taM ban+ng+he/ a de b+hairo ban+ng+he/ yug de bai ro ban+ng+he/ tsa ri khuT pany+tsa i de ha ri ban+ng+he/ a thad ha pa rab nas bab ti ban+ng+he/ na bo la kha ka ba ruM ban+ng+he/ sa ba su mer par ba ta ban+ng+he/ ban+ng+he ban+ng+he sai a da ba ra ha na/ de khum</text></item>
<item><p>354b.3</p><section></section><text>te re man+t+ra ki sak+ti/ mi ri bak+ti/ pho re man+t+ra i sh+Ta ro ba tsa/  zhes pa'i sngags 'di dag par bzung la thog mar nyi zla gang rung gza' 'dzin yod dus mdun du mar me/ spos/ lug sha tshon tsam/ chang phud bcas bza' 'dzin ma grol bar bsnyen pa gang 'gro skyel/ de rjes</text></item>
<item><p>354b.4</p><section></section><text>rang bsrung na gang dgos dus bzlas shing / gzhan 'dre gdon gyis gnod pa la phus btab pas/ sha za/ yi dgas/ 'byung po sogs 'dre gdon gang gis kyang glags mi rnyed do/ /yang / ha tha kha pa ra ka re re ka pa la/ ma ri mas ni hUM phi ruM mo hi ra khe ma ha ma gA la/ a</text></item>

<item><p>355a.1</p><section></section><text>kyi sgo nas ngan byed byas pa thams cad byed po kho rang la bzlog pa las glags rnyed par mi 'gyur zhing 'dre gdon kyi gnod pa'ang mi 'byung ngo / /a de sha gu ru gum purba de sha yo gi ni/ pa tshi ma ni ra d+ha ra/ ban+ng+ho khaM Da pA haM pra d+ha ra/ i shwa ra ma hA de ba/</text></item>
<item><p>355a.2</p><section></section><text>ru pe pA u/ so du ri me saM ga tsa d+ha li/ a tra a tra d+ha da tsu re/ ru aM baM ho i/ ka ma ru ka mi k+Sha ki do ha yi/ ru i baM ga do ha yi/ gra ru goR+Sha na tha ki do ha yi/ me ri b+hak+ti gu ra ki sak+ti/ phu re man+t+ra ne na yo gi nI ba tsa/ zhes pa'i sngags 'di yid la bzung la g.yul la 'jug skabs sogs nam</text></item>

<item><p>355a.7</p><section></section><text>ka pe tha d+he/ pa Tha ho i la ge ma re to ma sa na ho i/ i dza ga dzi bai ho ta ra ba tsa tre// me ri b+hak+ti gu ra ki sak+ti/ phu re man+t+ra i shwa ro ba tsa/ zhes pa'i sngags 'di go yu phye mar btab pa la lan sum cu bgrangs te bsngags la dzar btab ste bud med gang 'dod la sbyin na rang gi</text></item>
<item><p>355b.1</p><section></section><text>dbang du 'dus nas ci zer nyan par 'gyur ro/ /sbrang bu zi ma pho mo gnyis gza' nyi ma yod pa'i nyin zin la dur khrod du pho mo ma nor ba me la bsregs pa'i thal ba ma nor ba so sor tshags byas/ de'i pho'i thal ba bud med kyis skyes pa la byen na skyes pa dbang du 'du zhing / mo'i thal ba skyes</text></item>

<item><p>355b.5</p><section></section><text>dar mo sman rams pas rnyed pa'o//[ ]@/ /mig 'byed mthong ba don ldan bzhugs so/ /@##/ /rgya gar shA dzang gi sman pa yul ba ri pu ra nas 'ongs pa'i ma na ho'i lag len zin bris su dgod pa ni/ de la</text></item>
<item><p>355b.6</p><section></section><text>sman dpyad zas spyod bzhi la/ sngon 'gro/ /dngos gzhi/ rjes/ rten 'brel/ sngags rnams so/ /dang por dgongs mo nyal nas sang mig mi 'byed kyi bar du zas skom gyi rigs bkag /sprin med nyi ma dro sar nad pa dang sman pa gnyis stan bde bar</text></item>

<item><p>356a.1</p><section></section><text>rdza rngar 'jam pa rnams bsags rjes/ nad pa dang sman pa gnyis kyi lham phud/ sman pa'i lag pa gtsang bar bkrus/ nas phud gnyis ka'i lag tu thogs nas gsol 'debs bden bdar brjod nas nas 'thor/ yung ba brdar nas chu dang</text></item>

<item><p>356a.7</p><section></section><text>sgring byed thur mar 'khril nas dngos su mthong ba yong / de nas bya 'phur slob 'dra ba/ rgya gar skad la rnyo don dzo ti/ shin sman giN+Da paT nimA'i rnams chu thigs gnyis gsum rdo 'jam po'i steng blug par rim bzhin brdar ba'i skyo ma sngar gyi thur ma brgyab par bslan/ de'i rjes srin bal</text></item>

<item><p>356b.5</p><section></section><text>mi byed/ spyod lam nyin mo gnyid mi nyal/ldan pa g.yas g.yon phab nas mi sdod/ dgongs mo nyal sa steng shod la 'gro dgos yod tshe dal bus phyin nas nyal zhing rkang pa brkyangs chog /de nyin nas bzung zhag gsum gyi bar mig sman mig 'byed pa'i dus dang</text></item>
