<item><p>356b.7</p><section></section><text>btsag yug rnams rim cha bskyed nas btab byugs pas phan zhing / gzhan yang log gnon/ 'gram pa/ 'grib pa/ zhar ba/ gzer ba sogs rgyud ltar shes par bya'o/ /kye ma shar phyogs rin chen shel gyi gzhal yas na/ /bde chen pad+ma dkar po'i</text></item>
<item><p>357a.1</p><section></section><text>gdan khri la/ /sku yi rigs kyi drang srong 'khor dang bcas/ /deng 'dir zhi ba'i dbang dang byin rlabs stsol/ /lho'i drang srong ser po/ kye ma lho phyogs rin chen gser gyi gzhal yas nas/ /bde chen pad+ma ser po'i klong dkyil na/ /yon tan rigs</text></item>
<item><p>357a.2</p><section></section><text>kyi drang srong 'khor dang bcas/ /deng 'dir rgyas pa'i dbang dang byin rlabs/ /nub kyi drang srong dmar po/ kye ma nub phyogs rin chen mchong gi gzhal yas nas/ /bde chen pad+ma dmar po'i dkyil dbus na/ /gsung gi rigs kyi drang srong 'khor dang bcas/ /deng 'dir dbang ldan</text></item>
<item><p>357a.3</p><section></section><text>dbang gi byin rlabs stsol/ /byang gi drang srong ljang gu/ kye ma byang phyogs rin chen g.yu yi gzhal yas nas/ /bde chen pad+ma ljang gu'i gdan steng na/ /'phrin las rigs kyi drang srong 'khor dang bcas/ /deng 'dir 'phrin las dbang dang byin rlabs stsol/ /dbus kyi drang srong</text></item>
<item><p>357a.4</p><section></section><text>mthing ba/ /kye ma dbus phyogs rin chen baiDUr gzhal yas nas/ /bde chen pad+ma mthing ga'i klong dbus su/ /rigs ldan thugs kyi drang srong 'khor dang bcas/ /deng 'dir bsam tshad lhun grub dbang mchog stsol/ /khyod kyi bu brgyud slob brgyud thams cad la/ /drang srong rigs lnga sman</text></item>
<item><p>357a.5</p><section></section><text>skyong srung mar bcas/ /bskal pa ma stongs par du byun gyis rlobs/ /kye rin chen sna lnga baiDUr gzhal yas khang / /dkar ser dmar ljang mthing ga pad+ma'i steng / /rigs lnga pho brang 'ja' tshon 'khrigs pa'i dbus/ /mtshan dpes rab brgyan sangs rgyas sman gyi bla/ /ye shes</text></item>
<item><p>357a.6</p><section></section><text>lnga ldan sku lnga gsal bar sprul/ /re re'i 'od la 'khor gyi drang srong dang / /lha dang drang srong phyi nang sde bzhis bskor/ /zhi rgyas dbang drag lhun grub rnam pa lnga'i/ /sman gyi bu mo rnam lnga gnas 'dir byon/ /dri bzang me tog gru gar du ma bcas/ /drang srong rnams la phyag dang mchod pa 'bul/ /</text></item>
<item><p>357a.7</p><section></section><text>khang+ga ra khang+ga ra/ sA ta saM bung+ng+ha ra/ pa la/ gaN+Da/ gau ra/ smau re/ mA le/ bi pe pA ni/ lan gsum bzla/ shing kun srang gang / li shi srang gang / dzA ti zha drug /sug smel srang gang / pi pi leng zho drug /rgya gar gyi la la phud zho drug /kha che zho do/ 'jam 'bras pags pa med pa zho</text></item>
<item><p>357b.1</p><section></section><text>gsum/ shing tsha zho gsum/ a ru ra rus pa med pa zho drug /shu dag zho gsum/ ru rta zho drug /thal dkar rdo rje zho drug /kong po'i sga zho drug /sha 'bras zho gsum/ ga bur zho gsum/ zi ra nag po zho drug /pho ba ri zho gsum/ dom mkhris zho gsum/ sum cu tig zho gsum/ gla rtsi zho gsum/</text></item>
<item><p>357b.2</p><section></section><text>gi haM zho gsum/ sle tres zho drug /byi thang ka zho gsum/ ba du ra zho drug /sgog pa 'khar nyag gsum/ btsod nyag gang / d+ha du ra zho gsum/ btsan dug zho gsum/ sa min pha la zho gsum/ ko byil zho gsum/ tsi tra ka zho drug /dngul chu zho gang / gzi yod pa'i so ma ra tsa zho gsum/pad ka dmar</text></item>
<item><p>357b.3</p><section></section><text>po'i snum nyag drug /til nag gi snum nyag gsum/ zar ma'i snum nyag gsum/ nyungs kar gyi snum nyag drug /nya tsho ba dkyus mtho gang lhag tsam bcu drug gi khu ba/ phag tshil nyag gsum/ spyang ki'i tshil nyag gang / rgod kyi tshil spor do/ /sman sbrul sgor mo bubs gcig btsos pa'i khu</text></item>
<item><p>357b.4</p><section></section><text>ba/ phug ron gyi sha rul sums med pa bubs gcig btsos pa'i khu ba/ 'bri mar lo bcu gnyis song ba nyag lnga/ lcag mar nyag do/ ra'i 'o ma phul gang sbyar ba rnams kyi byug pas/ grum bu'i nad/ rtsa dkar/ dreg /rlung 'bam/ chu ser/ me dbal/ za 'phrug /skam mdze/ khe</text></item>
<item><p>357b.5</p><section></section><text>ma/ 'brum thor/ shu ba sogs chu ser grang ba la brten pa'i rigs mtha' dag la phan/ nyi ma byung na dang de min me la bsros pa'i 'byug thengs gnyis byed/ srong phyed re nad gzhi gang yod la bsgu mnye zhib 'them byas pa'i lo gcig song na zhag bdun tshun la drag /na ba'i lo gnyis song na zhag</text></item>
<item><p>357b.6</p><section></section><text>bcu bzhir drag /gsum song na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig la drag /'di khong du gtong rgyu'i sman nya phyis zho drug /la la phud zho drug /pi pi ling zho gsum/ tsi ta ka zho gsum/ kong sga zho drug /gser mdog rus med zho drug /ba ru ra zho gsum/ sle tres zho gsum/ tik+ta zho phyed do/ /sug smel zho phyed</text></item>
<item><p>357b.7</p><section></section><text>do/ /dzA deti zho phyed do/ /li shi zho phyed do/ /so ma ra tsa zho gang / 'jam 'bras zho gsum/ gla rtsi zho phyed do/ /gi haM zho phyed do/ /pho ril zho phyed do/ /'di rnams kyi khar bye dkar spar ba gang btab pa'i ril bu kham bu skam po tsam tho rangs chu skol ngang yal gyes rta byas btang ngo / /zas la rtsam pa/ sha gsar/</text></item>
<item><p>358a.1</p><section></section><text>rus gsar gyi thug pa tsha phyed tsha/ ja la mar dang 'o ma med pa'i tsha phyed tsha ma gtogs zas kyi rigs mi gtong / phan yon mgo dang rna ba yan lag ma gtogs khong nad kyi rigs la phan/ rgya gar gyi skad la sa mu dra phe na/ bod skad la rgya mtsho'i sru ba dngos/ sgog pa se'u</text></item>
<item><p>358a.2</p><section></section><text>gsum/ li shi/ dzA ti gsum cha bsnyams pa'i phye ma snum skol bar btab pa'i khu ba rna bar thigs pa gsum ri gnyis ra blugs pas te rna ba'i nad tsha grang kun la phan/ ba'i 'o ma phul do/ snum phul gang / rgya gar gyi d+ha du ra zho drug zhib par btags snum dang 'o ma gnyis skol bar</text></item>
<item><p>358a.3</p><section></section><text>btab pa lus la byugs pas chu bsags/ pho ba sgos pa na zug che ba'i rigs la phan/ zas spyod rtsam pa dang skom li shi 'bru bdun tsam chu phor gang la sbangs pa'i khub grang mo gtong / gong gi sman rnams nyin re la 'byug thengs gnyis re byed/ nyin bdun tsam la grag 'gro/ sman chen ser po</text></item>
<item><p>358a.4</p><section></section><text>dang dung me la bsregs pa pho ril gsum zho la bteg pa'i ril bu pho ril tsam sgril ba khong du btang bas cham pa/ tsha ba/ za ma ma zhu ba rnams la bsngags/ sman ma zhu na dug ril ltag pa sbrad ces byepa yang 'di yin/ 'khyags pa sogs grang ba'i nad rigs kun la phan/ rgya gar gyi la la phud</text></item>
<item><p>358a.5</p><section></section><text>chu la thun che bar btab la skol ba'i khu ba phor pa do gsum tsam btang bas shal skyug gang rigs byung na phan/ grang ba yun ring lo 'das 'grim pa la ko ci la me la bsregs pa dang la la phud shu dag gsum khram khrum brdungs pa thun che ba gsum zos pas phan/ rtsam pa rtsam thug mdzo zho'i</text></item>
<item><p>358a.6</p><section></section><text>chu ras la btsags pa btang bas phan/ pho pa 'bras bu gsum sdom chung ba la thag btang ba gcig zhib par btags pa'i khu ba mgo bo gzhogs phyed na la nadan gang na'i mig tu dar la btsags pa'i khu ba blug pas phan/ kro ma seng ge/ tsan dan dmar po/ lga ser/ btsag</text></item>
<item><p>358a.7</p><section></section><text>rnams brdar ba'i khu ba bal mchu la byugs pas phan/ so ma ra tsa brdar ba'i khu ba mig gi mtha' la byugs pas na zug che ba la phan/ ma la drod dugs byed/ ha ha tha g+ha ru la g+ha ru ra yi ke ke ma tsu li/ aM ge he aM g+ha sa ma i zhes lan gsum thal ba la sngags btab na kha rlang gi dug la phan no// //</text></item>
<item><p>358b.1</p><section></section><text>@/ /'phrul gyi me long dgu skor zhes bya ba'i rtsa 'grel bzhugs/ /@##/ /kun mkhyen nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor lta ba'i spyi 'grel brdeg /log rtog byang chub yul snang ba'i/ /chos kun</text></item>
<item><p>358b.2</p><section></section><text>sems su gcig mi gcig /lhun gyis grub pa gang la bgyi/ /de nyid snang ba yod dam med/ /ye nas sangs rgyas yin nam min/ /khams gsum sems can ji ltar 'khrul/ /'khrul nyid ni don ci</text></item>
<item><p>358b.3</p><section></section><text>lags/ /rnal 'byor bye ba'i ngo bo gang / /de dag dogs pa'i the tshom gang / /de rnams khyad par ji ltar che/ /'phrul gyi me long dgu skor skyebazhin/ /gsal byed 'phrul tshig dgu yis ston/ /sgyu ma rnam gnyis</text></item>
<item><p>358b.4</p><section></section><text>spyod du yul ni/ /sems kyi chos nyid ngang du gcig /de yi de nyid ji lta ba/ /mkha' dang gzha' snang ji bzhin du/ /log rtog sems rgyud tha dad kyang / /rigs rgyud med phyir dbye ba dka'/ /sems</text></item>
<item><p>358b.5</p><section></section><text>nyid nor bu rin po che/ /ji ltar dmigs shing sems par snang / /'gro la sems rgyud gnyis su 'char/ /de ni dngos med kun gyi gzhi/ /log rtog mun pa'i yul snang kun/ /sems phyir mtha' la</text></item>
<item><p>358b.6</p><section></section><text>rtsod pa med/ /gang la yod med med pa lte/ /rtog pa'i smra bsam yul las 'das/ /de ni de phyir rgyal 'gro zhes/ /ris su bcad pa med pa la/ /gtsang dang mi gtsang dngos gcig bzhin/ /phyogs su</text></item>
<item><p>358b.7</p><section></section><text>bltas na nor ba'i blo/ /ji snyed 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i sems/ /me long g.ya' dang mkha' sprin bzhin/ /rig dang ma rig gnyis med pas/ /phyogs gcig rkyen gyi dus su 'khrul/ /'jig rten brtan</text></item>
<item><p>359a.1</p><section></section><text>g.yo la sogs pa/ /snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med/ /rang byung phyi nang med snang phyir/ /de dus rang bzhin nyams pa med/ /'jug pa'i rnam shes de lta bus/ /shes rab thun mong</text></item>
<item><p>359a.2</p><section></section><text>spyan yin no/ /rang byung ye shes tshogs kun bdag /shes rab can gyi mchog yin no/ /rdo rje yid ni dbang mchog phyir/ /lta ba med phyir rang spyi chos/ /dbyer med phyogs lta'i 'dod bral ba/ /ma nor</text></item>
<item><p>359a.3</p><section></section><text>rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs/ /gsum gnyis gcig gis spangs/ /dang po dngos dang gsal ba dang / /snga ma sangs rgyas sems can dag /so so sems rgyud tha dad pa/ /gcig na bdun la snga rtogs skye/ /</text></item>
<item><p>359a.4</p><section></section><text>de bzhin sems rgyud brgyad la za/ /tha dad zhe na bdun gyis 'gal/ /de bas dgag dang sgrub med pas/ /gcig dang du ma med pa'o/ /gsum pa'i snga ma rtog skyon dgu/ /phyi ma med pa'i the tshom dag /</text></item>
<item><p>359a.5</p><section></section><text>skyon gyi dngos po bcu gnyis shes/ /mi mkhas mkhas pa'i bsam pa ni/ /mi mkhas shin tu mi mkhas pa/ /shin tu mi mkhas mthar lta ba'i/ /mi mkhas yod med rtsod byed cing/ /dgag dang sgrub pa</text></item>
<item><p>359a.6</p><section></section><text>gang byed pa/ /de de de la chags sdang skye/ /mkhas dang shin tu mkhas pa ni/ /mkhas pa phal pa dgag sgrub can/ /sgrub pa'i don la brten par byed/ /byis pa'i gzung 'dzin dbang gyur pa'i/ /</text></item>
<item><p>359a.7</p><section></section><text>ma nor lam dang bral ba yin/ /shin tu mkhas pa thams cad la/ /sems phyir dgag dang sgrub pa med/ /de dang rang rig rang snang phyir/ /dgag sgrub bral la yid mi rton/ /de phyir so so dgag sgrub can/</text></item>
<item><p>359b.1</p><section></section><text>sgrub pa'i phyogs la zhen pa'i phyir/ /de de med pa ga la mthong / /de bas rang gi brtags mthong yin/ /de de skas gdang ji lta ba/ /khyad par grangs dang dor ba med/ /cha yod dug la mi 'thung bzhin/ /log</text></item>
<item><p>359b.2</p><section></section><text>lta gnyis su ga la 'gyur/ /gnyis po de ltar de nyid la/ /grub pa'i tha snyad ji ltar mtshon/ /ma grub grub na nges tshig med/ /de ma grub na de bzhin no/ /de bas srid dang mi srid kun/ /lhun grub phyogs su</text></item>
<item><p>359b.3</p><section></section><text>grub pa med/ /bzhi pa'i snga ma skyon drug gnyis/ /de bzhin phyi ma rjes su mthun/ /gnyis med zhe na dus gsum la/ /'byung zhes bya ba'ang gnyis med dang / /sman nyid phan gnod bdag gnas ltar/ /</text></item>
<item><p>359b.4</p><section></section><text>ngo bo tha dad 'gyur ba med/ /phyogs las logs pa'i tha dad med/ /lnga pa 'khrul gzhi yod med pa'i/ /skyon ni gsum pa ji bzhin grangs/ /mig yor gsum la dngos med 'dra'i/ /chos yod bzhin</text></item>
<item><p>359b.5</p><section></section><text>pas rang sems la/ /de dngos med kyang rgyu rkyen drug /rang bzhin lhun grub dpag bsam bzhin/ /so sor snang ba dus gsum du/ /rgyun du 'khrul la lhun grub pas/ /'gro 'ong 'byung 'jug med snang bzhin/ /</text></item>
<item><p>359b.6</p><section></section><text>gzhi yod med dang dbyer med mtshungs/ /drug pa de ltar de bden na/ /de la skyon du bya ba bdun/ /thams cad 'ching 'grol dbyer med la/ /gnyis mthong 'khrul bar blta ba 'khrul/ /de bas blang dang dor ba med/ /bde</text></item>
<item><p>359b.7</p><section></section><text>sdug gnas su ris ma blta/ /bdun pa rang rig can yin na/ /de la skyon bcu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes 'di/ /mi lnga'i bdag po kun gyi sems/ /rang spyi ji snyed ji lta ba/ /rang yul med</text></item>
<item><p>360a.1</p><section></section><text>par nges gsal ba/ /nam mkha' sprin mthongs 'od bzhin du/ /rab rib gang dag shes rab snang / /brgyad pa nges mthong sgrib pa'i grangs/ /brgyad pa bsnyad pa yan lag bcas/ /phyag rgya</text></item>
<item><p>360a.2</p><section></section><text>bzhi yi gzhir gyur pa/ /nges par ngos zin bya bar bsnyad/ /ma rig pa nyid ye shes gsal/ /the tshom nyid kyang nges pa'i spyan/ /log rtog nyid kyang ma nor lam/ /de la mi mthun shes dang bral/ /dgu pa 'das dang</text></item>
<item><p>360a.3</p><section></section><text>'jig rten pa'i/ /theg pa'i lta ba gral dgongs/ /skas gdang lta bur bstan pa dag /kun kyang bdag dang bral ba'i phyir/ /'jig rten shes 'phags ci smos te/ /de dag nyid ni dgag dang sgrub/ /rim pa yod</text></item>
<item><p>360a.4</p><section></section><text>med khyad par dang / /ltos pas phye ba'i khyad par ni/ /bdag spong bdag med sgrub pa dang / /gzugs spong phyi steng sgrub pa dang / /don 'gog sems tsam sgrub pa dang / /mtha' spong mtha' bral sgrub pa dang / /</text></item>
<item><p>360a.5</p><section></section><text>dri spong dag pa sgrub pa dang / /mtshan 'gog mtshan med sgrub pa dang / /blang dor 'gog med sgrub pa dang / /rtsol spong rtsol bral sgrub pa dang / /de dag kun kyang yod med phyir/ /dgag sgrub rang gis mi byed</text></item>
<item><p>360a.6</p><section></section><text>pa'o/ /rim par phye ba'i khyad par ston/ /mthong ba dag dang ma dag pa'i/ /rim pas don gcig khyad par snang / /mthong ba dge ba'i kun mthong 'di/ /sna tshogs theg pa'i lta ba dang / /ji snyed bsdom pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>360a.7</p><section></section><text>bya ba rnams/ /sbyang bar bya ba ma yin yang / /ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs par gsal/ /kun shes bzhin 'dra rab rib dri ma nyid/ /bstan pa'i me long mthong goms rang dag sar/ /'gyur bas ma 'ongs don can</text></item>
<item><p>360b.1</p><section></section><text>ched bgyis pa'i/ /dge rtsas bdag dang mtha' yas 'gro bar bsngo/ /'phrul gyi me long dgu skor rdzogs so// //[]@/ /'grel pa bzhugs/ /@##/ /rnal 'byor rigs pa'i me tog 'phrul</text></item>
<item><p>360b.2</p><section></section><text>gyi me long la dbu zhabs su bsdus pa'i don bzhi ste/ phyag 'tshal mchod pa'i lung dang / dam bca' sdom pa'i lung dang / gzhung lugs rtsa ba'i lung dang / sna tshogs kyi lung dang bzhi'o/ /kun mkhyen nyid la phyag</text></item>
<item><p>360b.3</p><section></section><text>'tshal nas/ /shes pa gang gis gang ltar phyag btsal ba'o/ /rnal 'byor lta ba'i spyi 'grel brdeg /ces pa lta ba'i rim pa spyi'i shan dbye ba'i phyir 'grel pa ste/ the tshom gtar ka gnad du brdeg par dam bca'</text></item>
<item><p>360b.4</p><section></section><text>ba'o/ /lung bsdu ba bstan pa la gnyis te/ dris pa'i lung dang lan no/ /dris pa ni dgu ste/ log rtog byang chub yul snang ba'i/ /chos kun sems su gcig mi gcig /ces pa 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das</text></item>
<item><p>360b.5</p><section></section><text>pa'i spyod yul byang chub sems su gcig mi gcig dris pa dang po'o/ /lhun gyis grub pa gang la bgyi/ /dris pa gnyis pa'o/ /de nyid snang ba yod dam med/ /ces pa lhun grub snang stong gang yin dris pa gsum pa'o/ /</text></item>
<item><p>360b.6</p><section></section><text>ye nas sangs rgyas yin nam min/ /zhes pa chos kun gzhi yi sangs rgyas pa yin nam ma rgyas pa yin dris pa bzhi pa'o/ /khams gsum sems can ji ltar 'khrul zhes pa lnga pa'o/ /'khrul pa nyid ni don</text></item>
<item><p>360b.7</p><section></section><text>ci lags/ /zhes pa 'khrul pa'i grub mtha' dris pa drug pa'o/ /rnal 'byor lta ba'i ngo bo gang zhes pa bdun pa'o/ /de dag dogs pa'i the tshom gang / /zhes pa skyon dris pa brgyad pa'o/ /de rnams</text></item>
<item><p>361a.1</p><section></section><text>khyad par ji ltar che/ /bdun po theg pa gzhan las gang dpag dris pa dgu pa'o/ /'phrul gyi me long dgu skor bzhin/ /zhes pa mtshon pa dgus mtshon du btub pa'o/ /gsal byed 'phrul tshig dgu yis ston/ /zhes pa</text></item>
<item><p>361a.2</p><section></section><text>don dris pa lan zung dgu yi tshig gis gsal bar ston pa'o/ /lan dang po bstan pa'i phyir/ /sgyu ma rnam gnyis spyod yul ni/ /sems kyi chos nyid dang du gcig /ces pa log rtog sgyu ma'i sems can dang / ye shes sgyu ma'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul 'khrul lam</text></item>
<item><p>361a.3</p><section></section><text>ma 'khrul gnyis/ sems kyi de kho na nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes su gcig par lan gdab po/ /de'i dpe ni/ de'i de nyid ji lta ba'o/ /mkha' dang gzha' snang ji bzhin du/ /zhes pa gzha' tshon snang ba dang rang bzhin stong pa dbyer med pa bzhin no/ /</text></item>
<item><p>361a.4</p><section></section><text>gtan tshigs ni/ log rtog sems rgyud tha dad kyang / /rig rgyud med phyir dbye ba dka'/ /zhes pa log rtog gi rgyud so sor rtog pa dang / 'du shes tha dad pas/ tshor ba dang / 'du byed de lta ba dang / rgyal ba'i thugs gsal ba rtags kyis tha dad pa las</text></item>
<item><p>361a.5</p><section></section><text>mi mthun pa ni rgyal ba dang / 'gro ba la rig rgyud rtag par nges pa med pa'i phyir/ gcig ces dgos ched gnyis kyi phyir brjod kyis ngo bo gcig dang tha dad las grol ba'i ngang du dbyer med pa la de skad brjod pa'o/ /gnyis pa ni/ sems nyid nor bu rin po che/ /</text></item>
<item><p>361a.6</p><section></section><text>zhes pa lhun grub kyi dpe'o/ /ji ltar dmigs shing bsams par snang / /zhes pa lhun gyis ma grub pa dang ma grub pa'i chos thams cad du sems so sor snang ba'o/ /'gro la sems rgyud gnyis mi 'chang / /zhes pa sems kun gyi sems kyi chos nyid kyi</text></item>
<item><p>361a.7</p><section></section><text>gzhi'am dngos po zhes pa skad gcig ma ni bsam pa'am blo zhes rtog pa dang mi rtog pa'i sems rgyud gnyis pa 'gro ba gcig la med do/ /skabs kyis mi brjod pa'o/ /de ni dngos med kun gyi gzhi/ /zhes pa sems can gyi sems gcig pa de ni dngos</text></item>
<item><p>361b.1</p><section></section><text>po brtag dka' ste/ dgos 'dod bskong ba'i nor bu lta bu la gcig la gcig ma grub pa dang / lhun grub kyi ngo bo la ni phyogs gcig pa'i lhun grub tu khas blangs pa'o/ /lan gsum pa ni/ log rtog mun pa'i yul snang kun/ /zhes pa 'gro ba so so'i ma</text></item>
<item><p>361b.2</p><section></section><text>rig pa'i snang ba tha dad pa bsdu'o/ /sems phyir mtha' la rtsod pa med/ /ces pa snang ba yod med kun bdag nyid chen po'i gtan tshigs kyis dbyer med pa la yod med sgro skur tu rtsod pa byis pa'i blo/ dpe ni/ gang la yod med med pa ltar/ /ces pa dngos po</text></item>
<item><p>361b.3</p><section></section><text>gang la phan pa 'ba' zhig yod ce'am/ gnod pa'i mthu 'ba' zhig yod ces phyir ni mi btub ste/ brtags na mi dmigs par/ bsam na phan gnod so sor snang yang dbyer med pa ltar/ rtog pa'i smra bsam yul las 'das/ /zhes pa 'khrul pa'i snang</text></item>
<item><p>361b.4</p><section></section><text>ba yod med dbyer med pa ni thun mong chen po'i smra bsam las 'das pa ste/ don dam dngos po'am gzhi la med/ /kun rdzob blo 'am bsam pa la yod ces smra ba dag mi mkhas pa'i shes pas/ 'di skad du/ sems 'di yod do med do zhes/ /byis pa rnams ni</text></item>
<item><p>361b.5</p><section></section><text>rtsod par byed/ /zhes pa la sogs pas gsal lo/ /lan bzhi pa ni/ de ni de phyir rgyal 'gro zhes/ /ris su bcad pa med pa la/ sems snang stong dbyer med pa'i lhun grub de ni/ tshig snga ma gtan tshigs su gyur pas ye sangs rgyas pas rgyal ba zhe'am/ 'gro</text></item>
<item><p>361b.6</p><section></section><text>ba 'khor ba yin zhes gsungs pa'i tshig gnyis kar/ sems 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dbyer med la mi bsam mi brjod do/ /gtsang dang mi gtsang dngos gcig bzhin/ /zhes pa gnyis su med pa'i dpe ste/ la la'i gtsang ba la la la'i mi gtsang bar</text></item>
<item><p>361b.7</p><section></section><text>snang bas gtsang mi gtsang dngos po gcig ste/ gzhi la nges pa bzhin de kho na ji snyed pa'i ji bzhin pa sems kyi chos nyid sangs rgyas sems can dbye ba med pa la/ phyogs su bltas na nor pa'i blo/ /zhes pa gzhi 'khrul 'khor med pa'o/ /rnam dag phyogs</text></item>
<item><p>362a.1</p><section></section><text>gcig tu bltas te/ gzhi med pa la bsam blos blo bur du blta ba dag ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dag dang / tha snyad la skur ba 'debs pa'i lta ba ste/ gnyis med ngang la gsal ba 'dus par brjod pa nyid kyis mkha'i lta ba</text></item>
<item><p>362a.2</p><section></section><text>khas blangs pa'o/ /'dir gnyis su yod med nyid kyang dbyer med pas thun mong ma yin pa'i gnyis su med pa ste/ 'di skad du/ gnyis med gnyis su med min zhing / /zhes pa dgos byed gnyis kyi phyir brjod pa tsam mo/ /lan lnga pa ni/ ji snyed 'jig</text></item>
<item><p>362a.3</p><section></section><text>rten 'khrul pa'i sems/ /zhes pa log rtog tha dad pa'i sems bsam yas pa'o/ /me long g.ya' dang mkha' sprin bzhin/ /zhes pa ma rig pa dang sems ye shes gnyis su med pa'i dpe'o/ /rig dang ma rig gnyis med pas/ /zhes pa lhan</text></item>
<item><p>362a.4</p><section></section><text>cig skyes pa'i ma rig pa med pa min pa'i phyir/ ye shes dang ma rig pa dbyer med kyang / phyogs gcig rkyen gyi dus gsum 'khrul/ /zhes pa phyogs gcig nas ltos pas 'khor ba'o/ /de'i rgyu ma rig pas rkyen las dang nyon mongs pas dus gsum</text></item>
<item><p>362a.5</p><section></section><text>thog mtha' med par rgyun chags su 'khrul pa ni/ thag sprul tho mi sab rtas mtshon nas gzhi med pa las 'byung bar smra ba lta bu ma yin te/ sgro skur dang bral ba'i ngang las 'khrul ba'o/ /lan drug pa/ 'jig rten brtan g.yo la sogs pa/snang ba</text></item>
<item><p>362a.6</p><section></section><text>nyid na rang bzhin med/ /ces pa brtan g.yo blo brtags kyi rang bzhin bsam pa la yod la gzhi la med par smra ba ni rang bzhin la skur ba ste/ 'dir 'khrul pa snang ba do ba'i dus nyid na mkha' sprin ltar rnam pa'i mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa chen po la rang bzhin</text></item>
<item><p>362a.7</p><section></section><text>yod med dbyer med la dgos ched kyis brjod pa'o/ /rang byung phyi nang med snang phyir/ /zhes pa bdag nyid chen po'i gtan tshigs kyis kyang chu nyid rlabs lta bur 'gro 'ong med par snang ba'o/ /de dus rang bzhin nyams pa med/ /ces pa 'khrul pa de snang</text></item>
<item><p>362b.1</p><section></section><text>ba'i dus na rang bzhin stong pas ji bzhin nyid las ma nyams rang bzhin thun mong ma yin pa'i 'khrul pa ste/ 'di skad du/ 'khor ba nyid na bde gnas so/ /shes pa dang rang bzhin nyid las nyams pa med/ /ces gsungs so/ /lan bdun pa ni/ 'jug pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>362b.2</p><section></section><text>rnam shes de lta ba/ /shes rab thun mong spyan yin na/ /zhes pa lta ba'i ngo bo 'og ma bdag yid kyi rnam par shes pa de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i phyir/ 'du byed kyi shes rab dang mtshungs par thun mong gi lta ba lam du rigs pa'i shes pa la lta ba zhes brjod do/ /</text></item>
<item><p>362b.3</p><section></section><text>'dir/ rang byung ye shes tshogs kun bdag /shes rab spyan gyi mchog yin no/ /zhes pa tshogs brgyad rig rgyud gzugs mtshan gnas kyis tha dad med par 'od gsal ba'o/ /rkyen dang rgyu med par ma 'gags par ye rang gsal bar rang byung</text></item>
<item><p>362b.4</p><section></section><text>ye shes te/ bltas pa med par de kho na nyid du gsal ba lta ba'i phul lo/ /lta ba'i ngo bo des ji ltar mthong snyam pa la/ rdo rje yid ni dbang mchog phyir/ /zhes pa yid ye shes rdo rje ni shes rab kyi dbang po mchog ste gtan tshigs</text></item>
<item><p>362b.5</p><section></section><text>lta ba med pa rang spyi'i chos/ dbyer med phyogs lta'i 'dod bral ba/ zhes pa yul du lta ba med de rang rig phyi nang med phyir ro/ /rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi chos su snang ba yang shes pa dang rnam pa tsam du dbyer med pas/ nang phyogs nas phyi ru</text></item>
<item><p>362b.6</p><section></section><text>bltas pa'am/ phyi nas nang du blta ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas de kho na nyid yul med par rig pa rang gsal ba'i gdeng rnyed bas thams cad mkhyen pa la zhes pas/ zhe 'dod du med pas/ ma nor rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs/ /zhes gsungs</text></item>
<item><p>362b.7</p><section></section><text>so/ /de la g.yo theb brtan mthar phyin pa'i lam du gyur pa'o/ /lan brgyad pa ni/ gsum gnyis gcig gis the tshom spangs/ /zhes pa dris lan bdun pa'i tshom dris pa rjes su bsam pa'i phyir/ dang po dngos dang gsal ba dang / /zhes</text></item>
<item><p>363a.1</p><section></section><text>pa tshag lngas gtar ka gnyis kyi gegs bsal ba la/ /snga ma sangs rgyas sems can dag /so so sems rgyud tha dad pa/ /gcig na bdun la snga rtog skye/ /zhes pa spyir sangs rgyas dang sems can rnams phyogs</text></item>
<item><p>363a.2</p><section></section><text>gcig pa'i gcig pa yin na bka' lung la mi snang ba dang / don dang 'gal ba dang / gtan tshigs kyis mi rgyas pa dang / rig pas mi 'thad pa dang / chos brtags pa bzhi dang 'gal ba bdun po kun la 'byung mod kyang / skabs gnyis kyis</text></item>
<item><p>363a.3</p><section></section><text>gsang sngags ni spyi dang 'thun par rigs pas mi 'thad pa'i skyon brjod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi thugs dang sems can gyi sems phyogs gcig pa'i ldog pa dang bcas pa yin zhe na/ rgyal ba bzhin du 'gro bas kyang thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ba dang /</text></item>
<item><p>363a.4</p><section></section><text>rtog pa med par 'gyur ba dang / /nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / lam gyi chos la rag las mi dgos pa dang / rgyal ba yang 'gro ba bzhin thams cad mi mkhyen pa dang / rtog pa can du 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa sdug</text></item>
<item><p>363a.5</p><section></section><text>bsngal myong ba dang / skyon bdun 'byung ngo / /'gro ba drug gi sems can tha dad gcig na yang / de bzhin sems rgyud brgyad la za/ /zhes pa chos tha ma'i skyon 'byung ste/ 'gro ba drug po kun sems rang byung gi ye shes su gcig na yang / 'gro ba</text></item>
<item><p>363a.6</p><section></section><text>gcig sangs rgyas na kun sangs rgyas par rigs pa dang / gcig ltung na kun ltung bar rigs pa dang / gcig shes pa chen kun che/ gcig shes pa chung na kun chung / gcig 'du shes rgya che na kun che/ gcig 'du shes chung na kun chung /</text></item>
<item><p>363a.7</p><section></section><text>gcig rnon kun rno/ /gcig rtul na kun rtul/ gcig dog na kun dog /gcig yangs na kun yangs/ gcig tshor ba gsal na kun gsal/ gcig mi gsal na kun mi gsal/ gcig dran pa gsal na kun gsal/ gcig mi gsal na kun</text></item>
<item><p>363b.1</p><section></section><text>mi gsal/ brgyad po de ltar the tshom za ba/ tha dad zhen bdun gyis 'gal/ /zhes pa sangs rgyas kyi thugs dang 'gro ba'i sems tha dad na yang/ sangs rgyas sems can gnyis rang bzhin tha dad du 'gyur/ ngo bo tha dad du 'gyur bas 'brel pa med</text></item>
<item><p>363b.2</p><section></section><text>pas don byar mi btub/ 'gro ba sangs rgyar mi btub/ nyon mongs pa spang zhing sgrib pa byang du mi btub/ rgyal ba bsten pa la dgos pa med/ so sor rtog pa'i mthar 'gyur ba dang bdun no/ /sems can kun gyi rang gi ye shes tha dad na yang /</text></item>
<item><p>363b.3</p><section></section><text>rang byung gi ye shes so son yod pa'i phyir/ gcig gis gcig reg na gzhan 'byung du 'gyur ba dang / nges tshig med/ gcig gis gcig ma rig na/ ye shes su mi 'gyur ro/ /yul med par rig na dam bca' nyams/ shes pa'i rnam pa ye</text></item>
<item><p>363b.4</p><section></section><text>shes gzhan du snang ngo zhe na/ bdag gzhan gyi phyogs nas rnam pa cha gnyis yod pas gzung 'dzin du 'gyur ro/ /ye shes la rig rgyud la sogs pa tha dad pa bdun 'ong bas du ma'i mthar 'gyur ro/ /de gsal ba ni/ de bas dgag dang sgrub med</text></item>
<item><p>363b.5</p><section></section><text>pa'i/ /gcig dang du mar bral ba'o/ /zhes pa sangs rgyas dang sems can gcig dang du ma'i mtha' ma bkag la bral ba sgrub tu med pa ni rig pa rang byung gi ye shes nyid gcig dang du ma dang bral ba dang ma bral ba kun yin pas/ bral ma bral dbyer med</text></item>
<item><p>363b.6</p><section></section><text>pa la shugs snang la dgag sgrub ltar snang yang zhes 'dod la lhag pa'i dgag sgrub med pas skyon de dag mi 'byung ngo / /gsum pa 'khrul snang gzhi la yod med ston pa'i phyir/ /gsum pa'i snga ma rtog skyon dgu/ /zhes pa 'khrul snang gzhi la yod na gzhi</text></item>
<item><p>363b.7</p><section></section><text>'khor ba rang rgyud rtog pa'i skyon gyis sgrib pa mi 'byong / 'ching bu dpes sangs mi rgya/ rgyal ba dang / 'gro ba rig rgyud tha dad 'byung / bstan pa gsungs pa la dgos ched med/ mya ngan 'das pa'i snang ba 'gag /'khor ba mthar 'gyur/</text></item>
<item><p>364a.1</p><section></section><text>'grel pa med pas don byar mi btub/ gzhi'i chos dri ma can du 'gyur ba'o/ /phyi ma med pa'i the tshom dag skyon gyi dngos po bcu gnyis gzhi'o/ /zhes pa gzhi la 'khrul pa med pa yin na'ang / lhan cig skyes pa'i ma</text></item>
<item><p>364a.2</p><section></section><text>rig pa med pa'i skyon dang / rang bzhin chad pa'i skyon dang / mya ngan las 'das pa mthar 'gyur/ 'khrul snang 'gag gzhi med pa la 'khor ba snang na/ 'khor ba la thog ma 'byung / rgyud dag pa yang 'khor sgrib pa sbyang mi dgos/ bstan pa</text></item>
<item><p>364a.3</p><section></section><text>la dgos ched med/ ye nas gzhi la med pa las snang na/ mu stegs chad pa'i snang bar 'gyur/ snga na med pa'i skyon dang / gcig la gcig med pa'i skyon dang/ ye nas med pa dang bcu gnyis 'byung do/ /gzhi ni 'khrul snang yod med</text></item>
<item><p>364a.4</p><section></section><text>gnyis su med pa'i don dang 'gal/ bka' lung las mi snang ba/ gtan tshigs kyis ma rgyas pa/ de ltar rigs pas mi 'thad pa'o/ /zhor la shes pa'i khyad par bstan pa ni/ mi mkhas mkhas pa'i bsam pa ni/ zhes pa dbye na/ mi mkhas</text></item>
<item><p>364a.5</p><section></section><text>shin tu mi mkhas pa/ zhes pa mi mkhas pa'i bsam pa la gnyis te/ gang zhe na shin tu mi mkhas mthar lta ba'o/ /zhes pa mu stegs pa dang skye bo dag go/ /mi mkhas yod med rtsod byed cing/ /dgag dang sgrub pa gang byed pa/ /de de de la chags sdang</text></item>
<item><p>364a.6</p><section></section><text>skye/ /zhes pa ltos pa'i mi mkhas pa dag ni/ tshad ma tshul yod la rtsod/ sems tsam pa rnam pa yod med la rtsod/ dbu ma snang ba yod med la rtsod pa byed cing / rig pa ma yin pa'i shes pa'i yul ched du 'gegs/ rig pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>364a.7</p><section></section><text>shes pa'i yul sgrub par byed pa de ni/ sgrub pa'i don la blo chags/ dgag bya la zhe sdang bskyed pas/ blang dor med pa'i don ma mthong ba'i phyir mi mkhas pa'o/ /'o na mkhas pa gang zhe na/ mkhas dang shin tu mkhas pa ni/ zhes pa mkhas pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>364b.1</p><section></section><text>bsam pa dbye ba nye bar bstan pa'o/ /mkhas pa phal pa dgag sgrub can/ /sgrub pa'i don la brten par byed/ /ces pa theg pa chen po dbu ma dang sems tsam pa'o/ /de yang gsang sngags la ltos na 'khrul pa'i phyir/ byas pa'i gzung 'dzin dbang</text></item>
<item><p>364b.2</p><section></section><text>gyur ba'i/ /ma nor lam dang bral ba yin/ /zhes pa'o/ /ched du dgag sgrub byed pa'i nges pa 'jog pa'i rtog pa skyes pas/ gsang sngags kyi lta ba dang bral ba'o/ /gsang sngags ni/ shin tu mkhas pa thams cad la/ sems phyir dgag dang</text></item>
<item><p>364b.3</p><section></section><text>sgrub pa med/ /ces pa gsang sngags pa ni shin tu mkhas pa'i bsam pa ste/ bdag nyid chen po'i gtan tshigs kyis dgag sgrub ched du mi byed pa yang rtogs byad kyi thabs dam pa ste/ zhor la dgag sgrub can gyi lta ba 'gegs pa dang / dgag</text></item>
<item><p>364b.4</p><section></section><text>sgrub med pa'i don sgrub pa yod mod kyang / dgag sgrub med pa'i phyogs gcig pur khas mi len te/ don ni/ de dang rang rig rang snang phyir/ /dgag sgrub bral la yid mi rton/ /zhes pa dgag sgrub yod med kyi chos thams cad rang rig pa yin</text></item>
<item><p>364b.5</p><section></section><text>pas/ dgag sgrub med pa'i don ched du dmigs pa yul du mi byed do/ /dgag sgrub gtan la 'bebs pa'i dus dang / mnyam pa la bzhag pa'i dus gnyis ka ched du byed pa 'khrul pa'i phyir/ de phyir so sor dgag sgrub can/ /bsgrub pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>364b.6</p><section></section><text>phyogs la zhen pa'i phyir/ /de de med pa ga la mthong / /de bas rang gi brtags mthong yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /lan dgu pa zhar la bstan pa'i phyir/ /de de skas gdang ji lta ba/ khyad par grangs dang dor ba med/ /zhes pa rgyu'i theg pa de snyed</text></item>
<item><p>364b.7</p><section></section><text>'bras bu de skas gdang ltar khyad yod pa'i grangs mi 'dor bas/ bdun po'i skyon rgyu'i theg pa la grangs ji ltar brjod pa ltar 'byung gi/ 'bras bu'i theg pa la skyon mi 'byung bar smos pa'o/ /dgos ched ni/ cha yod dug la mi btung bzhin/ log lta</text></item>
<item><p>365a.1</p><section></section><text>gnyis su ga la 'gyur/ /zhes pa des de bzhin du rang bzhin log pa dang / ltos pa'i log pa ltar gsang sngags mi 'gro ba'o/ /gnyis pa the tshom bsal ba'i phyir/ gnyis po de ltar de nyid la/ /zhes pa grangs kyi</text></item>
<item><p>365a.2</p><section></section><text>gnyis pa de lta bur lhun grub dris pa/ grub pa'i tha snyad ji ltar mtshon/ /zhes pa lhun gyis grub pa phyogs gcig pa'am/ phyogs med pa gang yin dris pa'o/ /ma grub grub na nges tshig med/ /ces pa phyogs med na grub pa'i ngang la rta la</text></item>
<item><p>365a.3</p><section></section><text>glang ma grub pa la sogs pa yang grub pas/ grub pa gcig pu'i nges tshig med par 'gyur ro/ /de ma grub na de bzhin no/ /zhes pa ma grub par grags pa'i chos lhun gyis ma grub na'ang / ma grub pa'i chos ma rdzogs pas nges tshig med do/ /gzhan</text></item>
<item><p>365a.4</p><section></section><text>yang ma grub pa phyogs gcig par 'gyur bas yod mthar lta ba dang / bden pa mthong ba yang 'khor ba dang / zhen pas 'tshang rgya ba dang / dge sdig 'bras bu bsnol mar 'gyur ba yang grub dgos pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro/ /de bsal ba'i thabs ni/</text></item>
<item><p>365a.5</p><section></section><text>de bas srid dang mi srid kun/ /lhun grub phyogs su grub pa med/ /ces pa lhun grub kyi gtan tshigs kyis dge bas mtho ris su srid pa la sogs pa dang / dge ba ngan song du mi srid pa kun yod med grub ma grub dbyer med pa la dgos ched kyis</text></item>
<item><p>365a.6</p><section></section><text>lhun grub tu brjod kyis/ don grub grub por brjod pa med pas/ lhag pa'i lhun grub la skyon de dag mi 'byung / bzhi pa'i snga ma skyon drug gnyis/ /zhes pa ye sangs rgyas pa phyogs gcig pa cig rin chen gling dang / nyi mas mtshon pa sgra ji bzhin du</text></item>
<item><p>365a.7</p><section></section><text>brtags na/ mya ngan las 'das pa mthar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas rig rgyud can du 'gyur/ sgrib pa sbyang mi dgos/ rgyal bas don byar med/ sgrub pa'i gang zag med pas lam mi dgos/ bstan pa gsungs pa la dgos ched med/ 'khor</text></item>
<item><p>365b.1</p><section></section><text>ba'i snang ba 'gag /gal te na brgyud pa yang 'khor/ 'khor ba la thog ma 'gyur/ gzhi la 'khor ba med la blo la yod na blo dang gzhi tha dad pa'i skyon 'ong / tha mi dad na blo la yod pa bzhin du gzhi la yang yod par 'gyur/ de nyid dang gzhan</text></item>
<item><p>365b.2</p><section></section><text>du brjod du med pa yin zhe na/ de nyid ma yin pas gzhi la med kyang / gzhan du brjod du med pa'i tshul gyis gzhi la yod par 'gyur/ sgrub sngags gnyis pa des ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i phyogs kyang min no/ /de bzhin phyi ma rjes su mthun/ /zhes</text></item>
<item><p>365b.3</p><section></section><text>pa gzhi sangs rgyas ma yin par 'khor ba yin zhe na/ skyon grangs phyi ma'ang snga ma'i rjes mthun te/ gzhi 'khor ba'i mthar 'gyur/ gzhi dri ma can du 'gyur/ 'gro ba rang rgyud par 'gyur/ don byed pa po med par 'gyur/ mya ngan 'das pa</text></item>
<item><p>365b.4</p><section></section><text>'gag /gal te mya ngan 'das pa la thog ma 'byung / 'khor ba mtha' ma 'byung ste/ mtha' stong par 'gyur/ sgrib pa mi 'byangs par 'gyur/ 'khor ba rtags pa'i skyon dang / 'brel pa med pas don byar med pa dang / bstan pa gsungs</text></item>
<item><p>365b.5</p><section></section><text>pa la dgos ched med/ gzhi la 'khor ba yod na/ zhen blo dang khyad mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang bcu gnyis so/ /gnyis med zhe na dus gsum la/ /zhes pa ye sangs rgyas pa yin min gnyis ka ma yin na'ang/ phung po gsum pa dang / lung du</text></item>
<item><p>365b.6</p><section></section><text>ma bstan pa dang / 'gal ba 'dus pa 'byung ngo zhe na/ de gsal ba ni gnyis med dang / /zhes pa rang rig pa ni sangs rgyas dang sems can dbyer med na'ang / 'di skad du/ bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i/ /ye nas lhun rdzogs</text></item>
<item><p>365b.7</p><section></section><text>sangs rgyas chos/ /zhes gsungs pa'i don la/ dpe/ sman nyid phan gnod bdag gnas ltar/ /ces pa sman gcig kyang phan gnod gnyis ka'i ngo bor gnas pa ltar/ ngo bo tha dad 'gyur ba med/ ces pa sems rgyal 'gro gang gi phyogs su</text></item>
<item><p>366a.1</p><section></section><text>ma gyur pas/ yin min lung du ma bstan pa'i skyon mi 'byung ngo / /lnga pa 'khrul gzhi yod med pa'i/ /zhes pa chos nyid ngang la 'khor gzhi yod med gnyis/ gnyis med dang gsum la gsum pa mtshon pa sgo so</text></item>
<item><p>366a.2</p><section></section><text>sor bstan kyang / don la gcig par ma shes pa dag yod pa rang rgyud pa dang / med pa rnam dag phyogs gcig pa dang / phyogs kyi gnyis med la 'khrul par smra na/ skyon ni gsum pa ji ltar grangs/ shes pa 'khrul snang yod med skabs su</text></item>
<item><p>366a.3</p><section></section><text>bshad pa dang mthun par bgrang ngo / /de bsal ba ni/ mig yor gsum la dngos med 'dra'i/ /chos yod bzhin pas shes pa 'khrul tu btub pa'i dpe ni/ tho yor dang som mo dang thag pa la/ yang dag pa'i rta sprul gyi sha khrag med kyang /</text></item>
<item><p>366a.4</p><section></section><text>mi rta sbrul dang 'dra ba'i chos yod pas 'khrul du btub pa'i rkyen bzhis btub pa bzhin/ rang sems la/ de dngos med kyang rgyu rkyen drug /rang bzhin lhun grub dpag bsam bzhin/ /so sor snang ba zhes pa/ sems la 'khor ba rang rgyud</text></item>
<item><p>366a.5</p><section></section><text>med kyang me long gi g.ya' bzhin 'khor ba'i rgyu gnyis rkyen bzhis gnas pas snang du btub la/ dpag bsam shing la bsod nams che chung gis so sor snang ba ltar/ dag dang ma dag pa'i spyod yul du snang ngo / /gzhi ma rig pa yang dag par rang</text></item>
<item><p>366a.6</p><section></section><text>snang ba dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig mtshungs par yod pa dang / yod med dbyer med pas 'khrul gzhi med do yod do gnyis su med do zhes pa bstan pa don gcig go/ /dus gsum du/ rgyun du/ 'khrul pa lhun grub pas/ shes pa</text></item>
<item><p>366a.7</p><section></section><text>dus dang 'khrul gzhi'o/ /'gro 'ong 'byung 'jug med snang ba/ /gzhi yod med dang dbyer med mtshungs/ /zhes pa chu rlabs kyi tshul du 'gro 'ong med par 'khor bar snang ba'i gzhi yod med dbyer med du gcig pa la skyon med de/ drug pa de</text></item>
<item><p>366b.1</p><section></section><text>ltar de bden na/ de la skyon du bya ba bdun/ /zhes pa gong du 'khrul tshul bstan pa ltar bden te/ yid med phyogs can las 'khrul tu btub na/ tho yor la rta ru 'khrul/ sam mo la mir 'khrul/ thag pa la rtar 'khrul par rigs/ mi</text></item>
<item><p>366b.2</p><section></section><text>srid pa'i chos gzhi 'byung bar rigs te dpe skyon bdun no/ /de bas 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin 'khrul pa nyid du rtog na'ang / 'khor ba gzhi la grub nas/ 'khrul pa'i rgyu rkyen gnyis la rag mi lus pa'i skyon gnyis/ 'khrul pa mi sangs pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>366b.3</p><section></section><text>skyon/ gang zag dgos pa rtsan du 'khor ba la mtha' mi 'ong / bden pa mthong du mi btub chos nyid du ma 'dus shing ma khyab pa'i skyon 'byung ngo / /de bsal ba'i thabs/ thams cad 'ching grol dbyer med la/ /zhes pa gzhi la 'khrul ma</text></item>
<item><p>366b.4</p><section></section><text>'khrul yod med kyi sgro skur med pa'o/ /gnyis mthong 'khrul par blta ba'o/ /'khrul zhes pa rang bzhin ma nyams par blta ba'o/ /'khrul pa'o/ /de bas blang dang dor ma byed/ /bde sdug gnas su ris ma blta/ /zhes pa don gnyis mod la</text></item>
<item><p>366b.5</p><section></section><text>lta spyod kyi gdams ngag dag go/ /bdun pa rang rig can yin na/ /de la skyon bcu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zhes pa rang byung ye shes lta ba'i ngo bo yin na/ /rang byung ye shes gcig pas gcig gis rtogs na kun gyi skyon 'byung / skye mi 'byung /</text></item>
<item><p>366b.6</p><section></section><text>rgyal ba dang 'gro ba khyad par med par 'gyur/ lam chad/ da lta nyid nas thams cad mkhyen par thal/ gzhir thal/ sgom mi dgos/ tshig dang yi ge la la dgos pa med/ gtan la dbab mi dgos/ mngon shes ma bsgom par 'char</text></item>
<item><p>366b.7</p><section></section><text>bar 'gyur ba dang bcu'o/ /de bsal ba/ de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes 'di/ /mi lnga bdag po kun gyi sems/ /zhes pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / mi gnas pa dang / rang byung dang / lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i ye shes dang lnga'o/ /ngo</text></item>
<item><p>367a.1</p><section></section><text>bo 'gro ba kun gyis sems so/ /rang spyi ji snyed ji lta ba/ /rang yul med par nges gsal ba/ /zhes pa lta ba'i don no/ /dpe ni/ nam mkha'i sprin mthongs 'od bzhin du/ /zhes pa sprin gang dag pa na/ nyi</text></item>
<item><p>367a.2</p><section></section><text>ma'i 'od dang nam mkha' gsal ba ltar/ rab rib gang dag shes rab snang/ /zhes pa log rtog tha dad pa'i bsam rgyud gang dag pa la rim par rang byung ye shes snang bas/ stobs rdzogs ma rdzogs kyi skyon med do/ /brgyad pa nges mthong</text></item>
<item><p>367a.3</p><section></section><text>sgrib pa'i grangs/ brgyad pa bsnyad pa yan lag bcas/ /zhes pa don mthong ba la sgrib pa'i the tshom ste/ de'i rtsa ba bdun la skyon gyi grangs brjod zin pa de bsdu na/ phyag rgya bzhi pa'i gzhir gyur pa/ /nges par ngos zin bya bar bsnyad/ /</text></item>
<item><p>367a.4</p><section></section><text>ces pa 'di skad du/ bka'/ don/ gtan tshigs/ rigs pa gzhi/ snang dang / mi 'gal/ rgyas/ 'thad sbyar zhes pas don ngos gzung ngo / /la bzla ba ni/ ma rig pa nyid ye shes gsal/ /the tshom nyid kyang nges pa'i spyan/ /</text></item>
<item><p>367a.5</p><section></section><text>log rtog nyid kyang ma nor lam/ /de la mi mthun shes dang bral/ /zhes pa gsum po rim pa rang snang phyir/ de dag gnyis su med par bstan pa la 'gal ba 'dus par brtag tu med pa'o/ /dgu pa 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /</text></item>
<item><p>367a.6</p><section></section><text>theg pa'i lta ba gral bgod pa/ /skas gdang lta bur bstan pa dag go/ /kun dang bdag dang bral ba'i phyir/ /'jig rten shes 'phags ci smos te/ /zhes pa nyan thos yan chad kun 'jig rten pa'i bdag nyid med par 'phags mod</text></item>
<item><p>367a.7</p><section></section><text>kyang/ de dag nyid ni dgag dang sgrub zhes pa/ theg pa che chung nad pa gol ba man chod la yod pas khyad par ni/ rim pa yod med khyad par dang / /ltos pas phye ba'i khyad par ni/ /zhes pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i theg pa rnams lta ba</text></item>
<item><p>367b.1</p><section></section><text>rnams lta ba gtan la 'bebs pa'i tshe/ 'di skad du/ bdag spang bdag med bsgrub pa dang / /gzugs spang phyi stong bsgrub pa dang / /don 'gog sems tsam bsgrub pa dang / /mtha' spong mtha' bral bsgrub pa dang / /dri spong dag pa bsgrub pa</text></item>
<item><p>367b.2</p><section></section><text>dang/ /mtshan 'gag mtshan med bsgrub pa dang / /blang dor 'gag med bsgrub pa dang / /rtsol spong rtsol bral bsgrub pa dang / /de dag kun kyang yod med phyir/ dgag bsgrub rang gis mi byed pa'o/ /rim par phye ba'i khyad par ston/ /mthong</text></item>
<item><p>367b.3</p><section></section><text>ba dag dang ma dag pa'i/ /rim pas don gcig khyad par snang / /zhes pa lta ba ma dag pa'i byis pa gnyis so/ /ltos pa'i ma dag pa'i rjes su rnal 'byor man chad do/ /'o na dag pa chen po gang zhe na/ mthong ba dag pa kun mthong ba 'di/ zhes</text></item>
<item><p>367b.4</p><section></section><text>pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lta ba'o/ /de yang 'di skad du/ sna tshogs theg pa'i lta ba dang / /ji snyed bsdom pa'i lta ba rnams/ /spyad par bya ba ma yin yang / /ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs par gsal/ /zhes 'byung bas/ ngo bo rang byung thams cad</text></item>
<item><p>367b.5</p><section></section><text>mkhyen pa dang / /rang bzhin lta ba thams cad dang / /mtshan nyid lta ba gang dang yang ma 'dres pa dang / rtsal lta ba'i sgrib pa kun bcom pa dang / byin rlabs lta ba kun 'byung ba dang / yon tan lhag pa'i lha dang / sangs rgyas thob pas go 'phang bla na med</text></item>
<item><p>367b.6</p><section></section><text>pa'o/ /bsngo ba tshogs kyi lung ni/ kun shes bzhin 'dra rab rib dri ma nyid/ /ces pa 'gro ba kun gyi shes rab kyis rang gi bzhin rang gis ma mthong ba ltar/ ma rig pas sgrib pa ni/ bstan pa'i me long mthong bsgom rang dag par/ /'gyur bas ma 'ongs</text></item>
<item><p>367b.7</p><section></section><text>don can ched bgyid pa'i/ /dge rtsas bdag dang mtha' yas grol bar bsngo/ /zhes pa bzhin la me long bstan pas dri ma mthong nas 'dag par byas pa bzhin/ 'phrul gyi tshig dgus bstan pa'i tshig gi sgron mas/ lta ba rtogs pa la bsgoms pas sgrib pa</text></item>
<item><p>368a.1</p><section></section><text>'dag par 'gyur bas/ ma 'ongs pa bdag bas blo dman pa'i don du/ 'phrul gyi me long brtsams pa'i dgos kyi sbyin pa'i dge rtsas/ mtha' yas pa theg pa chen po'i chen por grol bar dmigs pa'o/ /'phrul gyi me long dgu</text></item>
<item><p>368a.2</p><section></section><text>skor la/ rig pa'i me tog gis 'grel pa'o/ /slob dpon chen po bi mA las mdzad pa rdzogs so// //[]@/ /thugs kyi sgron ma bzhugs/ /@##/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i</text></item>
<item><p>368a.3</p><section></section><text>bdag /chos kun rdzogs pa'i thugs rdo rje/ /sems dpa' che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dz+nyana'i yin bar bzheng / phyag phyag 'tshal lo// spyan mchog dbul ba'i shi sha'i phyir/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud dag las/ /'khor lo dag mchu'i tshul bzhin du/ /sgyu 'phrul thugs kyi sgrol</text></item>
<item><p>368a.4</p><section></section><text>ma de/ /'dzin pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal bas/ /g.yo 'dzin gsum dang mi g.yo ba'i/ /'dzin dgu log lta de bzhin pa'i/ /rnam gnyis spang phyir gnyen por brjod/ /bsam mi khyab dang de bsdus pa/ /brgyad khri bzhi stong da lta bas/ /gnyis bsdus</text></item>
<item><p>368a.5</p><section></section><text>nges bzhi 'bras bur gcig /thun mong mchog gi lam lnga po/ /'dod pa'i yul la zhen pa dang / /bsam gtan snyoms 'jug 'du shes med/ /rtag tshad bcu gsum zhen pa rnams/ /ring du gtong la mi mthun pa'i/ /spyod pa nyi shu rtsa gcig la'ang / /dang</text></item>
<item><p>368a.6</p><section></section><text>po phyed spong gcig gtang snyoms/ /byed pa'i zhen pas gzhi byed dang / /'phra zab dngos lta'i zhen pa dang / /phyogs stong de bzhin phyogs 'dzin pa'i/ /rgyud 'dzin zhen pa bden pa gnyis/ /rigs 'byed zhen pa'i stong pa can/ /'jig rten ngan song</text></item>
<item><p>368a.7</p><section></section><text>khams su rtse/ /zhi ba phyogs las nges 'byung dang / /rgyu 'bras rten 'brel 'byung ba'ang / /phyi pa dag lha gnyis rjes 'brang / /mtshan med 'od gsal nges zhen pa'i/ /spong len nges 'dzin bdag 'dzin gzhi/ /theg mchog lam gyi stegs gyur</text></item>
<item><p>368b.1</p><section></section><text>kyang| /rang rang nges pas bsgribs pa min/ /mchog gi gzhung lugs gdeng ma gyur/ /de bas rnal 'byor chen po'i lugs/ /bcu gnyis gcig gi zhen pa dag /mi spong gnyis med blang ba med/ /thabs kyi rang bzhin bral mngon byed/ /de bzhin</text></item>
<item><p>368b.2</p><section></section><text>pa yi lugs mchog 'di/ /rgyud dang rnal 'byor gsum rim pa/ /de las kun nas spags pa'i don/ /yang rab rnal 'byor blo la gsal/ /de gang zhe na gdod bsams pas/ /dug lnga dngos dang yul shes bcas/ /sems phyir cho 'phrul snang</text></item>
<item><p>368b.3</p><section></section><text>ba la/ /gsum snang zhen pa'i yul med par/ /rgyud drug shes pa rkyen bcas kyis/ /yul med mi dmigs phyir mi mthong / /mthong shes dbang bcas rang ma mthong / /de bzhin pa yis lnga nyon mongs/ /rjes 'brangs stobs gyur 'gro lngar smin/ /</text></item>
<item><p>368b.4</p><section></section><text>mi mthun bde sdug myong gyur bzhin/ /lam bral dus dgras bcom pa dang / /thar med yang dag lam ston dgos/ /de phyir mi gtsang rus spyod dang / /sab rta thag sprul mtho mi ltar/ /mi bden shes snang phyir rdzun pa'ang / /mi spong mod kyang</text></item>
<item><p>368b.5</p><section></section><text>bden pa med/ /rang byung ye shes mtha' dbus med/ /mi g.yo rang gsal 'dzin bral la/ /tshad med bzhi dang bsam gtan bzhi/ /rim par so sor bdag rtog cing / /gzugs rnams kun la bdag rtog pas/ /gsang ba'i bden gsum</text></item>
<item><p>368b.6</p><section></section><text>mnyam ma mthong / /thams cad mkhyen ldan 'bral ba yis/ /'du shes med lta sho bar ba/ /mnyam pa gsum la mdongs pa yis/ /mi g.yo snyoms 'jug bzhi 'dzin can/ /thal 'gyur ting 'dzin lus zhig na/ /ya nga'i 'bras bu ltung yong</text></item>
<item><p>368b.7</p><section></section><text>phyir/ /dran pa nyams pa'i ting 'dzin te/ /yid brtan bya ba'i yul ma yin/ /rang bzhin 'das dang 'khor ba dag /gnyis med lhun grub brjod bsam yul/ /'das dang sngon bzhin ma mthong bas/ /'khrul yul gzhir mthong ltar blo 'khrul/ /g.yang</text></item>
<item><p>369a.1</p><section></section><text>sa mtho dman lam zhugs pas/ /zad par bde sdug myong bar 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu ga la yin/ /de phyir gsum la khyad par med/ /drug gnyis ston pa'i rjes 'brangs pa'i/ /rigs min lta ba bsam yas pa/ /</text></item>
<item><p>369a.2</p><section></section><text>gnyis bsdus rtag dang chad pa dngos/ /log lta'i gtso bo ya nga'i rgyu/ /lnga pa ril po 'byed lta ba'ang / /snga ma dran pa'i byed lta ba'i/ /rigs bzhi nges 'dod rang blo log /de la kha dog dbyibs yod na/ /gzugs su thal bas mang nyung gis/ /'gal</text></item>
<item><p>369a.3</p><section></section><text>dang dran pa skye mi 'gyur/ /rnam smin myong ba ga la rung / /'on te gzugs kyis shes myong thal/ /des na ril po rdzun par nges/ /byed pos byas pa'ang de bzhin te/ /de kho gal te bden zhe na/ /byed por grub pa su yis byas/ /byed po rdul las 'grub</text></item>
<item><p>369a.4</p><section></section><text>'gyur ram/ /'on te las kyis byed 'byung zhe 'am/ /byed po nyid la byed yod dam/ /rang bzhin nyid kyis 'byung bar 'gyur/ /byed po stes dbang tsam du zad/ /byed la byed yod thugs med skyon/ /rdul na byas 'dra rag lus med/ /las yin kho bo'i 'dod</text></item>
<item><p>369a.5</p><section></section><text>pa med/ /rang bzhin stes dbang byas pa'ang thal/ /tsha rims a bras chod pa'i mig /'bag sogs snang ltar ga la bden/ /cis shos nya shing btsos bsregs pas/ /mi skye brlag 'gyur rigs pa yin/ /snga phyi med par bden lta ba'ang / /mi bden</text></item>
<item><p>369a.6</p><section></section><text>da lta sha 'brug ltar/ /stes dbang snang du btub zhe na/ /snga phyi 'ang stes dbang cis mi 'byung / /de mi 'byung na da lta'ang / /mi 'byung de min smos ci dgos/ /da ltar de na bdag dang gzhan/ /stes dbang snang ba dus gsum du/ /rgyun brtags med pa zhes</text></item>
<item><p>369a.7</p><section></section><text>pa 'gyur/ /gzugs la rung yang ming bzhis so/ /de ltar bden na rmi lam gyi/ /shes pa'ang nya shing mtshungs brlag 'gyur/ /rmi lam btags ldang zhing rgyun brtag na/ /gzugs phung zhig kyang de 'dra mod/ /'on te da lta yod pa bzhin/ /snga phyi yod</text></item>
<item><p>369b.1</p><section></section><text>pa smos ci dgos/ /rtag chad gnyis kar blo zhen na/ /don gyi snying po mchog las gol/ /rang rig snang stong yul min par/ /rig pa rang gsal bsam brjod 'das/ /de phyir gnyis dang der mi 'dzin/ /de la blang dor phyogs 'dzin med/ /de dag</text></item>
<item><p>369b.2</p><section></section><text>so so zhen yul bcas/ /blos bzhag med a yod brtags pa/ /spong byed chad du byas spong ba'ang / /lnga yi bye brag mi mthun pa/ /mos pa tha dad phyir gsungs pa/ /bye brag mdo tsam bshad par bya/ /theg pa dang po bcu drug 'gran/ /gnyis pa bzhi</text></item>

<item><p>369b.4</p><section></section><text>rim par bkod pa yang / /gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam/ /theg pa bzhis yis nges 'byung la/ /theg pa gcig gis 'bras bur gnas/ /tha ma'ang bsti gnas mthar thug ste/ /tha ma'ang gtso mchog 'dir bshad do/ /de la spong thabs mi mthun</text></item>
<item><p>369b.5</p><section></section><text>pa/ /'dod dang 'gog spang sbyong sol byed/ /'bras shes btang snyoms dag byed dang / /phyogs spyod dang len da ro la/ /bdag phyir blang dor med pa yis/ /che bas skas gdang lta bur 'gyur/ /brgyad gnyis bcu spyod theg sogs pa/ /thun mongs</text></item>
<item><p>369b.6</p><section></section><text>lam brjod rnam dgu/ /srid pa dang po dngos lta ba/ /rnal 'byor g.yeng drug gis bral yang / /rgyu 'bras shes pas ya nga spong / /bsti gnas dang po smin par 'dod/ /log rtog nyid la nyid spyod de/ /gzhan du g.yo ba ci yang med/ /bsam gtan</text></item>
<item><p>369b.7</p><section></section><text>snyoms 'jug pa brgyad po/ /'dod spyod sdig sogs spyod pas 'dor/ /dang po'i g.yeng drug bsam pas 'dor/ /'dzin pa phra bas ting nge 'dzin/ /dor ba gnyis mthun dor ba yis/ /sa stegs rtsa gcig thob byed pa'o/ /log lta bzhi po gnyis</text></item>
<item><p>370a.1</p><section></section><text>mthong bas/ /log pa'i lam zhugs ya nga'i 'bras/ /lam rim dang po dngos 'dzin gzhi/ /'khor ba'i lam bzhi zag bcas 'bras/ /de dag mchog gi gsum la rmongs/ /de phyir ma rtogs log rtogs pa'o/ /spang</text></item>
<item><p>370a.2</p><section></section><text>bgegs byed pa'i byis pa gnyis/ /tshul khrims bslab pas dngas 'gog cing / /mthong goms shes rab ting 'dzin gyis/ /spong bgegs med smra ting 'dzin lta/ /zab phra'i gzung 'dzin bya ba bar/ /brtag dngos zhags pas bcings pa yi/ /</text></item>

<item><p>370a.5</p><section></section><text>'dod pa/ /rnam rig rnal 'byor mdo sde'o/ /dang po rang byung ye shes don/ /mi dmigs phyir na rang sems la/ /rnam pa yod med rtsod pa byed/ /gang ltar rtsod kyang 'khrul pa'i mtha'o/ /'khrul snang yul gyi rnam pa can/ /rang bzhin 'khrul</text></item>
<item><p>370a.6</p><section></section><text>mthong yod ma myong / /rnam pa med pa'i rang rig pa/ /'od gsal shel ltar dag pa 'ang / /rgyu rtag skad cig mi rtag pas/ /skye 'gag med pa'i ye shes la/ /nam yang reg par mi 'gyur te/ /rnam par 'gog par thug pa'i mtha'o/ /rnam dag</text></item>
<item><p>370a.7</p><section></section><text>ye shes rnam bral ba/ /sems can rgyud re de yin te/ /rgyud 'dzin yul med gzung 'dzin can/ /g.yo med rtsod pa 'khrul par zad/ /byis pa mkha' la rtsod dang mtshungs/ /rnam pa yod med kun bdag skal/ /shes rgyud bzhi la rtsol ba'i lam/</text></item>
<item><p>370b.1</p><section></section><text>de dang thun mong sangs rgyas de'i 'bras bur/ /byed kyi lhag pa'i gsum ma mthong / /dam pa'i shes pa'ang brdzun pa'o/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa'ang de 'dra'i phyir/ /snga ma'i dam pa rgyu rkyen la/ /rang lus zhig dang skyes dang skyes/ /de bas brdzun lta dam par ni/ /</text></item>
<item><p>370b.2</p><section></section><text>thams cad sems te de ma dmigs/ /ma skyes stong pa smra bsam 'das/ /mtha' la dben pa'i don du lta/ /rnam pa yod med rtsod dang bral/ /shes pa ma skyes phyogs lta ba/ /mtha' dang bral ba thug pa'i mtha'/ /skye med phyogs gcig mtha' dang bral/ /</text></item>
<item><p>370b.3</p><section></section><text>de kho mchog lta'i zhen pa can/ /gnyis med dbyer med ma mthong bas/ /sems stong bzhi pa dka' spyod lam/ /'bras bu sngon bzhin 'das pa'i mtha'/ /grub mtha' nor rtog shes rab kyis/ /'bad pas brtan thob de yi phyir/ /de mi bden pas</text></item>
<item><p>370b.4</p><section></section><text>de mi bden/ /mdo sde pa yi gzhung lugs kyang / /kun brtags snang ba'i spyod yul 'di/ /dam pa gzhan dbang sgyu ma tsam/ /shes snang ma yin 'du snang yin/ /dam par skye med smra bsam 'das/ /rten 'brel gcig dang du ma med/ /rdo rje gzigs ma rnam</text></item>
<item><p>370b.5</p><section></section><text>bzhi dang / /mu bzhi skye 'gag la sogs pas/ /mtha' yas bye brag sel byed cing / /de 'dra bsam gtan 'das chen cing / /snang ba yod dang med pa dang / /rig pas 'grub dang ma grub sogs/ /de dag la rtsod mtha' tshol ba/ /snyed nas nges 'jog</text></item>
<item><p>370b.6</p><section></section><text>gzung 'dzin can/ /bden gnyis ngo bo gcig mi gcig /rtsod cing gcig la bden dang rdzun/ /rigs lta cha shas zhen pa can/ /gcig na rdzun mthong bden thal 'gyur/ /yang na bden mthong brdzun par 'gyur/ /brdzun zhen bden par bslu sogs</text></item>
<item><p>370b.7</p><section></section><text>ldar/ /thal 'gyur bden bzhin brdzun pa'ang / /skye 'gag med sogs bzhin thal 'gyur/ /yang na mnyam gzhag tshe na'ang / /bden gnyis dus gcig mthong bar rigs/ /bden brdzun phan tshun spangs pas 'gal/ /tha dad gyur na sgyu ma la/</text></item>
<item><p>371a.1</p><section></section><text>brten nas don dam mi rtogs shing / /sgyu mar 'bad pas 'ang tshi tshad 'gyur/ /dam pa btsal ba'i gnas med cing / /'grel ba med pas mi 'gyur/ /gang ma skyes ba'ang / /skye ba med par 'grub mi 'gyur/ /zhen spong gnyen po</text></item>
<item><p>371a.2</p><section></section><text>mi btub cing / /de nyid rang rgyud can gyur pas/ /gang la phan gnod med 'gyur ro/ /de ltar rtog cing the tshom za/ /khas blangs med sgra phyogs la zhen/ /de bas bla med theg pa pa/ /don dam du ni dbyer med de/ /kun rdzob tsam du thams cad la/ /dag</text></item>
<item><p>371a.3</p><section></section><text>dang ma dag gnyis kar 'dzin/ /thabs kyi theg pa chen po ni/ /don dam du ni kor bdun no/ /kun rdzob tu ni mnyam rdzogs so/ /rnam par byang dang sdug bsngal dag /kun rdzob tu'ang dbye rigs te/ /lta ba mtho dman de tsam mo/ /de nyid 'bras bu'i</text></item>
<item><p>371a.4</p><section></section><text>mtshan nyid la/ /don dam ngo bo nyid kyi rgyu/ /lhag pa'i bden par mtshan brjod do/ /cir yang snang ba'i ye shes nyid/ /mtshan mar ma 'gag cir yang snang / /ngo bo ma nges don mdzad dang / /rtag pa gnyis las ring ba dang / /rnal 'byor dam</text></item>
<item><p>371a.5</p><section></section><text>pa'i yul mthun dang / /snang la skye 'gag med pa'i phyir/ /lhag pa'i kun rdzob zhes su grags/ /thams cad kun gyi rang bzhin pas/ /ye shes snang ba'ang rgyu rkyen med/ /skye 'jig med do lnga 'bras bu/ /dbyings dang ye shes rdzogs mi</text></item>
<item><p>371a.6</p><section></section><text>dmigs/ /phyogs med re skong 'phrin las ni/ /kun nas mtshams pas don mdzad de/ /ched du byas pa'i rtag pa'ang bral/ /rang bzhin mtshan nyid ngo bo dang / /yon tan 'phrin las rtogs pas dben/ /chos drug ldan phyir lhag par bsgrags/ /de</text></item>
<item><p>371a.7</p><section></section><text>bzhin rang bzhin 'bras bu dang / /ye shes gsum phyir don dam pa'ang / /shes don nang nas mchog gyur pas/ /don gyi ming du 'grub pa yin/ /de'ang ma skyes dbyings kyi don/ /gzhi yis nges la khyad gyur pa/ /log rtog spyod yul las sogs</text></item>
<item><p>371b.1</p><section></section><text>pa| /kun gyi rang bzhin phyogs bkol med/ /ngo bo bdun rdzogs dmigs pa med/ /mtshan nyid kun grol kun bdag la/ /phyogs stong chad par yod pa med/ /kun byin ldan pa'i brlabs snang la/ dngos po gnyis kyi ngo bo'i rgyur/ /gyur pas</text></item>
<item><p>371b.2</p><section></section><text>ci yang mi 'gog ste/ /rgya mtsho'i chu dang rlabs bzhin no/ /yid bzhin nor ltar re skong ba'o/ /yon tan kun rdzogs phyir snang ba'o/ /thun mong dam pa'i yul min te/ /phyogs gcig mtha' bral ma yin te/ /dpe dang gtan tshigs thun mong bas/ /gtan</text></item>
<item><p>371b.3</p><section></section><text>la 'bebs pa ma yin te/ /bdun sogs ngo bor gnas pa'i phyir/ /lhag pa'ang grangs mthun nyid du brjod/ /rnal sogs spyod yul ma yin no/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni/ /pho mo ma yin ma ning min/ /mtshan med ma yin rig rgyud med/ /kha</text></item>
<item><p>371b.4</p><section></section><text>dog ma yin dbyibs ma yin/ /gnas su ma yin gang yang med/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te/ /thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu/ /phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad la/ /rang byung chen pos kun tu khyab/ /rang byung de nyid dngos med pas/ /chos dang gang</text></item>
<item><p>371b.5</p><section></section><text>zag bdag med pa/ /kun gyi phyag rgya'i rgyu yin no/ /ma skyes bzhi la bgrod pa'i lam/ /gang spangs gang thob de'i 'bras bu/ /dngos po ji bzhin mi mthong bas/ /'bras bu btags pa'i sangs rgyas tsam/ /de ltar nges 'byung bye brag gi/ /rgyud</text></item>
<item><p>371b.6</p><section></section><text>mas nges pa'i gsang ba'ang / /dang po rgyu 'bras dbye byed pas/ /'bras bu lam du byed ce'ang / /phyogs gcig dag pa'i chos nyid la/ /lta zhing de las lha drug sogs/ /dmigs pa gsum dang yan lag gis/ /sgom byed 'bras bu gzung 'dzin</text></item>
<item><p>371b.7</p><section></section><text>can/ /lta spyod ya cha'i zhen pa yis/ /bdag nyid chen po nang mi mthong / /dag pa'i sems zhi rtsol ba'i lam/ /rdo rje gsum gyi sa 'dzin pa/ /rmus long 'dri mkhan dang mtshungs te/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i thugs rje'i yul/ /gnyi ga ba yi bya ba</text></item>
<item><p>372a.1</p><section></section><text>dang / /rnal 'byor rjes su lta spyod 'brang / /gnyis po ya cha sngon bzhin te/ /de nyid bzhi yi zhen pa can/ /de'ang phyi rol pa la gnas/ /rnal 'byor ting 'dzin zhen pa can/ /dam par rang rig 'od gsal ba/ /</text></item>
<item><p>372a.2</p><section></section><text>dbyings nyid rnam dag ye shes la/ /kun rdzob byin rlabs dkyil 'khor dag /ye shes snang smra de la dmigs/ /de phyir lta dgongs phyi rol 'gyur/ /de rtogs khas len gtsang smrar len/ /chu yi ral gri phyis pa bzhin/ /spyod par mi phod</text></item>
<item><p>372a.3</p><section></section><text>'dzin pa can/ /de nyid sgo nas phyi rol spyod/ /shin tu nang don ma gtogs pas/ /phyi rol cha yis bcings pa yin/ /'od gsal bzhi las mtshan mar g.yo/ /snang stong res slob lam lnga yis/ /thob pa dam pa'ang bsti ba'i gnas/ /phyi</text></item>
<item><p>372a.4</p><section></section><text>rol gnyis sogs 'bras bu'i phyir/ /mching bu rin chen ji lta bar/ /lam 'bras ma 'brel 'khrul par zad/ /gtso mchog bshad par khas blangs pa/ /rgyas par gdams kyi gdeng du bgyis/ /rnal 'byor chen po lta ba'i don/ /yod</text></item>
<item><p>372a.5</p><section></section><text>las btsal na sgros btags te/ /med las btsal na skur btab 'gyur/ /yod med gnyis las btsal byas na/ /de ni lung du ma bstan 'gyur/ /de la gzhan yang 'brel med pas/ /nam yang rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ /mtha' la rtsod</text></item>
<item><p>372a.6</p><section></section><text>kun de lta bas/ /gsum bral phyogs gcig mtha' bral ba/ /rang blo 'khrul pa snang ba yin/ /de bas mthar thug ltos yod pa/ /kun kyang mtha' yis bral ba'ang mtha'/ /yin phyir nges pa'i blo mi bzhag /gnyis med smras bsam bral ba ltos/ /</text></item>
<item><p>372a.7</p><section></section><text>tshig dang sgra mthun tha dad pa/ /lta spyod log par drangs thabs su/ /gsung phyir rdo rje theg chen po/ /sgra gcig don gyi khyad par rtogs/ /dang po chos kun gnas bubs nyid/ /dang por mtshan cing dngos bzlog dang / /gnyis par yang dag</text></item>
<item><p>372b.1</p><section></section><text>bden bral don/ /mtshon phyir ma skyes de bzhin nyid/ /stong pa nyid dang snang ba med/ /gnyis su med dang mnyam pa nyid/ /ci'ang min dang smra bsam 'das/ /mi gnas mi dmigs mi rtog dang / /mtha' bral rnam par dag pa dang / /</text></item>
<item><p>372b.2</p><section></section><text>mtshan med smon pa med pa dang / /chos nyid chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / /spros bral 'gro 'ong med pa dang / /snang dang 'gag med thob pa med/ /grol dang thar dang thob pa dang / /kun rdzob don dam bden pa dang / /ma chags pa dang rang bzhin dang / /</text></item>
<item><p>372b.3</p><section></section><text>dngos med zhen med rig pa dang / /bdag med gzhan med spyod yul med/ /lta ba rig pa ye shes sogs/ /mtshon pa'i sgra grag chos rnams kyi/ /rang rang don rnams tha dad pa/ /khyad par ma 'dres gsal bya'i phyir/ /rig pas mdo</text></item>
<item><p>372b.4</p><section></section><text>tsam phyogs brjod pa/ /dang po rgyun gyis log rtog chos/ /bkag bsal phyogs gcig ma skyes dang / /dri mar ma skyes mtshan mar min/ /ched du byas pa ma skyes rnams/ /skyes spong ma skyes 'dod pa yis/ /srin bu bal bzhin bcings</text></item>
<item><p>372b.5</p><section></section><text>par zad/ /ji snyed tha dad chos rnams kun/ /gnyis med blang dor med pa yis/ /ltag pa ma go don mchog ni/ /skyes pa nyid na skye ba med/ /dbyings phyogs ma skyes de bzhin nyid/ /rig pa nyid dang yod ye shes 'dod/ /blang dor med pa'i de</text></item>
<item><p>372b.6</p><section></section><text>bzhin nyid/ /gnyis med ma byas ma bcos pa/ /smra bsam 'das pa'i gtso mtsho skyes/ /de bzhin stong nyid zhen pa'ang / /phyogs stong gsal stong la sogs las/ /rnam pa'i mchog ldan stong chen po/ /yod pa nyid ni stong pa nyid/ /yod dang</text></item>
<item><p>372b.7</p><section></section><text>med dbus smra bsam 'das/ /ngo bo rang bzhin mtshan nyid dang / /byin rlabs la sogs khyad par 'phags/ /snang ba med ces brjod pa yang / /ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs/ /snang la med lta bus pa med/ /phyogs gcig snang med phyogs ris med/ /brdzun pa</text></item>
<item><p>373a.1</p><section></section><text>gsal ba snang med dang / /snang ba dri ma med pa dang / /mtshan snang med pa la sogs pa/ /ched byas snang rtags kun par zad/ /sna tshogs snang ba dang bcas pa'i/ /snang ba med pa'i mchog 'di ni/ /snang ba yang med dbyer med</text></item>
<item><p>373a.2</p><section></section><text>pas/ /'di ltar snang zhes bsam du med/ /gnyis su med par bstan pa yang / /phyogs stong gnyis med yul sems med/ /phyogs gcig bral ba'i gnyis med pa/ /de kun gnyis pa'i gtso mchog go/ /don dam 'dod pa yod phyir ro/ /rgyu 'bras</text></item>
<item><p>373a.3</p><section></section><text>gnyis su med pa yang / /bya ba rnal 'byor don dam par/ /gnyis med dang du len pa'ang / /res 'jog ltos pa'i phyogs gcig pa'o/ /gnyis par grags pa'i chos so cog /ldan bzhin gnyis su med pa yis/ /lhun grub blang dor med pa dang / /gzugs</text></item>
<item><p>373a.4</p><section></section><text>brnyan nor bus mtshon pa'o/ /tshe phyir mnyam nyid gsungs pa dang / /'dra ba'i mnyam pa mi mnyam chos/ /mi mnyam bral ba'i phyogs mnyam ni/ /mnyam pa'i mtha' la gnas pas log /gsang chen mnyam pa chen po ni/ /mi mnyam chos kun bdag nyid la/ /</text></item>
<item><p>373a.5</p><section></section><text>mnyam dang mi mnyam cha shas med/ /mnyam pa kun gyi yang rtse yin/ /gzhan sel don du gnyer ba'i phyir/ /ci 'ang min par bka' stsal pa'ang / /rig pas ma yin shes pa la/ /yin par snang la skyon lta bar/ /mtha' sel phyogs gcig ma yin dang / /dmigs</text></item>
<item><p>373a.6</p><section></section><text>pa ma yin kun kyang mtha'/ /blang dor med sogs mi gsum ldan/ /ci'ang min zhes brjod pa'ang / /ci'ang yin pa'i dngos gzhi can/ /yin min dbyer med cha shas bral/ /phyogs su thug pa 'di la med/ /rma bya'i mdongs rtse kha dog 'dra/ /dgos ched sngon</text></item>
<item><p>373a.7</p><section></section><text>bzhin smra bsam 'das/ /bden pa phyogs gcig de bzhin pa/ /mkhur bar chu blugs bzhin 'dod la/ /phyogs chos smra bsam yul las 'das/ /rtog ge'i yul du nga smra'o/ /mi gsum ldan pa'i don mchog ni/ /smra bsam kun dngos smra bsam dka'/</text></item>
<item><p>373b.1</p><section></section><text>blo dan yul du ma gyur las/ /nam mkha' 'di zhes dka' dang 'dra/ /log rtog phyogs rigs rnal 'byor dang / /phyogs gsal mi gnas rten pa can/ /phyi pa'ang 'dzin pa'i gzhi can/ /gnas pa'i gtso bor bdag gis brjod/ /blang med dor med mi gnas</text></item>
<item><p>373b.2</p><section></section><text>pa/ /bsgom bya sems phyir rten bral ba/ /gnas dang mi gnas spong len med/ /ci la'ang yid rten mi 'cha' bas/ /mi gnas nyid la gnas mi byed/ /rten dang rten can med pa ni/ /mi gnas chen po mchog yin te/ /nam mkha' lta bu rten dang bral/ /gang</text></item>
<item><p>373b.3</p><section></section><text>gi mi dmigs shes brjod pa'ang / /log dang 'jig rten ting 'dzin dang / /'gog gnyis phyogs gcig la gnas dang / /dbu ma ba dag mi dmigs gsum/ /'dod las gsel ba'i dmigs pa can/ /phyogs gcig rten med dmigs pa'o/ /dmigs</text></item>
<item><p>373b.4</p><section></section><text>pa kun bdag mi dmigs la/ /mtshon chen can du de brjod kyang / /mi dmigs 'dod pa'i chags pa med/ /dmigs spo zhe sdang phrag dog med/ /gnyis su med par mi dmigs la/ /mkha' la 'di zhes dmigs bral 'dra'o/ /rnam par mi rtog brjod pa'ang / /</text></item>
<item><p>373b.5</p><section></section><text>'jig rten zhen pa'i rnam mi rtog /log par sgom pa mi rtog dang / /byis pa dgag sgrub mi rtog gnyis/ /phyogs 'dzin gsal ba mi rtog pa/ /rnam dag gsal ba mi rtog rnams/ /bzhi la rtog pa med smra zhing / /mi rtog mi mthun bgegs lta bas/ /dgag</text></item>
<item><p>373b.6</p><section></section><text>sgrub blang dor byed pa de/ /nges mchog bzhi yi rtog pa can/ /thabs chen rnam par mi rtog pa/ /rtogs tshogs ming tsam ye shes phyir/ /rtog pa nyid nas ma skyes pas/ /skyes brda'i 'du shes dbye ba med/ /dgag dang sgrub med mi rtog pa/ /mi rtog nyid</text></item>
<item><p>373b.7</p><section></section><text>du'ang rtog med pas/ /me long nang la rtog med bzhin/ /grol rtogs bya phyir mtha' bral ba/ /mtha' zhes thub par grags pa rnams/ /log pa'i mtha' gnyis bral gzugs med/ /skye 'gag cha shas bral ba dang / /rang rig mtha' brgyad bzhi gnyis bral/</text></item>
<item><p>374a.1</p><section></section><text>mtha' la skyon du rtog byed cing / /mtha' bral yon tan len byed pa/ /ltos pas thub pa yod pa'i phyir/ /mtha' bral nyid kyang mtha' yi gtso/ /kun rdzob shes yul byed pas 'khrul/ /yang dag mtha' bral shes</text></item>
<item><p>374a.2</p><section></section><text>pa'ang / /mtha' brgyad la sogs grags pa rnams/ /rang rig ye shes snang ba'i phyir/ /spros pa thugs rje'i dus nyid na/ /ming tsam der red med pa'i phyir/ /mtha' dang bral ba gnyis su med/ /sman zhes bya ba'i ga bur dus/ /grang ba'i dug</text></item>
<item><p>374a.3</p><section></section><text>dang gnyis med ltar/ /bral rjes brjod pa de kho na/ /thug pa'i mtha' dang dbyer med la/ /gang du'ang thug pa med pa'i phyir/ /mtha' bral bla mar bshad pa yin/ /rnal 'byor dag pa sbyang bya dag /mthong sgom lam gyi spang bya zhing / /sngags dang</text></item>
<item><p>374a.4</p><section></section><text>phyag rgya spyor rim dag /dag 'dod dri med chags pas bcings/ /thug pa'i rnam dag zhen pa can/ /rang rang kun tu btags pas non/ /'og mas smad pa'i dri ma rnams/ /dri ma nyid na rnam dag cing / /blang dor gnyis su med pa la/ /dag dang ma</text></item>
<item><p>374a.5</p><section></section><text>dag ris med pas/ /theg pa kun gyi yang kye ste/ /'dam skyes pad+ma ji bzhin no/ /mtshan ma med pa'i rim pa yang / /grags pa'i mtshan med 'dod pa yis/ /spang dang spel bas phyogs gcig pa/ /'du shes yul la skyon lta zhing / /de</text></item>
<item><p>374a.6</p><section></section><text>med pa la mchog gzhol byed/ /'dod dang zhen pa'i gzung 'dzin can/ /phyi yi bya ba rnal 'byor kyang / /de phyogs mthun mtshan phyir na brdzun/ /mchog gi mtshan ma med ces pa/ /'du shes kun bdag rang rig phyir/ /yul med de la 'dzin pa</text></item>
<item><p>374a.7</p><section></section><text>med/ /de nas phyogs kyi mtshan 'dzin bral/ /de bzhin smon pa med pa yang / /blo chung ltos pa'i smon byed dang / /bsal dang len dang smon med gsum/ /'dod pas zhen pa smon pa yin/ /smon pa kun rdzogs rang rig nyid/ /lam dang</text></item>
<item><p>374b.1</p><section></section><text>'bras bu dngos gzhi'i phyir/ /'phrul dga'i longs spyod tshul bzhin du/ /gzhan du re smon skye ba med/ /chos nyid dbyings zhes brjod pa'ang / /spyod yul 'di dag med stong zhing / /gsal bral stong pa'i chos dbyings dang / /rang rig</text></item>
