<item><p>374b.3</p><section></section><text>can ma gol dmigs pa'ang med/ /byar med byas med bslad pa'ang med/ /'di dang 'di zhes ris med pa/ /chos nyid dam pa de kho na'o/ /kun 'byung mu med brda khyab med/ /gang yang ma spangs bkol ba med/ /phyogs tshad med de blos rig med/ /</text></item>
<item><p>374b.4</p><section></section><text>de phyir gsang ba'i dbyings zhes bya/ /rnam mrangs chos de nam mkha' dang / /mthu yod phyir na nyer spyar ba'o/ /spros bral shes par bya ba'ang / /log rtog zhe na spros pa rnams/ /skyon shes sel ba'i phyogs gcig pa/ /phyogs gcig spros pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>374b.5</p><section></section><text>mtha' thub bcings/ /rang rig ye shes spros pa'ang / /spong len byed na spros pa'i mtha'/ /thig le kun nas bzlum pa ltar/ /spros pa lhun 'grub spros bral ni/ /ji snyed spros pa sems nyid phyir/ /rgyu 'dzin med pa'i byang chub sems/ /ming</text></item>
<item><p>374b.6</p><section></section><text>lnga ldan pa'i ye shes ni/ /de nyid chos dbyings rang byung ste/ /mi gnas shes pa lhun 'grub pa/ /de kho de bzhin nyid dam pa'o/ /yul dang ngo bos spros med phyir/ /spros bral kun gyi blor 'gyur yin/ /'gro dang 'ong ba med pa 'di/ /zhen log 'gro 'ong dam</text></item>
<item><p>374b.7</p><section></section><text>par med/ /thun mong phyogs gcig 'gro 'ong med/ /dag dang 'od gsal 'gro 'ong med/ /'gro 'ong phyogs la smod byed cing / /'gro 'ong med phyogs rjes 'brangs pa/ /shes bya shes byed ya cha ba/ /dam pa'i lam du gang la 'gyur/ /'gro 'ong</text></item>
<item><p>375a.1</p><section></section><text>kun dang gnyis med pa'i/ /'gro 'ong med pa chen po'o/ /'gro 'ong nyid na med pa'i phyir/ /'ong dang mi 'ong yod med med/ /rgya mtshor 'brel pa'i 'bab chu bzhin/ /yod med mtha' yi pa med/ /rtag pa 'khrul snang</text></item>
<item><p>375a.2</p><section></section><text>log snang dang / /phra rab stong 'khrul rnam snang dang / /sgyu snang ltar snang rim pa dag /yod snang la sogs 'dus snang dang / /bdag rig rang bzhin rkyen bslangs pas/ /lhag snang 'dod pas 'khrul mthong yin/ /snang med snang ba</text></item>
<item><p>375a.3</p><section></section><text>kun bdag nyid/ /rang rig ye shes cho 'phrul ni/ /rgya mtsho chu dang rlabs bzhin du/ /byang chub sems nyid kun tu shar/ /'gag pa med pa'i bye brag ni/ /med na mi 'gyur 'gag med dag /blo bur tsam snang mi 'gog dang / /'bras bu rdo rje'i</text></item>
<item><p>375a.4</p><section></section><text>'gag med gnyis/ /'gag spong de dang bral 'dod na/ /'gag med mtha' la zhen par zad/ /gnyis med 'gag pa med pa ni/ /rang byung ye shes rang snang phyir/ /'gag pa nyid na 'gag med pas/ /nam mkha' lta bur skye 'jig med/ /</text></item>
<item><p>375a.5</p><section></section><text>'dod pa zhen pa thob pa dang / /spangs thob sbyangs thob bgrong pa dang / /bdag yin las rung thob pa dag /'dod pas spangs thob phyir na rdzun/ /thob pa med pa'i thob pa ni/ /mtshan ldan long ba mig phyed bzhin/ /thabs la rten pa'i shes rab nyid/ /</text></item>
<item><p>375a.6</p><section></section><text>'bras bus shar bar zad/ /gzhi tsam nyid la spang thob med/ /ched du phyed pa'i thob med gnyis/ /lan cing chags pa yod pa'i phyir/ /thog med zhen pa lcags sgrog can/ /bdag nyid chen po thob med ni/ /'bras bu kun bdag rang rig la/ /gnyis</text></item>
<item><p>375a.7</p><section></section><text>phyir thob bya'i chos med de/ /dbul mo gter dang phrad nor bzhin/ /byed pos bgrol dang skag grol dang / /sbyangs pa grol ba phyogs gcig pa/ /thun mong min pa'i bltas grol ba/ /'ching grol gnyis su bltas pas bcings/ /bdag</text></item>
<item><p>375b.1</p><section></section><text>nyid chen por dbyer med pa/ /sus kyang ma bcings bcings med de/ /bcings par bya ba med gnyis grol/ /mkha' la 'dud med ji lta bu'o/ /ma rig nyon mongs las sdug bsngal/ /chu bo bzhi las thar pa'ang / /shin tu ring dang rgyud pa</text></item>
<item><p>375b.2</p><section></section><text>dang/ /bkag spangs gsal bas thar pa dang / /zil gnon sbyor bas thar 'dod pa/ /'dod pa'i rgya mtshor chud pa'i phyir/ /rtsol ba'i chu rgyun phyogs cha khyer/ /mchog dang ring ba'i log lta can/ /chu bo bzhi nyid lam 'bras phyir/ /</text></item>
<item><p>375b.3</p><section></section><text>thabs dang shes rab las nyid kyi/ /chu bo nyid la rol spyod pas/ /brgal ba med par rnam par thar/ /chu la nya chen 'phyo ba'am/ /sman sngags ldan pa'i dug nad 'dra'o/ /log pa'i kun rdzob rnam gnyis dang / /'khrul pa gzhan</text></item>
<item><p>375b.4</p><section></section><text>dbang kun rdzob rnams/ /rig pa bzhis bcus bden lta ba'ang / /yon tan rlabs 'byung lnga yi 'khor/ /tshul mthun rig pas 'bras bur lta/ /lhag pa kun rdzob don dam gnyis/ /bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya/ /thun mong don dam bye</text></item>
<item><p>375b.5</p><section></section><text>brag kyang / /bshad pa cha yis shes par bya/ /rgya mtsho dngas par gza' skar bzhin/ /bden gnyis snang stong dbyer med pa/ /phyogs blta'i mthar thug med pa ni/ /de ka rang bzhin rgyud nyid do/ /zhen pa'i yul la ma chags pa'ang / /tshim</text></item>
<item><p>375b.6</p><section></section><text>dang snying po bar chad sogs/ /chags med 'khrul dang log pa dang / /bkag spangs phyogs gcig chags pa dang / /bzlog dang gtang snyoms chags med dang / /bzhi po chags med chags pas bcings/ /chags med blang dor med pa ni/ /</text></item>
<item><p>375b.7</p><section></section><text>chags pa nyid na chags med pas/ /thabs dang shes rab gdeng ldan pas/ /pad+ma la ni de bzhin no/ /kun brtags rang bzhin chos rnams ni/ /rgyud spangs phyogs gcig rang bzhin med/ /phyogs gcig mtha' yi rang bzhin dang / /chos</text></item>
<item><p>376a.1</p><section></section><text>nyid mtshan nyid la sogs pa/ /rang bzhin yod 'dor med bsgrub phyir/ /spong len mthar gyur rang bzhin can/ /nam mkha' dngas pa'i dus nyid dang / /'ja' sprin tshogs kyi rang bzhin lta/ /brtags pa'i rang bzhin thams</text></item>
<item><p>376a.2</p><section></section><text>cad pa/ /de nyid snang phyir gnyis med pa'o/ /de bzhin dngos po med pa dang / /zhen pa med cing grags pa rnams/ /ye med snga la gcig med gcig la gcig /med dang zhig med 'dod lta ba/ gzhi la gnyis pa med 'dod pa/ /mi srid gzhi yi dpes mtshon par/ /</text></item>
<item><p>376a.3</p><section></section><text>'dod pa snang ris mi mthun par/ /lta ba sngon bzhin rgyu rim bzhin/ /de nyid 'bras lta'i rim pa gnyis/ /drug po 'das pa'i mthar zhen cing / /phyogs gcig gzhi la gang lta ba/ /sna tshogs snang ba'i gzhi mi rung / /de des mar me gsal dus na/ /mun pa</text></item>
<item><p>376a.4</p><section></section><text>ma sang sgrol med de/ /gsal nyid gnyis su med par lta/ /dngos zhen ma rig ye shes pa/ /spangs dang mi gnas 'gal ba med/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i yon tan ltar/ /dngos gnyis lhun grub cir yang snang / /chos kun gzhi zhes de phyir bya'o/ /rdzun la sogs</text></item>
<item><p>376a.5</p><section></section><text>pa'i rig pa ni/ /rgyu yi gzhi 'dod bden lta ba/ /phyogs gcig yin gyi nges 'jog /'byung ba'i gzhi rtsar the tshom med/ /thams cad ye nas dbyer med la/ /rig dang ma rig blang dor med/ /gnyis med ston pa'i lung man ngag /rig pas 'tsham pa go 'byed</text></item>
<item><p>376a.6</p><section></section><text>pa/ /dpa' bo'i lag cha ji bzhin du/ /rnam grangs kun kyang rtogs pa'i thabs/ /rig pa med kyang thabs kyi mchog /yin min chos la rtsod mi byed/ /chos dang gang zag bdag med pa/ /dngos lta'i bdag med nyan thos pas/ /phyogs tsam stong</text></item>
<item><p>376a.7</p><section></section><text>pa'i chos bdag med/ /rgyun snang don 'gog bdag med dang / /gsal ba phyogs gcig bdag med dang / /rig snang bdag med ye shes snang / /gsum gnyis spong len byed pa'i phyir/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gtso bo yin/ /phyogs bcu rang</text></item>
<item><p>376b.1</p><section></section><text>byung ye shes la/ /rang byung 'di 'dra'i dngos med pas/ /chos dang gang zag yod ma yin/ /la lar nyi ma'ang mun rkyen ltar/ /bdag med ye shes bdag kun ldan/ /gnyis med bdag med bdag nyid che/ /med mthar thug pa 'di la med/ /gzhan med spyod</text></item>
<item><p>376b.2</p><section></section><text>yul med pa yang / /phra bas gzhan pa'i yor po med/ /zab pas rtags pa'i dpyod byed med/ /gzhan pa stong pas med pa dang / /'khrul pas med pa'i rdzun pas med/ /rig phyir med dang ye shes phyir/ /gzhan med pa'ang de bzhin no/ /de bral</text></item>
<item><p>376b.3</p><section></section><text>'dod phyir lcags kyi dkris/ /sngon bzhin thams cad ye shes la/ /ngo bo gcig phyir cha shas med/ /gcig mtha' med pas kun tu shar/ /gnyis su med pas phung gsum med/ /de la smras bsam med pa'i phyir/ /gzung 'dzin lcags kyis bsdoms</text></item>
<item><p>376b.4</p><section></section><text>pa med/ /lha rig gnyis kyi sngon brjod pa/ /'dod pa tha dad yul mthong ba'o/ /shes rab spyan gyi ngo bo ste/ /khyad par bshad pa nyid du zad/ /mthong ba'i lam du gcig smra ba'ang / /bshes gnyen rkyen phrad sngags mthong gi/ /de med rang gi mngon shes</text></item>
<item><p>376b.5</p><section></section><text>kyis/ /mthong na bcu pa'ang thob par rigs/ /lta ba'i sgrib pas phye ba'i phyir/ /las dang 'bras bu'i khyad bar che'o/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ye shes la/ /bcu drug gnyis su 'dod pa dang / /bzhi dang gnyis su gnas 'gyur 'dod/ /rig pa bzhi dang</text></item>
<item><p>376b.6</p><section></section><text>lngar 'dod pa/ /rang rang rtogs pa'i don mthong phyir/ /mun pa'i rab mchog yin zhes brjod/ /brgyad drug tshogs bzhi snang bcas pa/ /dpyod yul dngos po snang ngo cog /rig pas dbang bsgyur bzhin snang dang / /so so'i ji ltar brtags snang</text></item>
<item><p>376b.7</p><section></section><text>dang/ /ngo bos nges pa red med phyir/ /sems nyid 'ba' zhig snang ba yang / /'khrul dus rang bzhin ma 'khrul dang / /so so shes pa brgyad chos phyir/ /ming gsum ldan pa'i shes gcig ste/ /gcig dang du ma kun dngos pas/ /ye shes kun</text></item>
<item><p>377a.1</p><section></section><text>gyi bdag nyid pa/ /cha yi lnga dang brgyad brjod pa/ /rtsa ba rang byung ye shes so/ /ye nas shes pa'i bdag nyid pas/ /me long blta ba'i tshul bzhin du/ /snang stong chos su grags pa kun/ /kha dog dbyibs sogs rang snang ba'o/ /rtag</text></item>
<item><p>377a.2</p><section></section><text>chad phyin ci log pa'i grangs/ /dngos dang ther zug skad cig rgyun/ /mi nyams ngo bo nyid rtag pa/ /tha ma theg mchog bzhed kun dang / /zhig med ye nas chad pa dang / /rkyen gyi ring chad la sogs pa/ /med bzhin sngon bzhin gsungs pa yang / /ched du byas</text></item>
<item><p>377a.3</p><section></section><text>pa'i rtag snang zad/ /sum cu brgyad sogs mtha' rnams la/ /spong len bral 'dod zhen chags can/ /bdag med smra ba'i blang dor mkhan/ /blang dor mtha' la mkhan po gnas/ /mchog 'dir mtha' yi grangs de'ang/ /'du shes bzlog phyir brjod pa</text></item>
<item><p>377a.4</p><section></section><text>las/ /de dag nyid du 'dod pa med/ /sems phyir mi spong rkun bu yang / /so so phyogs kyi ma reg pas/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ngo bo la/ /thams cad dag ces bya ba yang / /dngos po bsal dag ma yin te/ /snang spyod nyid na rnam par dag /de phyir</text></item>
<item><p>377a.5</p><section></section><text>lhag pa zhes su brjod/ /rang bzhin sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i don/ /sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kun/ /ngo bo gcig pa'i de kho na/ /de ni gcig gi mthar thug 'gyur/ /cir yang snang ba'i ye shes nyid/ /bcos med nges pa'i de kho na/ /lhag pa'i ye</text></item>
<item><p>377a.6</p><section></section><text>shes sgyu ma de/ /byas 'gro med par ci yang 'khrul/ /nam mkha'i cho 'phrul mtsho rlabs bzhin/ /snang ba'i dus na snang med de/ /dbyer med pa la rim mi phyed/ /de phyir gcig ces mtshon thabs brjod/ /de kho 'dra ba'i mchog yin no/ /tha dad spong ba'i gcig</text></item>
<item><p>377a.7</p><section></section><text>'dod pa/ /gcig gi mtha' la zhen pas nor/ /dag pa'i 'og tu gcig pa las/ /ma dag glo bur snang 'dod pa/ /sa bon med pa'i 'bras 'dod pa/ /sa ba rta mtho mi thag sbrul ltar/ /smig rgyu chu zla ltar med pas/ /snang zhes rig pas bsgrub pa</text></item>
<item><p>377b.1</p><section></section><text>pa yang / /'khrul te de na ri bong rwa'ang / /'byung ba nyid du the tshom med/ /gzhi la 'dra 'khrul chos yod phyir/ /'di 'dra 'khrul pa'i chos med ltar/ /lhun 'grub dbyer med ngang la snang / /'khor 'das snang yang grub pa med/ /yod pa sun 'byin</text></item>
<item><p>377b.2</p><section></section><text>chos 'di la/ /med par smra ba byis pa'i blo/ /med par sun 'byin chos dag la/ /yod lta yin zhes smra ba'ang log /dbus 'dzin sun 'byin chos dag la/ /gcig tu lta bur byed pa'ang 'khrul/ /mtha' bral 'dzin pa sun 'byin ba/ dri mas</text></item>
<item><p>377b.3</p><section></section><text>'gos 'dra nor ba'i mig /kun gyi 'byung gnas byed pa'o/ /de yis ma byas gang yang med/ /kha dog dbyibs rigs kun dngos dang / /kha dog dbyibs rigs gang yang min/ /shin tu brtag dka' sus mi rig /rig med dang la</text></item>
<item><p>377b.4</p><section></section><text>thams cad snang / /byang chub sems zhes brjod pa ni/ /skad cig kun dngos rgyud med phyir/ /gang nas ma 'ong gar mi 'gro/ /rtog med rang rig kho na'o/ /shes byar gyur pa'i chos so cog /rig pa ye nas rang gsal phyir/ /rang rig shes bya</text></item>
<item><p>377b.5</p><section></section><text>dmigs skye med/ /dngos yul tsam yang 'dod ma yin/ /byang chub sems kyi thig le ni/ /kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa/ /kha dog gnas dbyibs ris yod min/ /yon tan mchog gi snying po ni/ /rtog ge'i spyod yul de ma yin/ /mnyam</text></item>
<item><p>377b.6</p><section></section><text>pa'i don nyid ji lta bu/ /mnyam nyid rang bzhin gang yang min/ /gnyis phyir min zhes brjod pa las/ /phyogs gcig min pa smra brjod 'das/ /zhen pa bzlog phyir rkyen bshad ma rtogs pa/ /chos kyi ngang la tshig med brjod med pa'ang / /</text></item>
<item><p>377b.7</p><section></section><text>spangs bsal med phyogs log gsum blta ba ste/ /rang bzhin ngo bo mtshan nyid mchog las gol ba ni/ /'og mas spangs pa'i log rtog grangs/ /mtha' yas mi spong rang rig phyir/ /len pa'i chos rnams blang du med/ /blang dor med pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>378a.1</p><section></section><text>don mchog ni/ /zhen bral mtha' 'das 'ching grol sogs/ /blang bya kun gyi mchog yin te/ /de nyid bdag yin bla med pa/ /nyams su blang ba'i thabs mchog yin/ /sus kyang ma bcings bcings med de/ /bcings</text></item>
<item><p>378a.2</p><section></section><text>par bya ba yod ma yin/ /bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i/ /ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i yon tan ltar/ /bden gsum don kyang de ltar snang / /don du bden dang mi bden zhes/ /gnyis pa'i rtog pa rang gis med/ /</text></item>
<item><p>378a.3</p><section></section><text>de mthong shes rab mchog gi spyan/ /dmigs pa'i yul gyis blta 'dod pa/ /gzung 'dzin lam du zhugs pa'i phyir/ /nam yang lhag pa'i don mi mthong / /rtog pa'i yid dang rdo rje'i yid/ /snga ma mi spong mi len te/ /de sogs brgyad po'i rigs</text></item>
<item><p>378a.4</p><section></section><text>med phyir/ /brgyad bzhi'i tshogs rnams gcig yin te/ /rang rig tshogs gcig dbang drug mchog /so so'i rgyud du dbyer med de/ /brtags pas tha snyad snang dus na/ /ngo bo gcig pa rdo rje yin/ /yul med rang gsal shes rab spyan/ /shes</text></item>
<item><p>378a.5</p><section></section><text>pa spyod yul gnyis su med/ /shes dang shes par bya med pa'i/ /ye shes sgron me sbar bar ni/ /rgyu med rgyun tu rang shar bas/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing khams thams cad mthong / /thams cad mkhyen pa'i shes rab can/ /go tshim myong rag rig</text></item>
<item><p>378a.6</p><section></section><text>sogs chos/ /ming grangs drug bzhi gnyis su grangs/ /de ltar nges pa'i lta ba la/ /zhen pa'i lam du 'gro sa med/ /'jug pa'i dus na gcig po nyid/ /nges par rang gsal mi g.yo la/ /rtog ge pa dag de lta na/ /bogs dang yon tan dgag</text></item>
<item><p>378a.7</p><section></section><text>'gyur zhes/ /som nyis za gzhi'i yul min pas/ /gnyis su bslabs pa gces par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te/ /blo rtsol rab kyis rtogs 'gyur cing / /brjod bzhin shes pa des skye phyir/ /zab brjod zab mor nges par skye/</text></item>
<item><p>378b.1</p><section></section><text>zab mo'i tshe na blo can gyis/ /rang gi mtshan nyid mngon rtogs phyir/ /'dod pa med par zhor bogs sogs/ /'byung ba nyid na g.yos pa med/ /rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab lam/ /rim par mngon byas stobs 'gyur na/ /dpag bsam shing dang rin chen</text></item>
<item><p>378b.2</p><section></section><text>ltar/ /ngo mtshar rmad 'byung 'bras bu lnga/ /gzhan nas yod 'ong ma yin te/ /thabs la brten na shes rab nyid/ /de lta bu yi dang du 'byung / /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas shes bya/ /rigs 'dzin gsum pa'i gang de nyid/ /srid pa tha ma mdzad rdzogs pas/ /nga yi</text></item>
<item><p>378b.3</p><section></section><text>dbang bskur mngon sangs rgyas/ /rdo rje 'dzin par the tshom med/ /skal ba snod shes dad brtson shes/ /mchog rnams kun gyis rtog bya bgyis/ /de bzlog yul min sgro skur la/ /ming tsam don phyir bstan mi bya/ /bskal mun nang gi rin chen nor/ /sgron mes rnyed</text></item>
<item><p>378b.4</p><section></section><text>'gyur dbul sel ltar/ /skal ba thugs kyi rin chen nor/ /ston tshig sgron ma 'di rnyed shog /thugs kyi sgron ma dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //[]@/ /lta ba yang dag sgron ma bzhugs/ /@##/ /dpal ldan thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyi ma'i</text></item>
<item><p>378b.5</p><section></section><text>'od stong gis/ /shin tu 'bar ba'i zer tsam bdag blo mun par byung / /dbyangs dang tshig 'das nam mkha'i mtshan nyid las 'das pa'i/ /rang sems skye med zab mo'i don gyi phyogs tsam snang / /rang gis rtogs pas mkhas pas gsungs pa'i rnam mang ba/ /rtog</text></item>
<item><p>378b.6</p><section></section><text>ge bdag 'dra'i spyod yul rtsom par mi 'os kyang / /rig pa'i brjed byang tsam 'di nges don mos rnams kyis/ /chos phyir 'brang ba'i blo yis dpyad cing goms par bya/ /bskal pa mang por rgyal ba rnams la ni/ /dge rtsa bskyed cing rang sems sbyangs pa yis/ /rnal</text></item>
<item><p>378b.7</p><section></section><text>'byor dam pa nges pa'i lung chen la/ /shes rab mchog ldan rig pa'i mos blo gsal/ /rnam par mi rtog don dam rang bzhin gyi/ /rig pa'i tshul chen sems kyis dmigs pa ni/ /lung dang man ngag rigs pas thag bcad de/ /chos kyi rang bzhin yang dag yid</text></item>
<item><p>379a.1</p><section></section><text>ches bya/ /ji ltar nam mkha' la ni tha snyad du/ /ming dang tshig gis rjod par byed mod kyi/ /mtshan ma med cing spros dang bral ba ste/ /ngo bo nyid kyis sems kyi yul las 'das/ /ji ltar smig rgyu'i phung po snang ba dag /snang ba nyid na nam mkha'i rang bzhin</text></item>
<item><p>379a.2</p><section></section><text>ltar/ /de bzhin chos rnams sna tshogs ltar snang yang / /snang ba nyid na mtshan ma nam mkha' bzhin/ /rgya che rab zab theg mchog yangs pa'i lam/ /don dam dmigs med spros pa kun las 'das/ /bdag dang chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa yi/ /dbu ma'i don can blo yi rting du go bar byos/ /</text></item>
<item><p>379a.3</p><section></section><text>yang dag don dam cig car go nas ni/ /yod med la sogs sems kyi yul 'das shing / /re dang dogs pa'i mtha' ni rab spangs nas/ /rtsol ba med pa'i brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/ /chos rnams thams cad ye nas ro gcig phyir/ /bsgom pa dang ni bsgom bya'ang dmigs su med/ /</text></item>
<item><p>379a.4</p><section></section><text>sems nyid ye nas chos nyid yin shes na/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid gzhan du bsgom mi dgos/ /rmi lam dag gi bde dang sdug bsngal dag /sad par gyur na rang bzhin mnyam pa ltar/ /rnam par rtog dang mi rtog gnyis ka yang / /shes pas rig na rang bzhin yongs kyis mnyam/ /</text></item>
<item><p>379a.5</p><section></section><text>de ltar dus gsum rnam par dag pa dag /rang bzhin nyid las ma 'das shes na ni/ /sgro 'dogs gus pa'i rjes su ma 'brangs na/ /rang bzhin ngang du yong gis bcos mi dgos/ /ji ltar nam mkha' mtshan ma med pa'i phyir/ /nam mkha' de nyid bsgom par mi 'gyur bzhin/ /ngo bo</text></item>
<item><p>379a.6</p><section></section><text>nyid kyis ma skyes sems kyis ni/ /ma skyes de nyid bsgom par ga la 'gyur/ /mi mthun pa dang gnyan po dbyer med don/ /rang gis shes na rtsol ba kun spangs te/ /btang snyoms chen por ma bcos ngang bzhag na/ /tha snyad tsam du'ang bsgom zhes de la bya/ /skyon dang yon tan</text></item>
<item><p>379a.7</p><section></section><text>gnyis po ma skyes phyir/ /rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma ci byung yang / /ma bkag rang byung ma 'brangs rang zhi ste/ /ma bcos ma byas rang gi ngang gis gsal/ /lta ba yang dag sgron ma rdzogs so// //A tsar+ya dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'o// //[]@/ /mtha'i mun sel</text></item>
<item><p>379b.1</p><section></section><text>sgron ma bzhugs/ @##/ //chos rnams sems kyi 'khrul pa ste/ /sems las ma gtogs chos rnams med/ /chos su snang ba 'khrul pa'i sems/ /rten 'brel sgyu ma skye ba med/ /skye ba med ces bstan pa'ang / /dngos por 'dzin pa bzlog phyir te/ /sgyu ma ye nas skye med la/ /</text></item>
<item><p>379b.2</p><section></section><text>skye med snyad kyi sgra mi gdags/ /nam mkha' 'di ni med do zhes/ /blun po gang zhig rtog par byed/ /mkhas pa sngon nas yod mi 'dzin/ /med par mi rtog tshig mi brjod/ /sems las ma gtogs chos med phyir/ /bsgom bya'i chos nyid gud na med/ /sems kyang ye nas ma skyes na/ /</text></item>
<item><p>379b.3</p><section></section><text>bsgom pa po'ang gang la yod/ /brjod pa'i rtsa ba sems nyid ni/ /ma skyes dngos gzhi yod min na/ /bsgom dang bsgom du med pa yi/ /tha snyad gang zhig gang la 'jug /'gro la sems rgyud gnyis mi 'chang / /de ni ma skyes rang mi dmigs/ /de las gzhan pa'i sems med phyir/ /</text></item>
<item><p>379b.4</p><section></section><text>bcos shing gnas pa gang zhig yod/ /'khrul rtog rkyen dang ldan gyi bar/ /smig rgyu bzhin du sems snang na/ /rang bzhin shes pas bcos su med/ /mi shes smig rgyu bcos pa bzhin/ /mi rtog mtshan med sems rnams kyis/ /ma rtogs mtshan ma med la'ang gnas ma byed/ /</text></item>
<item><p>379b.5</p><section></section><text>mtshan ma med la mi gnas na/ /mtshan mar gnas pa smos ci dgos/ /bsgrub pa med cing gnas pa med/ /'du byed med pa mkha' 'dra bas/ /'du byed las byung bsam gtan skyon/ /ma lus kun gyis gos pa med/ /ji ltar rtog med zab mo zhig /blo yi yul du snang zhe na/ /mi</text></item>
<item><p>379b.6</p><section></section><text>rtog zab mo'i nyams myong ba/ /myong ba yin phyir de nyid min/ /lta ba dgum chung / mtha'i mun sel sgron ma/ bod kyi paN+Di ta A tsar+ya gnyan dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'o// //[]@/ /thabs shes sgron ma bzhugs/ /@##/ /dus gsum rgyal bas ji ltar thugs chud pa'i/ /chos</text></item>
<item><p>379b.7</p><section></section><text>kyi rang bzhin rig pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /ma thob thob phyir brtson par mi byed kyang / /snying rje'i bye brag thabs kyi spyod pa'ang ston/ /ji ltar mkha' la 'ja' tshon rnam mang yang / /nam mkha'i ngang du ro gcig bye brag med/ /de bzhin rgyal ba'i gzugs sku rnam mang yang / /ye shes dbyings</text></item>
<item><p>380a.1</p><section></section><text>su ro gcig bye brag med/ /bde gshegs snying po sems kyi rang bzhin la/ /yun ring dus nas rmongs pa'i sems can rnams/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa'i sems rgyud so sor snang / /rang bzhin nyid ni rgyal ba'i chos skur gcig /ye shes sgyu mar snang ba'i sangs rgyas dang / /</text></item>
<item><p>380a.2</p><section></section><text>log rtog sgyu mar snang ba'i sems can gnyis/ /ye shes log rtog khyad par bsam yas kyang / /sgyu ma yin phyir rang bzhin yongs kyis mnyam/ /sems can sangs rgyas bden par tshul gcig cing / /rang gi sems nyid sangs rgyas yin shes na/ /gzhan nas bsgrub par bya</text></item>
<item><p>380a.3</p><section></section><text>ba ci yang med/ /de lta bas na spang bar bya ba'ang med/ /'di lta bu yi chos kyi tshul rig na/ /ma rig rnams la snying rje yongs kyis skye/ /snying rje skyes nas sgyu ma'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /phan 'dogs thabs kyi spyod pa cir yang ston/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pa ji lta ba/ /sems kyi rang bzhin</text></item>
<item><p>380a.4</p><section></section><text>gnam med de ltar bsgom/ /thugs rje'i 'bad pa rab 'byams ji lta ba/ /rnal 'byor thabs kyi ting 'dzin de ltar spral/ /bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir/ /pha rol phyin drug dmigs med rdzogs par ldan/ /thabs kyi spyod pas gdul bya kun 'dul yang / /sgyu ma'i blo ldan</text></item>
<item><p>380a.5</p><section></section><text>rlom sems ci yang med/ /ma skyes sems la sems can med pa'i phyir/ /ngo bo nyid kyi chos sku'i nga rgyal 'chang / /chos kun sgyu mar mngon sum gsal ba'i phyir/ /ting 'dzin sgyu mas ci 'dus de ltar ston/ /chos sku mnyam nyid rtogs nas 'gro don du/ /bde gshegs byin rlabs cing</text></item>
<item><p>380a.6</p><section></section><text>yang ston pa ltar/ /bdag nyid chos sku rig pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /thabs kyi bye brag da nas de ltar brjod/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i sgron ma rdzogs so// //slob dpon dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'o// //[]@/ /rnal 'byor spyod ba'i lugs nges pa'i don la ji bzhin sgom thabs kyi sgron ma</text></item>
<item><p>380a.7</p><section></section><text>bzhugs/ /@##/ /ji bzhin pa yi chos brtson par/ /chos la chos ni mi 'jug ste/ /ji tsam zab pa'i tshig brjod kyang / /don dang mthun par mi 'gyur ro/ /sems ni ci la 'ang mi gnas dang / /ci la'ang mi dmigs shes bya ba/ /sems la gnas dmigs skyon sel ba'i/ /sems 'dzin</text></item>
<item><p>380b.1</p><section></section><text>phra mo de la yod/ /smig rgyu bzhin du sems med na/ /mi gnas mi dmigs byed pa gang / /nam mkha' rang la'ang mi gnas shes/ /bsgom pa don dang ldan ma yin/ /de bzhin skyil krung drang 'dug dang / /lus kyi bcos pa thams cad kyang / /lus rtog mngon par zhen las byung / /lus med</text></item>
<item><p>380b.2</p><section></section><text>mkha' la bcos su med/ /sgyu ma bzhin du lus shes na/ /drang 'dug skyil krung 'cha' ba med/ /spyod lam gsum gyis gnas pa gang / /ched du bya med byed pa'ang med/ /lus sems ma skyes gzhi med pa/ /mkha' ltar bcos pa'i kha na med/ /tshad mar lus sems 'chos byed pa/ /'dzin</text></item>
<item><p>380b.3</p><section></section><text>pa'i phur pa de la yod/ /ji ltar mtshan med nam mkha' ni/ /dmigs dang dmigs med rtsol dang bral/ /de bzhin sems nyid nam mkha' yang / /rang bzhin nyid kyis de lta'o/ /las la sogs kyang de bzhin te/ /rtsol ba med phyir gang ltar yang / /gnas pa med de mi gnas na/ /</text></item>
<item><p>380b.4</p><section></section><text>mi 'gal tsam du gyur pa yin/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lugs nges pa'i don la ji bzhin bsgom thabs rdzogs so// //man ngag dgum chung / gnyan dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'o// //[]@/ /lta ba rin chen sgron ma bzhugs/ /@##/ /gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag byang chub</text></item>
<item><p>380b.5</p><section></section><text>sems/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thugs dang ye nas mnyam/ /rig dang gti mug sgyu ma'i khyad par las/ /srid dang rnam grol rgyu dang 'bras bur snang / /dngos po med phyir dngos por rtog pa'ang med/ /chos can mi dmigs chos nyid yod ma yin/ /zhen pa bzlog phyir rkyen bshad ma gtogs</text></item>
<item><p>380b.6</p><section></section><text>pa/ /chos kyi ngang la tshig med brjod du med/ /snang ba nyid na med pa'i smig rgyu la/ /shes ldan rnams ni med pa'i blo mi 'byung / /chos rnams rang bzhin ma skyes rtogs pa yi/ /mkhas pas skye med stong par sgro mi 'dogs/ /ji bzhin ma skyes gdod nas zhi ba yi/ /gnyis med spros bral rang rig</text></item>
<item><p>380b.7</p><section></section><text>blo ldan pa/ /brjod med ngang tsam du yang mi gnas na/ /dngos dang tha snyad 'dzin par ga la 'gyur/ /bdag med chos sku byang chub snying po bas/ /gzhan nas btsal zhing thob ba ma yin yang / /rmi lam sad nas gzugs dang bral ba bzhin/ /sgrib spangs byang chub thob ces rgyal bas gsungs/</text></item>
<item><p>381a.1</p><section></section><text>rmi lam skyes bus dug 'thungs ji bzhin du/ /srid rgyu nyon mongs las rnams de ltar shes/ /rmi lam dug nad sdug bsngal bzod dka' ba/ /skye rgas na 'chi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yin/ /rmi lam nad sel sman dang 'dra ba ni/ /'phags lam rnam thar mang por rig par</text></item>
<item><p>381a.2</p><section></section><text>bya/ /sdug bsngal khad kyis 'byor pa'i skad cig ma/ /shes rab ting 'dzin khyad par skye ba'i tshul/ /rmi lam nad bsal sos pa'i bde rnyed pa/ /sems kyi rang bzhin byang chub thob pa'i dpe/ /rmi lam nyid na rgyu 'bras mi bslu bzhin/ /ma rig gnyid log rnams la de ltar nges/ /rmongs pa'i</text></item>
<item><p>381a.3</p><section></section><text>gnyid sad shes rab ldan pa dang / /'khor ba rmi lam lta bu'i dbang tsam du/ /'phags lam don brtson 'bras bu rig par gsal/ /rang bzhin mi 'gyur thob pa'i rlom sems med/ /mnyam pa'i don nyid blo dang ma mnyam na/ /tshig gi mnyam pas rtog pa'i klung mi bzlogs/ /dmyal</text></item>
<item><p>381a.4</p><section></section><text>sogs 'khor ba mnyam las ma g.yos kyang / /sdug bsngal mi zad srid las 'khyam/ /ye nas rnam dag thob la med rig nas/ /shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor rab brtson zhing / /sku gsung che ba'i yon tan kun bsdus pas/ /mtshan ma'i nyes dang ldan pa ga la yin/ /shes rab mchog gis</text></item>
<item><p>381a.5</p><section></section><text>log rtog sems sbyangs nas/ /ye shes tshogs chen rgyal ba chos kyi sku/ /dpe byad mtshan gyis ting 'dzin dbang thob nas/ /bsod nams tshogs chen rgyal ba gzugs kyi sku/ /rnam smin tshul gyis grub par mi lta zhing / /ye shes gzhan nas thob par mi byed de/ /sku gsum ji bzhin</text></item>
<item><p>381a.6</p><section></section><text>sbyor bas 'bras bu'i mchog /rtsol byas bsgrub pa'i dbang gi rgyu yang yin/ /rang sems rnal 'byor shes rab ting 'dzin yin/ /sems can nyid na bde gshegs yul la 'jug /dag pa'i zhing du smon par mi byed de/ /snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnas su bsgom/ /shes rab gnas med</text></item>
<item><p>381a.7</p><section></section><text>chags pa'i rdul bral yang / /snying rje sems can khams la skyo ba med/ /sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ma 'gags mngon sum ste/ /mtshan med ro gcig don dam dbyings su rtogs/ /slob dpon dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'i lta ba rin po che'i sgron ma rdzogs so// //</text></item>
</text>
